string.name: name
string.value: Borrowing Sera's Mirror

string.name: parent
string.value: Sera's Mirror
Go talk to Heena.
You meet Heena, who is worried the sun will damage her skin. Go get a mirror from her sister, Sarah, so she can check.
Heena asked you to get a mirror from her sister, so you walked all the way to Sarah.

string.name: name
string.value: Bringing a Mirror to Heena

string.name: parent
string.value: Sera's Mirror
You got the mirror from Sarah, who was doing her laundry. You have to take it to Heena.
You got the mirror from Sarah, who was doing her laundry and took it to Heena.

string.name: name
string.value: What Sen wants to eat

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina and Sen's Dinner Menu
Talk to Nina.
Nina is wondering what to make her brother, Sen, for dinner. Go talk to Sen, who's next to Nina, and ask him what he wants to eat.
You asked Sen, Nina's brother, what he wants for dinner. He said he wants #bMushroom Soup#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Returning to Nina

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina and Sen's Dinner Menu
Sen wants Mushroom Soup for dinner. Better tell Nina now.
You told Nina what Sen wants for dinner.

string.name: name
string.value: Letter for Lucas

string.name: parent
string.value: Please bring this letter to Lucas
Maria needs someone to help her. She wants you to deliver a latter to Lucas in Amherst.
You delivered Maria's letter to Lucas in Amherst.
Maria needs someone to help her...

string.name: name
string.value: Lucas' Reply

string.name: parent
string.value: Please bring this letter to Lucas
You delivered Maria's letter to Lucas who was in Amherst. He wrote her a reply, which you should bring to Maria.
Maria looked relieved after reading the reply from Lucas. Now you want to read it, too. Wonder what this was all about...
Biggs has a task for you.
You meet Biggs in Southperry. He wants you to get him #b10 orange mushroom caps and 30 blue snail shells#k. He doesn't look too convinced that you can do it, but it sounds like a piece of cake.
You gathered #b10 mushroom caps and 30 blue snail shells#k for Biggs in Southperry. The weapon he gave you as a reward was pretty decent.

string.name: name
string.value: Biggs's Collection of Items

string.name: name
string.value: Pio's Collecting Recycled Goods
Pio wants you to help collect recycled goods.

You ran into Pio, who is famous in Amherst for fixing broken goods. He asks you to break down scrap boxes from around town and bring back #t4031161#s and #t4031162#s. 

#t4031162# #c4031162# / #r1#k
#t4031161# #c4031161# / #r1#k
You broke the boxes and collected supplies for Pio. It was fun because you found other useful items in the boxes as well.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
You're not a beginning anymore. Talk to Rain and take the Maple Quiz!
You're not a beginning anymore. Talk to Rain and take the Maple Quiz!
Rain's first question was about which hotkey to press to open the Item Inventory. The answer is I!

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Solve Rain's second question.
What's Rain's second question?
Rain's question was about equippable items, which can be worn by double-clicking on them.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Rain's third question.
E is the hotkey for opening the Equipment Window. You can take off what you're wearing by double-clicking on the item in the Equipment Window.
Time for Rain's thirds question.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Time to answer #b#p12101##k's fourth question.
You can answer Rain's questions if you think carefully.
Rain's fourth question was about using Z to pick up items from the ground. 0 on the numpad also works.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
#b#p12101##k's fifth question. Wonder what it's about.
Rain asked job advancements. For Warriors, Thieves, and Bowmen, you need to be at least level 10, while for Magicians, you can advance at Level 8.
Whatâ€™s the fifth question?

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 6

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Time to answer #b#p12101##k's question.
Finally, the sixth question.
When you level up, you get 5 Ability Points (AP) to use to upgrade your abilities. Use the hotkey S your AP.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 7

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
This is #b#p12101##k's last question. Excited?
Finally the last question. After this, you'll no longer be a beginning.
Rain advised that it's time to leave Maple Island. In Victoria Island, you can choose a job and start a lot of new adventures. Head to Southperry to get to Victoria Island!

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training
Mai on Maple Island seems like a martial arts specialist who can train beginnings.
Mai trained you, and you feel stronger.

You're under the tutelage of the famous swordmaster, Mai, in Amherst. She wants you to hunt Snails, Blue Snails, and Shrooms.

#o100100# #r#a10161# #k
#o100101# #r#a10162# #k
#o120100# #r#a10163##k

 Ah, Mai also said to meet with #p20002# in South Ferry to get another quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Final Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training
Ready for Mai's last training?
Mai wants you to try hunting stronger monsters now. \n\n#o1210102# #r#a10171# #k
After Mai's training, you feel much, much stronger. Time to get off Maple Island! Go to South Ferry and take the boat to Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Todd's How-to-Hunt
You hear that Todd can teach you how to hunt...

Todd asks you to attack and defeat a #bJr. Sentinel#k, then talk to #p2002#.

Jr. Sentinel #b#a10181##k
#t4000142# #b#c4000142#/1#k
You defeated the monster, just as Todd instructed.

string.name: name
string.value: Sam's Suggestion
Sam suggests that you talk to Mai.
When you talk to Sam, he tells you to head to the east and hunt #r10#k #b#o100100##k before meeting #p12100#. \n\n#b#o100100# #r#a10191##k
As Sam suggested, you hunted #r10#k #o100100#s#k, then met #p12100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Pio and the Recycling
You gathered the recycling materials that Pio asked for, and he said he'd make you something nice in return.
You helped Pio gather recycling materials, and he made you a nice comfortable chair in exchange.
Pio promised to make you a nice relaxing chair with the recycling materials you gathered for him.

string.name: name
string.value: Roger's Apple
Talk to #b#p2000##k.
You learned how to use items! This will make life much easier!
By pressing the hotkey I, you can consume #b#t02010007#s#k in the Use window. Now talk to #b#p2000##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Lucas' Cute Daughter
Elder #b#p12000##k in #b#m1010000##k has a request.

#p12000# is worried that his daughter in #b#m60000##k is too scared of monsters to come home. To clear a path for her, he asked you to defeat 7 #r#o0130101#s#k and let #b#p20100##k know. \n #k \n#o0130101# #r#a10221# #k
You let #p20100# know you got rid of all those troublesome #o0130101#s. Yes!

string.name: name
string.value: Here Little Piggy...
#b#p20002##k in #b#m60000##k looks upset. What's going on?
You defeated 2 #o1210100#s! #p20002# seemed satisfied.

#p20002# heard that somebody says he looks like a #o1210100#. That's why he's so mad. To be honest, he does sort of look like a... Anyway, for #p20002#'s sake, you should defeat #r2#o1210100##k. \n #k \n#o1210100# #r#a10231# #k

string.name: name
string.value: Maria's Nutritious Juice

string.name: parent
string.value: Maria and Shanks
#b#p2103##k wants to speak to you...

#p2103# wants to make some #bnutritious juice#k and asked you to get these ingredients: #b#t4000004##k and #b#t4000011##k... Wonder what kind of juice this is...

#i4000004##t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/1 
#i4000011##t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/5
You gathered all the ingredients for #p2103#. #p2103# seemed to need another favor...

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Nutritious Juice to Shanks

string.name: parent
string.value: Maria and Shanks
#b#p2103##k seems to need your help again.
You gave #p22000# #p2103#'s nutritious juice. #p22000# looked happy...#p2103# and #p22000# are dating. The juice looks...pretty nasty, actually, but #p22000# seemed happy.
#p2103# asked you to give nutritious juice to #b#p22000##k, the captain of #b#m60000##k. Hmm... Are they dating?

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: For a new world

#p12100# was a new adventurer and worker on Victoria Island. But the elder, #p12000# in #m1010000# hired her to protect against dangerous situations on Maple Island. #p12100# says it's a hard because of all the work... Tell #b#p12000##k what #p12100# said.

#p12000# agreed with what #p12100# said. He said it's better to hire more workers. Then he asked you to tell #b#p1002101##k in #b#m104000000##k... #m104000000# is on Victoria Island... You have to go to #b#p22000##k in #b#m60000##k.
#b#p12100##k stands at #b#m50000##k. They say she is the strongest person on Maple Island... Why is she here? What's her life story? Go talk to #p12100#.

string.name: name
string.value: To Lith Harbor!

string.name: parent
string.value: For a new world

To deliver a message of #p12000# to #p1002101#, you need to go to Victoria Island. The only way you can get there is to pay #p22000# in #m60000#... Fortunately, #p12000# said he will ask #p22000# a favor. Go to #b#p22000##k.
#p22000# let you board for free as #p12000# request. Good, now on to Victoria Island! #m104000000#! Once there, you have to find #b#p1002101##k.
You met #p1002101# in #m104000000#. Hmmm. This tough and stubborn guy is a friend of #p12000#! Amazing! Fortunately, #p1002101# will do a favor for #p12000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Maria's Map Reading
You're at a crossroads. Where should you go? Hmm, maybe you should ask Maria for help.
Maria showed you how to read the World Map. If you press W, the world map will appear. You can see some places that you haven't been...
You think the world map will make it easier to go around Maple World.

string.name: name
string.value: Heena and Sera
#bMaple World#k, where fantasy and reality meet...and enjoy a nice slice of pie together! This is the world of adventure and humor meet! Go talk to #bHeena#k first.
Heena says her sister #bSera#k likes to meet new travelers. Apparently, Sera's nearby, hanging laundry. Head to your #bright#k to find her.
Sera told you to take the #bportal to the right#k to continue your journey into Maple World.

string.name: name
string.value: Nina's Brother Sen

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina's Request
Apparently, #bNina#k, a proud resident of the Mushroom Town, has a little brother...
Nina asks you to see what her brother #bSen#k wants to eat. Since Sen's inside #ba house in Mushroom Town#k, you should enter and see what he says.
Sen told you he wants some tasty #bMushroom Candy#k.

string.name: name
string.value: What Sen Wants

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina's Request
What Sen wants is some nice, tasty #bMushroom Candy#k. You better tell this to #bNina#k.
You told Nina what Sen wanted to eat.

string.name: name
string.value: Tasty Mushroom Candy

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina's Request
You tell Nina that Sen wants Mushroom Candy. She then takes ten out of her pocket and asks you to give those to him. Better go see #bSen#k now!
When Sen received the Mushroom Candy, he seemed very grateful and even gave you a couple to enjoy.

string.name: name
string.value: Todd's Hunting Method
There's a fellow named #bTodd#k who can teach you how to hunt in Maple World.

Todd says the #bCtrl#k key lets you perform basic attacks on monsters and wants you to hunt the Jr. Sentinel nearby. Hunt the #rJr. Sentinel#k, obtain 1 #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k, and bring it to #bPeter#k. 

Jr. Sentinel #r#a1##k 

#i4031802# #t4031802# #b#c4031802##k/1

You learned that skills can be accessed by pressing #bK#k to open the Skill Inventory. Unlike regular attacks, you need to raise a skill's level by assigning Skill Points. Peter also said that it's much more convenient to assign skills to the Quick Slot bars.

string.name: name
string.value: Robin the Walking Encyclopedia
#bRobin#k, who mutters excitedly to himself as he stands at Snail Hunting Ground 1, knows a lot about job advancement. Perhaps you should speak with him.

Robin promises to teach you everything you could ever want to know about stats, AP, and job advancement. But you have to take a quiz afterwards. He seems awfully fixated on that quiz... Guess you should talk to him and study up before continuing with the quest 'Robin the Walking Encyclopedia.'
You passed Robin's quiz! He looked a little wistful as you walked away, as if he wanted to give you another one...

string.name: name
string.value: Help Hunt the Snails

string.name: parent
string.value: Sam's Request
#bSam#k in the Dangerous Forest is wondering where Maria is. Maybe you can help him...
Sam wants you to take care of some snails to help #bMaria#k, who wants to collect some mushrooms. Slay #r10 Snails#k, then tell Maria that the field is clear.\n\nSnail #r#a10371##k
You told Maria that you took care of the snails.

string.name: name
string.value: Maria's Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Sam's Request
Maria is relieved the Snails are gone. Now she can now concentrate on collecting mushrooms. To make sure no one worries about her, she wants you to give this letter to #bChief Lucas#k in #bAmherst#k.
After reading the letter, Lucas seemed quite relieved and told you he wanted to introduce you to someone #bwho can train you#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Out Yoona
#bYoona#k is in a bit of trouble after wandering out of Amherst.

Yoona is trapped by monsters between her and Amherst. To help her return home, she needs you to take care of some #rBlue Snails#k and #rSpores#k.

Blue Snail #r#a10391##k 
Spore #r#a10392##k
You took care of the Blue Snails and Spores and told Yoona.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief's Introduction
For helping Maria, #bLucas#k offers to introduce you to a person who can train you. Hmm, who could he mean?

Lucas tells you to head to #bthe East Field of Amherst#k and find #bMai#k, who trains there. He thinks you'd benefit from her tutelage. #k

#y1041# #b (#u1041#)#k
#y1042# #b(#u1042#)#k
#y1043# #b(#u1043#)#k
#y1044# #b(#u1044#)#k
You completed all of Mai's Trainings and returned to Lucas.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's First Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!
Lucas introduces you to someone who can train you. #bEast of Amherst#k, you can find #bMai#k. Better head over.
Mai instructs you to hunt #r5 Stumps#k and collect #b3 Tree Branches#k. \n\nStump #r#a10411##k #i4000003# #t4000003# #b#c4000003# #k/3
You managed to hunt 5 Stumps, gather all the branches, and report it all to Mai.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Second Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!

After you finished hunting Stumps, Mai thought you had some talent and turned the training up a notch. This time, you must hunt #r5 Red Snails#k. They are faster than Stumps, so watch out. \n\nRed Snail #r#a10421##k
Red Snails have much higher endurance than Snails and Blue Snails. They also move faster than Stumps. You better not underestimate those sneaky creatures.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Last Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!
You defeated the Slimes and brought back the Squishy Liquid to Mai. She seemed impressed and now wants you to hunt a really powerful monster, #r2 Pigs#k.\n\nPig #r#a10441##k
You defeated 2 Pigs and reported the result to Mai.

string.name: name
string.value: Bari's Test
#bStanding close to Mai#k, #bBari#k seems to be looking for you...

Bari has been instructed by Mai to test your skills. He wants you to defeat the most powerful monster on Maple Island, an #rOrange Mushroom#k, and bring back #b1 Orange Mushroom Cap#k. 

Orange Mushroom #r#a10451##k
#i4000001# #t4000001# #b#c4000001# #k/1
You defeated an Orange Mushroom and brought back an Orange Mushroom Cap to Bari. Ah, Mai's training...officially complete! Ready to take on Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Designated Monster Effect
Designated Monster Effect
Collect 5 #b#M1047# cards#k and receive bonus EXP when hunting.\r\nWhen hunting #r#M1047##b, receive #r#x1047# #b#k
You have received bonus EXP from the Monster Book effect after hunting the designated monster.

string.name: name
string.value: Job Recommendation
The Maple Administrator seems willing to lend me a hand on job selections...
I was still just getting my feet wet in this game, so the Maple Administrator decided to help select a job for me.
I was still just getting my feet wet in this game, so the Maple Administrator decided to help select a job for me.

string.name: name
string.value: Becoming a Warrior
The Maple Administrator told me that I may be best suited to be a warrior.
The Maple Administrator told me she'll take me to Perion now to help me make the job advancement as a warrior.
Should I go ahead and make the job advancement as a warrior?

string.name: name
string.value: Becoming a Magician
The Maple Administrator told me that I may be best suited to be a magician.
The Maple Administrator told me she'll take me to Ellinia now to help me make the job advancement as a magician.
Should I go ahead and make the job advancement as a magician?

string.name: name
string.value: Becoming a Bowman
The Maple Administrator told me that I may be best suited to be a bowman.
The Maple Administrator told me she'll take me to Henesys now to help me make the job advancement as a bowman.
Should I go ahead and make the job advancement as a bowman?

string.name: name
string.value: Becoming a Thief
The Maple Administrator told me that I may be best suited to be a thief.
The Maple Administrator told me she'll take me to Kerning City now to help me make the job advancement as a thief.
Should I go ahead and make the job advancement as a thief?

string.name: name
string.value: Becoming a Pirate
The Maple Administrator told me that I may be best suited to be a pirate.
The Maple Administrator told me she'll take me to The Nautilus now to help me make the job advancement as a pirate.
Should I go ahead and make the job advancement as a pirate?

string.name: name
string.value: Moon Bunny's Rice Cake

The mysterious Moon Bunny only appears in full moon at #b#m910010000##k. #b#p1012112##k of #b#m100000200##k is looking for brave explorers that are willing to help #b#p1012114##k get #r#t04001101##k.
If you wish to see the Moon Bunny, you'll have to plant the Primrose Seed at a designated spot to bring out the full moon. Protect the Moon Bunny from wild monsters so the Moon Bunny can make #r10 rice cakes#k.

 - #eTime Limit#n : 10 min
 - #eParticipants#n : 3 ~ 6
 - #eRewards#n : #b#i1002798# #t1002798##k
 (After acquiring 20 Moon Bunny's Rice
 Cake, hand them over to Tory for a nice
 hat)

Gather #b10 Moon Bunny's Rice Cakes#k and hand them to Growlie!
#eMission#n
Complete #r#jcmp# #k
In Progress #b#jmin# #kmin #b#jsec# #ksec ( #jdate# ) 
 #b#i1002798# #t1002798# #k #r #jhave# #k
Record
 #b#jrank# #kRANK 


#eSummary#n
The mysterious Moon Bunny only appears at #b#m910010000##k when the moon is full. #b#p1012112##k of #b#m100000200##k is looking for brave explorers who are willing to help #b#p1012114##k get #r#t04001101##k.
If you want to see the Moon Bunny, you'll have to plant the Primrose Seed at the designated spot to bring out the full moon. Then, you must protect the Moon Bunny from wild monsters so that it can make #r10 rice cakes#k.

Flawless teamwork allowed Growlie to eat and eat until he couldn't take anymore, and it quickly became a topic of discussion for many in Henesys.

If you want to see the Moon Bunny, you'll have to plant the Primrose Seed at the designated spot to bring out the full moon. Then, you must protect the Moon Bunny from wild monsters so that it can make #r10 rice cakes#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Lord Pirate

#b#m251000000##k is normally a peaceful town where the Bellflowers reside...until recently, when the sinister #r#o9300119##k invaded without warning! #p2094000# screams for help, because the King of the Bellflowers, #b#p2094001##k, has been kidnapped. Make your way onto the pirates' battleship and find a way to remove #o9300119#.
The goal of Stage 1 is to defeat all the monsters as quickly as possible. On Stage 2, the battle takes place on the deck. Make sure to find the hidden route onto the deck. For the final stage, defeat #r#o9300119##k and rescue #p2094001#! 

 - #eTime Limit#n
 1) Stage 1: 4 min
 2) Stage 2: 6 min
 3) Stage 3: 6 min + 6 min 
 4) Stage 4: 6 min
 5) Stage 5: 8 min 
 - #ePlayers#n: 3 - 6
 - #eRewards#n: #b#i01002571# #t01002571##k
 (Clear the Lord Pirate PQ #r30
 times#k to acquire it)

You successfully defeated #o9300119# and rescued #p2094001#. If you were able to clear it #r30 times#k and acquire #b#t01002571##k, why not clear it #r80, 200, or even 350#k times to shoot for the hat upgrade?

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo and Juliet

The star-crossed lovers of #b#m261000000##k, #b#p2112004##k and #b#p2112003##k, hold the key to preventing #m261000000# from going through a potentially devastating civil war. Find out the real truth behind the cause of hatred between Zenumist and Alcadno!
Join forces and help either #p2112004# or #p2112003# pass through 7 sets of obstacles. Protect their love and manage to lead #r#p2112014##k to the right path to finally bring peace to #m261000000#.

 - #eTime Limit#n : 45 min
 - #eParticipants#n : 4
 - #eRewards#n : #b#i1122010# #t1122010##k
 (#bGather up #r25#k each of
 Zenumist Marble#k and #bAlcadno Marble#k to
 acquire it from #bYulete#k)

Gather up #r25 each#k of #b#t04001159##k and #b#t04001160##k, which can be earned by protecting #p2112004# and #p2112003#. Then, #b#p2112014##k will exchange them for #b#t01122010##k. To upgrade #t01122010#, use the #b#t02041212##k, which needs #r10#k marbles to work.
#eMission#n
 Complete #r#jcmp# #k
 Fastest Time #b#jmin# #kmin #b#jsec# #ksec ( #jdate# ) 
 #b#i1122010# #t1122010# #k #r #jhave# #k
 Record
 #b#jrank# #kRANK 


#eSummary#n
The star-crossed lovers of #b#m261000000##k, #b#p2112004##k and #b#p2112003##k, hold the key to preventing #m261000000# from going through a devastating civil war. Find out the real cause of hatred between the Zenumists and Alcadnos!
Join forces and help either #p2112004# or #p2112003# pass through 7 sets of obstacles. Protect their love and lead #r#p2112014##k to the right path to finally bring peace to #m261000000#.

#m261000000# is finally at peace. The heroes who prevented the civil war between the Alcadnos and Zenumists were in heavy demand, but they disappeared without a trace, leaving many to wonder who was responsible for such a heroic act.

Join forces and help either #p2112004# or #p2112003# pass through 7 sets of obstacles. Protect their love and lead #r#p2112014##k to the right path to finally bring peace to #m261000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Nett's Pyramid

The #rPyramid of Nett#k, the God of revenge, has been buried deep inside the sands of the desert for generations. However, due to the will of Nett, it has recently risen above ground. If you are not afraid of facing unknown chaos and death, challenge yourself to a fight against the Pharaoh Yeti who lies inside.
 
 - #eRequirement#n 
 1) Easy Mode: Lv. 40+
 2) Normal Mode: Lv. 45+
 3) Hard Mode: Lv. 50+
 4) Hell Mode: Lv. 61+

 - #eFinal Boss#n: #b#i1132013# #t1132013##k
 #b#i1132012# #t1132012##k
 (You can obtain it 
 from #t2022613#.)
 #b#i1142142# #t1142142##k
 (You can obtain it by defeating 
 #r50000 +#k.)

Enter #rNett's Pyramid#k and survive the challenges inside.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a New House For Blackbull
You hear Blackbull in Perion is building a new house...

You run into '#p1020000#' again, the guy whose house you helped fix. He has a much harder task for you this time, though. His cousins from #m100000000# are all moving to Perion, so he needs to build a brand new house, from scratch! He needs the deed to his land, but it was stolen from his son by #r#o3230100##k. You'll need to go see the Curse Eyes who roam the Northern Forest areas...
So that all of Blackbull's cousins could move to Perion, you got him the item he requested. It was really tough, and you hope he doesn't ask you to BUILD a house for him next time...

string.name: name
string.value: Maya of Henesys

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine
You hear that #p1012101# is very sick...

A girl named Maya in Henesys has been ill for a long time. It looks like she can't live a normal life at all. You agree to help her. #bWeird Medicine#k... What a strange name! She says she'll get a little better by taking that... You should go to Lith Harbor and see this guy Teo...

Maya wanted you to go see Teo of Lith Harbor, so you did just that. He promised to give you the Weird Medicine only after you get him a Sparkling Rock. Geez, he won't even give any free medicine for a sick girl?

string.name: name
string.value: Finding Sophia

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

In Lith Harbor, you meet a heavily-bearded crewmember of The Victoria called Teo. He says he has some #bWeird Medicine#k but he isn't willing to give it up for free. Instead he says he'll trade it for a #bsparkling rock#k. He seems like he knows Maya pretty well, yet he still wants a favor first, knowing how sick Maya is? Creep. Anyway, to get the #bsparkling rock#k, you should head to Perion and talk to #rSophia#k, the daughter of the owner of the General Store there.
You met Sophia. To make the sparkling rock, she said she needs #bArcon's blood#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Sparkling Rock

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

You meet Sophia in the General Store in Perion. She's working on her dream to be an alchemist. To make the sparkling rock, she says she needs #b50 squishy liquids, 50 leaves, 20 octopus legs#k and #b1 Arcon's blood#k. Everything looks reasonable enough...wait, Arcon's blood?! Fortunately, Sophia knows where to get some. She says to have a chat with Manji, who's somewhere around Perion.
Sophia told you that Manji has some Arcon's Blood, a key ingredient to make a sparkling rock.

string.name: name
string.value: Arcon's Blood?

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine
Manji asked for #t04000020# in return for some Arcon's Blood.

You find Manji in Perion, but he is unwilling to give you any #bArcon's Blood#k for free. He wants you to go to the underground tunnel in the middle of the island and gather up #b10 Wild Boar Teeth#k first. You practically shiver at how coldly Manji treats you... You almost regret agreeing to help Maya, but no one else seems willing to...

string.name: name
string.value: Getting Arcon's Blood

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

You gather the #bWild Boar Teeth#k and give them to Manji in Perion. Still as cocky as ever, he hands over the #bArcon's Blood#k. Maybe he isn't so horrible...at least he followed through with his promise.
You brought the Charms of the Undead to Manji and finally got some Arcon's Blood. Hurry back to Sophia...

string.name: name
string.value: Making Sparkling Rock

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

Sophia looks genuinely surprised when you hand her all the materials needed for the #bsparkling rock#k. Well, it wasn't easy! Anyway, she hands over a #bsparkling rock#k made of the materials you gathered. Hmm, the #bsparkling rock#k...gives off a strange light and then...starts glittering, and...whoa, now you understand why people want this! It's mesmerizing! Well, now you just have to do it trade it with Teo in Lith Harbor.

Sophia looked genuinely surprised when you handed her all the materials needed for the #bsparkling rock#k. Well, it wasn't easy! Anyway, she handed back a #bsparkling rock#k made of the materials you gathered. Hmm, the #bsparkling rock#k...gives off a strange light and then...starts glittering, and...whoa, now you understand why people want this! It's mesmerizing! Well, now you just have to do it trade it with Teo in Lith Harbor.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Weird Medicine

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

You traded the #bsparkling rock#k to Teo in Lith Harbor for the #bweird medicine#k. Now, to get it to #rMaya#k. Anyway, the medicine looks quite tasty. If you're ever thirsty and have no water handy, you'd be tempted to drink it yourself!

You returned to Henesys and handed Maya the weird medicine. Hopefully she'll get better after taking this. As a sign of thanks, Maya gave you 5,000 mesos and a #bbrown bamboo hat#k. The hat, er, well, it should keep your head protected under the hot sun, but it's kind of old and raggedy. And when you wear it, you feel like insects are crawling around. Nah, must be your imagination, right?

string.name: name
string.value: Pia and the Blue Mushroom
Find Pia in Henesys.

Under the watchtower in Henesys Park, you see Pia, wearing a teddy bear costume. How cute! She tells you that she ran into a bully #o2220100# on her way to Ellinia, and now she wants you to show the rude mushroom who's boss! Collect #b10 #t4000009#s and 10 #t4000012#s#k as proof. You contemplate telling Pia she's asking to be teased, walking around the forest in a bear costume, but you decide against it.

You delivered #b10 #t4000009#s and 10 #t4000012#s#k to Pia in Henesys Park. She was thrilled that she got vengeance on the mushrooms and gave you a Scroll for defense. All you have to do is click on it in the Use tab of your Item Inventory and drag it to your helmet in the Equipment window... Oh, and you'll have to cross your fingers and hope the Scroll doesn't fail.

string.name: name
string.value: Jane and the Wild Boar
Look for Jane in Lith Harbor.

In Lith Harbor, you find Jane, a girl wearing bunny ears. Jane says she wants to travel the world, but her dad won't let her. She thinks if you can get her #b10 Wild Boar Teeth and 10 Horny Mushroom Caps#k, her father will change his mind.

You delivered the #t4000020# and #t4000015##k to Jane. You wonder if this will really change her father's mind...she's wearing bunny ears, for goodness sake! Ah well, it's none of your business. In return, Jane gave you a Scroll for ATT. Your weapon's going to be awesome...if the Scroll works.

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's First Challenge

string.name: parent
string.value: Jane the Alchemist
You hear Jane's got herself a new life ambition...

Last time, you got Jane some boar's teeth to convince her dad to let her travel. That didn't work. Now she has a new dream. She wants to be an alchemist! A bit fickle, but whatever. Now, she needs materials... You can guess where this is going. She wants you to get her #b1 Pure Water, 30 Medicines with Weird Vibes, and 20 Malady's Experimental Frogs#k so she can make some Elixir.
You got the materials Jane needed to make some elixir. If she fails...is the whole place going to blow up?

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's Final Challenge

string.name: parent
string.value: Jane the Alchemist

For this last experiment, Jane promises to make you a mysterious Scroll. For that, she needs #ba Moon Rock, 2 Dragon Skins, and 3 Saps of Ancient Tree#k. Maybe you should ask the fairies at Ellinia for the Moon Rock...

You got the materials Jane needed and the scroll for glove for ATT was made without a hitch. Sweet! Jane expressed a strong desire to keep experimenting. Maybe next time you return you'll be able to buy something from her that's not sold in stores...

string.name: name
string.value: Alex's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Alex the Runaway Kid
There is a runaway kid called Alex in Kerning City...

At the top of a building in Kerning City, you meet Alex, who ran away from home after a spat with his father. Now, with no money and a severe case of boredom, he wants to go home. He wants you to convince his father, Stan, who happens to be the chief of Henesys, to let him return home... Not only that, he also wants you to get a #bold gold watch#k, which belonged to Alex's mother, from his father as proof that he's calmed down.
As Alex requested, you looked for his father in Henesys to get Alex's mother's #bold gold watch#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Talking to Stan

string.name: parent
string.value: Alex the Runaway Kid
At the entrance of Henesys Park, you meet Alex's father, Stan, the chief of Henesys. Before you can even start a conversation, he asks you to get him #b10 #t4000007#s and 30 #t4000002#s#k.
Only after you brought the #t4000007#s and the #t4000002#s did Chief Stan start talking to you.

string.name: name
string.value: Mother's Gold Watch

string.name: parent
string.value: Alex the Runaway Kid

At the entrance of Henesys Park, you met Alex's father Stan, the chief of Henesys. He was even more blunt and difficult to talk to than you'd anticipated, but you finally convinced him to accept Alex back with open arms. You also got Alex's late mother's #bgold watch#k as proof. Now, all you need to do is get this watch to Alex in Kerning City.

You gave Alex his late mother's #bgold watch#k. As a sign of appreciation, he gave you an earring he received from friends he met while traveling. Well, Stan forgave Alex, but it doesn't seem like Alex plans to head home right away. Maybe you should keep an eye open next time you're in Henesys.

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen and the Glass Shoe
Arwen the fairy from Ellinia has lost something...

Arwen the fairy from Ellinia says she lost her #bglass shoe#k a couple of days ago, on her way to Perion. A monster covered in flame stole it! Fairies obsess over glimmering, shiny objects so she obviously wants it back... Time to hunt some monsters near Perion.

You returned the glass shoe to Arwen in Ellinia. You got lucky, finding it off a nasty Fireboar As a sign of gratitude, she gave you a fairy item. It's gorgeous and glimmers like a star. Dang, maybe you can use this to make something special.

string.name: name
string.value: Luke the Security Guy
Meet Luke the Security Guy at the entrance of the Henesys Dungeon.

At the entrance of the dungeon, you meet Luke the security guy. He wants to make a healthy dish for his mom and asks you to get him #b100 pieces of Jr. Necki's skin, 10 wings of Stirge, and a bowl of salad#k. He says he's too busy, but it looks like he's just napping on the job...

You got Luke the stuff he asked for. Since he's making the Snake Drink... you want a taste, too! Luke gave you a nicely refined jewel he found from around the area. Anyway, you should drop by later when he's done making the Snake Drink.

string.name: name
string.value: Hungry Ronnie

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book

Inside a tree tunnel near Ellinia, you find #bRonnie#k, Mr. Wetbottom's son. He says the red book is off limits, but he seems to be starving. In the end, you make a deal. If you get him #b20 Lupin Bananas, Rina's Unagi Special, and some Fresh Milk#k, he will hand over the book. According to Ronnie, you can find Rina in Henesys and the fresh milk from Rowen the fairy, in Ellinia.

You got Ronnie the food he needed and received the #bSecret Book#k Mr. Wetbottom desperately wanted back. It's a weird-looking book with a red cover... You have a feeling that you should not open this book... Anyway, gotta return this to Mr. Wetbottom at the VIP sauna in Sleepywood before it's too late.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret to Unagi Special

To get the Unagi Special and some Fresh Milk, you need to gather some ingredients. Rina of Henesys requests #b25 Curse Eye tails and 3 Pig's Heads#k for the Unagi Special. Rowen the fairy of Ellinia wants a refined #bDiamond#k in exchange for fresh milk.

Inside the tree tunnel of Ellinia, you found #bRonnie#k, the son of Mr. Wetbottom. He was adamant about not giving away the red book, but he seemed very hungry. You wound up making a deal with him, where he would give you the red book after you get him #b50 Lupin's Bananas, Rina's Special Unagi, and some fresh milk#k. According to Ronnie, Rina can be found at Henesys, and the fresh milk can be obtained through a fairy in Ellinia.

string.name: name
string.value: Cold Milk

To get the Unagi special and some fresh milk, you need to gather ingredients. Rina of Henesys requests #b25 Curse Eye tails and 3 pig's heads#k for the Unagi special. Rowen the fairy of Ellinia wants a refined #bdiamond#k for some fresh milk.

Inside the tree tunnel of Ellinia, you found #bRonnie#k, the son of Mr. Wetbottom. He was adamant about not giving away the red book, but he seemed very hungry. You wound up making a deal with him, where he would give you the red book after you get him #b50 Lupin's Bananas, Rina's Special Unagi, and some fresh milk#k. According to Ronnie, Rina can be found at Henesys, and the fresh milk can be obtained through a fairy in Ellinia.

string.name: name
string.value: Returned Secret Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book
You got Ronnie some yummy food in exchange for the Secret Book. You're tempted to peek inside...

You got Mr. Wetbottom the precious Secret Book he'd been desperately looking for. You asked him if he's worried about Ronnie at all, only to hear that he'll be in good hands with the fairies... You got the sauna clothes in return for the book. Might as well enjoy it now and relax here at the sauna...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 50 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
I think Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia has something to ask me...

You run into #bRowen#k again, the fairy who gave you fresh milk for Ronnie, Mr. Wetbottom's son. Back then, she seemed to be keeping her guard up against humans, but now, it looks like she accepts you as Ronnie's friend... Rowen is assistant to the head magician of Ellinia, Grendel the Really Old, and she tells you that Grendel is concerned about the cursed dolls that he made with his black magic a long, long time ago. The dolls had been sealed up for a while, until a bunch of Lupins took them and ran away. The Lupins have since become zombies and have been destroying the forest. To return the forest to how it was before, someone needs to take down the Zombie Lupins and take away the #bcursed dolls#k from them... So, you readily accept the request to collect #b50 cursed dolls#k, but fear those crazy monkeys may be too much to handle...
You eliminated a bunch of Zombie Lupins in a forest near Ellinia and collected all #b50 Cursed Dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave you 7 ores. You hope the forest will return to normal...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 70 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
70? Well, that shouldn't be too hard...
You eliminated a bunch of Zombie Lupins in a forest near Ellinia and collected all #b70 Cursed Dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave you 10 ores. You hope the forest will return to normal...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 100 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asks for your help again, this time to collect #b100 Cursed Dolls#k. It's getting quite serious now...

You eliminated a bunch of Zombie Lupins in a forest near Ellinia and collected all #b100 Cursed Dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave you 5 very rare ores. You hope the forest will return to normal...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 150 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asks for your help again, this time to collect #b150 Cursed Dolls#k. Now that's a lot of Cursed Dolls!\n\n#i4000031# #t4000031# #b#c4000031##k/150

You eliminated a bunch of Zombie Lupins in a forest near Ellinia and collected all #b150 Cursed Dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave you the Scroll for gloves. You hope the forest will return to normal...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 200 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asks for your help one last time, this time to collect #b200 Cursed Dolls#k. You wonder why she needs so many... Is she trying to sell them or something?

You eliminated a bunch of Zombie Lupins in a forest near Ellinia and collected all #b200 Cursed Dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave you a nice hat. You've collected so many dolls for her, but it seems like the Zombie Lupins aren't decreasing in any way, shape, or form... you wonder what's going on. However, it seems that the fairies may not have such animosity toward humans now... at least that's a good thing.

string.name: name
string.value: Second Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.

This time Ronnie wanted #b50 of octopus legs, Curse Eye tails, wild boar tooth, and the charm of the undead EACH#k. These are probably available by the monsters around the deep forest, highland, and ant tunnels.
I got them all for Ronnie. Please don't tell me he wanted all these for free...!

string.name: name
string.value: Last Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.

Ronnie makes his final request. This time, he wants #b50 of the Medicine With Weird Vibes, 50 Wild Kargo Eyes, 50 Tauromacis Horns, and 1 Diamond#k. It will be very difficult, but it can certainly be done by hunting at the Subway, Deep Forest, and the Cursed Temple. \n\n#i4021007:# #t4021007:# #c4021007# / 1 #i4000025:# #t4000025:# #c4000025# / 10 #i4000027:# #t4000027:# #c4000027# / 10 #i4000036:# #t4000036:# #c4000036# / 10 #i4000028:# #t4000028:# #c4000028# / 10

I got all the materials Ronnie needed for the last time. Is this it? For the reward, he gave me a pair of shoes he got as a gift from the fairies that found it somewhere around the forest. Somehow, he can't put the shoes on, so I'm getting it... hopefully it works... haha!

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's First Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya
Let's go to Maya in Henesys
I got all the items Maya requested, but when do I get rewarded for this? What? How many more times do I have to do this??

I got a favor request from Maya of Henesys, who has been collecting various items. She wanted #b50 each of snail shells, blue snail shells, mushroom spores, and tree branches#k. Maybe...well it looks like I can get these from the monsters around the prarie...

string.name: name
string.value: What Pia has Borrowed

string.name: parent
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend

You see Rina at Henesys, and she tells you that she took that red cape, because Pia didn't return the items she borrowed. Rina says that if she gets her items back, the cape is Pia's again. Go find #b1 Black Crystal, 1 Ancient Scroll, and 30 horns of Tauromacis.\n\n#i4021008:# #t4021008:# #c4021008# / 1 #i4000028:# #t4000028:# #c4000028# / 15 #i4001005:# #t4001005:# #c4001005# / 1

I went to Rina to get Pia's cape, but Rina told me that she is keeping the cape until Rina brings back what she borrowed from Rina. She said she will return the cape if she gets back what Pia has borrowed from her.

string.name: name
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend

string.name: parent
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend

You delivered #b1 Black Crystal, 1 Ancient Document, and 30 horns of Tauromacis#k to Rina, and in return, you received Pia's #bRed Cape#k. You should take the cape, along with #b15 Silvers, 50 Dragon Skins, and 40 screws#k to Pia.\n\n#i4000030:# #t4000030:# #c4000030# / 5 #i4003000:# #t4003000:# #c4003000# / 10 #i4031043:# #t4031043:# #c4031043# / 1 #i4011004:# #t4011004:# #c4011004# / 5

I got Pia of Henesys Park all the materials she requested for her friend's claw, and in return, got myself some thief-only clothes...wow...since that was made just for me, I should take good care of these, right? Anyway, did that friend of Pia's leave by now? Who knows? I may see him sometime...

string.name: name
string.value: Hero's Gladius

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji's Old Gladius
Let's look for Manji in Perion

I ran into Manji from Perion again, the same Manji that I met while I was helping the little Maya get her medicine. He was shocked by my stronger appearance, and wanted to ask me for a favor. Long long ago, he was in danger of being attacked by Balrog, only to be saved by the legendary hero Tristan. He died in place of Manji, and for that, he's been keeping that sword to this day. Too bad the sword has been soaked in Balrog's evilness and is as ragged as possible. It's too embarrassing to even call it a sword now. Anyway, he gave me the #rOld Gladius#k and wanted me to reawaken it for him. If it indeed gets reawakened, it becomes the #bHero's Gladius#k ...I should go see Chrishrama of Sleepywood just the way Manji said it...

It seems that this Gladius which Manji told me is one fine sword. I had to make a hard decision choosing one bwtween the #bGladius#k and the #bSkull Earring#k which Manji offered me, but I will not regret.

string.name: summary
string.value: I need to reawaken the Hero's Gladius and take it to Manji.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 7,500 EXP #Wselect# 1 #i1302015:# #t1302015:# 1 #i1032012:# #t1032012:# Can proceed to the "Reawakening the Gladius" quest. You can now begin the "Manji's Request" quest.

string.name: name
string.value: John's Present
Let's go see John at Lith Harbor again.

I ran into John the fisherman again at Lith Harbor. This time, he wanted to get his wife Blue Viola for her birthday. He asked me to get #b20 Blue Violas#k for him. The scent of Blue Violas last over 500 years...and according to John, they can be found through the mysterious statue again, where the flower may be found. Man ... do I HAVE to go in there again??

I got John all #b20 Blue Violas#k. It has a nice scent to it, but 20 of them? Makes my head spin...As a sign of appreciation, John got me a nice glove he found inside a ship. I mean, it looks like someone accidentally left that glove in there...is he allowed to give it to me like that? What if I wear this around town and run into the actual owner of it??

string.name: name
string.value: John's Last Present
I heard John has one final thing to ask me...

I ran into John the fisherman again at Lith Harbor. John says his mother recently passed away. He wants to place some White Violas at her headstone to pay his respects. They're supposed to possess a delicate scent that lasts for over a thousand years. According to John, they can be found through the mysterious statue... Yeah, it's a touching gesture, but really, there AGAIN?!

I got John all #b30 White Violas#k. It has a nice scent to it, but 30 of them? Makes my head spin...As a sign of appreciation, John gave me a set of his mother's earrings. These earrings look like they are made of some common flowers, but it seems there's something to it...

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach
A beautiful girl by the name of Riel from Florina Beach seems to be in need of help...
Riel introduced me to a part time job, where I have to collect #b10 Coconuts#k. Why don't I start collecting those delicious looking Coconuts over there on the right?\n\n#t4000136# #c4000136#/10
I brought back fresh coconuts just like Riel said. Riel told me I can come back for work anytime I want. I guess I won't be starving here in Florina Beach.

string.name: name
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's First Worry
I hear that Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys is worried about something...

You run into Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys, who is overcome with concern. She says there aren't enough decorations for the village festival, and asks you to get #b3 Slime Bubbles and 20 Pig's Ribbons#k. 


#i4000010##t4000010# #b#c4000010##k / 3
#i4000002##t4000002# #b#c4000002##k / 20
I brought back all the stuff Mrs. Ming Ming asked me for, but I'm sure these decorations are not the only things needed for the festival...

string.name: name
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry

string.name: parent
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry
I heard Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys has a new worry...

I met Mrs. Ming Ming again in Henesys who was preparing for the village festival. She said she needs food to prepare for the festival, and asked me to collect #b15 Pig's heads, 60 Octopus Legs, and Estelle's Special Sauce#k. To get the special sauce, I think I'll have to go find Estelle near Ellinia.
I met up with #bEstelle#k near Ellinia to get her #bSpecial Sauce#k, but she apparently she doesn't want to give it to me for free...

string.name: name
string.value: Estelle's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry
I ran into #bEstelle#k near Ellinia. She was making a necklace for her mother's birthday present. If I can get her #b1 Garnet#k, she was willing to give me the special sauce.

I got #b1 Garnet#k for Estelle, who I met near Ellinia, for making her mother's birthday present. She gave me #bEstelle's Special Sauce#k. I better collect other materials and return to Mrs. Ming Ming.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Fossil Dig-up
I heard that #p1022006# the archeologist is searching for something in the Rocky Mountains on the East side of Perion...

#b#p1022006##k the archaeologist you ran into at the Rocky Mountains on the east side of Perion said he lost the fossils he collected near Perion. He asks you to bring back #b100 #t4031146#s#k and #b100 #t4031147#s#k which the #b#o1140100#s#k and the #b#o2230102#s#k took. If he could lose something that important, he must be more careless than he looks...

#i4031146##t4031146# #b#c4031146##k / 100
#i4031147##t4031147# #b#c4031147##k / 100
I found the fossil which #b#p1022006##k lost.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering a Box of Fossil

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Fossil Dig-up

#b#p1022006# the Archeologist#k said that it is not safe to put the valuable fossils in the tent. He asked me to take the fossil and deliver it to #bDr. #p1032104##k in Ellinia. He also wrote a letter of introduction for me to show him.

#b#p1022006# the Archeologist#k in Perion said that it is not safe to put the valuable fossils in his tent. He asked me to deliver it to #bDr. #p1032104##k in Ellinia. Dr. Betty said it is going to be really busy from now. He asked me to stop by again and give him a hand afterwards. Fossils huh...? Should I give it a try?

string.name: name
string.value: Research on Plant Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Plants
Dr. Betty, a biologist near Ellinia is looking for an assistant.

#bDr. Betty#k asked me to work as an assistant for a while. My first task from her is to collect #b20 #t4031150#s#k. I can see various plants covering the woods in Ellinia.\n\n#t4031150# #c4031150#/20
My first job as Dr. Betty's assistant was to collect some plants in the woods in Ellinia and sample them. It wasn't that hard I guess.

string.name: name
string.value: Transporting Drake's Skull

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Fossils
I received the #t4031151# from Anne, Dr. Betty's daughter. Now I have to deliver this carefully to Dr. Betty...
I collected some plant samples and Drake's Skull to help Dr. Betty's research on fossils. I can't wait to see the results...I'll go and see Dr. Betty, because he said he would tell me when I go back.

string.name: name
string.value: Stranger's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Mystery of Naora Hospital
I heard there is someone in Naora Hospital in Kerning City...

I met #b#p1052105##k in Naora Hospital in Kerning City. #b#p1052105##k wanted to see how the surgery went, but there was no mirror. #b#p1052105##k asked me to hunt down a #bWild Boar#k and collect #b20#t4031155##k...\n\n#t4031155# #c4031155#/20
For the Stranger I met in Naora Hospital, I actually collected #t4031155# and brought back to her.

string.name: name
string.value: Stranger's Identity

string.name: parent
string.value: Mystery of Naora Hospital

The Stranger you meet in Naora Hospital is a Ghost! She's waiting for Naora, first unaware, and then unwilling to believe, that Naora is dead... The Stranger tells you that she needs #b4 Charms of the Undead#k in order to live again, and asks you to find them. You wonder if her plan will really work...\n\n#i4000008##t4000008# #b#c4000008##k / 4

#p1052105# who I met in Naora Hospital was a Ghost. She was staying in the Hospital, not knowing that she's dead. She couldn't live again with #t4000008#. It seems that she already knew she couldn't make it...I really hope she returns to heaven.

string.name: name
string.value: Camila's Gem
I heard that #p1012108# in Henesys is worrying about something...
You meet #p1012108# in Henesys, and she asks you to deliver #b#t4031156##k to #b#p1012107##k for her, because she is afraid. You heard that you could get to #m900000000# through Way to the Beach...
I delivered #p1012108# to #p1012107#. I'm sure they are really close friends, since they give what's most precious to them. I wish I could meet a friend like that during my journey...

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Maple History Book 2
I found all 3 Maple History Books, and gave them all to #p2041022#. He gave me #t4031160# and told me to go see #b#p1012109##k.
I showed #p1012109# the #t4031160# that Tigun gave me, and in return, he gave me #t1012109:#. As a sign of thanks for finding the history book, #p1012109# gave me #t1012109:#.

string.name: name
string.value: Estelle's Special Sauce

string.name: parent
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry

You receive the special sauce from Estelle near Ellinia. Now, deliver it to Mrs. Ming Ming, along with #b1 Pig's Head and 20 Octopus Legs#k. 

#i4000017##t4000017# #b#c4000017##k / 1
#i4000006##t4000006# #b#c4000006##k / 20
#i4031154##t4031154# #b#c4031154##k / 1
I got all the materials that Mrs. Ming Ming asked me to get, and gave it to her. I can't wait to see the village festival!

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Warrior
What does it mean to be a Warrior? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bWarrior#k if you're at least #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1022000##k in #rPerion#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Warrior from #p1022000#. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Bowman
What does it mean to be a Bowman? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bBowman#k if you're at least #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1012100##k in #rHenesys#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Bowman from #p1012100# in Henesys. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Thief
What does it mean to be a Thief, like #p1052001# in Kerning City? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bThief#k if you're at least #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see the #r#p1052001##k in #rKerning City#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Thief from #p1052001# in Henesys. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Magician
What does it mean to be a Magician? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bMagician#k if you're at least #bLevel 8#k. He tells you to see #rGrendel the Really Old#k in #rEllinia#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Magician from the chief of all wizards, Grendel the Really Old. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.

string.name: name
string.value: A Lesson on Job Advancement
What do you have to do to start the job you like? Better talk to Olaf in Lith Harbor to find out.
Listen carefully as #p1002101# describes the details of each job. There'll be a quiz afterwards!

You answered #p1002101#'s questions. You need to be at least #bLevel 10#k to be a #bWarrior, Thief, Bowman, or Pirate#k, and at least #bLevel 8#k to be a #bMagician#k. Head on over to the city where you can get your first job! Warriors: Perion. Thieves: Kerning City. Magicians: Ellinia. Bowmen: Henesys. Pirates: Nautilus.

string.name: name
string.value: Icarus's Hang Glider
Apparently there's someone at Kerning City by the name of #p1052106# that stands on top of a building just staring at the sky 24/7.

You meet #b#p1052106##k on top of a building in Kerning City. He seems like a nice guy with an unquenchable thirst for flying, and he wants to create a Hang Glider to fulfill his dream of flying. He asks that you gather up the materials for the Hang Glider. Even though the process of making a Hang Glider seems dubious, you can't say no to his sincere desire to fly. You'll need to get him #b20 #t4000042#s, 10 pieces of #t4003001#, and 5 #t4003004#s#k.

#i4000042##t4000042# #b#c4000042##k / 20
#i4003001##t4003001# #b#c4003001##k / 10
#i4003004##t4003004# #b#c4003004##k / 5

I got the materials needed for #p1052106# to make the Hang Glider and realize his dream of flying. I just wonder if Stirge's wings are enough to make the Hang Glider. I don't know if this will really work, though, so I'll check up on him around the time when the Hang Glider should be ready to take flight.

string.name: name
string.value: In search of Wing the Fairy

string.name: parent
string.value: Icarus and the Flying Pill
I wonder how Icarus's doing with the flying balloon...maybe I should go check up on him at Kerning City.

Icarus had failed to make the flying balloon, but his never-ending quest for flight remains. This time he wants to deviate from the scientific approach to flight and opts for the magical approach, and asks me to see his best friend #b#p1032106##k at Ellinia, the town of fairies. Apparently Wing the Fairy knows the way to make #b'#t4031163#'#k...I'll need to see that fairy at Ellinia for Icarus's sake.

string.name: name
string.value: The Ingredients for the Flying Pill

string.name: parent
string.value: Icarus and the Flying Pill

You meet Wing the Fairy at Ellinia, but he doesn't seem to like people. You wonder how he could be so close with Icarus... Anyway, he says that to make #b#t4031163##k, he'll need #b50 #t4000207#s#k and #b20 Witchgrass Leaves#k.

#i4000207##t4000207# #b#c4000207##k / 50
#i4031165##t4031165# #b#c4031165##k / 20
As Wing the Fairy asked, I got her mysterious medicine and leaves of witch grass. Could she make Flying Pill with these?

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Flying Pill

string.name: parent
string.value: Icarus and the Flying Pill
#bWing the Fairy#k of Ellinia asked me to take the Flying Pill to Icarus. So this little pill is all it takes to fly? I need to get this to Icarus ASAP.
I got Icarus the Flying Pill that Wing the Fairy of Ellinia made. I hope it works for him.

string.name: name
string.value: The Reason Behind the Mushroom Studies
I should go see Bruce in Henesys...

I got to meet Bruce, who has been studying the monsters and animals in general in Henesys. His bright smile and the easy-going demeanor belies the painful fact that his daughter has been missing for some time, and that he's been studying the mushroom monsters for the sake of finding a clue on his daughter's whereabouts. He asks me if I can help him out, and I just can't say no to a worthy cause like this...

#t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/10 
#t4000001# #b#c4000001##k/40
I helped Bruce gather up the materials necessary for his studies. Will these help him find his daughter?

string.name: name
string.value: I Need Help on My Homework!
Whenever I walk past Wing the Fairy of Ellinia, he seems to be asking for help. I wonder what it is...

Wing the Fairy of Ellinia seems to have a general disdain for humans. Definitely not the kind of attitude you would expect from someone in need of help... He asks you to get him 5 Tree Branches, 10 Squishy Liquids, and 3 Slime Bubbles. He needs them to make a potion for his homework. \n\n#i4000010:# #t4000010:# #c4000010# / 3 #i4000003:# #t4000003:# #c4000003# / 5 #i4000004:# #t4000004:# #c4000004# / 10
I helped Wing the Fairy of Ellinia with his homework. I have no idea how that potion works, though.

string.name: name
string.value: I'm Bored 1

string.name: parent
string.value: I'm Bored
I should go see Icarus, who's at the top of a building in Kerning City. He seems to be bored out of his mind.
I got to talk to Icarus of Kerning City. Just what exactly is he doing staring aimlessly at the sky anyway? He seemed to be really bored, and asked me if I can answer his set of questions.
I answered all the questions that Icarus of Kerning City asked. That was easy.

string.name: name
string.value: I'm Bored 2

string.name: parent
string.value: I'm Bored
I answered all the questions that Icarus of Kerning City asked. That was easy.

You answer all of Icarus's questions, but he still seems bored out of his skull. He asks if you to get him a toy that he can have some fun with. 

#i4000003##t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/7 
#i4000004##t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/7
I had fun playing around with Icarus.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter 1

string.name: parent
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter
I wonder how Bruce is doing in Henesys these days...

I met up with Bruce in Henesys, and he had great news: He finally found his daughter!!! There was one problem, however: She seems to be suffering from amnesia, Bruce gave me a toy that his daughter played around while growing up, and asked me if I can give that to her.
I found Ayan and gave her the toy sword.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter 2

string.name: parent
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter

Amazingly, Ayan recovered from amnesia with the help of the toy sword. That's just amazing!!! The only thing left now is for Ayan and Bruce to finally meet up, but first, I got to get this letter from Ayan to Bruce.
I'm so glad that Ayan got her memory back. I'm even gladder that Bruce got to finally see his daughter again! What a moment...

string.name: name
string.value: Taking Out the Alligators 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Alligators at the Swamp
I heard something happened to the tribesmen of Perion. I should go talk to Ayan about this.

You meet Ayan in Perion, and she tells you that a few days ago, a group of tribesmen went hunting in the swamps and wound up being ambushed by a group of alligators. She's very worried about the sudden surge of alligators taking over the swamps and wants you to eliminate them before they spawn out of control. You'll have to kill #b8 #o3110100#s#k and #b10 #o2130103#s#k while collecting #b5 #t4000034#s#k along the way.

#o3110100# #r#a20942##k
#o2130103# #r#a20941##k

#i4000034##t4000034# #b#c4000034##k / 5

The tribesmen of Perion got ambushed by the alligator herd at the swamps, so Ayan asked if you could help take care of the alligators. You responded by taking out #b8 #o3110100#s#k and #b10 #o2130103#s#k. Hopefully, this will bring some peace back to the swamp.

string.name: name
string.value: Taking Out the Alligators 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Alligators at the Swamp
Ayan of Perion is desperately looking for me. Is something wrong??

You find Ayan, and she seems to be in a state of panic. She was walking around the swamp when she ran into a bigger, stronger, and more dangerous group of alligators than the previous ones. She ran back to Perion and has been looking for you ever since, so that you could help her out once more. This time, you'll need to kill #b20 #o5130103#s#k and take #b5 #t4000033#s#k along the way. 

#o5130103# #r#a20951##k

#i4000033##t4000033# #b#c4000033##k / 5
You eliminated 20 #o5130103#s from the swamps, just like Ayan asked you to. You'll have to revisit that spot from time to time and take out the alligators before they spawn out of control.

string.name: name
string.value: Camila's Lost Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Looking for the Korean Folk Town...
Apparently, Camila of Henesys lost something...

She was devastated that her friend, who lives far from here, sent her a letter, only to be stolen by the notorious Curse Eye's. She was crying as she asked me for help. I may have to find the letter for the sake of Camila, but where is that girl?\n\n#t4031239# #b#c4031239##k/1
I recovered Camila's letter that had been stolen from the Curse Eye's. It should be fun writing letters to people far from me...

string.name: name
string.value: Two Ways to Get to Korean Folk Town

string.name: parent
string.value: Looking for the Korean Folk Town...

The letter that was sent to Camila was written by her pen pal, and it said she might not be able to write her again. Camila sensed something wrong might have happened to her friend, and asked me if I could visit her at Korean Folk Town, where she lived, and check on her.
At Korean Folk Town, I was able to meet Camila's pen pal, Kong Ji. She looked ecstatic after I gave her Camila's reply letter.

string.name: name
string.value: Korean Folk Town : Through the Sky
How about going to the Korean Folk Town through the sky?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the skypath and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Camila said she'll give me a few essential items for the trip. What must those be?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the skypath and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Okay, so I first go from #bEllinia#k to #bOrbis#k, then to #bLudibrium#k? And once I get there, I'm supposed to walk my way down there through #bHelios Tower#k. That's pretty far...

string.name: name
string.value: Korean Folk Town : Through the Ocean
How about going to the Korean Folk Town through the ocean?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the ocean and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Camila said she'll give me a few essential items for the trip. What must those be?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the ocean and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Okay, so I first go from #bEllinia#k to #bOrbis#k, then from #bOrbis Tower#k all the way down to #bAqua Road#k? I think she told me to take the #bDolphin Taxi#k at Aquarium...

string.name: name
string.value: Nella's Dream

string.name: parent
string.value: Fanzy the Mysterious Cat
Apparently, #p1052103# of Kerning City had a weird dream ...
I heard a really weird dream story from #b#p1052103##k, who lived in Kerning City. She ran into a cat in the middle of a green forest full of trees... and she can't tell if it's a dream or for real.
In the middle of the forest in #m101000000#, I found the mysterious cat that #p1052103# had seen in her dream.

string.name: name
string.value: Fanzy's Red Furball

string.name: parent
string.value: Fanzy the Amusing Cat

The mysterious cat in the middle of Ellinia forest introduces itself as Fanzy, and says that he belongs to a fairy living in Ellinia Forest. A few days ago, while hanging out in the forest, Fanzy lost the #b#t4031273##k that his master gave him. Fanzy really wants you to find it, so defeat the #r#o0210100#s#k and retrieve the #b#t4031273##k. Once you have it, bring it back to Fanzy with your pet by your side to receive a handsome reward. \n\n#i4031273##t4031273# #b#c4031273##k / 1
I brought the #t4031273# back from #o0210100# to #p1040002#, and to my delight, #p1040002# increased the closeness level between my pet and me.

string.name: name
string.value: Planting Trees
I heard #p1022006# is looking for ways to liven up the barren grounds of Perion.

Thanks to the excavation project, Perion and its surrounding areas have been rapidly deteriorating. To liven up the area, many #t4000195#s are needed for planting trees. Bring #p1022006# #b9 #t4000195#s#k. \n\n#i4000195##t4000195# #b#c4000195##k/9
I defeated #o1140100# and collected #t4000195#. #p1022006# promised to liven up the currently-barren Perion by planting lots of trees around the area, and he'll be the first to start it.

string.name: name
string.value: Notice from the Excavation Team
Someone's telling me there's an urgent notice posted on the bulletin board at the excavation camp.

You read the notice posted on the board at #m101030104#. Apparently, many of the excavators were attacked by the Army of Skeletons around the tomb site. They want someone to eliminate #r20 Skeleton Soldiers, 20 Skeleton Officers, and 10 Skeleton Commanders#k. In addition, the board states that, as evidence, whoever eliminates those monsters will have to bring #b7 Ribs, 7 Pelvic Bones, and 7 Horse Skulls#k to #bShawn#k. 

#o5150001# #r#a21193##k
#o6230602# #r#a21191##k
#o7130103# #r#a21192##k

#i4000206##t4000206# #b#c4000206##k/7
#i4000207##t4000207# #b#c4000207##k/7

string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest

After some convincing from the chief of #m101000000# #p1032001#, I have decided to leave #m101000000# as the messenger of #p1032001#. #p1032001# warned me that I may get lost on the way there since it's my first time there, and gave me #tLeafre Guidebook# as well as a flight ticket. By the way, what's this item that I'm suppose to deliver to Tatamo?

I received a request from #p1032001#, the chief of #m101000000#, to head to a place called #b#m240000000##k of Ossyria. #m240000000# is a town entrenched in Minar Forest somewhere in Ossyria, and I was told to deliver an item to the chief of the town, Chief Tatamo, for him. I'll have to deliver the #b#t4031345##k that #p1032001# gave to #b#p2081000##k of #b#m240000000##k.

You delivered the Pure Water of Protection that the Chief of #m240000000# requested to #p1032001#, the Chief of #m101000000#. As a sign of gratitude, Chief Tatamo gave you a magic seed that will allow you to teleport between #m101000000# and #m240000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Manji and the Secret Group
I heard #p1022002# of #m102000000# was visited by a group of strange people the other day...

#p1022002# told me a group of strangers came up to him and asked for help. He politely declined, but felt bad about it, and have been thinking about it ever since. He desired to send someone to help them for him, and asked me to prove my worth to him so he can send me there.\n\n#o2130100# #r#a21221#
I took care of 15 #o2130100#s, gaining approval from #p1022002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's First Training Session
You're now a Warrior! But you have no idea what to do... Get help from #b#p1022000##k.
#p1022000# suggests that you hunt monster as basic training. He wants you to beat up #r20 #o0130100#s#k. #o0130100#s live near #m102000000# so he said they're easy to find.\n\n#o0130100# #r#a21281##k
You defeated 20 #o0130100#s and reported the news to #p1022000#. Too easy!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's Second Training Session
You got stronger, but you've still got a ways to go. Talk to #b#p1022000##k again.
#p1022000# tells you to continue hunting monsters. This time, you have to hunt #r20 #o0130100#s#k.\n\n#o0130100# #r#a21291##k
You defeated 20 #o0130100#s and reported the news to #p1022000#. Ha! You're getting stronger!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's Third Training Session
You're starting to get into this Warrior thing, but you still have a long way to go. #b#p1022000##k wants to help you.
#p1022000# says a Warrior must possess patience and endurance. He wants you to hunt #r20 #o1110101#s#k. 20 #o011110101#s? It's not going to be easy... \n\n#o1110101# #r#a21301##k
You hunted 20 #o1110101#s! Whew, that wasn't easy!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's First Training Session
You're a Magician! Yay! Er, now what? Ah, maybe you should talk to #b#p1032001##k.
#p1032001# suggests that you hunt monsters as your basic training. Take care of #r8 #o0210100#s#k. You can find #o0210100#s right around #m101000000#. \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21321##k
You took care of 8 #o0210100#s and reported the news to #p1032001#. Quite easy, actually.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's Second Training Session
You feel a little stronger, but you still have a long way to go. Talk to #b#p1032001##k for your second training session.
#p1032001# says to continue hunting monsters. This time, you have to hunt #r20 #o0210100#s#k. 20 #o0210100#s! You feel a little nervous but you can't stop now!\n\n#o0210100# #r#a21331##k
After eliminating 20 #o0210100#s and reporting the news to #p1032001#, #p1032001# seemed quite pleased.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's Last Training Session
You've really improved. Now #b#p1032001##k wants to test you!
#p1032001# asks you to hunt #r10 #o3000001#s#k. #o3000001#s are way stronger than #o0210100#s. Watch yourself out there! \n\n#o3000001# #r#a21351##k
You killed 10 #o3000001#s. You're shaping up to be quite a good Magician, if you do say so yourself.

You're now a Bowman! Now what? Perhaps #b#p1012100##k can help you.
#p1012100# suggests hunting monsters as a form of basic training. She wants you to hunt #r16 #o1210102#s#k, which can be easily found near #m100000000#.\n\n#o1210102# #r#a21361##k
You eliminated 16 #o1210102#s and reported back to #p1012100#. You thought it was too easy...

string.value: Beginner Bowman's Second Training Session
You feel your muscles forming along your upper arms, but you've got a long way to go. Talk to #b#p1012100##k again.
#p1012100# says the best way to learn is to hunt monsters. She says to hunt #r20 #o1210102#s#k. \n\n#o1210102# #r#a21371##k
20 #o1210102#s, slain and looted. You reported the news to #p1012100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Bowman's Third Training Session
You're really starting to get into this training thing. #b#p1012100##k wants to give you another session.
#p1012100# says Bowmen must be calm and possess a lot of will power. She says you must hunt #r30 #o0210100#s#k. That's, uh, quite a lot, but you can do it. \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21381##k
You took care of 30 #o0210100#s. It wasn't easy, but you did it!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Bowman's Last Training Session
You're really starting to look like a Bowman. #b#p1012100##k wants to help you with one last training session.
#p1012100# wants you to slay #r15 #o2110200#s#k as a test. #o2110200#s are much stronger than #o0210100#s, so stay alert! \n\n#o2110200# #r#a21391##k
You eliminated 15 #o2110200#s. It wasn't easy, but you feel like you're well on your way to becoming an amazing Bowman.

30 #o1120100#es... It won't be easy... \n\n#o1120100# #r#a21421##k

During the excavation, Doctor #p1022006# said he heard a rumor about a very old tree living in #m102000000#. However, he had no clue on what kind of tree it was, or where exactly it was located. That's why he's asked me to visit #b#m102000000# village to collect information on this particular tree.#k
