string.name: name
string.value: The Old Snail

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail
Heard #bPia#k in #bHenesys#k got her hands on a strange book. What kind of book could it be? Let's go see her.

The book is about the #boldest snail#k in Maple World and its #b#t2210006##k. It looks like Pia is interested in the snail's shell because it makes wishes come true. Jay is the original owner of the book; he must know something about the author. Let's go see him. \n\n#i4161035##t4161035# #b#c4161035#/1#k
Jay said that the author of Legend of the Snail was his great-grandfather #bAlloy, who is Mrs. Ming Ming's grandfather.#k

string.name: name
string.value: Hero of the Story

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail

Took Jay's advice and visited Mrs. Ming Ming to ask about Alloy, the author of Legend of the Snail. She said her grandfather's latest letter was about #bWing the Fairy of Ellinia#k, and suggested I go see Wing.
Wing the Fairy recalls Alloy as the human who obtained Mano's shell and prolonged his lifespan. Let's ask some more questions.

string.name: name
string.value: Snail Hunt

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail

Wing the Fairy not only knew about Alloy, but also knew of the snail with #r#t2210006#, Mano#k. Wing offered to give Mano's location on one condition; save the #bsnail shells#k.

#i4000019##t4000019# #b#c4000019#/10#k
#i4000000##t4000000# #b#c4000000#/10#k
#i4000016##t4000016# #b#c4000016#/10#k
Gave snail shells to Wing the Fairy and in return got information that Mano frequently appeared near the thicket around the beach. Let's go back to #bPia#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Sacrifice to King Clang

string.name: parent
string.value: Defeat King Clang!
Rumor has it that a fearful monster is lurking about the beautiful #bFlorina Beach#k. #bRiel#k, a girl of the Florina Beach, must know something about this monster.

The terrible monster #rKing Clang#k followed the warm current all the way to Florina Beach. Riel says that beautiful girls are being sacrificed to suppress King Clang's anger. Riel and her sisters, Roel and Rael, have taken a bet on who will be sacrificed to the monster, and asks me to be the judge of their dreadful bet. They can't be serious about this, right?

#y2158# #b#u2158##k
#y2159# #b#u2159##k
#y2160# #b#u2160##k
Helping Riel

string.name: name
string.value: A brave warrior to defeat King Clang appears!

string.name: parent
string.value: Defeat King Clang!

Complaining Riel soon lightens up and says that a brave warrior must appear to rescue the beautiful girl in distress. Therefore, she asks me to take the role of the warrior and defeat King Clang. What have I done to get myself into these situations!? I'm not the warrior type, but the least I can do is help defeat #rKing Clang#k. \n\n#o5220000# #r#a21611##k
Defeated King Clang and came back to Riel. Riel joyfully says that a brave warrior saved her. It really wasn't for her sake, but Florina Beach is finally back to its peaceful state.

string.name: name
string.value: Shining Stone

string.name: parent
string.value: Whalians and The Nautilus

I can't believe that The Nautilus' power is generated by this mystical Shining Stone... That's pretty interesting, I must say. I wonder what the Shining Stone looks like. I should go check out the stone in #bThe Nautilus' Generator Room#k.
While I was touching the Shining Stone, I could actually feel the stone's mystical powers traveling through my entire body.

string.name: name
string.value: Sea Firefly 1
Sharyl, the Prince of Whales, hanging out on the lower deck of The Nautilus, says he's got another problem. Let me see what he has to say.

Sharyl, the Prince of Whales tells me some mystical story about a Sea Firefly. I guess there are many other mystical objects on The Nautilus besides the Shining Stone? Anyway, according to Sharyl, the Prince of Whales, the mystical Sea Firefly's powers are diminishing, which is making him worried. I'd better help Sharyl, the Prince of Whales by going to the #bOlaf#k in #bLith Harbor#k to fill the magic flask with some #bVigor of the Sea#k.
You went to see the Olaf, who filled the Magic Flask with the Vigor of the Sea.

string.name: name
string.value: Sea Firefly 2
You should be getting the bottle back from Olaf and heading back to the Nautilus...

Olaf gave the magic flask back to you, filled with the Vigor of the Sea. You'd better get the bottle to #bSharyl, the Prince of Whales#k right away, before it starts getting dark. \n\n#i4031842##t4031842# #b#c4031842##k / 1
As the Vigor of the Sea is unleashed in The Nautilus, the overall atmosphere turns bright. But why is it that Sharyl, the Prince of Whales is blushing while saying that Kyrin should be so happy?

string.name: name
string.value: The Large Pearl
Apparently Sharyl, the Prince of Whales has yet another problem. Should I go find out what it is?

Sharyl, the Prince of Whales claims that he had left a #bMother of Pearl#k in The Nautilus' #bGenerator Room#k a long time ago. He thinks that there must be a #bLarge Pearl#k in there by now, and wants me to go get the pearl to take to Kyrin. I wonder why Sharyl, the Prince of Whales wants to give the pearl to Kyrin? Anyway, I should remember to beware of #bMuirhat#k while I'm on my way. The Prince warned me to watch out! \n\n#i4031843##t4031843# #b#c4031843##k / 1

Just as I am about to enter the Captain's cabin, Muirhat appears and stands in front of the door, blocking my way. He says that Sharyl, the Prince of Whales must give up hope, and wants me to hand over the pearl! Then he tells me to comfort Sharyl, the Prince of Whales if I see him again... Stay strong, dear Sharyl, the Prince of Whales.

string.name: name
string.value: Information for Dr. Kim

Do you know Rolonay, the smartest genius alive in all of The Nautilus? He is possibly the smartest person in all of Maple World. But he's apparently stuck in a jam, because of all the requests he's been getting from people asking for more and more information. I'd better give Rolonay a hand- But first, I should go see him in the central corridors of The Nautilus.

Rolonay's been working hard to compile all the information #bDr. Kim#k had requested, but says he's too tied up with all the analysis he has to do, to bring the research documents all the way to the Omega Sector. I should help out Rolonay and bring all the research documents to the Omega Sector for him.
I've delivered all the research documents to Dr. Kim, on Rolonay's behalf. That Rolonay, despite his looks, is quite a brainiac!

string.name: name
string.value: What is it that Bart saw?

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus
Let me take Bart's status report to #bBaine#k.
I've delivered Bart's report to Baine. By the look on Baine's face, it seems that there's something fishy going on.

string.name: name
string.value: The Truth Behind the Black Shadow

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus

Baine's eyes light up as he reads Bart's report, as if he's discovered something! He thinks that the ominous feeling he's been getting recently may have something to do with the Disciples of the Black Mage... Baine thinks it's possible that the Black Mage's Disciples are still in Victoria Island. He wants you to hunt down 15 #rRibbon Pigs#k and 15 #rPigs#k and bring back 1 #bBlack Mage's Token#k. 

#i4031846##t4031846# #b#c4031846##k / 1 
#o1210101# #r#a21731##k
#o1210100# #r#a21732##k
I've hunted down the monsters and found the Black Magician's Token, and brought it to Baine. I'm afraid there's something much bigger going on than it appears.

string.name: name
string.value: Report to Muirhat

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus

Baine discovers that the Black Magician's Disciples have been secretly observing The Nautilus. And with that discovery, Baine's report is now ready to be delivered to Muirhat. Baine wants me to bring the report to Muirhat myself, since I gave him so much help with writing the report...

This report contains the Black Magician's Token which I found, plus a description of the strange sound waves that Baine had heard. It also includes information about the suspicious movements that Bart saw. I should take this to #bMuirhat#k.
When Muirhat receives the report, he is surprised and shocked to find that the Black Magician's influence has spread as far as here.

string.name: name
string.value: Disciples of the Black Magician

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus

Muirhat thinks that Disciples of the Black Magician are most likely still lingering by Henesys and The Nautilus. He says that they are probably hiding in deserted house in the forest, disguised. I should get rid of them myself and preserve the peace on The Nautilus. \n\n#o9300156# #r#a21751##k
I've gotten rid of all the Disciples of the Black Magician. Have we finally restored the peace on The Nautilus?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning The Nautilus 1

Mrs. Reade, who is in charge of keeping The Nautilus clean, says she is in need of help. Apparently the wash cloths that she uses for cleaning the ship have become tattered from incessant cleaning and she's in need of some new wash cloths... I should go talk to Mrs. Reade myself in the upper deck corridors where she's cleaning.
Go find the #bPig's Ribbons#k, which Mrs. Reade can use as a wash cloth.\n\n#i4000002##t4000002# #b#c4000002##k / 10
Looks like Mrs. Reade's making good use of the pig's ribbon I brought her, but poor Mrs. Reade, she's cleaning all day long...as usual.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning The Nautilus 2

Mrs. Reade, who is in charge of keeping The Nautilus clean, says she's worried about the sanitary conditions of the ship because there has been a huge influx of mice on The Nautilus since the ship has been docked at Victoria Island. Should I help Mrs. Reade get rid of the mice?

The Nautilus has been docked at Victoria Island for some time now, and apparently that causes more rats to board the ship. Mrs. Reade is hyper-anxious having had to deal with all the vermin. I think I'll bring her #b50 Rat Traps#k. I've heard that I could obtain mouse traps from the #rRatz#k in Ludibrium. \n\n#i4000095##t4000095# #b#c4000095##k / 50
We set up 50 mouse traps. I don't think we'll see any more mice around here... would we?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning The Nautilus 3
Mrs. Reade says her problems just never end...

So we took care of all the rats on The Nautilus but there's still one more problem. And that problem happens to be the main cause of all of Mrs. Reade's problems on The Nautilus- and he still needs to be cleaned! Mrs. Reade's biggest problem is Jack, the one who's to blame for every bit of the mess on The Nautilus! Let me go get some #bPure Water#k so #bJack#k can get a good wash down. \n\n#i2022000##t2022000# #b#c2022000##k / 1
Will Jack ever get clean? All this scrubbing doesn't seem to be making him any cleaner... and I'm scrubbing and scrubbing...

string.name: name
string.value: Protect The Nautilus' Emergency Food Supply

string.name: parent
string.value: Special Recipe for The Nautilus

Apparently, pigs and ribbon pigs have been coming onto The Nautilus every night to eat up the ship's emergency food supply. At this rate, the people on The Nautilus may end up starving! I should go see Tangyoon, the ship's Head Chef and talk to him about this.

Tangyoon says pigs and ribbon pigs keep coming onto The Nautilus' emergency food supply and eating up all the food, and there's only a little bit left in storage! I'm gonna have to teach these #rpigs#k and #rribbon pigs#k a lesson they'll remember. 

#o1210100# #r#a21791##k 
#o1210101# #r#a21792##k
I think they must've learned their lesson by now. They'd better stay away from The Nautilus' food supply!

string.name: name
string.value: Find Fresh Milk

string.name: parent
string.value: Special Recipe for The Nautilus

According to those who've tasted Tangyoon's cooking, Tangyoon's dishes give you a mystical experience... They say that Tangyoon's dishes will either transport you to the happiest moment of your life or make you experience a flood-like rush of fantasy the moment you take a bite of it. What IS his secret?

The secret behind Tangyoon's cooking is none other than fresh ingredients! So I guess that means that freshness is the basis of all great cooking? Tangyoon is so serious about making sure that he has the freshest ingredients that he actually raises his own milk cows on The Nautilus for milk... Now that's impressive! Tangyoon wants me to go milk the cows and bring him some milk if I want to try some of his newest dish. Well, I definitely want to try some of his food, so I guess I'll go milk the cows and fill this bottle with milk. I'd better remember that I can only fill up 1/3rd of the bottle from a single mother cow. \n\n#i4031850##t4031850# #b#c4031850##k / 1
Wow! I can't believe I'm telling you this, but Tangyoon's dish was truly amazing. I was touched!

string.name: name
string.value: Ingredients to Get for the Banquet

string.name: parent
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians

Of all the ingredients, I can't believe they ran out of sea horse tail... The Whalians are probably starving so I'd better go get #b40 cans of sea horse tails#k from #bKenta#k and get them some food to eat. \n\n#i4000161##t4000161# #b#c4000161##k / 40
I've collected 40 cans of sea horse tail. This should be enough to cook a dish, right?

string.name: name
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians

string.name: parent
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians
I'm finally done cooking the special entree for the Whalians. I'd better take it to #bPorchay#k quick!
I don't think the Whalians will have to worry about food for a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bark's Worry

string.name: parent
string.value: For Kyrin
The Nautilus' First Officer and handsome muscle man, Black Bark has a worry? I should go talk to him in the conference room of The Nautilus' central corridor.

Black Bark wants to give Kyrin a pretty dress for her birthday, something that expresses everyone's warmest regards toward her. He's apparently asked his old friend and dressmaker, Mrs. Ming Ming, to make the dress, but she's run out of bright white material. She says that a table cloth made of Jr. Wraiths is best for the dress she's making... You need to gather #b15 Table Cloths#k and bring them to #bMrs. Ming Ming#k. \n\n#i4000035##t4000035# #b#c4000035#/15#k
I've collected the table cloths and have brought them to Mrs. Ming Ming. I wonder what the dress will look like!

string.name: name
string.value: Dress for Kyrin

string.name: parent
string.value: For Kyrin
The dress for Kyrin is finally done. It looks so nice! I should hurry and bring the dress to #bBlack Bark#k.
I wonder if Miss Kyrin will be wearing the dress at her birthday party. Can't wait to see her in the dress!

string.name: name
string.value: Unidentified Strangers
#b#p1012003##k of #b#m100000000##k seems to be facing a pretty serious problem...
#p1012003# says that a group of unidentified strangers have appeared on the eastern coast of #m100000000#, and wants me to find out who they are. I should go to #b#m100030000##k.

There's a huge wooden entryway leading into #m100030000# which I'd never seen before. It almost looks like an entryway to a fortress...I should try talking to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of me. I remember him telling me that a #bpirate #p1072008##k fort is being built here. PIRATES!?

string.name: name
string.value: The Beginner Pirate's First Training Session
You're now a Pirate! Now what? Perhaps Kyrin can help you.
Kyrin suggests monster hunting as a form of basic training. She wants you to hunt #r11 Pigs#k. There are apparently a lot of Pigs near Henesys. \n\n#o1210100# #r#a21931##k
You eliminated 11 Pigs and reported the results to Kyrin. No sweat!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Pirate's Third Training Session
You're really starting to get into this training thing. #bKyrin#k wants to give you another lesson.
According to Kyrin, Pirates need great composure and perseverance. She wants you to hunt 40 Pigs this time. #r40 Pigs#k? That's no joke! \n\n#o 1210100# #r#a21951##k
You took care of 40 Pigs. Phew! It wasn't easy, but you did it!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Pirate's Fourth Training Session
You're really starting to look like a Pirate. #bKyrin#k wants to help you with one last training session.
Kyrin wants you to slay #r10 Green Mushrooms#k. Green Mushrooms are much stronger than Pigs. Stay alert. \n\n#o 1110100# #r#a21961##k
You destroyed 10 Green Mushrooms. Wasn't easy, but you feel like you're well on your way to becoming an amazing Pirate.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dish 2
Tangyoon says he's found a new ingredient to work with. I wonder what Tangyoon has in mind now?

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish recently, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before. This time, he says he's been working with Curse Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only you would bring him #b10 Curse Eye Tails#k... You hope it comes out tasty! \n\n#i 4000013##t 4000013# #b#c 4000013#/10#k
Just as I'd thought... Curse Eye Tails aren't meant to be eaten.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dish 3
Tangyoon says he's found a new ingredient to work with. I wonder what Tangyoon has in mind now?

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish recently, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before, Cold Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only you would bring him #b10 Cold Eye Tails#k... You hope it comes out tasty! \n\n#i 4000023##t 4000023# #b#c 4000023#/10#k
Just as I'd thought... Cold Eye Tails aren't meant to be eaten.

string.name: name
string.value: Lazy Little Calico

At The Nautilus, there's a kid who is forever curious and loves to make pranks. Bartol tells me now he has a good prank to pull on someone. If I want to join in, I better head over to the middle hallway of The Nautilus to find Bartol!

All #bCalico#k ever does is sleep, sleep, sleep, when he should be keeping an eye out on the crew's bedrooms. Bartol thinks it would be funny to throw an #bEvil Eye Tail#k at Calico and see how he reacts. You think it might be a fun little prank... \n\n#i 4000007##t 4000007# #b#c 4000007#/7#k
Calico awakes, in total shock. C'mon, Calico, you've got to stop falling asleep!

string.name: name
string.value: Bartol's Requests
If I'm passing through the central corridors of The Nautilus, I should make sure to stop by and see Bartol. He said he could teach me an easier way to get there...

Well, Bartol says that if I fulfill his request then he would give me a coupon that would allow me to use the warp machine to be warped to the Omega Sector. He says that he has some business to attend to with Shulynch, Muirhat and Black Bark and could use my help...

I fulfilled Bartol's request and received the Omega Sector Warp Coupon in return. I can use this coupon to use the Warp Machine in The Nautilus' Control Room to be warped immediately to the Omega Sector.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Pirate
What does it mean to be a Pirate? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bPirate#k once you reach #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1090000##k in #rThe Nautilus#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Pirate from #p1090000#. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.

string.name: name
string.value: JM's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: The Monster and the Evil Scheme
#b#m103000000# #p1052002##k is looking for someone to uncover the hidden truth about the #rscheme#k...

JM says a monster known as the #r#o6220000##k has been appearing in the #m103000000# sewer system, and he wants you to find out whether it is someone's evil scheme to put #m103000000# in danger. He says the person who will help identify the root of this problem must be strong enough to defeat #rthe alligators in the swamp region#k... 

#i4000032##t4000032# #b#c4000032##k/20 #k 
#i4000033##t4000033# #b#c4000033##k/20

When you come back after defeating the alligators in the swamp, JM is convinced that you're strong enough to manage the task. He asks you to come back later so that he can tell you what the next step entails.

string.name: name
string.value: The Run-down Huts in the Swamp

string.name: parent
string.value: The Monster and the Evil Scheme

It seems like the next step entails collecting information. JM says that he is going to leave something for you inside the #bhut#k found deep inside the swamp. You can retrieve it #bfrom 5 p.m. to 8 p.m.#k, so be sure to keep track of the time and head over to #b#m103030100##k.
You have a crumpled piece of paper containing the list of informants in your hands. Let's go find the informants listed on the paper.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Shumi
According to the information provided on the #t4031894#, #p1052102# is one of the informants that JM wants you to go see. Let's go find #b#p1052102##k.
According to #p1052102#, the #m103000000# sewer has been emitting a strange odor.
According to #p1052102#, the #m103000000# sewer has been emitting a strange odor.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Nella
According to the information provided on the crumpled piece of paper, #p1052103# is one of the informants that JM wants you to go see. Let's go find #b#p1052103##k.
According to #p1052103#, #b#p9020000##k the magician in #m103000000# seem rather anxious... Hmmm does she have something to do with the scheme?
According to #p1052103#, #b#p9020000##k the magician in #m103000000# seem rather anxious... Hmmm does she have something to do with the scheme?

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Information Completed
You have gathered all the information from the informants. Let's give #bJM#k an update about the progress.

As soon as you tell JM the information you have gathered, JM turns pale. Is he surprised at the evil scheme...? JM, with an anxious look on his face, tells you to speak with #b#p9020000##k and ask about #o6220000#.
When asked about #o6220000#, #p9020000# is taken aback by the question and comes clean about the incident... about her accidentally dropping the Growth Powder in the sewer...
The evil scheme to put #m103000000# in danger... it only turned out to be #p9020000#'s clumsiness. Let's go inform #bJM#k.
JM, numbed by the absurdity, asks you to defeat #o6220000#. He seems to have aged 10 years because of this. Poor JM...\n\n#o6220000##r#a22211##k
You have defeated #o6220000# and reported your progress to JM.

string.name: name
string.value: The Name He Calls

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1040002# knew exactly who #r#o5220002##k the black monkey monster was. #o5220002# seems to have something to do with Arwen... #p1040002# says to bring back #b#t4031925##k from #r#o5300100##k if you wish to find out more about #o5220002#. \n\n#i4031925##t4031925# #b#c4031925##k/10 #k
When given #t4031925#s, #p1040002# says to wait while it finds the entrance to the #m910100000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Rage, Resentment, and Revenge

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1040002# has told you that the entrance to #m910100000# is in #m100040105#. If you want to meet the ghost Fanzy was talking about, head over to #r#m910100000##k. But it seems like the ghost only appears during certain hours... Let's keep track of time since the ghost is said to appear #rfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k.
The ghost of the cursed forest, #p1032107#. He seems to be cursing someone ceaselessly...

string.name: name
string.value: The Cause and Effect

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1032107#, once an apprentice of #p1032001#, wanted to get close to Arwen, but Arwen could not even remember #p1032107#, and #p1032107# began to take revenge by casting an evil spell on #o4230101# to turn it into #o5220002#... Let's go inform #bArwen#k.
At first, Arwen is shocked and upset at what #p1032107# has done, but seems deep in thought now...

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen's Apology

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

Arwen, after much contemplation, says she can't understand Reef's actions but takes some responsibility for them. She, then, asks you for a favor... to deliver Fairy Hair to #bReef#k. She seems sincere, so perhaps you should help her out. Don't forget that Reef is a ghost who only appears #bfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k.
You have delivered the Fairy Hair to Reef. Reef, surprised at the unexpected gift, asks you to give his apologies to #bGrendel the Really Old#k for having harmed others.

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat Faust

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1032001#, who has heard everything about #p1032107#, claims that #p1032107# was once a polite and mild-tempered person... He speculates that it was the power of darkness that has consumed and changed Reef, and blames himself for it. Then, #p1032001# asks you to defeat #o5220002#... \n\n#o5220002# #r#a22271##k
When you defeat #o5220002# and report your progress to #p1032001#, he says #p1032107#, too, probably feels relieved.

string.name: name
string.value: A Mysterious Small Egg
It sounds like someone is calling out my name. The dreamy eyes... the luscious purple hair... who are you?

The fairy with the dreamy eyes and the flowing purple hair talks for a bit, but it's not understandable at all. After the fairy disappears, you find a #bMysterious Small Egg#k inside your inventory. The fairy said something about it being your friend... Anyway, you better go visit the fairy at #bEllinia#k, the town of Fairies.\r\n#b<Message from the Fairy>\nCome to Ellinia, home of green trees too tall to measure. I will wait for you here.

The fairy with the dreamy eyes... and the luscious purple hair talked for a bit, but it wasn't understandable at all. After the fairy disappeared, I found a Mysterious Small Egg inside my inventory. Reliving the message the Fairy left for me, I went to the area and found Mar the Fairy hiding behind a huge bellflower. Mar mentioned something about being responsible for taking care of a living being, and then gave me a pet as a gift. The mysterious small egg turned out to be a Snail's egg.\r\nAlong with a message that this small snail can only be with me for 5 hours.

string.name: name
string.value: Enjoy the Entitlement!

string.name: parent
string.value: Captain Al's Passing of Knowledge

This task is to enjoy your hard-earned #rEntitlements#k! #bCaptain Al#k's mission is for me to use the Entitlement to spend the #rcurrent Rep down to 500#k. He also wanted to make sure I stacked up enough Reps by saving all the way up to 2,000. Better return to Captain Al once I complete the mission.

#rTotal of at least 2,000 Rep
Current Rep under 500#k
(Open the Family window to see both the current Rep and the total Rep)

Captain Al commended my efforts for successfully accomplishing all the missions, and told me I have the looks to become a great Senior. He also reiterated the fact that it's very important to provide a full support to my Juniors and everyone in the Family. I better ask Al if I have any questions about the Family. Time for me to start a big Family of my own!

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog
Manji, a solitary warrior in Perion, has asked to see you. He's never been the type to initiate a conversation, let alone a meeting! It must be something important. Let's go see Manji in Perion.

Manji says he felt a threatening energy coming from the deep end of the dungeon, so he asked his young apprentice, #bMu Young#k, to investigate. Unfortunately, he hasn't heard from Mu Young since! He'd like you to find the young man. If the last time Manji heard anything from Mu Young was when he was investigating the central dungeon of Victoria, couldn't he still be inside?

Manji says he felt a threatening energy coming from the deep end of the dungeon, so he asked his young apprentice, #bMu Young#k, to investigate. Unfortunately, he hasn't heard from Mu Young since! He'd like you to find the young man. If the last time Manji heard anything from Mu Young was when he was investigating the central dungeon of Victoria, couldn't he still be inside? \r\nYou were able to find Manji's apprentice, Mu Young, in the Underground Temple of the central dungeon.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go find Mu Young, who is somewhere in central dungeon of Victoria. He probably went down to the Underground Temple to investigate the root of a threatening and mysterious energy.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 8,000 Unlocks 'Balrog and the Seal' quest Unlocks 'Stay Away from Strangers...' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Owner of the Mysterious Note

string.name: parent
string.value: The Mysterious Note
There is a strange note on the ground. Pick it up and see what it says.
You've picked up a Mysterious Note inside the dungeon. Let's return this Note to its owner. Hm, could it belong to Mu Young?

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him. You have given the Note to Mu Young, whom you met inside the dungeon.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's return the piece of paper you've picked up. Could it be Mu Young's?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 10,000 Unlocks 'Who is the Owner of the Mysterious note?' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Who is the Owner of the Mysterious Note?

string.name: parent
string.value: The Mysterious Note
While talking to Mu Young, you were suddenly transported to a foreign place and a Jr. Balrog appeared right in front of your eyes. Let's defeat the Jr. Balrog.

While talking to Mu Young, you were suddenly transported to a foreign place and a Jr. Balrog appeared right in front of your eyes. As soon as you defeated the Jr. Balrog, Tristan's Spirit appeared. You were able to hear the story of his past life.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go into Tristan's Tomb and talk to his spirit after defeating the Jr. Balrog.

string.name: name
string.value: A Letter to the Master

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog
Mu Young seems to have another favor to ask of you. Let's see what he needs.
Mu Young says he has to further investigate the place, so he'd like me to deliver the letters he wrote to Manji during the past few days.

Mu Young says he has to further investigate the place, so he'd like me to deliver the letters he wrote to Manji during the past few days.\r\nLet's deliver Mu Young's message to Manji in Perion. He thanked you for all your help as you set out to deliver his letters.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's deliver Mu Young's messages to Manji.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,000 Unlocks 'A Request to His Apprentice' quest

string.name: name
string.value: A Request to His Apprentice

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog
Manji, who has received Mu Young's messages, seems to have a favor to ask of you.
Manji has asked that you deliver his request to Mu Young, who is currently in the Underground Temple inside the dungeon. Let's deliver Manji's request to Mu Young.

Manji has asked that you deliver his request to Mu Young, who is in the Underground Temple inside the dungeon. Upon receiving Manji's request, Mu Young promised himself that he would always remain mindful of his master's request.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go find Mu Young, who is in the Underground Temple in the central dungeon of Victoria.

string.name: name
string.value: Stay Away From Strangers
Mu Young says he's met a strange man. Could it be someone who is related to the impending revival of Balrog? Let's go find Mu Young.

Mu Young claims that he spotted a strange man at the entrance of the Underground Temple. He has asked you to look into this and see if you can gather some information about the man. Let's investigate the strange man.

Mu Young claims that he spotted a strange man at the entrance of the Underground Temple. At the request of Mu Young, who has asked you to look into this strange man to see if you can gather some information, you began your investigation.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's start a conversation with the strange man.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,000 Unlocks 'This is Something You Can Make with Balrog Skin' quest

string.name: name
string.value: This is something you can make with Balrog Skin.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Strange Man
Let's start a conversation with the strange man.
The strange man said he'd show you something if you bring him 20 sheets of Balrog Skin.
He made you a scroll using the sheets of Balrog Skin.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's collect 20 sheets of Balrog Skin and take them to the strange man.

string.name: name
string.value: Tristan's Successor
You hear Tristan's Spirit calling you from the Underground Temple. Let's rush over to Tristan's Tomb.

Tristan's Spirit says he'd acknowledge you as his successor if you prevent Balrog from reviving. Wow, the successor of a legendary hero of Maple World? That's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! Let's do it!
Upon preventing Balrog's revival 200 times, you have been named Tristan's Successor.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's stop Balrog from reviving 200 times.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Stop Balrog from reviving 200 times.

string.name: name
string.value: To Tristan's Tomb
You could not defeat the Jr. Balrog in Tristan's Tomb and you want to give it another shot.
You could not defeat the Jr. Balrog in Tristan's Tomb and you want to give it another shot.
You went back to Tristan's Tomb and met Tristan's Spirit after finally defeating the Jr. Balrog.

string.name: name
string.value: Horny Mushroom Caps Research

string.name: parent
string.value: Strange Mushrooms
Apparently, the #bThe Rememberer#k of Sleepywood is conducting studies on mutated Horny Mushrooms. You should go to Sleepywood to find out more.

Some Horny Mushrooms have been acting really cruelly lately...there seems to be something suspicious going on. #bThe Rememberer#k has noticed the change and is conducting studies on these suspicious Horny Mushrooms.\r\n
#i4000015:# #t4000015:# #c4000015# / 30
You helped #bThe Rememberer#k with his research on Horny Mushrooms, but he seems to need some more information.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,000 Unlocks 'Raging Horny Mushrooms' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Raging Horny Mushrooms

string.name: parent
string.value: Strange Mushrooms
The Rememberer of Sleepywood claims to be studying the changes that are taking place with the strange-looking Horny Mushrooms and needs some help.

The Rememberer says that he must continue his research and that the raging Horny Mushrooms must be stopped in the meantime.


#o2110200# #a22471#
You helped the Remember of Sleepywood with his research again, but you better talk to him about the progress he's made in his studies on the strange mushrooms.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,000 Unlocks 'Understanding Horny Mushroom Signals' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Zombie Mushroom Signal 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Strange Mushrooms
The Rememberer needs help figuring out what drove the mushrooms into a rage.

The Rememberer suggests that someone should study the Zombie Mushrooms.


#o2230101# #a22491#
You've helped further the study of Zombie Mushrooms.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,100 Unlocks 'Zombie Mushroom Signal 2' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Zombie Mushroom Signal 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Strange Mushrooms
The Rememberer needs help figuring out what drove the mushrooms into a rage. You should go help.
The Rememberer needs assistance figuring out what drove the Mushrooms into a rage. Go help!\r\n #i4000008:# #t4000008:# #c4000008# / 50
You've helped further the study of Zombie Mushrooms.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,100 Unlocks 'Zombie Mushroom Signal 3' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Zombie Mushroom Signal 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Strange Mushrooms
The Rememberer still needs help figuring out what drove the mushrooms into a rage.

With those vague mushroom signals, The Rememberer hasn't been able to figure out what drove the mushrooms into a rage. He suggests studying Zombie Mushrooms.

#i4032399:# #t4032399:# #c4032399# / 20

You finally managed to figure out the signals the mushrooms sent to themselves. #b#e'Mushking of the Mushroom Castle is in danger. Watch out for King Pepe! Request help from the courageous adventurers of Maple World who are at least Level 30.' #n#k What does that mean?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,100 Unlocks 'Studying the Mushroom Signals 1 (Repeatable)' quest Unlocks 'Studying the Mushroom Signals 2 (Repeatable)' quest Unlocks 'Karcasa of the Desert' quest

string.value: Studying the Mushroom Signals 1 (Repeatable)
The Rememberer requests your help so he can continue making progress in his research.
The Rememberer requests your help so he can continue making progress in his research.
The Rememberer requested your help so he could continue making progress in his research.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 350

string.value: Studying the Mushroom Signals 2 (Repeatable)
The Rememberer requests your help so he can continue making progress in his research.
The Rememberer requests your help so he can continue making progress in his research.
The Rememberer requested your help so he could continue making progress in his research.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 350

string.name: name
string.value: Karcasa's Memory 2

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
You gave in to Karcasa's demands in order to find out more about the Mushroom Castle. Now, he seems like he's going to ask you for another favor! Does he even know anything about the castle?
How could an oasis be created with water bought from a store? Anyway, you need to give in to his demands in order to find out more about the castle, but he seems awfully suspicious.\r\n
Is he trying to make a fool out of you?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Karcasa Relents' quest\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Karcasa Relents

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
Something doesn't seem right. He keeps repeating what he's already said. Does he really know?
You knew it! Karcasa was just spitting out rumors he heard. Maybe the Camel Cab can help you out instead?
You visited the Camel Cab and asked for some information on the Mushroom Castle.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Complete this quest as the Meerkats Listen During the Day quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Meerkats Listen During the Day

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
You should ask the Camel Cab for information about the Mushroom Castle.
Apparently, Meerkats spread rumors like wildfire during the day. Defeat enough Meerkats in a limited amount of time to keep the rumor from spreading.\r\n

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Go on to the Scorpions Can't Listen at Night quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Scorpions Can't Listen at Night

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
What? He can't tell you because the Meerkats may overhear? What to do? You'd better talk to the Camel again.
He agrees that the Meerkats might eavesdrop and tells you to go to '#bSahel 1#k' for a private conversation.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Go on to the To the Mushroom Castle! quest.

string.name: name
string.value: To the Mushroom Castle!

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
You can finally find out what the Mushroom Castle is all about.
The Camel Cab tells you that you need to be over Level 30 for him to give information about the Mushroom Castle.
Camel Cab can finally share information about the Mushroom Castle now that you've reached Level 30! You'd better undergo job advancement and listen to the Camel Cab talk about the Mushroom Castle.

string.value: Reach Lv. 30

Apparently, the Camel Cab is willing to help you train until you reach Level 30.

string.name: name
string.value: Camel's Training Session 3 (Repeatable)
Apparently, the Camel Cab is willing to help you train until you reach Level 30.

Apparently, the Camel Cab is willing to help you train until you reach Level 30..

#i4032402:# #t4032402:# #c4032402# / 80
The Camel Cab helped you train until you reached Level 30.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,000\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Lim and the Subway

#eJake#k, who works at the #eKerning City Subway Turnstile#k, wants to ask you for a favor. You'd better go talk to him.\r\n#bTip - At the entrance of the subway station in Kerning City, you'll see Shumi sitting outside.

Jake at the Kerning City Subway Station needs help. Up north, there's a #e#bSubway Station that is only partially built. Apparently, the place is infested with monsters and construction had to be halted. #e#bMr. Lim#k#n has been sent there to assess the damage, and Jake wants you to go there to see how bad the damage is.\r\nYou should head over to the #e#bKerning City Abandoned Construction Site#k#n and find the Subway Station that's under construction, then locate Mr. Lim.

Jake, who works at the Kerning City subway station, requested that you meet Mr. Lim at the Construction Site North of Kerning City. Mr. Lim then pleaded with you to check out the old subway platforms for him.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: You talked to #bMr. Lim#k inside the #bAbandoned Subway Train#k located at the Construction Site North of Kerning City.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200

string.name: name
string.value: My dream is to...
Blake has a dream...but he wants you to talk to him about it in a little bit, since he's in the middle of something.
Blake wants to be a singer! Will his dream come true? Talk to #bLana#k the CEO of Big Hit Records. She's shopping in Kerning Square.
Will Blake's dream ever come true?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 600 Unlocks 'Lana's Decision' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Convince Robby Fray
#bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? If that's what it takes to convince a seven star chef to cater Blake's party, then that's what it takes. Get to it!
Robby Fray needs Bubbles to make his specialty cocktails. Head over to the 1st-2nd floor of Kerning Square and collect Bubbles from the Bubble Teas.
#bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? Well, you gotta do what you gotta do to help Blake make his debut. Talk to Robby Fray again.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,550 Can proceed to 'Secret Recipe' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Secret Recipe
You perform a favor for #Robby Fray#k so he would agree to cater the party, but when you go to turn it in, he screams in dismay. It seems like you'll have to do him another favor...

Uh oh. Without his Secret Recipe, Robby Fray can't bear to keep living, let alone cater a party. Hopefully you can find his Secret Recipe before somebody else nabs it.\r\nIt should be with the Doll Claw Games on the 3rd-4th floor of the Shopping Center, right?\r\n
Whew! Finally, you convinced Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to cater the party. Report the good news to #bLana#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,550 Unlocks 'Reception Party Preparation, Done!' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Reception Party Preparation, Done!
After all that, you were finally able to convince Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to help. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
Next on the list is getting a makeup artist. Head over to #bTina#k and see if she'll help.
You met and talked with #bTina#k, but it seemed like she wanted you to do something for her first.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 300 Unlocks 'Tina's Proposition' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Tina's Proposition
Help #bTina#k with her request, then ask her to help with Blake's debut.
Tina needs key chains to give out to her clients. Collect the key chains and dolls from the Doll Claw Games.
You were able to get a makeup artist for the job. Deliver the good news to #bLana#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,550 Unlocks 'Makeup Artist, Booked!' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Makeup Artist, Booked!
You booked a makeup artist. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
This time, you must book a hair stylist. Go over to #bMarshall#k and ask for help.
#bMarshall#k says he can't design Blake's hair. Why not? This can't be good. Discuss it with #bLana#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 300 Unlocks 'Marshall's Refusal' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Marshall's Refusal
Marshall refuses to help. What is stopping him? Report the bad news to #bLana#k.
Find the Locker Key Marshall lost and open the #bLocker#k at the subway station. He supposedly lost his Locker Key on the 5th-6th floor of the Shopping Center.
You found the Locker Key #bMarshall#k lost, but the locker closed shortly after you opened it. Try opening the locker one more time.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 300 Unlocks 'Marshall's Refusal' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Legendary Scissors
Open the #bLocker#k again.
When you open the Locker, you find the #bLegendary Scissors#k. Hurry and deliver the scissors to Marshall.
#bMarshall#k was ecstatic when you delivered the Legendary Scissors and agreed to style Blake's hair in a heartbeat. Give #bLana#k the good news.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 300 Unlocks 'Hair Stylist, Booked!' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Hair Stylist, Booked!
Thanks to your hard work, Marshall agreed to take the gig. Give #bLana#k the good news.
Lana suggested that you ask #bLala#k, Blake's number one fan, for help with the costumes.
#bLala#k was thrilled to hear that Blake was finally make a debut, and asked you to give her some time to brainstorm.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Costume Preparation' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Costume Preparation
Lala is thrilled to hear that Blake is finally making his debut and happily agrees to help with the costumes. Assist #bLala#k to prepare the costumes.
Collect the costumes and props for Blake's debut performance and take them over to #bLala#k.
#bLala#k was thrilled to hear about Blake's debut and asked you to give her some time to think about which costumes would be best for the performance.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,600 Unlocks 'Costume Preparation, Done!' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Costume Preparation, Done!
You've completed the costume preparation, but she says something is still missing. What could possibly be missing? Ask #bLala#k what else she needs.
#bLala#k says she needs more than just costumes and wants you to bring perfume that would complete each costume.
#bLala#k wasn't sure which scent would go best with which costume, so she gave you some time to think about it. \r\nHm, you don't seem too sure either. Why don't you leave it up to #bLala#k?\r\n

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,600 Unlocks 'Rose Scent' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Rose Scent
You aren't sure which scent would go best with which costume. Why don't you leave it up to #bLala#k?
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this rose scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the rose scent would go best with the Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit. Time to tell #bLala#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Freesia Scent' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Freesia Scent
Lana says the rose scent is perfect for the Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit. Time to let #bLala#k know.
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this freesia scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the freesia scent would go best with the Female Mannequin's Wig. Go tell #bLala#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Lavender Scent' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Lavender Scent
Lana says the freesia scent is perfect for the Female Mannequin's Wig. Better tell #bLala#k.
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this lavender scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the lavender scent wasn't exactly perfect for the Fedora, but that it would work. \r\nAsk #bLana#k what other tasks are left on her to-do list.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Music Preparation' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Music Preparation
Lana says she needs to pick out a song for Blake. Talk to #bLana#k for more details on what she needs.
Blake needs a song to perform. Find the CDs at the music shop on the 7th-8th floor and deliver them to #bLana#k.
Lana said the existing hits weren't good enough and asked you to get a new song from #bMaestro Rho#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Request for a New Song' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Request for a New Song

Lana wants you to request a new song from a genius composer? Maestro Rho is not only known for his talents but is also infamous for his arrogance. Oh well, gotta do what you gotta do. Go talk to #bMaestro Rho#k and request a new song.
Destroy the Cheap Amplifiers and find Maestro Rho's lost MP3 player. Follow the sound coming from the 7th-8th floor to where #bJune#k is on duty.

When you found the MP3 player and returned it to Maestro Rho, he said he wanted to listen to some music before helping you. How rude! But this is for Blake, so you should ask him again... And try to be nice.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Composition Fee' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Composition Fee
You found and returned Maestro Rho's MP3 player. That ought to be enough to get a new song, right? Ask #bMaestro Rho#k for a new song Blake can perform during his debut concert.
A composition fee? Well, that's somewhat understandable since he's a brilliant composer. Find the Fancy Amplifier Cables on the 7th-8th floor and deliver them to #bMaestro Rho#k.
You have paid the fee, but he still seems reluctant to give you the song. What's up with that? Talk to #bMaestro Rho#k again.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Say No to Plagiarism' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The New Song
He must have found his Composition Notes by now. Go and get the Composition Notes from #bMaestro Rho#k.
Deliver the #bComposition Notes#k to #bLana#k, the CEO of Big Hit Records.
All preparations for Blake's debut performance are now complete. Go over to #bBlake#k and give him the good news.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'Debut Preparations Completed' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Debut Preparations Completed
Everything seems to be in order. Confirm one more time with #bLana#k.
Lana says everything for Blake's debut performance is good to go and wants you to give #bBlake#k the good news.
Blake was beyond happy and gave you a special gift. He then said you should go see #bJune#k at Kerning Square.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 #Wbasic# #i1032075:# #t1032075:# 1 Unlocks 'Admission to the VIP Zone' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Admission to the VIP Zone
Could it be...? Is it really the VIP Zone in Kerning Square? Rush over to #bJune#k!
He says he'll let you enter the VIP Zone if you bring him VIP Tickets. He says you can get them from any monster in Kerning Square.
He says the VIP Zone can be entered once every 30 minutes. Go see #bJune#k when the 30 minutes are up.

string.name: name
string.value: Blake's Dream
Jake, who works at the subway station at the center of Kerning City has something on his mind.\r\nHead over to #bJake#k and see what's going on.\r\n
Jake says he wants nothing more than to see Blake achieve his dream. Who's Blake anyway?\r\nPass through the turnstile and go over to Kerning Square Station.\r\n
Blake has asked you to wait, as he was in the middle of something.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500 Unlocks 'My Dream Is To...' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Last Song
Try to remember the last song Spirit of Rock performed.\r\nIf you can't remember, the only thing left to do is to destroy Spirit of Rock again.
Try to remember the last song Spirit of Rock performed.\r\nIf you can't remember, the only thing left to do is to destroy Spirit of Rock again.
You told Maestro Rho the last song Spirit of Rock performed.

You should take the #bletter of recommendation#k from the job instructor and visit #b#p1300005##k in the Mushking Empire.
You took the letter of recommendation from the job instructor and met with the Head Security Officer of Mushking Empire.

string.name: name
string.value: The Test
You should meet with #b#p1300005##k of the Mushking Empire.
In order to prove your worth as a candidate for saving Mushking Empire, you should gather #b50 #t4000499#s#k and hand them to #p1300005#.
You proved that you're worthy to save Mushking Empire.

string.name: summary
string.value: You eliminated some Renegade Spores, gathered up #b50 Mutated Spores#k, and brought them back to #p1300005#.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,300 Unlocks 'The Story Behind the Case' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Story Behind the Case
The Head Security Officer of Mushking Empire has something to say.
You need to visit the Mushking Empire's Secretary of Domestic Affairs.
You listened intently as the Mushking Empire's Secretary of Domestic Affairs gave you a timeline of what happened.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should pay a visit to the Mushking Empire's #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 800 Can proceed to the 'Exploring Mushroom Forest (1)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Exploring Mushroom Forest (2)
You must find a way to break through the powerful barrier in Mushroom Forest.
The #bSecretary of Magic#k of Mushking Empire might have an idea about what to do.
You reported the condition of the barrier in Mushroom Forest to the #bSecretary of Magic#k of Mushking Empire.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should find the #bSecretary of Magic#k of Mushking Empire.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 800 Can proceed to the 'Exploring Mushroom Forest (3)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Exploring Mushroom Forest (3)
You're looking for a clue about how to break the barrier from the #bSecretary of Magic#k.
You should visit #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.
You told #bScarrs#k about the strange yet powerful barrier in the Mushroom Forest.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should visit #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 800 Can proceed to the 'Killer Mushroom Spores (1)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Killer Mushroom Spores (2)
It looks like you need more ingredients to produce a #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k.
You have to gather 50 Mutated Spores, which are found on Renegade Spores.
You gave all the ingredients required for producing the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k to Scarrs.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to gather #b50 #t4000499#s#k for #bScarrs#k to finish making the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,300 #Wbasic# #i2430014:# #t2430014:# 1 Can proceed to the 'Killer Mushroom Spores (3)' quest Can proceed to the 'Friendship with Bruce' quest Can proceed to the 'Killer Mushroom Spores, Again' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Killer Mushroom Spores (3)
#bScarrs#k says he has something to tell you.
You need to bring a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.
You brought a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to hand a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 800 Can proceed to the 'Over the Castle Walls (1)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Friendship with Bruce
#bScarrs#k says that he has something for you.
You need to hand a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to #bBruce#k in #bHenesys#k.
You handed a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to #bBruce#k.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to hand a #bSample of Killer Mushroom Spore Potion#k to #bBruce#k in #bHenesys#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Over the Castle Walls (1)
The #bSecretary of Magic#k told you he had something for you.
You should visit the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.
You stopped by to see the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k. He's been thinking of ways for you to somehow enter the castle.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should visit the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 800 Can proceed to the 'Over the Castle Walls (2)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Over the Castle Walls (3)
You think the #bSecretary of Magic#k might shed some light on how to climb past the wall.\r\n
Gather #b30 #t4000501#s#k to make #bThorn Remover#k, then take them over to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.
You gathered #b30 #t4000501#s#k and delivered them to the #bSecretary of Magic#k.

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat the #bIntoxicated Pigs#k and gather #b30 #t4000501#s.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,400 Can proceed to the 'Over the Castle Walls (4)' quest Can proceed to the 'James's Whereabouts (1)' quest Can proceed to the 'Sending Provisions (1)' quest Can proceed to the 'Stop the Wedding' quest Can proceed to 'The Seal of the Empire' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Over the Castle Walls (4)
You should get the #b#t2430015##k from the #b#p1300004##k and climb over the castle walls.
You should use the #b#t2430015##k on the castle walls.
You used #b#t2430015##k to eliminate the thorns from the vines that cover the castle walls.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: You used the #b#t2430015##k on the castle wall to enter the Mushroom Castle.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 500

string.name: name
string.value: James's Whereabouts (1)
The #bHead Security Officer#k says that he has something to tell you.
You should find #bJames#k, who's somewhere hiding inside the castle.
You found #bJames#k, who was hiding inside the castle.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should find #bJames#k, who's somewhere hiding inside the castle.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 800 Can proceed to the 'James's Whereabouts (2)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: James's Whereabouts (2)
You should help #b#p1300008##k make his escape.
You need to bring a #b#t4001317##k to #b#p1300008##k to help him escape.
You brought a #b#t4001317##k to #b#p1300008##k to help him escape.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should bring a #b#t4001317##k to #b#p1300008##k to help him escape.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,500 Can proceed to the 'James's Whereabouts (3)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: James's Whereabouts (3)
You're trying to help #b#p1300008##k escape the castle.
You need to help #b#p1300008#'s#k escape. After, you should go visit #b#p1300005##k!
You successfully helped #b#p1300008#'s#k escape.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to help #b#p1300008#'s#k successfully escape.

string.name: name
string.value: Sending Provisions (1)
Is there a way you can help the soldiers of Mushking Empire, who are running low on supplies? #b#p1300003##k says he wants to have a word with you.
Gather #b25 #t4000502#s#k and take them over to #b#p1300005##k.
You gathered and delivered the #b#t4000502#s#k to #b#p1300005##k in order to contribute to the supply.

string.name: summary
string.value: Gather #b25 #t4000502#s#k and take them over to #b#p1300005##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,500 Can proceed to the 'Sending Provisions (2)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Stop the Wedding
The time has finally come for the showdown. You should go see #b#p1300001##k.
You need to eliminate #bKing Pepe#k and his #b3 Yeti Brothers#k.
You eliminated #bKing Pepe#k and his #b3 Yeti Brothers#k.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to eliminate #bKing Pepe#k and his #b3 Yeti Brothers#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's Violetta?

You need to find #b#p1300002##k, who is probably trapped inside the wedding hall.


#b#e- Limit - #n
Must be alone. (Leave Party)
You found #bPrincess #p1300002##k trapped inside the wedding hall.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value:
You need to find #b#p1300002##k, who is probably trapped inside the wedding hall.


#b#e- Limit - #n
Must be alone. (Leave Party)

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Can proceed to 'The Story of Betrayal' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Story of Betrayal
So who's behind the force that brought down the Mushking Empire?
Eliminate the #bPrime Minister#k, otherwise known as the ultimate traitor.
You eliminated the #bPrime Minister#k, otherwise known as the ultimate traitor.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Can proceed to 'The Identity of the Princess' quest Can proceed to 'The Recovered Royal Seal' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Identity of the Princess
You finally get to see the Princess's face!
Go find out the true identity of the Princess.
You finally saw the princess, whose looks were indescribable, except to say that her looks were the #bstuff of the highest level of mushroom beauty#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Rest
Apparently, the castle is still populated with the minions of the #bPrime Minister#k...
You need to find the rest of the Prime Minister's minions. They are apparently hiding in an area that can be reached through #bSkyscraper 3#k.
You found the minions of the #bPrime Minister#k and took them all out.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should eliminate the rest of the Prime Minister's army. They are apparently hiding in an area that can be reached through #bSkyscraper 3#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Find the Prime Minister's remaining minions.

string.name: name
string.value: Truth Revealed
Now that everything has been revealed, you get the unenviable task of explaining it all to his highness, the Mushking.
You have to bring the #b#t4032387##k given to you by #bPrincess #p1300002##k to #b#p1300000##k and explain what really happened.
You explained to #b#p1300000##k everything that happened.

string.name: summary
string.value: You have to bring the #b#t4032387##k given to you by #bPrincess #p1300002##k to #b#p1300000##k and explain what really happened.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,700 #Wbasic# #i1082254:# #t1082254:# 1 Can proceed to the 'King Pepe's Scroll' quest

string.name: name
string.value: King Pepe's Scroll
King Pepe may be no more, but #b#p1300005##k still seems concerned about the future. You'd better go talk to him.

You're asked to eliminate King Pepe's remaining army.

#o3300000# #a23371#
#o3300001# #a23372#
#o3300002# #a23373#
#o3300003# #a23374#
#o3300004# #a23375#
You helped eliminate the remaining minions of King Pepe.

string.name: summary
string.value: You must eliminate King Pepe's remaining minions.

string.name: name
string.value: Killer Mushroom Spores, Again
If you've lost the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k, go visit #bScarrs#k.
You're visiting Scarrs to get another #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k.
You received a new #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Recovered Royal Seal
#bPrincess Violetta#k says she has something for you.
You recovered the lost #t4001318#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mushking Empire in Danger
The Mushking Empire is in danger!
Take the #bRecommendation Letter#k that Mike has written and go to #b#p1300005##k in the Mushking Empire.
You took the Job Instructor's Recommendation Letter and met with the Mushking Empire Head Security Officer.

string.name: name
string.value: Endangered Mushking Empire
The Mushking Empire is in dire straits and desperately needs your help.
As a member of the Resistance, you can't just sit back and watch the Mushking Empire wallow in danger. Take the #bRecommendation Letter#k and go see #b#p1300005##k of the Mushking Empire.
You took the Job Instructor's Recommendation Letter to the Mushking Empire's Head Security Officer.

string.name: name
string.value: The Dark Lord's Trivial Problem 1
The Dark Lord says that a small problem has risen. His expression seems to indicate that he is quite bothered. Go see the Dark Lord.

The Dark Lord says that some strange incidents have occurred recently. Although they are not serious, the frequency of the occurrences bothers him.\r\nOne incident involves the thieving Spores who have infiltrated Victoria Island. He needs someone to get rid of them by investigating each one, but there is no one the Dark Lord can trust with the task. In order to gain the Dark Lord's trust, you volunteer to eliminate the #bSpores#k...

The Dark Lord said that a few strange incidents occurred recently. Although they were not serious, the frequency of the occurrences bothered him.
One incident involved the thieving Spores who infiltrated Victoria Island. He needed someone to get rid of them by investigating each one, so you volunteered for the task...

Although you eliminated 20 Spores, you were unable to find a suspicious Spore. Still, the Dark Lord appreciated your hard work, and you seemed to have successfully gained his trust.

string.name: summary
string.value: To solve the Dark Lord's problem, head to the #bSix Path Crossway#k located to the left of Kerning City and eliminate the #bSpores#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200 Can proceed to the 'Dark Lord's Trivial Problem 2' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Investigating the Suspicious Person
Eels received a secret letter from the Dark Lord and is investigating the Dual Blades. Go see Eels immediately.

Eels says that people with ulterior motives have entered Kerning City disguised as thieves. He says there's one person standing in front of the Jazz Bar who appears really suspicious, and he wants you to investigate his motives. \r\nYou wonder if he means #bRyden#k...

Eels said that people with ulterior motives have entered Kerning City disguised as thieves. He said there was one person standing in front of the Jazz Bar who was really suspicious, and he wanted you to investigate his motives. \r\nRyden, the suspicious person standing in front of the Jazz Bar, was taken aback, but devised a plan to trick Eels.

string.name: summary
string.value: The Thief Job Instructor is suspicious of #bRyden#k. Go see #bRyden#k in Kerning City.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200 Unlocks 'Falsified Remnant' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Falsified Remnant
Ryden has a plan to deceive Eels...

Ryden wants you to give Eels falsified evidence to deceive him. He wants you to bring Eels a fake secret map that indicates the secret organization's supposed hideout. The map is planted in Stirges and Jr. Wraiths...
As Ryden requested, you brought the falsified evidence gathered from Stirges and Jr. Wraiths to Eels. He was convinced that the map indicated the secret organization's hideout...

string.name: summary
string.value: Hunt Stirges and Jr. Wraiths to collect the #bSecret Map#k, then deliver it to the #bThief Job Instructor#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 220

string.name: name
string.value: Shiba's Story

string.name: parent
string.value: Visiting The Secret Garden
You meet Shiba at The Secret Garden who tells you about the reasons he became a Dual Blade. After finishing his story, Shiba tells you to go see #bYun#k to hear the rest of the story.

You met Shiba at The Secret Garden who told you about the reasons he became a Dual Blade. After he finished his story, Shiba told you to go see #bYun#k to hear the rest of the story. You went up to the next level using the stairs and met #bYun#k, who was standing on top of an owl.

string.name: name
string.value: In the Presence of Lady Syl

string.name: parent
string.value: Visiting The Secret Garden

When you meet Yun, she tells you the story of Lady Syl, Jin (the current Dark Lord), and the former Dark Lord. She asks that you help Lady Syl and suggests that you go see her. Go meet with Lady Syl. \r\n#i3800009#

When you met Yun, she told you the story of Lady Syl, Jin (the current Dark Lord), and the former Dark Lord.\r\nAfter listening to Yun's story, you entered Lady Syl's Room in order to seek her guidance.

string.name: name
string.value: Suri the Owl
Lady Syl has something she wants to propose to you.

Lady Syl proposes that you develop your skills. She tells you to visit Suri the Owl, who is located at The Secret Garden Basement. She says that although the owl can communicate with humans only by using vocabulary cards, he is an expert at training Dual Blades. Training through an owl...?

Lady Syl proposed that you develop your skill. She told you to visit Suri the Owl located at the Secret Garden Basement. She said that although the owl can communicate with humans only by using vocabulary cards, he is an expert at training Dual Blades. You met the owl, who seems normal, whatever that means...

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Talk to #bSuri#k located at The Secret Garden Basement.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 700 Unlocks 'Suri's Beginner Training 1' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Suri's Beginner Training 1
Go see Suri the Owl.
Suri the Owl gives a loud hoot as he picks up 3 vocabulary cards.\r\n\r\n#b#e[Training Center 1], [Shadow Dual Blade], [50]

Suri the Owl gave a loud hoot as he picked up 3 vocabulary cards.

#b#e[Training Center 1], [Shadow Dual Blade], [50]

#k#nYou returned to Suri after eliminating 50 Shadow Dual Blades at Training Center 1.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 700 Unlocks 'Suri's Beginner Training 2' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Suri's Beginner Training 2
Go see Suri the Owl.
Suri the Owl gives a loud hoot as he picks up 3 vocabulary cards.\r\n\r\n#b#e[Training Center 2], [Giant Shadow Blade], [60]

Suri the Owl gave a loud hoot as he picked up 3 vocabulary cards.

#b#e[Training Center 2], [Giant Shadow Blade], [60]

#k#nYou returned to Suri after eliminating 60 Shadow Dual Blades at Training Center 2.

string.name: name
string.value: Eyewitness Holding the Key
Talk to Mr. Pickall who seems to know about everything.

You ask Mr. Pickall about the former Dark Lord and he says that while he isn't too familiar with him, he does know that the former Dark Lord was close with Tristan. He also recommends that you talk to #bManji in Perion#k since he knows a lot about Tristan.

You asked Mr. Pickall about the former Dark Lord and he said that while he wasn't too familiar with him, he was certain that the former Dark Lord was close with Tristan. He also recommended that you talk to #bManji in Perion#k since he knows a lot about Tristan. Though Manji seemed very reserved in his speech, he told you about the former Dark Lord as best as he could recall.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Talk to #b'Manji'#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Suri's Intermediate Training
Now that you've made another Job Advancement, go see Suri the Training Instructor.
Suri the Owl gives a loud hoot as he picks up 3 vocabulary cards.\r\n\r\n#b#e[Training Center 3], [Shadow Blade Lord], [70]

Suri the Owl gave a loud hoot as he picked up 3 vocabulary cards.

#b#e[Training Center 3], [Shadow Blade Lord], [70]

#k#nYou returned to Suri after eliminating 70 Shadow Blade Lords at Training Center 3.
Yun seems to be very worried about Lady Syl. Go see Yun.

Yun says that Lady Syl seems to have lost all will after reading the former Dark Lord's diary. Therefore, she would like to give Lady Syl a gift. Obtain a Tulip from the Fire Boars and give it to Yun.

Yun said that Lady Syl seemed to have lost all will after reading the former Dark Lord's diary. Therefore, she wanted to give Lady Syl a gift. You obtained a Tulip from the Fire Boars and gave it to Yun.

string.name: name
string.value: Arec's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Eighth Mission: In the Presence
Arec says that he will officially recognize the Dual Blades if you can pass his test. Hunt the #bWhite Fangs#k, the legendary white hunters, and bring back their drops.

Arec said that he would officially recognize the Dual Blades if you passed his test, which was to hunt the #bWhite Fangs#k, the legendary white hunters, and bring back their drops. You passed Arec's test by hunting #b100#k White Fangs and bringing back #b50 White Fang Tails#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 12,000 Unlocks 'Arec's Test' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Dark Lord's Trivial Problem 2
The Dark Lord says that he has another little problem...
Heed the Dark Lord's request to eliminate the #bStumps#k in order to gain his trust. A good place to find Stumps is in the Thief Training Center at the Kerning City Construction Site.
You solved the Dark Lord's problem and gained more of his trust.

string.name: summary
string.value: In #bCaution Falling Down#k, go to the Thief Training Center by NPC #bPower B. Fore#k and eliminate Stumps.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200

string.name: name
string.value: Nella's Opinion
Nella seems to know a great deal about the Dark Lord. Talk to #bNella#k.
Nella said that she thinks the Dark Lord is keeping a secret from others. She asked you to talk with JM to find out if other people think the same. #bJM From tha Streetz#k... Why him of all people?
Nella doesn't seem to know that much about the Dark Lord... But perhaps JM might know something.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 100 Unlocks 'JM From tha Streetz's Take' quest

string.name: name
string.value: JM From tha Streetz's Take
JM seems to know something indeed. Figure out the details from #bJM From tha Streetz#k.
JM says that #bMr. Pickall#k would know the most about the Dark Lord and suggests that you talk with him.
Mr. Pickall sounded as if he knew more about the Dark Lord than others.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 100 Unlocks 'Mr. Pickall's Advice' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Pickall's Advice
Dark Lord is the title for the master of Kerning City... Does that mean there have been many Dark Lords? Figure out the details from #bMr. Pickall#k.
The former Dark Lord disappeared? In any case, it seems like you've heard from all the important people, so head back to #bRyden#k.

Ryden said that in order for the Dual Blades to recapture Kerning City, they must first sully the Dark Lord's reputation. He said that a plan is in the works and gave you the mission of investigating how the townspeople currently view the Dark Lord. You reported to Ryden what you discovered from the townspeople.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 100 Unlocks 'Fourth Mission: Double Agent' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Quieting Wraiths
Something seems to be bothering Ryden. What could have happened? Go talk to #bRyden#k.

Recently, Lady Syl hasn't been able to get any sleep, because of the Wraiths who haunt her dreams every night. You need to eliminate the Wraiths, so Lady Syl can have some peace and quiet at night. Eliminate the #rWraiths#k in #bKerning City Subway#k.
You eliminated the Wraiths to help Lady Syl sleep better at night.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 225 #Wbasic# #i2001502:# #t2001502:# 30 Unlocks 'Octopuses Do Your Body Good' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Octopuses Do Your Body Good
Something still seems to be wrong with Lady Syl. Go see #bRyden#k.

Gather the necessary ingredients to make a special tonic that will energize Lady Syl. #Go to the Construction Site using the portal located to the right of Kerning City#k and gather some Octopus Legs.
You hope that Lady Syl will get better soon. Go find out from Ryden if there is anything else you can do.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 330 Unlocks 'Making a Tonic' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Tonic
You brought Ryden fresh Octopus Legs that will be used to make Lady Syl's tonic. Wonder how it's coming along? Go talk to #bRyden#k.

So, it seems that herbs are required to complete the tonic. Use the portal at the right side of Kerning City and hunt the #rDark Stumps#k found in Perion's Dusty Wind Hill past the Six Path Crossway. Gather the #bLeaves#k they drop.
You can only hope that the tonic will make Lady Syl feel better...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 330 Unlocks 'Fifth Mission: Fabrication' quest

After making a job advancement as a warrior, you need to find a training center that'll help you level up faster.
After making a job advancement as a warrior, you should follow the arrows from Perion that lead you to a training center. You won't be able to enter once you reach Level 20.
You found the training center for beginning warriors. You'll be able to receive your first set of training lessons from the trainer, Power B. Fore.
