You were able to find the research sample for Dr. Betty and borrow the #t4032801#. Take it over to #bWing#k, and tell him to return it to Dr. Betty when he's done.
#i4032801##t4032801# #b#c4032801##k/1
You borrowed the #b#t4032801##k from Dr. Betty and brought it to #bWing#k, but #bWing#k had to write it himself, because Betty's report was too difficult to understand.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 220

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen's Paint 1
#b#p1032100##k in Ellinia is in dire need of help.

#bArwen#k was assigned to draw a mural for the Ellinia Magic School Festival, but she can't finish her mural, because she has run out of yellow and green paint. Find #b20 #t4000007#s#k and #b20 #t4000013#s#k, which can be used to make paint.
#i4000007##t4000007# #b#c4000007##k/20 #i4000013##t4000013# #b#c4000013##k/20
You brought the #t4000007#s and #t4000013#s for Arwen. They're such odd ingredients for paint...

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen's Paint 2
#b#p1032100##k of Ellinia needs your help one more time regarding the mural.

#b#p1032100##k of Ellinia needs more White and Black paint to finish her mural. Find 20 #b#t4000023#s#k and 20 #b#t4000621#s#k for Arwen, so she can make more paint.
#i4000023##t4000023# #b#c4000023##k/40 #i4000621##t4000621# #b#c4000621##k/40
You found the #t4000023# and #t4000621# for Arwen. You wonder what she's trying to paint.

string.name: name
string.value: Dark Lord's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Kerning City Maintenance Construction
Nella in Kerning City has a request for you.

#b#p1052001##k is working on a construction project to exchange old bricks with new ones around Kerning City, and he is asking adventurers for help through #b#p1052103##k. #bJM#k can make the bricks, but he needs #b#t4000623#s#k from #bSwamps#k near Kerning City. Find #b100 #t4000623#s#k and take them over to #bJM#k
#i4000623##t4000623# #b#c4000623##k/100
You delivered Mud Clumps to JM.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Can proceed to the 'Deliver Orange Bricks' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Deliver Orange Bricks

string.name: parent
string.value: Kerning City Maintenance Construction

When you delivered 100 clumps of Mud to JM, he made a #t4032802# out of them. Take the #t4032802# over to the Dark Lord.
#i4032802##t4032802# #b#c4032802##k/10
You safely delivered the #t4032802# that Dark Lord requested and received a pair of shoes as a reward.

string.name: name
string.value: Returning to Master Sergeant Fox

string.name: parent
string.value: Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication

Master Sergeant Fox asked me to meet #bStaff Sergeant Charlie, Sergeant Bravo, and Corporal Easy#k in order. I met them all just as Master Sergeant Fox told me. I should be returning to him right away.

Just like the way Master Sergeant Fox requested, I met his men in order of ranks and got the 3 pieces of an ancient document to him. He was really happy about it, and gave me the scroll made out of those pieces. He also wished that I could drop by sometime later and see how the other men are doing...maybe I should...

string.name: summary
string.value: Go back to Master Sergeant Fox

string.name: name
string.value: Hella's Missing

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

Alcaster told me to go to Hella's house in Orbis, to no avail. She wasn't anywhere to be found, as I had to resort to talking to her housekeeper, #bElma#k. According to her, Hella hadn't been home in months, and no one knows where she went or why. She did tell me to go see her best friend, #bJade of El Nath#k, so I should go there immediately.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should go see Hella's friend, Jade, at El Nath.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,200 Can proceed to the 'Where is Hella?' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Where's Hella?

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
Jade suspected that Hella may have gone on a search to find the #bkeepsake of her late mother#k, and told me to go see Hella's housekeeper again.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should go back to Housekeeper Elma in Orbis.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,200 Can proceed to the 'One Clue' quest

string.name: name
string.value: To Restore the Crystal

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
Just as I expected...Spiruna went livid over the cracked Black Crystal, and blames it all on me!!! Maybe I should seek some help from that lady standing next to her.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should talk to the mysterious girl who lives in Spiruna's house.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,200 Can proceed to the 'The Advice of an Assistant' quest

string.name: name
string.value: A Word from the Assistant

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

Spiruna's assistant quietly tells me that at this point, nothing will bring her back to her senses, unless I bring an item called #bFairy Dust#k, the only item that'll restore the cracked black crystal to its original state. #bKriel the Fairy#k of Orbis General Store may have it.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should go see Kriel the Fairy at the Orbis General Store.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,200 Can proceed to the 'Acquiring Fairy Dust' quest

string.name: name
string.value: To Acquire the Fairy Dust

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

#bKriel the Fairy#k wanted to make a deal with me, and I complied. For her to give up the #bFairy Dust#k, I'll have to get her #b100 Star Pixie Starpieces, 50 Lunar Pixie Moonpieces, and 30 Luster Pixie Sunpieces#k. I'll have to go on a serious Pixie hunting spree for a while. 

#t4000061# #b#c4000061##k/30
#t4000059# #b#c4000059##k/100
#t4000060# #b#c4000060##k/50
I gave all ingredients to Kriel the Fairy. She will give me Fairy Dust.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should gather all the ingredients Kriel the Fairy needs and bring it back to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 14,680 Can proceed to the 'Fairy Dust in My Hand' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Hella is Found!

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

Hella requested that I get this #bpendant#k to Jade. She also mentioned something about an old diary that she found at home years ago, and it mentioned the existence of the Book of Ancient, and that the owner lost it somewhere deep in the valley of the snowfield. Jade should fill up the rest for me. I got to go see him right now and inform him of her whereabouts.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should deliver Hella's pendent to Jade in El Nath.

string.name: name
string.value: The Small Grave That's Hidden

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
Jade, who received Hella's Pendant, suppresses her excitement, instead asking how Hella is doing. The small tomb Jade mentions should be in the cold field somewhere...

string.name: summary
string.value: I should go to the small grave in the snowfield Jade mentioned.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,400 Can proceed to the 'An Old Ring' quest

string.name: name
string.value: An Old Ring

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I found an anonymous grave somewhere deep in the valley of the snowfield. I also removed an old ring from the corpse's finger. Maybe Alcaster knows what to do with it.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should take the ring I found at the grave and take it to Alcaster in El Nath.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,400 Can proceed to 'The Secret Behind the Ring' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Secrets Behind the Ring?

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
Alcaster took time observing the ring, and felt an incredible force emanating from it. He recommended that I go see Scadur the Hunter around El Nath.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Wolf Skin

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

#bScadur#k mentioned that the price of wolf skin has gone up the roof these days, and wanted to make a deal with me. 80 Hector Tails and 80 White Fang Tails will be enough for him to return the ring to me, along with telling me everything he knows regarding the situation. .

#t4000051# #b#c4000051##k/80
#t4000052# #b#c4000052##k/80
Being satisfied with Hector Tails and White Fang Tails, Scadur said he would give the ring back. \n\n#t2000004 # #b#c2000004 #/1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog and His Recovery

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

I went to Perion and met up with #bDances with Balrog#k. After I showed him the ring, he conceded that he may have an item that'll provide enough clues to help me ultimately find the Book of Ancient. Of course, he also didn't want to just give it away like that. Since he's spent too much energy trying to help other warriors, he wanted #b2 Power Crystals#k to recover his strength, in return for handing me the item that holds the clue.

string.name: name
string.value: Restoring the Map

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
So I need the #bMemory Powder#k to put the map pieces back as one...I better talk to #bCorporal Easy of Alpha Platoon#k and see if he has it.

string.name: name
string.value: Acquiring the Memory Powder

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

Corporal Easy promises that he will give you Memory Powder if you bring him #b30 Lucida Tails#k. He says you can find Lucidas in the Garden of Darkness in Orbis...\n\n#i4000074##t4000074# #b#c4000074##k/30
You delivered Lucida Tails to Corporal Easy.

string.name: name
string.value: The Map is in One Piece

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I got the #bMemory Powder#k from Corporal Easy. Now I need to get this to Alcaster.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secrets Behind the Statue

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
With the Memory Powder, Alcaster was able to attach the four map pieces and turn it into a map. According to the map, the Book of Ancient lies somewhere #baround Orbis Tower at some statue#k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Book of Ancient is Back!

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I can't believe I finally have a hold of the #bBook of Ancient#k. Now I need to turn this over to Alcaster...

A lot of time and effort were put into this, but the Book of Ancient is finally back in Alcaster's hands as he will begin working on the process of sealing up the book for good. As a sign of appreciation, he rewarded me with a special cape. I really hope he finds a way to seal up the book for good.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcaster and the Dark Crystal
I should go check up on Alcaster in El Nath soon.

Alcaster of El Nath told me in order to seal up the #bBook of Ancient#k, he'll need a #bDark Crystal#k and a #bStar Rock#k. So here I am, looking for those two. The Dark Crystal is supposedly only available through evil-minded monsters, and the ores can be refined through Spiruna of Orbis Park.
I got Alcaster the #bDark Crystal#k and the #bStar Rock#k. He may have been drained and exhausted from sealing up the #bBook of Ancient#k, but he seems peaceful at heart

string.name: name
string.value: Traces of Nick

string.name: parent
string.value: Nick, the Son of Scadur the Hunter
I should go see Scadur the Hunter in El Nath.

You see Scadur for the first time since the whole Book of Ancient fiasco. He says he lost his wife when the monsters from the Dead Mine invaded, and his son, Nick, left home to travel El Nath in an attempt to avenge his mother's death. But, Scadur has not heard from his son and wants you to find #bNick's Ring#k. He thinks it may be in Ice Valley somewhere. He also wants you to grant his son's last wish and bring 80 #bWhite Fang Tails#k. It sounds like a rigorous adventure awaits you!
I went into the innermost part of the lava cave, where I found a chipped part of a statue. I have a feeling something is in here.

string.name: name
string.value: Nick's Ring

string.name: parent
string.value: Nick, the Son of Scadur the Hunter

You find a #bRing#k in Ice Valley, below a statue fragment that could belong to Nick. The ring has a name engraved on it... Show it to Scadur and confirm that it belonged to Nick...

#i4000052##t4000052# #b#c4000052##k/80
#i4031060##t4031060# #b#c4031060##k/1

You found Nick's Ring and collected some White Fang Tails in Ice Valley. When you brought them to Scadur, he gave you a cape from Scadur that has been passed down from generation to generation. Not too shabby!

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Huckle's Magic Ingredients
I heard there is an old man called #bHuckle#k inside a hidden secret room in Orbis Tower...

You meet an old man named Huckle in the Hidden Room in the middle of Orbis Tower. He's been living there for 30 years, studying the physics of the self-moving stones. He wants you to gather #b45 Jr. Sentinel Shellpieces, 20 Ice Sentinel Shellpieces, and 20 Fire Sentinel Shellpieces#k. Get ready!

#i4000085##t4000085# #b#c4000085##k/15
#i4000083##t4000083# #b#c4000083##k/15
#i4000084##t4000084# #b#c4000084##k/15

I got Huckle, the old man living in the hidden room at the Orbis Tower, the items he had requested, and in return, got the Statue-Teleporting Scroll. It allows me to teleport between the statue at the 20th floor of Orbis Tower, and the 1st floor. Huckle looks like he needs more samples, so I guess I'll need to keep looking for those ...

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from Staff Sergeant Charlie

string.name: parent
string.value: Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication
I found Staff Sergeant Charlie at Orbis, and he asked me to get him #b2 refined #t4011005#s#k while giving me an item which is to be given to Master Sergeant Fox.
I gave Orihalcon to Sergeant Charlie. What would he give Master Sergeant Fox?

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering a Mysterious Item

string.name: parent
string.value: To the New World
I should go see Wing the Fairy, who should be in Ellinia.

I met up with Wing the Fairy of Ellinia. He grabbed me and asked me if I wanted to explore to a new world and train myself there. Unfortunately, that's not what he really meant by it. He just wanted me to be the delivery person and get this item to his friend #bKriel the Fairy#k in Orbis.
I went to Orbis and gave Kriel the Fairy a bottle of Tears of Kelvelos.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Kriel Out

string.name: parent
string.value: To the New World
I need to go see Kriel the Fairy at Orbis.

Kriel the Fairy is swamped with work and asks if you could help her. She wants you to walk around town, collecting Empty Bottles and other materials required to make magic tools. 

#i4031198##t4031198# #b#c4031198##k/20 
 #i4000073##t4000073# #b#c4000073##k/50 
 #i4000058##t4000058# #b#c4000058##k/30
I'm glad I got to help Kriel the Fairy out.

string.name: name
string.value: The Nependeath Juice

string.name: parent
string.value: The Chaos behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice
I should go see Alfonse Green, who should be somewhere near Orbis.

I met up with Alfonse Green, and needless to say, he is a big fan of the Nependeath Juice. He asked me if I could make one for him. To make one, I'll need to acquire the Sap of Nependeath, and I'll need Ericsson for that.
I met up with Ericsson.

string.name: name
string.value: A Present for Nero
I need to see Elma the Housekeeper, who is in Orbis.

The only way to convince Ericsson is to make a present for his kitty. Make a Lunar Wristband for the cat.

 #i4000059##t4000059# #b#c4000059##k/60 
 #i4000060# #t4000060# #b#c4000060##k/30
I got Nero's present through Elma. Now if only I can convince Ericsson...

string.name: name
string.value: Ericsson's Reward

string.name: parent
string.value: The Chaos behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice
I need to look for Ericsson.

After bringing Ericsson a present for his cat, he is extremely happy and promises to make you the #bSap of Nependeath#k. 

 #i4000058# #t4000058# #b#c4000058##k/50 
 #i4000062##t4000062# #b#c4000062##k/25
I got the #bSap of Nependeath#k from Ericsson. I should take this to #bElma the Housekeeper#k immediately!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,400 #Wbasic# #i4031200:# #t4031200:# 1 Can proceed to the 'Elma's Nependeath Juice' quest Can proceed to 'The Lost Nependeath Juice' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Elma's Nependeath Juice

string.name: parent
string.value: The Chaos behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice
I should ask Elma the Housekeeper to make a glass of Nependeath Juice.

Elma promised me to fix me a nice Nependeath Juice, but she'll need the following ingredients to do so...

 #t4031201# #b#c4031201##k/1 
 #t2022039# #b#c2022039##k/1 
 #t4000136# #b#c4000136##k/20
Elma fixed me a tasty-looking Nependeath Juice. I better get this to Alfonse Green quickly!

string.name: name
string.value: Estelle and the Syrup
I should go check out Estelle, who should be somewhere around Ellinia.

Estelle asked me to gather up the ingredients necessary to make syrup. She promised to hook me up with a very tasty syrup if I get those for her. 

 #t4000029# #b#c4000029##k/60 
 #t2012002# #b#c2012002##k/30 
 #t4000017# #b#c4000017##k/10
Estelle fixed me a bottle of sugary sweet syrup.

string.name: name
string.value: Alfonse's Smile

string.name: parent
string.value: The Chaos behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice
I better go see Alfonse right now. I'm sure he's been dying to see me!
I got Alfonse Green exactly what he wanted, the Nependeath Juice.
I've never seen anyone so happy over a glass of juice as Alfonse Green was with his glass of Nependeath Juice.

string.name: name
string.value: Lisa's Letter of Recommendation

string.name: parent
string.value: Scadur's New Fur Coat
I should go see Lisa of Orbis.
I've decided to go see Scadur of El Nath with the help of Lisa.
He said he needed my help in order to make a new fur coat.

string.name: name
string.value: Acquiring Materials for the Fur Coat

string.name: parent
string.value: Scadur's New Fur Coat
I better go introduce myself to Scadur of El Nath with this letter of recommendation from Lisa.

Apparently, Scadur has been wanting to get a nicer fur coat for quite some time. He asks you to gather the finest set of materials for his new fur coat. 

 #i4000051##t4000051# #b#c4000051##k/100 
 #i4000052##t4000052# #b#c4000052##k/100 
 #i4000057##t4000057# #b#c4000057##k/50 
 #i4020005##t4020005# #b#c4020005##k/50
I helped Scadur make the finest fur coat available in Ossyria.

string.name: name
string.value: Moppie the Lone Dawg
I should go see Moppie, who seemed tired and weary of waiting for his master.

I saw Moppie in Orbis, and he seemed unresponsive to my commands. You could tell he's been waiting for his master for a long time judging from the wrinkly, dirty, unruly hair he features. I wanted to help him out, but I cannot understand whatever Moppie is uttering. I need someone as a translator so I can talk to him, but ... should I ask for a person, or a fairy?
I had no idea what Moppie was saying, so I got to ask Lisa for some help.

string.name: name
string.value: Fairy's Horn Flute
According to Lisa, there is a way to communicate with Moppie the dog, as long as the horn flute is there. They are usually featured by the fairies.

With the fairies' horn flute, I can talk to Moppie with ease...and Lisa promised to make one for me, as long as I gather up the necessary materials for it. 

#t4000073# #b#c4000073#/80#k
#t4003004# #b#c4003004#/15#k
#t4000021# #b#c4000021#/5#k
The horn flute for the fairies is finally made. Wow, this thing feels weird...

string.name: name
string.value: Fairy's Horn Flute II
Lisa of Orbis made me a horn flute. Hopefully this will help me finally understand what Moppie is saying ...
Should I try this horn flute on Moppie?
I used the horn flute for fairies on Moppie, and I could finally understand what he's saying!!

string.name: name
string.value: Lisa's Special Medicine
Thanks to the horn flute, I can clearly comprehend what Moppie is saying. What kind of help is Moppie looking for...?

Thanks to the horn flute, I could finally understand what Moppie was saying. Apparently he was just sitting at the same spot waiting for his master until one day, he decided to take matters into his own hands (or paws) and wandered out of town. He was attacked by a monster, and he's been hurt ever since. I need to find someone that can help Moppie get healthy again.
I found that someone that can make the ultimate medicine for Moppie.

string.name: name
string.value: Lisa's Special Medicine II
To cure Moppie, I need Lisa's Special Medicine...

To make Lisa's Special Medicine, I'll need 40 Orange Potions, 20 Blue Potions, 1 Antidote, and ... 1 Fairy's Tentacle. Obtaining the Fairy's Tentacle is going to be difficult.

#t2000001# #b#c2000001#/40#k
#t2000003# #b#c2000003#/20#k
#t2050000# #b#c2050000#/1#k
#t4000068# #b#c4000068#/1#k
Lisa's Special Medicine is finally made! The sweet scent of it just makes it look that much more appealing to me, and I'm sure it will for Moppie.

string.name: name
string.value: Lisa's Special Medicine III
With Lisa's Special Medicine, Moppie's injuries will heal in an instant. Hurry over to Moppie.
With Lisa's Special Medicine, Moppie's injuries will heal in an instant. Hurry over to Moppie.
Thanks to Lisa's Special Medicine, Moppie is completely healed!

string.name: name
string.value: Food-Hunting for Moppie
Moppie's master Huckle had completely forgotten about his trusty dog as he was conducting his studies in Orbis Tower. He felt so horrible that he wanted to at least feed Moppie with something...
Huckle wants you to get some fish for Moppie. Head down to the bottom of Orbis Tower and collect fish from Jr. Pepe. 50 fish should make Moppie happy. \n\n#i4000088##t4000088# #b#c4000088#/50#k
I gathered up 100 of Jr. Pepe's Fishes and got them to Moppie as a favor from Huckle.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,400 #Wbasic# #i2020006:# #t2020006:# 10 #i2120000:# #t2120000:# 15 #i4001019:# #t4001019:# 2 Can proceed to the 'Food-Hunting for Moppie â…¡' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Food-Hunting for Moppie II
Moppie's master, Huckle, wants to ask me for another favor...

Huckle's time is entirely consumed by his studies, and he wants you to get some more fish for Moppie. This time, he wants 100 of them! Deliver them to Moppie. \n\n#i4000088##t4000088# #b#c4000088#/100#k
You gathered 100 of Jr. Pepe's fish and delivered them to Moppie.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,400 2,000 mesos #Wbasic# #i2020006:# #t2020006:# 15 #i4001019:# #t4001019:# 2 #i2120000:# #t2120000:# 15 Can proceed to the 'Food-Hunting for Moppie â…¢' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nero's Necklace
I heard somewhere around Orbis Park, there's a guy strolling along with a black cat on his head. I should check him out.

I met #p2012018# at Orbis Park, and despite his intimidating appearance, seemed like a genuinely nice guy who has an affinity for cats. He was concerned about the fact that his cat Nero wandered around and came back without the necklace that he personally made for him. #p2012018# asked if I could buy the materials necessary for him to make a new necklace for Nero at the store. 

#t4031191# #b#c4031191##k/1
#t4031192# #b#c4031192##k/1
As a favor from #p2012018# of Orbis Park, I purchased the necessary materials for #p2012018# to make a new necklace for Nero.

string.name: name
string.value: Protect Nero!
I should check #p2012018# out at Orbis Park.

#p2012018# is livid, because the monsters right outside of Orbis have made life miserable for Nero. He wants you to teach those monsters a lesson by eliminating #b30 #o3210200#s, 30 #o3210201#s, and 30 #o3210202#s#k. In addition, you need to bring back #b50 #t4000073#s#k.

#i4000073##t4000073# #b#c4000073##k / 50

#o3210200# #r#a30641#
#k#o3210201# #r#a30642#
#k#o3210202# #r#a30643#
Ericsson was livid towards the fact that the monsters outside Orbis had been making his cat Nero's life miserable, so with his blessing, I proceeded to teach those monsters a lesson or two.

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes's Research Material
I heard Hughes ran out of materials to conduct research ... I should go check him out.

The mad scientist living at the basement of Orbis, Hughes, wanted me to gather up some materials for his new research. 

#t4000155# #b#c4000155# / 20#k 
#t4000156# #b#c4000156# / 20
I got him #t4000155# and #t4000156# for his research.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Sap of Nependeath
I lost the sap of Nependeath. I better go talk to Ericsson about it.
Fortunately Ericsson had some left over from the last time he made them. He wasn't very pleased with the fact that I lost it, but...I think he'll make me another batch.
I got a new batch of sap of Nependeath from Ericsson.

string.name: name
string.value: Shammos's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Ready for Revival
I should go meet up with Shammos, who lives somewhere around El Nath.

I met Shammos at the basement of Chief's Residence. Apparently a plan from back then had backfired and rendered him to where he is today ... it seems like he was planning up something sinister, and the four chiefs found out about it and sealed him up. Anyway, he looks really intimidating, and he seems to be cooking up something terrible again. He's not telling me what it is, but he wants me to head over to Perion to get the item he needs. Am I doing the right thing by helping him out?
I met up with Manji, who knows a thing or two about the #b#t4031218##k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secrets Behind the Contract of Darkness

string.name: parent
string.value: Preparing For the Revival
I met up with Manji, who knows something about the #b#t4031218##k.

Manji tells you about the #b#t4031218##k, but you wonder if it's true... Can it really bring the dead back to life? The unfathomable force of #b#t4031218##k... Find it and return to Shammos. \n\n#i4031218##t4031218# #b#c4031218##k/1
I gathered up the #b#t4031218##k and gave them back to Shammos.

string.name: name
string.value: Carta the Sea Witch

string.name: parent
string.value: Carta the Sea Witch
#p2060006#, who works at the Aquarium Zoo, asked me for help, and wanted me to go see her at the Aquarium. What does she need from me...?

#b#p2060006##k, who works at the Aquarium Zoo, asked me to go see her. #b#p2060006##k said she wanted to find out the whereabouts of her boyfriend #bGail#k, who has volunteered to be part of the exploration team that heads deep in the underwater, and asked me if I could go talk to #b#p2060100##k the sea witch about him.
At the request of #p2060006#, I went to see #p2060100# the sea witch. #p2060100# lived inside the cave at #m230040000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Carta's Demand

string.name: parent
string.value: Carta the Sea Witch
At the request of #p2060006#, I went underwater to meet up with the Sea Witch, #p2060100#. Unfortunately, when I got there, she said she can't foresee the future.

#b#p2060100##k flat-out claimed she couldn't predict the future, but she said she can at least see what the person in question is doing right now. She also said that since the spell is really difficult to pull off, so I'll need to gather up the items if I want to find out what's in store for Gail. She requested that I get #b3 #t4031256#s#k and #b10 #t4031251#s#k from #r#o8140600##k, and #b1 #t4031253##k that can be obtained through #r#o8510000##k while it's dying. 

#t4031256# #b#c4031256##k/3
#t4031251# #b#c4031251##k/10
#t4031253# #b#c4031253##k/1
I gathered up all the items #p2060100# asked me to get.

string.name: name
string.value: Carta's Fortune-Telling

string.name: parent
string.value: Carta the Sea Witch
I gathered up all the materials that #p2060100# asked me get. Maybe I can now find out what happened to Gail.
According to #b#p2060100##k, something terrible indeed happened to Gail. What can possibly happen underwater? Anyway, I should let #b#p2060006##k of this immediately. I hope he takes it well...

I told #b#p2060006##k the result of #b#p2060100##k's fortune-telling. What does it mean by the dark fog that surrounds Gail? #p2060006# was trying to act calm, but I could tell she's feeling nervous about Gail. Is #p2060100#'s stuff really worth believing?

string.name: name
string.value: The Blocked Path of the Ocean
I should be able to see #p2060101# deep in the underwater... somewhere around #m230040400#.

I met #b#p2060101##k in between #m230040400# at an empty ship that's been wrecked. He said he's been looking for the traces of his missing men. He came down here to check out the irregular activities that have been taking place here, and one day he lost contact with his men. Not only did he lose them, but he said the path to the bottom of the ocean is blocked too, so he asked me for help on looking for traces of his men. I should wander around looking for #bitems that can be used as evidence#k. If the items the men have used are still here, then maybe the #bsharks#k that have been roaming around #b#m230040400##k is the one to blame... I should find a #bflashlight#k, a #bcamera#k and a #bnotebook#k, and give them back to #b#p2060101##k.

#p2060101#, whom I've met at #m230040400#, asked me to find traces of his men that have disappeared. I was able to gather up the flashlight, the camera, and the notebook that his men used at the time of the attack. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to find any of the missing men.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Nependeath Juice
If I ever lost the Nependeath Juice, at least I know who to talk to... Elma.
I went to see Elma to get another glass of Nependeath Juice that I lost.
I got a new glass of Nependeath Juice from Elma.

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Research 1
#p2060005#, the animal instructor at the Aquarium Zoo, has a quandary. I should go talk to him and see what's up.

#b#p2060005##k, a veteran animal instructor at the Aquarium Zoo, seemed to be concerned over the fact that the animals at Aqua Road have been acting strangely since the storm that occurred not too long ago. I couldn't see the difference myself, but I'm sure the expert sees it differently. \n#b#p2060005##k wanted to investigate this phenomenon, and asked me to gather up the DNA samples of the animals at Aqua Road.

I gave #p2060005#, the animal trainer at Aquarium, the DNA samples of some of the animals at Aquarium. If it's indeed true that some animals have started to act differently since the storm, then how is he going to prove it through research? I'm anxious to find out...

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Research 2
I wonder how #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, is doing these days... I want to find out what he got out of his research. I better go see him.

I met up with #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, again. He mentioned that he was on the verge of finding out what was wrong, but was missing something. He then asked me to gather up another set of DNA samples. 

#t4031262# #b#c4031262##k / 1
#t4031263# #b#c4031263##k / 1
#t4031264# #b#c4031264##k / 1
I helped #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, out again. This time, I gathered up the DNA samples of the fishes at Aqua Road. Maybe this will lead to clear-cut results.

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Research 3
Has #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, been getting the results he wanted? I better go find out...

I met up with #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, again. This time, he mentioned that the fishes near Aquarium have generally transformed more than others, and that he wanted to find out the conditions of the living organisms at the east coast and west coast. He wanted me to gather up another set of DNA samples for him. 

#t4031265# #b#c4031265##k / 1
#t4031266# #b#c4031266##k / 1
#t4031267# #b#c4031267##k / 1

I helped #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, out again. So the animals in Aqua Road have been slowly changing in a negative way without anyone noticing... why is that happening? Can #p2060005# find out?

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Advice
I should go see #p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, with my pet.

Kenta, the trainer at the aquarium zoo, mentions that if a pet's loyalty increases, it will walk at the same pace of its master. Then, Kenta says he will offer you a chance to increase your pet's Closeness level.
With the help of Kenta, your pet's loyalty went up, and it began to walk at the same pace as you.

string.name: name
string.value: Nanuke's Ingredients
Deep in the snow at the Snowy Whale Island, #p2060000# found something he really wants to eat... I wonder what it is...

Deep in the snow at the Snowy Whale Island, #p2060000# wanted to eat something that he'd never eaten before in his life. Apparently, his friend #p2060006#, who lives at #m230000000#, offered to make him a tasty new dish, so long as he gathers up the ingredients for her. The problem is... those ingredients are really difficult to gather up. I better go gather up #b150 #t4000183#s#k and #b80 #t4000181#s#k for #p2060000#, so I can deliver them to #b#p2060006##k.

#t4000183# #b#c4000183##k / 150
#t4000181# #b#c4000181##k / 80

Deep in the snow at the Snowy Whale Island, #p2060000# wanted to eat something that he'd never eaten before in his life. He also said if I gather up 150 #t4000183#s and 80 #t4000181#s, then #p2060006# will make a tasty meal for him... So I gathered up the ingredients and met up with #p2060006#. #p2060006# wanted me to wait while she makes the tasty dish for Nanuke, and asked to see her later.

string.name: name
string.value: Muse is Cooking
Is #p2060006# done cooking?

#p2060006# made what seemed like a very tasty dish from the ingredients I got for her. I couldn't see the dish because it was inside a box, but judging from the tasty aroma that filled the room, I knew this was indeed a winner. #p2060006# warned me that this was best eaten when hot, and wanted me to get this to #b#p2060000##k before it turned cold. Basically, I have #r1 hour#k to deliver this to #b#p2060000##k. Can I do this?
I delivered the food that #p2060006# made to #p2060000# on time. I had to really run to make it here in 1 hour. Phew, at least seeing #p2060000# chow down on the dish made it all worthwhile.

string.name: name
string.value: Spiruna's Prophecy

string.name: parent
string.value: Orbis in Danger

I heard that #p2032001#, who resides at the Cloud Park of #m200000000#, made a disturbing prophecy. She may not have the best of personalities, but she's a prophet who correctly saw the future. What must it be that she saw...?

I ran to the Cloud Park of Orbis just to hear the disturbing prophecy from #b#p2032001##k herself. She said nonchalantly that #m200000000# will crash to the ground soon. I asked her of the ways to save #m200000000#, only to hear her say it's all going to be in vain, and decided not to help me out. I can't let #m200000000# crash down like that! I better go talk to #b#p2032001##k again.

I went to see #p2032001# again, but she sat down, motionless, as if she was meditating right then and there. Will #m200000000# crash and burn just like that? But then, a girl standing next to #p2032001# is looking at me as if she has something to say on this matter. Who must she be...?

string.name: name
string.value: Lightening Up Orbis

string.name: parent
string.value: Orbis in Danger

You run into a mysterious girl at #p2032001#'s house. She thinks the reason Orbis is sinking is because there are too many monsters in the Cloud Terrace these days. The mysterious girl requests that you eliminate #b50#k #r#o3210200#s, #b50#k #o3210201#s, and #b50#k #o3210202#s#k.

#o3210200# #r#a30871##k
#o3210201# #r#a30872##k
#o3210202# #r#a30873##k

As the mysterious girl at #p2032001#'s house requested, you eliminated 50 each of the #o3210200#, the #o3210201#, and the #o3210202#. Your contribution probably slowed down Orbis's inevitable crash, but the imminent danger has not been completely prevented. And you can't help but wonder who the mysterious girl is... She must be aware of the danger that has befallen Orbis. Talk to her again.

string.name: name
string.value: Pixies' Cloud Pieces

string.name: parent
string.value: Orbis in Danger

I talked to the mysterious girl at #p2032001#'s house again. She mentioned that Spiruna has finally found the main reason Orbis is sinking. Orbis floats in the air thanks to the mythical, magical power that's laden in the clouds, but the Pixie's have been soaking up that magical power from the clouds to their advantage. The Pixies use that power to increase their magical powers, and by doing so, the clouds have been weakened to the point of Orbis making its freefall. To start the fixing, she wanted me to gather up #b25 #t4031309#s#k from #o3230200#, #o4230106#, and #o5120000# for her.\n\n#t4031309# #b#c4031309##k / 25
Just the way the mysterious girl at #p2032001#'s house requested, I gathered up 25 #t4031309#s from the Pixie's and gave them to her.

string.name: name
string.value: The Sprayer Elma Borrowed 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Orbis in Danger

The key tool used to fix the Orbis clouds is the Cloud Sprayer, but ever since Elma the Housekeeper borrowed it some 50 years ago, the sprayer hasn't been seen since. 50 years, and still no return??? I better go see #bElma the Housekeeper#k.
I met up with Elma and received the #t4031308# that she borrowed 50 years ago. I should go back to Spiruna's house now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Sprayer Elma Borrowed 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Orbis in Danger

I received #t4031308# from Elma the Housekeeper. It looks like a significant amount of time has passed since I came here. I better get back to #p2032001#'s house immediately.\n\n#t4031308# #b#c4031308##k / 1
I received the Cloud Sprayer from Elma the Housewife. The cloud fixing should be a breeze now with this in store. This better stop the freefall of Orbis.

string.name: name
string.value: Aqua Road Photo Album

string.name: parent
string.value: The View of the Ocean
I heard #b#p2060006##k of Aquarium sells #t4031310#...

I met with #p2060006#, the person who sells #t4031310#. Unfortunately, she mentioned that the photo album is sold out. After relentlessly asking her questions about it, she relented and told me she'll give me the photo album that she kept for herself. In return, she wanted me to show her #t4031312#, since she's never seen snow before in her life. #b#t4031312##k is made by #r#p2020005##k of El Nath.
After receiving the request from #p2060006# to see the Snow Crystal Sphere, I headed off to El Nath to see #p2020005#.

string.name: name
string.value: Snow Crystal 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The View of the Ocean
#p2020005# seems to be pretty busy. I better pay another visit.

#p2020005# mentioned that, in order to make #t4031312#, I'll have to bring #b100 #t4031311#s#k to him. #t4031311# can be found through the monster called #b#o5300000##k, which lives in the Orbis Tower... \n\n#i4031311# #t4031311# #b#c4031311##k/100
I got all 100 #t4031311#s and gave them to #p2020005#. #p2020005# promised me to make #t4031312# soon, and wanted me to wait for a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Snow Crystal 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The View of the Ocean
Is #t4031312# made? I better go see #p2020005# and find out for myself.
I finally got #t4031312# from #p2020005#. I have a feeling #p2060006#'s going to LOVE seeing this. I better head back to Aquarium and see #r#p2060006##k.
I gave #p2060006# the #t4031312#, and in return, got myself the Official Aqua Road Photo Album. Now it's time for me to show this to Kriel in Orbis.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Photo Album
I think I lost the Official Aqua Road Photo Album that Muse gave me. I better go see her again.
Muse said she can make another one for me, but this time, it'll cost me 10,000 mesos. 10,000 mesos? Man, that's expensive...
I gave Muse 10,000 mesos for the Official Aqua Road Photo Album.

string.name: name
string.value: The legend of Papa Pixie
#p2032001# examined the Pixie's sculptures and asked us to look for him again.

#p2032001# said that the reason why Pixies have become ferocious is that the Pixie king, #rPapa Pixie#k, has emerged again. It seems that the Goddess who suddenly appeared is related to the tower. Because the future of Orbis is endangered, let's look for Papa Pixie#k at the tower of #rGoddess and drive him away. \n\n#o9300039# #r#a30981##k

At the tower of the Goddess, Pa pa Pixie was successfully driven away. #p2032001# thanked us for saving Orbis' future as the Pixies became gentle again. However, as everyone was elated and preparing to go out, it seems like the real reason to be happy is something else.

string.name: name
string.value: Master Sergeant Fox's Secret

string.name: parent
string.value: Warm El Nath
Apparently #p2020003# has a small secret. I should go to #m211000000# and find out some more about this.

#p2020003# admitted to easily getting cold...and the only reason he could stand the blistering cold in #m211000000#, the coldest place in Ossyria, is because he has this item... in return for divulging the secret, #p2020003# asked me to get some food for him as he makes his way back to the headquarter.

#i4000088# #t4000088# #b#c4000088##k / 40 
#i2022001# #t2022001# #b#c2022001##k / 10 
#i2010000# #t2010000# #b#c2010000##k / 10 
#i2010002# #t2010002# #b#c2010002##k / 10
After giving #p2020003# the food, he showed me a cape that helped him withstand the coldest of cold. Apparently the person that gave him the cape is a man who's over #b300 years old#k...

string.name: name
string.value: Huge Creature of the Snowfield

string.name: parent
string.value: Snowfield Giant
#p2020006# from #m211000000# was attacked by a huge yeti in the snowfield a while ago. Let's go and hear about this attack from #p2020006#.

#p2020006# says that he was attacked by a huge yeti while skiing in the snowy mountains of El Nath. What could have attacked #p2020006#? #b#p2020007##k knows a lot about snowfield creatures. Let's go and ask about them.
Asked #p2020007# about the creature that attacked #p2020006#. #p2020007# seems to know something about the creature.

string.name: name
string.value: Snowman Legend

string.name: parent
string.value: Snowfield Giant
#p2020007# tells me the story of the Snowman. According to #p2020007#'s story, the creature is quite gentle. What could have made it attack #p2020006#? Let's go back to #b#p2020006##k.

Told #p2020006# about #p2020007#'s story of the #o8220001#. #p2020006# says it can't be true, because #o8220001# attacked him first and got mad over the entire thing. Strange that his story is different from what I heard from #p2020007#. Who speaks the truth? Or perhaps there's another story behind this? Let's get back to #p2020007#.

string.name: name
string.value: Snowman's Rage

string.name: parent
string.value: Snowfield Giant

Told Scadur of what I learned from Jade. His face looks grim. He thinks something must have happened to the Snowman, and asks me to investigate the area where it appears. Could the truth be found around #b#m211040101##k?\n\nFound a clue. #b#u3108##k
Found a strange item near the town. It looks like a broken piece of something. It looks like ice.

string.name: name
string.value: Snowman's Rage-Found a clue
What kind of clue is Scadur looking for? Let's investigate around the #bValley of Snowmen#k.
Found a strange statue made of ice. It's hard to tell what it looks like, because half of it has been broken into pieces. It might be the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture.
Found the Spirit of Snow Sculpture deep in the snowfield. Maybe this is the clue Scadur is looking for? This statue might have something to do with the Snowman. Let's go back to Scadur.

string.name: name
string.value: Holding Back the Snowman

string.name: parent
string.value: Snowfield Giant

Scadur says the Snowman is angry because the Spirit of the Sculpture is damaged, and adds that we need to restore it. However, restoring the sculpture will take some time, and somebody needs to hold the Snowman back from attacking anyone else.\n\n#o8220001# #r#a31091##k
Blocked the Snowman and came back to Scadur. He says Alcaster has completed his preparations to restore the sculpture and tells me to go see him.

string.name: name
string.value: Restoring the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture

string.name: parent
string.value: Snowfield Giant

Alcaster says he has everything set to restore the sculpture, and gives me an Ice Crystal. He says that a magic spell is cast onto this crystal, and will help restore the sculpture.\n\n#i4031791##t4031791# #b#c4031791#/1
The snowman seems to have returned to its gentle self as soon as the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture was restored. No worries about the Snowman attacking anyone else, right?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliza's Rage

string.name: parent
string.value: Goddess's Pet
#bSpiruna#k, an old woman living somewhere in #bOrbis#k, looks into the crystal ball and sees a dreadful truth. Let's go to #bSpiruna#k.

She says that the #bAncient Creature#k has awakened from its eternal sleep. This creature was the pet of the goddess, and its name is #bEliza#k. #bEliza#k was once known as a very gentle creature, but for some reason it has become ferocious. #bSpiruna#k says that #bEliza#k started to rampage about when the goddess was kidnapped by Pixies, and asks to defeat the Pixies roaming Cloud Park in order to calm #bEliza#k's rage.

#o3230200# #r#a31111##k
#o4230106# #r#a31112##k
#o5120000# #r#a31113##k
Came back after defeating all the Pixies. Has Eliza's rage softened somewhat?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliza's Garden

string.name: parent
string.value: Goddess's Pet
Spiruna says that Eliza has calmed down enough, so #btalk with Eliza#k. Eliza can be found in #bEliza's Garden#k behind a fallen pillar at the Stairway to the Sky II.
Met #bEliza#k sitting gracefully inside Eliza's Garden. #bEliza#k showed no traces of anger, instead looking calm.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliza's Eternal Sleep

string.name: parent
string.value: Goddess's Pet
#bEliza#k plans to sleep again until her goddess is released from Papa Pixie. She asks me to play an #binstrument#k to help her go to sleep. To play a goddess' harp... this won't be easy.
Glanced over at #bEliza#k as I finished playing the instrument, and noticed that she is already asleep. Sweet dreams.

string.name: name
string.value: A Strange Development
#b#p2012012##k of #b#m200000000##k told me she saw something strange. What could it be? I better go see #p2012012# right now.

#p2012012# told me she saw a fish that resembled a huge chunk of metal crossing the water, and wanted me to find out exactly what that creature is. It was heading towards #b#m100030000##k, so I better go there right now.

There's a huge wooden entryway leading into #m100030000# which I'd never seen before. It almost looks like an entryway to a fortress... I should try talking to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of me. I remember him telling me that a #bpirate #p1072008##k fort is being built here. But for what purpose?

string.name: name
string.value: Shammos's Awakening
#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\nContent: It's a message from Shammos in El Nath. He seems to be in need of help...
Go see Shammos, who's in the basement of the Chief's Residence in El Nath.
What could Shammos want from you?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 14,050 Can proceed to the 'Remnants of Memory' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Remnants of Memory

#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\rType: Prerequisite Quest\r\nContent: What is the truth about Shammos? Why is he trapped in a place like this? You may be able to discover the truth if you help him regain his memory.
To help Shammos regain his memory, bring #bShammos's Diary Pages 5, 6, 7, 8, and 9#k to him. You can obtain them from the #bHectors#k and #bWhite Fangs#k in El Nath.
You recovered the diary for Shammos so that he could regain his memory.

string.name: name
string.value: Shammos's Regained Memory
#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\n Content: #bShammos#k has called you again. Could he have regained his lost memory?
Go see Shammos, who's in the basement of the Chief's Residence in El Nath.
Shammos seems to have something he wants to say to you...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 28,100 Can proceed to the 'Hoblin King' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Hoblin King
#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\n Content: Shammos seems to have something important to say to you...
Ask one of the 3rd Job Instructors at the Chief's Residence about Rex the Hoblin King.
#bTylus#k has confirmed the existence of Rex. You may be able to find out more from #bRobeira#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 14,050 Can proceed to the 'Recollection' quest
#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\n Content: Go to Robeira and report what you've heard from Shammos.
Tell #bShammos#k about how the Hoblin King was sealed up by the 3rd Job Instructors.
Shammos seems to be at peace now.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 14,050 Can proceed to the 'Ominous Sign' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Confirming the Seal
#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\n Content: Go to Robeira and find out the location where Rex, the Hoblin King, is sealed.

As #bRobeira#k instructed you, go confirm the seal. If you cannot find the Ice Gorge, forfeit the quest and talk to Robeira again.
Examine the location where Rex the Hoblin King is sealed and return to #bShammos#k.
You confirmed with your own eyes that Rex the Hoblin King is sealed up and told so to Shammos. He seems to have calmed down now.

string.name: name
string.value: Sign of the Resurrection
#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\n Content: Could Shammos's worries have come true?
You got a message from El Nath stating that something strange is going on with the Hoblins. Go to Shammos and find out what's going on.
Shammos says that the resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King is imminent.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 14,050 Can proceed to the 'Robeira's Proposal' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Robeira's Proposal
#b Category: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Prerequisite Quest\r\n Content: The resurrection of the Hoblin King is at hand...
Go to #bRobeira#k and deliver Shammos's message.
#bRobeira#k has proposed that you reseal the Hoblin King.

string.name: name
string.value: Evidence of the Seal
#b Category: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Optional Quest\r\n
If you've sealed up Rex the Hoblin King and obtained the #b#t4000584##k, the source of his power, take it to #bRobeira#k.
You prevented the resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King.

string.name: name
string.value: Supplying Leather Clothes

#b Category: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Optional Quest\r\n Content: #bPedro#k says that he has something to ask of you before you leave to prevent the resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King.
Bring #bPedro#k #b10 #t4000580:#s#k.
You brought #bPedro#k #b10 #t4000580:#s#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Hoblin Weapon

#bCategory: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Optional Quest\r\n Content: #bTylus#k says that he has something to ask of you before you leave to prevent the resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King.
Obtain #b1 #t4032648:##k, used by the Ferocious Hoblins, and bring it to #bTylus#k.
You obtained #b1 #t4032648:##k and brought it to #bTylus#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret to Improving Concentration

#b Category: Resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King - Escort, Party Quest#k\r Type: Optional Quest\r\n Content: #bRene#k has something to ask of you before you leave to prevent the resurrection of Rex the Hoblin King.
Take #b10 #t4000581:#s#k, used by the Elite Green Hoblin, to #bRene#k.
You took #b10 #t4000581:#s#k, used by the Elite Green Hoblin, to #bRene#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning up Eos Tower
I should go see Marcel, who's in charge of the security for Eos Tower of Ludibrium.
Marcel of Ludibrium asked me if I could take care of huge, nasty #bRatz#k, 50 of them to be exact.\n\n#o3110102# #r#a32001#
I took care of the #bRatz#k just like the way Marcel of Ludibrium asked me to do, but I'm sure there are still quite a number of nasty monsters at Eos Tower.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up the Inner Parts of Eos Tower
I should go see Marcel now...

Marcel asked me to take care of #b40 #o2230103#s#k and #b40 #o3210205#s#k living in Eos Tower.

#o2230103# #r#a32011##k
#o3210205# #r#a32012#
I took care of the #b50 #o2230103#s#k and #b50 #o3210205#s#k, just the way Marcel wanted, but it seems like there's more outside...

string.name: name
string.value: Eos Tower Threatened!
I should go see Marcel at Ludibrium.

Marcel of Ludibrium asked me to take care of #b20 Block Golems#k and #b12 King Block Golems#k that seem prevalent around Eos Tower.

#o4230110# #r#a32031##k
#o4230109# #r#a32032#
I took care of the #bBlock Golems#k and #bKing Block Golems#k that Marcel of Ludibrium asked me to do.

string.name: name
string.value: Peace at Eos Tower
I should go see Marcel, who should be in Ludibrium.

Marcel of Ludibrium asked for one last favor, this time, for me to take down the ultimate monster in Eos Tower, the leader of the monsters inside, #b#o4130103##k. It is found every once in a while in the middle of Eos Tower, at a secret passage.\n\n#o4130103# #r#a32041#
I took out the leader of all Block Golems, Rombot, just the way Marcel of Ludibrium asked me to do. Hopefully this will bring peace to Eos Tower.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Guard
A lost guard is found somewhere around Eos Tower...

You find #p2040023# on the 94th Floor of Eos Tower. He says he needs to get to the 59th Floor to go back to work, but is too scared to go with all the monsters around. He wants you to gather #b15 Worn-Out Goggles and 15 Spiderwebs#k. Will you help him?

#i4000123# #t4000123# #b#c4000123##k/15
#i4000097##t4000097# #b#c4000097##k/15

I ran back to the lost guard at the 93rd floor of Eos Tower and gave him the proof of eliminating the monsters in the vicinity of where we were. In return, I was able to get the Scroll of Eos Rock, which activates the Eos Rock located in a number of places at the Tower. By activating the rock, it'll enable us to teleport to the next Eos Rock. And since he needs to get down to 59th floor, I'm sure there's more mess to come...

string.name: name
string.value: Nemi's Lunchbox Delivery
I should go see Nemi, who's in Ludibrium...

Nemi of Ludibrium gave me a lunchbox and asked me if I could make a special delivery to her dad, #b#p2040015##k. Apparently, he forgot to bring his lunchbox to work today. She said her dad should be somewhere around the #bToy Factory#k.
I met #b#p2040015##k, who was at the toy factory, and gave him the lunchbox Nemi packed for him, but it looks like he wants to ask me for something...

string.name: name
string.value: Nemi's First Ingredient
I should go see Nemi, who's in Ludibrium...

I met up with Nemi again at a small house in Ludibrium. She was preparing dinner for her dad, who should be home from work soon, and she wanted to make him a nice bowl of soup. She asked me if I could get her #b10 slices of #t4031129##k by taking out the #bRatz#k in Eos Tower. \n\n#t4031129# #b#c4031129##k/10
I got Nemi the #b10 slices of #t4031129##k that she wanted. I wonder what kind of soup she's making for her dad...

string.name: name
string.value: Nemi's Second Ingredient
I should go see Nemi, who's in Ludibrium...

You meet Nemi again in the small house in Ludibrium. She thinks the #bRatz#k stole eggs she prepared for her father's lunch. Nemi wants you to retrieve her eggs and teach those Ratz a lesson. \n\n#i4032734##t4032734# #b#c4032734##k/30
You collected all the #bLost Eggs#k that Nemi requested. You wonder what sort of delicious lunch she will make for her father with the eggs...

string.name: name
string.value: Nemi's Dilemma
I should go see Nemi, who's in Ludibrium...

I met up with Nemi again at a small house in Ludibrium. Lately she had been experiencing some weird things where the food had been disappearing right after being made, and was suspecting that the rats might have done it. That's why there's a toy mouse called Ratz, which is a toy mouse with rat traps, but instead of catching rats, they became alive as monsters. At Nemi's request, I'll have to take out Ratz and collect #b45 Rat traps#k, and give them back to her.\n\n#t4000095# #b#c4000095##k/45
I collected all the rat traps that Nemi needed in Ludibrium. I can't believe the amount of rat traps she made, judging from the fact that every single Ratz in Eos Tower is her creation.

string.name: name
string.value: Just Another Day at Work

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I should go see #b#p2040015##k, who should be somewhere around the Toy Factory

#bManager Karl#k, who's at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, wanted me to check up on his 10 Roly-Poly workers by taking pictures with them. The 10 have to be in the order... I should go see Eos Tower.
I found Roly-Poly 1 at the 99th floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work

#b#p2040015##k, who's at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, wanted me to check up on his 10 roly-poly's by taking pictures with them. The 10 have to be in the order... I should go to Eos Tower.
I found Roly-Poly 2 at the 96th floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that Karl gave me.

string.value: Roly-Poly 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 2 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that Karl gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 3 at the 93rd floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.value: Roly-Poly 3

string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 3 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 4 at the 85th floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

I found Roly-Poly 5 at the 67th floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
