string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 5 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 6 at the 34th floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 6

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 6 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 7 at the 33rd floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 7

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 7 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 8 at the 32nd floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 8

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 8 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 9 at the 4th floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 9

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found Roly-Poly 9 working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I found Roly-Poly 10 at the 2nd floor of Eos Tower working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.

string.name: name
string.value: The Drumming Bunny
I should go see Roly-Poly Worker 5 at Eos Tower

I met up with Roly-Poly Worker 5 again at Eos Tower. He was complaining about the Drumming Bunnies that seem to be bothering him at the 65th floor, and requested that I collect #b100 Toy Drums#k for him. If I get this for him, then there may be more work in store...\n\n#t4000127# #b#c4000127##k/100

Just the way the Roly-Poly Worker 5 asked, I took out the drumming bunnies and collected the toy drums. He said his work got easier when I'm around, and he wants me to help him out on some other stuff. Maybe I should chill here and help these guys out for a change.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Drumming Bunny
I should go see Roly-Poly Worker 5 at Eos Tower

When you meet #p2040008# again at Eos Tower, he thanks you for helping him last time. Then, he mentions that, although you probably already heard it from General Maestro, the force of darkness must be taken from them to return things to normal. He wants you to eliminate the Drumming Bunnies on the 65th Floor of Eos Tower and collect #b500 Toy Drums#k for him.\n\n#i4000127##t4000127# #b#c4000127##k/500

Just the way the Roly-Poly Worker 5 asked, I took out the drumming bunnies and collected the toy drums. I think this really took out the wild bunnies as well as taking away the force of darkness. Here's hoping that those bunnies turn back to the old, adorable bunnies they used to be.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 6's Tool
I should go check out Roly-Poly 6 at Eos Tower
I met up with Roly-Poly 6 at Eos Tower. He wanted me to find a tool that he lost right where a ton of monsters are. I have a feeling #bBloctopus#k might have taken it...
I found the lost tool for Roly-Poly 6. I'm hoping this will allow him to fix things at Eos Tower now.

string.name: name
string.value: Fixing Eos Tower
I should go check out Roly-Poly 10 at Eos Tower.

I met up with Roly-Poly 10 again at Eos Tower. He asked if I could get him #b30 Yellow Toy Blocks#k and #b15 Blue Toy Blocks#k to fix the tower. I think I can get those by taking out the Block Golems...

#t4000101# #b#c4000101##k/30
#t4000102# #b#c4000102##k/15
I gave Roly-Poly 10 the yellow blocks and blue blocks needed to fix this place up. A toy block used to fix a castle...where else can this happen but here in Ludibrium?

string.name: name
string.value: The Man in the Black Suit

string.name: parent
string.value: Korin's Memory

I met #bAgent Marco#k at the Omega Sector. I asked him some questions regarding Korin, and I was able to find out that she had been kidnapped by a group of aliens that invaded the Omega Sector. He also said that in order to recover Korin's lost memories, I'll have to defeat the #bMateons#k and collect #b5 Memory Pieces#k that contain her lost memories... I'll have to head over to the Boswell Field quickly.\n\n#t4031090# #b#c4031090##k/5
I defeated the aliens that took Korin's memories, gathered up the memory pieces, and gave them to Agent Marco. He then put the pieces together and made it into one whole piece.

string.name: name
string.value: The Recovered Memory

string.name: parent
string.value: Korin's Memory

After defeating a bunch of #bMateons#k at the Boswell Field, I went through their stuff and found 5 #bMemory Pieces#k that contained Korin's lost memories. I gave them to Agent Marco, and he proceeded to put the 5 together into one whole piece of #bKorin's Memory#k. Now all I have left to do is give this piece of memory back to Korin.

I gave Korin her lost memories through the man in Omega Sector wearing black suits, #bAgent Marco#k. She was initially disoriented after recovering her memories, but she promised to fully enjoy life the way she used to before the kidnapping. Hopefully that'll never happen again.

string.name: name
string.value: Toy Soldier's Walnut
I should go see Delv the Toy Soldier, who's at Eos Tower.

Delv the Toy Soldier, firmly protecting the gates of the 100th floor on Eos Tower, asked me for a favor by getting him #b20 Tasty Walnuts#k as a way to fight the boredom of guarding the gate and doing little else. He said a black rat monster called #bBlack Ratz#k might offer up the walnuts...\n\n#t4031093# #b#c4031093##k/20

I got Delv the Toy Soldier, firmly protecting the gates of the 100th floor on Eos Tower, the #b20 tasty walnuts#k he requested as a way to fight the boredom of guarding the gate and doing little else. He was very thankful and asked if I could go talk to his buddy Olson next to him if I have some free time to burn.
I should go see Olson the Toy Soldier, who's at Eos Tower

I ran into Olson the Toy Soldier at the 100th floor on Eos Tower, doing his job as the security guard next to Delv. Olson told me a story of a monster sneaking in through the cracks of time and stealing a pendulum from the clocktower, culminating with the monster disguising itself as a dollhouse somewhere inside. I need to locate the one that's different from the sea of dollhouses in here.

Inside the secret room of Eos Tower, I located the monster disguised as a dollhouse, destroyed it, recovered the pendulum, and gave it to Mark the Toy Soldier. This should get the Ludibrium Clocktower to start working again.

string.name: name
string.value: The Broken Clocktower

string.name: parent
string.value: A Delivery to a Lost Time
I should go see Olson the Toy Soldier, who's at Eos Tower

Olson the Toy Soldier from the 100th floor of Eos Tower wanted me to get the #b#t4031094##k obtained from the monster disguised as the dollhouse to #p2040029# at the Lost Time somewhere inside the Clocktower. Apparently the #p2040029# should be able to fix him.
I found Grandpa Clock standing around somewhere in the lost time, but he looks very lethargic, as if he's about to stop.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the #t4031094#

string.name: parent
string.value: A Delivery to a Lost Time

At the Lost Time in the Ludibrium Clocktower, I gave #p2040029# the #b#t4031098##k from Tick-Tock's. I'm glad I got to give this to him before too late. Now I should wait to hear a word from #bOlson#k.

At the Lost Time in the Ludibrium Clocktower, I gave #p2040029# the #b#t4031094##k, an essential part of the clocktower. Now all I have to do is wait for the #p2040029# to fix the clocktower. Will this work?

string.name: name
string.value: The Clocktower Headache
I should check on #p2040029#, who is working hard at the Lost Time.

You meet Grandpa Clock deep in the Lost Time of Ludibrium. He's annoyed by the tiny Ticks that have been going inside the clocktower and destroying parts of it. They make his job much harder than it should be. You must eliminate 80 #bTicks#k for Grandpa Clock.\n\n#o3210207# #r#a32341#

I took care of the request #p2040029# made, by taking out the #bTicks#k. The Ticks were another one of the reasons the clocktower seemed to have something wrong at all times, so this should give #p2040029# a good night's sleep.

string.name: name
string.value: The Clock Workers' Batteries
I should check on #p2040029#, who is working hard at the Lost Time.

Deep inside an abandoned time in Ludibrium, #p2040029# takes things slow and easy. admits he's an old fella and needs his spring periodically rewound, unlike the younger battery-operated clocks. Problem is, there aren't enough batteries to operate all the young clocks! Be a good chap and collect #b200 cheap batteries#k for the clocks that need them, hm? \n\n#t4000111# #b#c4000111##k/200

I got the cheap batteries needed for the new battery-operated worker clocks. #p2040029# seemed ecstatic over the prospect of those workers finally showing life and lessening his work burden in the process. Anyway, what exactly are they doing in there...?

string.name: name
string.value: Assembling a Toy
I should go see #p2041018# at Toy Factory.

I ran into #bHans#k, the toy assembler at the Toy Factory in Ludibrium. He made a proposal where if I get him some parts for a toy, then he'll assemble it and make something fun out of it. This is sweet! The things I'll need are #b20 cheap batteries from the Robo, 20 metal hearts of Master Robo, and 30 cogs of Chronos#k. 

#t4000111# #b#c4000111##k/20
#t4000112# #b#c4000112##k/20
#t4000115# #b#c4000115##k/30

At the toy factory in Ludibrium, I gave Hans the parts needed to assemble a toy. Hans put together the parts and made a very unique sack out of it. He said he put some toys inside, but... I don't know, something may pop up that'll scare the daylight out of me. I better be careful with it...

string.name: name
string.value: Rocky's Parts
I better go talk to #p2041019#

I met up with #p2041019# at the Toy Factory in Ludibrium Clocktower. Rocky seemed to be swamped with work due to a sudden increase in monsters destroying parts here and there. He was worried about running out of essential parts, so he asked me if I could gather up #b50 cogs#k and #b30 screws#k. .

#t4003000# #b#c4003000##k/30
#t4000115# #b#c4000115##k/50
At the Toy Factory in Ludibrium, I gave Rocky the cogs and screws needed for him to fix anything that is broken. Hopefully that was enough to undo the damages done by those pesky monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Mac the Mechanic's Maintenance Manual
I'll need to have a word with Mac the Mechanic.

I met up with Mac the Mechanic at the Toy Factory in Ludibrium. Mac was panicking because of the fact that all the blueprints and #bMaintenance Manual#k of the factory were stolen by Toy Trojan. If I destroy the boxes around the Toy Factory, I may find a hidden path that'll lead me to a clue.
I found the documents Mac the Mechanic lost, and he seemed very much relieved by it. Something's strange, though. Why would the toy soldiers feel the need to steal this in the first place...?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up Helios Tower
Helios Tower opened recently for public, and apparently #p2041004# has been going through some trouble thanks to the growing number of #o3210208#s at the tower.

#p2041004#, the security guard of Ludibrium, approached me and asked for a favor. He was concerned about the growing number of #b#o3210208##k at the Helios Tower, which has recently opened for travelers. According to him, the #o3210208#s have been blocking the travelers' path, as well as destroying the elevators in the tower, and he wanted me to eliminate some #o3210208#s for him.\n\n#o3210208# #r#a32411#
With a request from #p2041004#, the security guard of Ludibrium, I went into Helios Tower and eliminated 20 #o3210208#s, the striped rats that have been destroying the elevators at the tower.

string.name: name
string.value: The Messenger of the Toy Palace 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Toy Palace

At the suggestion from #p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, I headed to #m240000000# as the messenger of #m220000000#. #p2041004# graciously provided me with #tLeafre Guidebook# as well as a flight ticket provided by #m220000000#. What's the item I'm supposed to give him, though?

I received a request from #p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, to head to a place called #m240000000# as the messenger of #m220000000#. #m240000000# is a town entrenched in Minar Forest somewhere in Ossyria, and I was told to deliver an item from #m2200000000# to the chief of the town, Tatamo. I better give that item from #p2041004# to #p2081000# of #m240000000#.\n\n#t4031347# #b#c4031347##k / 1

I managed to deliver a present from #m220000000# to the chief of Leafre, Tatamo, as their messenger. As a sign of gratitude, Tatamo gave me a magic seed that allows me to transport between Ellinia and Leafre.

string.name: name
string.value: Spider's Out at Eos Tower
The King's #b#p2041022##k is in need of help. What must it be? I better head over to #b#m220000400##k.

#p2041022# received an order to deliver the king's royal letter to #m221000000#. The problem is, he's hesitant to go, because to go to #m221000000#, he'll have to go through Eos Tower, and is afraid of descending down the Tower because of the spiders. Oh well, I'll have to kill off #r20 #o2230103#s#k #r20 #o2230104#s#k for #p2041022#. 

#o2230103# #r#a32451##k 
#o2230104# #r#a32452##k
I was able to eliminate #o2230103# and #o2230104#. I'm sure now #p2041022# can do his job. I thought #p2041022# was unafraid of anything else in life besides the King. Spiders? That was unexpected...

string.name: name
string.value: A Mysterious Letter
#b#p2041004##k of #b#m220000000##k is concerned about a mysterious letter... what could it be?

#p2041004# said he's been concerned about a mysterious, anonymous letter sent to the king of #m220000000#, and believes something huge is developing. He then asked me to head over to #b#m100030000##k and find out who wrote the letter...

There's a huge wooden entryway leading into #m100030000# which I'd never seen before. It almost looks like an entryway to a fortress... I should try talking to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of me. I remember him telling me that a #bpirate #p1072008##k fort is being built here. I wonder who the captain is...

string.name: name
string.value: Rightful Donation Culture
I should go to #b#m220000000##k and listen in on #b#p2041022##k's problem.

#b#m220000000##k #b#p2041022##k's problem was more difficult than I imagined. It's hard enough finding a #b#t04021005##k, but to freely donate it to the king of #b#m220000000##k!? But if it's true that every great adventurer must learn to generously donate, maybe I need to consider donating as well. 
Plus, according to #b#p2041022##k, the king is a very generous person so it will probably be used to help those in need... This is stressful.

I don't know if I made the right decision, but I gave away #b#t04021005##k to #b#p2041022##k. I feel like I've somewhat wasted it but I guess it does feel good to know that I've helped someone in need. Overall, it was a good experience.

string.name: name
string.value: Operation Strategy 2 : Defeat the Monsters

string.name: parent
string.value: The Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation

Operation strategy 2 is much simpler than strategy 1. It was to defeat the monsters! You must defeat #r#o4230113##k, #r#o3230306##k, #r#o4230114##k, #r#o4230115##k, and even #r#o5220003##k, so it's not child's play... but let's defeat the monsters.

#o4230113# #r#a32491##k 
#o3230306# #r#a32492##k 
#o4230114# #r#a32493##k 
#o4230115# #r#a32494##k 
#o5220003# #r#a32495##k
You have reported to #p2041026# after defeating all the monsters. It's not as easy as it may seem since there are so many types of monsters to hunt!

string.name: name
string.value: Operation Strategy 3: A Cute Baby Bird

string.name: parent
string.value: The Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation

#p2041026# seems to be preoccupied with raising birds. According to the new research conducted, #o5220003#s have undergone changes under the management of Papulatus, but can make great pets when tamed. He has given you a cute baby bird, saying you can feed the bird #b#t4031992#s#k that can be obtained from the Clocktower Monsters. He has asked you to return the bird when it's fully grown.

The baby bird has become full-fledged since you've been diligently feeding the bird #t4031992#s. Although it's sad to let go of the bird to which you have grown attached, but you have no choice but to return the bird to Ghosthunter Bob. Be well, bird.

string.name: name
string.value: A Deal with the Broker

There's a new, unknown and mysterious town called #m261000000#. It's an alchemist town, which explains the mysterious aura around it... I better go see #b#p2111007##k to gain some information on #m261000000#.

When I asked #p2111007# about #m261000000#, he requested #b10,000 mesos#k for information, as if it's an accepted practice. Is he really a broker...? Come to think of it, #p2111007#'s reputation isn't that great either...what do I have to lose?

After giving #p2111007# 10,000 mesos, I was able to obtain some information on #m261000000#. A long time ago, after the death of the Black Magician, the alchemists came together and set up a town called #m261000000#. Nowadays, the town is split into #b2 societies, Zenumist and Alcadno. They seem to be in constant conflict with one another.#k

string.name: name
string.value: Test from the Head of Zenumist Society

string.name: parent
string.value: Joining Zenumist

Bourne of a true union of science and magic... #bZenumist, is a society of pure alchemy#k. With the conflict raging in #m261000000#, however, Zenumist doesn't seem to accept outsiders. I really want to join them, though... I better go see #b#p2111007##k.

#p2111007# told me in order to join Zenumist, I'll have to run the rigorous test of showing my lab results to the president of the Zenumist Society. But he also said if I can get him #b2 ores of jewels, regardless of type#k, then he'd take care of the rest...
After giving #p2111007# 2 ores, he told me to wait. I hope I get in!

string.name: name
string.value: Zenumist Cape

string.name: parent
string.value: Joining Zenumist

After visiting the Broker once more, he gave me a bottle that contained some strange-looking water. He then told me to take it to #bZenumist Society#k, and place it next to the blue alchemy pillar, which will automatically create the item for me. He then told me to give it to #b#p2111000##k... is the broker really telling the truth? Seems impossible...

When I left #t4031705# next to the alchemy pillar, I heard a deafening explosion, followed by the creation of a useless tree branch. I had no idea what that was, but I gave it to #p2111000#. He seemed VERY satisfied with the result, and gave me #b#t1102135##k in return. Why would he want a tree branch?

string.name: name
string.value: Test from the Head of Alcadno Society

string.name: parent
string.value: Joining Alcadno

A true union of alchemy and mechanical engineering, #bAlcadno, is a society that celebrates new alchemy#k. With the conflict raging in #m261000000#, however, Alcadno doesn't seem to accept others. I really want to join Alcadno, though... I better go talk to #b#p2111007##k.

#p2111007# told me in order to join the Alcadno Society, I'll have to compile a series of lab reports and present it. He said he could obtain a legitimate report if I pay him #b2 ores, regardless of type#k. He'd then take care of the rest...
After giving #p2111007# 2 ores of jewels, he told me to wait.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcadno Cape

string.name: parent
string.value: Joining Alcadno

I received #t4031704# from the broker. I was told to give it to #p2111001# and answer the questions in the order that the broker told me in order to become a member of Alcadno... I better remember the sequences that #p2111007# gave me when I go see #p2111001#.

After a number of tough, tough questions, #p2111001# finally accepted me as a member of Alcadno. Flashing his trademark glass eye as he gave me #t1102136#, the head of the Alcadno Society may look intimidating, but he's a really nice person.

string.name: name
string.value: Re-acquiring Zenumist Cape
I lost #t1102135#. Without it, I can't prove that I'm Zenumist. What should I do? I better go talk to the president of the Zenumist Society, #b#p2111000##k.

#p2111000# gave me that look of disappointment as he asked me to bring the items required to make another #t1102135#. Those items are #b#t4000021##k and #b#t4021003##k, with #b10,000 mesos#k. Thank goodness I can make another one. 

#i4000021##t4000021# #b#c4000021##k/10 
#i4021003##t4021003# #b#c4021003##k/5
I got #t1102135# again. Without it, I can't be accepted as a Zenumist. I better not lose it again.

string.name: name
string.value: Re-acquiring Alcadno Cape
Oh no...! I lost #t1102136#, the one item that proves that I'm a member of Alcadno. What should I do? I better go talk to the president of the Alcadno Society, #p2111001#.

#p2111001# told me he could give me another cape, but this time, I'll have to come up with all the items required to make the cape. As long as I can get another one, gathering the items is not a problem! Those items are #b#t4000021##k and #b#t4021006##k, with #b10,000 mesos#k.

#i4000021##t4000021# #b#c4000021##k/10 
#i4021006##t4021006# #b#c4021006##k/5
I got Alcadno Cape again. Without it, I can't be accepted as an Alcadno. I better not lose it again.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Out Bedin
#b#p2111008##k, an alchemist from Zenumist, seems to be looking for help with his experiment...

#p2111008# told me he was short on some items for his experiment and asked me to get #b5 refined #t4010004#s#k and #b50 #t4000352#s#k for him.

#i4010004##t4010004# #b#c4010004##k/5 
#i4000352##t4000352# #b#c4000352##k/50
I gave #p2111008# #t4011004# and #t4000352#. This #t4011004# seems to have a peculiar power of registering spells into it. I learned something new today.

string.name: parent
string.value: Zenumist and the Missing Alchemist
#p2111000# asked me to search Dr. De Lang's house, and if I find any information inside, I have to report it to him. I better head off to the missing alchemist's house.

There were some writings found at the missing alchemist's house, but nothing seems significant. It did mention a pendant multiple times, though... a pendant? What does that have to do with his studies?

string.name: name
string.value: Russellon's Items for Experiment
#p2111009#, the alchemist for Alcadno, seems to be in need of something for his experiment. I better go visit #b#p2111009##k.

#p2111009#, an alchemist who works on fighting diseases, asked me to get #b#t4031694##k for him, a crucial ingredient for his medicine. #t4031694# can be found through #o3110302#, and I better take note of the advice that getting it from #o3110303# is much easier than through #o3110302#.\n\n#i4031694##t4031694# #b#c4031694##k/10
Once I gave him all the #t4031694#s, #p2111009# seemed ecstatic and started working on his experiment. ...What kind of a medicine would that be?

string.name: name
string.value: Maed's Experiment

string.name: parent
string.value: Alcadno and the Missing Alchemist

The missing alchemist from Alcadno who caused that terrible explosion... He must have done some significant research and experiments. The only person that is still aware of his work seems to be the president of Alcadno, #bMaed#k...
#p2111001#, the head of Alcadno Society, told me if I wanted to know more about the missing alchemist, then I'll have to prove him my worth by destroying #r#o7110301##k.\n\n#o7110301# #r#a33151##k
As ordered by #p2111001#, I was able to destroy all the #o7110301#s. Now, maybe he'll share a secret or two about the missing alchemist...

string.name: name
string.value: Han the Broker's Info

string.name: parent
string.value: Alcadno and the Missing Alchemist

We need someone that can reveal the truth, said #p2111001#. He then proceeded to tell me a story about #p2111002#. According to him, #p2111002# was in close contact with #p2111007# before he turned up missing, which means I'll have to go see #b#p2111007##k. In order to talk to Han the Broker, I'll have to come up with some mesos...
#p2111007# seems to know something about #p2111002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Parwen's Lab
There's a ghost at #b#m261000000##k! A lab ghost, #b#p2111006##k! Apparently, even a ghost like him needs help...

#p2111006# told me he couldn't stand being next to #r#o6110301##k, and wanted me to slay some #o6110301# for him. He freaks me out even more! But since a request is a request, I'll have to slay them first. \n\n#o6110301# #r#a33191##k
#p2111006# told me as recent as a while ago, some alchemist entered this place and worked hard at his research, and yet he hasn't shown up since the explosion.

string.name: name
string.value: What Parwen Knows

string.name: parent
string.value: Parwen's Memory
Maybe the alchemist #p2111006# saw is #r#p2111002##k, the missing alchemist! I better go see #b#p2111006##k.

#p2111006# tilted his head a bit as if he was having a headache, and frowned. Next thing you know, I was spotted at a different place. This may seem familiar, but this place also seems a bit strange. Where is this? And who's that #rguy#k?
Oh my gosh! The person that's standing in the lab is indeed #p2111002#! #p2111006#...! Wait, so this place is really #b#p2111002#'s lab#k?

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. De Lang, the Missing Alchemist

string.name: parent
string.value: Parwen's Memory

With a sad, yet calm look on his face, #p2111002# did not look like someone that would scare off other people by conducting terrible experiments. Observing the words he candidly spoke, I realized that his wife was #b#p2111004##k! He said he wanted to give Phyllia a #bSilver Pendant#k... \n\n ...A Silver Pendant? Come to think of it, didn't #p2040050# say something like the key to #p2111002#'s secret note is made out of silver? I can't believe that pendant has been lying around in #p2111002#'s house...
Thanks to #p2111006#'s amazing abilities, I was able to talk to #p2111002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Phyllia's Pendant

After combining all the information I got through Zenumist, Alcadno, and #p2111006#, I realized the person that knew the missing alchemist the most was his wife #b#p2111004##k. I better go look for her.

When I asked #p2111004# of #p2111002#, she seemed to be on the defensive. She couldn't believe I actually talked to #p2111002#. In order to make #p2111004# believe in me, I better provide solid evidence... maybe I should find the #bpendant#k that #p2111002# wanted to give her.

After seeing the pendant, #p2111004# finally accepted the fact that I met with #p2111002#. She seemed distrustful of both Zenumist and Alcadno. According to her, #p2111002#'s experiment touched a nerve with an important secret of #m261000000#, and the presidents of both societies had been more than eager to keep #p2111002#'s work and the accident quiet.

string.name: name
string.value: Phyllia's Concern

string.name: parent
string.value: The Fairy in Despair 1
At #b#m261000000##k, there's a fairy that seems to always wear a sad face, #b#p2111004##k. I wonder what really saddens her.

#p2111004# says although her daughter #p2111005# may seem exuberant and lively on the outside, she is very much concerned about her failing health. She wants to cure her declining health by acquiring medicine from #b#p2012018##k of #b#m200000000##k.
#p2012018# seems to know something about #p2111004#. Maybe he'll help #p2111004# out.

string.name: name
string.value: Ericsson's Ingredients

string.name: parent
string.value: The Fairy in Despair 1

Surprisingly, #p2012018# appears to be #p2111004#'s younger brother. You can't believe it! But, #p2012018#, with a serious look on his face, offers to help his sister as much as he can. He has asked you to find #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000060#s#k, so that they can make her medicine.\n#i4000060##t4000060# #b#c4000060##k/100
When I gathered up all the ingredients for #p2012018#, he asked me to wait for a bit.

string.name: name
string.value: A Sip of the Moon

string.name: parent
string.value: The Fairy in Despair 1

With a clouded look on his face, #p2012018# gave me a medicine called #t4031700# and a letter, asking me to deliver them to #b#p2111004##k. He seemed concerned that the medicine might not be enough to cure #p2111005#...
Despite receiving the medicine, #p2111004# still seemed very much concerned. #p2111005#'s illness might be a lot worse than I thought...

string.name: name
string.value: Keeny's Secret

string.name: parent
string.value: The Fairy in Despair 2
#p2111004# is a fairy who always wears a sad face. Is her daughter #p2111005# getting better now? I better go see #b#p2111004##k again.
#p2111004# told me #p2111005# still hasn't been fully cured, and asked me to go see #b#p2012018##k once more and get another medicine from him.
#p2012018# acted as if he knew I'd come back...why? Perhaps there is more to this than I realized...

string.name: name
string.value: Ericsson's Ingredients for Medicine 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Fairy in Despair 2

According to #p2012018#, #p2111005# isn't a full fairy, rather a mix of Fairy and Human. He says that's why fairy medicine won't be as effective on her. #p2012018# wants to use medicine that is even stronger and requests that you collect #b100 #t4000061#s#k. \n#i4000061##t4000061# #b#c4000061##k/100
Once I got him all the ingredients, #p2012018# told me to wait as he made a new batch of medicine.

string.name: name
string.value: A Sip of the Sun

string.name: parent
string.value: The Fairy in Despair 2

#p2012018# handed me #t4031699#, a more potent medicine for Fairies. Will this finally make Keeny healthy? #p2012018#'s face still seems quite sad, though... anyway, I better give this to #b#p2111004##k.

#p2111004# seemed worried that this medicine might not work, either, and longed for her missing husband. She said as an alchemist from Alcadno, she believed he would have found the cure for his daughter...

string.name: name
string.value: Keeny's Research on Roid
#b#m261000000##k's favorite little Fairy #b#p2111005##k. Her dream is to one day become an alchemist herself, and apparently, she has already started a new research...

#p2111005# was studying #o5110301#, the ones that the alchemists from Alcadno came up with. She said to thoroughly investigate #o5110301#, she'll need #t4000364#... I better get her #b80 #t4000364#k from #o5110301# for her, so she can continue her research. \n\n#i4000364##t4000364# #b#c4000364##k/80
I gave #p2111005# all the #t4000364#s she asked for. She broke out a wide grin while observing the complex-looking #t4000364#. She may be young, but she sure looks like an alchemist.

string.name: name
string.value: Keeny's Research on Neo Huroid!
#b#p2111005##k is the little Fairy who studies alchemy. She seems to be in need of help...

#p2111005#'s studies have now taken her ahead of #o5110301# and onto #o5110302#. #p2111005# said in order to thoroughly investigate #r#o5110302##k, she'll need #b#t4000365##k... \n\n#i4000365##t4000365# #b#c4000365##k/160

I gave #p2111005# all the #t4000365#s she asked for. She revealed that she learned alchemy from the Zenumist alchemists, but slowly found Alcadno's work fascinating, and is now conducting studies secret from the alchemists that have taught her.

string.name: name
string.value: Keeny's Research on D.Roid!!
#b#p2111005##k is the little Fairy who aspires to be an alchemist. Where will her studies and research take her next? I better check it out for myself!

#p2111005# told me she wanted to thoroughly check out the powerful #r#o7110300##k. I told her she must be really into alchemy, and #p2111005# said there's a reason for all this, and proceeded to ask me to get her #b1 #t4000362##k from #o7110300#. \n\n#i4000362##t4000362# #b#c4000362##k/1

#p2111005# told me the reason she had been studying so hard on these mechanical dolls is because of her friend #p2111003#. She wants to fulfill his wish to become a human being, and that's what's driving her into alchemy. Will #p2111005# be able to turn #p2111003# into a living, breathing human being?

string.name: name
string.value: Keeny's Pal Humanoid A

string.name: parent
string.value: A Present for Keeny

At #b#m261000000##k, there's this strange form of life that resides in town. Humanoid may be a machine on the outside, but he can also be classified as a human being... I better pay a visit to #b#p2111003##k.

#p2111003# did not remember anything from the past. He does not even remember who created him. He did tell me, however, that he has a friend and that's why he doesn't feel alone, and that friend is #p2111005#... a tight bond between Humanoid and a Fairy? That's interesting! He wanted to give #p2111005# a present, and asked me to get #b#t4000357##k and #b#t4000358##k for him, so he can make one for her. 

#i4000357##t4000357# #b#c4000357##k/100 
#i4000358##t4000358# #b#c4000358##k/100
I gave #p2111003# all the materials he asked for. He then told me to wait as he began making the present.

string.name: name
string.value: A Present for Keeny

string.name: parent
string.value: A Present for Keeny

#p2111003# made a present for #p2111005#. What, he's not human, but he can perform alchemy? \n\nAnyway, #p2111003# made #t4031693#. I didn't think the present seemed girly enough, but in the world of alchemy, this might be the norm... I better give this to #b#p2111005##k right now.
#p2111005# was very ecstatic to receive this gift. She must be really close with #p2111003#.

string.name: name
string.value: Humanoid A

string.name: parent
string.value: Humanoid Just Wants to be Human
#p2111003# is the one being that cannot be fully categorized as either a robot, or a human. He apparently has something he desires more than anything else. I better go see #p2111003#.
Once I got him all the materials, #p2111003# gave me a sincere thanks for the work. He seemed so happy... but why does he want to give Phyllia a present? Does he love her...?

string.name: name
string.value: A Rose from the Snowfield

string.name: parent
string.value: Humanoid Just Wants to be Human

#p2111003# said that the flowers on #t4031695# should be blooming, but it can't be removed unless with a warm hand of a human, and asked me if I could take one #t4031695# for him and give it to #b#p2111004##k as a gift. He said all this with a sad look on face... 

To make #t4031695# bloom, I'll need #t4000361#, so I better get #b#t4000361##k first, then head to the place where #p2111003# planted #t4031695#. 

#i4031695##t4031695# #b#c4031695##k/1
I gave #p2111004# the #t4031695#. She seemed very surprised by the gesture, followed by a complex look on her face... Will #p2111003#'s love finally bloom as well?

string.name: name
string.value: Acquiring the Seed for the Snowfield Rose
The #t4031696# that #p2111003# requested can only be obtained through #b#p2020005##k at #b#m211000000##k. I better go talk to #p2020005#.

#p2020005# said #t4031696# is something only the alchemists are aware of, and seemed surprised that I knew it. He then promised to give me #t4031696# as long as I defeat #r100 Leattys#k for him. \n\n#o5300000# #r#a33361##k
I finally received #t4031696# from #p2020005#. Good, now I better get back to #p2111003#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Importance of Life Alchemy
#b#m261000000##k's alchemist #b#p2111009##k seems to be very proud of his work as an Alcadno combining the machinery and alchemy into one great body of work.

#p2111009# warned me of the dangerous nature of #r#o2110301##k, and wanted me to slay #r80#k of them while acquiring #b#t4000351##k necessary to make a medicine.

#i4000351##t4000351# #b#c4000351##k/40 
#o2110301# #r#a33371##k

#p2111009# told me he lost his right eye in the past because of an attack from #o2110301#, but thanks to the Life Alchemy practiced by the Alcadnos, he was able to live a new life with a new right eye. He also contends that poison, if used right, can be a great source of medicine, and that just because it's dangerous, doesn't mean people should stay away from the merging of machinery and alchemy.

string.name: name
string.value: The Problems with Life Alchemy
#p2111008# is an alchemist from #b#m261000000##k. He's a Zenumist, and contends that Alcadno's works are flawed. I better go talk to #b#p2111008##k.
#p2111008# had been mad at the fact that lately, there have been an increase of #o2110300#s outside #m261000000#, and asked me to defeat #r150#k of them.\n\n#o2110300# #r#a33381#
#p2111008# proceeded to point out every flaw stemming from Alcadno, and wanted to put a stop to their research.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Underground Study

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes
#b#p2111004##k is the wife of the missing alchemist #p2111002#. If I need to investigate more on #p2111002#, I better go talk to her.

When I told #p2111004# of my intentions to investigate more on #p2111002#, she contended that she'd rather prefer me conducting this as opposed to people from Alcadno or Zenumist. She then proceeded to tell me something that no one is aware of: #p2111002#'s #bunderground study#k. It may have been gathering dust from no one visiting, but I may be able to find a clue or two there...

At #p2111002#'s underground study, I was able to locate a strange book. Maybe this book contains Dr. De Lang's Secret Notes! A hole that's found in the middle of the book looks like if I find the right item, it may fit perfect in the hole... if the key to the Secret Notes is made out of silver, as mentioned by the Wandering Alchemist, then maybe #b#t4031744##k is the key.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Secret Notes

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes

I found something inside that strange book, and that was #p2111002#'s Secret Notes. Let's see what's inside... based on the information inside, I'll have to figure out #bthe person that #p2111002# trusts the most#k, and then go to that person to clarify it.
The person that #p2111002# trusts the most is actually #p2111002#'s friend #p2040050#. When I handed #p2040050# the #t4161031#, he looked concerned as he peered through the notes...

string.name: name
string.value: The Truth About Dr. De Lang

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes

After reading #t4161031#, #p2040050# realized what #p2111002# wanted was...really nothing significant. He felt sad about the whole situation, and as he observed the note, something caught #p2040050#'s eyes as he realized there was a hidden message on the back of the note. He then mentioned that #b#p2020005##k might be the person to talk to to reveal the hidden message.
A great alchemist who served as the 3rd president of the Alchemist Union in #m261000000#... That's #p2020005#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Hidden Words

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes
When I showed #p2020005# #t4161031#, he took a good look at it, and told me if I wanted to unveil the hidden message, I'll have to bring #b#t4031737##k. \n\n#i4031737##t4031737# #b#c4031737##k/1
I brought #t4031737# as ordered by #p2020005#. Without any hesitation, #p2020005# poured the blood all over #t4161031#...

string.name: name
string.value: Re-acquiring Dr. De Lang's Notes
Oh no... I was going to give #t4161033# to Zenumist, but I misplaced it. What should I do? If that book ends up in the wrong hands, then that spells disaster. I better talk to #b#p2020005##k.
Clearly flustered, #p2020005# yelled at me never to misplace it again. Fortunately, with his magic powers, it is easy to spot #t4161033#, so I'll just have to wait until he finds it.
Now that I've received #t4161033# from #p2020005#, I better head back to #p2111000# of Zenumist Society. I still have a chance to change my mind and take a different route.

Clearly flustered, #p2020005# yelled at me never to misplace it again. Fortunately, with his magic powers, it is easy to spot #t4161033#, so I'll just have to wait until he finds it.
Now that I've received #t4161033# from #p2020005#, I better head back to #p2111001# of Albino Society. I still have a chance to change my mind and take a different route.

Oh no... I was going to give #t4161033# to Phyllia, but I misplaced it. What should I do? If that book ends up in the wrong hands, then that spells disaster. I better talk to #b#p2020005##k.
Clearly flustered, #p2020005# yelled at me never to misplace it again. Fortunately, with his magic powers, it is easy to spot #t4161033#, so I'll just have to wait until he finds it.
Now that I've received #t4161033# from #p2020005#, I better head back to #p2111004#. I still have a chance to change my mind and take a different route.

string.name: name
string.value: The Memories of Humanoid A

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is De Lang?

#p2111001# seemed to think long and hard about #p2111002#'s research, then said maybe #b#p2111003##k might know something about the medicine. #p2111003#? The one who can't even remember his past? How??
When I asked #p2111003# about #p2111002#, he had no clue who he was. However, he did mention something about this medicine that he held on from the moment he opened his eyes.

string.name: name
string.value: De Lang and Humanoid A

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is De Lang?

#p2111001#'s eyes normally scare me off, but his eyes seem sad today. According to him, #p2111003# was found at #p2111002#'s lab when the lab exploded because of the failed experiment. No one knows when or how it was made... and Humanoid himself doesn't remember his origins. \n\nMaybe #p2111002#'s experiment didn't fail as everyone believes... the one item that #p2111003# is holding on to, despite not remembering anything from the past, says it all. I better go to #b#p2111005##k and give her #p2111002#'s piece of mind.

#p2111005# seemed stunned when receiving the medicine, but then turned into pure joy and happiness. #p2111005# seemed determined to get better with the medicine, so she can really improve her alchemy skills to one day turn #p2111003# into a human being. Hopefully her experiment will end up being successful.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for the Master Key

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret, Quiet Passage

I told #p2111006# that his pass was useless, and he told me that since it's such an old pass, that its verification code might have expired. Why did I put so much hope into this? But, says #p2111006#, he will do everything in his power to give me an entry to the Secret Passage, and asked me to find #b100 #t4000363#s#k from #r#o6110301##k.\n\n#i4000363##t4000363# #b#c4000363##k/100
I fell for #p2111006#'s promise, and got 100 #t4000363#s from #o6110301#. That's when #p2111006# started making new combination of verification codes out of the #t4000363#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Zenumist and the Ostracized Research
Apparently, #b#p2111008##k, an alchemist from Zenumist, wants something...

#p2111008# mentioned that there was an alchemist that has been ostracized by everyone for trying to combine the works of Zenumist and Alcadno, #b#p2112014##k, and he was interested in obtaining the Lab Report. He wanted me to acquire #b#t4031774##k for him, and in order to do so, I'll have to find someone that is aware of #p2112014#'s current whereabouts... \n\n#i4031774##t4031774# #b#c4031774##k/1
I acquired #t4031774# and gave it to #p2111008#. Peering through the results, Bedin's eyes were flashing with interest.

string.name: name
string.value: Studying Frankenroid 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Keeny's Research on Frankenroid
Magatia's diminutive Fairy alchemist, #bKeeny#k, is lately studying hard on mechanical dolls, Roids.

Keeny said she heard a rumor that the mysterious alchemist #bYulete#k invented a new type of Roid, and wanted to study more on his Frankenroid. Good thinking, except finding Yulete, who has been virtually banished from Magatia, and actually #btalking#k to him might be difficult...
While helping Romeo and Juliet out, I was able to learn of Yulete's true intentions and was able to meet with him.

string.name: name
string.value: Studying Frankenroid 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Keeny's Research on Frankenroid

Yulete seemed ecstatic to help Keeny out. Then he proceeded to bring out the well-organized blueprint of Frankenroid and told me to tell her if she had any questions, she's more than welcome to ask him herself. I better give this blueprint to #bKeeny#k.
After receiving the blueprint of Frankenroid, Keeny seemed beyond words. She felt like this would really help her make Humanoid A's wish come true.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Obstacles
To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.
Yulete asked me to eliminate the monsters that stand in his way of conducting experiments. It seems like the monsters he created from the past have come back to haunt him. \n\n#o9300153# #r#a33681##k
I was able to eliminate all the monsters that were of hindrance to Yulete in the lab. Yulete breathed a sigh of relief that he can now use that lab.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo's Present

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Flowers
Romeo had finally received the okay to date Juliet, but he had been hard at work researching. Has he been dating well? Let's check up on #bRomeo#k.

Romeo was still worried about what to get her, so I advised him to get Juliet a flower. Like a true alchemist, Romeo thought of the Snowfield Rose and asked me to help him get one. Thankfully, he knew how to make the seeds, so all I need to do is get the #bMay Mist#k. \n\n#i4000361##t4000361# #b#c4000361##k/20
I found the Snowfield Rose and gave it to Romeo. Romeo told me to wait as he wants to finalize the process himself, with all his heart.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo's Flowers

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Flowers

Romeo was able to complete the making of Snowfield Rose, but he's terribly shy. So shy that he was too terrified to give the flower to #bJuliet#k himself, and asked me to deliver the flower to her for him. I didn't know he was like this...
I gave Juliet Romeo's flower. Thankfully, she seemed very satisfied with the choice of the present. Good thing he didn't give her something like a Scorpion Needle.

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet's Feelings

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Response
Juliet received a Snowfield Rose with Romeo's true feelings laden in it. I better go see her and see how she feels about the present.

Juliet was so happy about Romeo's Present that she wanted to give Romeo something in return. After taking some time wondering what would be the perfect present for him, she decided to... make him some clothes. She's an alchemist... how will she make clothes for him? Anyway, since Juliet asked for help, I'll need to see #bSirin#k of #bAriant#k.
When I told Sirin of Juliet's story, she told me to wait for a second. She didn't seem to be sweating it one bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Writing Romeo's Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Love Letter

Romeo is an alchemist from Magatia. I don't know about his alchemy skills, but his dating skills leave a lot to be desired, and he seems to be really concerned about that as well. I'll need to talk to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo wanted to write a love letter to Juliet that conveyed his true feelings towards her, but he seemed to be struggling with words. I'll have to come up with something very creative for Romeo...
Struggling, but slowly making progress with the letter, Romeo sure is trying to impress Juliet. I wonder how the letter will end up.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo's Love Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Love Letter
After finally completing the letter, Romeo asked me if I could deliver the letter to #bJuliet#k for him. What am I, their loyal servant???
After receiving Romeo's heartfelt letter, Juliet shed a tear of joy. I don't understand how that letter brought her to tears, but...

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet is Impressed

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox
Juliet seemed very much in love with Romeo after receiving the letter, which meant one thing. Juliet wants to repay the love with a present of her own. I better go see #bJuliet#k.

Juliet decided the best way to respond to the letter was to cook for him by making a lunchbox. ...A lunchbox by an alchemist from Alcadno... I better help her make one before Juliet poisons Romeo to death with her toxic cooking skills. I better buy the #blunchbox recipe#k from #bHan the Broker#k. \n\n#i4031785##t4031785# #b#c4031785##k/1
I handed Juliet Han the Broker's recipe for lunchbox.

string.name: name
string.value: Han the Broker's Recipe
I better stop Juliet before she accidentally poisons Romeo with her toxic cooking skills. I'll need to hurry up and see #bHan the Broker#k so I can buy a recipe for a nice food from him.

Han the Broker was noticeably complaining, and told me if I wanted his #blunchbox recipe#k, then I'll have to fork over #b20,000 mesos#k. That's really pricey, but he's the only way I can acquire the recipe here in Magatia...
I got the recipe from Han the Broker. This recipe also gives me this uneasy feeling. This time, it's not the contents, but the broker himself that worries me...

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox

Juliet's Lunchbox is now complete. It doesn't look all that great, but... seriously, she made this for Romeo, a person she dearly loves, so come on, it can't be toxic, right? Whatever happens to him, I'm sure the great alchemists in Magatia can save him. I'm worried about the lunchbox, but I better still give this to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo seemed very ecstatic to receive the lunchbox. Hopefully he won't die on me.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo Proposes
Romeo is an alchemist in Magatia that's currently dating Juliet like there's no tomorrow. He has finally decided to pop the question to Juliet. I better go visit #bRomeo#k.

Romeo told me although he may not be perfect, he's sure that Juliet will understand and take him regardless, and that's how he came to conclusion to propose to her. He then asked me to find a perfect engagement ring for her. The ring can be purchased at #bWedding Village#k through #bAllegro#k.\n\n#i4031806##t4031806# #b#c4031806##k/1

I got the engagement ring and gave it to Romeo. Now, all he has to do is come up to her and propose successfully. They may be an odd couple, but they do fit like a glove. Hopefully their love will come to fruition.

string.name: name
string.value: Yulete's Reward
#b#p2112014##k, a genius alchemist who isn't universally accepted but deserved to be, may know what #t4001159# and #t4001160# are for. I better go talk to #p2112014#.

After carefully examining #t4001159# and #t4001160#, #p2112014# stated that #bby combining the marbles that contain the essence of the two studies, he can actually form a whole new power that encompasses them all#k. I have a feeling that the materials required for this might be extensive... I better get #t4001159# and #t4001160# first.
Only #p2112014# might be capable of combining the two distinctive styles of work like Zenumist and Alcadno and make something out of it.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : Blueprint for New Robot

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments
Dr. Kim of Omega Sector has apparently come up with something incredible...

Dr. Kim of Omega Sector gave me the Blueprint Machine for the new robot that's currently in development, and he requested that I show this to Chury, Hoony, and Gunny. I should meet up with #bChury#k first; he's at the #bOmega Sector Silo#k.
Dr. Kim gave me a mission to show Chury the blueprint of the new robot that he's currently making, and I did just that. Chury seemed impressed by it.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting with Gunny

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments

I met up with Gunny at a field around Omega Sector, handed him his #bLaser gun#k, and showed him the #bBlueprint Machine#k. Gunny appreciated my effort and requested that I report this all to Dr. Kim. This Command Center warp capsule seems like a useful item.

As Dr. Kim requested from the Command Center in the Omega Sector, I showed the blueprint of the new robot to Chury, Hoony, and Gunny, while simultaneously solving their problems. Dr. Kim was very pleased with the results, and wanted me to drop by again sometime, for he could use my help.

string.name: name
string.value: An Important Robotic Part

string.name: parent
string.value: Supplying the Robotic Parts
I should go see Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

From the Command Center in the Omega Sector, Dr. Kim requested that I receive 3 important mechanical parts from Cheng the Assistant at the Toy Factory of Ludibrium. Man ... when am I going to find time to go all the way up to Ludibrium?
Dr. Kim of the Command Center in the Omega Sector gave me a mission to receive some stuff from Cheng the Assistant of the Toy Factory. The parts I received seem to be very important for something.

string.name: name
string.value: Retrieving the Robotic Parts
I should go see Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

I met with Dr. Kim again at the Command Center. Dr. Kim was furious over the fact that someone stole 3 boxes full of robotic parts. He requested that I check into the hidden place at the Boswell Field, break all the Alien boxes, and recover the 3 missing boxes.

#t4031141# #b#c4031141##k/1
#t4031142# #b#c4031142##k/1
#t4031143# #b#c4031143##k/1
I retrieved the 3 boxes full of robotic parts that were stolen by the Aliens, and gave them back to Dr. Kim at the Command Center. This should speed up the development of the new robot.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Aliens
I should go see Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

Dr. Kim of the Command Center notified me that a powerful new Alien has appeared somewhere around the Boswell Field, and wanted me to eliminate it for them. He said he had to ask me for help since the new robot isn't ready just yet... I need to head over to the hidden place at the Boswell Field and defeat at least 5 #bMT-09#k's.\n\n#o5120100# #r#a34081#
I managed to eliminate all 5 MT-09's that Dr. Kim of the Command Center requested. I really hope that the new robot is made soon, so I don't have to ever do this again.

string.name: name
string.value: Where is Dogon's HQ?
I should go see Chury of Omega Sector.

I met with Chury at the Silo of the Omega Sector again, and he requested that I find a secret base of an apparent alien-worshipper. I'll need to find Dogon's HQ, which is hidden somewhere around the Fields nearby Omega Sector, find #bDogon's Report#k from the box at the Dogon's HQ, and give them to Chury.

I gave Chury, who was waiting for me at the Silo of the Omega Sector, the #bDogon's Report#k that I found from Dogon's secret base. I can't believe someone is actually helping aliens... now THAT's quite shocking.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Gray's Sign
I should go see Gunny of Omega Sector.

I met up with Gunny again at a field around Omega Sector. Lately Gunny has been on a mission to trace Chief Gray's every move, but due to the fact that he gets lost easily, he had been having trouble locating it. I'll need to defeat Chief Gray's for Gunny and collect 5 signs that they wear with them, so I can give them to Gunny.\n\n#t4000125# #b#c4000125##k/5
I collected Chief Gray's signs and gave them to Gunny, who's at a field around Omega Sector. With this sign, Gunny may be able to have an easier time tracing Chief Gray.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Grays
I better go see Black Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Kulan Field.

At a field around Omega Sector, I met this strangely-dressed man who called himself Black Mesoranger. He requested that I eliminate the alien that's been taking over Kulan Field, the #bBarnard Gray#k, 25 of them to be exact.\n\n#o4230116# #r#a34121#
I successfully completed the mission from Black Mesoranger by defeating the #bBarnard Grays#k. It seems, however, that there will be much more dangerous aliens monsters around Kulan Field

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Chief Gray
I better go see Black Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Kulan Field.

I met with Black Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. She wanted me to take out #bChief Grays#k, considered as a high rank among the Grays, as well as collect 3 of their #bnotes#k from them. Chief Grays are very rare among all Grays and they are few and far between. How am I going to find them? \n\n#t4031102# #b#c4031102##k/3

I took 3 #bnotes#k from the Chief Grays and gave them to Black Mesoranger, who was at a field around Omega Sector. Apparently, these notes contain the history of the Grays... hopefully these notes can be deciphered soon!

string.name: name
string.value: The History of Zeta Leticulan
I better go see Black Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Kulan Field.

I met Black Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. She said the notes have been deciphered, and they revealed that the original planet in which the Grays lived in has been affected with lethal contaminants. Ever since then, they've been looking for a new place to live in, and the Earth turned out to be an ideal place for them. She said that she needed to see which lethal containments aliens couldn't stand that currently infest their original planet, and requested that I extract the #bskin cells of Barnard Gray, Zeta Gray, Ultra Gray, and Chief Gray#k.

#t4031103# #b#c4031103##k/1
#t4031104# #b#c4031104##k/1
#t4031105# #b#c4031105##k/1
#t4031106# #b#c4031106##k/1

I extracted the cells of #bBarnard Gray, Zeta Gray, Ultra Gray, and Chief Gray#k, and handed them to Black Mesoranger, who was at a field around Omega Sector. If the pollutants are poisonous enough for them to leave the planet for good, then our planet may not be safe for much longer...

string.name: name
string.value: Assembling the Alarm Clock
I should go see Pink Mesoranger, who should be around Boswell Field.

I met Pink Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. I was expecting her to tell me that she's been waking up on time, only to find out that all of her clocks have been destroyed. She said she needed a special alarm clock, and to make it will require #b2 Special Batteries, 10 Cogs, and 10 Table Clocks#k. To obtain the special batteries, I'll have to defeat Master Robo at the Ludibrium Clocktower.

#t4031115# #b#c4031115##k/2
#t4000114# #b#c4000114##k/10
#t4000115# #b#c4000115##k/10

To make a special alarm clock for Pink Mesoranger, stationed at a field around Omega Sector, I gathered up a bunch of #bSpecial Batteries, Cogs, and Table Clocks#k as materials. I sure hope this clock does not break on her.

string.name: name
string.value: A Sleeping Monster

string.name: parent
string.value: Delivering the Alarm Clock
I should go see Pink Mesoranger, who's somewhere around Boswell Field.

I ran into Pink Mesoranger again at Boswell Field, near the Omega Sector. She said that the items I gathered up for her last time has been sent to #bKevin the Soldier#k of Omega Sector, and that he should be ready with the #bSuper Alarm Clock#k. My task is to get it from him for her. I hope she'll be able to wake up on time with this baby.
I received a request from Pink Mesoranger to receive the Alarm Clock from Kevin the Soldier for her. The clock looks very well-made.

string.name: name
string.value: The Completion of the Alarm Clock

string.name: parent
string.value: Delivering the Alarm Clock
I received the #bSuper Alarm Clock#k from #bKevin the Soldier#k, who was at the Omega Sector, for Pink Mesoranger. Now all I have to do is deliver this to her.
#bKevin the Soldier#k made the #bsuper alarm clock#k for Pink Mesoranger, stationed at a field around Omega Sector, and I delivered it to her. Hopefully this will enable her to wake up on time.

string.name: name
string.value: Trading with Alien Gray
I better go take a look at Alien Gray, who's somewhere around Kulan Field.

I ran into #bAlien Gray#k at Kulan Field around Omega Sector. He claimed that it's the Omega Sector, not them, that's been the bad one, and it asked me to help it invade the Sector by getting a number of materials from the Omega Sector Silo. I really don't feel good about helping it, but... oh well... I'll need to enter the Omega Sector Silo and bring out #b3 Secret Documents#k. \n\n#t4031116# #b#c4031116##k/3

I got the 3 secret documents out of the Silo and handed them to #bAlien Gray#k, which was at Kulan Field of Omega Sector. I was richly rewarded for my effort, but I can't believe I fell for Gray's lies... I better hope the Omega Sector does not find out about the fact that I actually helped out the aliens...

string.name: name
string.value: The Effort to Make-up
I better go see Yellow Mesoranger at the Safety Zone.

I met with Yellow Mesoranger at a field around Omega Sector. She alerted me that she's aware of the fact that I helped out Alien Gray, and that if I am to dispel the notion that I'm on the alien's side, I'll have to make an effort to make-up for my blunders. In order to regain their trust, I'll have to eliminate the aliens. \n\n#o4230118# #r#a34201#

I may have helped out Alien Gray in a moment of chaos, but after successfully completing the mission Yellow Mesoranger gave me, I think I regained some of her trust. It just seems like the aliens do not want to peacefully coexist with us.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Meteorite Samples
I better go see Yellow Mesoranger at the Safety Zone.

I met up with Yellow Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. Displaying her faith in me, she requested that I pick up #b6 Meteorite Samples#k that's been scattered all over Kulan Field for further investigation. If I take care of this mission, I'll probably gain some more of her trust... \n\n#t4031117# #b#c4031117##k/6
I gathered up the meteorite samples from the Kulan Field and gave them to Yellow Mesoranger, who was at a field around Omega Sector. Hopefully this will jumpstart the studies.

string.name: name
string.value: Fuel for MT-09
I should go see Kay the engineer at the Omega Sector.

I met an engineer named Kay at the Omega Sector Silo. She said she'd been looking for an assistant, and asked if I could help her out. For my first task, since she's trying to develop a new machine that recycles MT-09's fuel, she wanted me to collect #b5 MT-09's Fuels#k.\n\n#t4000126# #b#c4000126##k/5
I went around and collected the fuel for MT-09. This was for Kay the Engineer, who was at the Silo of the Omega Sector. I wonder what kind of a machine Kay will make with the fuel...

string.name: name
string.value: Porter the Undependable

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot
I need 3 of Rombot's Memory Cards so #bPorter#k of Omega Sector can decipher them.
Porter made a colossal mistake and destroyed one of Rombot's Memory Cards. I can't believe I just trusted this man to do this job!

string.name: name
string.value: Porter's Mistake

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot

I met #bPorter#k at the Command Center in the Omega Sector and gave him Rombot's 3 memory cards, but oh my... he was unable to decipher one of the three, and destroyed it. I'll need to find another one of Rombot's Memory Card for Porter.
I watched over Porter's deciphering with an uneasy feeling, but thankfully he didn't make any mistake this time around.

string.name: name
string.value: The Brilliant Assistant

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot

Once again, I gave #bPorter#k Rombot's Memory Cards. Fortunately, the deciphering worked this time around, and I was able to get a hold of #b3 Deciphered Memory Cards#k for Kay. Now all I have to do is give them to her.
I gave Kay, who's at the Silo of Omega Sector, the #bDeciphered Memory Cards#k that she requested. I'm anxious to see what she makes out of them.

string.name: name
string.value: Porter's Secret Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Dropship
I should go see Porter of the Omega Sector.

#bPorter#k, who's at the Command Center in the Omega Sector, requested that I deliver a letter to #bKay the Engineer#k at the Omega Sector Silo. This letter has to be delivered on time, so I'll have to hurry up and give it to her. I wonder what's written in this though... maybe it's a love letter. Hahaha.
I gave Kay the Engineer, who was at the Omega Sector Silo, the letter from Porter. Unfortunately, it doesn't look like a love letter. It's about a disappeared Dropship

string.name: name
string.value: The Pilot's Whereabouts...

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Dropship
I found what appeared to be a broken Dropship around Boswell Field, but the pilot is nowhere to be found, and instead, I was able to find a letter inside. I better give that letter to Kay.

I found a letter inside the broken Dropship, and gave it to #bKay the Engineer#k at the Omega Sector Silo. With a sad look on her eyes, Kay said she was glad to find out the pilot was at least alive. Now, where would that pilot be...?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 100 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.

I met Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector, and he asked for my help to gather up some items to make various kinds of medicine. He said he needed #b100 Mateon Tentacles#k, which can be obtained by taking out the aliens. It's quite amusing to think that the alien tentacles can be used as an ingredient to make medicines. Rice really wanted me to keep it a secret, since this was something even the famous Dr. Pepper was unaware of, and he's thinking of making a patent out of it. Well, time to collect some tentacles! \n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/100

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b100 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will the research start now? I wonder what kind of the antidote this will produce. I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 200 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b200 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/200

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b200 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will this prove to be a turning point on the research? I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 300 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b300 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/300

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b300 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will this prove to be a turning point on the research? I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 400 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b400 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/400

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b400 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will this prove to be a turning point on the research? I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Mateon
I better go see Green Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Boswell Field.

I met Green Mesoranger at Boswell Field around Omega Sector. Green Mesoranger said he heard a lot about me through other Mesorangers, and asked if I wanted to tackle a Mesoranger mission. First I decided to help Green Mesoranger by helping his mission to #beliminate 100 Mateons#k.\n\n#o4230119# #r#a34351#

I took out 100 Mateons, just the way Green Mesoranger from Boswell Field asked. The duties of the Mesorangers don't seem to be over, though, so if I have some time to spare, then I maybe I should go check Green Mesoranger then.

string.name: name
string.value: Help Kevin the Soldier's Vacation Plans

string.name: parent
string.value: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach
I heard Kevin the Soldier has something related with VIP ticket to Florina Beach at Omega Sector.

Kevin the Soldier was drafted into the army, but was never thrown in combat, and instead, is relegated to security duties at the Omega Sector. Feeling bored from all the security work, Kevin decided to earn some brownie-points for vacation by hunting down Mateons, and enlisted for my help. 

 #t04000120# #b#c04000120##k/25 
 #t04031206# #b#c04031206##k/1
What can I do with a Ripped Travel Ticket? I better check on Nara the Tour Guide first, just the way the ticket said.

string.name: name
string.value: Destroying the Power of Evil

Dark Tachion is an altered version of Tachion, which is the source of power that forms the Time Sphere. It should be deemed dangerous now, and since a creepy, evil force keeps seeping out of it, it must be a dangerous time here. I should destroy this at the lava deep in El Nath.

After taking care of Papulatus, it coughed up Dark Tachion, emitting a dark force in the process. To destroy this, I went to the deepest part of El Nath where the lava flows. I better destroy this by dropping it in the boiling lava.
After entering a hidden area where the lava flows, I found a Suspicious Lava. This is where I threw the Dark Tachion to destroy it. The force of evil disappeared along with the Tachion itself.

string.name: name
string.value: Mason the Collector â…¡

string.name: parent
string.value: Mason the Collector
It seems like Mason the Collector has a favor to ask other than that of Aurora Marbles.

Mason the Collector took a look at the Aurora Marble, and wondered... how it would it look like in an original state of form? It looks like Buffy' marble have been shaped in such way through an outside force... nn#t4031195# #b#c4031195#/10#kn#t4000129# #b#c4000129#/50#k
Just like Mason the collecting fanatic wanted, I managed to gather up more Lazy Buffy marbles and Aurora marbles. In return, I received an item from him that looks quite useful...

string.name: name
string.value: Zeno, the Formidable Enemy
#b#p2050001##k from #b#m221000000##k has requested your cooperation to save the world...

Boasting a firm build and intelligence, #o6220001# is a new type of robotic ordnance. But #o6220001# has been acting strangely as of late... It attacks everything including the Grays. #p2050001#, curious as to why #o6220001# has suddenly turned ill-tempered, has asked you to talk to #b#p2050002##k to gather information about #o6220001#.
When asked about #o6220001#, #p2050002# denies knowing anything about it... Hm, he seems suspicious.

string.name: name
string.value: Wave Translator
Go to the #bCommand Center#k to find #bDr. Kim#k.

When you tell #p2050001# that you couldn't get any useful information from #p2050002#, he suggests he build #b#t4031927##k. He asks you to find the materials so that he can build the translator that can decode the ultrasonic waves that Grays send each other using their tentacles. 

#i4000119##t4000119# #b#c4000119#/30#k
#i4000118##t4000118# #b#c4000118#/30#k
#i4000125##t4000125# #b#c4000125#/1#k
#i4031926##t4031926# #b#c4031926#/10#k
When you brought him all the materials he's asked for, #p2050001# made you a #t4031927#. Hmm, but he says this one might malfunction since he hasn't had the time to test it...

string.name: name
string.value: The Endangered Lives of Grays
How well does the Wave Translator work? Let's hurry over to #m221040100# and try talking to #b#p2050002##k.
While hiding the #t4031927# behind your back, you approached #p2050002#. #p2050002# tells you that nothing is going on but says something completely different through the ultrasonic waves.
You've gotten a bunch of #ruseless information#k... which means the Wave Translator probably malfunctioned. Let's return to #b#p2050001# and have him build you a new #t4031927#.#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Endangered Lives of Grays
Let's to talk to #b#p2050002##k with the new #t4031927#.

While hiding the #t4031927# behind your back, you approached #p2050002#. #p2050002# says nothing is going on but says something completely different through the ultrasonic waves. \n\n According to the #t4031927#, it seems that the Grays have broken the console which controls #o6220001#. Oh my... no wonder #o6220001# has been acting out of control.

The #p2050002# becomes flustered as soon as he recognizes the #t4031927# you're holding, but informs you that #m221000000# will be in danger if nothing is done to control #o6220001# soon. Let's go tell Dr. Kim.

string.name: name
string.value: The Battle Against Zeno

The #b#p2050002##k, who has failed at keeping #o6220001# under control, informs you that #m221000000# will be in danger if nothing is done to control #o6220001# soon. Let's hurry over to #b#p2050001##k and let him know.

When you tell #p2050001# what you heard about the truth behind #p2050002# from the Wave Translator, he asks you to defeat Zeno for the safety of this world. According to #p2050001#, #o6220001# can be found in #b#m221040301##k, which you can reach from Kula Field IV. Hurry and defeat #r#o6220001##k! \n\n#o6220001# #r#a34571##k

You have defeated #o6220001# and reported your progress to #p2050001#. Not only does #m221000000# have to worry about the safety of the world, but also the safety of the #p2050002#... No wonder #m221000000# is always busy.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolutionary Defensive Wall Construction Plan
#b#p2050009##k in #b#m221000000##k wants to share his new plans with someone.

#b#p2050009##k suggested that we help #b#p2050008##k. He says we can prevent aliens from attacking by using solid #b#t04000101#s#k to build a defensive wall around #b#m221000000##k. In order to find out if this plan is possible, we need to get #b#t04000101#s#k and get it tested by #b#p2050001##k.

#i04000101##t04000101# #b#c04000101#/20

#r30 minute time limit

It's sad that #b#p2050009##k really thinks his idea is brilliant but #b#p2050001##k is right. This plan clearly makes no sense and doesn't even need scientific testing in order to prove that... Ugh, next time I should think things through before I offer to help. I hope I grew at least a little bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Path to the Past
I arrived at the majestic temple high above the sky, the Temple of Time. A fussy looking #b#p2140000##k standing in front of the three doors begins to talk to me...

#p2140000# said there was an incident recently where an intruder broke in through the Door to the Past and that until the case is resolved, they will not be letting regular visitors inside the Temple of Time. He says if I really want to go in, I can, but it will be a waste of time... Well, should I just #bgo in for now#k?

#p2140000# said because time goes backwards in Memory Lane, you can't go forward unless you are given permission. He says I would need to get permission from the Goddess... How do I get permission from the Goddess?

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane1

I went inside the temple through the broken Door to the Past, but I kept circling back to the same place. This Temple of Time...I can't go forward unless I get permission from the Goddess. How do I get permission from the Goddess? I should ask #b#p2140000##k.

He says the Goddess is in eternal sleep but if I get permission from the Goddess' representative, #p2140000#, I can go through Memory Lane. #p2140000# said that he needs someone to #binvestigate the break in#k, and that if I agree to do it, he will grant me permission.

When I said I would gladly do it, #p2140000# said he will have to first #btest#k me and see if I can withstand the flow of energy that governs Memory Lane. The test is none other than defeating #r999#k #r#o8200001#k in #m270010100#... 

#o8200001# #r#a35011##k
I defeated 999 #o8200001#. #p2140000# was impressed, and I was able to go further in. But...

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane3
I received permission to go all the way to #m270010300#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270010300##k and take out #r999 #o8200003##k. \n\n#o8200003# #r#a35031##k
I defeated 999 #o8200003#. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows me to go up to #m270010400#.

string.value: Lost Memory

string.name: parent
string.value: Memory Lane

Whale of Time, #o8220004#, eats memory as its staple food. #p2140000# said that my memory was eaten by #o822004# while I was fighting it and therefore I couldn't pass through Memory Lane. He said I might be able to retrieve my lost memory if I go see #b#p2140001##k, the Memory Keeper.
I met #p2140001#, the Memory Keeper.

string.value: Road of Regrets

I drank #p2140002#'s potion. Due to the side effect, all of my HP and MP were drained, making me temporarily unavailable for combat, but I think I found my emotions back. I should try going past the Road of Regrets now.
