string.name: name
string.value: The Goddess' Blessing

string.name: parent
string.value: Road to Oblivion
I received permission from #p2140000#, but once I went deep inside the temple, something was stopping me and I couldn't go in further. What did I lose this time? I should go see #b#p2140000##k.

#p2140000# scratched his head and said he didn't know what happened this time. He said unless I lost my Oblivion, which doesn't even make sense, there should be no reason I can't pass through the Road to Oblivion. \n\nHe suggested that maybe the #bGoddess' Promise#k has been broken and told me to go see #b#p2140003##k to check the records of the promise.

I met with #p2140003#. He said he had been waiting for me and began explaining things as if he already knew what was going on. He said that the blessing of the Goddess of Time, can never disappear or be taken away, and it was still valid... However, he said there is another reason why I can't go deep into the temple.

string.name: name
string.value: Force Field

string.name: parent
string.value: Road to Oblivion

When I told #p2140003# everything I heard from #p2140000#, he knew right away. He said the reason the inside of the temple is blocked is because of an #rintrusion by an outside force#k! #p2140000# said it must be because a #rforce field has been set by an intruder#k and that I need to break the force field and find out who the intruder is. He says I need the power of the Guardians of the Past in order to break the force field...

string.name: name
string.value: In Search for the Lost Memory

According to the Memory Keeper, in order to find my lost memory, I need to go back to the starting point of my adventure. Starting point of my adventure? Let's see... Wouldn't that be when I left Maple Island to Victoria Island for the first time and got my job? I should go see #b#p1032001##k.

It had been a long time since I last met with #p1032001#. He said he remembered back when I was just a beginning and I knew nothing. He was happy to see how I've grown into a great wizard. I was touched that he still remembered our first meeting from such a long time ago.

string.value: Breaking the Force Field
I wanted to go deep inside the temple, but I couldn't because of the intruder's force field. I should try making the item that can destroy the force field with help from #p2140000#.

When I brought all the ingredients to #p2140000#, he made me the #t4032002#. Now I should be able to go deep inside the temple again.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of the Lost Memories

According to the Memorykeeper, you must go back to the place where you first began your adventures in order to retrieve your lost memory. The place where you first began your adventures... That must be #b#m310000000##k, where you chose the path of the Resistance. Go to the Underground Base of the Resistance.

You see #p2151003# for the first time in a while. She's ecstatic to see that you have become a true member of the Resistance. You feel warm and tingly inside, seeing that #p2151003# still remembers your first encounter...

You saw #p2151003# for the first time in a while. She was ecstatic to see that you have become a true member of the Resistance. You felt wonderful inside, knowing that #p2151003# remembered your first encounter...

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Gong's Love For His Wife
I should go visit Tae Gong, who's gone fishing floating around in the middle of Aqua Road.

Tae Gong, who's in the middle of the ocean fishing on a raft, was concerned that he couldn't gather up #t4000166# for his wife. I made a deal with him to gather up #b20 #t4000166#s#k for him and deliver them to his wife #bGrandma Yeon#k at the Korean Folk Town.\n\n#t4000166# #b#c4000166##k/20

Tae Gong, who was busy fishing in the middle of the ocean, requested that I gather up 20 #t4000166#s and deliver them to his wife Grandma Yeon, which I did. Grandma Yeon was very thankful, yet sorry that I had to go through all kinds of trouble just for her.

string.name: name
string.value: The Brothers' Stack of Rice 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Brotherly Love
I better go visit Chil Sung at the Korean Folk Town.

Chil Sung and Chil Nam are brothers living in Korean Folk Town. Chil Sung was worried that his brother Chil Nam didn't have much food with him, and asked me if I could secretly place his sack of rice on Chil Nam's stacks.
I received a sack of rice from Chil Sung, and placed it on top of a stack of rice in front of Chil Nam's house.

string.name: name
string.value: The Brothers' Stack of Rice 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Brotherly Love

Chil Nam insisted that his brother, who is the oldest child, should have more food than him, and stuck out a #t4031229# from his stack. He then requested that I place it on top of Chil Sung's stack of rice in front of his house.
I received a #t4031229# from Chil Nam, and placed it on top of a stack of rice in front of Chil Sung's house.

string.name: name
string.value: The Brothers' Stack of Rice 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Brotherly Love

I received a #t4031229# from Chil Sung, and placed it on top of a stack of rice in front of Chil Nam's house.

string.name: name
string.value: Opening Nolbu's Gourd
I have this seed that Swallow gave me. Should I give this to Nolbu?

I took this seed that Swallow gave me and gave it to Nolbu. When notified that the seed was indeed from Swallow, Nolbu requested that I plant the seed on his rooftop, and when it grows into a gourd, open it and give him whatever that may be inside.

I gave Nolbu the seed that Swallow gave me. Nolbu requested that I plant the seed on his rooftop, and when it grows into a gourd, open it and give him whatever that maybe inside. When the gourd grew and was big enough to open, it contained the warrant of attachment. Greedy Nolbu collapsed and started bawling over his misfortune.

string.name: name
string.value: Opening Hongbu's Gourd
I have this seed that Swallow gave me. Should I give this to Hongbu?

I took this seed that Swallow gave me and gave it to Hongbu. When notified that the seed was indeed from Swallow, Hongbu requested that I plant the seed on his rooftop, and when it grows into a gourd, open it and give him whatever that may be inside.

I gave Hongbu the seed that Swallow gave me. Hongbu requested that I plant the seed on his rooftop, and when it grows into a gourd, open it and give him whatever that maybe inside. When the gourd grew and was big enough to open, it contained a chest full of treasures.

string.name: name
string.value: The Seed That Swallow Lost
I lost the seed that Swallow gave. I better go visit again.
I lost the seed that Swallow gave, so I had to explain the circumstances to it. After some deliberation, it decided to look for another seed, and asked me to wait for a bit, then talk to it again.
I went to see Swallow because I have lost the seed myself, and it gave me a new one. Now, who should I give this to?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate Goblins

string.name: parent
string.value: Goblin at Black Mountain

Armed with 3 types of food that Goblins cannot resist, the quest to defeat the Goblins has now officially begun. Chumji advised that I drop the baits at various spots near the abandoned house in the Black Mountain to draw the Goblins out, and proceeded to give me the details on exactly where to drop them: roasted pork in front of a stack of rocks; buckwheat paste inside a tree hole; rice wine in a stone lantern?

#o7130400# #r#a36113##k
#o7130401# #r#a36111##k
#o7130402# #r#a36112##k
#t4031232# #b#c4031232##k/1
#t4031233# #b#c4031233##k/1
#t4031234# #b#c4031234##k/1

I brought roasted pork, buckwheat paste, and rice wine and made my way up to the very top of the Black Mountain, where the abandoned house is located. I was able to successfully draw the 3 King Goblins out from the house and defeated all of them. When the Goblins were defeated, they dropped a bunch of jewelry, and after bringing them all to Chumji, he decided to give me one as a gift.

string.name: name
string.value: Chil Sung's Roasted Pork
Apparently, the place that makes the best roasted pork in Korean Folk Town is Chil Sung's...

I went to Chil Sung's place because he was apparently the best at making roasted pork in Folk Town. He asked for 5 Moon Bunny's Pounders and 1,000 mesos in return for roasted pork.\n\n#t4000169# #b#c4000169##k/5
I gave Chil Sung 5 #t4000169#s and 1,000 mesos for 1 roasted pork.

string.name: name
string.value: Chil Nam's Buckwheat Paste
Apparently, the place that makes the best buckwheat paste in Korean Folk Town is Chil Nam's...

I went to Chil Nam's place because he was apparently the best at making buckwheat paste in Folk Town. He asked for 4 Tiger Stamps and 1,000 mesos in return for some buckwheat paste.\n\n#t4000170# #b#c4000170##k/4
I gave Chil Nam 4 #t4000170#s and 1,000 mesos for 2 buckwheat pastes.

string.name: name
string.value: Kong Ji's Rice Wine
Apparently, the place that makes the best Rice Wine in Korean Folk Town is Kong Ji's...

I went to Kong Ji's tavern because apparently her place was the best at making rice wine in Folk Town. She asked for 3 Three-Tailed Foxtails and 1,000 mesos in return for some rice wine.\n\n#t4000172# #b#c4000172##k/3
I gave Kong Ji 3 #t4000172#s and 1,000 mesos for 5 bottles of rice wine.

string.name: name
string.value: Pot with a Hole

string.name: parent
string.value: Kong Ji's Request
I heard that Kong Ji is in need of help. I should go check it out...

Kong Ji, who lives at a tavern in Folk Town with her stepmom, is a nice girl who does everything her stepmom asks her to do, however ludicrous the task may be. This time, the stepmom ordered her to fill up a pot with water, but the pot had a hole at the bottom, which made it impossible to fill up the pot. She asked me if I could get her a new #t4031230#. I heard that Grandma Yeon, who lives at the place where the water mill is, sells pots, and if I keep her up to date on his husband's whereabouts, then she may give me the pot. \n\n#t4031230# #b#c4031230##k/1

I gave Kong Ji, who was panicking because her pot had a hole at the bottom, the #t4031230# that Grandma Yeon made at the water mill. Apparently, Grandma Yeon only sells these pots to the closest few. I should go check on Kong Ji again down the road.

string.name: name
string.value: Extracting Artemisia

string.name: parent
string.value: Kong Ji's Request
I heard that Kong Ji is in need of help. I should go check it out...

I went to see Kong Ji again. Kong Ji seemed swamped with work at home. Her stepmom wants some Artemisia Rice Cake, which means she had to extract #t4031231#, but she is stuck at home trying to finish the laundry before the day is over. Obviously, she has no time to extract Artemisia, and that is why she's asking for my help. I've decided to extract some #t4031231# for poor Kong Ji. \n\n#t4031231# #b#c4031231##k/12

I went through the town and mountains and extracted some Artemisia for Kong Ji, who was stuck at home doing house chores. Kong Ji seemed to be stuck at home working way too hard. I better go see her again down the road.
Chumji from Korean Folk Town is looking to gather up some people to fight against tigers. Should I join?

Chumji of Korean Folk Town is concerned about the fact that lately, the Hoguls have been surprising numerous people with their appearance at the Black Mountain. He asked if I could go up to the mountain, defeat 8 Hoguls, and bring back 8 Tiger Skins as proof.

#t4000171# #b#c4000171##k/8
#o5100005# #r#a36221#

Through Chumji's request, I went up to the Black Mountain and defeated 8 Hoguls, the same Hoguls that have put many residents of the Folk Town in fear. Also, as evidence, I collected 8 Tiger Skins, and gave them to Chumji. He commended my courage for the job well done.

string.name: name
string.value: Grandma Yeon's Pot
Word is that Grandma Yeon of the Folk Town is great at making pots.

I needed a new pot for Kong Ji, so I went to see Grandma Yeon near the water mill. She seemed very appreciative of the fact that I helped her husband get something done in the past, and decided to sell it to me cheap. #b5,000 mesos#k? Is that really considered cheap?
I was able to purchase Grandma Yeon's pot for 5,000 mesos.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Brotherly Love
I'm sure I received the storybook after helping out the brothers Chil Sung and Chil Nam. Where did it go? Should I go see Chil Nam again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031237##k for him. I was pretty sure I received it while helping out the brothers Chil Sung and Chil Nam, but I can't find it for some reason. I visited Chil Nam and explained the matters to him, and he made a deal with me. If I give his brother #b5 #t4000095#s#k, then he'll give me the storybook.\n\n#t4000095# #b#c4000095##k/5
I acquired 5 #t4000095#s and gave them to Chil Sung, as requested by Chil Nam, in order to reacquire #t4031237#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Kong Ji and Pat Ji
I'm sure I received the storybook after helping out Kong Ji. Where did it go? Should I go see Kong Ji again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to retrieve #b#t4031236##k. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I helped Kong Ji out, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with her, she promised to give me the storybook if I gather up #b5 #t4000166#s#k for her family dinner later tonight.\n\n#t4000166# #b#c4000166##k/5
I gave Kong Ji 5 #t4000166#s just as she requested to reacquire #t4031236#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Hongbu and Nolbu (Hongbu)
I'm sure I received the storybook after helping out Hongbu. Where did it go? Should I go see Hongbu again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031235##k for him. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I helped Hongbu out, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with Hongbu, he promised to give me the storybook if I gather up #b10 #t4000168#s#k and give them to the Swallow with the injured wing.\n\n#t4000168# #b#c4000168##k/10
I gave Swallow 10 #t4000168#s just as Hongbu requested to reacquire #t4031235#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Hongbu and Nolbu (Nolbu)
I'm sure I received the storybook after teaching Nolbu a lesson. Where did it go? Should I go see Nolbu again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031235##k. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I taught Nolbu a lesson, but I can't seem to find it. When I went to visit Nolbu and ask for the storybook, Nolbu went on a tirade and decided to give me the storybook only after giving him #b2 #t4000100#s#k.\n\n#t4000100# #b#c4000100##k/2
I gave Nolbu 2 #t4000100#s just as he requested to reacquire #t4031235#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on the Goblin Story
I'm sure I received the storybook from Chumji after defeating 3 King Goblins. Where did it go? Should I go see Chumji again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031238##k for him. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it after I defeated the King Goblins, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with Chumji, he promised to give me the storybook if I gather up #b10 #t4000173#s#k for him.\n\n#t4000173# #b#c4000173##k/10
I gave Chumji 10 #t4000173#s just as he requested to reacquire #t4031238#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon storybook
I'm sure I received the storybook from #p2071008# after helping him out. Where did it go? Should I go see Haetnim again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031270##k for him. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I helped Haetnim out, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with Haetnim, he promised to give me the storybook if I buy #b5 #t2020001#s#k for his hungry sister.\n\n#t2020001# #b#c2020001##k / 5
I gave Haetnim 5 #t2020001#s just as he requested to reacquire #t4031270#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Shim Chung
I was sure I received the storybook after helping #p2071009# out, but where is it? Did I just lose it? I better go see #p2071009# again

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031280##k. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it after I lent #p2071009# 300 #t4031279#s, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with #p2071009#, he promised to give me the storybook if I gather up #b10 #t4000165#s#k for Shim Chung, who's quite a florist, to make her favorite flower.\n\n#t4000165# #b#c4000165##k / 10
I gathered up 10 #t4000165#s, which are Shim Chung's favorite, at the request of #p2071009# in order to reacquire #t4031280#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Fox Hunt
I should go visit #p2071000#, who is the chief of the Korean Folk Town.

#b#p2071000##k, the elder of the Korean Folk Town, is concerned that an increasing number of residents in Folk Town are becoming sick these days, because #r#o5100004#s#k from the Black Mountain put a curse on them. In order to end the curse affecting the town, he tells you that it requires #b99 Foxtails#k. Since each #t4000172# has #b3 tails#k, you will need to get #b33 #t4000172#s#k. \n\n#i4000172##t4000172# #b#c4000172##k / 33
You brought 33 #t4000172#s to cure the curse of the Three-Tailed Fox affecting the residents of Folk Town. Chumji thanked you for your help and gave you an All-Cure Potion.

string.name: name
string.value: The Story of Axes
Deep in the #m222010002# of the Black Mountain, I heard #p2071010# is concerned about something. I better go check it out myself.

I met #b#p2071010##k, who was heavily sighing at #m222010002# with a big lump on his head. Apparently, he got hurt from a random axe that was thrown on his way. After throwing the axe out of the pond in disgust, the owner of the axe, #b#p2071011##k, came and asked for the axe. He requested that anyone that finds the #b#t4031315##k return it to #p2071011#.\nThe Mountain God believes that the steel axe for the tree cutter might be taken by a monster, and that he has offered to look into the axe and see if it's legit. The axes will be available through #rDark Axe Stumps#k, and he'll look into it and see if it's really #b#t4031315##k.
Through the request from #p2071010#, who I met at #m222010002# of the Black Mountain, I returned #t4031315# to its rightful owner, and received the storybook on 'The Story of the Axes'.

string.name: name
string.value: Judging the Axe
As the Mountain God said, if I got an axe from Dark Axestump, let's go to the Mountain God and ask him to see if it's indeed the steel axe.

The Mountain God told me if I bring the #baxe#k that #r#o2130100##k had, then he'll look into it and see if it's indeed the steel axe of the tree cutter or not. I need to pick up an axe from Dark Stump and bring it back to the Mountain God.

The Mountain God carefully looked through the axe that I picked up, and told me what kind of axe that was. If I ever find the tree cutter's steel axe, then I'll have to return it to the tree cutter who lives somewhere around the Black Mountain.

string.name: name
string.value: Young Man Possessed by a Fox

string.name: parent
string.value: Legends of Hometown
Chil Nam from the #bFolk Town#k has become strange lately, and #bChil Sung#k is worried sick. What could be the problem? Let's go see Chil Sung.
Chil Sung says Chil Nam doesn't eat nor sleep, and just sits and sighs all day. What could be wrong with him? Let's see how #bChil Nam#k is.
A preoccupied Chil Nam sits with his mouth open and says something about a fox. This may be a clue. Let's go back to Chil Sung.

string.name: name
string.value: Chil Sung's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Legends of Hometown
Went to Chil Sung and told him that Chil Nam said something about a fox and Chil Sung tells of a Samiho living in Black Mountain. The Samiho may hold more clues. Let's go and hunt down a #rSamiho#k.

Retrieved a strange piece of cloth after hunting a Samiho and showed it to Chil Sung. He is suddenly surprised, and says this is a piece of the Black Mountain's God of Mountains. Why do the Samihos have the god's cloth? Let's hurry and meet with the #bGod of Mountains#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Fox's Threat

string.name: parent
string.value: Legends of Hometown

When you went to go see the God of Mountains, he was deep in thought. According to him, a fox only becomes an evil Nine-Tailed Fox after a long period of training. Chil Nam seems to have been possessed by this Nine-Tailed Fox, but the God of Mountains cannot defeat the Nine-Tailed Fox with his current powers. So, he needs your help. \n\nThe God of Mountains says the #bgoblins#k in Black Mountain may know something about the Nine-Tailed Fox. Go see the goblins at the #bGoblin House near the Haunted House#k and find out how to defeat the Nine-Tailed Fox. In the meantime, the God of Mountains will find a way to break the Nine-Tailed Fox's spell.

Fortunately, the goblins shared their secret on how to defeat the Old Fox. The God of Mountains was relieved to hear the good news, and urged me to go tell Chil Sung about it. However, even if I told him how to defeat the Old Fox, is Chil Sung up to grab the Old Fox's tail?

string.name: name
string.value: What the Blue King Goblin Wants
The God of Mountains says the Goblins of Black Mountain are the only ones that know something about the Old Fox. Go see the #bBlue King Goblin#k at #bDokebi House#k near the Haunted House.

The Blue King Goblin says he will tell everything about the Old Fox only if I get him #b1 bottle#k of his favorite #brice wine#k. Let's go buy rice wine from the Folk Town. \n\n#i2022052##t2022052# #b#c2022052##k/1
The Blue King Goblin revealed where the Old Fox appears.

string.name: name
string.value: What the Yellow King Goblin Wants
The God of Mountains says the Goblins of Black Mountain are the only ones that know something about the Old Fox. Go see the #bYellow King Goblin#k at #bDokebi House#k near the Haunted House.

The Yellow King Goblin says he will tell everything about the Old Fox only if I get him #b1 plate#k of his favorite #broasted pork#k. Let's go buy roasted pork from the Folk Town. #k \n\n#i2022050##t2022050# #b#c2022050##k/1
The Yellow King Goblin revealed the spell the Old Fox uses.

string.name: name
string.value: What the Green King Goblin Wants
The God of Mountains says the Goblins of Black Mountain are the only ones that know something about the Old Fox. Go see the #bGreen King Goblin#k at #bDokebi House#k near the Haunted House.

The Green King Goblin says he will tell everything about the Old Fox only if I get him #b1 plate#k of his favorite #bbuckwheat jelly#k. Let's go buy buckwheat jelly from the Folk Town. \n\n#i2022051##t2022051# #b#c2022051##k/1
The Green King Goblin revealed how to retrieve a soul from the Old Fox.

string.name: name
string.value: Retrieve a Soul

string.name: parent
string.value: Legends of Hometown

Chil Sung was thrilled to hear how to retrieve Chil Nam's soul from the Old Fox, but soon became sullen. He says he doesn't have the nerve or strength to get the Old Fox's tail. Let's help Chil Sung and hunt down the #rOld Fox#k and bring back the #bOld Fox's Tail#k! 

Old Fox #r#a36471##k 
#i4031793##t4031793# #b#c4031793##k/1
Tickled Chil Nam's nose with the end of the Old Fox's Tail, and after sniffling a bit, Chil Nam suddenly returned to his old self.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Love Affair with Seal Meat
#b#p2071007##k says she has a special favor to ask. I should go to #b#m222000000##k.

#b#p2071007##k says she used to love eating #t04000166#. Even #b#p2071007##k's husband knows how much she loves #t04000166# and would occasionally buy it for her. The problem is that since recently, #b#p2071007##k says she's been liking #b#t04000157##k more. I should help out #b#p2071007##k, who always has to get #b#t04000157##k secretly behind her husband's back.\n\n#i04000157##t04000157# #b#c04000157#/15
#b#p2071007##k laughed with such excitement. It felt good to know that my efforts were not in vain.

string.name: name
string.value: Kumo's Request
I'd better go see #p2081001# at #m240000000#.

I ran into #p2081001# at #m240000000#. #p2081001# seemed concerned by the fact that the egg he's taking care of is about to be hatched, and is constantly moving, in danger of dropping any minute. He wanted to make a supporting block to fully support the egg, and asked me for help. I better start gathering up #b48 #t4000236#s#k and #b28 #t4000237#s#k.

#i4000236##t4000236# #b#c4000236##k / 48
#i4000237##t4000237# #b#c4000237##k / 28
As requested by #p2081001#, I gathered up 48 #t4000236#s and 28 #t4000237#s for him. #p2081001# was concerned about building a sturdy support block for the egg, and has started doing so.

string.name: name
string.value: Yaku's Request
I'd better go see #p2081003# at #m240000000#.

#p2081003#, who takes great care of the egg at Leafre, desires to beautifully decorate the nest. She seemed excited by the prospect of the baby dragon hatching out of the egg and seeing the beautiful nest for the very first time, and asked me if I could gather up #b50 #t4000238#s#k and #b30 #t4000239#s#k to help her decorate the nest.

#i4000238##t4000238# #b#c4000238##k / 50
#i4000239##t4000239# #b#c4000239##k / 30
As requested by #p2081003#, I gathered up 50 #t4000238#s and 30 #t4000239#s. #p2081003# went to work immediately, decorating the nest with soft, sparkling feathers.

string.name: name
string.value: Pam's Request
I'd better go see #p2081004# at #m240000000#.

I ran into #p2081004#, who's responsible for singing for the egg at #m240000000#. #p2081004# liked to sing, but was also interested in playing instruments, and wanted to make a big flute. In order to do so, she asked that I gather up #b50 #t4000231#s
I gave Pam 50 #t4000231#s. Pam seemed excited by the prospect of making a huge pan flute out of those small pan flutes and eventually play beautiful music for the eggs.

string.name: name
string.value: Hero's Mark

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Hero
I hear #b#p2081001##k of Leafre is curious about someone's whereabouts

#b#p2081001##k in Leafre was wondering about the whereabouts of the heroic knight that rescued him a long time ago. His name is #b#p2081007##k... So I promised #b#p2081001##k to find the knight that disappeared into the Dragon's Forest.
I was able to find #b#p2081007##k, the man responsible for saving Kumo from the monsters, at Wyvern Canyon.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Squad's Mission

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Hero
I think I hear someone's groaning somewhere in Dragon's Canyon. Sounds like someone's injured...

I ran into #b#p2081007##k, who was badly injured on the ground at Dragon's Canyon. Raul explained to me about his mission, and asked if I could finish it for him. The mission is to bring back #b#t4001094##k safely, which Horntail kidnapped, back to its nest. He says If I defeat Horntail and bring #b#t4001094##k back to its nest, I will be able to meet someone...

I defeated Horntail and returned #b#t4001094##k back to its nest as #b#p2081007##k, the Dragon Squad leader. Then I saw #b#p2081008##k hatch from the egg. Will the baby dragon survive on its own in Minar Forest?

string.name: name
string.value: The Last Hour of Horntail
I hear #b#p2081006##k, who's locked up in prison, has a request for me...
The incarcerated #b#p2081006##k wanted me to kill Horntail in revenge for Nine Spirit and the Dragon Squad and bring peace in Minar Forest.\n\nKill Horntail #r#a37071##k
I killed Horntail as #b#p2081006##k requested, but will this really bring peace in Minar Forest?

string.name: name
string.value: Getting Advice from Grendel the Really Old 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Sacred Barrier of the Forest

The grand magician of #m101000000#, #p1032001# , gave me a letter with the solution to take back to #b#p2081000##k and also told me to gather materials to strengthen the forest's barrier .

#i4000232##t4000232# #b#c4000232##k / 5
#i4000233##t4000233# #b#c4000233##k / 5
#i4000234##t4000234# #b#c4000234##k / 5

#i4031410##t4031410# #b#c4031410##k / 1
As requested by #p1032001#, I gathered up 5 each of #t4000232#, #t4000233#, and #t4000234#, along with #t4031410#, and took it to Tatamo.

string.name: name
string.value: A New Force Emerging
#b#p2081000##k of #b#m240000000##k seemed to be very concerned about something. What must that be? I better go talk to Chief Tatamo.

#p2081000# said there's a new force that will affect all of Maple World, and seemed unsure whether to welcome them or watch out for them. I'll have to go #b#m100030000##k to find out exactly who they are...

There's a huge wooden entryway leading into #m100030000# which I'd never seen before. It almost looks like an entryway to a fortress... I should try talking to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of me. I remember him telling me that a #bpirate #p1072008##k fort is being built here. It looks nearly complete...

string.name: name
string.value: The Wanderer's Whereabouts 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man
Isa the station guide at Orbis Station informs you that the strange man was heading to Tera Forest, located east of Minar Forest. Will you be able to find this foreign place called Tera Forest?
You found the entrance to Tera Forest by searching the outskirts of east Minar Forest. There, you met the strange man you were searching for, Andy.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #bFind Tera Forest

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to the 'Andy the Time Traveler' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Andy the Time Traveler

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man
Andy the Time Traveler has asked you to help him find the Pocket Watch, the key to the Time Gate, which he's lost in Minar Forest.
The Pocket Watch has chosen you as the new Time Traveler. You begin to wonder what you've got yourself into.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 #Wbasic# #i4001393:# #t4001393:# 1 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest Can proceed to the 'Time Traveler's Pocket Watch' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your first time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler informs you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before you can travel through time. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the first test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and have earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to Average Town in the year 2021. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to 'The First Clue' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The First Clue

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day
Andy has a request.
Year 2021. You must go through trash cans, find the clue that Andy needs, and bring it to him.

You teleported to the year 2021, found a piece of paper that appeared to be the clue, and took it to Andy. Unfortunately, that was not what Andy was looking for. Will your time travel end in failure? Go back to year 2021.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to the 'Dangerous Slime' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Dangerous Slimes

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day

The year is 2021. Eliminate 50 Slimes that are threatening the boy and another 50 Slimes that are threatening the girl. Then collect 30 dropped items from each group of Slimes to prevent the Slimes from reviving and report back to the Brainy Boy.
You worked hard to eliminate so many Slimes, but the population of the Slimes has not gotten any smaller. Where are these monsters coming from?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to 'The Crying Girl's Sketchbook' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Crying Girl's Sketchbook

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day
Find Loose-Leaf Pages from the Sketchbook the Slimes ate and return it to the Crying Girl.\r\n
You have collected the Loose-Leaf Pages from the Sketchbook and returned them to the Girl. However, the girl seemed to be even more saddened by the pages that were chewed up by the Slimes.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to 'The Boy and the Girl' quest Can proceed to 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Boy and the Girl

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2021- Just Another Day

The Brainy Boy swore that he would find more Loose-Leaf Pages from the Crying Girl's Sketchbook, including her drawing of a Robot. This sounds like something Andy mentioned. Perhaps you should tell him about this.
When Andy heard the story about the kids, said it was a useful piece of information and that you should prepare yourself for your next time travel.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your second time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Next the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your second time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the second test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 99,190 Can proceed to 'The Hidden Truth about the Past' quest Can proceed to the 'Policeman in Danger' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Hidden Truth about the Past

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
Andy the Time Traveler has requested that you travel to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 to investigate and if possible, destroy the giant robot, if it exists.
You traveled to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 as Andy the Time Traveler has requested, during which time you spotted a giant robot and destroyed it as instructed.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 106,900 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Policeman in Danger

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 wants you to help him eliminate some monsters that have been taking over the harbor. Specifically, 50 Overlord A and 40 Overlord B monsters.
The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 asked you to help him eliminate some monsters, so you eliminated Overlord A and Overlord B monsters.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 106,900 Can proceed to 'The Shelter Key' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Temporary Relief

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2099- The Harbor
When you meet Captain Edmond in 2099, he asks you bring him 20 Overlord A Radar Devices and 40 Overlord B Radar Devices to temporarily stop the monsters at the harbor.
When you met Captain Edmond in 2099, he complained that he didn't approve of the monsters that overtook the harbor. He then asked that you bring him their radar devices, which you did.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 106,900 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Time Traveler's Pocket Watch

In order to operate the Time Gate that leads to Neo City, you'll need the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch. They say that you can obtain the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch by fulfilling Andy the Time Traveler's request...

In order to operate the Time Gate that leads to Neo City, you'll need the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch. They say that you can obtain the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch by fulfilling Andy the Time Traveler's request...\r\n#rCan be completed once a day#k
You obtained the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch, which is needed to operate the Time Gate that leads to Neo City, by fulfilling Andy the Time Traveler's request...\r\n#rCan be completed once a day#k

string.name: name
string.value: Identity of the Missile

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing
Andy the Time Traveler has asked you to travel to the year 2215 to investigate the Bombed City Center and destroy the A.I. missile known as Dunas.

Andy the Time Traveler asked you to travel to the year 2215 to investigate the Bombed City Center and destroy the A.I. missile known as Dunas. To your surprised, you discovered that Dunas was an android missile that closely resembled a human. You may have succeeded in destroying Dunas, but the Bombed City Center doesn't appear to be restorable.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 106,900 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Survivor Search

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

May was happy that you were able to reduce the population of the noisy Robbies, but was also concerned that she may be the only survivor left. She asks you to investigate the area where the missile landed and search for survivors.

You have searched the area all the way to the location where the missile landed, as May requested. Fortunately, you were able to find a male survivor named Bao. How is it that he doesn't even have a tiny scratch on him?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 106,900 Can proceed to 'The Dangerous Android' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Dangerous Android

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

May was right. When you went into the City Center, you found another survivor, Bao. Bao could not move an inch because he was so afraid of Iruvatas and asked that you help him. He appears to be a big guy, but really, he's just a softie inside.
You defeated Iruvatas that were scaring Bao. Bao thanked you for your help. What a softie.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 106,900 Can proceed to 'The Wreckage of the Missile' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Wreckage of the Missile

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

Bao says that the Iruvatas and Robbies seem to come from the place the missile landed and suggests you search around there. How did he know you were looking for something? He seemed a little dull and slow, but perhaps he actually has a perceptive side. Anyway, investigate and report your findings to Andy.

Bao said that the Iruvatas and Robbies seemed to come from the area the missile landed and suggested you search there. You then defeated Dunas the missile android in the bombed City Center and delivered the Time Sand you acquired to Andy.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your fourth time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Next the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your fourth time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the fourth test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the ruins of the city in year 2216. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Central Robot Aufheben' quest Can proceed to the 'Disturbing the Army of Robots' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Central Robot Aufheben

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216 - The Ruins

Andy has requested that you travel to the ruins of the city in the year 2216 and defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controls all electronic devices in the city. Andy says if Dunas was an android, it is very likely that Aufheben is also an android.

Andy requested that you travel to the ruins of the city in the year 2216 and defeat Aufheben, the central robot that controlled all electronic devices in the city. As suspected, Aufheben was an android. The battle between humans and robots seems interminable.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Disturbing the Army of Robots

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins

You have traveled to the year 2216 on your fourth time travel. Thanks to Ken, who assumes you are from the support unit, you must eliminate monsters. Things keep coming up and hindering you from doing what you're here to do. Keep in mind that you are here for a reason.

You traveled to the year 2216 on your fourth time travel. Thanks to Ken, who just assumed that you were from the support unit, you had to eliminate monsters. Conditions in the city appear to be deteriorating.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Isabella's Search' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Isabella's Search

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins

Ken, who you met in the ruins of the city in the year 2216, requests that you investigate the eastern regions where he received a rescue signal. You must hurry and find the person who he suspects to be a teenage female. Begin your search right away.

Ken, whom you met in the ruins of the city in year 2216, requested that you investigate the eastern regions where he received a rescue signal. You found a teenage female who appeared to be passed out from exhaustion. Fortunately, she was conscious when you talked to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'What was That I Saw?' quest Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: What Was That I Saw?

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2216- The Ruins

When she regained consciousness, Isabella kept rambling nonsense about how she saw an angel to the east, where the high rise collapsed. An angel? Is she insane? The only way to confirm that is to go over and see for yourself. You may even find a Time Sand.
When she regained consciousness, Isabella kept rambling nonsense about how she saw an angel. The only way to confirm that was to go over and see for yourself. You did, and even found a Time Sand.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2230- Imminent Collapse!
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your fifth time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your fifth time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the fifth test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the dangerous towers of the year 2230. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to 'The New and Improved, Oberon' quest Can proceed to the 'Defeat the Mavericks' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The New and Improved, Oberon

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2230- Imminent Collapse!

Andy says, based on the findings from the previous time travels, it is likely that the Fifth Time Sand is in the year 2230. He wants you to defeat Oberon, an android even more advanced than Aufheben, and bring back the Time Sand.
As Andy suspected, Oberon had the Fifth Time Sand. You have successfully defeated Oberon and found the Fifth Time Sand in the dangerous tower in the year 2230.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat the Mavericks

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2230- Imminent Collapse!
Hoya, the boy you met at the lobby of the dangerous tower in the year 2230, has asked you to eliminate the pesky Mavericks and report it to Nalo.

Hoya, the boy you met at the lobby of the dangerous tower in the year 2230, asked you to eliminate some pesky Mavericks. You did so and reported it to Nalo at the top of the tower. Nalo seemed concerned about Hoya's immature and irresponsible actions.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 111,300 Can proceed to the 'Nex the Time Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2503- From the Sky
Andy the Time Traveler has something to tell you before you go time traveling for the sixth time.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your sixth time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the sixth test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the Air Battleship of the year 2503. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 100,000 Can proceed to the 'Nibelung's Song' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Nibelung's Song

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2503- From the Sky
In the end, Andy says the answer is in the year 2503, where he's from. He wants you to travel to the year 2503 to destroy Nibelung and report it to Ashura. Will this solve the problem?
You destroyed Nibelung and reported that to Ashura. She showed her gratitude and wished for peaceful days in the future.

string.name: name
string.value: The Dragon Rider's Identity 2
Learn about the strange things that have been happening in Leafre from #bChief Tatamo#k.
Go into #bThe Forest That Disappeared#k in Minar Forest and investigate the whereabouts of the Dragon Rider.
You discovered the identity of the Dragon Rider from #bMatada#k, the Halflinger Adventurer.

string.name: name
string.value: Towards the Sky 1
In order to chase the Dragon Rider, you're going to need to learn to fly... Discover the secret to flight from Matada, the Halflinger Adventurer.
Bring Matada the items he needs so that he can teach you how to fly.
You brought #bMatada#k the items that he wanted.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 13,000 Can proceed to the 'Towards the Sky 2' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Towards the Sky 2
Will you now be able to fly? Only one more item is required to fly...
Go to #bChief Tatamo#k in Leafre and bring back a Dragon Moss Extract.
You learned the #bSoaring#k skill and are able to fly now.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Can proceed to the 'Tears of Repentance' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Dragonoir's Horn
Chief Tatamo has one more thing to ask you...
Chief Tatamo has asked that you defeat the Dragon Rider and bring back the Dragon's horn.
You brought back the horn as Tatamo requested. You just hope that the injured animals get better soon...

string.name: name
string.value: Tears of Repentance
The identity of the Dragon Rider has been revealed. Talk to #b#p2085003##k who seems to have something to say.
That such a horrible thing could happen to one of the Halflingers... You kind of feel sorry for #p2085003#. Go to #bChief Tatamo#k and tell him his story.
You protected Leafre, though now that you know the whole story, you're not entirely sure the townspeople deserved it.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Document

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong's Teaching
Apparently at #b#m250000000##k, there's someone by the name of #b#p2091001##k who is the meditation instructor on the Masters, and he knows a way to become the Legendary Being.

#p2091001# stated that there's a scroll out there that should help one to become the Master. Unfortunately, the scroll that contains all the skills have been lost by #p2091001# once at #m250010501# around the Peach Farm, only to find it back later. Alas, the scroll is old and ragged, with ripped pages here and there. So, does that mean if I find the ripped #b#t4000299##k, then I can become a Master myself?\n\n#t4000299# #i4000299# #b#c4000299##k/10
I managed to find #t4000299#, and brought it back to #p2091001#. Unfortunately, #p2091001# had the look of great concern as he rummaged through #o5120506#...

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Spirited Cats

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong's Teaching

The document that contains all the mysterious skills necessary to become the Master. I found all the loose pages, but #b#p2091001##k looked concerned as he ran through #t4000299#. What's the problem now? When will he make me a Master? I better talk to #p2091001#.

After looking through #t4000299#, #p2091001# stated that there were cat footprints everywhere, and concluded that some street cats may have read the document and secretly obtained those skills. #p2091001# stressed that there should not be cats like those roaming around the forest, for they'll present danger to all of us. He asked that I eliminate #r20 #o6130209#s#k for him, and bring back #b5 #t4031433#s#k...

#t4031433# #b#c4031433##k/5 
#o6130209# #r#a38041##k

After eliminating #o6130209#s and bringing back #t4031433#s, #p2091001# commended me for the job well done, but refused to hand me #o5120506#. He mentioned that the document will allow me to obtain those skills, but learning the skills that way would make me no different than those street-cats-turned-monsters, and recommended that I train slowly but surely. That, and only that, he said, would allow me to become the true Master. Sigh... that all went for a naught, but he did say the right thing. When will I become the true Master?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Spirited Monkeys

string.name: parent
string.value: Protecting the Peach Farm
#b#p2091002##k, who owns a Peach Farm at #b#m250000000##k, seems to be concerned about something.
#p2091002# seemed wary of fighting off the #o6130207#s that have stolen his peaches, and wanted me to eliminate #r50 #o6130207#s#k for him.\n\n#o6130207# #r#a38051##k
I managed to eliminate the #o6130207#s that were stealing peaches. Hopefully the Peach Farm will be alright now...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Peach Seeds

string.name: parent
string.value: Protecting the Peach Farm
#b#p2091002##k, the owner of the Peach Farm and the resident pharmacist at #b#m250000000##k. He seemed concerned about something...

#p2091002# seemed relieved that the #o6130207#s have been eliminated, but was very much concerned over the fact that they have already eaten most of the peaches at the farm. He was worried that the crop will be very low. He asked me to collect #b100 more #t4000282#s#k. \n\n#i4000282##t4000282# #b#c4000282##k/100
I gathered up #t4000282#s for him. NOW #p2091002# seemed to breathe the sigh of relief.

string.name: name
string.value: Intruder - The Herb Farm 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Intruder - The Herb Farm
#b#p2092000##k, the owner of the herb farm at #b#m251000000##k, seemed to be in trouble...

#p2092000# seemed very concerned by the fact that a bunch of #b#o5120501#s#k have invaded the herb farm, pretending to be Ginsengs, and sucked up all the nutrients from the fertile soil. He wanted me to eliminate #r80 #o5120501#s#k so his Ginsengs can grow in his farm.\n\n#o5120501# #r#a38071##k
I managed to eliminate the #o5120501#s that have made life miserable for the Ginsengs at the herb farm in #p2092000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Intruder - The Herb Farm 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Intruder - The Herb Farm
Apparently, there was a thief at #p2092000#'s herb farm at #m251000000#...

#p2092000# claimed that someone had entered his herb farm and stole some of his herbs. #p2092000# seemed confident that it was the work of the red-nosed pirates, and asked me to defeat #r#o7130104##k and #r#o6130208##k.

#o7130104# #r#a38080##k 
#o6130208# #r#a38081##k
I was able to defeat #o6130208# and #o7130104#. Now that I have apprehended the suspects, #p2092000# should enjoy a nice, long sleep tonight.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Being's Scroll 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legendary Being's Scroll
#b#p2071010##k of #b#m222000000##k seems to be looking for me for a favor.

#p2071010# wanted me to return the #b#t4031430:##k that he had borrowed to the meditation instructor of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091001:##k, and borrow #b#t4031431##k from him instead. What? So #p2071010# was only a Master in the beginning level?
As requested by #p2071010#, I returned #t4031430# to #p2091001#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Being's Scroll 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legendary Being's Scroll
Through #p2071010#'s request, I returned #t4031430# to #b#p2091001##k of #b#m250000000##k. Now I better borrow #b#t4031431##k from him...
#p2091001# decided to lend me #t4031431:#, in exchange for #b#t4031432:##k. #t4031432# can be apparently found at #r#o5120506##k...\n\n#t4031432# #b#c4031432##k/1
I managed to give #p2091001# the #t4031432#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Being's Scroll 3

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legendary Being's Scroll
I gave #t4031432# to #b#p2091001##k of #b#m250000000##k. Hopefully now he'll lend me #t4031431#. I better go see #p2091001# right now.
#p2091001# met his end of the bargain and lent me #b#t4031431:##k. Now it's time for me to deliver it to #b#p2071010##k.

I gave #p2071010# the #t4031431#. Hopefully this will help #p2071010# become the Master at the intermediate level. Does that mean the intermediate-leveled Master can make not just the Gold Axe, but a Diamond-studded Axe?

string.name: name
string.value: The Outlaw in the Sea
#b#p2094000##k the bellflower is apparently searching for someone brave enough to rescue his King.

#p2094000# used to be the chamberlain of the King of Bellflowers. According to him, the Bellflowers never attacked humans and lived peacefully. That was before Lord Pirate kidnapped #bThe King of Bellflowers, #p2094001##k. The Bellflowers, worried that #p2094001# might be in danger, reluctantly followed the Lord Pirate's orders and started attacking humans instead. How cowardly of the Lord Pirate to disturb the peace of the Bellflowers by kidnapping their King!! That's despicable! I better defeat #r#o9300119##k and save the King of Bellflowers, #p2094001#! 

#o9300119# #r#a38131##k
#o9300105# #r#a38132##k
#o9300106# #r#a38133##k
I was able to defeat #o9300105# and save #p2094001#, the King of Bellflowers. Hopefully, with the king now saved, the Bellflowers will resume their peaceful lives.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Body & Physics Medicine 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Making Body & Physics Medicine
The physical trainer of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091000##k, seems to be in need of something...

#p2091000# seemed concerned about his students getting injured while training, and requested to the resident pharmacist #b#p2091002##k to make some medicine using a particular set of ingredients. Apparently, it requires #b10 #t4000281#s#k to make it, so I better start gathering up those items. \n\n#i4000281##t4000281# #b#c4000281##k/10
#p2091002# told me he'll make #t2022144# for the trainees engaging in physical training.

string.name: name
string.value: Making Mind & Heart Medicine1

string.name: parent
string.value: Making Mind & Heart Medicine
The mental trainer of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091001##k, seems to be in need of something.

#p2091001# seemed to be looking for a medicine that'll clear his head, and requested to the resident pharmacist #p2091002# for some #b#t2022142##k. Apparently, making #t2022142# requires #b8 #t4000283#s#k, so I better start gathering up the ingredients and give them to #b#p2091002##k. \n\n#i4000283##t4000283# #b#c4000283##k/8
#p2091002# told me to wait as he makes the #t2022142#.

string.name: name
string.value: Making Mind & Heart Medicine2

string.name: parent
string.value: Making Mind & Heart Medicine
Is #b#p2091002##k done with #t2022142#? I better go ask him.

I finally received #b#t4031553##k from #p2091002#. Yuck... it smells DISGUSTING. For #p2091001# to heat this up and drink it... wow, that's amazing. Anyway, I better give this to #b#p2091001##k immediately.
I gave #p2091001# #t2022142#, which smells so bad that a mere sniffing can certainly wake up an average person.

string.name: name
string.value: Making Mastery Medicine
The resident pharmacist of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091002##k, seems to be in the midst of creating a special medicine...

#p2091002#, who claims to be working on a medicine that'll take a regular person much closer to becoming a Master, requested that I gather up the ingredients for him. The ingredients required are: #b10 #t4000288#s#k, #b10 #t4000292#s, 10 #t4000294#s, 6 #t4000281#s, and 4 #t4000283#s#k...

#i4000288##t4000288# #b#c4000288##k/10 
#i4000292##t4000292# #b#c4000292##k/10 
#i4000294##t4000294# #b#c4000294##k/10 
#i4000281##t4000281# #b#c4000281##k/6 
#i4000283##t4000283# #b#c4000283##k/4
I managed to give #p2091002# all the required ingredients. It actually looks good enough to be a medicine to speed up the recovery from, say, fatigue, but will this really make us become Masters?

string.name: name
string.value: Swallow's Memory

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong Seeking Swallow
Doesn't #b#p2071006##k from #b#m222000000##k have something to do with #m250000000#? I visited the #p2071006#, but it seems to have a case of amnesia...

After mentioning #m250000000# to #p2071006#, it seems to regain a bit of memory, but wasn't sure exactly what that was, and told me that if it could have a bite out of #ba pink, sweet-smelling fruit#k, then the memory may come back. A pink, sweet-smelling fruit... hey, isn't that the Peach from #b#m250000000##k? I better get some #t2022116# for #p2071006#'s lost memory.\n\n#i2022116##t2022116# #b#c2022116##k/1
I gave #b#p2071006##k some #t2022116#. #p2071006# immediately dug into it... would its memories come back?

string.name: name
string.value: Tell Do Gong I Said Hi

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong Seeking Swallow
Will #b#p2071006##k of #b#m222000000##k regain its lost memory?

#p2071006# told me it now remembers everything that has to do with #b#m250000000##k and #b#p2091001##k, and felt saddened that it hadn't been able to repay #p2091001# for all the good things he did for it due to the injury, and wanted me to say HI to him for it.

I managed to relay #p2071006#'s greetings to #p2091001#. #p2091001# seemed shocked by #p2071006#'s injuries, and wished it a speedy recovery by asking me to deliver #b#p2091002##k to it. Okay, I better go back to #b#p2091002##k, now.
