string.value: Swallow's Medicine

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong Seeking Swallow
#p2091001# asked me to visit #b#p2091002##k as he prepares a #bmedicine#k for #p2071006#...

#p2091002# was more than willing to make the medicine for #p2071006#, but...I have to gather up the missing ingredients for it...

#i4000292##t4000292# #b#c4000292##k/20 
#i4000276##t4000276# #b#c4000276##k/50 
#i4000279##t4000279# #b#c4000279##k/50
#b#p2091002##k told me to wait for a second as he makes the medicine.

string.name: name
string.value: Swallow Isn't Alone

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong Seeking Swallow
Did #b#p2091002##k finish making the medicine for #p2071006#? I better go see #p2091002# right now...
#p2091002# seemed very concerned about #p2071006#'s injury, and worked hard to make #b#t4031555##k for it. Now all I need to do is deliver this medicine to #b#p2071006##k...

I managed to deliver the medicine to #p2071006#. People from all over the area seem to really go out of their way to help #p2071006# out. Hopefully it manages to feed off the love from those people and be able to fly high once more...!

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Sang's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Operation Eliminate Red-Nosed Pirates
The resident pharmacist of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091002##k, would like to request something. I wonder what that is...

#p2091002# talked to me about the dastardly ways the #rRed-Nosed Pirates#k used to steal some herbs by attacking the ships traveling from #m250000000# to #m251000000#. He asked me to join forces with #b#p2092001##k, who's in charge of freight on #b#m251000000##k and protect it.
#b#p2092001##k seems to be very experienced here. If I work well with him, defeating the disciples of Lord Pirate should not be too difficult.

string.name: name
string.value: An Evidence of Slaying the Captain

string.name: parent
string.value: Operation Eliminate Red-Nosed Pirates
#b#p2092001##k of #b#m251000000##k seems to be thinking of eliminating #rRed-Nosed Pirates#k... maybe there's something I can do to help. I better go see #p2092001#.

#p2092001# suspects that #r#o7130104##k of the Red-Nosed Pirates is responsible for this mess. In order to help him, you must find a way to eliminate #o7130104#. Eliminate #r#o9300118#, #o9300116#, and #o9300122##k, who are the underlings of Lord Pirate, and bring the #b#t4031436##k as proof. \n\n#i4031436##t4031436# #b#c4031436##k/20

Once I showed #p2092001# #t4031436#, he seemed very ecstatic. To see a grown man be so ecstatic makes me feel equally as good. Hopefully this will in turn transport those herbs safely to #m250000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Captain Lord Pirate
#b#p2092001##k, who's in charge of freight for #b#m251000000##k, seems to know something about #b#t4031438##k...

#p2092001# told me the location of #t4031551# is written in here, and wanted me to find #t4031551#. The box of #t4031551# is located at a relatively unknown place inside the Pirate Ship, at #bthe deck where the bellflowers are guarding#k, and I'll need #t4031437# to open it... I guess I'll have to get #b#t4031437##k first. In order to get #t4031437#, I'll have to enter the lair of Lord Pirate.\n\n#i4031551##t4031551# #b#c4031551##k/1
I opened the box of #t4031551#, took out all the treasures, and gave them to #p2092001#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Do's Book on Herbal Medicine
I heard there's a suspicious pharmacist by the name of #b#p2090004##k at #b#m250000000##k...

#p2090004# claimed that he's the true student of #p2091002# and is a great pharmacist himself. The more I look at this character, the more I feel suspicious about him... anyway, he told me he's been working on combining rare herbs found at #m250000000#, and asked me to grab some #r#o5120506#s#k and give him #b#t4000298##k along the way. \n\n#i4000298# #t4000298# #b#c4000298##k/25

Once I gave him all the #t4000298#s needed for this, #p2090004# gave me a book that he authored, #b#t4161030##k, and told me if I bring this book to him when I visit him, he'll make the medicine for me in a heartbeat. He may not seem trustworthy, but I don't see what's wrong with asking him for a medicine every once in a while...

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Test
The Head Physical Trainer of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091000##k, wants to test the students willing to become the Master...

#p2091000# told us the test consists of defeating both #r#o5120500# and #o6130203##k. #o5120500# and #o6130203# may be animals, but they have both been training hard to become Masters, so this may not be a easy fight...

#o5120500# #r#a38311##k 
#o6130203# #r#a38312##k

After successfully defeating #o5120500# and #o6130203#, I went back to #p2091000# to tell him the good news, only to listen to him tell me that I still have ways to go before becoming the true Master. What the, he's doing this again... is he really going to make me a Master, or what?

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's Test
The Head Mental Trainer of #b#m250000000##k, #b#p2091001##k, wants to test the students willing to become the Master...

To test out the skills the students have accumulated over time, #p2091001# told us to defeat both #r#o5120506##k and #r#o6130209##k. #o5120506# and #o6130209# have both mastered the art of casting spells, becoming close to Masters themselves. They may be hard to handle...

#o5120506# #r#a38321##k 
#o6130209# #r#a38322##k
After defeating 100 #o5120506#s and 100 #o6130209#s, #p2091001# told me I still have ways to go before becoming a true Master...

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Up the Lacking Ingredients
#b#p2092000##k of #b#m251000000##k told me he needed to tell me something.

#p2092000# has been short on herbs that should be sent to #p2091002# due to the dastardly ways of Lord Pirate. #p2092000# told me other herbs will be needed to replace the original herb, and asked me to gather up as much #b#t04000294##k as possible...\n\n#i4000294# #t4000294# #b#c4000294##k/1
I wound up giving #p2092000# #t04000294#.

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo's Account

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master
#bTae Soo#k, the kid in charge of protecting the Peach Farm of Mu Lung, apparently experienced something very strange...

While aimlessly walking around Sky Forest, Tae Soo was ambushed by a terrifying wild bear. Almost injured, Tae Soo completely froze up, not knowing what to do, until a helping hand arrived...by the form of bear. Tae Soo wanted to know what that bear was all about, and asked me to talk to #bNo Gong#k about him.
After hearing the story on the bear, No Gong had the heavy look of concern...

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Student

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

No Gong had a student who was struck by a Goblin's spell and started attacking innocent people around the neighborhood, and his name is #bTae Roon#k... the most intelligent student No Gong had ever taught. He is currently in exile out of this town, hoping for the spells to weaken as time goes by... \n\n No Gong suspected that since he helped Tae Soo out, the spell might be weakening the grip on him, and wanted me to confirm this with #bDo Gong#k.
Do Gong told me he'll do anything to help Tae Roon out. I better go talk to Do Gong once more.

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's Spell

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

Do Gong thinks Tae Roon had been weakening the grip the spell has on him through meditation, so he believes that with his own set of spells, the previously-unbreakable spell of Master Goblin might finally be broken. In order for Do Gong to do the spell, however, he'll need some items to work with... 

#i4000288# #t4000288# #b#c4000288##k/10 
#i4000298# #t4000298# #b#c4000298##k/10 
#i4000282# #t4000282# #b#c4000282##k/50
Do Gong started casting the spell... only to no avail. I better notify this to No Gong.

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat Tae Roon

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

Since Do Gong's spell was unfortunately interfered by Master Goblin, No Gong, with sadness in his eyes, told me the following... for the sake of Tae Roon, if he ever loses it again, he told me to take him down.\n\n#o7220000# #r#a38381##k

I went to go see No Gong again after defeating Tae Roon. No Gong believed that this would actually lighten the pressure Tae Roon might have felt with the spell controlling his every move. He said this with equal parts sadness and relief. \n\nNow that I have learned the truth about Tae Roon, I better go see #bTae Soo#k once more.

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo's Reward

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forgotten Master

After listening to Tae Roon's story, Tae Soo felt that since he owes Tae Roon a debt of gratitude, he wanted to give him a Peach from this farm. How can I successfully give Tae Soo's Peach to Tae Roon? Maybe there's a place to drop the Peach at the #bWild Bear Area#k...

A small note of thank you on the table... after handing Tae Soo the note, he flashed a big smile so genuine he must have felt like flying. This small piece of paper may well be the truth about Tae Roon.

string.name: name
string.value: Master Goblin's Questions

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat

Due to being tricked by Master Goblin, I wound up giving the Red Marble to Do Gong, poisoning him in the process. This isn't true... how can he lie to me? I better go back to see Master Goblin and ask him what's up!

Master Goblin offered to give me an #bantidote marble#k if I manage to answer all three of questions... but the true answers were NOWHERE to be found. He NEVER meant to give me the antidote!! What should I do? I better go see Do Gong now.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat

After I shared my unfortunate conversation with King Sage Cat, Do Gong told me that was to be expected. I guess I won't be able to obtain the Antidote Marble with the Sage Cat by negotiation. There's no other way now... I'll have to take it by force. I'll have to eliminate the #rKing Sage Cat#k and obtain the #bAntidote Marble#k! 

#o7220002# #r#a38441##k 
#i4031789# #t4031789# #b#c4031789##k/1.

After defeating the King Sage Cat, I grabbed the Antidote Marble and gave it to Do Gong. Fortunately, the marble was legit, and Do Gong seems to have been cured from poisoning. I better make it a habit of not being so gullible against others with suspect motives.

string.name: name
string.value: Learning the Culture of Ariant

#m260000000#, a town built in the middle of the desert. This town feels different from anything else you've ever experienced. Why are the people in #m260000000# so aloof? You hear #b#p2101005##k is researching at #m260000000#. Ask him for help.

#p2101005# tells you the people in #m260000000# are very guarded, and that the best way to break the ice is by drinking their water from the oasis. Then they'll accept you. You should head over to the #boasis near the palace#k.

You returned to #p2101005# after drinking the water and he told you the people of #m260000000# should accept you now. He also explained the basic happenings in #m260000000#. #m260000000# seems a bit complex. Be careful.

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun the Guard at the Palace
The palace of #m260000000# boasts some tight security, but you really want to go in. Talk to the head of palace security, #b#p2101004##k, for help.

#p2101004# flat out says he can't let you in the palace...unless you show your allegiance to the Sultan by paying mesos. #b2,000 mesos#k isn't much, but you hate dealing with corrupt officials like this.
After you gave #p2101004# 2,000 mesos, you received the pass to the palace. Even though you feel dirty about it, at least you can enter the palace now.

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Make-up Kit
#b#p2101007##k, the queen of #b#m260000000##k, apparently needs something.

Queen #p2101007#, whose sensitive fairy skin is acting up in the heat, demands that you slay some #rRoyal Cacti#k for their #b#t4000331#s#k, which are some of the most expensive makeup ingredients in the world. \n\n#i4000331# #t4000331# #b#c4000331##k/20
Once you got her the #t4000331#s, #p2101007# seemed quite satisfied. You know, for a fairy, she sure wears a lot of heavy makeup...

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Tea 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Queen's Tea
Famous for being frivolous to a fault, the queen of #b#m260000000##k is also known for her picky taste... You better go see #b#p2101007##k.

The queen #p2101007# is complaining that tea made with #t4000331#, considered the finest in this world, is not up to her taste. After some more complaining, she decides to drink a different tea, and asks you to get a #b#t4031577##k from #b#p2012012##k in #b#m200000000##k.
When you asked #p2012012# for #t4031577#, #p2012012# gave you an awkward, disapproving look.

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Tea 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Queen's Tea
#p2012012# says that she doesn't know who #p2101007# is and she can't just hand over a #t4031577#. But she'll give you a #t4031577# if you eliminate #r30 #o5200000#s#k. \n\n#o5200000# #r#a39041#
You eliminated 30 #o5200000#s and went back to #p2012012#.

string.name: name
string.value: Jiyur's Sister

string.name: parent
string.value: Jiyur's Sister
A little kid from #b#m260000000##k, #b#p2101001##k, has an older sister. Then why is #p2101001# standing by himself? You should ask him that.

#p2101001# has an older sister who used to tell him fun stories, but she was dragged into the castle by the guards one day. Concerned, #p2101001# wants you to tell his sister he misses her. \n\nWait, you forgot to ask him her name, though you have a hunch you'll recognize the #bsister of #p2101001##k when you see her.
#p2101001#'s storytelling sister is indeed #p2101008#.

string.name: name
string.value: A Letter From the Sister

string.name: parent
string.value: Jiyur's Sister
#p2101008#, the older sister of #p2101001#. #p2101001# will want to know how his sister is doing. You should deliver the letter she wrote to #b#p2101001##k.
#p2101001# seemed ecstatic to receive a letter from #p2101008#. He must have been concerned that the horrendous queen might really give her a hard time.

string.name: name
string.value: A Present for His Sister

string.name: parent
string.value: Jiyur's Sister

After receiving #p2101008#'s letter, #p2101001# wants to get her some #t4000331# to soothe her vocal chords. You should get #b#t4000331#s#k for #p2101001# and #p2101008#. \n\n#i4000331# #t4000331# #b#c4000331##k/20

When she received the #t4000331#s, #p2101008# let out a smile that was brighter than anything you've seen from her. These two really care for each other...and for them to be separated like this... The queen must be really heartless.

string.name: name
string.value: Dancer's Ringing
#b#p2101000##k, a dancer in #b#m260000000##k, seems to be looking for something to improve her set of moves...

#p2101000# is an ambitious dancer who desires to be the best. She came up with the idea of putting bells on her dress, to make her moves more dynamic. She feels that this will take her to stardom and wants you to get some #b#t4000328#s#k from #r#o2100105#s#k. \n\n#i4000328# #t4000328# #b#c4000328##k/20
You got #p2101000# some #t4000328#s. There's a rumor that if the #t4000328# rings, #o2100105#s will appear. The thing is, #p2101000# didn't seem afraid one bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Sword Dance

string.name: parent
string.value: Dancer Sword
#p2101000# is a dancer from #b#m260000000##k. She says she now needs something else. Better go see #b#p2101000##k.

#p2101000# believes she needs a new, fancier knife to really pull off her best move, the sword dance. She said the only person talented enough to make that kind of a sword in #m260000000# is #b#p2100001##k.
#p2101000# is a dancer who needs a new sword. You should meet up with #p2100001#...

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Fancy Sword

string.name: parent
string.value: Dancer Sword

#p2100001# of #m260000000# says he'll make the sword if you bring him the items to ornament it with: #b#t4031568#s#k, #b#t4000335#s#k, and #b5,000 mesos#k.

#i4031568# #t4031568# #b#c4031568##k/4 
#i4000335# #t4000335# #b#c4000335##k/30
You gathered the materials required to make the Dancer Sword, along with 5,000 mesos, and gave them all to #p2100001#. That should be enough for him to craft the sword.

string.name: name
string.value: Deliver the Fancy Sword

string.name: parent
string.value: Dancer Sword
You got #t4031569# from #p2100001#. Unlike other swords, this blade is dull, yet light and beautifully decorated. It should look good on #p2101000#.
After receiving the new sword, #p2101000# confidently declared she will one day perform in the castle. Will all this preparation, she should be accepted into the palace...

string.name: name
string.value: Schegerazade's Storybook

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller
As suggested by #p2040052#, #p2101008# put her stories together into a book. All you have to do now is give this to #b#p2040052##k, right? Okay off to #b#m222020000##k.
#p2040052# saw the pages that #p2101008# wrote and was clearly happy with it. Hopefully this book will allow #p2101008# to concentrate on her work... Better get back to #p2101008#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Little Prince that Loves Roses

string.name: parent
string.value: For the Little Prince

There was a strange boy in the middle of the Nihal Desert. Dressed differently from everyone else, with blonde hair that matched the color of the sand... Maybe you should head to #b#m260010500##k and see if he's all right.

The strange boy seemed concerned about his wilting rose. A rose? Who cares about a rose? You're more worried by the fact he's sitting in the middle of the desert. Maybe you should just get him some #b#t2022155#s#k for his roses. Maybe you'll be able to talk some sense into him after that. \n\n#i2022155# #t2022155# #b#c2022155##k/5
You gave the strange boy some #t2022155#s. He smiled in relief. Who is this kid anyway? What's he doing here?

string.name: name
string.value: The Little Prince that Loves the Stars

string.name: parent
string.value: For the Little Prince
You remember seeing a boy sitting in the middle of the desert with a rose. He must not have been thirsty, because he kept worrying about the rose. Is he doing alright?

The strange boy is gazing up at the sky, explaining sadly that he can't see a star. A star? What star is he looking at? You feel sad watching him, so you promise to get him #b#t4000333#s#k from #r#o2100108#s#k so he can see his star. \n\n#i4000333# #t4000333# #b#c4000333##k/20

After you gave that strange boy the #t4000333#s, he flashed that bright smile of his. He said he's from a different planet... what does he mean? Is he an alien? He's hard to understand, but seeing him smile like that made you feel less weird about him.

string.name: name
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince
The strange boy you saw in the middle of the Nihal Desert... apparently, #p2040052# of #b#m222020000##k knows something about him. Better go talk to #b#p2040052##k.

You tell #p2040052# about the boy you saw in Nihal Desert. He says the boy is from a folk tale and ended up here because of crack in dimensions at the Helios Tower. He said #p2101006# shouldn't be sitting in the desert by himself, so #p2040052# wants you to get back the book #p2101006# from him.
You found #p2101006# at Nihal Desert. Looking at the young boy with the sad expression, you didn't know what to say... You don't know what to do to straighten up this jumbled folk tale.

string.name: name
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Recovering the Book The Little Prince

You ask #p2101006# about the fox, but he didn't seem to know what you were talking about. You were at loss of what to do, until you realized something and promised to be #p2101006#'s friend. He smiled and gave you the book Little Prince. Now you should give this to #b#p2040052##k.

When you told #p2040052# you promised to be friends with #p2101006#, he let out a sigh of relief and thanked you for your efforts. Hopefully this straightened out the distorted part in the book #p2101006#. It feels weird being a part of a folk tale...

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?! 1

string.name: parent
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!
#b#p2101012##k lives outside #b#m260000000##k. Could he be part of the Sand Bandits, a secret organization in #m260000000#? Go find out.

#p2101012# confirms that he is indeed a member of the Sand Bandits. He needs some rope to help him steal the queen's treasure, and he wants to make it out of...#b#t4000329#s#k? Okay, whatever he says... Better defeat some #r#o2100102#s#k. \n\n#i4000329# #t4000329# #b#c4000329##k/30
You gave #p2101012# 30 #t4000329#s. It isn't much, but maybe it helped the Sand Bandits.

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?! 2

string.name: parent
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

#b#p2101012##k lives outside #b#m260000000##k. He claims to be a member of the Sand Bandits, the secret organization in #m260000000#. If he's a Sand Bandit, then he's helping the people. What can you do to aid him?
#p2101012# says he needs Poisoned Needles to steal a treasure from the queen, and asked you to collect #b#t4000330#s#k for him. \n\n#i4000330# #t4000330# #b#c4000330##k/50
You gave #p2101012# all the #t4000330#s required for the Poisoned Needles. The Sand Bandits require a lot of stuff to help everyone.

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?! 3

string.name: parent
string.value: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits?!

The Sand Bandits are a secret organization that works for the good of the people in #m260000000#. What can you do to help? Since #b#p2101012##k of #b#m260010400##k is a member of the Sand Bandits, you should go talk to him.

#p2101012# tells you it's time to steal the queen's treasure. First, you need to go to the #bpalace#k. Since you need to be discreet, you'll have to #buse the hidden portals in the castle#k to get to the queen's treasure chest and steal the treasure. Wait, then why did he want the Poisoned Needles and the rope? You're not even using them...\n\n#i4031578# #t4031578# #b#c4031578##k/1
Phew, you gave #p2101012# the ring from the queen's treasure chest. Isn't a task this important supposed to reserved for experienced members of the team?

string.name: name
string.value: Sirin Speaks

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits and Red Scorpions
Apparently #p2101012# of #b#m260010400##k is very angry. Why, though? Didn't you just get him a ring? What's going on?
#p2101012# said he hid the treasure behind a rock, and someone apparently stole it. He thinks the person responsible is #p2101000#, the dancer. Better go talk to her.
Seems like #p2101000# indeed took it, but...something doesn't feel right.

string.name: name
string.value: Screwing the Red Scorpions

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits and Red Scorpions

Like #p2101000# suggested, you went the Red Scorpions' hideout and stole their treasure. Now you have to drop it off at secret spots inside residents' houses. Sirin says houses marked with an X are associated with the Red Scorpions, so you should avoid those.
You left the treasures at homes marked with an O. That should be enough revenge against the Red Scorpions...

string.name: name
string.value: The Existence of the Secret Organization

#b#m260000000##k is famous for producing #t4011008#, but the people of #m260000000# aren't wealthy, and that's because of the greedy queen! Maybe #b#p2101000##k, who dances in the middle of town, knows a thing or two.

When you ask #p2101000# about the queen, she speaks passionately about the queen's lack of humanity and mentions #bthe Sand Bandits#k in the process. Apparently, the Sand Bandits steal the treasures of the greedy queen and give them to the struggling folks in this town. When you mention you want to join then, #p2101000# instructs you to find #ba wall with something written about Sand Bandit on its#k. Find the wall and then return to #b#p2101000##k.
You found the wall with clues about the Sand Bandits written on. A dagger, an iron hammer, a bow, an arrow? What does that mean?

string.name: name
string.value: The Man with a Bow

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Sejan
The word 'Bow' was written on the #p2103001#. You think it signifies person. Hmm, didn't you see someone carrying a bow in #m260000000#? You think his name may have been #p2101011#.

#p2101011# is indeed a member of the Sand Bandits. He seems reluctant to trust you and says you need to gather some food to prove you're not a spy. By food, he means #b#t4000325#s#k, #b#t2010000#s, and #t2010002#s#k.

#i2010000# #t2010000# #b#c2010000# / 10#k
#i2010002# #t2010002# #b#c2010002# / 10#k
#i4000325# #t4000325# #b#c4000325# / 50#k
When you gave #p2101011# the food, he told you that you'll have to do more for #m260000000# to earn his trust. Fine. Talk to #p2101011# again and see what else you can do.

string.name: name
string.value: Sejan's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Sejan

Since you brought the food, Sejan says you have to distribute it too. Hide the food in safe spots in the houses of innocent people in town. You can tell who owns a house by the mark on the door, then click around the house to find a good spot for the food.
You delivered the food to the people of Ariant, as requested. Sejan still doesn't seem to fully trust you.

string.name: name
string.value: Ardin's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Ardin
After eliminating both the #o2100106#s and #o2100107#s, you reported it to #p2101003#, who seemed shocked. Hopefully he'll give you his recommendation now.

string.name: name
string.value: Eleska's Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Eleska

You didn't mention a word about the Sand Bandits, yet for some reason, #p2101008# tells you exactly where the treasure storage room is. A hidden path underneath an unlit lamp... now all you have to do is steal #b#t4031574##k, right?\n\n#i4031574# #t4031574# #b#c4031574#/1#k
You gave Eleska the Skyloam. Eleska seemed stunned... Maybe she is starting to accept you.

string.name: name
string.value: Eleska's Sand Bandits

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Eleska
You passed all the tests #p2101002# had for you. Maybe you can finally become a member of the Sand Bandits. You should talk to #p2101002# about this.

#p2101002# told me the key to being a Sand Bandit is hating the vile deeds of the queen, but not letting it show, and instead biding your time for the right moment to strike. Patience, in other words. Patience, a trait also needed when refining ores. So Eleska requested that you make #b2 #t4011008#s#k. \n\n#i4011008# #t4011008# #b#c4011008#/2

After receiving the #t4011008#s, #p2101002# told you that you had enough patience to be a Sand Bandit. Now you just have to pass the tests of the other members. Hmm, the wall also mentioned a bow and an iron hammer.

string.name: name
string.value: The True Identity of Sand Bandits
You have passed all the tests, and you have heard from each member of the Sand Bandits that they accept you. Now you should find their secret headquarters.

The captain of the Sand Bandits, #b#p2101010##k, tells you a story about the queen of #m260000000#. He then requests that you look around #m260000000# and decide if you really want to join the Sand Bandits.
You are finally member of the Sand Bandits, thanks to #p2101010#. As a member, your job is to do your best for the people of #m260000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: First Mission

string.name: parent
string.value: First Mission of Sand Bandits
The Sand Bandits are here for the residents of #m260000000#. Now that you are a member, you should go get your first mission! Talk to #b#p2101010##k.

#p2101010# says he wants to steal an expensive order of silk that the queen is buying and use it to pay for food for the people. The plan is for someone to transform into the guard from the palace to trick the merchant into giving up the silk! But first, you need to get a piece of #b#p2101004#'s hair#k. \n\n#i4031570# #t4031570# #b#c4031570# /#k1#k
You gave #p2101010# a piece of #p2101004#'s hair, er, beard. Now you just have to wait for the potion to be completed...

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun's Hair
You promised #p2101010# to get a strand of #p2101004#'s hair, but how are you going to manage that? Better go see #b#p2101004##k.

#p2101004# vehemently refuses to part with even a single strand of his hair, but promises to give you a piece from his beard...if you give him #b1 #t4010007##k.\n\n#i4010007# #t4010007# #b#c4010007#/1#k
You gave #p2101004# the #t4010007# and got a piece of his beard in return. It's not head hair, but...it's close. Better go see #p2101010#.

string.name: name
string.value: A Proper Reward for a Good Deed

You got bamboozled by a Red Scorpion, thinking you were helping the Sand Bandits. Good thing you found out before it went on for too long. To compensate, you stole some of their treasure and passed them out. You feel great, but for some reason, #bSirin#k still wants to talk to you about it.
Sirin says you've more than made up for accidentally helping the Red Scorpions with your other good deeds. She says you should look for some #bcompensation#k. Compensation? Who's going to pay you?
You took a bit of treasure from the Red Scorpion's treasure chest. This is more than enough compensation.

string.name: name
string.value: Dealing with Tigun

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search for His Sister

You feel bad for #p2101001#. He really wanted to get in the palace... Maybe you can convince #b#p2101004##k to let him in. A fine of #b50000 mesos#k... Sigh, you should pay it off for #p2101001#.\n\n#b50000 mesos#k
#p2101001# still wasn't able to meet his sister but at least they can send letters to each other. But, #p2101004#! That delivery fee was a ridiculous!

string.name: name
string.value: The Bounty Hunt

string.name: parent
string.value: The Desert Bounty
#b#p2101000##k of #b#m260000000##k has heard a rumor...

#r#o3220001##k, the cactus monster, is threatening the desert! The #bSand Bandits#k have put a bounty on #o3220001#'s head. The Sand Bandits? When asked, #p2101000# suggests asking #bthe leader of the Sand Bandits#k...

You met the leader of the Sand Bandits, #p2101010#. #p2101010# says that the Sand Bandits have put a bounty on #o3220001#, but there is a problem. Some people worship #o3220001# as the guardian deity of the desert. He says the first thing to do is to convince #p2100001#, the spokesman for the people who worship him.

string.name: name
string.value: Convince Muhamad

string.name: parent
string.value: The Desert Bounty

Go talk to #p2100001#. He says to shush about the nonsense of #o3220001# being a monster. It will take more than words to convince him. Perhaps #b1 bottle of the #t4011008##k that #p2100001# likes might help the conversation. \n\n#i4011008##t4011008# #b#c4011008#/1
You have successfully convinced #p2100001#! He is infamous for being stubborn... Sweet! Report to #p2101010#.

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat Deo

string.name: parent
string.value: The Desert Bounty
You've managed to convince #p2100001# somehow. Go report to #p2101010#.

You report that #p2100001# has been convinced. #p2101010# grins, nods, and then suggests that you defeat #r#o3220001##k. Hmm, now he wants you to defeat a monster? Sigh...but don't forget that there is a bounty. That should motivate you a little. \n\n#k#o3220001# #r#a39541##k

You defeated #o3220001# and told #p2101010#. #p2101010# laughed heartily and said you did well. Huh? Is that it? What happened to the bounty? #p2101010# said the bounty didn't include members of the Sand Bandits. No way!

string.name: name
string.value: Kino Konoko's Concern
#b#p9110002##k is responsible for taking care of a small altar over in Mushroom Shrine. She seems to be concerned about something...

Tired of cleaning up after those pesky #o9400000#s, #p9110002# wants me to gather #b100 #t4000064#s#k. I'd hate to see the #m800000000# covered in filth, so I've decided to help her. Time to pluck some #t4000064#s!\n\n#t4000064# #b#c4000064#/100
I gave #p9110002# a whole bunch of #t4000064#s. It felt good seeing her being ecstatic over a bunch of #p9110002#s. Hopefully this will restore #m800000000#'s beauty...

string.name: name
string.value: Kino Konoko vs Fire Raccoon
#b#p9110002##k, who resides in the Mushroom Shrine, is having a bit of trouble with Fire Racoons. I should see if I can help!

Kino Konoko tells me that the food vendors and restaurants in #m800000000# are suffering from #b#o9400001#s#k attacking their places. I better help them out. I would not want to miss out on some great food around here! Now, where can I find #o9400001#?\n\n#o9400001# #r#a43011##k
I let #p9110002# know that I took care of 100 #o9400001#s. She was ecstatic, to say the least. Hopefully that'll keep the #m800000000# food from disappearing...

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Muffler 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#b#p9120001##k of #b#m800000000##k has an item she really would love to have. What must that be?

It turns out that the item #p9120001# wants to have is a muffler made out of #t4000066#. A muffler made out of Foxtails. Hmm...I don't get why she'd want to wear a muffler in such warm weather, but I did promise to get her #t4000066#s, She needs 100, so I'd better get started. So, that's #b100 #t4000066#s#k... \n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/100#k
I gave #p9120001# 100 #t4000066#s. Hmmm, but this isn't as much as I thought. Can she really make a muffler out of this?

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Muffler 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#b#p9120001##k, who wanted to make a #t4000066# muffler, haven't finished making it. I wonder what she's lacking...

#p9120001# wanted to make a muffler out of #t4000066#, so I gave her 100 #t4000066#s. Despite the work, #p9120001# flat-out insisted that she asked for 300 all along, and demanded that I get her 200 more. I didn't need to hear that from her, but I'll have to get her 200 more... #b200 more #t4000066#s#k? That's a lot!\n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/200
I gave #p9120001# 200 #t4000066#s. Hopefully this will do.

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Coat

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#p9120001# seemed to be dissatisfied with just having a #t4000066# muffler, and wants something more. What would that be...

It turns out #p9120001# wanted not just a #t4000066# muffler, but a #t4000066# coat. Seriously, why does she need a coat at #m800000000#... This defies anyone's logic, but oh well... How am I going to gather up #b400 #t4000066#s#k?\n\n #t4000066# #b#c4000066#/400
I gave #p9120001# 400 #t4000066#s. I understand her need for pretty things, but wearing a muffler AND a coat at #m800000000#? #p9120001#'s just weird.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Big Cloud Fox
The 'best-dressed' lady of #b#m800000000##k, #b#p9120001##k, seems to be perturbed at something...

I found #p9120001# enraged - it appears her newly-purchased fabric was destroyed by a pack of #o9400004#es. For someone as vain as she is, this is devastating. As a result, I promised her to eliminate #b80 #o9400004#es#k for her.The things I do for friends... \n\n#o9400004# #r#a43051##k
#p9120001# seemed thankful for me eliminating 100 #o9400004#es. She must have bought some new fabric already.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lantern at Mushroom Shrine
#b#p9120003##k, a proud resident of #b#m800000000##k, seems to be annoyed by something.

#p9120003# was indeed annoyed by something. She was disturbed that the #t4000222#s that are being used at #m800000000# is apparently stuck with ghosts. This isn't annoying; this is downright creepy. I better kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and get her some #b#t4000222#s#k, just the way #p9120003# said.

#o9400011# #r#a43061##k 
#t4000222# #b#c4000222#/50
I eliminated #o9400011# and got some #t4000222#s for use. The more I think about it, I think #o9400011# is much more of a dangerous presence than an unlit street at night.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Ghosts
#b#p9120003##k of #b#m800000000##k seems to have something to tell me. I wonder what it is...
#p9120003# told me I have a whole bunch of #o9400003#s around me. That's creepy, to say the least. I better kill off #b80 #o9400003#s#k right now.\n\n#o9400003# #r#a43071#
After letting #p9120003# know that I've killed 80 #o9400003#s, she tells me that there aren't any #o9400003#s hovering around me. Phew...

string.name: name
string.value: Water Goblin's Cucumber
#b#p9120003##k's farm, located at #b#m800000000##k, seems to have been robbed. What happened?

#p9120003# states that the only items stolen at her farm are the #b#t4000223#s#k, and she was very confident that it was the work of #b#o9400012##k. She asked me to eliminate 80 #o9400012#s and recover 40 #t4000223#s in the process. A monster that prefers to eat #t4000223#? Interesting, especially since most kids hate that

#o9400012# #r#a43081##k 
#t4000223# #b#c4000223#/40
After eliminating #o9400012#s and recovering a whole bunch of #t4000223#s, #p9120003# had the look of satisfaction on her face.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Blue Mushmom
#b#m800000000##k is apparently in deep trouble. I better go see #b#p9120003##k.

Apparently, out of numerous mushrooms that reside in #m800000000#, a few of them turned into mutants, ultimately becoming #b#o9400205##k. #p9120003# was worried that the town was going through a lot of trouble because of them, and wanted me to eliminate #o9400205#s. #o9400205#s are located at #b#m800010100##k. \n\n#o9400205# #r#a43091##k
I eliminated #o9400205#s as ordered and reported them to #p9120003#. Those mushrooms were indeed very hard to handle.

string.name: name
string.value: Rooney's Breaking News
#b#p9250052##k is apparently handing out flyers that contain the breaking news...
Just received a flyer from #b#p9250052##k. The flyer stated that Happyville is in a state of emergency, and for more details, I have to visit #p1022101#.
I asked #b#p1022101##k to inquire more on the stuff written on the flyer.

string.name: name
string.value: News Special Report
People are saying that there is shocking news on the front page of the Maple Herald. What could it be?

You were unable to buy the newspaper because it was already sold out. However, you were able to read from the newspaper clippings behind the sales clerk. They say that Santa Claus will not be coming to Maple World this year. Is it true that he's not coming to town because Maplers stopped believing in Santa Claus? There must be some other reason. #bRooney#k is from Happyville and should know about what's happening. You should go ask.
You wished Rooney a Merry Christmas! Now, you should ask about Santa Claus.

string.name: name
string.value: Disappeared Santa Encyclopedia
You should ask Rooney about the article on Santa Claus.

Rooney felt bad that most Maplers don't believe in Santa Claus anymore. She also mentioned that this is caused by the loss of #bSanta Encyclopedias#k in the town library. She asked that you gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias that the monsters have stolen. Remember, not only is it meaningful to gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias, but also something good will happen while searching for those books.

#t4161043# #b#c4161043##k/1 
#t4161038# #b#c4161038##k/1 
#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1 
#t4161040# #b#c4161040##k/1 
#t4161041# #b#c4161041##k/1 
#t4161042# #b#c4161042##k/1

Just like Rooney had mentioned, a lot of good things happened to you while searching for the 6 Santa Encyclopedias. Since you did all those good deeds, Santa is certainly coming to town. More importantly, Maplers will now believe in Santa Claus!

string.name: name
string.value: Santa Grandmother Finding

You've found Santa Encyclopedia No.2, regarding Santa's Family History. Santa Encyclopedia No.2 has stories about the lovely wife of Santa Claus, Mrs. Claus. You should visit her by tracing the information written in Santa Encyclopedia No.2.
Mrs. Claus was precisely at the location mentioned in the book. You asked Mrs. Claus about Santa Claus.
You asked Mrs. Claus about Santa Claus, but she pretended as if she didn't know who he was. How will you get her to warm up to you?

string.name: name
string.value: Common Sense Of Santa

You made a visit to Mrs. Claus wondering about Santa Claus's condition, but she wouldn't tell you anything. Maybe you should go find #bSanta Encyclopedia No.1#k, the one that contains the history of Santa Claus, and read up a bit first. Then you should go visit her again.
Thanks to #bSanta Encyclopedia No.1#k, she finally opened up and started talking to you.
Truth always prospers! You were able to discover the real reason why Santa Claus disappeared.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Creation Recipes

Mrs. Claus, who previously wouldn't open up about Santa Claus, finally started talking to you after realizing you had read up on Santa Claus. As you expected, there was another reason behind Santa Claus leaving.

Mrs. Claus told you about the importance of the Christmas Socks. However, she also said that making quality socks is not an easy task. The sock factory ceased its production due to a case of robbery, but she'll be able to make them again with a little bit of your help.\n\n#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1

You brought #bSanta Encyclopedia No.3#k to Mrs. Claus who was having a hard time remembering how to make Christmas Socks. But it all came back to her after reading the book. You should wait a while until she finds the frame for the socks.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Actual Creation Action
Mrs. Claus has finally discovered the frame for the socks. You should ask her again.

Mrs. Claus gladly lent you a frame necessary for making Christmas Socks. She also said that yarn with good flexibility is a must. These yarns seem to have been taken by the #bSnowman#k who is highly suspected as the culprit behind the robbery. You can make socks by collecting the yarn and attaching them to the sock frame.\n\n#t4220022# #b#c4220022##k/1
Finally, you made the Socks by getting the necessary amount of yarn. Of course, don't forget to thank Mrs. Claus who taught you the craft.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Hanging
You've successfully completed the Socks. Mrs. Claus thinks that Santa Claus will be satisfied with them. Now, you must hang the socks in a good location so that it will be seen easily by Santa Claus.

You've found a Christmas tree where you can hang the socks. This tree must be the one that Santa Claus used to visit whenever he was worried. Obviously, this is not a normal tree since it can talk! The tree tells you that doing good deeds will allow you to receive better gifts from Santa. You should go around town to see if there is anything you can do to help.\n\n#t4031885# #b#c4031885##k/4
You've helped the people in Happyville and also received a present from Santa Claus. Here's hoping that everyone will have a Merry Christmas!

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Cliff's Rudolph
There is an old man looking sad on the 2nd floor of center tower in Happyville. It must be hard to just pass him by, knowing that he is sad. Go find him and offer him some help.

#bCliff#k has been feeling lonely ever since Torr left to help Santa Claus. You will need to go to the highest point in town to take a picture of #bTorr#k pulling Santa's sleigh.\n\n#t4031881# #b#c4031881##k/1
What?! #bTorr#k is not in the sleigh formation. Rumor has it that there is a Reindeer crying around the corner of town. Could it be #bTorr#k?

string.name: name
string.value: Torr's Whereabouts

string.name: parent
string.value: Cliff's Rudolph
You took the picture as Cliff had requested, but Torr was not there! Cliff began to worry greatly about Torr. Let's listen to his unfinished story.

Cliff asked you to check if the reindeer crying around the corner of Happyville is Torr. And if it is, he asked you to #btell Torr#k that he will be waiting on the 2nd floor at the Center Tower of Happyville.
You've sent Torr back to lonely old man Cliff. It will be a warm and happy holiday, at least for those two.

string.name: name
string.value: Santa Cat's request

string.name: parent
string.value: Helping to Clean Chimney
#b#p9201030##k, who is planning on extensive chimney cleaning, needs some help. #b#p9201030##k should be somewhere around the Chimney in Happyville. You should find out.
You met Santa Kitty #b#p9201030##k in Happyville, who asked you to find Rina#b#p1010100##k in Henesys in order to borrow a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight to be used for cleaning the Chimney.
You've successfully borrowed a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight from Rina#p1010100#k in Henesys.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivery of Rina cleaning device

string.name: parent
string.value: Helping to Clean Chimney

You've successfully borrowed a Chimney Sweep and Flashlight from #p1010100#k. Let's take them to #b#p9201030##k in Happyville.

#t4031882# #b#c4031882##k/1 
#t4031883# #b#c4031883##k/1
You brought #b#p9201030##k a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight. He thanked you and asked for permission to clean the Chimney.

string.name: name
string.value: Warm Milk Delivery

string.name: parent
string.value: To sleep Icarus
Dalphs#b#9220005##k in Happyville has a favor to ask of you.
You met with Dalphs#b#p9220005##k in Happyville. He asked if you could bring a glass of warm milk to #bIcarus in Kerning City#.\n\n#t4031884# #b#c4031884##k/1
You delivered a glass of warm milk to Icarus#b#p1010100##k in Kerning City.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivery the word Thank

string.name: parent
string.value: To sleep Icarus
You delivered a glass of warm milk to #b#p1052106##k. Hope he can go to bed early from now on. You should tell #b#p9220005##k in Happyville about this delivery, as he was worried.
You told Dalphs#b#p9220005##k that the glass of warm milk was successfully delivered to Icarus.

string.name: name
string.value: Bicho's snowman
Bicho in Happyville looks too weak to make a snowman all by himself, but he is doing quite well so far. But it seems like he is looking for someone.
Bicho asked you to find the person who helped him make the snowman. He said that the person is somewhere in Maple World.\n\nHis friend's name is #b#Q4490##k
Due to Bicho's misunderstanding, you were not able to find the Mapler who had helped him earlier. Wait, Bicho is thinking of another name now? You should go visit him!

string.name: name
string.value: Clear the Rubbish
I should go see #b#p9270039##k in Singapore Airport. She needs to say something about our beautiful Singapore.

She asked me to clean up the streets of Singapore. As she works at the Singapore Airport, she sees lots of foreigners complaining that the city does not look the same as before. I should impress foreign visitors again by cleaning up the wastes.

#t4000366# #r#c4000366# / 20#k
#t4000367# #r#c4000367# / 20#k
I feel much better now that I did contribute myself in making Singapore even cleaner.

string.name: name
string.value: The secret of the past

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of the Ghost Ship
#b#p9270030##k in Boat Quay Town looks like he could use some help of mine. He seems very scared of something. Let's go find out.

#p9270030# told me this weird story about a ghost ship and ghosts along the coastline. Should I believe him? He is just a nameless wanderer in town, but he seemed to be serious about the story. Let's go and find out if he is telling me the truth. There should be #b#o9420509#s#k and #b#o9420510#s#k somewhere around Boat Quay Town, and I am about to eliminate them!

#o9420509# #r#a45101##k
#o9420510# #r#a45102##k
What a surprise! #p9270030# was telling me the truth! I should go see him again since I feel that there are more stories he wants to tell me!

string.name: name
string.value: Making the path to the sea

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of the Ghost Ship
#b#p9270030##k has more secrets to reveal! Let's go see him again!

#b#p9270030##k told me that he wishes to sail again with his crew. However, he isn't sure if he can go out to the sea like the old days because of the ghosts along the coastline. I really want to help him get his dream back by eliminating #b#o9420510#s and #o9420511#s#k.

#o9420510# #r#a45111##k
#o9420511# #r#a45112##k
I helped #p9270030#, but he is still worried about something. I think I should go see him again.

string.name: name
string.value: Entering Ulu City

string.name: parent
string.value: Savior of Ulu City

#b#p9270030##k seems even more anxious than usual lately. He's been mumbling something about an old city that's lost its glory because of people's selfishness? Hmm, perhaps this is worth investigating.
You have completed first step to becoming the savior of Ulu City and proven yourself to be a brave adventurer. #b#p9270044##k will instruct you on what to do next.

string.name: name
string.value: Pushing Forward in Ulu City

string.name: parent
string.value: Savior of Ulu City
You've proven that you have the training to save Ulu City. Next up, ask #b#o9420516##k how you can help his patrol squad.

Taking control of the area by yourself won't be easy, but an adventurer's got to do what an adventurer's got to do, right? Hunt #b100 #o9420517#s#k and #b100 #o9420516#s#k and retrieve #b100 #t4000432#s#k and #b100 #t4000431#s#k for #b#p9270044##k. 

#o9420517# #r#a45271##k 
#o9420516# #r#a45272##k 
#t4000431# #r#c4000431#/100#k 
#t4000432# #r#c4000432#/100#k
Perhaps you missed your true calling as a member of a patrol squad? Excellent work. You're halfway to saving Ulu City!

string.name: name
string.value: Ulu City Energy Thieves

string.name: parent
string.value: Savior of Ulu City
Monsters are sapping energy from Ulu City's power reserves and using them to power up other monsters. They must be stopped!

#b#o9420519#s#k are stealing Ulu City's energy and using it to strengthen other monsters. They must be stopped. Hunt #b100 #o9420519#s#k and confiscate #b100 #t4000434#s#k, which is that they're using to transfer the energy.

#o9420519# #r#a45281##k 
#t4000434# #r#c4000434#/100#k
The war over Ulu City is ostensibly over, but #b#p9270044##k doesn't think real victory can be achieved until #b#o9420520##k is defeated.

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Mallet
You've lost the tool you need to summon #b#o9420520##k. Maybe #b#p9270044##k will give you another one?
#b#p9270044##k wants you to hunt some monsters while he finds you another #bWrench#k.
Now you're ready to confront #b#o9420520##k! Be careful not to lose the #bMallet#k again.

string.name: name
string.value: Savior of Ulu City

string.name: parent
string.value: Savior of Ulu City
There's only one monster left to defeat before Ulu City is saved! Quickly now. If you take too longer, the monsters you've already defeated will come back to life!
You're so close to the end! Just defeat #b#o9420520##k, who Capt. Latanica brought to Ulu City. \n\n#o9420522# #r#a45301##k

You saved Ulu City and all the city's former residents finally returned home! You've learned an important moral from all of this: Treat nature with respect or she will show you her fury, and her fury gives you quite a headache.

string.name: name
string.value: Too Hot!

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
Boy... The Weather is hotter than ever!
#b#p9270061##k says that the villagers need 100 more of those #b#t4000465##k to cool themselves down. \n\n#t4000465# #r#c4000465#/100#k
The villagers are happy now to cool down with nice cool coconut juice! Cool refreshment was what exactly they needed.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 20,000 5,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'I am Bored!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Poor Blondie

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries
Blondie, the poor blonde Kitty has lost her fur due to the hot weather. There must be something that can be done for this poor little thing...
Blondie is now more precious than ever covered up with golden hair, and you have never seen #b#p9270060##k happier for his kitty.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 15,000 Able to proceed to 'Running out of Wigs!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Daddy's Birthday Party

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party

#b#p9270058##k's daddy is planning to invite 50 most close friends to his birthday party. #b#p9270058##k suggested an idea of giving them with rare gift at the party. What would be the perfect gift to all of the guests?

#b#p9270058##k thought of #b#t4000470##k as a special gift to all guests to her daddy's birthday party. She now needs #b50 #t4000470##k before the party begins. 

#o9420532# #r#a45541##k 
#t4000470# #r#c4000470#/50#k
#b#t4000470##k was a superb gift and every guests who came to birthday party of #b#p9270058##k's daddy were surprised at the unexpected gift and had a jolly time together.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 16,000 Able to proceed to 'Unexpected Guest' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Lam wants to see the world

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung
#b#p9270062##k loves his life in Kampung village, but it seems like he wants to see other parts of the world that he has never seen before.
#b#p9270062##k is super excited to travel outside of Kampung village, but first he needs plenty of #b#t4000475#s#k to go around the city. \n\n#t4000475# #r#c4000475#/100#k
Finally, all tickets have been collected for #b#p9270062##k. But someone must remind him there is much more to prepare before going on a long trip.

string.name: name
string.value: Educating Smart Pets (Pet Summon)
You have a very smart pet with you. Please take it to Bartos the pet instructor. With his guidance, the pet may do something different.
In order to request Bartos for help in teaching the evolving pet new movements, I'll need to bring him his favorite drink.
I gave Bartos the drink and taught the evolving pet. I can now order the pet to come right next to me. Type /petcome to have your pet come to you.

string.name: name
string.value: Educating Smart Pets (Speech by Itself)
You have a very smart pet with you. Please take it to Bartos the pet instructor. With his guidance, the pet may even start a conversation...
In order to request Bartos for help in teaching the evolving pet new language, I'll need to bring him his favorite drink. The drink can be obtained through merchants.
I gave Bartos a drink and taught the evolving pet. Apparently the pet may start the conversation at times...what would it say...?

string.name: name
string.value: Naomi's Invitation 1
#p9105002# seems to be holding a very fascinating event. I better go check it out.
#p9105002# gave me all the information on the newest event that she planned. I should talk to her again in a bit.
#p9105002# gave me an entrance ticket to participate in the event.

string.name: name
string.value: Naomi's Invitation 2
I better talk to #p9105002# again and hear more about the event.

#p9105002# explained to me in greater detail about the event that's taking place. It looks like I'll need to gather some #t4032056#s, bring them all to #p9105002#, and receive a special prize in return.

I gave #p9105002# some #t4032056#, and she gave me a present in return. I guess I can only enter this event once a day. Seriously, is there no way I can enter again today? Perhaps I could find a ticket elsewhere...

string.name: name
string.value: Chair King Medal
If you have #t3010172#, I'll give you Chair King medal.
Oh, you have the #t3010172#. I'll give you the Chair King Medal since you own a special chair.
Here is a Chair King Medal for you. Remember, in the next event, the Chair King Medal will go to someone who has a different chair.

string.name: name
string.value: Chair King Medal
If you have #t3010184#, I'll give you Chair King medal.
Oh, you have the #t3010184#. I'll give you the Chair King Medal since you own a special chair.
Here is a Chair King Medal for you. Remember, in the next event, the Chair King Medal will go to someone who has a different chair.

string.name: name
string.value: Chair King Medal
If you have #t3010169#, I'll give you Chair King medal.
Oh, you have the #t3010169#. I'll give you the Chair King Medal since you own a special chair.
Here is a Chair King Medal for you. Remember, in the next event, the Chair King Medal will go to someone who has a different chair.
