Solved Icebyrd Slimm's all Quiz.

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Discovery

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
I heard there's an adventurer over at the MesoGears underneath Bigger Ben. What mysteries does it hold? I should find out!

I spoke with the famous John Barricades' one-half of the world famous Barricade Bros. Treasure Hunting Co. He spoke to me about Subani, the legendary mage responsible for the Dark Scrolls throughout the Maple World. He believes there is something within the MesoGears that may be a treasure of his. I've agreed to help clear the way. I'll have to defeat #b50 Killa Bees, 30 Mighty Maple Eaters and 40 Fire Tusks#k so I can explore deeper into the MesoGears...
I cleared a path straight through the MesoGears, and now I can explore there in peace. When I'm ready, I can see John Barricade to continue with the next part of this adventure!

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Transgression

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
John Barricade is awaiting me at the Temple Hive! He's found something!

I spoke with John, and he's found a set of weird markings in the MesoGears that he can't decipher. He's mentioned that he'll need special crystals known as #bHyper Glyphs#k. I've agreed to snag #b50#k of them so he can decipher the markings. Electrophants...John thinks that the mechanism on their heads may have those Hyper Glyphs inside. I'd better be careful-I don't want to get shocked!
I got the #b50 Hyper Glyphs#k that John needed, and he's hard at work deciphering the markings. I should come back soon to see if he's finished!

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Deliverance

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
John has finished deciphering the markings! I need to get back to the Temple Hive now!

John and I spoke again, and something unforeseen happened. I'll have to track down #b25 MesoGears Map Pieces#k so he can put together the map! He mentioned the robots he "borrowed" for some assistance went all crazy, kept saying "#bI.AM.ROBOT#k" as they scurried into the Krakian Jungle...

Finally done! I took the pieces back to John, and he's going to start piecing the map together. However, he did come across a strange ring that passed on to me. If this was the first treasure, I wonder where the rest is...
There's a mysterious traveler in New Leaf City-he doesn't look like he's from anywhere around here. I should ask him what's going on. It could be interesting...

I spoke with Elpam Gorlab, and he's a traveler from Versal, the mirror-world of MapleStory. He traveled here to observe us and our celebration, but due to the appearance of Amoria, he was thrown off-course and landed in New Leaf City. I've agreed to help get him home by collecting #b30 Elpam Magnets#k. He's mentioned that the only creatures that have them here are the Fire Tusks. I'll have to head to Bigger Ben and track them down. I didn't know that there was a mirror-world...I wonder if I have a double there...
I got the #b30 Elpam Magnets#k and returned them to Elpam. In return, he gave me an Elpam Elixir, something that's sure to help me. It looks like he needs more help though...
Elpam has adjusted his compass, but he still needs my help. I should travel back and see what he needs!

I went back to Elpam for more information, and he's explained that while he was able to adjust the compass, he needs to head back to the moment of his travel glitch to get back to his home safely. I have to hunt down #b60 Temporal Fragments#k and hand them over. That's a full minute and the perfect amount of time for him to travel back. The Electrophant monsters should have them, since they tend to keep time. HA!
I got all #b60 Temporal Fragments#k and returned them to Elpam. In return, he's given me a very nice prize he found floating in the rift...!
Icebyrd looks like he needs my help. I'd better get over to New Leaf City and see him!

I spoke with Icebyrd, and he was glad to see me. He's been trying to build the new areas, but the Gryphons have been wreaking havoc on the construction crews. If that wasn't enough, those pesky Boomers are also attacking the machines. I've agreed to help by taking out #b100 Gryphons#k (located in the Highlands) and #bBoomers#k for #b150 #t4000391##k (located in the Badlands) to show them that this city is off-limits!

Man, what a day. I de-clawed the Gryphons and defused the Boomers. Now the city can continue building in peace. Icebyrd said that they may act up again, so I should come back to see if they've been rowdy...

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz - END

string.name: parent
string.value: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz
I've successfully solve all the questions but I am still curious of some things...
I was talking with Icebyrd Slimm and wow, there is more to this land of Masteria and New Leaf City than what I learned from the quiz. I want to know more of what happened in this place.
I've asked about the old fable of Masteria and Icebyrd Slimm didn't quite answer my question. Maybe when I become stronger, he will tell me more about it.

string.name: name
string.value: Interstellar Relics

Professor Foxwit spoke with me about the space-based Artifacts suddenly being discovered. He's believes he can invent new and different items with them by using the knowledge he's acquired over years of time-travel. He is willing to experiment on any Artifacts I should find. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and give me a blueprint to make it...

Professor Foxwit spoke with me about the space-based Artifacts suddenly being discovered. He's believes he can invent new and different items with them by using the knowledge he's acquired over years of time-travel. He is willing to experiment on any Artifacts I should find. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and give me a blueprint to make it...

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Artifacts

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

string.name: name
string.value: Jay's Curiosity

It's weird... When I walked passed #bJay from Henesys#k the other day, he didn't answer my greetings and didn't even notice me there. It looked like he was working on some kind of riddle by himself. Let's find out what Jay is up to these days.

I don't believe I actually offered to help him on finding a historical figure just out of curiosity! I guess it won't hurt to check out the dungeon as #p1012109# requested... But I really doubt I would find anything there. It's a legend, myth, a fairy tale.
I found Bob from #m105090300# and talked with bunch of people about him. He is famous around this world.

string.name: name
string.value: Gwin's Thanks
When I passed by, #b#p1061013##k, someone I really never got to spoke with, looked like he had something to talk to me. Let's go and find out what he has to say to me.

#p1061013# was looking at #t4031447# very closely to see if I did anything to hurt him. I don't know what the deal is but he was scaring me. It makes me wonder why he is obsessed with this particular snail. I should find out by talking to #b#p1061013##k again.
#p1061013# told me what happened between him and Bob. It's amazing that a simple snail actually tried to save human being... Those little monsters we hunt aren't really little at all...

string.name: name
string.value: Grendel The Really Old's Glorious Days
Grendel The Really Old... He lives deep in the forest of Ellinia. Since he's really old, he has to know SOMETHING about Bob. I shall see him now.

Grendel The Really Old was talking out of himself but I got to make him hear what I had to say. He is getting glasses. I hope his eyesight isn't too bad to recognize Bob... After all, Grendel is probably the oldest guy in this world.

Grendel The Really Old got very mad at me for hitting Bob to make him go into his shell. I knew he would know something but never would have guessed they were old friends. I guess I owe Bob a big apology. But how am I going to be able to do that to a snail, especially if he's not coming out from his shell?

string.name: name
string.value: Cody's Confession

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Approval

string.name: name
string.value: Blackbull's Mistake

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism
This is a wild guess but... Wouldn't Dances with Balrog know a little bit about Bob? Who knows, I heard that he likes snails. Maybe I will go check with him.
I didn't know Dances with Balrog likes to EAT the snails... Now, what am I suppose to do?! It doesn't look like he is going to give me back Bob's Snail Shell anytime soon...
I had to take off from Dances with Balrog. Who can STAND all that endless talking? I should figure out a way to get Bob back other than talking him through...

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Scheme Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Scheme

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Scheme Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Scheme

string.name: name
string.value: A Word to the Wise

string.name: parent
string.value: Old Man Tom's Word
I hear that Old Man Tom has been hearing noises from the old Prendergast Mansion on the outskirts of New Leaf City. A haunted house? Sounds like the perfect Halloween adventure!

Old Man Tom told me about the haunted Prendergast Mansion. Apparently, the doors won't open for just anyone... I've got to figure out how to get in. Tom mentioned that the toymaker Prendergast used to hold parties for kids for holidays, including Halloween costume parties around this time of year. Maybe if I wear a costume I can get in! Hmmm... Now where can I buy one?

I made it into the old Prendergast Mansion, against the advice of Old Man Tom. I wonder why he's so dead set on keeping people out of the house? Maybe if I explore the house, I can find out more about what happened here...

string.name: name
string.value: The Past in the Present

string.name: parent
string.value: Old Man Tom's Word
Jonas gave me his Toy Workshop Key. He wants me to find someone who will keep it safe and ensure that his twisted toys can't escape his house.

Turns out Old Man Tom is Thomlin Prendergast, Jonas' younger brother. I gave him Jonas' Toy Workshop key to keep. He gave me Sophilia's Necklace, for helping put the spirits in Prendergast Mansion to rest.

string.name: name
string.value: A Cold Hearth
I heard there's an old butler in the Haunted House. Maybe he needs help cleaning it...

I spoke with Edmunds, Butler of the Prendergast Estate. It seems that he' run out of #t4000018# to heat the house, which would explain the chill. I've agreed to help him out and bring back #b60 #t4000018##k so he can refill the fireplaces throughout the house and re-heat the mansion.
I brought back #b60 #t4000018##k to Edmunds; he can get the fireplaces going again now. Hmmm... It seems like there are quite a few fireplaces around this labyrinthine house.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Delivery
There's a beautiful woman in the Prendergast house that looks mildly annoyed... perhaps I should speak with her.

Man! I spoke-no, tried to speak with Ludmilla, and she wouldn't give me the time of day until I agreed to get her #b5 slices of #t2022190##k for Jonas from Olde Sapp Village. A bit strange that she referred to New Leaf City as that, but Miki should have them at the potion shop. What a cranky woman...

Well, I got Ludmilla her #b#t2022190##k, and learned a bit about Jonas and her love...for his money. No wonder Edmunds hates her. I should press that woman for more info about what's going on around here.

string.name: name
string.value: Family Jewels
Oh...looks like Ludmilla is not quite done with me yet. I'd better head back and see what that nag wants now...

I spoke with Ludmilla, and big surprise---her Cherry Pie Ghoulash didn't lure Jonas out. I think he probably pushed a bookcase in front of the door to ensure he never sees her again, but that's just a theory. At any rate, it looks like now her prized jewelry has mysteriously disappeared. She thinks Sophilia's taken it, but I'm not sure if I buy that, seeing as how she's...not around to do that. I have to gather #b20 #t4031769#s#k and #b10 #t4031770#s#k and bring them back to her. The woman complains way too much... sheesh.
I found Ludmilla's beloved jewelry for her. In return she gave me a worn, but well-loved doll. It's seen better days, but it has charm. Someone is probably looking for this...

string.name: name
string.value: A Father's Love
Jonas gave me a new doll he made to give to his daughter. I don't think Sophilia'll like it as much her favorite one, but I guess I should give it to her anyway, per her father's wishes.
I gave Sophilia the new doll her father made. It made her sad. She asked me give Annabelia, the first doll Jonas made for her, back to her father.
Jonas was very confused by the doll I gave him. He was almost speechless. I hope he is not going any more insane than he is right now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Infernal Toy Machine
I keep hearing the groans and bellows of machinery echoing through the house. What is making this racket? Is it where these infernal toys are coming from?

I found Jonas Prendergast in his Toy Workshop at the top of the house, in front of a huge toy machine which seems to be the source of all these infernal toys! It seems that his machine is not functioning properly. If I collect #b50 Firewood#k, #b25 Screws#k, and #b25 Loaded Springs#k, Jonas can build the replacement part to get his machine working properly again. I know that the Rocking Horses will have the #bFirewood#k and the Psycho Jacks will have the #bScrews and Loaded Springs#k. I've got to get what Jonas needs-perhaps this will stop it from churning out all these crazy toys!
I collected the parts Jonas needed to fix his machine. I hope I haven't simply helped a madman create more of his messed up toys.

string.name: name
string.value: In Her Likeness
Looks like Jonas fixed the machine... yet it's still cranking out these crazy toys. Maybe he is bonkers. Or maybe he needs some more help.

Looks like Jonas needs help building a new doll, a more perfect likeness of Sophilia. I don't think he realizes she's dead. In any case, I have to collect #b30 Locks of Doll's Hair, 10 Heartstoppers, 10 Maple Candies, and 10 Pumpkin Taffies#k. Why the candies? I may never know...
I collected everything Jonas needed to build his new doll in the likeness of his daughter. I have to say though... it looks nothing like her.

string.name: name
string.value: Smores No More
MBI (Maple Bureau of Investigation) Agent Falcon has been standing in front of the Prendergast Mansion for quite some time. Maybe I should go see why he's still loitering around.

Looks like the bumbling MBI Agent Falcon just can't get a break. Just when he was ready to pack up and leave to report the findings for his Halloween mission, a mysterious little boy appeared and stole all the Smores Falcon had cooked up for his colleagues! Falcon has agreed to pay you 100,000 mesos (from his Agency discretionary account) if you recover #b25#k of his #bSmores#k for him. Easy money - or is it? The Smores look pretty tasty... I guess I'll have to try not to eat them myself as I collect them!

I collected Agent Falcon's #bSmores#k for him... they were a bit dirty but still good, so his colleagues back at the MBI Agency should be happy! In return, Falcon paid me the 100,000 mesos he promised. He also gave me some old medicine bottles that he'd found lying outside the house. They look pretty potent...

string.name: name
string.value: The Spirit of Maplemas
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to Maple Claws. I'm sure she's back in town now in Happyville.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to Maple Claws about Suzy's dilemma. Maple Claws listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Maple Claws gave me a message for Suzy: that as long as she remembers the essence of the Maplemas Spirit, it doesn't really matter what holiday traditions she chooses to follow this year. I should return to Suzy with Maple Claws' message once I've also spoken to O-Pongo.

string.name: name
string.value: Happy Versalmas to You
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I should go see O-Pongo in New Leaf City if I want to give it to him. Decisions, decisions...
I'm thinking it's Versalmas for me this year! All I have to do now to cement my decision is to actually give Little Suzy's Wishlist to O-Pongo. I can't wait! It's time for a change of pace!

Looks like I'm celebrating Versalmas this year! I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to O-Pongo, and he gave me this awesome #bVersalmas Hat#k for me to wear proudly! Every time I bring O-Pongo presents I've collected from monsters, he'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents to him in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring him presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing O-Pongo more presents will also help me earn #bVersalmas Cheer#k! If the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k, O-Pongo will have something really nice for me at the end of the event!

string.name: name
string.value: Elpam's Gift
Looks like Elpam is celebrating a new holiday. I should head over to New Leaf City and check it out!

Elpam is celebrating the holiday known as Versalmas! He'd like me to speak with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, and the one who gives presents. Looks like Elpam has received his gift from O-Pongo, who is also in New Leaf City, so doing this shouldn't be too tough...

Elpam offered me a slab of #bMelting Cheese#k as a Versalmas gift! Er, a strange gift but I gladly accepted this as a token of friendship! He also said that I should speak with O-Pongo to learn more about this Versal tradition...

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's Blue Box
Bill is frantically looking for a Blue box. I wonder why...
If I find the Blue box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the Blue box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's White Box
Bill is frantically looking for a White box. I wonder why...
If I find the White box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the White box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wandering Alchemist Eurek's New Skill
I hear that #b#p2040050##k over in Sleepywood is working on a way to scroll items without equipping them. I should go see Eurek and see how far along his research is--maybe I can learn how to do it!
I spoke with Eurek and he's perfected his method for scrolling unequipped items. I can't wait for him to show me how to perform this new skill!

I returned with the materials that #b#p2040050##k asked for and learned how to use scrolls on unequipped items! Eurek also mentioned that in his travels, he'd heard rumors of a powerful monster residing somewhere in Leafre--even stronger than Zakum.

string.name: name
string.value: Pheromone Perfume
0 = #b#p2060005##k is performing further research about monster riding. I wonder if he's finished researching #t4031507#? Time to grab my swimming trunks and head back to Aqua Road!

#p2060005# said that he not only did more research on #t4031507#, he's discovered a way to make it work! However, he'll need a special perfume from #bChief Tatamo from Leafre Village#k to make #t2270000# which trains the monster. Leafre is in Ossyria, so I've got a bit of a journey on my hands...\n\n#i4031509##t4031509# #b#c4031509#/1#k.

After a long journey to Leafre, I traveled back to the Aquarium with the perfume in hand and gave it to #p2060005#. He believes that this method should work and gave me #b#t2270000##k for the monster. He told me that if I take it somewhere in the #bnext town# I would be able to train wild boars!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon's Perfume Bottle
It's time to take my mount to another level! Let's go see #p2081000# in Leafre and see if he has any methods to improve my mount!

After reaching Leafre, I spoke with #p2081000#. He confirmed that he does have a way to improve my mount--by turning it into a powerful dragon! However, like most good things in life, this is not free. He's agreed to sell me the dragon's perfume for the low, discounted price of #r20 million meso#k because it is rare. Really rare. So rare, in fact, that he still has his original stockpile. At 20 Million mesos per, I'm not surprised...

After thinking it over, I gave #p2081000# 20 million mesos and got the dragon's perfume. I took a whiff, it smells like candy, chocolate, and roses...I'm tempted to drink it! However, I want an awesome dragon mount, so I'll have to pass. I can't wait to ride it!

string.name: name
string.value: Kyrin's Teaching
Since I still have yet to master Monster Mount and Spirit of the Craftsman, #bKyrin#k volunteered to teach me these skills...
I'll have to go talk to #bKyrin#k about these skills...right?
I was able to learn #rMonster Mount#k and #rSpirit of the Craftsman#k through Kyrin. Time to use them!

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #1
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, wants a word with me. I wonder what he wants to talk about...

Moren's coworker Keol requested that I make a shoe for him. Even though Moren had already accepted me as his apprentice, it seemed that Keol didn't agree with that. Apparently, he wasn't very pleased with Moren that he was willing to divulge his item-making secrets to everyone, regardless of the skill level. Keol asked me to make a pair of shoes for him... that even a Level 1 can make with ease. Seriously... does he think that low of me? Fine, I'll make the finest pair of those he'll ever see!\n\n#i4001174# #t4001174# #b#c4001174# / 1

Moren's coworker Keol requested that I make a shoe for him. Even though Moren had already accepted me as his apprentice, it seemed that Keol didn't agree with that. Apparently, he wasn't very pleased with Moren that he was willing to divulge his item-making secrets to everyone, regardless of the skill level. Keol asked me to make a pair of shoes for him... that even a Level 1 can make with ease. Seriously... does he think that low of me? But even after seeing my work, Keol just dismissed it as little more than adequate. He also commented that I'll need lots of practice, and gave me a measly Basic Enhancement Gem. I don't like this guy... and I definitely don't like his attitude.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #2
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol requested me to make a pair of shoes for his nephew. His pompous attitude is really hard to take, plus it seems like he's trying to just use me for things like this. I can't back down from someone like him! Fine, here's your pair of shoes!\n\n#i4001175# #t4001175# #b#c4001175# / 1
Moren's coworker Keol requested me to make a pair of shoes for his nephew. Despite my best effort, Keol still doesn't seem to believe I am up to par with his standard of excellence...

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #4
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.
A request was made from Maple Admin to make a White Crewneck Shirt for him. Actually, a 100 of them!!! Oh wow... how am I going to make them all?\n\n#i4001177# #t4001177# #b#c4001177# / 100

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Maple Admin to produce White Crewneck Shirts for beginnings, and asked me to do it for him. It was quite daunting to even think about making a 100 of them, but how can I say no to the Maple Admin?? I worked hard and gave Keol all 100 of them, but he still gave me a hard time about the shirts.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #6
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from General Maestro of Omega Sector to build a Water Gun for Training, and asked me to do it for him. I better put extra effort into this, since this directly affects the performance of the soldiers.\n\n#i4001179# #t4001179# #b#c4001179# / 7

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from General Maestro of Omega Sector to build a Water Gun for Training, and asked me to do it for him. For someone that does not trust my item-producing skills, he keeps asking me to make one for him. What's the deal with him, anyway?

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #7
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol heard that I have reached Level 2 of the Maker skill, and asked if I could make a pair of gloves for him. I really don't understand how someone who's asking for a favor keeps making rude requests!\n\n#i4001180# #t4001180# #b#c4001180# / 1
Moren's coworker Keol asked if I could make a pair of gloves for him. I managed to make one for him, but he told me he can't even wear those outside. Keol really needs to go to the charm school.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #8
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Cliff for a pair of warm mittens, and asked me to do it for him. Here's the man that constantly works for the kids in a warm, loving manner... I better really work hard at this!\n\n#i4001181# #t4001181# #b#c4001181# / 1

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Cliff for a pair of warm mittens, and asked me to do it for him. I couldn't stand Keol, but I worked hard at it for the sake of Mr. Cliff. Even so, Keol gave me a hard time about the mittens. What is wrong with this guy?

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #9
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol told me he received a massive order from The Nautilus, and he needed help completing the order. He then asked me if I could make a mop for him!\n\n#i4001182# #t4001182# #b#c4001182# / 6

Captain Kyrin of The Nautilus must be a neat freak. Otherwise, she wouldn't have purchased that many cleaning products! I wound up making the mop for Keol so he could ship it and other products to The Nautilus.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #10
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.
Mu Lung's brilliant instructor No Gong seemed to have ruined his training uniform, and asked us to make a new one for him.\n\n#i4001183# #t4001183# #b#c4001183# / 30
This time, Keol asked me to create a brand new training uniform for Instructor No Gong of Mu Lung. First off, red belt!!

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #11
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.
Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Chil Sung and Chil Nam of Korean Folk Town to make a rake, and asked if I could make one for them.\n\n#i4001184# #t4001184# #b#c4001184# / 2
I built a sturdy, easy-to-use rake for the delightful brothers Chil Nam and Chil Sung of Korean Folk Town. It seems like even Keol is letting up just a little bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Special Order

string.name: parent
string.value: Keol's Order #13
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, has a special order for me to process. Better go see what it is.

The moment Keol saw me walk in, he let me have it. That's because a very important order came from Abdullah VIII, and Moren decided to let me take care of it! Wow... I didn't know Moren had that much faith in me. Anyway, since Keol seems very upset over this, I'll have to go make the delivery myself.\n\n#i4001186# #t4001186# #b#c4001186# / 1

The moment Keol saw me walk in, he let me have it. That's because a very important order came from Abdullah VIII, and Moren decided to let me take care of it! Wow... I didn't know Moren had that much faith in me. Anyway, since Keol seemed way too upset to go, I had to go make the delivery myself.

string.name: name
string.value: Abdullah VIII's Statement

string.name: parent
string.value: Keol's Order #13
Abdullah VIII seemed very pleased with the turban and told me to send Moren a royal compliment on his behalf. He also said he already gave Moren the reward. That was quick!

I gave Moren the royal compliment that Abdullah VIII made for him. Moren in turn told me how proud he was of the progress I made as an item-producer. As gratifying as it was to receive compliments from someone like Moren, it also put a lot of pressure on me.

string.name: name
string.value: Moren's Class on the Actual Practice
When I visited Moren to learn his new method, he instructed me to attend his class that deals with the actual application of the new method. Oh, so I am actually doing this now...
Moren told me he needs some time to prepare the materials for the class, and told me to talk to him when I'm ready.
I went through Moren's class on the actual application of the new method. This was fun!

string.name: name
string.value: Moren's Second Round of Teaching

I think I have gotten quite familiar with producing items, and I am sure Moren would be shocked to see my prowess in it. Right at that time, Moren called me and told me if I ever had anything to do in Magatia, make sure to stop by and see him.

I wound up heading to Magatia after seeing Moren's message. As soon as I saw him, however, instead of a hearty hug, he gave me a huge scolding. Apparently, he saw one of the items I made at the Free Market, and he was so disgusted by my poor quality of work that he vowed to set me straight by giving me a test.
The test is actually making an Intermediate Monster Crystal. Hmmm... this is quite intense.

#i4260003# #t4260003# #b#c4260003# / 1

Moren gave me a lecture on how I had become complacent, and told me I had to start again from scratch. After passing his test by successfully creating the Intermediate Monster Crystal, he let me go, and I realized my item-producing skills have gotten that much better as a result of his words.

string.name: name
string.value: The Owner of the Note

string.name: parent
string.value: Moren's Third Round of Teaching!
This piece of note that was found in Moren's lab may be his. I better return it to him.
This piece of note that was found in Moren's lab may be his. I better return it to him.

string.name: name
string.value: A Surprise Outcome

string.name: parent
string.value: Moren's Third Round of Teaching!

The piece of paper Moren dropped contained scribbles that seemed like a manual for a Gold Anvil. A Gold Anvil... sounds like something that'd be fun to make. Moren doesn't seem like he wants to make it... so maybe I should try it.\n\n#i4031980# #t4031980# #b#c4031980# / 1
I managed to make a Gold Anvil and gave it to Moren. He seemed astounded by the fact that I was able to make it, and gave me a major praise for being able to do so.

string.name: name
string.value: Shammos's Advice

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

Despite her vast knowledge of bow-based combat, #p2020010#, like #p1012100#, didn't know much about the skill. I hear #bShammos#k's rambling about something...Perhaps I should pay him a visit...\n\n#t4161026# #b#c4161026# / 1#k
#p2022003# took the book and started reading it. Would he know something? He certainly appeared focused on deciphering what this new skill could be...I hope he can tell me more!

string.name: name
string.value: New Guess

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

My hunch was right about #bShammos#k. He knew a bit more and was able to give me further details, but there's something strange about what #p2022003# said. Let's ask #b#p2020010##k. Finally getting somewhere! \n\n#t4161027# #b#c4161027# / 1#k

I took the book back to #p2020010# following a lead from #bShammos#k. Rene said that #p2022003# used to be human and that I should pay close attention to what he says--both as a warning and path to discovering more.

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Remembers...

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

I spoke with #p2020010#, who had a new suggestion to help me piece together this puzzle. She told me to go to see #b#p1061011##k in Sleepywood. I can sense the answers coming soon--they'd better, because my feet are tiring from all this walking! \n\n#t4161028# #b#c4161028# / 1
My journey continues...#p1061011# had no idea about the book. But he said he might be able to point me in the right direction to who would know about the book...

string.name: name
string.value: Insignificant Being

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation
#p1061011# said #b#p1061012##k will know about the Bowman's ultimate skill. At last! I'm on my way there now! \n\n#t4161029# #b#c4161029# / 1
#p1061012# was aware of the book and gave me the answers I needed. I see that my journey has just begun, but I will gain tremendous power should I see it through to completion. Onward!

string.name: name
string.value: Spiritual Stone of Darkness

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation
#b#p1061012##k says he can send me to the Bowman's training place if I bring him #b#t4031466##k which is carried by #m910500000#. \n\n#i4031466##t4031466# #b#c4031466# / 50#k
I gave 50 #t4031466#, which is needed to enter #m910500000#, to #p1061012#. I am one step closer to obtaining this ultimate skill. The anticipation is growing within me...

string.name: name
string.value: Junior Balrog in a Different World

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation
#b#p1061012##k said he'll teach me the ultimate skill once I go to #m910500000# and get #b300 #o9300085##k. It's almost within my grasp! \n\n#o9300085# #r#a61081##k

After completing the training to catch Junior Balrogs in #m910500000#, I acquired the Bowman's ultimate skill! Power is now mine--I shall master this skill and use it triumph over my enemies in battle!

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Test

I obtained a book I can't read. It looks like it's written in a strange language. The writing is crude, almost like an animal wrote it...a kind of monster language. I wonder if #b#p1022002##k would know how to read it. Couldn't hurt to speak with him...

My hunch paid off. When I asked #b#p1022002##k about the book, he examined the language closer and came to a conclusion. He said the book is about the #bRush#k skill. He offered to translate, but he said that I must prove myself as one worthy to obtain such power--a true warrior in his eyes. I must eliminate #r200 #o9300087##k in #m910500100# located at the entrance of the Sanctuary, deep in Sleepywood. Manji saw that I was surprised by the high number and advised me to make a party with a few of like-minded companions to ensure victory. This is precisely what friends are for...\n\n#o9300087# #r#a61101##k

With a bit of help from my trusty weapon, I easily defeated the requisite number that #p1022002##k requested. As promised, he translated the book, and it revealed the famed skill known as Rush. I can't wait to try it out!

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Power 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart
After speaking with #b#p2081007##k, he said the dragon has not reached maturity. There must be something I can do to increase its' power...
Raul told me to gather #b25 #t4031482##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. It's time to hunt! \n\n#i4031482##t4031482# #b#c4031482#/25#k
After I gave Raul #t4031482#, he awakened #q2321003#'s power. I can feel it radiating...magnificent!

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Power 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart

The feeling I had within was confirmed by #b#p2081007##k. There is a way to unlock more of the dragon's power. I will not rest until I have discovered it. Raul has been helpful thus far--I wonder if he'd be willing to assist me again...
Raul has agreed to help me again. I'm to gather #b35 #t04031484##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. \n\n#i4031484##t4031484# #b#c4031484#/35#k
Another long, but successful hunt. I gave Raul #t04031484#, and he increased #q2321003#'s power even more. When will the dragon reach its full power? It seems to be limitless...

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Completion

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart

I once again seek to enhance the power of the dragon. After speaking with #b#p2081007##k, he says the dragon still hasn't reached its full power. I must see this through to the end. The full power of the dragon must be a sight to behold. I must ask Raul for assistance once more to unleash the power of the dragon.

The final step to unlock the dragon's power is at hand! Raul says if I get #b40#t4031485##k he will awaken #q2321003#'s power. He says this will complete the dragon's power. My heart trembles with anticipation... \n\n#i4031485##t4031485# #b#c4031485#/40#k
At last, the dragon's power is complete. And it shall truly be a sight to behold! I will use this power wisely...

string.name: name
string.value: Cold Flame

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

I found an altar within a deep sea cavern that was emitting cold energy. If I start a cold fire and throw in the black book, I should find out more about the content inside--but what to do after? Perhaps taking the new book to #b#p2060100##k will yield answers. \n\n#i4161017##t4161017# #b#c4161017# / 1#k
The book's identity has been revealed. It was #bCaron's Note#k! One journey ends as another begins...now to find out more!

string.name: name
string.value: Return of the Dark Lord

string.name: parent
string.value: The One Hidden in the Shadow
#b#p2081400##k says he has something to tell me...perhaps I should pay him a visit.
#b#p2081400##k told me to meet #b#p1052001##k. Now that I think about it, it's been a long time since I've seen the Dark Lord. He never seems to age...
#p1052001# said he has some interesting suggestions and that if I'm interested, he'll tell me more.

string.name: name
string.value: The Night Warrior

string.name: parent
string.value: The One Hidden in the Shadow
#p1052001# says he has a good suggestion and has offered to tell me more. Perhaps I should accept. I've heard it is unwise to refuse a request from the Dark Lord.

#b#p1052001##k said he wanted me to be his disciple and has entrusted me with disciplining his other students. He told me to defeat his other #b6 disciples#k who are disguised as him and earn their loyalty. He told me if I'm interested to come back to him and ask #bI want to know about being a Thief#k...Is this some sort of game? The Dark Lord is known for his wily tricks and deceitful ways, but also for great power...I will see where this path leads me, hopefully to a new skill! \n\n#o9300088# #r#a61411##k

I defeated the imposters and earned their loyalty. I made #o9300088#, a powerful Thief, into my shadow partner. I can now use him and the other five students in battle to great effect. My enemies will never know what hit them...

string.name: name
string.value: Singing Shield

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior

I brought the necklace back to Tatamo, the chief of Leafre. He looked at the picture inscribed on the #o8180001#'s necklace, and said that since #b#p1061012##k knows about Sayram, I should go show him the necklace. Off I go! \n\n#i4031467##t4031467# #b#c4031467#/1
On Chief Tatamo's recommendation, I spoke with #p1061012#, who knew about the necklace and the Singing Shield. I must ask him for more information about the shield!

string.name: parent
string.value: Shammos's past
When I asked #p2022003# about #p1032001#, I could tell he was very resentful towards #p1032001# and #p2020009#. Let's go back to #b#p1032001##k and tell him about #p2022003#.
#p1032001# looked disappointed as he said how #p2022003# used to be a great Magician...

string.name: name
string.value: Robeira's Intentions

string.name: parent
string.value: Shammos's past
#p2022003# seemed exhausted and mumbled #p2020009# to forgive him. Let's go to see #b#p2020009##k.
#p2020009# said there's no way he can let #p2022003# go...

string.name: name
string.value: Robeira and Shammos

string.name: parent
string.value: Shammos's past
#p2022003# became quiet for some reason. What's the matter? Let's go talk to #b#p2022003##k.
#p2022003# seems to have regained consciousness.

string.name: name
string.value: Spiruna's advice

string.name: parent
string.value: Conspiracy of kidnapping Tylus

#p2032001# looked in the crystal ball and told me that #r#o8140000##k has the other half of the kidnapping plan, masterminded by #p2020008#. #o8140000#? That means #o8150000# and #o8140000# conspired together? Let's get the note that #o8140000# has and go back to #b#p2081100##k.\n\n#i4031477##t4031477# #b#c4031477# / 1#k
I went to Harmonia with the rest of the paper that I got from #o8140000#. Harmonia asked me to immediately go and protect Tylus. I'm on my way...

string.name: name
string.value: Protecting Tylus

string.name: parent
string.value: Conspiracy of kidnapping Tylus

#p2020008# said he heard the news from #p2081100#, and accepted my protection. I have to protect#k #p2020008##k and receive #b#t4031495##k. Let's go see #b#p2020008##k again after successfully protecting Tylus. \n\n#i4031495##t4031495# #b#c4031495# / 1#k
I successfully protected Tylus from #o8150000# and #o8140000#. Tylus taught me the Power Stance skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Shawn's fear

string.name: parent
string.value: Grief of darkness
I was told to bring #brequested object#k from an unrevealed relic. A newly discovered relic...What could it possibly be? \n\n#i4031452##t4031452# #b#c4031452#/1
...I brought the requested object. It wasn't easy but I did it. #p9040002# looked extremely happy, but a bit worried at the same time. What could be bothering him?

string.name: name
string.value: Arec and Shadower

string.name: parent
string.value: Grief of darkness

#p9040002# said he is thankful to have me because this job is very dangerous and it hasn't gone through the appropriate approval process. A dangerous task that hasn't gone through the approval process...should he be asking me to do this? I wonder...let's go see #b#p2020011##k.
In return for the job...I received the Assassinate skill. This will definitely come in handy...

string.value: Inverse Attributes

string.name: parent
string.value: Inverse Attributes

I tried the experiment with b#p2020005##k but unfortunately it failed. #b#p2020005##k told me to go to see #b#p2030012##k, an expert on magic ingredients.
#b#p2030012##k said the inverse attributes is a bunch of nonsense. Nevertheless, he seemed intrigued by it and told me to go see #b#p2012017##k, the mad scientist in Orbis.

#b#p2020005##k asked me talk to him later while he works on how to give magical power to #b#t4031451##k. I'll check on his progress in a little while.

string.value: Huckle's Spirit Pouch

As I showed him the completed summoned-being's frame #b#p2020005##k said all that's left is to get the Spiritual Stone, which will ignite its' power. He said I would be able to find the stone in another world and that #b#p2041023##k would know how to get there.\r\n#i4031470##t4031470# #b#c4031470#/1

I battled #o9300089# after it hatched from the egg and I put him under my control.

#p2081003# thinks the highest nest in the sky should be able to hatch it. Sounds good. Let's go there. \n\n#o9300090# #r#a62431#
I can use the power of Frostprey now!

string.name: parent
string.value: Ancient Ice Stone
The guardian of Snow Mountain, #b#p2030000##k told me that if I want to break the ancient ice stone, I would have to go see #b#p2020000##k to make a hammer strong enough.

Bogen said that although he's not sure if it will break the ancient magic, it's worth a try and asked me to get him the ingredients to make the hammer. #b#p2020000##k. The Ingredients are #b#t04000150#, #t4011005# and #t4011007##k.

#b#p2020000##k isn't sure if he can make a container that will hold lava but he says he'll try. He'll need #b#t4000081#, #t4021007#, and #t4021009##k.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Improve Your Strength
I hear that Kyrin is looking for me, now that I've become a Buccaneer. She apparently wants to teach me some new skills...
I must show Kyrin my skills to prove what I'm capable of. I'd better make sure I'm ready to show her everything I've got and stand up to her for at least 2 minutes.
I've finally gained Kyrin's confidence. And she has taught me the super transformation skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Presence of Mind
I've learned the Super Transformation Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

I apparently need to do some intense training in order to be able to freely use the Super Transformation Skill. One of the benefits of the skill is that it will strengthen me and give me a body of steel! I'd better go observe the Red Dragon Turtles whose bodies are equally as hard, and try to stand up against them. To prove that I've done the training, I must defeat #r150 Red Dragon Turtles#k and bring #b50 Hearts of Stone#k to Kyrin. 

#i4031872##t4031872# #b#c4031872# / 50#k 
#o8140701# #r#a63401##k
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Snatch Skill in return.

I've learned the super transformation skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

I apparently need to do some intense training in order to be able to freely use the super transformation skill. One of the benefits of super transformation is that it will strengthen me and give me a body of steel! I'd better go observe the Blue Dragon Turtles whose bodies are equally as hard, and try to stand up against them. To prove that I've completed the training, I must defeat #r150 Blue Dragon Turtles#k and bring #b50 Sturdy Leather #k pieces to Kyrin. 

#i4031871##t4031871# #b#c4031871# / 50#k 
#o8140700# #r#a63501##k
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Demolition Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: The Study of Space-Time Transformation

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space-Time Transformations
Rolonay has been deeply immersed in the study of transformation across space and time. I wonder if there's anything I can do to help in his research.

Rolonay thinks that he'll have to rely on some openings between Papulatus' dimensions to transform through space and time. But that won't be as easy as long as Papulatus is around! Rolonay suggests defeating Papulatus to find a clue that might lead to finding the openings between dimensions. I should defeat #rPapulatus#k and look for #bany strange or special objects#k to help Rolonay with his research.
When I defeated Papulatus, I received a strange key. I gave the key to Rolonay, thinking that it might actually be a crucial piece of clue.

string.name: name
string.value: Papulatus' Key

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space-Time Transformations
I should take Papulatus' key to the #bOrigin of the Clocktower#k.
Where am I? There's someone here!

string.name: name
string.value: Papulatus in the Past

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space-Time Transformations
That's kind of strange. This doesn't really look like the Origin of the Clocktower as I remember it. I'd better go and talk to Papulatus.
What? I'm really in the past? How in the world did I get here?

string.name: name
string.value: A New Revelation

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space Time Transformations

When I told Papulatus that I had come from the future, he seemed very interested in learning more about me. I guess he got even more excited when I told him that he, in the future, was doing some pretty major things... Little does he know that he's doing some pretty radical, negative things... Anyway, how am I supposed to get back to the future now?

Papulatus asks me to be his guinea-pig for the research he's been working on, which is almost complete. He says he'll send me back into the future where I came from... I don't like the idea that I'm a guinea-pig for his research, but I can't stay in the past like this forever. I guess I should trust Papulatus for now and get back to the future to tell Rolonay about what had happened.
I don't know if it's a remnant of the power I felt during my transition between dimensions but I've somehow acquired the power to control space and time. I'll call this skill 'Time Lift'.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Improve Your Strength
I hear that Kyrin is looking for me, now that I've become a Captain. She apparently wants to teach me some new skills...
I must show Kyrin my skills to prove what I'm capable of. I'd better make sure I'm ready to show her everything I've got and stand up to her for at least 2 minutes.
I've finally gained Kyrin's confidence. Kyrin taught me the Battleship Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Observe the Spirit Vikings
I've learned the Battleship Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

So I guess I still need to learn some more skills before I can use the Battleship Skill, plus I need to learn how to properly control the battleship before I can learn how to use the skill itself... Let me go watch the Vikings in Ludibrium, and to prove that I've completed my training, I must defeat #r150 Spirit Vikings#k and bring back #b50 Spirit Viking Flags#k for Kyrin.
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Battleship Cannon Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Observe the Gigantic Spirit Vikings
I've learned the Battleship Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

So I guess I still need to learn some more skills before I can use the Battleship Skill, plus I need to learn how to properly control and attack from the battleship while riding on it before I can learn how to use the skill itself... Let me go watch the Gigantic Spirit Vikings in Ludibrium, and to prove that I've completed my training, I must defeat #r150 Gigantic Spirit Vikings#k and bring back #b50 Vikings' Token#k for Kyrin. 

#i4031874##t4031874# #b#c4031874# / 50#k 
#o8141100# #r#a63901##k
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Battleship Torpedo Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Jonathan's Court
I should go and meet with Bart. His royal highness is asking for me so...
You're telling me he's the Ruling King of the Seagulls? Why would the King of the Seagulls be looking for me? Well, let me go see him and find out.
Jonathan... The King of the Seagulls. Well he certainly has a presence about him.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission Free the Monsters
Shulynch is sending me an SOS signal. Is there an emergency?

Rolonay's old friend, Delli, who, in the past, worked with Rolonay to rescue the monsters that were spellbound by evil powers, is apparently now in grave danger. Shulynch wants me to help rescue her. I'll go and rescue Delli!
I rescued Delli and learned how to become friends with monsters in return.

string.name: name
string.value: An Arrangement from the Goddess.
After countless battles... the goddess has prepared something for me. I better go visit the Statue of Goddess at Orbis.

The statue was always silent, but all of a sudden, I could hear a voice. The goddess told me as a person that has reached the highest level that is available, and challenged me to step up and put in the effort to help others. She told me to let her know of my decision. Hmm...

I received a new skill from the Goddess called the Echo of the Hero. This isn't for my own benefit, but for everyone else around me. The statue, which always had a sad face on, seems to be smiling as I look at it once more.

#b#p2081500##k tells me that I need to prove my attributes as a hero in order to make the 4th level job advancement. To prove my eligibility, I must bring #b#t4031518##k and #b#t4031517##k. \r\n#i4031860##t4031860# #b#c4031860#/1#k\r#i4031861##t4031861# #b#c4031861#/1

string.value: Tatamo's Suggestion
#b#p2081500##k tells me that I should go see #b#p2081000##k in Leafre if I want to rescue #b#t4031517##k and #b#t4031518##k using my intelligence.

#b#p2081000##k tells me to bring him #b#t4031348##k if I want #b#t4031517##k and #b#t4031518##k. Apparently the scroll shop clerks in the other towns know about the secret spell scroll... \r\n#i4031348##t4031348##k #b#c4031348#/1
I brought the #b#t4031348##k to him and received #b#t4031517##k and #b#t4031518##k in return.

string.name: name
string.value: A Piece of Crack
To block the cracked dimension that occurred at a vault, something is needed to block it. I should ask #p2041023# at the tunnel of time for help.

I met up with Flo who told me about Papulatus. He's a monster that came through a crack in dimension to this world. I will need to get #i4031179# to seal up the cracked dimension. I'll need to eliminate #o8141100# and #o8143000# who might have entered this world with #b#o8500001##k and collect the pieces of cracked dimension.

#t4031176#: #r#c4031176#/1#k
#t4031177#: #r#c4031177#/1#k
#t4031178#: #r#c4031178#/1#k
I gathered up 3 types of pieces of cracked dimension and gave it to #p2041023#. I also gave Flo #t4031179#, which has something to do with #o8500002#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of Crack
If I ever lose the piece of cracked dimension, then I better go see Mr. Bouffon again.
I told #rMr. Bouffon#k that I lost the piece of cracked dimension. He told me he was going to give me another chance and that I should go see #rFlo#k immediately.
I was able to regain the lost piece of dimension from Flo. I should seriously take care of Papulatus this time.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Medal
If I lost the Ludibrium Medal, then I better go see Mr. Bouffon.
I told #rMr. Bouffon#k that I lost the Ludibrium Medal. He told me he was going to give me another chance and that I should go see #rFlo#k immediately.
I was able to regain the lost Ludibrium Medal from Flo. I should seriously take care of Papulatus this time.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of Crack
I lost the #t4031179# that #p2041023# gave me. I better go back to #p2041021# and tell him the truth

I lost the #t4031179# that's been given to me by #p2041023#. After telling #b#p2041021##k of the situation, he wanted me to talk to Flo again. I'm afraid #b#p2041023##k may be less than pleased by the fact that I lost a very valuable #b#t4031179##k.

After telling #p2041021# that I lost #t4031179#, he wanted me to go see #p2041023# again and talk to him. #p2041023# was pretty upset that I lost the valuable #t4031179#, but then wanted me to really make sure not to ever lose it again, while giving me the #rlast remaining #t4031179##k that he kept to himself. He warned me that this is the last one, and that if I ever lose it again, #rI won't be able to get it back ever again.#k. I better make sure not to lose it, and give it to #p2041021#.

string.name: name
string.value: New Life
I should go see Mai right now...

I better get Mai #b10 Mushroom Spores, 10 Snail Shells, and 10 Red Snail Shells#k right now.
#t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/10
#t4000019# #b#c4000019##k/10
#t4000016# #b#c4000016##k/10
I took care of the challenge Mai gave me. That was easy...

string.name: name
string.value: Grako's Request 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!
I heard Grako's best friend #bMariwaka#k, who resides in Showa Town, is going through some hard times. I better go there and check it out myself.
I met up with Mariwaka. Yeah, it looks like something's troubling her...

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I better go talk to #bSakura#k, who's crying in front of the police station.
#bSakura#k wanted me to find the #bBoss Kitty#k that stole her Orange Marble, and retrieve it from it.
I will have to get the orange marble for #bSakura#k. I am sure she is looking for it. So what should be my next move? Perhaps confrontation...

string.name: name
string.value: Learning to Speak the Kitty Language

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
Where's the #bBoss Kitty#k that stole Orange Marble?

I went up to the #bBoss Kitty#k and asked something, only to hear some language I've never even heard of in my life. I better ask #bScarred Kitty#k for some kitty language, then I may be able to pick up on it.
I learned the kitty language through #bThe Scarred Kitty#k! Now I can probably communicate with #bBoss Kitty#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Dealing with Boss Kitty

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I could understand what the Boss Kitty said, but in order to regain #bOrange Marble#k, I'll have to perform a task first.

I'll have to answer every single question fired by the Boss Kitty right. Not only that, in order to even start the quiz, it'll require #b300 Fried Chickens#k. Crazy...I know cats love birds, but that's ridiculous...

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble

I will need to gather up #b300 fried chickens#k for each time it get it wrong and answer all the questions right, then I'll receive the Orange Marble. I better take it back to Sakura.\n\n#b#c4031064#/1#t4031064#
I was able to safely hand the #bOrange Marble#k back to Sakura.

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura's Crying

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I should go see Sakura, who's crying. I wonder if I can help...
I better talk to Sakura, who still weeps in sorrow. There must be something that I can do, but what?
Sakura murmured something while crying. Perhaps this is the reason behind the flowing tears...

string.name: name
string.value: I should talk to the Boss Kitty in kitty language.

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
Now that I mastered the kitty language, I should go talk to the Boss Kitty.

I should meet Yoona at Southperry for a little quiz!
There's a quest before the quiz starts. I better take care of that fast.

string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping

string.name: parent

string.name: parent

I better solve Yoona's 3rd question on shopping.
Almost halfway done! Time to solve question number 3! I have to get it right...
I learned something about expiration dates. I can move my cursor over my acquired items and view the expiration date, so I know when I have to change style or re-select it!

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's 4th question on shopping.
I can see the light at the end of the tunnel--I'm nearly done! Time to solve question number 4!
I learned something about number of uses on an item. I can only use an item so such until it vanishes. At that point, I'll have to acquire another one if possible...

string.name: name
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Yoona's Quiz on Shopping
I better solve Yoona's last question on shopping.
Last question. Gotta finish STRONG!
I learned something about the restrictions regarding the weapon avatar items. This should help me navigate through the Cash Shop with no problem whatsoever!

string.name: name
string.value: Actor Training
Mariwaka of Showa Town is apparently looking for someone. Perhaps I can help find them...

Mariwaka claims that if I audition well, then I get to make my debut on the big screen. Me? An actor? Hmm, maybe. I better go take care of some #b#o9400110#s#k and #b#o9400111#s#k. \n#o9400110# #r#a80291##k \n#o9400111# #r#a80292#
Mariwaka did well auditioning. Oh well, I feel like I'm one step closer to becoming a movie star. Now all I need to do is meet Director Furano. Let's go!

string.name: name
string.value: War of Pang Pang
Poni Chai of Showa Town is apparently in trouble. Might as well go there while there's time.

I have no idea what the War of Pang Pang is all about, but I'll need to gather up #b30 #t04000110#s#k in order to sharpen a pencil. I better gather them up and give them to Poni Chai. \n#t04000110# #b#c04000110##k/30
By the way, does the plastic knife really work in sharpening a pencil? Oh well, Poni Chai claims he'll emerge victorious tomorrow at the War of Pang Pang, so...

string.name: name
string.value: Youthful Mariwaka
Mariwaka of Showa Town apparently has great concern. I should at least listen to her and see what the fuss is about.

Mariwaka desired to keep her beauty eternal, and she found out about a potion that'll help her do so. Sounds very fishy, but since she really believes in it, I should get her #b50 #t04000149#s#k for her eternal beauty.\n#t04000149# #b#c04000149##k/50
I really doubt that those potions enable eternal youth. Oh well, she likes it anyways, and that's the bottom line. I'll just leave her be.

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Concerns 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya's Concerns
By the way, how's Maya doing? I better go check her out!

Maya was attending a baby monster that's been deeply wounded. I know this is not what people would want us to do, but Maya wanted to do it, and I have to help her out. Oh well... in order to fix the wound, she said she needs #b50 #t02050003#s#k, #b20 #t04000086#s#k, and #b20 #t04000023#s#k. 

#t02050003# #b#c02050003##k/50
#t04000086# #b#c04000086##k/20
#t04000023# #b#c04000023##k/20
The wound is sanitized, but the baby Lioner should rest. It seems very tired from the ordeal.

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Concerns 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya's Concerns
I think we've turned the corner now. Will this be it? I need to ask Maya.

To speed up the baby Lioner's recovery, Maya asked me if I could gather some fish for it, FRESH fish at that. Since #b#o5400000##k eats fresh fish, I better gather up #b100 #t4000088#s#k. \n#t4000088# #b#c4000088##k/100
I've done all I could here. Maya can take care of the rest. I hope the Lioner gets better!

string.name: name
string.value: Lionel's Necklace 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Lionel's Necklace
Anyway, how's that baby Lioner doing? I better check on it at Maya's house.
Maya decided to disguise Lionel as a housecat by dressing it up with a necklace. Since buying one at a local General Store may give it away, she wanted me to ask Teo of Lith Harbor for help.
Teo decided to help make Lionel's necklace.

string.name: name
string.value: Lionel's Necklace 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Lionel's Necklace
Teo decided to help make Lionel's necklace. I better ask him right now.

Teo seemed really busy, so I decided to gather up the items myself. I better gather up #b50 #t04000033#s#k, #b50 #t04000030#s#k, and #b7 #t04000061##k and give them to Teo.

#t04000033# #b#c04000033##k/50
#t04000030# #b#c04000030##k/50
#t04000061# #b#c04000061##k/7
After handing Teo the items, he sent it to the jeweler, who made it for him fairly quickly. A beautiful necklace with Alligator and Dragon skin. I better show this to Maya now.

string.name: name
string.value: Lionel's Necklace 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Lionel's Necklace
After handing Teo the items, he sent it to the jeweler, who made it for him fairly quickly. A beautiful necklace with Alligator and Dragon skin. I better show this to Maya now.
With the necklace, Lionel sure doesn't look like a monster now. Phew!

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Rumor Mill

string.name: parent
string.value: Monster Rumor Mill
I heard Scadur of El Nath got attacked by a monster. I better go talk to him.
Apparently, Foxy, I mean, Master Sergeant Fox also got attacked by that infamous monster. I better check out what's up.
In order to gather up the information regarding the monster, I'll have to do Master Sergeant Fox a favor. Are you kidding me?

string.name: name
string.value: Fox So Foxy

string.name: parent
string.value: Monster Rumor Mill
In order to gather up the information regarding the monster, I'll have to do Master Sergeant Fox a favor. Are you kidding me?
In order to find out more about the monster, I'll have to give Master Sergeant Fox #b50 #t04000129#s#k. \n#t04000129# #b#c04000129##k/50
No wonder ... according to him, Omega Sector may also be on the move to defeat the monster. He said I'll find out more about it by eavesdropping on General Maestro. That won't be easy...

string.name: parent
string.value: Monster Rumor Mill
No wonder ... according to him, Omega Sector may also be on the move to defeat the monster. He said I'll find out more about it by eavesdropping on General Maestro. That won't be easy...

No way... one of the #b#o8140000#s#k could be planning something insidious...I can't let them create havoc over innocent people here. This may not be what Maya wants to hear, but I'll have to kill the #b#o8140000#s#k. \n#t04000054# #b#c04000054##k/50
I didn't find the #b#o8140000##k with the necklace. I'm sure it's alive somewhere. I know this may sound odd, but I decided to believe that's true.

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen and Ellinia
#p1032100# of #m101000000# seems to be depressed these days...

#p1032100# of #m101000000# was recently attacked by a monster on her way back to #m101000000#. Since then, she'd been too afraid to venture outside #m101000000#, and wanted me to take care of the monsters for her. Time for a full-body workout!\n\n#o1110100# #r#a80481##k

By the request of #p1032100# of #m101000000#, I took out the Green Mushrooms that were wandering around near Ellinia. In return, #p1032100# gave me an item that the fairies really cherish. It's so beautiful and sparkling that it looks like an item used to make something very special.

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura and the Seal
Sakura of Showa Town has lost something. I should go talk to her and help find it!

I think she lost the #b#t04000154##k that she received from Dr. Hikekuro. She dropped it at the riverbank, and it's probably floated its way to the sea by now. 
Come to think of it, recently a monster by the name of #b#o3230405##k have been collecting dolls. I should go check it out...

#t04000154# #b#c04000154##k/100
Phew, I gathered up as much as I could. Fortunately Sakura found the one that Dr. Hikekuro gave her. Thank goodness!

string.name: name
string.value: Today's Schedule
I think Betty of Ellinia is stuck in a difficult spot. I'll need to talk to her on this.

Betty usually operates under a strict schedule, and lives by her own routine. Hmmm, I see, so without a watch to let her know the time, there's no way she'll be able to follow a strict schedule. According to her, #b#o3230306##k has the #b#t04000115#
Betty got her watch fixed, and went right back on schedule, as if she's trying to make up for the lost time. Maybe she'd be more relaxed if the watch was never fixed...Nah...

string.name: name
string.value: An Unknown Love
An unknown lady in Kerning City spends yet another day shivering in coldness. I should hear her side of the story.
Am I even allowed to take these...? I do feel like helping her find true love though... Whoever that may be... well, these are dropped by #b#o7130300##k, alright. \n#t04000148# #b#c04000148##k/100
I surely wish she makes a good couple with that special someone. Hahaha...But then again, it's a little disturbing, come to think of it. I better ask her what's up next time.

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
Olaf of Lith Harbor offered to take me to numerous famous spots in the Maple World.
According to Olaf, Riel will take me to the next stop. Where must that be?
I was able to meet up with Riel. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After soaking up the sun at Florina Beach, I should start up a conversation with Riel.
Riel offered to take me to Showa Town. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Skye...
I was able to meet up with Skye. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After taking a stroll around Showa Town, I should start up a conversation with Skye.
Skye offered to take me to Orbis. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Elma...
I was able to meet up with Elma. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After observing the stunning scenery of Orbis, I should start up a conversation with Elma.
Elma offered to take me to Ludibrium. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Marcel...
I was able to meet up with Marcel. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After I get done touring around Ludibrium, I should start up a conversation with Marcel
Marcel offered to take me to El Nath. Once I get there, he advised me to look for Scadur...
I was able to meet up with Scadur. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 6

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After observing the magnificent view of El Nath, I should start up a conversation with Scadur
Scadur offered to take me to Omega Sector. Once I get there, he advised me to look for Jr. Officer Medin...
I was able to meet up with Jr. Officer Medin. Where will I go next?

string.name: name
string.value: Traveling Around Maple 7

string.name: parent
string.value: Traveling Around Maple
After carefully observing Omega Sector, I should start up a conversation with Jr. Officer Medin.
Scadur offered to take me back to Lith Harbor. Once I get there, I better get back to Olaf...
I met up with Olaf again. What's this creepy scroll for...?

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura and the Teddy Bear
I should talk to #b#p9120011##k, who's in front of the police station crying.
#b#p9120011##k asked me to gather up #b50 #t04000106#s#k so she can fix her doll. \n\n#t04000106# #b#c04000106#/50#k
I gave #b#p9120011##k #b50 #t04000106#s#k. She seemed very happy to receive them. Hopefully that'd be enough for her to fix her doll.

string.name: name
string.value: Doll in the Dark 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Doll in the Dark
#b#p1012109##k of #b#m100000000##k in Victoria Island has apparently started writing a book.
#p1012109# of #m100000000# has requested my help in writing his book. For more information, he recommended me to talk to #b#p2041022##k in #b#m220000400##k of Ludibrium. Should I go there...?
#b#p2041022##k asked me to look for some subjects worthy of writing a book on. I should talk to him when the research is over.

string.name: name
string.value: Doll in the Dark 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Doll in the Dark
#b#p2041022##k said he looked for some subjects that may go along with the book that's being written. What do I need to do now? I better ask him.
#p2041022# requested me to defeat #b#o6230400##k and collect #b50 #t04000143#s#k so I can hand them to #b#p1012109##k. I don't know if #p1012109# wants to be in on this, but I'll ask first.

Just the way #p2041022# ordered, I gathered up #b50 #t04000143#s#k from #b#o6230400##k, and gave them to #p1012109# of #m100000000#. #p1012109# seemed very ecstatic, and rewarded me for my effort, but will that really help him write the next chapter?

string.name: name
string.value: Soul in the Dark

string.name: parent
string.value: Soul in the Dark
I should ask #b#p1012109##k of #m100000000# how the book is coming along.

Just as I suspected, the stuff I gathered up for him last time didn't help much. This time, he wanted me to defeat #b#o6230500##k and gather up #b50 #t4000144#s#k for #p1012109# of #m100000000#.\n\n#t4000144# #b#c4000144#/50#k
I gave #p1012109# of #m100000000# #b50 #t4000144#s#k. Hopefully THIS will help me finish up the book.

string.name: name
string.value: A Puppet

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
Apparently #p9120011#'s doll just walked out and disappeared. I better check out this story.

#p9120011#'s doll apparently just walked out on her and disappeared. Maybe this has something to do with the #b#t4000144##k that #p1012109# is looking for. I should go to #b#p1012109##k's place and talk to him.
#b#p1012109##k seems to catch on to something here.

string.name: name
string.value: Tsuri's Special Seafood 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Tsuri's Special Seafood
Tsuri of Showa Town seems to be in a tight spot. Wonder why...
It would be nice to go catch a fish without having to go underwater, but ... oh well, that's alright. You should get #b#t04000153##k that #b#o3210450##k has. \n\n#t04000153# #b#c04000153##k/1
It'd be nice to catch a fair share of fishes, but ... I'll have to come back later and see how this goes.

string.name: name
string.value: Tsuri's Special Seafood 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Tsuri's Special Seafood
Now that Tsuri has #b#t04000153##k with him, will he be good at catching those fishes? I better go check him out...
Hah, I wound up having to catch for him. I'll need to get #b100 #t04000158#s#k from #b#o4230200##k.\n\n#t04000158# #b#c04000158##k/100
That bowl of rice covered in Poopa's eggs does not look enticing at all. Does it taste alright? I think I'll let others find out...

string.value: An Old Code

string.name: parent
string.value: A Puzzling Code
Kinokonoko of the Mushroom Shrine apparently found something. I should check it out.
Kinokonoko asked me if I could solve this puzzling code. What does this code mean...?
I managed to solve the code Kinokonoko gave me--answers lie in Sleepywood.

string.name: name
string.value: Umi Needs Money

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
I heard #r#p9120005##k of Showa Town is setting up a master plan. I better hear this.

She wanted to purchase a machine owned by #r#p2050002##k which is made out of the finest technology in the universe, but was short on money, so #r#p9120005##k asked me to pitch in for her. #n5,000,000 mesos is a LOT of money...
I handed #r#p9120005##k 5,000,000 mesos. Can she buy it, though?

string.name: name
string.value: Lazy Alien Grey

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
Apparently, #r#p9120005##k paid for the machine to #p2050002##k, only to keep waiting for the machine to come. #nIn any case, I better talk to #r#p9120005##k.
#r#p9120005##k asked me to convince #r#p2050002##k to send the machine to her. \nIn any case, I should meet up with #r#p2050002##k.
I was able to meet #r#p2050002##k. This is it!

string.name: name
string.value: The Arrogant Alien Gray

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
I better negotiate with #r#p2050002##k so the machine can be sent to Showa Town ASAP.

After eating lunch, #r#p2050002##k claims that he'll send the machine to Showa Town, no problem. \nThis really irritated me, but I'll have to gather up #b400#k #b#t4000117#s#k in order for that to happen.\r\n#t4000117# #b#c4000117##k/400
Just as #r#p2050002##k demanded, I got him #b400 #t4000117#s#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Good Luck

string.name: parent
string.value: Umi's Ambition
As promised, #r#p9120005##k sent this to #r#p9120005##k. I better go see it right now.
In order to create a new item, it'll require #b10#k #b#t4011005#s#k. \nI've gone through too much to give up on this. Let's go!\r\n#t4011005# #b#c4011005##k/10
I was able to make the item, but was this investment really worth it?

string.name: name
string.value: Sophia's Snack
#r#p1022100##k seems very fatigued.
In order to make a tasty #r#t2010005##k, she'll need #b20#k #b#t2012002#s#k. I should take out the monsters around the stump area, and I'll get them in no time.\n#b#t2012002# #b#c2012002##k/20
I received #r#t2010005##k as promised. It tasted great, and I feel rejuvenated!

string.value: Todd's How-to-Hunt
I hear #b#p9101002##k can teach us how to hunt.

#b#p9101002##k taught me to move towards upper right-hand side to attack by pressing #rCtrl#k and kill #b1 x #o9409000##k and #b1 x #o9409001##k, then talk to #b#p9101001##k... 

Tutorial Leatty #b#a81421##k
Tutorial Drumming Rabbit #b#a81422##k
#t4000300# #b#c4000300#/1#k
#t4000301# #b#c4000301#/1#k
As #b#p9101002##k's taught me, I hunted down the monsters.
