string.value: Around Lith Harbor

string.name: parent
string.value: MapleStory Basic Knowledge
#b#p1002101##k at Lith Harbor wants to tell Maplers who have completed their 1st job advancement all the great things Lith Harbor has to offer. Perhaps you should go hear him out.

#b#p1002101##k says the Ribbon Pigs are great if you want to train around Lith Harbor. If you hunt Ribbon Pigs and bring him proof, he just might give you something useful. 

#t4000017# #b#c4000017#/1#k
#t04000002# #b#c04000002##k/20

#b#p1002101##k commented on how strong you've gotten and gave you two types of pills. Put them to good use.\r\n\r\nAfter reaching level 20, you can talk to Kino Konoko in the Mushroom Shrine to begin the next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Relaxing at the Mushroom Shrine

string.name: parent
string.value: MapleStory Basic Knowledge
#p9110002# at the Mushroom Shrine has something to ask you. Talk to her and find out what she has to say.

#b#p9110002##k says she wants to take a day off to have a picnic near the shrine, where the cherry blossoms are in full blossom. Bring her some food for her much deserved break.
You can get Maple Special Bento boxes by hunting Blue Mushrooms.

#t2022016# #b#c2022016#/2#k

As a token of appreciation, #b#p9110002##k gave you an item which will help you in your future adventures.\r\nAfter reaching level 30, you can talk to Shururu at the Ninja Castle to begin the next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Playing Around in Ninja Town

string.name: parent
string.value: MapleStory Basic Knowledge
#bShururu#k in Ninja Town is obsessed with making a new top. Find out if there is anything you can do to help.
#bShururu#k says the wood used by ninjas is some of the best in existence. Gather some Genin Dolls for him. \n\n#t4000337# #b#c4000337#/30#k
#bShururu#k was ecstatic when you brought him the materials for his new top. You're just glad he didn't scream. Screaming toddlers give you a headache.

string.name: name
string.value: A Little Mischief
#p9110112# is looking for help. Go and find out what this is about.
You have been given a top secret mission from #p9110112#. Gather 100 #b#t04000338#s#k from #b#o9400401##k? What will he do with them? \n\n#t04000338# #b#c04000338##k/100
You delivered 100 #t04000338#s to #p9110112#. He probably isn't planning on using it for anything bad... Or is he?

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Others

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ninja Castle
#p9110112#'s daughter, #p9110103#, seems pensive. Find out what's making her worry.
#p9110103# has asked you to find someone to help you investigate Ninja Castle. But where will you find someone to help you investigate such an unsettling castle?
You found someone who is willing to investigate the castle with you!

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ninja Castle
#p9110114# seems willing to accept you as an ally. Find out the details.
Now you must prove your abilities. Collect 50 #b#t04000344#s#k from the #b#o9400406##k and deliver them to the #b#p9110108##k. \n\n#t04000344# #b#c04000344##k/50
You collected 50 #t04000344#s and delivered them to #p9110108#.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Info

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ninja Castle
Ask #p9110108# to share the current situation with you.

#p9110108# has requested that you collect 50 #b#t04000340#s#k from #b#o9400403##k and 1 #b#t04000342##k from the #b#o9400405##k to deliver to someone. But who...? 

#t04000340# #b#c04000340##k/50
#k#t04000342# #b#c04000342##k/1
You have collected 50 #t04000340# and 1 #t04000342#, and delivered them to #p9110106#.

string.name: name
string.value: A Peaceful World

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ninja Castle
Something still doesn't feel complete. Talk to #p9110106# to see if she has any insight.
You completely forgot about #p9110103# initial request! #p9110106# says you should give her the #t04000345#, which will help her father return to normal. \n\n#t04000345# #b#c04000345##k/1
You delivered the #t04000345# to #p9110103#. Who knew the #t04000345# meant so much to her? #p9110112# is sure to return to his normal self once he sees it!

string.name: name
string.value: Pet's Evolution1
I heard there's a rumor that the Baby Dragons can be evolved. Unfortunately, the only way to find out is to meet up with the grotesque-looking Karnox. I better go see him...
I better protect the Dragon's egg from the vicious egg hunters such as Lupins and Cold Eyes and need to gather #b50Lupin's Bananas#k and #b50 Cold Eye Tails#k.
Thankfully, Karnox acknowledged my true love for the Baby Dragon and promised to help my pet evolve.

string.name: name
string.value: Pet's Evolution2
I have sufficiently proved my love for the Baby Dragon. However, Karnox stated that special materials are required in order to evolve the Dragon...
In order to evolve the Baby Dragon, I'll need to deliver 1 #b#t5380000##k and 10,000 mesos to Karnox.
The Baby Dragon has successfully evolved and has grown up rather nicely.

Apparently, Ace of Hearts can make a chocolate basket that extends the power of love using a number of #t4140100#s.

[#p2041017#] said with #t4140100# and additional materials, he can make a #b#t4140200##k that expires at a later date. Apparently, it's good for #r5 days#k, longer than that of #t4140100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Artifacts

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ - Start
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!

I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to bring 10 #b#t4031664#s#k 10 #b#t4031665#s#k and 10 #b#t4031666##k to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: Finding Jack
I heard that John Barricade has received news from his brother Jack! I should go find John in Bigger Ben and see what he's learned.

Apparently, Jack Barricade is in Masteria and has discovered Crimsonwood Keep deep in the Phantom Forest. However, the last letter John received from his brother was dated over a month ago. John wants me to head to Crimsonwood after him and see why Jack's communiques have stopped. Looks like I need to make my way through the Phantom Forest... I'd better stock up on potions!

I found Jack Barricade resting in a cave on Crimsonwood Mountain. It turns out that after exploring the Masterian wilderness for weeks, Jack finally came across the ancient stronghold - only it wasn't deserted. Jack was captured and imprisoned in the Keep by the evil soldiers I've been seeing around, but luckily managed to escape. John will be relieved that Jack is okay.

string.name: name
string.value: Storming the Castle

To enter the Grandmaster Hall of Crimsonwood Keep and find the new twisted Masters, Jack Barricade says I'll need to find some way to open the gate to the Keep's Inner Sanctum. Perhaps someone who has firsthand knowledge of the Keep will know what I need... and I know just who to ask!

I asked Lukan about the Inner Sanctum Gate, and as I surmised, he knew how to get in. Being a well-respected Stormcaster Knight, he was given a #bCrimsonwood Keystone#k by the Keep's Grandmasters. However, Lukan thinks that I'm mad to assault the castle and refuses to give me the key, calling it a suicide mission. However, if I can whittle down the Keep's defenders, he'll relent and give me the Keystone. I've already put the hurt on the Stormbreakers, but I'll need to defeat at least #b75 Windraiders, 75 Firebrands#k, and #b75 Nightshadows#k more to put a sizeable enough dent in this evil army!

I defeated the twisted Crimsonwood warriors! And true to his word, Lukan gave me his #bCrimsonwood Keystone#k. He also said that although the Keystone will physically unlock the Inner Sanctum Gate, the red energy field that surrounds them is foreign to him, and likely a new addition by the Keep's new Masters. I should take the key back to Jack Barricade and let him know what I've discovered.

string.name: name
string.value: The Fallen Woods

I've heard people say that there's a band of bandits in the Phantom Forest. Maybe they're responsible for the travelers that go missing in the woods. Perhaps I should investigate and see if there is any truth to this story

Turns out that these so-called bandits are not responsible for any disappearances, at least so they say. However, I'm still not really sure why they're camped out here in the middle of these haunted woods. Their leader, a mysterious tough named #bTaggrin#k, seems quite unfriendly to strangers. Taggrin said that there was one thing I could do however: #bcut down the possessed Phantom Trees#b and bring him #b25#k of their #bseeds#k. I'm not sure why he wants them, but I guess the fewer angry trees around the better for everyone.

I fulfilled Taggrin's request and brought him the fallen seeds from the Phantom Trees. He seemed to warm up to me for doing this, and has opened the bandit's camp up to me. Now I can buy and sell things from their provisioner, Mo. Whew, this has definitely saved me the effort of having to trek all the way back to NLC!

string.name: name
string.value: The Fallen Warriors
I should speak to Taggrin to see if he has another task for me.

Taggrin has one more task for me: he wants me to hunt down the #bElder Wraiths#k and collect #b50 of their Elder Ashes#k. Warning me that this would be no easy task, he explained that the wraiths are the souls of brave Crimsonwood Keep warriors who fell in battle in the forest, protecting the Keep from the invading Krakians. Never given a proper burial, they have become mindless undead, threatening the Keep's foes and innocent travelers alike. With these ashes, Taggrin intends to give these noble lost souls the final rest they so rightfully deserve.

Taggrin was impressed that I manage to collect the ashes from the Elder Wraiths. I can now speak to #bFiona#k about #bupgrading any Raven Ninja gear#k I may have! Taggrin also mentioned that the talented ninja smith has experimented with some weapon designs of her own; I should speak to her about the possibility of #bcrafting new items#k from scratch.

string.name: name
string.value: Lost in Translation 1
I should see if Jack Barricade needs my help with anything...

Jack needs John's help, and needs me to be the go-between. He wants me to deliver a letter to his brother in NLC; the #bCoded Communique#k contains a transcription of some strange symbol code that he saw while being held in Crimsonwood Keep. Hopefully, with his expertise in ancient languages, John should be able to decipher it. I should hop to it! I have a feeling some serious events are unfolding...

Looks like Jack was right about the symbols he saw in the Grandmaster Council Hall; the Versalian code seems to indicate that the new Masters are planning to attack NLC with the soldiers they're training! It's going to be up to us to stop them!

string.name: name
string.value: Lost in Translation 2
I should see if John needs my help with anything...

After showing John the #bCoded Communique#k that Jack gave me, John used a Hyper Glyph to try to decipher the symbols... to no avail. While John attempts to fix and recalibrate the Hyper Glyphs to work on these symbols, he asked me to show the letter around to the #bother experts in town#k. Maybe they can shine some light on all this...
I told John about Elpam's translation, and John was able to fill in some more of the blanks for me. I need to get this new information Jack and see what else he knows...

string.name: name
string.value: Lost in Translation 3

I showed the #bCoded Communique#k to Elpam Gorlab, and he recognized the symbols as being #bVersalian#k! Elpam translated what he could and gave me a #bTranslated Communique#k. I should show this to John immediately!
I must traverse Crimsonwood Mountain and get this new information Jack and see what else he knows...!
I reached Jack and gave him the info-he's going through it all now...

string.name: name
string.value: Stemming the Tide

The Versalian code that Jack uncovered and that Elpam translated points to some sort of imminent attack on New Leaf City by the Twisted Masters' army. It's up to us to stop them! I should talk to John...
Someone who has firsthand knowledge of the Keep. I think I have an idea who might be able to help.

I brought Lukan's #bCrimsonwood Keystone#k to Jack. I explained what Lukan told me: that this would unlock the gate mechanically, but the red energy field was a new development. Jack thinks he can figure out a solution for the magical barrier, but he'll need some time. I should check in with him later and see if he's made any progress.

string.name: name
string.value: Catch a Bigfoot by the Toe

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter...

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and I'm pretty sure I'm getting the short end of the stick on this one. I have to venture into the Phantom Forest and find this creature they've named Bigfoot and claim its toe as the proof of bounty. Everyone else who's gone after this thing has never come back-I'd better stock up on potions and keep my guard up-who knows when it could appear?

I found this mysterious creature, and Lita wasn't kidding when she said it wrecked everyone that came after it! Although, when I was fighting it, I got the feeling that the Leprechaun on its back was just luring him into things...maybe it just doesn't know better? At any rate, I returned the Toe to Lita and claimed the Bounty. The more mesos, the better!

string.value: Catch a Bigfoot by the Toe.

string.name: name
string.value: Attendance Check
I wonder what #b#p9200000##k will give me if I give him these items I collected for the last 2 weeks.
I came to MapleStory everyday and collected all the scrumptious lunch items. From what I hear, it has something to do with the 5 types of snacks I collected...
I gave #b#p9200000##k the lunch snacks I had collected for 14 days. Hope they didn't rot! Anyways, he seemed ecstatic and gave me a cool lunchbox that can be used as a weapon.

string.name: name
string.value: Donate Your Notebook
I wonder what all the commotion is about. Rumor has it that there's a race going on. The team that collects the most Notebooks will win. The reward is also said to be very nice...
I'm really anxious to find out which team is winning. I gotta get more players involved to win this race!
I gave Maple Administrator the Notebook. She seemed very ecstatic, as if it was for him... seriously, what did she do with all those notebooks?

string.name: name
string.value: Maple 7th Day Market opens tomorrow!
Tomorrow is the day of the Maple 7th Day Market!
Maple 7th Day Market opens tomorrow! Come join us!
Maple 7th Day Market opens tomorrow! Come join us!

string.name: name
string.value: Maple 7th Day Market
Today is the day of the Maple 7th Day Market!
Today is the day of the Maple 7th Day Market! It's here every Sunday!
Maple 7th Day Market is here today.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping the daughter of the poultry farm owner, Lazy Daisy
Let's go to the Maple 7th Day Market and find Lazy Daisy, the daughter of the poultry farm owner.

You will be rewarded for tending to Lazy Daisy's egg. The egg grows every time you hunt, and leaving the UI open will bring optimal results. And for the egg to grow into a chicken, you must apply the growth powder which is distributed by the Maple Admin daily. If you have succeeded in growing your egg to a chicken, you should go see Lazy Daisy who is visiting Henesys on Saturday.
You have successfully hatched Lazy Daisy's egg! You will be rewarded if you succeed more than 5 times, so let's try again!

string.name: name
string.value: Hatch the egg
There are things to be done in order to tend Lazy Daisy's egg successfully. Let's go see the GM.
You must go find the GM every day from Monday through Friday, and receive the growth powder and apply it on the egg.
You receive the growth power for today. Hurry up and apply it on your chicken.

string.name: name
string.value: Dinner Fixins'
It's time for Thanksgiving and I'm ready for some home cookin'! I should pay Mom and Dad a visit over in Henesys!

I'm helping Mom and Dad make Thanksgiving dinner! I have to gather one of each ingredient: 1 ear of #b#t2020029##k, a can of #b#t2022262##k, a #b#t2022263##k, bowl of #b#t2022264##k and best of all, #b#t2022261##k. They promised me an #b#t4031529##k if I return quickly. I guess the Turkeys stole all the ingredients to make Thanksgiving fixins'... I guess they think that without the fixins', there'll be no dinner! No dinner? No way! Time to defeat some battle-hardened Turkeys!

My trusty weapon did a fine job of ruffling those rowdy turkeys' feathers, and I obtained all of the ingredients for Mom and Dad. In return, they gave me my #b#t4031529##k! I guess doing chores does pay off! I can take this to any of the Store Vendors in New Leaf City, and receive a #bNexon Game Card#k for it! ...I'd better get out of here before Aunt Petunia shows up! Mom mentioned that I can help her with dinner once a day until it's time to eat!

string.name: name
string.value: The Spirit of Maplemas
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to Maple Claws. I'm sure she's back in town now in Happyville.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to Maple Claws about Suzy's dilemma. Maple Claws listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Maple Claws gave me a message for Suzy: that as long as she remembers the essence of the Maplemas Spirit, it doesn't really matter what holiday traditions she chooses to follow this year. I should return to Suzy with Maple Claws' message once I've also spoken to O-Pongo.

string.name: name
string.value: Happy Versalmas to You
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I should go see O-Pongo in New Leaf City if I want to give it to him. Decisions, decisions...
I'm thinking it's Versalmas for me this year! All I have to do now to cement my decision is to actually give Little Suzy's Wishlist to O-Pongo. I can't wait! It's time for a change of pace!

Looks like I'm celebrating Versalmas this year! I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to O-Pongo, and he gave me this awesome #bVersalmas Hat#k for me to wear proudly! Every time I bring O-Pongo presents I've collected from monsters, he'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents to him in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring him presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing O-Pongo more presents will also help me earn #bVersalmas Cheer#k! If the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k, O-Pongo will have something really nice for me at the end of the event!

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
Hmm, that woman looks like she's preparing some sort of celebration... I should check it out.

I spoke with Hannah, and she's preparing a Festival of Lights. I've agreed to help her build the Altar by gathering 25 Altar Pieces. She mentioned that the monsters would already have an axe stuck in them, so I should hunt those.
I collected the 25 Altar Pieces and returned to Hannah. She was happy, and began building the Altar. She also mentioned that I could come back for more work when I have a chance

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Piece of Mind of Maple
#bChief Stan#k knows about your quest for the #rMind of Maple#k. He is awaiting your arrival, so go prove your worth to him.

Follow the instructions #bChief Stan#k, and defeat the monsters to gather up the appropriate items and prove him your worth.

#t4032234:##r #c4032234#/20#k
#t4032235:##r #c4032235#/20#k
#t4032236:##r #c4032236#/20#k
#t4032237:##r #c4032237#/20#k
#t4032238:##r #c4032238#/20#k
You have finally received an item of approval from Chief Stan. What does this have to do with restoring #rMind of Maple#k?

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Ghost-scaring Chinese Firecrackers

The Lunar New Year is dawning upon us, and unfortunately, the town has been invaded by ghosts. In Asian mythology, the firecrackers are set off on New Year's to scare away ghosts. Apparently, the firecrackers made with the mysterious Asian powers have the power to produce explosions loud enough to totally eliminate these ghosts, and bring peace to the start of the new year. Better find Mr. Moneybags in Henesys for more information.

The God of Goods uses his special powers to create special firecrackers for these occasions. These firecrackers have the special power of scaring away ghosts with their ear-ringing explosions. \r\n#t4001128# #b#c4001128##k/30
I got a firecracker. Now I can able to repel ghost.

string.name: name
string.value: Finding the Ghost
Now that I have the Chinese Firecrackers with mysterious powers laden in it, the next stop for me is to go find a town where the ghosts are, and eliminate them with the firecrackers.
These Chinese Firecrackers with mysterious powers have to be set off near the ghosts. These ghosts are not necessarily easy to find, so I better keep my eyes open. \n\n#o9500197# #r#a85701##k
Awesome... this should bring peace and happiness to this year.

string.name: name
string.value: 2006 Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Yellow)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up...

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service...

#t2022065# #b#c2022065#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k with the #rEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #bEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad...

string.name: name
string.value: 2006 Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Green)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up...

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service...

#t2022066# #b#c2022066#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k with the #bEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #rEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad...

string.name: name
string.value: Anniversary : Birthday Present (Red)
I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 1st birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bRED birthday present#k for me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031306# #b#c4031306#/1#k
I found the #bRED birthday present#k and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me, and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Anniversary : Cody's Quest
Cody is supposedly in need of help. I should go see him at Henesys...

Cody said he's preparing a big party for the MapleStory staff with food and everything, but he forgot to buy the birthday candles for the cake! He seemed to be in a state of emergency, and asked me if I could gather up #b10 Birthday Candles#k for him. #bBirthday Candles#k? That's weird...\n\n#t4031305# #b#c4031305#/10#k

I gave him the #b10 Birthday Candles#k he requested. He seemed very much relieved by the fact that the party won't be ruined after all. He gave me a #rMaple Flag#k as a reward. Wow, I haven't seen these in a while!

string.name: name
string.value: Anniversary : Birthday Present (Blue)
I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 1st birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bBLUE Birthday Present #kfor me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031307# #b#c4031307#/1#k
I found the #bBLUE Birthday Present#k, and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Independence Day : Cody's Barbecue Party
Cody from Henesys is looking for my help. I hear that it is only for the limited time. Better go to Henesys and check out what he wants before time runs out!

Cody mentioned he is throwing a #rBarbecue party for Independence Day#k! He needs #b50 Pigs' Heads, 50 Tree Branches and 50 Leathers#k to prepare for the Barbecue. I wonder what leather has to do with a Barbecue...

#t4000017# #b#c4000017##k/50 
#t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/50 
#t4000021# #b#c4000021##k/50
I gave #bCody#k the materials needed for the Barbecue! I got some #bdelicious Barbecue#k and an #bIndependence Day Hat#k for a reward!

string.name: name
string.value: Independence Day : Alien Invasion
#bAgent Marco#k of the Omega Sector is looking for heroes to protect our World. I need to get to him before all hope is lost.

#bAgent Marco#k needs help on exterminating the #rPlateons#k on Boswell Fields. I heard that a tremendous number of Plateons are taking over the Boswell Fields and coming toward the Omega Sector. I need to take out bunch of Plateons and bring #b100 Plateon Helmets#k to Agent Marco of the Omega Sector as a proof of my mission's success.\n\n#t4000121# #b#c4000121##k/100
After I gave Agent Marco all #b100 Plateon Helmets#k, I received the #bStars and Stripes#k. This flag represents my support for the independence of our World.

string.name: name
string.value: Nanuke and the Chair
Nanuke apparently has something for everyone. He's way out there at the Whale Island. I should go see him...

Nanuke and his huskies greeted me with open arms. He proceeded to give me a resting chair as a way of celebrating the summer. Pretty ironic, considering he lives in perhaps the coldest place in MapleStory. Anyway, I should sit on this chair and relax for a bit...

string.name: name
string.value: Thanksgiving : Turkey Yellow Egg hunt
It looks like Cody of Henesys needs help finding Turkey eggs...

I'm on a mission to find as many #bYellow Turkey eggs#k as I can for Cody, who has a strange liking for Turkey Egg omelets. I'm going to find as many as I can and bring them back to Cody for prizes! I've heard tamed turkeys can be found around Victoria Island.

#k
#t4031416# #c4031416# / #r1#k
The event is over, and I was able to help Cody find #bsome Yellow eggs#k. He looked pretty happy, but I think he got so many eggs he'll start to chirp...ha!

string.name: name
string.value: Thanksgiving : Turkey Green Egg hunt
It looks like Cody of Henesys needs help finding Turkey eggs...

I'm on a mission to find as many #b Green Turkey eggs#k as I can for Cody, who has a strange liking for Turkey Egg omelets. I'm going to find as many as I can and bring them back to him for prizes! I've heard wild turkeys can be found around Ossyria and Sleepywood.

#k
#t4031417# #c4031417# / #r1#k
The event is over, and I was able to help Cody find some eggs. He looked pretty happy, but I think he got so many eggs he'll start to chirp...ha!

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar
Hmm, that woman looks like she's preparing some sort of celebration... I should check it out.

I spoke with Hannah, and she's preparing a Festival of Lights. I've agreed to help her build the Altar by gathering 25 Altar Pieces. She mentioned that the monsters would already have an axe stuck in them, so I should hunt those.
I collected the 25 Altar Pieces and returned to Hannah. She was happy, and began building the Altar. She also mentioned that I could come back for more work when I have a chance

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Blessing the Festival

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
I promised Hannah I'd return to her once I was rested up. I should head back soon.

Upon my return, Hannah was joyous, having finished the Altar. She now needs candles to signal the start of the ceremony. I'll have to get 9 candles (she mentioned Horned Mushrooms) and bring them back so the Festival of Lights can begin.
I acquired the nine candles and gave them to Hannah. The Festival of Lights has begun!

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Wishes 1

string.name: parent
string.value: New Year : New Year's Wishes
Can't believe its New Year's already! Looks like the Maple Administrator has something for me!
Can't believe its New Year's already! Looks like the Maple Administrator has something for me!
The Maple Administrator opened my present for me! Sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Wishes 2

string.name: parent
string.value: New Year : New Year's Wishes
It's New Year's! I should visit the Maple Administrator to get my present opened!
It's New Year's! I should visit the Maple Administrator to get my present opened!
The Maple Administrator opened my present for me! Sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Blessing the Festival reward

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
Now that I have the Hanukkah Present Box, I'll need to get this opened to see what's inside. Better go talk to Hannah.
Hannah promised to open the box for me. The box seems heavy though, so I may get something nice in return...
Hannah helped open up the box, and I got to receive what's inside it. Not bad!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden
I see Jacob, the garden caretaker over there! Why does he look so worried? Maybe I can lend him a hand.

I talked with Jacob, who's trying to expand his garden. He's sent me to gather #b25 Cherry Blossom seeds#k, #b10 Silk Feathers#k and #b10 Leather#k. I've heard that Sakura celions might have the blossom seeds. In return for this, he's agreed to give me some high-quality potions. I bet they taste delicious...
I got the materials that Jacob needed to expand the garden. He mentioned he might have more work for me if I needed it. I'll pay him a visit soon!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden 2 - Finishing Touches

string.name: parent
string.value: Amoria : The Sakura Garden
Jacob mentioned he'd need more help. Perhaps I should pay him a visit?

I went to see Jacob again, and his Sakura Garden is just about done. He wants to do something special for the first guests, so I've agreed to provide #b20 White/Purple Gift Boxes#k, #b10 Lupin Dolls#k and #b10 Toy Baby Seals#k. Shouldn't be too tough, and he's mentioned something special if I finish...
I finished getting everything for Jacob and returned to him for my reward-#bBlossom Juice#k! It tastes great!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Beginner

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Beginner
The wife of a sailor, eh? I'll bet she needs some help.

I spoke with the lovely Angelique, and I'm going to deliver #b25 Stiff Feathers#k to her husband, Richard, for her. He works on Tae Gong's ship in Aqua Road. Once I have everything, I'll head there, drop everything off, and let Angelique know her husband has everything.
I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Marriage
Congratulations! You're now married! Now go in peace and forever celebrate love!
Congratulations! You're now married! Now go in peace and forever celebrate love!
Congratulations! You're now married! Now go in peace and forever celebrate love!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Red Dahlia - Magician
Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy, shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Circle of Trust 1 (The Unmarried Couple)

string.name: parent
string.value: Circle of Trust
An unhappy couple in Amoria? I should go find out what's wrong...
I spoke with Gary and Shatima, and it looks like their rings were broken and taken in to #b20 Ring Fragments#k by some Tweeters. Looks like I'll have to clip some wings to find them all...
I returned to the Rings to Gary and Shatima, and now they can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Circle of Trust 2 (A Bond is Forged)

string.name: parent
string.value: Circle of Trust
An unhappy couple in Amoria? I should go find out what's wrong...
I spoke with Gary and Shatima, and it looks like their rings were broken and taken in to #b20 Ring Fragments#k by some Tweeters. When I have them all, I am going to head over to Moony.
I returned to the Ring fragments to Moony, and now Gary and Shatima can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!

string.name: name
string.value: Spot On : An Interesting Chore

string.name: parent
string.value: Spot On
Mom and Dad need some help at home. I'd better go visit and see how I can help them.
I visited Mom and Dad and they looked pretty happy to see me. They need a #bMouse#k for their new computer, and heard that Mr. Spot would have one. He's in Kerning City, so I'd better get a move on.
I returned to Mom and Dad with the #bMouse#k, and they gave me #bAllowance#k. Now I can return to Mr. Spot and get a #bNexon Prepaid!#k

string.name: name
string.value: Spot On : Go See Mr. Spot

string.name: parent
string.value: Spot On
Mr. Spot is in Kerning City, and he has something that could help Mom and Dad. I'd better go see my parents first before I visit him.
I visited Mr. Spot and got the Mouse for Mom and Dad. I can get a #bNexon Prepaid#k from Mr. Spot if I ask them for #bAllowance#k. I'll cross my fingers...
I got my #bNexon Prepaid#k! I should keep it, because it will turn into Maple Points soon! SWEET!

string.name: name
string.value: Circle of Trust - Repaired Ring
I've lost the Ring I got from Moony on the way back to Gary and Shatima. Maybe Moony can help me out...
Moony has the Ring! I am saved. This time I should be very careful.
I got the Repaired Ring from Moony again, and now Gary and Shatima can get married! Phew, a lot of work, but well worth it!

#t4000003# #b#c4000003#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/100#k
I got the Easter Basket from the Maple Administrator. Mad Bunny may need this for something... I should go see him now.

string.value: Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Green)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up...

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service...

#t2022066# #b#c2022066#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k with the #bEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #rEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad...

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Anniversary : Birthday Present (Red)
I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 2nd birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bRED birthday present#k for me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031306# #b#c4031306#/1#k
I found the #bRED birthday present#k and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me, and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Anniversary : Birthday Present (Blue)
I should go visit the MapleStory Administrator. I heard MapleStory is celebrating its 2nd birthday, and she may have something in store for me...

The MapleStory Administrator said we'll be celebrating the anniversary in style and that there is a #bBLUE Birthday Present #kfor me to look for. Now, where must that be...\n\n#t4031307# #b#c4031307#/1#k
I found the #bBLUE Birthday Present#k, and gave it to the Maple Administrator. She opened the present for me and gave me what was inside. That was pretty sweet!

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Anniversary : Cody's Quest
Cody is supposedly in need of help. I should go see him at Henesys...

Cody said he's preparing a big party for the MapleStory staff with food and everything, but he forgot to buy the birthday candles for the cake! He seemed to be in a state of emergency, and asked me if I could gather up #b10 Birthday Candles#k for him. #bBirthday Candles#k? That's weird...

I gave him the #b10 Birthday Candles#k he requested. He seemed very much relieved by the fact that the party won't be ruined after all. He gave me a #rMaple Flag#k as a reward. Wow, I haven't seen these in a while!

string.name: name
string.value: About the Amorian Challenge!
Ames the Wise has good news for me. It looks like his brother, Amos the Strong, has finished his hunting ground for married couples. I should stop by and get some more info!

I visited Ames the Wise, and he explained the Amoria Party Quest in detail\n\nI must visit Amos the Strong at the end of Purplewood Forest, and if I'm #bmarried,#k I can enter. I can either bring my #bspouse or go at it solo#k. I must team up with #b5 other married people#k, and from there, the adventure begins!

That wasn't so bad! Amos the Strong seems much different from his brother Ames--he had muscles coming out of his muscles! To enter his hunting ground, I must be married, and can either bring my spouse or go at it with 5 other married people. I should visit Amoria more often...I wonder what else is in this land...

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ - Start
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!

I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to bring 10 #b#t4031664#s#k 10 #b#t4031665#s#k and 10 #b#t4031666##k to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ.
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!
I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to grab 30 #b#t4031659#s#k and bring them back to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ...
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!
I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to grab 30 #b#t4031660##k and bring them back to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: Deciphering the Scroll of Secrets
Maybe I should see Geanie at Ludibrium to seek help in deciphering the Scroll of Secrets.
Geanie said to open this magic box, she'll need #b#t4031072##k for it, and the only way to obtain it is by defeating #b#o2230103#s#k.
I requested Geanie to decipher this scroll of secrets, and received the magic box as a reward. Once I opened the box with the key, I was shocked by what I found inside.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing
You hear that you can receive help from Teo in Lith Harbor...

You meet #bTeo#k in Lith Harbor. Teo says that you remind him of when he was younger, and he wants to help you. He says that he will recognize your potential and support you if you bring him #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b30 #t4000004#s#k... For an awesome adventurer like you, this should be a piece of cake.

#t4000016# #b#c4000016##k/50

#t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/30
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, who you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that should come handy during your adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Beat the Heat <Easy> - 2nd Stage

string.name: parent
string.value: Beat the Heat <Easy>
I should go visit Maple Administrator for Beat the Heat, 2nd Stage.
For the 2nd Stage task, the Maple Administrator asked me to gather up #b10 #t4031167#s#, which can be obtained by hunting #b#o1110100##k and #b#o1110101##k.\n\n#t4031167# #b#c4031167##k/10
I met the Maple Administrator, and passed the 2nd stage of the Easy level of #bBeat the Heat#k.

string.value: Beat the Heat <Medium>
I should go visit Maple Administrator for Beat the Heat, 2nd Stage.

I met the Maple Administrator, and passed the 2nd stage of the Medium level of #bBeat the Heat#k.

string.value: Beat the Heat <Hard>
I should go visit Maple Administrator for Beat the Heat, 2nd Stage.
For the 2nd Stage task, the Maple Administrator asked me to gather up #b15 #t4031169#s#k, which can be obtained through #b#o4230104##k and #b#o4230115##k. \n\n#t4031169# #b#c4031169##k/15
I met the Maple Administrator, and passed the 2nd stage of the High level of #bBeat the Heat#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Torr's Horn
I heard #p2002002# of Happyville has lost something very important...

I heard #p2002002# of Happyville lost something very important, so I went to see her. I found her crying, and it turns out that... she lost her horn?!? How can you lose a horn?? She asked me to find her horn but... where can it be?\n\n#t4031063# #b#c4031063##k/1
I found Torr's horn at the Cash Shop, and gave it back to her. She was ecstatic, to say the least. I hope she doesn't lose it anymore...

string.name: name
string.value: Valentine's Day : Heart Chocolate
You can make a special chocolate for the special someone with the ingredients you can gather up yourself. Go see Ace of Hearts and make the Valentine's Day Chocolate full of love!

#b#p2041017##k said he can make a nice package for a chocolate with a heart-shaped box, laden with a special spell full of love, as long as I gather up the materials for both the chocolate and the package. #t4031110#, and #t4031109# can be acquired through monsters, while #t4031111# and #t4031112# can be acquired through #bCoco#k. 

#t4031110# #c4031110# / #r1#k
#t4031109# #c4031109# / #r1#k

#t4031111# #c4031111# / #r1#k
#t4031112# #c4031112# / #r1#k
Ace of Hearts helped me make a Heart Chocolate laden with a spell full of love. \n\n"The power of love shall protect you..."

string.name: name
string.value: Valentine's Day : Chocolate Basket
Apparently, Ace of Hearts can make a chocolate basket that extends the power of love using a number of #t4140100#s.

[#p2041017#] said with #t4140100# and additional materials, he can make a #b#t4140200##k that expires at a later date. Apparently, it's good for #r5 days#k, longer than that of #t4140100#.

#t4140100# #c4140100# / #r1#k
#t4031110# #c4031110# / #r1#k
#t4031109# #c4031109# / #r1#k
#t4031113# #c4031113# / #r1#k
#t4031114# #c4031114# / #r1#k
I was able to make a chocolate basket for the person I dearly love for the Valentine's Day through [#p2041017#].

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Attack
#p9010000# has a request about keeping the town safe...

Long ago, a warrior sealed away evil monsters. But the seal's gotten weak and the monsters have escaped. The town is now in danger of attacks from these monsters... #b#p9010000##k is calling brave adventurers to protect the town from these monsters and retrieve #b1 #t4031282##k, which is the source of their power.
Many adventurers fought together, restoring the town to peace. However, it doesn't seem as if that peace will be maintained for long.

string.name: name
string.value: Evil Energy Sealed
How was the #t4031282#'s seal released? Regardless, go to #m105040300# to find #p1061011#, who is said to be able to seal the #t4031282#.

You meet #b#p1061011##k at #m105040300#. He says that he needs #b1 refined #t4011001##k in order to create a lock that can seal the #b#t4031282##k.

#t4031282# #b#c4031282##k / 1
#t4011001# #b#c4011001##k / 1
The Evil Energy was sealed with the help of #p1061011#.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search for the One Who Remembers...
You defeated the monsters that attacked the town and brought the #t4031282# to #p9010000#. #p9010000# sees the dangerous #t4031282# and shivers...

#b#p9010000##k, who saw the #t4031282# and felt that it was dangerous, introduces you to someone who could seal the #b#t4031282##k. His name is b#p1061011##k... To find him, travel to #r#m105040300##k, a town located inside a dungeon...
You were able to find #p1061011# at #m105040300#, a town inside a dungeon.

string.name: name
string.value: Vikin's Treasure Chest
They say that #p9000009# has finished his voyage and returned...

#b#p9000009##k says if you eliminate #r100 #o2230101#s# and #r100 #o2110200#s#k, who used to torment him as a child, he will let you see the Treasure Chest he found during his travels.

#o2110200# #r#a93801##k
#o9101001# #r#a93802##k

You defeated the monsters who used to torment #p9000009# as a child and got a chance to see the Treasure Chest. He thanked you for defeating the monsters and gave you one of the treasures inside the chest to show his appreciation.

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for Ericsson
They say that #p9000009# has finished his voyage and returned...

#b#p9000009##k says that he received assistance from #b#p2012018##k during his voyage to Ossyria and would like to pay him back. Bring the #b#t4031285##k and #b50 #t4000021#s#k to #b#p2012018##k.

#t4031285# #b#c4031285##k / 1
#t4000021# #b#c4000021##k / 50
You safely brought the #t4031285# you received from #p9000009# and the 50 #t4000021#s you gathered to #p2012018#. #p2012018# gave you one of the treasures contained in the #t4031285#.

string.name: name
string.value: A gift for Ayan
They say that #p9000009# has finished his voyage and returned...

#b#p9000009##k says that he wants to give a #b#t4031286##k he found on his voyage to #b#p1022007##k who lives in #b#m102000000##k. Eliminate #r100 #o4230400#s#k that #p1022007# is afraid of and go to #b#p1022007##k in #m102000000#.

#t4031286# #b#c4031286##k / 1
#o4230400# #r#a93821##k
You eliminated the #o4230400#s that #p1022007# is afraid of and safely delivered the #t4031286#.

string.name: name
string.value: Vikin's Black Treasure Chest
A Treasure Chest that #p9000009# picked up during his voyage won't open...

Of the Treasure Chests that #b#p9000009##k brought back from his voyage, there is a black Treasure Chest that won't open. In order to open this Treasure Chest, he will need a key made of stone. He says that he will need #b30 #t4000022#s#k, #b30 #t04000025#s#k, and #b10 #t04000177#s#k in order to make a stone key and asks that you bring him the materials.

#t4000022# #b#c4000022##k / 30
#t4000025# #b#c4000025##k / 30
#t4000177# #b#c04000177##k / 10
You brought back the three different types of Golem Rubble required to make the Stone Key. #p9000009# made a key and opened the black Treasure Chest.

string.name: name
string.value: Vikin's Blue Treasure Chest
A Treasure Chest that #p9000009# picked up during his voyage won't open...

Of the Treasure Chests that #b#p9000009##k brought back from his voyage, there is a blue Treasure Chest that won't open. In order to open this Treasure Chest, he needs a Mystical Key. He says that in order to make a Mystical Key, he needs #b100 #t4000185#s#k that you can get from #r#o6230600#s#ks and asks that you get them for him.\n\n#t4000185# #b#c4000185##k / 100
You obtained the #t4000185#s#k dropped by the #o6230600#s in order to make the Mystical Key. #p9000009# was able to open the blue Treasure Chest.

string.name: name
string.value: News of Vikin's Return
The #p9010000# says that she has some interesting news. What could it be?
The Administrator says that #b#p9000009##k recently returned from a long voyage and brought back lots of Treasure Chests. Treasure Chests... what could be inside? Go see #b#p9000009##k and find out.
#p9000009#, who returned from his voyage, seemed very tired but was still in a good mood thanks to all the Treasure Chests he acquired.

string.name: name
string.value: MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza
To commemorate the 3 year anniversary of MapleStory, apparently there's going to be a huge event. I better go see #b#p9010000##k in town.
I better find #b#t04031297##k that a lot of the monsters around the area may have.\n\n#t04031297:# #b#c4031297#/1

I took the party invitation, clarified that I'm a traveler in the world of Maple, and received #b#t1002508##k. #b#p9010000##k can't make it to the party, and asked me instead to talk to #b#p1002100##k of Lith Harbor.

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's Permission
#b#p1002100##k, who lives in Lith Harbor, wants to join the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza.. I better help #b#p1002100##k make her way to the party.

To earn the permission from her dad, #b#p1002100##k decided to make a Mushroom Stew for him. 
 #eMushroom Stew: Ingredients#n 
#t04000011:# #b#c04000011#/5#k 
#t04000009:# #b#c04000009#/5#k 
#t04000012:# #b#c04000012#/20#k 
#t04000015:# #b#c04000015#/20 
 #r!Warning : Please do not lose #b#t1002508##k.
After helping #b#p1002100##k in her quest to go to the party, she strengthened my #b#t01002508##k as promised.

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's Errands
#b#p1002100##k, who lives in Lith Harbor, wants to join the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza.. I better help #b#p1002100##k make her way to the party.

#b#p1002100##k says she can't go to the party until she takes care of the errands her dad gave her. I better help #b#p1002100##k make it to the party. 

#o2230100# #r#a93881##k
#o3230100# #r#a93882##k 
#r!Warning : Do not lose #b#t1002508##k.
After helping #b#p1002100##k in her quest to go to the party, she strengthened my #b#t01002508##k as promised.

string.name: name
string.value: Party with Jane
#b#p1002100##k, who lives in Lith Harbor, wants to join the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza.. I better help #b#p1002100##k make her way to the party.

In order to attend the party with #b#p1002100##k, I'll have to prove my level of courage and power to her dad by slaying tough monsters.

#t04000028:# #b#c04000028:#/3#k 
#t04000046:# #b#c04000046:#/3#k 
#o7130100# #r#a93891##k
#o7130101# #r#a93892##k 
#r!Warning : Please don't lose #b#t1002508##k.
After helping #b#p1002100##k in her quest to go to the party, she strengthened my #b#t01002508##k as promised.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Maple Hat
If I ever lost #b#t01002508##k before the training, I'll need to meet up with Maple Administrator at a nearest town.
Hopefully she has spare #b#t01002508##k for me...
Fortunately, I was able to receive #b#t01002508##k again.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secrets Behind the Mundane Statue
Apparently, the truth behind the long-time legend of mysterious Monster Statue is out... I better go see #b#p9010000##k and hear the story behind it.
I better go see #b#p2040050##k, the one responsible for uncovering truth behind these strange Monster Crystal Statues.
I met up with #b#p2040050##k, who knows the secret behind these Monster Crystal Statues...

string.name: name
string.value: The Mysterious Monster Crystal Statue
Apparently, #b#p2040050##k discovered the hidden secrets behind the Mundane Monster Statues. I better go visit #b#p2040050##k.
After gathering up the gems, #b#p2040050##k gave me a new Monster Crystal Statue. I can turn into a monster for a short period of time with this!

string.name: name
string.value: Maple GM's Congrats on the 3 year Anniversary
#b#p9010000##k wanted to show his appreciation to everyone in MapleStory for the support, and wants people to see him.
MapleStory is now 3 years old all thanks to you!
Hope you enjoy MapleStory for many years to come! The best is yet to come!

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes Needs the Eraser
Hughes seems to be in need of help. I better go see him.
Hughes has been trying to go on with his research, but told me he needs an eraser to continue...
I got Hughes the eraser he's been seeking.

string.name: name
string.value: A Revenge on Gray the Alien
I should go see Alien Gray.
Whoa... Gray is taking an interest to this eraser... I mean, it's really nothing but a piece of rubber... okay, this is a good time to avenge the prank he pulled on me...
I wound up trading a useless eraser for a very useful item.

string.name: name
string.value: An Immovable Sword
I heard there's a #bMysterious Sword#k at Perion. I should check it out.

I saw a long sword stuck in a pile of ashes, so as I approached it, I heard a deep voice resonating the area. The voice introduced itself as the rightful owner of the sword, and asked me to free him from the sword by pulling it out of the ashes. In order to do so, I'll need #bMonster Eraser#k and #b#t4001115##k...

#t4001115# #b#c4001115#/1#k
#t4001038# #b#c4001038#/1#k
#t4001039# #b#c4001039#/1#k
#t4001040# #b#c4001040#/1#k
#t4001041# #b#c4001041#/1#k
#t4001042# #b#c4001042#/1#k
#t4001043# #b#c4001043#/1#k

After bringing both the Monster Eraser and #t4001115#, the power of the sword seemed to have come back, and freed the sword from the ashes. In the end, I was able to get my hands on #t01302063#. Hopefully the owner of the sword is also set free in the process.

string.name: name
string.value: Hectagon Crystal Necklace and the Seal Cushion
#bArwen#k of #bEllinia#k seems to be enamored with jewelry...

Arwen's eyes after seeing the Hectagon Crystal necklace told a whole story. She really seemed to want one. She said she'll give me the precious Seal Cushion if I give her #bHectgon Crystal Necklace#k and a #bMonster Eraser#k...

#t4001116# #b#c4001116#/1#k
#t4001038# #b#c4001038#/1#k
#t4001039# #b#c4001039#/1#k
#t4001040# #b#c4001040#/1#k
#t4001041# #b#c4001041#/1#k
#t4001042# #b#c4001042#/1#k
#t4001043# #b#c4001043#/1#k
After giving her the Hectagon Crystal Necklace and a Monster Eraser, I was able to obtain a lovely Seal Cushion.

string.name: name
string.value: Han the Broker and the Mystical Mineral
#bHan the Broker#k seems to want the strange mineral you got recently... Go to Magatia and meet with him.

Han the Broker says that he has been looking a long time for that mineral and requests a trade. When you refuse, he tells you that he will reward you handsomely if you bring him the mineral along with monster erasers... He seems a bit shady but rumors do say that he is a fair guy when it comes to business... 

#i4001197##t4001197# #b#c4001197#/1#k
#i4001038##t4001038# #b#c4001038#/1#k
#i4001039##t4001039# #b#c4001039#/1#k
#i4001040##t4001040# #b#c4001040#/1#k
#i4001041##t4001041# #b#c4001041#/1#k
#i4001042##t4001042# #b#c4001042#/1#k
#i4001043##t4001043# #b#c4001043#/1#k

Once Han the Broker received all the items, he mumbled to himself while smiling happily. Something about how he can now overpower the man in blue tights who wears his underwear outside... Huh? You think you might know who he is talking about... Then does that mean that bluish mineral is...?

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing I
You hear that you can receive help from #b#p1002001##k in Lith Harbor...

You met #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says that you remind him of his younger days when he was just starting out on his adventures, and he would like to help you. He says that he will honor and support you if you bring him #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k. For an awesome explorer like you, this should be a piece of cake. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, whom you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that will come in handy during your adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II
Go to #b#p1002001##k who has helped you previously.
You proved to #b#p1002001##k just how much stronger you've become.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing I
You hear that you can receive help from #b#p1002001##k in Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says you remind him of when he was younger, and he wants to help you. He says that he will recognize your potential and support you if you bring him #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50#t4000004#s#k... For an awesome adventurer like you, this should be a piece of cake. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, who you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that should come handy during your adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II
Go to #b#p1002001##k, who helped you before.

#b#p1002001##k wants you to prove how strong you've become.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k
You proved to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger.

string.name: name
string.value: Collaborative Effort: First Time Together
#b#p9010010##k says that she has some advice...
#b#p9010010##k spoke about the importance of collaboration and said that #b#p9020000##k in Kerning city can teach you a lesson on that. A trip to Kerning City may be in order.
In Kerning City, you learned a different method of fighting.

string.name: name
string.value: The Crystal Ball: Dimensional Crack
There seems to be a problem with #b#p9010010##k's Crystal Ball...

#b#p9010010##k says that she uses the Crystal Ball to watch over the entire Maple World and that the crack in the Crystal Ball indicates a dimensional crack... #b#p9010010##k asks that you head over to Ludibrium to stop the dimensional crack.
You stopped the dimensional crack and #b#p9010010##k's Crystal Ball became fixed as well. #b#p9010010##k's Crystal Ball really is amazing!

string.name: name
string.value: Consoler of the Goddess: Remnant of the Goddess
#b#p9010010##k says that her Crystal Ball revealed an interesting phrase...

#b#p9010010##k says that her Crystal Ball revealed to her the phrase, 'Who will console the Goddess...' She says that you have the ability to solve this riddle and asked that you go see #b#p2013000##k in Orbis.
You and the other party members awakened the Goddess Statue. Has this helped the Goddess recover from her sadness?

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Revenge: Lord Pirate
Lord Pirate...the infamous pirate whose whereabouts are unknown. But #b#p9010010##k claims that she knows where he is...

#b#p9010010##k says that an old friend of hers was previously victimized by Lord Pirate and asks that you go to Mu Lung to defeat him. Will you be able to defeat Lord Pirate? Go see #b#p2094000##k in Herb Town.
You had no idea that #b#p2094000##k would be a bellflower. In any case, it's a good thing you were able to defeat Lord Pirate.

string.name: name
string.value: Cody's Valentine
I heard Cody was acting like he's madly in love. I better go see for it myself.

#p9200000# seemed to have a big-time crush on Maya, and wanted to surprise her with a Valentine's day gift. Since he couldn't go anywhere, he asked me if I could deliver chocolate for him, so I obliged. No one's better at making chocolate Cookers.\n\n#t04140100# #b#c04140100#/1#k
On behalf of Cody, I gave Maya the #b#t04140100##k. She seemed very much ecstatic. Hopefully this is the start of something good...

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Magic
#b#p9010010##k says she has perfected a new magic.
You can earn bonus EXP with the help of #b#p9010010##k's magic when you hunt monsters. The magic will last until April 1st.\r\nHunt #r#M9680##k and earn #r#x9680# #kbonus hunting EXP.
You received bonus EXP with #b#p9010010##k's magic when hunting monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Week Sept 6th
Something good might happen if you go see #b#p9010010##k.
#b#p9010010##k says if you give her a scroll, she will use magic to increase the success rate of your scroll by 5%. You can only do that 5 times today, so choose wisely.
#b#p9010010##k has traded your scroll for a better one with higher success rate. How nice of her.

string.name: name
string.value: To Fool a Liar

Wanted: A great liar? Apparently, #b#p9010010##k is looking for explorers that can help protect Maplers from monsters, and she is looking for a great liar... What is that supposed be? I better go talk to #p9010010# right now.

#p9010010# mentioned that #r#p9010011##k was hatching a plan to transform into a human and pull some pranks on unsuspecting Maplers, and she wants to prevent that from happening by having him sniff the Flower Petals of Transformation, which will prevent him from transforming altogether. But she warned that #r#p9010011##k wouldn't believe it if I just gave it to him as is, so we have to trick him into believing that the petals will actually help him transform into a human much easier... There are plenty of #p9010011#s #baround #m100000000##k, though... how am I going to tell which one is really him? \n\n#i4031583##t4031583# #b#c4031583#/10#k
I managed to give #t4031583# to #p9010011#. This will prevent him from transforming into a human for an hour, right?

string.name: name
string.value: Help out Gordon!
Cassandra seems to be depressed. What could maker her sad? I better go talk to her.

Gordon of El Nath had been busy creating a wooden puppet called Pinocchio, and it seems like he is stuck in limbo because he's short on materials to finish the puppet... better start gathering up some materials for Gordon\r\n\r\n#i4031933# #t4031933# #b#c4031933# / 30#k
I gathered up the materials and gave it to Cassandra. She seemed elated that she would be able to help Gordon with these new materials.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Winston's Research
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

You must eliminate the monsters that are getting in the way of Dr. #b#p1022006##k's research and report back. 

#o0130100# #r#a98401##k 
#o1110101# #r#a98402##k
You were a great help in Dr. #b#p1022006##k's research.

string.name: name
string.value: Violent Monkeys
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

Teach those violent monkeys and Malady a lesson and report back to Estelle.

#o3210800# #r#a98411##k 
#o4230101# #r#a98412##k
#o5300100# #r#a98413##k
You eliminated the monkeys that were pestering Estelle.

string.name: name
string.value: Icarus's Mushroom Bites
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

Icarus is craving Mushroom Bites. Collect the ingredients and take them over to #b#p1052106##k.

#o2220100# #r#a98421##k 
#o1120100# #r#a98422##k 
#t04000009# #b#c04000009#/20#k 
#t04000006# #b#c04000006#/20#k
You helped #b#p1052106##k make delicious Mushroom Bites.

string.name: name
string.value: Garden of Three Shades
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
It appeared to have been enchanted by #b#p9010010##k's magic.

string.name: name
string.value: Regulate the Star Pixies
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
Hunt the Star Pixies that are casting magic on anyone and everyone, and report to #b#p2012020##k. \n\n#o3230200# #r#a98441##k
You regulated the Star Pixies that were out of control.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wailing White Fang
#b#p2030001##k seems to have something to tell you.
Eliminate the White Fang and report to #bCassandra#k. \n\n#o5140000# #r#a98451##k
You defeated the White Fang that was wailing loudly.

string.name: name
string.value: The Clocktower
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

Take care of the problem at the Clocktower and report to #b#p2040029##k. 

#o4230113# #r#a98461##k 
#o4230114# #r#a98462##k
You took care of the problem at the Clocktower.

string.name: name
string.value: Guard the Omega Sector
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
Eliminate the aliens that are threatening the safety of Omega Sector and then rush over to #b#p2050012##k to report your progress. \n\n#o4230118# #r#a98471##k
There are a lot of aliens remaining, so don't let your guard down yet.

string.name: name
string.value: A Small Pond
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
It appeared to have been enchanted by #b#p9010010##k's magic.

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Test
Did you hear #b#p2091000##k, the physical trainer of Mu Lung, might need help?

#b#p2091000##k says your test is to defeat Grizzly and Panda. They may just be bears, but they are training to become masters, so defeating them won't be as easy as you think.

#o5120500# #r#a98491##k 
#o6130203# #r#a98492##k

You have returned after defeating Grizzly and Panda. However, No Gong says you still have a long way to go until you can become a master. What? Why does he keep doing this? Is he even planning on making you into a master?

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's Test
Did you hear #b#p2091001##k, the mental strength trainer of Mu Lung, might need help?

#b#p2091001##k says he wants to test your progress and has asked that you defeat the Book Ghost and Sage Cat. He says the Book Ghost and the Sage Cat have mastered magic, so defeating them won't be as easy as you think.

#o6130209# #r#a98501##k 
#o5120506# #r#a98502##k
You have returned after defeating the Book Ghost and the Sage Cat, but he said you needed to continue training, as that's the only way for you to become a master.

string.name: name
string.value: Snake Pit in the Swamp
#b#p1052000##k in Kerning City is being called Alex the coward. Why is he being teased for being a coward? Talk to Alex.

#b#p1052000##k saw a snake pit and told his friends, but no one believed him and accused him of being a coward. Well, it is a bit hard to believe... A snake pit? Really? When Alex sensed your skepticism, he instantly teleported you to the snake pit in the swamp, saying you should see it for yourself and hunt 50 Jr. Neckis!\n\n#o2130103# #r#a98511##k
#b#p1052000##k was telling the truth. In the swamp, there was a snake pit filled with slithering Jr. Neckis. Eeeeeek! No wonder Alex was so frightened.

string.name: name
string.value: Forked Road: West Sea
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something she needs to tell you right away. Click on the light bulb above her head.
#b#p9010010##k seems to have something she needs to tell you right away. Click on the light bulb above her head.
#b#p9010010##k appears to have some sort of magic put on her...

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Magic
#b#p9010010##k says she's working on mastering new magic.
#b#p9010010##k's magic can earn you bonus EXP when you hunt monsters. \r\n#r#M9860##b Additional EXP #r#x9860# #bacquired#k when hunting.
You earned bonus EXP by hunting monsters with #b#p9010010##k's magic.

string.name: name
string.value: Growing a Sprout
#bCassandra#k is handing out a pretty Pot. Head over to #bCassandra#k.
The sprout in the Pot grows every time you hunt, but she says it'll grow even faster if you double-click the Pot and let it receive sunlight.
You have delivered a Pot to #bCassandra#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Magatia, the City of Alchemy
A new region has been discovered recently. If you wish to find out about the city of alchemy, talk to Cassandra, who claims to know everything about Maple World.
Cassandra says she can use her magic to send you over to Magatia. If you are determined to go to Magatia, talk to #bCassandra#k.
You have arrived in Magatia, the city of alchemy.

string.name: name
string.value: Wanted: Mano
#bCassandra#k has something to tell you. Rush over to her.
Defeat Mano, who controls the snails, and return to #bCassandra#k. \n\n#o2220000##r #a98801##k
You have done #bCassandra#k a favor. Help her once a day until September 28th.

string.name: name
string.value: Wanted: Stumpy
#bCassandra#k has something to tell you. Rush over to her.
Defeat Stumpy, who controls the stumps, and return to #bCassandra#k. \n\n#o3220000##r #a98811##k
You have done #bCassandra#k a favor. Help her once a day until September 28th.

string.name: name
string.value: Gift From Cassandra
#bCassandra#k says she'll be giving gifts once a day until October 26th.
#bCassandra#k says she'll be giving gifts once a day until October 26th.

#bCassandra#k gave you a gift! You can receive one gift per day and if you receive a gift every single day of the event, you'll be entered into a drawing for a prize. \n#bThe more you participate, the better your chances of winning#k, so log in every day!

string.name: name
string.value: Torn Scroll
Talk to #bCassandra#k if you are curious about the #b#t04001136##k.

#bCassandra#k said you can exchange 30 #t04001136#s for an ATT scroll from her. 
#t04001136#s can be obtained from the gift box Cassandra gives you every day. 

#i04001136# #t04001136# #b#c04001136#/30#k
You received a Weapon ATT scroll from #bCassandra#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Magic
#b#p9010010##k says she has perfected a new magic.
You can earn bonus EXP with the help of #b#p9010010##k's magic when you hunt monsters. The magic will last until November 30th.\r\nHunt #r#M9890##k and earn #r#x9890# #kbonus hunting EXP.
You received bonus EXP with #b#p9010010##k's magic when hunting monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Collect Pumpkin Pieces
#p2120000# is hosting a Halloween party at the #rHaunted #m229000000##k. The friendly yet slightly eerie looking #r#p2120003##k awaits your arrival...

#p2120003# wants me to collect and bring her the #b#t2022255##k left over from making halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. She says that she will give me a #b#t1002699##k which she made herself, as a gift in return. Let me follow #p2120003# to go make a Jack-o'-Latern. \n\n#i2022255# #t2022255# #b#c2022255#/50#k.
I brought the #t2022255# to #p2120003# and received a #t1002699# in return. Apparently, only 1 pumpkin hat is made per day, so I should go get myself a pumpkin hat to wear to the party.

Lately I see a strange group of people wandering all over the Maple World. They display confident looks with weapons I have never seen anywhere else...and a scent of the ocean to boot. Who are they really? I better ask #b#p9010010##k for more information on these strangers.

#p9010010# was making quite a scene about ''them'' having finally arrived. The "they" she referred to was the #bPirates#k! Cassandra proposed that if I was interested in the Pirates, then she'll allow me to experience a small dose of that. I'll just have to prove it to her that I am indeed interested in the Pirates... I better answer the #bquestions#k Cassandra asks and earn #b#t2210010##k!
I received #b#t2210010##k from #p9010010#. With this, I may be able to experience the mysterious skills of the Pirates! I should also stop by the Nautilus, near Hensys and see them for myself!

string.name: name
string.value: Tienk's Monster Card
Tienk, who is at Lith Harbor, said he would give me a monster card as a 4 Year Anniversary gift...
Tienk said he will give me a monster card as a gift if I bring him a Maple Leaf.
I gave a Maple Leaf to Tienk and received a Monster Card as a gift.

string.name: name
string.value: 4 Year Anniversary Level Up event
When you level up, I will give you a Maple Leaf that is crucial for the 4 Year Anniversary event.
When you level up, I will give you a Maple Leaf that is crucial for the 4 Year Anniversary event.
When you level up, I will give you a Maple Leaf that is crucial for the 4 Year Anniversary event.
