string.name: name
string.value: Putting the Maple Leaf in my mouth...
I should go see #b#p9010010##k. She said she was going to tell me some special information in light of MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary...

Collect #t04001126#? It's hard to believe that it's a #b#t01012098##k... but it is said to be very potent. It's not like I need to collect a large amount. I should give it a try\n\n #i04001126# #t04001126# #b#c04001126##k / 50

I got a #b#t01012098##k! After I put it in my mouth, I feel like my abilities increasing. It feels invigorating. Oh, but what if it doesn't increase the abilities I need?\n...I'll just go see #p9010010# in two hours. I'm sure she'll know what to do.

string.name: name
string.value: Making Maple Syrup
I should go see #p9010010# and learn how to make #b#t01012098##k better.
#bMaple Syrup#k? I should get this done right away. I can enhance my Maple Leaf by doing just that? What a bargain!.\n\n#i04001126# #t04001126# #b#c04001126##k / 25

#p9010010# really made the Maple Syrup for me just like that. I wonder if she didn't already have it pre-made. #p9010010# said to come back in 30 minutes and she'll make Maple Syrup for me again. \n I did hear that Maple Syrup can corrode the #t01012098# so I should use it carefully.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Latest Information

string.name: parent
string.value: Snow Silk and the Mysterious Fabric
Cassandra, maple world's informant, is said to have obtained some new information hot off the press. I'm curious what it is.
Cassandra told me about the Snow Silk. But for some reason she wouldn't explain in detail and kept telling me to just go see the archeologist, #bWinston#k...
Maple world's informant, Cassandra, notified me of her latest information, the Snow Silk. I went to go see Winston, the archaeologist who is looking for this Snow Silk.

string.name: name
string.value: Materials for the Mysterious Fabric

string.name: parent
string.value: Snow Silk and the Mysterious Fabric

Winston the archaeologist said the reason he is looking for the Snow Silk is to get the #bMysterious Fabric#k, which is made from Snow Silk. The Snow Silk is said to add Mysterious Power to any object that is made with it and he said if I'm interested in this #bMysterious Fabric#k, to gather #b10 Snow Silks#k and to go see Arwen the Fairy.\n\n#i4001166# #t4001166# #b#c4001166# / 10

As Winston the archaeologist advised, I gathered 10 Snow Silk and went to go see Arwen the fairy. Arwen was amazed that I collected 10 Snow Silk and secretly made the Mysterious Fabric for me without the other fairies knowing. Arwen warned me of the Mysterious Fabric's power and advised me that if she were to have a Mysterious Fabric, that she would go see #e#bFrancois #k#n.

string.name: name
string.value: Francois' Latest Work

string.name: parent
string.value: Snow Silk and the Mysterious Fabric
Mysterious Fabric that I got from Arwen... What should I make with this? Should I go see Francois like Arwen mentioned? But she seems a little strange though...

As Arwen suggested, I went to go see Francois with the Mysterious Fabric. Francois said she will make me her latest creation and asked me to bring her one more ingredient; an item that is common but not ordinary, small but possessing great power... She wants me to bring her #b50 Maple Leaves#k...\n\n#i4001126# #t4001126# #b#c4001126# / 50

After contemplating what to do make with the Mysterious Fabric I received from Arwen, I decided to go see Francois as Arwen suggested. Francois told me she would make me an item she just recently created and asked me to bring her 50 more Maple Leaves. She then made me a #bMaple Cape#k. Wow~ this is great!

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Maple Leaf
A Golden Maple Leaf fell from a full grown maple tree. I should take it to Gaga who is the keeper of the maple trees.
I took the golden Maple Leaf to Gaga, the keeper of the maple tree.

I should take the Golden Maple Leaf that fell from the Maple Tree to Gaga, the Maple Tree keeper. Gaga said that this Maple Leaf can be used to plant another Maple Tree and gave me a gift for bringing it to him.

string.name: name
string.value: Speed Quiz
I hear Cassandra has prepared a speed quiz in time for winter break.
I should try again in a little bit!

string.name: name
string.value: Vanished Mysterious Fabric
The Mysterious Fabric disappeared from me all of a sudden. I should go talk to Arwen.

The Mysterious Fabric disappeared from me all of a sudden. I went to go see Arwen and she said if the Mysterious Fabric isn't kept properly, it can melt away and disappear... She could make me another one but she would need more materials this time. As Arwen requests, I should gather #b12 Snow Silks#k and bring it to her.\n\n#i4001166# #t4001166# #b#c4001166# / 12
The Mysterious Fabric disappeared from me all of a sudden. Arwen said it was because I didn't properly take care of it. I brought her 12 more Snow Silks and she made me another one.

string.name: name
string.value: Repairing the Maple Cape
I think my Maple Cape has a hole. I should go see Francois.

When I went to go see Francois to repair my Maple Cape, she told me she doesn't know how to repair it. Instead, she told me to go see #Lisa#k from Orbis who taught her how to make the cape. She also told me to take #b10 Snow Silks#k just in case she needs it to repair the cape.

#i4001166# #t4001166# #b#c4001166# / 10
#i1102166##k #t1102166# #b#c1102166# / 1

Francois told me to go see #bLisa#k in Orbis to repair the hole in the Maple Cape... When I took the Maple Cape along with 10 Snow Silks to Lisa, she not only perfectly repaired it with her hidden sewing skills but she also made the cape stronger than before. I had no idea Lisa had this kind of skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcaster's Advice
I get the feeling that my Maple Cape's vibrant color has faded a bit. It seems less shiny... I should go see Lisa who repaired the cape before.

I decided to go see Alcaster on Lisa's referral... Lisa did mention that I'll probably need #b10 Snow Silks and 10 Maple Leaves#k, so I should gather all the materials before I go see Alcaster.

#i4001166# #t4001166# #b#c4001166# / 10#k
#i4001126# #t4001126# #b#c4001126# / 10#k
#i1102167# #t1102167# #b#c1102167# / 1

With Alcaster's help, I was able to recharge the power into the Maple Cape. It even seems to fit me better than before. Alcaster told me that the cape is excellent item which is rare to find these days. I will take good care of it and use it for a long time.

string.name: name
string.value: Operation MS-07
Agent W is on an important mission to transport something of great value. But who are the unidentified beings that are following Agent W? You begin a conversation with Agent W.
You defended the memory chip Agent W entrusted to you.

Agent W was headed towards headquarters to transport #b#t3994089##k #i3994089#, which contains important information about #e#rMaster M#k#n. However, some unidentified assailants started chasing him, so he had no choice but to hand the memory chip to you. \r\nHe said that he will give you an #e#rExcellent Agent Badge#k#n if you can protect the memory chip for #r1 hour#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Suspicious Offer?!
An urgent message was sent from #b#p9000021##k.
An urgent message was sent from Agent #b#p9000021##k.

#bGaga#k asked you to become an agent out of nowhere...and you agreed! Now what? Hmm, come ot think of it, the #bMaple Admin#k and #bCassandra#k both looked suspicious with their black sunglasses. Time to interrogate #bGaga#k for more details.

string.name: name
string.value: Co-op with Special Agent O
Gaga, who's now a secret agent, says he has someone he wants to introduce you to. Who could it be?

Gaga, who 's suddenly a secret agent, suggests you work with Special Agent O. He says you can find Special Agent O at the mini dungeon entrance...n
#b<Mini Dungeon Area where agent O could be>
- Victoria Island: #m100020000#
- Victoria Island: #m105040304#
- Victoria Island: #m105050100#
- Ludus Lake: #m221023400#
- Nihal Desert: #m260020300#
- Nihal Desert: #m261020300#
- Minar Forest: #m240020500#
- Minar Forest: #m240040511#
- Minar Forest: #m240040520#
Through Gaga's introduction, you met Special Agent O. He's quite the character.

string.name: name
string.value: Number of Special Agent Badges

Special Agent O tells you to go to the mini dungeon and bring back #b#t4031988##k from the Agent Box which appears after 30 minutes.
#i4031988# #t4031988# #b#c4031988# / 1

#k Each time you collect 10 badges, you'll receive #bAgent O's Nylon Gloves#k and when you collect 100, you can get #bAgent O's Leather Gloves#k.
Special Agent O asked you to disarm the Agent Box in the mini dungeon and retrieve a Special Agent Badge, and you successfully completed his mission.

string.name: name
string.value: Agent W's Watermelon Investigation
The Maple Admin wants to talk to you.

The Maple Admin said that #e#rMaster M#k#n has planted bombs Chumji's watermelons and asked you to retrieve them. Get to Chumji's watermelon field with the Maple Admin's help, then collect #b5 #t4031701##k and take it to #rAgent W#k at agent headquarters.\r\n#i4031701# #t4031701# #b#c4031701# / 5#k

There was intelligence that #rMaster M#k planted a bomb in Chumji's watermelon field. You carefully picked 5 watermelons and delivered them to Agent W, who's a self proclaimed demolitions expert. You don't feel all that safe around him...

string.name: name
string.value: Agent C's Intelligence Activity
Gaga sent you a strange message.

Secret Agent Gaga tells you to collect 5 Intelligence documents from party quests and then meet Agent C. 

#b<Party Quests where you can find Agent C>
- Moon Bunny's Rice Cake: Level 10 or higher
- First Time Together: Level 21 - Level 30
- Crack of Dimension: Level 35 - Level 50
- Tower of the Goddess: Level 51 - Level 70
- Lord Pirate: Level 55 - Level 100
- Romeo and Juliet: Level 71 - Level 85
- Poisonous Fog Forest: Level 45 - Level 55

 #kEach time you retrieve 5 Intelligence documents you will receive #bAgent C's old Receiver#k, and when you retrieve 100 Intelligence documents, you will receive #bAgent C's Titanium Titanium Receiver#k.
Secret Agent Gaga suggested that you go see Agent C at the reward map once you get 5 Intelligence documents from the party quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Information on Master M
You collected 5 Intelligence documents. Where was Agent C supposed to be again?
You delivered the 5 Intelligence documents you gathered from the party quests to Agent C. For your good work, Agent C gave you a receiver.
You delivered the 5 Intelligence documents you gathered from the party quests to Agent C. For your good work, Agent C gave you a receiver.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order: Find Master M's Orders!
There's a strange vibe flowing through Maple World. Who is this Master M that can make everyone act so strange? If anyone, #b#p9000036##k should know. I should go visit her.
Agent E said that in order to protect Maple World, I must find #t4031999#s. \n\n#i04031999# #t4031999# #b#c04031999# / 20#k
I found #t4031999#s and delivered them. I hope #b#p9000036##k does a good job analyzing them...

string.name: name
string.value: Today's Mission!
Please check today's mission.
Clear the mission that is given to you each day!
You should clear the mission that is given to you each day! What is today's mission?

string.name: name
string.value: Obtain the Special Agent Badge!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission! 
<Hunt in the mini dungeon and obtain #b1 Special Agent Badge#k!>
Today's mission is to obtain a #bSpecial Agent Badge#k from the mini dungeon...
You should go see Agent O. If I haven't been introduced to #bAgent O#k yet, you should first go see #bAgent Gaga#k.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: Obtain the Excellent Agent Badge!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission! 
<Protect the Memory Chip and obtain #b1 Excellent Agent Badge#k!>

Today's mission is to obtain an #bExcellent Agent Badge#k. According to a trusted source, you can receive an Excellent Agent Badge by completing #bAgent W's#k #bMS-07 Mission#k.
When the time comes, #bAgentW#k will come find you...
You completed Today's Mission.

string.name: name
string.value: Participate in the Special Agent Enrichment Program!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!
<Recieve #b50 Points#k by participating in the Special Agent Enrichment Program!>#k

Today's mission is to receive #b50 Points#k by participating in the Special Agent Enrichment Program. The Special Agent Enrichment Program is a special training program created by #bAgent Kitty#k and #bAgent Meow#k. It is a method of training in which you will battle monsters that appear in stages inside a virtual location. You will receive #bPoints#k based on the difficulty of the monsters that you eliminate.You can participate alone or in a party.
You completed today's mission.

string.name: name
string.value: Earn 50 points on the Speed Quiz!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!
<Earn #b50 points#k on the Speed Quiz!>

Today's mission is to get #b50 points#k from the Speed Quiz. Go see #bAgent Cassandra#k to take a speed quiz on the items and monsters of Maple World. You get 1 point per question and the quiz can be taken once every 30 minutes. You must earn a #btotal 50 points#k for today.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: Invade the Watermelon Field!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!
<Obtain #bChumji's Watermelon#k from the watermelon field!>

Today's mission is to gather Chumji's watermelons. There has been intelligence that #rMaster M#k has planted bombs in Chumji's watermelon field. Get to the watermelon field by talking to the Maple Admin and bring back watermelons to #bAgent W#k at the agent headquarters.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: Help Agent E!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!!
<Complete Agent E's #bSpecial Operation Quest#k!> 

Agent E frequently assigns special operations to the agents to collect information on #bMaster M#k. In order to receive a special operation from Agent E, go to Agent E who is in each town.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: You are a True Special Agent!
#b#p9000021##k is said to have prepared a special gift for you for saving Maple World in the summer of 2009...
#b#p9000021##k is said to have prepared a special gift for you for saving Maple World in the summer of 2009...
2009 summerâ€¦ You were a true agent.

string.name: name
string.value: Long and Dangerous Road of an Agent
You lost the Parachute Agent Shoes that Gaga gave to you recently. You feel bad asking for another pair now, but you probably should.
Gaga seemed overly touched by the encouragement you gave in passing. He is going to give you another pair of Parachute Agent Shoes. Talk to #bGaga#k again.
Gaga gave you a new pair of Parachute Agent Shoes without any conditions. You feel bad for doubting him all this time...

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing I
You hear that you can receive help from #b#p1002001##k in Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says you remind him of when he was younger, and he wants to help you. He says that he will recognize your potential and support you if you bring him #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50#t4000004#s#k... For an awesome adventurer like you, this should be a piece of cake. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, who you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that should come handy during your adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II
Go to #b#p1002001##k, who helped you before.

#b#p1002001##k wants you to prove how strong you've become.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k
You proved to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger.

string.name: name
string.value: Surprise Event: Special Alphabet
Cassandra will be giving out a Special Alphabet Letter on Back To School day! The Cassandra is only giving it out on that one day, so you'd better go get it now!
Cassandra is apparently giving out one letter you ask for.
You received a Special Alphabet letter on Back To School day as part of MapleStory's Surprise Back To School event.

string.name: name
string.value: Taking Care of Baby Bird
You haven't seen #p9000042# around these days. What could he be up to?

#p9000042# has been busy these days #btaking care of an egg#k. A bird that flew into Maple World left an egg and #p9000042# felt sorry for it. #p9000042# says that he simply can't take care of the egg by himself anymore and needs help. Time to go see #b#p9000042##k.

#p9000042# has been busy these days #btaking care of an egg#k. A bird that flew into Maple World left an egg and #p9000042# felt sorry for it. #p9000042# says that he simply can't take care of the egg by himself anymore and needs help. Time to go see #b#p9000042##k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Snipe
A #p9000043# that has been separated from his flock is looking for help...

A snipe that was migrating to a warmer place got lost and is now separated from his flock. He wants to fly towards his friends but he can only take off by jumping off the #bJump Stand#k... To help the Snipe, talk to him using the keyword #bHelp the Snipe#k.
You helped the Snipe get up the branch. He should now be able to jump and take off. But why do you feel so uneasy...

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Bird Feather

The Baby Bird that hatched from the egg flew away freely with an indifferent and almost smug expression. The only thing left are some of its soft feathers. Hmm... Looks like #b#p9000042##k wants to say something.

#p9000042#, with tears flowing down his smiling face, says that he is thrilled the cute Baby Bird hatched. He wants to keep a #b#t4032066##k as a momento. The Baby Bird really wasn't all that cute...but maybe you should just give him a feather.
#p9000042#, after receiving the #t4032066#, jumped for joy saying that he would always treasure it. Now he's preparing to take care of the next egg...

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Request
#p9010010# wants to talk to you... She's been busy these days teasing #p9000042#. What could she want?

#p9010010# says that #b#p9000042##k seems to have become involved in something strange again and asks that you help him. It's about taking care of an egg or something. In any case #p9010010# seems to care about #p9000042# after all...

#p9010010# says that #b#p9000042##k seems to have become involved in something strange again and asks that you help him. It's about taking care of an egg or something. In any case #p9010010# seems to care about #p9000042# after all...

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Tale
The Maple Administrator says that she has something to tell you.
You should take the Maple Adminstrator's advice and talk to Manji in Perion, who started his adventures alongside the very first adventurers in Maple World. #bGo see Manji.#k
You went to see Manji in Perion who started his adventures alongside the very first adventurers in Maple World. Manji said that he would rather not retell his tales and handed you #bHis Old Diary#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Gwin's Tale
The Maple Administrator says that she has something to tell you.

You should take the Maple Administrator's advice and talk to Gwin, who started his adventures alongside the very first adventurers in Maple World. Take 1 #bDrake's Blood#k and #bgo see Gwin#k who is somewhere in Victoria's Central Dungeon.
Gwin, who was one of the first adventurers in Maple World, has yet to stop adventuring. You gave him a Drake's Blood and received his tale in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Ericsson's Tale
The Maple Administrator says that she has something to tell you.

You should take the Maple Administrator's advice and talk to Ericsson, the brave adventurer in Ossyria. #bGo see Ericsson#k in Orbis. Don't forget the Maple Administrator's advice to bring #b1 Dry Treat#k as a gift for his pet.
The Tale of Ericsson, the famous adventurer in Ossyria, is famous even amongst people who've never seen him. You brought a Dry Treat for his pet cat Nero and received his tale in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Maple Scarf
Cassandra says that she has something to tell you. Cassandra seems to know about everything going on in town. What could she want this time?
Cassandra seems to always be curious about what is going on. This time, she asks that you collect 100 Trivial Rumors dropped by monsters. Why is she so interested in rumors about other people...
You brought Cassandra 100 Trivial Rumors and received a Maple Scarf in return. Putting this around your neck should keep you warm and toasty!

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Favorite Song
Look what you found! A Pop Star's Hit Songs CD... You wonder what you could do with this?

After giving much thought as to what you should do with the Pop Star's Hit Songs CD, you decided to give it to Gaga as a gift. He was begging me for it after all... Wait a minute! Could it be that Gaga never gave up on his secret dream of becoming a pop star himself?

After giving much thought as to what you should do with the Pop Star's Hit Songs CD, you decided to give it to Gaga as a gift. He was begging me for it after all... Wait a minute! Could it be that Gaga never gave up on his secret dream of becoming a pop star himself?

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Special Gift
#bCassandra#k seems to have something she wants to say to you...
#bCassandra#k says that she has something to give you...
#bCassandra#k gave you a strange medicine. Should you drink it?

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Complaint
Gaga's face appears sad for some reason. What could be wrong? You should hear Gaga's story.

You ask Gaga why he is so sad. Gaga says that he has tried very hard at doing the things he wants to do and that nothing has worked out. He says that effort alone isn't enough. You try to console him but he seems to just get more sad.

You ask Gaga why he is so sad. Gaga says that he has tried very hard at doing the things he wants to do and that nothing has worked out. He says that effort alone isn't enough. You try to console him but he seems to just get more sad.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Truth?!
Cassandra seems to have something she wants to say to you.

Cassandra grumbles saying that she is bored because Gaga is so lethargic these days. She always has fun teasing Gaga, but it's not fun when he's like this. In order to cheer him up, she asks you to gather some White Monkey Puppets of Luck for him. She emphasizes that she is not asking because she feels bad about teasing him so much.\n\n#i4032087# #t4032087# #b#c4032087# / 10

Cassandra grumbles saying that she is bored because Gaga is so lethargic these days. She always has fun teasing Gaga, but it's not fun when he's like this. So you gathered some White Monkey Puppets of Luck for Gaga.\nCassandra emphasized that she doesn't feel bad about teasing him so much but you don't think she is being honest. Gaga seemed really happy about the gift and was filled with anticipation about good luck coming his way. Gaga said luck should always be shared and gave you a Mysterious Box.

You better find the book that contains Cygnus' beliefs and values, and read what's written on it.
You managed to read Vol.1, which was torn.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing I
You hear that you can receive help from #b#p1002001##k in Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says you remind him of when he was younger, and he wants to help you. He says that he will recognize your potential and support you if you bring him #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50#t4000004#s#k... For an awesome adventurer like you, this should be a piece of cake. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, who you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that should come handy during your adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II
Go to #b#p1002001##k, who helped you before.

#b#p1002001##k wants you to prove how strong you've become.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k
You proved to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger.

string.name: name
string.value: Starlight Festival
Exciting Maple star festival that resembles the twinkling stars in the sky! If you'd like to participate in the Starlight Festival, go see #bCassandra#k from #bFebruary 5th to February 20th#k!
Exciting Maple star festival that resembles the twinkling stars in the sky! You will receive a star every hour you keep the Giant Star safe.
Exciting Maple star festival that resembles the twinkling stars in the sky! You will receive a star every hour you keep the Giant Star safe.

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Richie's Compass
Cassandra says something went wrong on Gold Richie's Treasure Island. Rush over to #bCassandra# and talk to her.
If you need a compass to give you directions to Treasure Island, talk to Cassandra.
If you've collected #bN,E,W,S for the Compass#k from the monsters, double-click the #b#t2430007##k to make a #t2430008# which will take you to Gold Richie's Treasure Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Pig's Egg
If you have a #b#t4001255##k, go find #bGoldrich#k across Treasure Island.
Goldrich seems extremely interested in your #b#t4001255##k.
When you gave #b#t4001255##k to Goldrich, he gave you EXP in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Making Pure Perfume 1
The young adventurers of Maple World seem to have become frightened by something! What could have happened? Go to #p9010010# and find out.

#p9010010# says that there is a hidden monster that attacks young children. This giant monster identfies children by their scent. In order to be camouflaged as a young child, you'll need their scent...
Cassandra made #t2430009# which smells just like a child. The monster is sure to mistake you as a child if you put on this perfume.

string.name: summary
string.value: Collect #b30#t4032271#s#k which are the ingredients for the #b#t2430009##k and give them to Cassandra!

string.name: name
string.value: Making Pure Perfume 2

string.name: name
string.value: Making Pure Perfume 4
The young adventurers of Maple World seem to have become frightened by something! What could have happened? Go to #p9010010# and find out.

Cassandra made #t2430009# which smells just like a child. The monster is sure to mistake you as a child if you put on this perfume.

string.name: summary
string.value: Collect #b30#t4032271#s#k which are the ingredients for the #b#t2430009##k and give them to Cassandra!

string.name: name
string.value: Defeating the Hidden Monster
You received the #b#t2430009##k. It smells so pure. How are you supposed to use this? Find out from #p9010010#.

The children say that they saw the monster in various places outside of town. Try going to the places where the children saw the monster and spritz on the perfume. If you bring back the toys that the monster took from the children, #p9010010# will cast a magical buff on you...
You defeated one monster. The children should be a bit safer now!

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat the hidden monster and return the toys that the monster took from the children to Cassandra!

string.value: Defeating the Hidden Monster
You received the #b#t2430009##k. It smells so pure. How are you supposed to use this? Find out from #p9010010#.

The children say that they saw the monster in various places outside of town. Try going to the places where the children saw the monster and spritz on the perfume. If you bring back the toys that the monster took from the children, #p9010010# will cast a magical buff on you...
You defeated one monster. The children should be a bit safer now!

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat the hidden monster and return the toys that the monster took from the children to Cassandra!

string.name: name
string.value: Defeating the Hidden Monster

string.value: Defeat the hidden monster and return the toys that the monster took from the children to Cassandra!

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Love Letter 1
The shy #p9000021# has a concern. Go find out what #p9000021# is troubled about.

#p9000021# wants to know what #p9020000# thinks of him. He wants to express his feelings without facing her reaction... Bring him some materials so that he can write a letter. If she refuses him, he can always say that it's April Fools' Day!
Love requires a pure heart and true courage. Don't be like him and confess your love pretending it is a April Fools' Day joke. Muster up your courage and confess your true love.

string.name: summary
string.value: Bring Gaga the materials he needs to write a letter!

string.name: name
string.value: We are all part of the Maple family
In celebration of MapleStory's 5th Anniversary, you can receive a free Family Studio Photo Coupon from the Maple Admininstrator. Try taking a photo with all your friends.
Obtain a photo coupon that will transport you and your friends to the Family Studio.
You obtained a Family Studio Photo Coupon which can be used to take a 5th Anniversary commemorative photo with your friends.

string.name: summary
string.value: Take a photo with your friends to commemorate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary.

string.value: MapleStory 5th Anniversary Party Preparation.
#p9010010# is preparing for a huge party to celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary and is in need of lots of materials.
Collect #t04032298#s and bring them to Cassandra.
You delivered the party materials to #p9010010#.

string.value: Gather some party materials for #p9010010#.

Send a congratulatory message through #b#p9010010##k to celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary.
If you truly want to congratulate MapleStory for reaching its 5th Anniversary, go see #b#p9010010##k to send your congratulatory message.
You congratulated MapleStory for reaching its 5th Anniversary.

string.value: Go see #p9010010# and deliver your #bMapleStory 5th Anniversary#k congratulatory message.

string.name: name
string.value: Portrait of a Popular Monster: Orange Mushroom
Every day, #b#p9010010##k will give you gifts if you bring her a Portrait of a Popular Monster.
Collect a #t04032302# and complete a portrait of an #bOrange Mushroom#k.
You brought a portrait of a popular monster to #b#p9010010##k.

string.name: summary
string.value: Complete a portrait of an Orange Mushroom and bring it to #b#p9010010##k.

You brought a portrait of a popular monster to #b#p9010010##k.

string.value: Complete a portrait of an Octopus and bring it to #b#p9010010##k.

Every day, #b#p9010010##k will give you gifts if you bring her a Portrait of a Popular Monster.
Collect a #t04032304# and complete a portrait of a #bYeti#k.
You brought a portrait of a popular monster to #b#p9010010##k.

string.name: summary
string.value: Complete a portrait of a Yeti and bring it to #b#p9010010##k.

string.name: name
string.value: You are a True Maple Lover â™¥
Because you kept the 15-Day Dreamer Medal safe, a Maple Admin came to see you.
The Maple Admin, touched at how passionate you were about Maple, exchanged your 15-Day Dreamer Medal for a Maple Lover Medal.
The Maple Admin, touched at how passionate you were about Maple, exchanged your 15-Day Dreamer Medal for a Maple Lover Medal.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Gift
Cassandra says she'll give you a pair of gloves to celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary. Go talk to Cassandra to find out more.
Cassandra claims that she can make gloves out of maple leaves. Go collect some maple leaves!
You were told if you have Maple Gage currently equipped or in your Inventory, you can't receive it again. Failed equipment should be thrown away.

string.name: name
string.value: Aramia's Golden Maple Leaf
A shiny gold colored Maple Leaf has fallen off a fully grown Maple Tree. Bring it to #p9000055# who is in charge of the Maple Tree.
Take the Golden Maple Leaf to #p9000055# who is in charge of the Maple Tree.

When you brought a Goldem Maple Leaf, that fell off a fully grown Maple Tree, to #p9000055#, the Maple Tree caretaker, said that the Golden Maple Leaf can be used as a seedling for a Maple Tree and gave you a gift as your reward.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Witch's Secure Broomstick
When you use the Witch's precious treasure, #b#t01002971##k, you hear a voice that sounds like the Witch.
The Witch says she must make a Broomstick she can ride in order to release the magic binding her and fly away.
Bon voyage!\r\nYou must help the Witch make her Broomstick 5 times by #rDecember 8th#k. Otherwise, it all goes to waste!

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Witch's Solid Broomstick
When you use the Witch's precious treasure, #b#t01002971##k, you hear a voice that sounds like the Witch.
The Witch says she must make a Broomstick she can ride in order to release the magic binding her and fly away.
Bon voyage!\r\nYou must help the Witch make her Broomstick 5 times by #rDecember 8th#k. Otherwise, it all goes to waste!

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Witch's Sturdy Broomstick
When you use the Witch's precious treasure, #b#t01002971##k, you hear a voice that sounds like the Witch.
The Witch says she must make a Broomstick she can ride in order to release the magic binding her and fly away.
Bon voyage!\r\nYou must help the Witch make her Broomstick 5 times by #rDecember 8th#k. Otherwise, it all goes to waste!

string.name: name
string.value: The Witch's Treasure Chest
#b#p9000059##k says he has something to tell you and it has to do with the Witch.
He says he'll tell you how to open the Witch's Treasure Chest.

Remember you can open the Witch's Treasure Chest by leaving one #b#t4001300##k in front of the chest per day. \r\nRemember everything goes to waste if you don't release all 5 seals by #rDecember 8th#k.

string.name: name
string.value: A Petrified Mouse
You have found an interesting artifact.
If you take this Mouse to a Maple Admin, you will receive something as a token of appreciation.

You have taken the Mouse, which was once involved in a Macro, to a Maple Admin. The Maple Admin thanked you and reminded you that MapleStory is much more fun when you actually play the game than when you use some illegal program to play it for you.

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Glasses
You have found an interesting artifact.
You have found a pair of glasses that look like Gaga's. Let's take them to Gaga and see if he recognizes them.
Gaga was thrilled that you found the glasses he lost when he was abducted by a UFO.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Crystal Ball
You have found an interesting artifact.
This item looks like Cassandra's Crystal Ball. Let's go talk to Cassandra.
She thanked you for finding her cracked Crystal Ball and said she'd restore it and put it to a good use.

string.name: name
string.value: A Shiny Watch
You have found an interesting artifact.
A watch...? Whose is this? Let's report it to a Maple Admin!
This fancy watch apparently belongs to Corba. Will you take it to Corba yourself? Or will you leave it with the Maple Admin?

string.name: name
string.value: A Nice Cleat
You have found an interesting artifact.
A cleat... Who does this belong to? Let's report it to a Maple Admin first.
Perhaps it belongs to Vaughn Lee, Stan, or Louie?

string.name: name
string.value: Quest Completion Book
You have found an interesting artifact.
You have found a Quest Completion Book. Just as you are about to report it to a Maple Admin, you wonder what it was used for.
Upon returning it to the Maple Admin, he thanked you and said more and more Maplers participate in quests nowadays.

string.name: name
string.value: A Pretty Hair-Tie
You have found an interesting artifact.
This pretty Hair-Tie has [Manji] written on it. Let's take it over to Manji.
Manji seemed a bit flustered and quickly took the Hair-Tie. Something's fishy...

string.name: name
string.value: An Old Shoe
You have found an interesting artifact.
You have found an Old Shoe that belongs to a Maple Admin. How in the world does anyone lose a shoe?
The Maple Admin says he lost his shoe when he was chasing after someone who was using an illegal macro program. He has given you a reward for returning his shoe to him.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt 1000 points acquired!
You have acquired 1000 points in Artifact Hunt.
You have acquired 1000 points in Artifact Hunt.

When you reached 1000 points in Artifact Hunt, the Maple Admin said he'd give you twice the points until you reach 3000 points. Not bad! He also says he'll give you another present when you reach 2500 points.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt 2500 points acquired!
You have acquired 2500 points in Artifact Hunt.
You have acquired 2500 points in Artifact Hunt.

When you reached 2500 points in Artifact Hunt, the Maple Admin cast magic to enhance your Weapon Attack and Magic Attack. He says he'll cast more magic when you reach 4000 points and give you another boost.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt 4000 points acquired!
You have acquired 4000 points in Artifact Hunt.
You have acquired 4000 points in Artifact Hunt.
When you reached 4000 points, the Maple Admin cast better magic on you! He says he'll reward you with a Participation Prize if you obtain at least 5000 points.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt Participation Prize
You've obtained over 5000 points in Artifact Hunt. The Maple Admin says he'll reward you with a Participation Prize.
You've obtained over 5000 points in Artifact Hunt and received a Participation Prize from Gaga.
You can receive presents as well as a boost in your AP if you rank within the top 10. Would you like to take the challenge?

string.name: name
string.value: Vaughn Lee's Cleat
Find the legendary Cleat that Vaughn Lee, Stan, and Louie made together in their youth. But which of them deserves to receive the Cleat once it's found?
You have decided to return the Cleat to Vaughn Lee. Let's take the Cleat over to Vaughn Lee in Magatia!
When you hand the Cleat to Vaughn Lee, he praises you, saying you're a great judge of character.

string.name: name
string.value: Stan's Cleat
Find the legendary Cleat that Vaughn Lee, Stan, and Louie made together in their youth. But which of them deserves to receive the Cleat once it's found?
You have decided to return the Cleat to Stan. Let's take the Cleat over to Stan in Magatia!
When you hand over the Cleat to Stan, he praises you, saying you're a great judge of character.

string.name: name
string.value: Louie's Cleat
Find the legendary Cleat that Vaughn Lee, Stan, and Louie made together in their youth. But which of them deserves to receive the Cleat once it's found?
You have decided to return the Louie to Vaughn Lee. Let's take the Louie over to Vaughn Lee in Magatia!
When you hand the Cleat to Louie, he praises you, saying you're a great judge of character.

string.name: name
string.value: Corba's Watch
Corba says he lost his watch during his transformation.
You told the Maple Admin that you would take the watch to Corba yourself. Let's go find Corba in Leafre!
Corba sincerely thanked you and gave you an amazing present as a token of his appreciation.

string.name: name
string.value: 8 Mystical Treasures
Find the 8 Mystical Treasures. If you find 8 Mystical Treasures, you will receive a special reward.
If you find all 8 Mystical Treasures, Shuang will give you a special present.
You've found all 8 Mystical Treasures and received a Mystical Artifact Discoverer Medal from Gaga.

string.name: summary
string.value: Find 8 Mystical Treasures!

string.name: name
string.value: Start the Artifact Hunt
Gaga informed you that Artifact Hunt has started.
Gaga informed you that Artifact Hunt has started.
Gaga informed you that Artifact Hunt has started. He says a high score can earn you an awesome reward, so do your best!

string.name: name
string.value: Challenge! Honorable Mesoranger
Dr. Kim at the Omega Sector HQ is holding a Physical Fitness Event! Check the #bEvent Schedule on the website#k to see what time the event will occur on your world.
Transform into an Alien Gray and go to the top of the Henesys Pet-Walking Road after you answer the agents' questions. The Maple Admin will tell you which agents you need to meet.
You have completed Dr. Kim's Omega Physical Fitness Footrace.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order! Find Agent E!
Agent M says to go see Agent E. Get the information you need from the Maple Admin and find out where Agent E is.
You must answer some questions if you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger. Get your thoughts together and tackle Agent E's questions.
Shall we head over to see Agent S now?

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order! Find Agent S!
Agent M says to go see Agent S. Get the information you need from the Maple Admin and find out where Agent S is.
You must answer some questions if you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger. Get your thoughts together and tackle Agent S's questions.
Shall we head over to see Agent O now?

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order! Find Agent O!
Agent M says to go see Agent O. Get the information you need from the Maple Admin and find out where Agent O is.
You must answer some questions if you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger. Get your thoughts together and tackle Agent O's questions.
Shall we head over to see Agent C now?

string.name: name
string.value: They're Coming Back!
Cassandra, looking into her Crystal Ball, says they will soon returnâ€¦ But who are 'they'? For details, let's go see #bCassandra#k.
Cassandra said you'll find answers if you look into the Crystal Ball.
What you saw in the Crystal Ball was the revival of the Arans. The Aransâ€¦ Don't you want to know more about them?

string.name: name
string.value: The Revival of the Arans
The Arans! They are going to revive. But who are the Arans? And why did they disappear from Maple World? Talk to #bCassandra#k if you'd like to find out more about them.
Cassandra seems to know a lot about them...
The 12 Aran Memory Fragments? Perhaps you should go see Cassandra to find the Aran Memory Fragments.

string.name: name
string.value: Vague Aran Memories
If you're curious about the Arans, talk to #bCassandra#k.
She says you must collect Vague Aran Memories in order to obtain an Aran Memory Fragment.
You have collected an Aran Memory Fragment. Cassandra told you a story about a girl who's waiting for the heroes in Rien. What was her name...? Li...Lilin?

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Album
Cassandra says something extremely bad has happened!

Cassandra says she's lost her album and suspects it has something to do with Gaga's artifacts. Hm, but you're busy collecting the Aran Memory Fragments. Perhaps that can wait until after you're done helping Cassandra, who seems desperate. If you collect artifacts, you may naturally find Cassandra's Album.
You have acquired an Aran Memory Fragment for returning Cassandra's Album.

string.name: name
string.value: Dim Aran Memories
Go over to #bCassandra#k if you're curious about the Arans.
She says you must collect Dim Aran Memories if you wish to find out more about the Arans.
You have finished collecting an Aran Memory Fragment. What happens when you collect all 12?

string.name: name
string.value: Signs of Their Revival
There have been subtle signs that indicate the revival of the Arans. Talk to Cassandra for details.
Ice Shards from the ice the Arans were sealed in have been found near town. Where are those Ice Shards?
The Aran Memory Fragments...How long will it take for you to collect all 12?

string.name: name
string.value: Faint Aran Memories
Many have begun to forget the Aransâ€¦ But if you're still gung-ho about finding their Memory Fragments, go talk to #bCassandra#k.
Cassandra says you must collect Faint Aran Memories.
You seem to have collected about half of what's required.

string.name: name
string.value: Wolves Waiting for their Masters
You must first go see Cassandra in order to collect an Aran Memory Fragment.
You must look for the wolves that are waiting for their masters.
When you approached the wolf, it jumped up and left an Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: Cloudy Aran Memories
Let's go talk to Cassandra and ask her about the Aran Memory Fragments.
Let's collect Cloudy Aran Memories.
You have collected an Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Their Arrival
Cassandra says she needs your help.
Cassandra has asked you to bring a weapon from the town Weapons Shop for the heroes who will be reviving soon.
The weapon you brought will be used by the legendary Arans. Isn't that exciting?

string.name: name
string.value: Lingering Aran Memories
You don't have enough memories of the Arans. You better go see Cassandra.
Let's search for Lingering Aran Memories.
You have collected an Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: The Memory of the Heroes
You're getting close to collecting the 12 Memory Fragments Cassandra mentioned, but you're not quite there yet. Let's go back to #bCassandra#k.
What the...She was talking as if she were going to give you an Aran Memory Fragment but...Hmpf, it's annoying, yes, but what else can you do? Let's talk to Cassandra and see what she has to say.
You're close to collecting all 12 Aran Memory Fragments. But what are these...?

string.name: name
string.value: Flickering Aran Memories
Of the 12 Aran Memory Fragments that Cassandra mentioned, you just need one more! And as you may have guessed, you must go see Cassandra to find the last memory.
Let's collect Flickering Aran Memories.
Finally! You've finished collecting all 12 Aran Memory Fragments. But what are all these memories anyway?

string.name: name
string.value: The Hidden Meaning Behind the Memory Fragments
You have collected 12 Aran Memory Fragments. But they seem meaninglessâ€¦ What is the logic behind this? Cassandra probably knows the answer to the mystery.
Hm? What? Huh? Each fragment has its place? Switch the order of the fragments around.
July 9th, 2007. Will the Arans really revive?

string.name: name
string.value: Who Deserves Cassandra's Album?
You were digging and digging.
After diligently digging around, you discovered Cassandra's Album. Hm, should you return it to its owner, Cassandra? Or should you take it over to Gaga for fun?
You received an Aran Memory Fragment for returning the Album.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Cassandra's Album
Cassandra's Album that has all of her baby picturesâ€¦ Oh, wow! Is that really Cassandra? Gaga will get a kick out of this!
You have taken Cassandra's Album to Gaga, and he jumped for joy saying he can finally be free from Cassandra!

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Cassandra's Album
As a good citizen of Maple World, you've decided to take it over to Cassandra, its rightful owner.
Cassandra, who had been extremely anxious, was ecstatic when you returned the Album.

string.name: name
string.value: Aran Welcome Celebration
To commemorate the launch of Aran, Cassandra has prepared an event that has the odds of you winning at 100%!
In celebration of the legendary hero Aran's release, Cassandra has prepared a foolproof lottery event!
In celebration of the legendary hero Aran's release, Cassandra prepared a huge event. #bFrom December 10th through January 19th#k, this daily event is a guaranteed win for everyone who participates!

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Master of Combos
You reach Level 15 and #b#p9010010##k approaches you to start a conversation...
Highest Score : #e#r#R10335##b#n Combo#k\n
You were able to check your highest combo score. You're think you're starting to get used to combos now.

string.name: name
string.value: Aran's Return
You reach Level 20 and #b#p9010000##k suddenly starts talking to you about somethingâ€¦

Aran has returned to Maple World! Maple Admin and #p1201000# have teamed up to host an event in celebration of the return of Aran. Apparently, if you reach #bLevel 30(50, 70) as Aran#k, #p1201000# will reward you with a special gift.

Aran has returned to Maple World! Maple Admin and #p1201000# have teamed up to host an event in celebration of the return of Aran. Apparently, if you reach #bLevel 30(50, 70) as Aran#k, #p1201000# will reward you with a special gift.

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Present 3
You have reached Level 70 and #b#p9010000##k starts a conversation with you...

#p9010000# tells you since you have reached Level 70, you can receive a #bspecial gift#k from #p1201000#.

#i1112405:# 

You are told to go straight to #b#m140000000##k and meet #b#p1201000##k.
Your received #t1112405# from #p1201000#. A special ring that can be worn by any character within the same account. It looks like an item that is not just for an Aran, but for any character.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostaligic Reminiscing I
You can apparently get some help from #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says that you remind him of his younger days when he was starting out on his adventures, and he would like to help you. He says first that you need to bring him #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k. For a talented explorer like you, this should be a piece of cake. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/50#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k

You showed #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor what you were made of as an adventurer. #b#p1002001##k recognized the potential in you and gave you some money to use on your journeys. You're going to put this to good use and become an excellent adventurer.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 150,000 Mesos Unlocks 'Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminscing II
You should visit #b#p1002001##k, who gave you a helping hand last time.

#b#p1002001##k wants to see how much more powerful you've become and tests you to find out.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k
You were able to emphatically prove to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger since the last time you met.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 250,000 Mesos

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminscing I
You can apparently get some help from #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says that you remind him of his younger days when he was starting out on his adventures, and he would like to help you. He says first that you need to bring him #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k. For a talented explorer like you, this should be a piece of cake. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/50#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k

You showed #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor what you were made of as an adventurer. #b#p1002001##k recognized the potential in you and gave you some money to use on your journeys. You're going to put this to good use and become an excellent adventurer.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminscing II
You'd better visit #b#p1002001##k, who gave you a helping hand the last time.

#b#p1002001##k wants to see how much more powerful you've become and gives you a test to find out.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k

string.name: name
string.value: The 2010 Winter King / Winter Queen Event!
Winter is here, and the chilly cold is already affecting everyone! If you wish to become the Winter King or Winter Queen of 2010, you'd better go see Cassandra.
Cassandra says she'll give you a Winter King or Winter Queen medal that can be used until midnight.
If you get more than 20 of these medals from Cassandra, then Cassandra will give you a medal that won't expire for 30 days.

string.name: name
string.value: The True Winter King / Winter Queen Event of 2010!
Winter is here, and the chilly cold is already affecting everyone! If you wish to become the Winter King or Winter Queen of 2010, you'd better go see Cassandra.
What, she's going to give you a present? All you did was train diligently throughout the winter!
On a cold winter day in 2010, you have become the ultimate Winter King or Winter Queen.

string.name: name
string.value: 2010 Pink Flower Tube!
Go see #b#p9010010##k if you want to receive a Pink Flower Tube.
Cassandra says she will give you a beautiful Pink Flower Tube if you have a #b#t4001320##k.
Enjoy the summer of 2010 with a Pink Flower Tube!

string.name: name
string.value: Hunter's Luck - Week 1

The time between February and March is what many call the prime hunting season! Receive some hunting pointers from Scadur and become the best hunter on the block!#b

<Event Period>
February 19, 2010 - February 21, 2010

<How to Join the Event>
1. Receive the 2x EXP item that Scadur hands out once a week.
2. Use the item when in need of an extra boost of Luck.
3. Hunt away!

<Notes>
1. 2x EXP item will expire at midnight on Sunday.
2. New 2x item will become available the following Monday.

string.name: name
string.value: Picture of a Rainbow

Cassandra, who's never been very good at drawing, says that she has a special request for you. What could it be?

#b<Event Dates>
 April 17, 2010 - May 2, 2010

Cassandra, who loves to draw but isn't very good at it, wants you to complete her rainbow drawing. Gaga has the 7 crayons you need, but if you tell him that you need it for Cassandra, he might not give them to you. 

Also, the color of the crayon you can borrow is different each day of the week. 
#b
- Monday: Red
- Tuesday: Orange
- Wednesday: Yellow
- Thursday: Green
- Friday: Blue
- Saturday: Indigo
- Sunday: Violet
#r* On April 17 and May 2, you can borrow any color that you want.

Aw, Rainbow Week is over. 

#b<Event Dates>
 April 17, 2010 - May 2, 2010

string.name: summary
string.value: Complete the Rainbow Drawing.

string.name: name
string.value: Rainbow Week: Red Monday Magic
Rainbow week, during which you can benefit from the seven colors of the rainbow, has started. They say that #b#p9010010##k can cast Red Monday magic on you...
Red Monday. With #b#p9010010##k's magic, you can receive bonus EXP when hunting monsters. The magic will last all day on April 19.\r\nReceive #r#x10450# additional EXP when hunting #b#r#M10450##b.
Red Monday was a day for hunting designated monsters! You received bonus EXP while hunting monsters thanks to #b#p9010010##k's magic.

string.name: name
string.value: Rainbow Week: Red Monday Magic

string.name: name
string.value: Rainbow Week: Yellow Wednesday Magic
Rainbow week, during which you can benefit from the seven colors of the rainbow, has started. They say that #b#p9010010##k can cast Yellow Wednesday magic on you...

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Richie's Compass
Cassandra says something went wrong on Gold Richie's Treasure Island. Rush over to #bCassandra# and talk to her.

If you've collected #bN,E,W,S for the Compass#k from the monsters, double-click the #b#t2430007##k to make a #t2430008# which will take you to Gold Richie's Treasure Island. 

#i3994102##t3994102# #b#c3994102#/1#k 
#i3994103##t3994103# #b#c3994103#/1#k 
#i3994104##t3994104# #b#c3994104#/1#k 
#i3994105##t3994105# #b#c3994105#/1#k 
#i2430007##t2430007# #b#c2430007#/1#k
If you need a compass to give you directions to Treasure Island, talk to Cassandra.

string.name: name
string.value: The Birth of a New Hero
The #p9010000# wants to talk to you. What could it be about?

A new Maple World Hero, Dragon Master Evan, has appeared! To celebrate Evan, #p9010010# has prepared a gift...

#i1022097#

#bYou can receive a gift by reaching Lv. 30 as Evan before #bMay 5#k, and then talking to #p9010010#.#k You can also receive #bScrolls#k that can be used on the #t1022097# by reaching higher levels as Evan, so don't miss out!

A new Maple World Hero, Dragon Master Evan, has appeared! To celebrate Evan, #p9010010# has prepared a gift...

#i1022097#

#bYou can receive a gift by reaching Lv. 30 as Evan before #bMay 5#k, and then talking to #p9010010#.#k You can also receive #bScrolls#k that can be used on the #t1022097# by reaching higher levels as Evan, so don't miss out!

string.name: name
string.value: The Maple Administrator's Congratulations
When you reach Lvl. 20, the #p9010000# starts talking to you...

The Maple Administrator congratulates you for reaching Lvl. 20 and casts the Dragon's Blessing on you. According to her, #p9010010# is also very excited about the growth of the Dragon Master... #bShe says that you can receive a gift from #b#p9010010##k by reaching #bLv. 30#k by May 5.

The Maple Administrator congratulates you for reaching Lvl. 20 and casts the Dragon's Blessing on you. According to her, #p9010010# is also very excited about the growth of the Dragon Master... #bShe says that you can receive a gift from #b#p9010010##k by reaching #bLv. 30#k by May 5.

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lvl. 30, #p9010000# starts talking to you...
#p9010000# says that you can now receive a gift from #p9010010# and that you should go to town and meet #b#p9010010##k. She will be very happy to see you...
You received a #t1022097# that #p9010010# made herself. Work harder and reach Lv. 50 before #bMay 5#k to receive a scroll that can be used on it.

string.name: name
string.value: A Second Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lvl. 50, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#b#p9010010##k congratulates you for reaching Lv. 50 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you a scroll that can be used.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 60 by #bMay 5#k.

string.name: name
string.value: A Third Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 60, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 60 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you another scroll. Just how many scrolls has #p9010010# prepared? In any case, go to town and meet #p9010010#.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you an even better scroll if you reach Lv. 80 by #bMay 5#k.

string.name: name
string.value: A Fourth Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 80, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 80 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you the scroll she mentioned before. How will she react after seeing how much the Dragon she called cute before has grown? Go to town and meet with #b#p9010010##k.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 100 by #bMay 5#k.

string.name: name
string.value: A Fifth Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 100, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#p9010010#, in a sincere voice, congratulates you for reaching Lv. 100 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you the final scroll. Go to town and meet with #p9010010#.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. #p9010010# says that she has given you everything she could and that all that is left is for you to work hard and believe in yourself.

string.name: name
string.value: A Sign of the Dragon Master's Return
If you're curious about #bDragon Master Evan#k, go see Cassandra in town.
#bCassandra#k says that she has some information for you regarding Dragon Master Evan. Go see her now.
You found out that the return of Dragon Master Evan is close at hand.

string.name: name
string.value: Searcing for Remnants of the Dragon Master 1
Search for remnants of Dragon Master Evan
Find a #b#t4032533##k in Maple World and bring it to #bCassandra#k.
You discovered a #b#t4032533##k, a remnant of Dragon Master Evan.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 660 Unlocks 'Searching for Remnants of the Dragon Master 2' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for Remnants of the Dragon Master 7
Search for remnants of Dragon Master Evan
Find an #b#t4032539##k in Maple World and bring it to #bCassandra#k.
You completed the search for remnants of Dragon Master Evan.

string.name: name
string.value: Evan Everyday Event
Cassandra has something to talk to you about. What could she want?

Cassandra says that she's decided to raise a Mini Dragon as a way of commemorating the launch of Dragon Master Evan. But she says that she doesn't think she will do a good job and asks that you take care of the Dragon Egg for her. She says that if you #bhatch the egg by taking good care of it for 1 hour#k, she will give you a nice gift... \r\n\r\nIf the egg disappears because you log out, forfeit the quest and accept it again.
Cassandra seems to be raising a Mini Dragon in order to commemorate the launch of Dragon Master Evan. She is planning to hatch new Dragons from #bMarch 31 to May 4#k, so keep helping her until then.

string.name: name
string.value: Evan Launch Commemoration 2PM Event
Go to Cassandra to receive the gift she has prepared to celebrate the launch of Dragon Master Evan.
You have to go grab Cassandra's gift that you didn't get earlier. If you don't go get it by 4:30, you won't be able to get it at all.
You received the gift that Cassandra prepared in celebration of the launch of Dragon Master Evan.

string.name: name
string.value: Evan Launch Commemoration 2PM Event
Go to Cassandra to receive the gift she has prepared to celebrate the launch of Dragon Master Evan.
You have to go grab Cassandra's gift that you didn't get earlier. You have to get it within the alloted time. \r\n
You received the gift that Cassandra prepared in celebration of the launch of Dragon Master Evan.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing I
You hear that you can receive help from #b#p1002001##k in Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says that you remind him of his younger days when he was starting out on his adventures, and he would like to help you. He says first that you need to bring him #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k. For a talented explorer like you, this should be a piece of cake.
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, who you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that should come handy during your adventures.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 100,000 Mesos Unlocks 'Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing II
Go to #b#p1002001##k, who helped you before.
#b#p1002001##k wants you to prove how strong you've become.
You proved to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 200,000 mesos\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Weapon Rental
They say that a special event has been prepared to celebrate the re-balancing of the Explorer class...
Cassandra says that she will let you borrow an item so that you can experience using a stronger weapon to complement your more powerful skills. Go into town and meet Cassandra.

You borrowed a powerful weapon from Cassandra. The weapon is only good for 7 days, so obtain it again from Cassandra once the time has passed. Cassandra will be #brenting out weapons until July 27th#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Weapon Rental
They say that a special event has been prepared to celebrate the re-balancing of the Explorer class...

Cassandra says that she will let you borrow an item so that you can experience using a stronger weapon to complement your more powerful skills. But before that, she wants you to prove your ability to wield a stronger weapon... Challenge yourself to Cassandra's test.\n\n#i4000035# #t4000035# #b#c4000035# / 50#k

You borrowed a powerful weapon from Cassandra. The weapon is only good for 7 days, so obtain it again from Cassandra once the time has passed. Cassandra will be #brenting out weapons until July 27th#k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Hero of MapleStory!
They say that an incredible gift is being prepared to coincide with the strengthening of MapleStory's Explorer skills.
Achieve Lv. 10 with an Explorer character.
You achieved Lv. 10 and received a beginner weapon.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv.10

string.name: name
string.value: Explorer Lv. 20 Challenge
They say that you will receive an incredible gift if you reach Lv. 20 with an Explorer character.
Achieve Lv. 20 and receive a high quality weapon.
You achieved Lv. 20 and received a high quality weapon.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 20

string.name: name
string.value: Explorer Lv. 30 Challenge
They say that you will receive an incredible gift if you reach Lv. 30 with an Explorer character.
Achieve Lv. 30 and receive a high quality armor.
You achieved Lv. 30 and received a high quality armor.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 30

string.name: name
string.value: Explorer Lv. 40 Challenge
What kind of gift will be waiting if you reach Lv. 40 with an Explorer character?
Achieve Lv. 40 and receive the #b<Honorable Explorer>#k title.
You achieved Lv. 40 and received the #b<Honorable Explorer>#k title.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 40

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,500 #Wbasic# #i1142184:# #t1142184:# 1 Unlocks 'Hard-Fought Lv. 50' quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Hard-Fought Lv. 50 Challenge!
They say that you will receive a ring with absolute power if you reach Lv. 50...
Reach Lv. 50 and go see Cassandra to receive one of the following items as a gift: #b#t1112427#, #t1112428#, #t1112429#.
You have finally achieved Lv. 50. You are now strong enough to overcome all obstacles alone!

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 50

string.name: name
string.value: Explorer Level +30 Challenge
They say that a great gift has been prepared to celebrate the improvement of the Explorer skills.
If you increase 30 levels from your current level by July 27th 2010, you can receive one of the following gifts from Cassandra: #b#t1112427#, #t1112428#, #t1112429##k.
You received one of the Explorer rings for increasing 30 levels within the time limit.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Increase 30 Levels

string.name: name
string.value: New Function: Party Search
The Maple Administrator says that a new function has become available. Go see the Maple Administrator.
You can find the party you want by pressing the hotkey O or the search button in the Party Window (hotkey P).
You can find the party you want by pressing the hotkey O or the search button in the Party Window (hotkey P).

string.name: name
string.value: Attracting Tourists to the Golden Temple
#p9010010# is talking to you. What kind of event could be planned this time? Respond to #p9010010#.

There's a new attraction called the #b#m950100000##k in Maple World. It's a small village, but it has its own boss monster and other unique monsters. If you go now, #b#p9000078##k, the PR Manager, will give you a #t4001431# that will allow you to use the mini dungeons located near the temple. Head over to the #m950100000# through the #bDimensional Mirror#k.

You received a #t4001431# from PR Manager #p9000078#. You can use it to enter any mini dungeons near the town once. If you want to use the mini dungeons again, you can purchase a Premium Golden Ticket or obtain ticket pieces dropped by monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Attracting Tourists to the Golden Temple
#p9010010# is talking to you. What kind of event could be planned this time? Respond to #p9010010#.

There's a new attraction called the #b#m950100000##k in Maple World. It's a small village, but it has its own boss monster and other unique monsters. If you go now, #b#p9000078##k, the PR Manager, will give you a #t4001431# that will allow you to use the mini dungeons located near the temple. Head over to the #m950100000# through the #bDimensional Mirror#k.

You received a #t4001431# from PR Manager #p9000078#. You can use it to enter any mini dungeons near the town once. If you want to use the mini dungeons again, you can purchase a Premium Golden Ticket or obtain ticket pieces dropped by monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Recycled Golden Ticket
You've used the #t4001431#. You can receive another by doing a quest given by #p9000078#, the PR Manager of the #b#m950100000##k, so pay him a visit.

#p9000078# says that he would like to save resources. If you bring him #b10#k #bGolden Ticket Pieces#k, he will issue you another #t4001431#. You can obtain Golden Ticket Pieces from #rany monster#k. \n\n#i4032605# #t4032605# #b#c4032605# / 10#k
You obtained a Golden Ticket in return for 10 Golden Ticket Pieces. If you want another #t4001431#, you can come back after a day has passed.

string.name: name
string.value: Tourist Site: A Wild Monkey Mess
#p9000078#, the #b#m950100000##k PR Manager, seems to be encountering some problems. Talk to #b#p9000078##k.

#p9000078# says that the number of #t4000561#s being thrown away by the #o9500383#s are becoming a nuisance for tourists visiting the #m950100000#. Help #p9000078# by eliminating #r100 #o9500383#s#k and gathering #b50 #t4000561#s#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k.

#i4000561# #t4000561# #b#c4000561# / 50#k
#o9500383##r #a105821# #k

Even though you eliminated the #o9500383#s and cleaned up the #t4000561#s, the #m950100000# still doesn't seem very clean. #p9000078# plans on continuing his clean-up of the place and asks that you come see him #bafter 1 hour#k, if you'd like to help.

string.name: name
string.value: What the Mama Monkey Stole
Something bad seems to have happened to #p9000079#, a tourist who is sightseeing in the #b#m950100000##k. Talk to #b#p9000079##k.

#p9000079# was upset that a huge #r#o9500384##k stole her cell phones and cameras. Recover #p9000079#'s lost #bCell Phones#k and #bCameras#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. 

#i4032602# #t4032602# #b#c4032602# / 5#k
#i4032603# #t4032603# #b#c4032603# / 5#k

#p9000079# would like to thank you for recovering her items and requests your help in the future if she happens to lose something again. She says she often loses things, so go see her again #bin 1 hour#k.

string.name: name
string.value: White Baby Monkey Making a Mess of the Garden
#p9000074#, a boy monk at the #b#m950100000##k, seems to be worried about something. Talk to #b#p9000074##k.

#p9000074# says that recently, a growing number of #o9500385#s have been entering the temple to break things and loot items. He asks that you teach the #o9500385#s a lesson. Help #p9000074# by eliminating #r100 #o9500385#s#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. \n\n#o9500385##r #a105841##k

You helped #p9000074# by defeating 100 #o9500385#s. Although the #o9500385#s should remain quiet for now, they will probably return soon again to make another mess. Come back #bin 1 hour#k to lend your assistance.

string.name: name
string.value: What the White Mama Monkey Stole
#p9000077#, a fruit seller at the #b#m950100000##k, seems to be very angry. Talk to #b#p9000077##k.

#p9000077# was angry that the #o9500386#s stole the #t4032604#s that he had left out to sell to the tourists. Eliminate the #r#o9500386#s#k and recover #b20 #t4032604#s#k at #p9000077#'s request. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. \n\n#i4032604# #t4032604# #b#c4032604# / 20#k
You eliminated the #o9500386#s and recovered the #t4032604#s. Still, the #o9500386#s have their eyes on the #t4032604#s. Please come back #bin 1 hour#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Goblin Crowns
#p9000076# at the #b#m950100000##k has a wish. Has it come true yet? Talk to #b#p9000076##k.

#p9000076# says that she came here to pray so that her wish might come true. Unfortunately, despite the long time she has spent in prayer, her wish has yet to be fulfilled. She says that maybe she should offer something. Defeat the #r#o9500387#s#k and bring her some #b#t4000564#s#k. You can enter the Goblin Cave by talking to #b#p9000075##k. 

#i4000564# #t4000564# #b#c4000564# / 50#k
#o9500387##r #a105861##k

You defeated the #o9500387#s and delivered the #t4000564#s to #p9000076#. Wait #b1hour#k to see if her prayers have had any effect, then come back to see her. She may want to offer something else if her wish doesn't come true.

string.name: name
string.value: Threat of the Red Goblins
#p9000073# at the #b#m950100000##k has a very grave concern. Talk to #b#p9000073##k.

#p9000073# seems to be worried about people being victimized by the #o9500388#s. For the safety of others, please eliminate the #r#o9500388#s#k and recover their #baxes#k. Talk to #b#p9000075##k to enter the Goblin Cave. 

#i4000563# #t4000563# #b#c4000563# / 50#k
#o9500388##r #a105871##k
You eliminated the #o9500388#s and recovered a good number of their axes. Still, these probably aren't enough. Come back again #bin 1 hour#k to eliminate some more Goblins.

string.name: name
string.value: Corruption of Morals: Strong Stone Goblin
#p9000072# at the #b#m950100000##k looks very upset. What could be the problem? Talk to #b#p9000072##k.

#p9000072# says that the influx of tourists has corrupted the morals and culture of the village. As evidence, he mentioned the outfit of the #o9500389#s. #p9000072# said that he can no longer put up with the #r#o9500389#s#k walking around in their revealing underwear and asked that you eliminate them. Enter the Goblin Cave by talking to #b#p9000075##k. \n\n#o9500389##r #a105881##k
You eliminated the #o9500389#s, but #p9000072# is worried that #bin just 1 hour#k, they will return again as they were before. Come back later to help #p9000072#.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Ravana
#p9000072# at the #b#m950100000##k seems to be worried about something. Talk to #b#p9000072##k.

#p9000072# says there is a very dangerous monster called #r#o9101005##k inside the cave he is guarding, and he doesn't know what to do. He says that you can't defeat it alone and that you must enter with other party members. Gather some party members and defeat #o9101005#.\n\n#o9101005##r #a105891##k
You defeated #o9101005#. Will the #m950100000# be safe now?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Ravana
#p9000072# at the #b#m950100000##k seems to be worried about something. Talk to #b#p9000072##k.

#p9000072# says there is a very dangerous monster called #r#o9101005##k inside the cave he is guarding, and he doesn't know what to do. He says that you can't defeat it alone and that you must enter with other party members. Gather some party members and defeat #o9101005#.\n\n#o9101005##r #a105891##k
You defeated #o9101005#. Will the #m950100000# be safe now?

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Part-Time Job
There is a rumor around town that Cassandra has been collecting Owl Tail Feathers as part of her secret part-time job. Wait, but if it's a secret...

An Owl Tail Feather that came from a sealed box. Is this what Cassandra has been looking for? Go see Cassandra. 


#i2430052:# #t2430052:# #c2430052# / 5
You brought the Owl Tail Feather. Since you've completed the secret part-time job, I'll let you perform a secret trade with the great Cassandra.

string.name: name
string.value: Reach Dual Blade Lv. 20!
Reach Dual Blade Lv. 20!
Reach Dual Blade Lv. 20!
You reached Dual Blade Lv. 20! You received a Dual Blade item.

string.name: name
string.value: Reach Dual Blade Lv. 30!

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Richie's Part-time Job
#b#p2084001##k, the richest man in Maple World, has a proposal for you. Go see #b#p2084001##k.
Gold Richie is working on a plan to support the Resistance, so that they can kick the Black Wings out of Edelstein. He has asked for your help with this important matter.
You agreed to help Gold Richie support the Resistance.

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Richie's Packages
Gold Richie has a job for you. Go see Gold Richie to receive the job.

Monsters attacked Gold Richie, and he lost important packages for #bCassandra#k, #bGaga#k, and #bMaple Administrator#k. The packages contain items that were meant for the Resistance, so it will be a big problem if the Black Wings find them first. Retrieve the items quickly, then deliver them to Cassandra, Gaga, and the Maple Administrator.
You retrieved all of the Gold Richie's packages, delivered them to Cassandra, Gaga, and the Maple Administrator. When you were done with the deliveries, you reported your results to Gold Richie.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Package
Find #t4032803#, which was taken by the monsters, and bring it to #bCassandra#k. You wonder what Cassandra requested from Gold Richie...
You delivered the item to Cassandra.

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Package
Find #b#t4032803##k and bring it to #bGaga#k. Come to think of it, #bGaga#k seems to be engaged in a strange new research...you hope the item isn't anything dangerous.
You delivered the package to Gaga.

string.name: name
string.value: The Maple Administrator's Package
The #bMaple Administrator#k asked for an item from Gold Richie, but due to a monster attack, the container with the item, #b#t4032803##k, has been lost. Retrieve #b#t4032803##k from the monsters.
You delivered the package to the Maple Administrator, all the time wondering what was inside.

string.name: name
string.value: Precious Medicine
Gold Richie has something else he wants to ask you...

Gold Richie wants to support the Resistance in Edelstein by bringing them some necessary medicine. Since the Black Wings are keeping a tight watch, sending the complete medicine will be impossible. Therefore, only the ingredients will be sent. Defeat the #bMegrans#k that appear occasionally throughout Maple World and bring back #b10 #t4032804#s#k, which can be used to make medicine.
You delivered the #b#t4032804#s#k to Gold Richie.

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Richie's Secret Weapon Test

Gold Richie's secret weapon is finally complete. However, he lost the Ignition Key. It's probably somewhere close, so defeat the monsters nearby to find it. Once you have it, test out the secret weapon, then report back to Gold Richie.
You reported to Gold Richie that you found the Ignition Key and tested the secret weapon, which ended up exploding.

string.name: name
string.value: Missing Crewman
Gold Richie urgently requests your help. See Gold Richie to find out what's going on.

Gold Richie tells you that a crewman from his trade ship left two days ago to meet an old friend and never came back. He is worried that the crewman might be lost somewhere. Gold Richie wants you to find the crewman and use the #b#t2030000##k to send him to the nearest town.
#i2030000##t2030000# #b#c2030000##k/1
You found the crewman lost in the middle of a dungeon and sent him back safely.
