string.name: name
string.value: Greetings from the Young Empress.
You have decided to become one of the Knights serving the young Empress and battle the indestructible Black Mage. You better first meet up with #b#p1101000# and formally introduce yourself.
#p1101000# expressed her gratitude on your decision to become a Cygnus Knight and made a promise that she will always be there for you.
#p1101000# claims that it is ultimately in your hands to defeat the Black Mage. She says that her trustworthy Tactician, #p1101002#, will be responsible for molding you into a formidable Knight.

string.name: name
string.value: Neinheart the Tactician
Now you have to meet up with #p1101000#'s Tactician, #b#p1101002##k, and discuss what you have to do in the future.

#p1101002# claimed that you may be too weak to fight for Maple World, and therefore refused to name you as a Knight-in-Training. He stated that the training period towards becoming a Knight-in-Training is already set up, and that you need to meet up with #b#p1102000#, the Training Instructor#k.

#p1101002# claimed that you may be too weak to fight for Maple World, and therefore refused to name you as a Knight-in-Training. He stated that the training period towards becoming a Knight-in-Training is already set up, and that you need to meet up with #b#p1102000#, the Training Instructor#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku the Training Instructor
As stated by #p1101002#, you have to first raise your level to 10 and become a Knight-in-Training. You have to visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and enter the Training Forest.

You met with #p1102000# at the entrance of the Training Forest. According to #p1102000#, Ereve is bereft of monsters, and instead, everyone trains against fantasy creatures created by #p1101001# called 'Mimi'. He then proceeded to give you a potion called #p1102000#...
#p1102000# shot a warning saying that training will be tough. You better pack up the potions that he gave you and get ready for the training.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's First Training Session
Visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

The first session involved facing off against the weakest Mimi in all of Ereve, #r#o0100120##k, and defeating #r5#k of them in the process. You better hunt down those #o0100120#s in #b#m130010000##k \n\n#o0100120##r #a200031##k
You managed to defeat all 5 #o0100120#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Second Training Session
Visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

The second session involved facing off against the 2nd weakest Mimi in all of Ereve, #r#o0100121##k, and defeating #r10#k of them in the process. You better hunt down those #o0100121#s at or near #b#m130010000##k. \n\n#o0100121##r #a200041##k
You managed to defeat all 10 #o0100121#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Third Training Session
Visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

The third session involved facing off against the third weakest monster of Ereve, #r#o0100122##k, and defeating #r15#k of them in the process. You better hunt down those #o0100122#s in #b#m130010100##k. \n\n#o0100122##r #a200051##k
You managed to defeat all 15 #o0100122#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Fourth Training Session
Visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

#p1102000#'s fourth session involves facing off against the fourth weakest... you get the drill. Anyway, an easy Mimi called #r#o0100123##k, and defeating #r20#k of them in the process. You better hunt down those #o0100123#s in #b#m130010100##k. \n\n#o0100123##r #a200061##k
You managed to defeat all 15 #o0100122#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Last Training Session
Visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive his fifth training session.

#p1102000# said you've done a good job, and wanted you to defeat #b3 #o0100124#s#k for the last time. He warned you that unlike other Mimis, #o0100124# has significantly higher stamina, so you better be careful... \n\n#o0100124##r #a200071##k
You managed to defeat the #o0100124#s and return. #p1102000# greeted you with a smile and said you are now eligible to become a Knight-in-Training. He then advised you to go see #p1101002# again.

string.name: name
string.value: I'll Show You How to Hunt
Get some information on hunting from #b#p1102005##k.

#p1102005# briefly explained the basics of hunting and asked that you hunt #r#o100120##ks, the weakest creatures in Ereve, as a test. He says you can attack by pressing the #bCtrl key#k, so let's try it out!
You have come back after hunting the #o0100120#s. #p1102005# says you can meet his brother #p1102006# if you continue to your left.

string.name: name
string.value: How Well Do You Know Your Skills?
Get some information on skills from #b#p1102006##k.

#p1102006# informed you that you can open your Skill window by pressing the #bK key#k and suggested that you hunt #r3 #o100121#s#k and bring #b1 #t4000483##k to prove that you know how to use your skills.
You've come back after hunting the #o0100121#s and brought back a #o0100121#'s feather. #p1102006# says #p1102007# is waiting for you. Proceed to the left.

string.name: name
string.value: A Box with Goodies Inside
Start a conversation with #b#p1102007##k.

#p1102007#, after telling you about acquiring items from boxes, has asked that you collect #b#t4032267##k and #b#t4032268##k from the boxes scattered around the field. He says you can only break the boxes using #bregular attacks#k.
Upon receiving #t4032267# and #t4032268#, #p1102007# made you a fantastic chair using the materials. If you continue to your left, you'll meet the last brother, #p1102008#. Let's rush over.

string.name: name
string.value: The Empress is Waiting
Start a conversation with #b#p1102008##k.

In a courteous tone of voice, #p1102008# said he wanted to quiz you on your newly-gained knowledge to make sure that you learned the necessary basics of Maple World. When you completed the quiz, #p1102008# gave you a #t4032269# and asked you to report to #bEmpress #p1101000##k.
You went to see Empress #p1101000#, and the pale and fragile Empress welcomed you with a warm smile.

string.name: name
string.value: Greetings From the Young Empress
Start a conversation with #bEmpress #p1101000##k, who is sitting quietly next to #p1101001#.

#p1101000# thanked you for becoming one of her Knights and asked that you stay by her side for a long time. She then went on to say that her tactician, #b#p1101002##k, is going to help you become a competent Knight.

#p1101002# said you weren't strong enough to fight for Maple World, let alone appoint you as a Knight-in-Training. He said you must undergo a training course that has been prepared for you. Let's go see #p1102000#, the training instructor.

string.name: name
string.value: The First Knight Training
As #p1101002# has said, you must reach Lv.10 before you can become a Knight-in-Training. Head over to #b#m130010000##k to find #b#p1102000#, the Training Instructor#k.

You have met #p1102000#, the Training Instructor, in #m130010000#. According to #p1102000#, there isn't a single monster in Ereve, so you must train against illusory creatures named Mimis, which #p1101001# summons. Then #p1102000# asks that you hunt #r#o100122##ks.

You have met #p1102000#, the Training Instructor, in #m130010000#. According to #p1102000#, there isn't a single monster in Ereve, so you must train against illusory creatures named Mimis, which #p1101001# summons. Then #p1102000# asks that you hunt #r#o100122##ks.

string.name: name
string.value: The Second Knight Training
Start the second knight training with #b#p1102000##k.

The second knight training requires you to hunt the #r#o100123##ks. You must hunt #r20#k of them, which is a little more than what you had to do for your first training. Let's head over to #m130010100# and hunt the #o100123#s.
You have come back after hunting all 20 #o0100123#s. Let's continue with the next training.

string.name: name
string.value: The Last Knight Training
Begin your last knight training before you become a #p1102000# Knight.
This time, #p1102000# has asked you to hunt the strongest of the Mimis in Ereve, the #r#o100124##ks.
You have come back after hunting the #o100124#s. #p1102000# suggested you report to #p1101002#, as you've completed your training.

string.name: name
string.value: 5 Different Paths of Cygnus Knights

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
Talk to #b#p1101002##k and see if he accepts you as a Knight-in-Training.

#p1101002# showed you the 5 different paths of Cygnus Knights, suggesting that you decide what kind of knight you wish to become. A Dawn Warrior of sword and soul, a Blaze Wizard of magic and flame, a Wind Archer of bow and storm, a Night Walker of night and darkness, and a Thunder Breaker of knuckle and lightning. Which fits you the best? The choice is entirely yours.

#p1101002# showed you the 5 different paths of Cygnus Knights, suggesting that you decide what kind of knight you wish to become. A Dawn Warrior of sword and soul, a Blaze Wizard of magic and flame, a Wind Archer of bow and storm, a Night Walker of night and darkness, and a Thunder Breaker of knuckle and lightning. Which fits you the best? The choice is entirely up to yours.

string.name: name
string.value: Time to Choose

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
You better go talk to #b#p1101002##k and formally receive the blessing to become a Knight-in-Training.
There are five paths to choose from. Warrior of Light, Magician of Fire, Bowman of the Wind, Thief of Darkness, and Pirate of Thunder. What's your destiny?
There are five paths to choose from. Warrior of Light, Magician of Fire, Bowman of the Wind, Thief of Darkness, and Pirate of Thunder. What's your destiny?

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Dawn Warrior

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The time has come. If you want to find out more about Dawn Warrior, the Warrior of Light, talk to #b#p1101003#, the Chief Knight of Light#k.
If you want to become a Cygnus Knight as a #bDawn Warrior#k accompanied with honor and glory, you should select #p1101003#.
You are now a Dawn Warrior!

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Blaze Wizard

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The time has come. If you want to find out more about Blaze Wizard, the Magician of Fire, talk to #b#p1101004#, the Chief Knight of Fire#k.
If you want to become a Cygnus Knight as a #bBlaze Wizard#k with flaming expectations for the future missions, you should select #p1101004#.
You are now a Blaze Wizard!

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Wind Archer

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The time has come. If you want to find out more about Wind Archer, the Bowman of the Wind, talk to #b#p1101005#, the Chief Knight of the Wind#k.
If you want to become a Cygnus Knight as a Wind Archer with broad perspectives on life, you should select #p1101005#.
You are now a Wind Archer!

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Night Walker

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The time has come. If you want to find out more about Night Walker, the Thief of Darkness, talk to #b#p1101006#, the Chief Knight of Darkness#k.
If you want to become a Cygnus Knight as a Night Walker that embraces the darkness for the sake of light, you should select #p1101006#.
You are now a Night Walker!

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Thunder Breaker

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The time has come. If you want to find out more about Thunder Breaker, the Pirate of Lightning, talk to #b#p1101007#, the Chief Knight of Lightning#k.
If you want to become a Cygnus Knight as a Thunder Breaker who thoroughly enjoys thrilling adventures, you should select #p1101007#.
You are now a Thunder Breaker!

string.name: name
string.value: The End of Knight-in-Training

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
After reaching Level 30, #p1101002# wanted to talk to you about something...

#p1101002# stated that since your level is significantly high and that you are well-versed in the duties and assignments of a Knight, he suggested that it's time for you to remove the in-Training by taking the #bKnighthood Exam#k. To become a Knight on the next level, you better head over to Ereve.

#p1101002# stated that since your level is significantly high and that you are well-versed in the duties and assignments of a Knight, he suggested that it's time for you to remove the in-Training by taking the #bKnighthood Exam#k. To become a Knight on the next level, you better head over to Ereve.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Treasure

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
#p1101002# is contacting me in an emergency manner. I wonder what happened.
Something terrible must have happened at #bEreve#k. I better go find out.
According to #p1101002#, an important item from Ereve has been stolen by one of the minions who serves the Black Mage. What must that be? I better head over to Ereve.

string.name: name
string.value: The Master of Disguise

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The detailed instructions on searching for the thief will be given by #b#p1101003##k, the Chief Knight of Light. I better talk to #p1101003#.

Apparently, the member of the Black Wings has yet to escape Ereve. If we just search the island thoroughly, we may be able to find the culprit. First, I'll need to visit #b#p1101002##k and receive a #bInvestigation Permit#k, followed by a thorough search of Ereve to find #r#o9001009##k. Once I find him, I'll need to defeat him in a battle and bring back #b#t4032101##k in the process. The problem is that the enemy, being the #o9001009#, is adept at transforming into different persons, so I better talk to each and every one of them to figure out who's real or fake. 

#o9001009##r #a203011##k 
#i4032101# #t4032101# #b#c4032101# / 1#k
I was able to defeat #p1104001# the #o9001009#, a member of the Black Wings, and managed to recover #t4032101#.

string.name: name
string.value: Shinsoo's Teardrop

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
It seems like #p1101003# has something to say about the recovered treasure...
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight.
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight. I'll need to make sure to keep going so I won't lower the standards of the Advanced Knights.

string.name: name
string.value: Shinsoo's Teardrop

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
It seems like #p1101004# has something to say about the recovered treasure...
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight.
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight. I'll need to train further and always work with passion like an Advanced Knight would.

string.name: name
string.value: Shinsoo's Teardrop

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
It seems like #p1101007# has something to say about the recovered treasure...
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight.

For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight. I'll need to embrace even the most difficult journeys with smiles and ease like an Advanced Knight would.

string.name: name
string.value: Chasing the Knight's Target

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
#p1101002# seems to have a new assignment for me.

I have received a new assignment. The assignment deals with supporting Advanced Knight #p1103000# that is chasing the Black Wings that are targeting the Empress. The last trace of #p1103000# was found in #b#m211000000##k, and he has instructed me to go to #m211000000# to find #p1103000#.

I have received a new assignment. The assignment deals with supporting Advanced Knight #p1103000# that is chasing the Black Wings that are targeting the Empress. The last trace of #p1103000# was found in #m211000000#, and he has instructed me to go to #m211000000# to find #p1103000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Hunting the Zombies

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
#b#p2020006##k of #b#m211000000##k apparently knows something about #p1103000#...

#p2020006# told me she's not sure where #p1103000# is now, but she was able to confirm that he did stay at #m211000000# for a lengthy period of time, and he was busy #rhunting the zombies#k. Not just a regular hunting, but with a purpose: to find a clue that may lead to something.
According to #p2020006#, #p1103000# was actively hunting the zombies. Not just a regular hunting, but hunting with a purpose: to find a clue that may lead to something.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Scale

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
While slaying the zombies, I was able to obtain an item called #t4001207#. Once I did that, #p2032001# approached me.

#b#p2032001##k warned me that #b#t4001207##k contained a curse-like power that spread all over this world, and that since it's a dangerous item, he wanted me to hand it in to him so he could break the curse. While listening to #p2032001# talk, however, I noticed #p1103000#'s name being mentioned... \n\n#i4001207# #t4001207# #b#c4001207# / 1#k
I gave #p2032001# the #t4001207#. #p2032001# told me that #p1103000# gave him #t4001207# too the other day, and that he recently moved to #m240000000# to find out more about #t4001207#.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Outcasts

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
According to #p2032001#, #p1103000# recently moved to #m240000000#. I better head down to #b#m240000000##k and ask #b#p2081000##k about #p1103000#.

According to #p2081000#, #p1103000# went to visit the #bDragon Outcast#k outside town. Apparently, the scale of the Dragon Outcast is similar to #t4001207#'s... I better go visit Dragon Outcast. His house is #bconnected to #m240020401# or #m240020101##k.

When I asked #p2081012#, the Dragon Outcast, about #p1103000#, he seemed perturbed by my question and got mad at me for it. Apparently, #t4001207# is not his. He thought it might have to do instead with the stolen dragon egg incident at #m240000000#...

string.name: name
string.value: The Cave of the Black Witch

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
I better go visit the #bCave of the #o9001010##k as instructed by #p2081012#.

There was a note posted on the wall of the cave. After reading the note, I noticed that it may have been written by #p1103000#. The subject of the curse was not found, but the device was found, recovered, and sent back to Ereve. I may have been one step too late. #p1103000# must have completed his assignment already. I better return to #bEreve#k.

There was a note posted on the wall of the cave. After reading the note, I noticed that it may have been written by #p1103000#. The subject of the curse was not found, but the device was found, recovered, and sent back to Ereve. I may have been one step too late. #p1103000# must have completed his assignment already. I better return to Ereve.

string.name: name
string.value: The Knight That Disappeared

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

I may have failed the assignment of providing support for #p1103000#, since he already completed his assignment before I could reach him. I better return to #bEreve#k and report the results to #b#p1101002##k.

I was going to complain to #p1101002# about doing all that work for nothing, but he seemed more concerned that #p1103000# hasn't come back and that something might be up. He then asked me if I could return to the #bCave of the #o9001010##k and find out if there's another note somewhere inside.

#p1101002# told me #p1103000# has not yet come back and that something might be up. He then asked me if I could return to the #bCave of the #o9001010##k and find out if there's another note somewhere inside.

string.name: name
string.value: The Curse of the Black Witch

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

...Wait, is this Ereve? But Ereve's usually not like this. And why are the Chief Knights standing like that? No one's answering! Only #p1101001# seemed to be barely awake. I better talk to #b#p1101001##k.

#p1101001# told me the lady in front is actually #r#p1104002# the #o9001010##k and that she has put a curse on everyone in Ereve. He mentioned that most of them on the island should be able to weather it, but the Empress might be in grave danger... I better defeat #o9001010# and break the curse now! \n\n#o9001010##r #a204071##k

The cunning #o9001010#, after realizing that Ereve, which is protected by #p1101001#, may be hard to enter, used #p1103000# to throw in cursed items, then cursed the whole island through that! Fortunately, after defeating #o9001010#, the curse seems to have been lifted.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Knight of the Empress

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
I received a call from #p1101000#, the young Empress herself.
The young Empress thanked me for my efforts in saving Ereve and decided, through my accomplishments and past work, that I would be promoted to the position of Chief Knight. Chief Knight?

I wound up being anointed as the new Chief Knight for the Cygnus Knights. I made a promise to the Empress that the moment the Black Mage reawakens, I will be the first in line to defeat the Black Mage.

string.name: name
string.value: Mounts for Knights
I better talk to #b#p1101002##k and get some information on Monster Mounts for Knights.
#p1101002# told me I'll need to visit #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k, who's at the #bHatchery#k raising the Mimis for Mounts.
I met with #p1102002# the Mount Trainer.

string.name: name
string.value: Raising Mimiana
I better visit the #bHatchery#k and talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k about the Mounts for knights.

#p1102002# told me the Mounts for the knights are through #t1902005#, a type of Mimi, and told me I'll have to raise #t1902005# on my own. He then handed me a small egg... #t1902005# can be raised by #bsharing my experiences with it#k.
After fully raising #t1902005#, I handed it back to #p1102002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Riding Mimiana
How does a fully-grown #t1902005# act? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k for the answer.

#p1102002# told me that #t1902005# may have grown quite a bit, but it's not ready to be mounted, and told me I'll need to make it stronger by feeding #t1902005# with some of #b#p2060005#'s Supplements#k. He then instructed me to go purchase #p2060005#'s Supplements. Aren't they quite expensive?
#p1102002# handed me a mountable #t1902005# and #t1912005#, and taught me the Monster Mount skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Supplements for Mimiana
In order to strengthen #t1902005# so I can Mount it, then I must feed the creature with #p2060005#'s Supplements. I better go visit #b#p2060005##k at #b#m230000000##k.
#p2060005# told me he would give me a discount on his supplements since I knew him, then proceeded to charge me 10 million mesos for them. Seriously, what's inside these Supplements?
Saddened, but undeterred, I managed to purchase #p2060005#'s Supplements.

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Saddle
I lost the #t1912005# for Mounts. What should I do...? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainerk# for help.

#p1102002# tells you that because of budget issues, he can't give you a spare #t1912005#. He suggests that you come up with a new #t1912005# on your own. It is rumored that #p2060005# of #m230000000# is a great maker of #t1912005#s, but it will probably be very expensive. You'll have to bring the materials and the service charge for the #t1912005# to #p2060005#.

#i4000030# #t4000030# #b#c4000030# / 200#k
#i4000055# #t4000055# #b#c4000055# / 200#k
#b5,000,000#k Mesos
I handed #p2060005# the materials for #t1912005#, along with the service charge, and received #t1912005# in return. I better make sure not to lose #t1912005# ever again.

string.name: name
string.value: Re-raising Mimiana
I lost #t1902005#. What should I do? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k about this situation.

#t1902005# is a fantasy creature that naturally dissolves if it stays away from its master for a prolonged period of time. In short, if I want #t1902005# back, I'll have to #bawaken the creature from the egg stage, starting over from scratch#k. #p1102002# said he can get the Supplements for me, but I'll have to pay for it again... sigh. I'll have to rack up enough experience to awaken #t1902005# once more.
I was able to awaken #t1902005# once more. I better not lose it again.

string.name: name
string.value: A Knight's Pride
#p1101002# said he had something to tell me... again...

#p1101002# was worried that I was at Level 100 and still riding a regular #t1902005#, which is beneath my level as a high-ranked Knight. He then informed me about Monster Mount. I guess I can find out more about an enhanced Mount from #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k...

string.name: parent
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo
Suddenly, #p1101002# approaches you.
#p1101002# suggested that you take your Mount and go see #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor,#k saying that your Mount may be in trouble.
#p1101002# suggested that you take your Mount and go see #p1102002#, the Mount Instructor, saying that your Mount may be in trouble.

string.name: name
string.value: The Mount in Danger

string.name: parent
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo
Let's show your #t1902006# to #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor#k.

#p1102002# says your Mount is suffering because you've gotten too strong for your Mount to keep up. He says he can try to recover your weakened Mount by putting the Mount inside a special Incubator, which will cost you a usage fee of #b50,000,000 Mesos#k.
You have given 50,000,000 Mesos to #p1102002#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo

string.name: parent
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo
Let's go check with #b#p1102002##k, the Mount Instructor, to see whether your Mount will recover its health if it goes into the special Incubator.

#p1102002# says he's done everything he could but the Mount keeps getting weaker and weaker. As a last resort, he suggests you seek help from #b#p1101001##k. He then hints that you may gain something more valuable if you #bsincerely devote time and energy to your Mount#k.
The Mount which #p1101001# had revived was not the same #t1902006#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Rebirth of Shinjo
If you wish to turn your #t1902006# into a #t1902007# again, you must go see #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor#k.

#p1102002# said he's learned to summon #t1902007# from #p1101001#, but that he couldn't do such a favor for someone who's careless enough to lose his #t1902007#. He then proposed that you pay him #b100,000,000 Mesos#k as a testament of your devout determination to never lose your Mount again.
You paid 100,000,000 Mesos to #p1102002# and received a #t1902007#.

string.name: name
string.value: Training Never Ends
#p1101002# seems eager to talk to me about something...

#p1101002# told me that being at Level 100 still means I have some training to do. He suggested I learn from the Chief Knights who never stop training. He even told me I may one day be able to acquire a new skill...

#p1101002# told me that being at Level 100 still means I have some training to do. He suggested I learn from the Chief Knights who never stop training. He even told me I may one day be able to acquire a new skill...

He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. string.name: name
string.value: Are You Sure You Can Leave?
Apparently, #p1101002# wants to tell me something...
#p1101002# told me I may be a knight, but I still have a long way to go before he can send me out on assignments, and asked me to train more.

#p1101002# told me I may be a knight, but I still have a long way to go before he can send me out on assignments, and he asked me to train more with the help from #p1102000# the Training Instructor...

string.name: name
string.value: First Time Together Training
I better take #p1101002#'s advice and go see #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k.

#p1102000# told me he expected me to come and suggested that I take the Acclimation Training before entering Victoria Island. He then proposed that I head over to the end of the Training Forest and enter #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k to hunt the #r#o9300271#s#k that are inside.\n\n#o9300271##r #a207011##k
I managed to defeat 30 #o9300271#s.

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Acclimation Training
I shall receive the 2nd Acclimation Training from #b#p1102000##k.
This time, the monster in question for Acclimation Training is #r#o9300272##k. I'll need to enter #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k and battle against #o9300272#... \n\n#o9300272##r #a207021##k
I managed to defeat 30 #o9300272#s.

string.name: name
string.value: 3rd Acclimation Training
I shall receive the 3rd Acclimation Training from #b#p1102000##k.

This time, the monster in question for the Acclimation Training is #r#o9300273##k. He warned me that the monster has quite a temper and that I better be careful. I better return to #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k and hunt #o9300273#s. \n\n#o9300273##r #a207031##k
I was able to hunt 30 #o9300273#s. Now that I have reached Level 13, I should return to #p1101002# and receive an assignment.

string.name: name
string.value: A Mission in Henesys
I have finally reached the level it takes to receive an assignment as a Cygnus Knight. I'll need to visit #bthe Tactician for Cygnus Knights, #p1101002##k for an assignment.

You finally receive the first assignment from #p1101002#, asking that you head over to #b#m100000000# of Victoria Island#k and provide support for #bAgent #p1103001##k. In order to get to Henesys, you must...
1. Go to the Sky Ferry and take the ship that heads to Victoria Island. 2. Arrive at the Victoria Tree Platform. 3. Go toward Henesys from the Six-Way Crossroads.
...Be careful not to get lost.

I finally received the first assignment from #p1101002#, asking that I head over to #m100000000# of Victoria Island and provide support for Agent #p1103001#. I guess this kind of assignment is very common, since the Cygnus Knights are sent to different parts of Maple World to collect information on the Black Mage.

string.name: name
string.value: A Cynical Orange Mushroom
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000# in order to receive the next assignment.

According to #p1103001#, #o1210102# has been looking suspicious lately. Some of the #o1210102#s appear to offer a cold, cynical look, and #p1103001# believes they may be linked to the Black Mage. He then assigned me to hunt down #r#o9300274##k... 

#o9300274##r #a207051##k 
#i4032190# #t4032190# #b#c4032190# / 1#k
I was able to hunt down all the #o9300274#s that were out there. #p1103001# then told me to come back later, as he decided to continue to investigate on other suspicious creatures in this area.

string.name: name
string.value: A Black Shadow in the Pig Farm
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100010000#, who seems to have some new information to share.

#p1103001#, who claims black shadows have been spotted all around #b#m100010000##k, asks you to investigate the forest in the east. He tells you to #bmove your mouse cursor around until you can click on something, then click on it#k.
You spotted a suspicious black shadow hidden in the forest, and you reported it to #p1103001#.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolt of the Pigs
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000#, who apparently received some disturbing news.

Was I too late in finding that black shadow? Apparently, the #o1210100#s at the #o1210100# Farm have caused a revolt. The agent believes that one of Black Mage's men has probably set up a device in the area that causes such chaos. #p1103001# assigned me to defeat the #r#o1210100#s#k and if I happen to come across an item called #b#t4032130##k, then I should bring it back to him. I can find the #r#o1210100#s#k in #m120020100#.#

#o1210100##r #a207071##k 
#o1210101##r #a207072##k 
#i4032130# #t4032130# #b#c4032130# / 1#k

I was able to eliminate #o1210100#s and prevented their revolt from being carried out any further. After handing in the #p1103001# to #t4032130#, he had a disturbed look on his face. I wonder what's going on.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Henesys Complete
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000#, who seems eager to talk to me.
#p1103001# told me that would conclude my assignments here in #m100000000# and asked me to hand in the Mission Report and #t4032131# to #b#p1101002##k in #bEreve#k.
After receiving the report and the doll, #p1101002# told me to go train to make myself more useful while he goes through the report.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Kerning City
#p1101002# is trying to give me a new assignment. I wonder what it is...
I received a new assignment from #p1101002#, which is to travel to #b#m103000000##k of Victoria Island and provide support for #bAgent #p1103002##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Hidden Inside the Trash Can
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# about the next assignment.

#p1103002# told me that sources confessed to a huge number of #bstrange dolls#k dumped inside the #m103000000# subway, and that he wanted me to bring back one of those. I'll have to dig in through the #btrash can inside the subway#k in #m103000000#... \n\n#i4032136# #t4032136# #b#c4032136# / 1#k
I managed to find #t4032136# and gave it to #p1103002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Fake Doll
Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# found a new information he'd like to share with me.

#p1103002# tells you that the dolls inside the trashcan are fake and that the real dolls may have already been absorbed by #o1210103#s. He wants you to defeat #r50 #o1210103#s#k and bring back #b10 #t4032137#s#k.

#o1210103##r #a207111##k 
#i4032137# #t4032137# #b#c4032137# / 10#k
I was able to eliminate the #o1210103#s and bring back #t4032137#s to #p1103002#.

string.name: name
string.value: I Shall Pick 'Em All!
Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# had something to tell me.

#p1103002# said there were so many dolls with him that he couldn't tell which one was which and wound up asking #b#p9000008##k to sort out the dolls for him. My job is to go up to him and ask for the real doll from the pile.\n\n#i4032138# #t4032138# #b#c4032138# / 1#k
I was able to score the real #t4032138# from #p9000008# and handed it to #p1103002#.

string.name: name
string.value: A Deal With Mr. Pickall
Per #p1103002#'s order, I better go up to #b#p9000008##k and ask for the real #t4032138#.

#p9000008# told me he couldn't give me the real doll because he wasn't paid a dime for this work. In fact, he wanted me to pay him the fee for it. He even suggested that if I couldn't pay for it, then I'll have to work. I'll need to give him #b#t4032139##k, which is very common among #r#o1210103#s#k, in order for him to cough up the real doll. \n\n#i4032139# #t4032139# #b#c4032139# / 10#k
I was able to give #t4032139# to #p9000008# and received the real #t4032138#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Kerning City Complete
Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# told me he had something to tell me...
#p1103002# told me this wraps up my work in #m103000000# and that I'll need to hand in the Mission Report and #t4032140# to #b#p1101002##k.

After receiving the report and the doll, #p1101002# told me one of Black Mage's men is indeed a Puppeteer, and that this may all stem from him. He then told me this still needs more investigation and asked me to train harder so that I can make myself useful for the upcoming missions.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Ellinia
It looks like #p1101002# is trying to give me a new assignment. I wonder what it is...
I received a new assignment from #p1101002#, which is to head over to #b#m101000000##k of Victoria Island and provide support for #bAgent #p1103003##k.
I wound up meeting Agent #p1103003# at #m101000000#...

string.name: name
string.value: Maybe it's Arwen!
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# told me she suspects that #b#p1032100##k might be controlled by the Puppeteer, and asked me to give Arwen #b#t4032142##k, which can be purchased at #b#m101020300##k. Her theory was that if Arwen is controlled, then she would dread it; if Arwen is free, then she'd be ecstatic over it... \n\n#i4032142# #t4032142# #b#c4032143# / 1#k
Arwen thanked me for giving her #t4032142#, for she was very thirsty at the time and proceeded to finish it in one giant gulp.

string.name: name
string.value: The Plants are Suspicious!
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# tells you she's starting to worry about the #bplants that are growing in the Chimney Tree area. After she plucked a fruit from one of the plants, she got violently ill. She suspects that one of the Black Mage's henchmen injected some poison in the plants. You better collect some fruits to see if it's true. \n\n#i4032143# #t4032143# #b#c4032143# / 10#k
I gave #t4032143# to #p1103003#. After looking through the charts, #p1103003# found out that the fruits that are being produced at this time of the year can cause food poisoning...

string.name: name
string.value: Maybe it's Grendel!
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# told me #p1032001# looked very suspicious. She said she always had #p1032001# in mind every since she found out about his past, which involved dabbling with dangerous black magic. She then assigned me to visit #b#m101000003##k, where #p1032001# lives, and wanted me to conduct a #bfull search in his house#k while #p1032001# is away.

While conducting a full search in #p1032001#'s house, I was ambushed by a black shadow. Thankfully, I came out alive. After telling her what happened, #p1103003# stopped and started thinking about something...

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Ellinia Complete
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000#, who wanted to talk to me about something.

#p1103003# told me this makes it clear that #p1032001# is not guilty and that this assignment has been wrapped up for now. She then handed me the Mission Report on the black shadow and asked me to hand it in to #b#p1101002##k.

I handed #t4032144# in to #p1101002#. #p1101002# seemed worried that the power of the Puppeteer seems to be growing by day and that I'll need to get stronger in order to one day stop the Puppeteer cold in his tracks. He then ordered me to keep training until the next assignment becomes available.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Perion
#b#p1101002##k told me there's an item that I'll need to deliver that is crucial to this upcoming assignment.
#p1101002# wound up giving me #t4032145#. He told me I'll soon discover the reason for the item and asked me to deliver #t4032145# to #bAgent #p1103004##k of #b#m102000000##k.
I wound up giving #t4032145# to #p1103004#.

string.name: name
string.value: Wooden Mask
I better ask Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# about the new assignment.

#p1103004# tells you something's not right in #b#m102040000##k, and you need to go there to eliminate #r#o2230110##k. After eliminating #r#o2230110##k, you also have to bring back #b#t4032146##k.

#o2230110##r #a207221##k 
#i4032146# #t4032146# #b#c4032146# / 1#k
I was able to eliminate #o2230110#s and brought back #b#t4032146##k. #p1103004# had a serious look on his face while looking at the detector...

string.name: name
string.value: Stone Mask
Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# has a new assignment for me...

#p1103004# tells you that this time, the detector reacted in the direction of #b#m102040100##k, and assigns you to eliminate #r50 #o2230111#s#k there, while bringing back #b#t4032147##k. 

#o2230111##r #a207231##k 
#i4032147# #t4032147# #b#c4032147# / 1#k
I was able to eliminate all the #o2230111#s. #p1103004# then proceeded to look at the detector again...

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Perion Complete
Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# wants to talk to me about something...
#p1103004# told me the assignments for #m102000000# are now complete and asked that I turn in the Mission Report along with #t4032148# to #b#p1101002##k.
I wound up giving #p1101002# #p1103004#'s report and #t4032148#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Sleepywood
#p1101002# wants to talk to me about an assignment...

#p1101002# told me he detected a strong force of darkness around #b#m105040300##k and wanted me to look into #r#o9300285##k. The problem is there's not a single agent currently assigned there, so he wanted me to gather up the information from scratch by myself...
I was able to gather up all the information and write up a report to #p1101002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama's Information
Maybe #b#p1061005##k of #m105040300# can tell me something useful about #o9300285#...
#p1061005# says he can give you useful information on #o9300285# if you can eliminate #r100 #o2230100#s#k for him. \n\n#o2230100##r #a207271##k
According to #p1061005#, #o9300285# lives somewhere around Perion.

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Statue's Information
According to #p1061000#, there may be some clues of #o9300285# on the surface of #b#p1061006##k. I'll have to talk to #p1061006#.
Something seems to be written on it, but it's hard to see. I'll have to move #p1061006# around.
At the back of #p1061006#, I found some writings on it with a horrible handwriting. It said: The password is XXXXXXX is a genius #o9300285#!

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Missing Kid 1
You hear someone scream from the ark, saying something about a kid that's gone missing. The ark can't leave until the kid's on board. What should you do?

#p1209000# is pleading with you to find the child. The kid's apparently lost somewhere in the forest. She says you're the only one who even has a chance of succeeding... #bSo you'd better go into the forest and look for him!#k
You barely managed to find the kid deep in the forest. You'd better take him back to the ark.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Missing Kid 2
You barely managed to find the kid deep in the forest. You should take him back to the ark.
You barely managed to find the kid deep in the forest. You should take him back to the ark.
You barely managed to rescue the kid. There's not much time left! The ark must leave before the Black Mage attacks!

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Weapon
You should talk to #b#p1202002##k on your way back to town.
#p1202002# tells you it's an honor to meet a real hero and pleads with you to say hello to his brother #b#p1202003##k, who's also eager to meet a hero.
#p1202003# said that a true hero should never be without a weapon and gave you a sword. A hero without a weapon? Were you really a hero to begin with?

string.name: name
string.value: Abilities Lost
You should talk to #b#p1202004##k, standing on the road to town.

#p1202004# says that it makes perfect sense that you don't know how to hold a weapon, since you've lost your memory. He then tells you that maybe battling a monster would jog your memory and asks you to defeat #r#o9300383##k. You wonder if you can do it.
You defeated #o9300383#, but it hasn't jogged any memories. You have a feeling that your skills and abilities were lost, just like your memories. What kind of a hero are you if you have no abilities?

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Hero
You should talk to #b#p1202005##k, standing on the road to town.

#p1202005# confesses that he's always wanted to build one particular gift for a hero and that he's stored all the necessary components in a box. He asks you to break open the box and bring him the items inside. Break boxes by swinging at them with regular attacks, then collect the #b#t4032309##k and #b#t4032310##k.
You received a chair from #p1202005#. #p1202005# encouraged you by telling you that you are still a hero even though you've lost your powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Training 1

#p1201000#'s debriefing allowed you to understand the gist of what happened between the heroes and the Black Mage. You have a hunch there may be another showdown with the Black Mage down the road, and that you'll be an important part of it. You should see what #b#p1201000##k thinks you should do next.

#p1201000# tells you that you'll have to do everything you can to regain your abilities. First, however she suggests you warm up, seeing how you were frozen in ice for hundreds of years. The first level of basic training is monster hunting. You'd better head to #b#m140020000##k and start hunting.
You were able to defeat the #o0100131#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Training 2
Basic Training continues. If you want to start the second stage of Basic Training, you should talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says that this time you have to go to #b#m140020100##k and defeat some #r#o0100132#s#k. Come to think of it, #p1201000# seems different from the time you first saw her, back when she had that mystical aura about her...
You defeated the #o0100132#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Training 3
Basic Training continues. If you want to start the third stage of Basic Training, you should talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# wants to step up the intensity of the training and asks you to defeat #b#o0100133#s#k. This is getting more intense, but when you mentioned that to #p1201000#, your protests were ignored. Shoot, you'd better just head over to #b#m140020200##k.
You defeated the #o0100133#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Test
You think you have gained some much needed stamina through training. You should talk to #b#p1201000##k and receive the test for the final stage of your Basic Fitness Training.
#p1201000# told you battle #r#o0100134#s#k. This time, you need to head to the other side, to the west side of town where #b#m140010200##k is. Fortunately, that doesn't seem too hard.
You eliminated the #o0100134#s. You can see how much your stamina and power have improved. What next?

string.name: name
string.value: The Mirror of Desire

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
The polearm introduces itself as Maha and demands that you remember him. What are you supposed to do? You'd better consult #b#p1201000##k about this.

#p1201000# states that the voice is really #p1201001#'s voice, and that you need to remember something about #p1201001# to appease him. If you head west of #b#m140000000# to #m140030000##k, you'll find the Mirror of Desire, which has the power to display whatever you desire. Maybe you should check it.

You were able to faintly encounter your past through the mirror. You saw the time you first got your polearm. When you mentioned the story, #p1201002# seemed relieved. Thanks to #p1201002#'s help, you were able to recover some of your dormant abilities.

string.name: name
string.value: Catch that Thief!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
So what exactly happened to make you return to the island? You'd better go talk to #b#p1201002##k.

#p1201002# was devastated to have his #t4032312# stolen! The thief responsible for this mess, #o9001013#, apparently headed toward #m140020300#. Maybe he's planning to escape on a boat. You need to go to #m140020300# and battle #r#o9001013##k.\r\n\r\n#o9001013##r #a213011##k
You successfully eliminated #o9001013#, but the #t4032312# was nowhere to be found. When #p1201002# found out what happened, he went crazy.

string.name: name
string.value: Friendship with Yeti

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

So, you follow #p1201000#'s instructions and look in the Mirror of Desire once more. Your vision gets dark for a second, but then you find yourself in #m211000000#, once again returning to the past. Standing before you is a Yeti in tears. What's going on? You'd better talk to #b#p1203001##k.

Sniffling heavily, #p1203001# says a thief stole his gem. He is distraught that his red gem is gone, after he had so painstakingly created it. A red gem? It must have something to do with the #t4032312#! You should find the thief on behalf of #p1203001#.

#o9001013##r #a213031##k
#i4032339# #t4032339# #b#c4032339# / 1#k

#p1203001# thanked you for retrieving his gem and taught you how to make a #t4032312# as a token of his appreciation. #t4032312# can be made using #b1 Dark Crystal, 3 Diamond Ores, and 3 Garnett Ores#k and combining them with the #bMaker Skill#k. Don't forget it when making the #t4032312# for #p1201002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Taming the Polearm

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
Something must be wrong with the #b#p1201002##k. What's going on, you wonder? Why is he in so much pain?

#p1201002# confesses that, because he spent the last few hundred years without a master, the hint of darkness that existed in his heart has begun to spiral out of control in the form of rage. He's begging you to get rid of the rage. Apparently, if you defeat #p1201002#, the rage will stop. It doesn't look easy by any means, but it is what a master must do. You'd better take on the #r#o9001014##k.\r\n\r\n#o9001014##r #a214011##k
You were able to defeat the #o9001014#. Once the rage subsided, #p1201002# helped awaken more of your past powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Acknowledges Its Owner

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
As soon as you reach Level 200, #b#p1201002##k strikes up a conversation with you...?!
#p1201002# tells you to come to #b#m140000000##k. He has something he wants to tell you.
#p1201002# tells you that you are almost back to you old, heroic self, and as proof, gives you a powerful skill called Hero's Echo.

string.name: name
string.value: Pucci's Request
#b#p1202007##k, a penguin from #b#m140000000##k, apparently has something to tell you.

#p1202007# says that one of the 'huskies' he was tending was actually a wolf. He doesn't know exactly what happened, but he doesn't want to abandon the infant wolf pup. He wants you to ask around for some tips on how to raise a wolf. Somewhere around Aqua Road, you know that #b#p2060000##k knows a little something about raising wolves...
You were able to meet #p2060000# at #m230010201# of Aqua Road.

string.name: name
string.value: Formula for Your Wolf Pup
You should ask #b#p2060000##k of #b#m230010201##k about how to raise a wolf.

#p2060000# tells you he's raised wolves before and promises to make #bWolf Pup Formula#k for you. In order to make the formula, you will need #b#t4000161##k, which you can get from Seacles, and #t4032331#, which is sold by #b#p2060005##k.
#i4000161# #t4000161# #b#c4000161# / 50#k #i4032331# #t4032331# #b#c4032331# / 1#k
Armed with all the ingredients, #p2060000# asked you to wait while she finishes making the #t4032332#.

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Wolf Pup Formula
You should head to the t#b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k and purchase some #t4032331# from #b#p2060005##k.
#t4032331# costs 10 million mesos. It's a lot to pay, but you gladly pay it, knowing it's what's best for the wolf pup.\r\n\r\n#b10 million mesos#k
You purchased the #t4032331#.

string.name: name
string.value: Ryko the Wolf Pup
Is the #t4032332# ready? You should talk to #b#p2060000##k of #b#m230010201##k.

You receive the completed #t4032332# from #p2060000#. This should be enough to raise the Wolf Pup for a bit. You should head to #b#m140000000##k right away and give #b#p1202007##k the formula. Pucci is probably waiting somewhere around the #bSnowy Field 2#k.
Having finished the formula, the Wolf Pup seemed to have taken a liking toward you. #p1202007# ended up giving you the wolf pup, which he named #t1902015#, to raise. You vow to take good care of him.

string.name: name
string.value: Wolf Mount
It looks like there are a couple of people who know how to handle Wolf Pups. You should head over to #b#m211000000##k and talk to #b#p2020007##k.

#p2020007# has taught you the basics of mounting a wolf! With this, you'll be able to move around faster since you can ride on the wolf's back. Plus you gain valuable bonding time with your wolf. You'll have to gather materials for a saddle, since you won't be able to ride your wolf without one.\r\n\r\n#i4000048# #t4000048# #b#c4000048# / 50#k
You received the #t1912011# and Mount Skill from #p2020007#. You'll be able to roam through the entire world with this.

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Wolf
#t1902015# is missing! What should you do? You'd better go to #b#m140000000##k and ask #b#p1202007##k what to do.

#p1202007# says that #t1902015# returned to him in tears and chastised you for not taking better care of it. He then tells you that you need to buy some medication in order to restore poor, weakened #t1902015#'s health.\r\n\r\n#b20,000,000 mesos#k
You were able to get #t1902015# back. You promise to never, ever lose it again.

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Saddle
You've lost your #t1912011#! What should you do?

#p2020007# tells you to gather materials to make another #t1912011# and to also pay a service fee of #b10 million mesos#k for the replacement. What?!

#b10,000,000 mesos#k
#i4000048# #t4000048# #b#c4000048# / 50#k
After paying the huge service fee and gathering all the materials, you received another #t1912011# from #p2020007#. Better not lose it again!

string.name: name
string.value: The Adolescent Wolf
#b#p1202007##k, a penguin from #b#m140000000##k, wants to talk to you about something.

According to the data #p1202007# has studied, wolves go through a kind of puberty during their adolescent years. They say that if you don't take special care of wolves during this time, they might not grow properly! #p1202007# then mentions that in order to raise #t1902015# well, you should ask advice from some veterans of wolf-raising.

#y21608# #b(#u21608#)#k
#y21610# #b(#u21610#)#k
After listening to everyone's advice on how to raise a wolf, you noticed that your #t1902016# had grown a bit. You need to take good care of your wolf now that it is going through puberty.

string.name: name
string.value: Nanuke's Advice
Since adolescent #t1902015# is now going through puberty, you decide to visit #b#p2060000##k in #b#m230010201##k and ask for some good advice.

#p2060000# says that nutrition is very important for adolescent wolves. He agrees to make you some nutritional supplements if you bring him the ingredients...
#i4000182# #t4000182# #b#c4000182# / 100#k #i4000183# #t4000183# #b#c4000183# / 100#k #i4000184# #t4000184# #b#c4000184# / 100#k #i4032333# #t4032333# #b#c4032333# / 1#k
You brought the ingredients to #p2060000# and she worked her magic to create some special formula for adolescent wolves.

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Adolescent Wolf Vitamins
You've decided to prepare a bowl of Adolescent Wolf Vitamins for #t1902015#. Head to #b#m230000003##k to buy ingredients from #b#p2060005##k.

#p2060005# claims to have the vitamins necessary for Adolescent Wolves and agrees to sell them to you for 40 million mesos. *Sigh* It's a lot of money, but you should buy them for the sake of your wolf's health and well-being.\r\n\r\n#b40,000,000 mesos#k
You paid 40 million mesos and bought some of Adolescent Wolf Vitamins from #p2060005#.

string.name: name
string.value: Scadur's Advice
Since adolescent #t1902015# is going through puberty, you should visit #b#p2020007##k of #b#m211000000##k and ask for some good advice.

#p2020007# says that Wolf Pups need to freely run around fields every once in a while and introduces you to a great spot. Head to #m921110000#, located past the #bWolf-Shaped Rock#k in #b#m211050000##k, and let your pup get some exercise running around the field.
You and your wolf ran across the Field of Wolves and got some good exercise. #t1902015# seemed to have really enjoyed the experience.

string.name: name
string.value: Rebellious Wolf
The wolf that you lost, then recovered, seems to have decreased in size and has quite an attitude too. What should you do? Better head to #b#m140000000##k and talk to #b#p1202007##k.

According to #p1202007#, a wolf who has lost its way is often unable to get over its trauma, to the point where it shrinks and even acquires a rebellious attitude. The owner, apparently, needs to re-teach the wolf some life lessons. They say you need to invest in some educational expenses...\r\n\r\n#b80,000,000 mesos#k
You paid the educational fees and let the wolf just enjoy himself for once. Fortunately, the wolf seemed to be back to normal size.

string.name: name
string.value: A Visit from the Wolf Herd
#b#p1202007##k, the penguin from #b#m140000000##k, wants to have a word with you.

A pack of wolves apparently paid a visit to #m140000000# in search of #t1902016#. It must be the family that #t1902016# lost as a pup. You should meet #b#p1202008##k and ask why they're here all of a sudden. #p1202008# is waiting at #m914030000##k, which can be accessed through #b#m140010100#.
You met with #p1202008#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wolves' Test
You need to go see the pack of wolves that are here to meet #t1902016#. They are apparently waiting at #b#m914030000##k, which is connected to #b#m140010100##k.

#p1202008# thanked you for raising their baby pup, but demanded that you return #t1902016# to them. When you told them you weren't interested in returning him, the wolf decided to give you a test to see if you're worthy of raising a wolf. Now you just need to eliminate all the #o9300354#s #p1202008# has summoned.
You passed the test, but #p1202008# still seems to want a word with you...

string.name: name
string.value: A Wolf's Heart
According to #p1202008#, #t1902016# will be in grave danger if you leave it as it is right now. What does that mean? You'd better ask #b#p1202008##k.

#p1202008# introduced its clan as Silver Wolves, and told you that all Silver Wolves must drink #b#t4032334##k in order to properly grow into adulthood. Otherwise, these adolescent wolves' lives may be in danger. You should gather the ingredients and use the Maker Skill to make #t4032334#!\r\n\r\n#i4032334# #t4032334# #b#c4032334# / 1#k
You made some #t4032334# and had your #t1902016# drink it. Armed with a stronger heart, #t1902016# has successfully transformed into an adult wolf.

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Ingredients for the Wolf's Life Water
One of the ingredients for the #t4032334# is the #t4032335#. Maybe #b#p2060005##k at the #b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k sells it? You'd better go see #p2060005#.
#p2060005# tells you that the #t4032335# that was given by the wolves living in #m230000003# is available, but only at a price. She says it'll cost you 80 million mesos.\r\n\r\n#b80,000,000 mesos#k
You purchased the #t4032335# from #p2060005#. You'll use it to make some #t4032334#.

string.name: name
string.value: Reacquiring the Life Water Ingredients
You need to make the #t4032334# again. You know #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k sells this so you'd better go see #p2060005# for another #t4032335#.
#p2060005# tells you it'll cost you 100 million mesos to buy the #t4032335# because the supply has become more limited since the last time you purchased it.\r\n\r\n#b100 million mesos#k
You paid #p2060005# 100 million mesos and purchased the #t4032335#... You'd better make some #t4032334# right now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wolf's Evolution
#b#p1201002##k wants to talk to you about something...
#p1201002# says that he's noticed a formidable force surrounding you and tells you to come see him because he wants to find out what it is. You'd better head over to #b#m140000000##k right now.

#t1902017#, the Silver Wolf, apparently grows with its master. The wolf is able to go through an awakening to get a whole new look once it gains enough strength from its master. This seems to explain your #p1201002#'s transformation into a #t1902018#.

string.name: name
string.value: Train or Die! 1
You certainly have doubts, but you'll give #b#p1202006##k the benefit of the doubt and receive some training from him.

According to #p1202006#, the first training lesson involves eliminating #r#o9300341#s#k. He makes it seem like it's some huge hurdle but they don't sound too difficult.\r\n\r\n#o9300341##r #a217011##k
You eliminated the #o9300341#s with ease. Judging from how enthusiastic #p1202006# reacted, you are even less inclined to trust him.

string.name: name
string.value: Train or Die! 2
You still don't trust this #b#p1202006##k, but you might as well receive some training from him.

According to #p1202006#, the second lesson involves eliminating #r#o9300342#s#k. Again, he still makes it sound like it's some huge hurdle, but again, they don't sound very tough.\r\n\r\n#o9300342##r #a217021##k
You defeated the #o9300342#s with ease! #p1202006# may be giving you words of encouragement, but his words are worth very little.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Steps
After receiving some lessons from #p1202006#, you remembered the Combo Ability skill! You'd better relay this to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says you were probably able to regain your memories of the skill because you swung your polearm around just like how you did in the past. Muscle memory, or something. She seems confident that the more you train, the stronger you will become and the more skills you will remember.

The small step of remembering the Combo Ability skill has opened a world of possibilities for you. You now have the confidence to continue training in the hope of one day returning to your old, heroic self.

string.name: name
string.value: To Victoria Island
Your training continues. You must keep progressing until the Black Mage is defeated once and for all. You should ask #b#p1201000##k what to do next.

#p1201000# says you can only train so much in #m140000000# and suggests you venture to #bVictoria Island#k. She directs you to an ally of hers, #b#p1002104# the Information Dealer#k, in #b#m104000004##k.\r\n\r\nIn order to reach #m104000000#, you must leave #m140000000# by boarding a ship. From town, head to your right and continue past the snow-covered field to arrive at a small port operated by penguins. Once there, talk to #b#p1200003##k to board the ship.

#p1002104# the Information Dealer was once a resident of #m140000000# eagerly awaiting the Hero's revival, but he eventually lost hope and left town. He's a distant cousin of #p1201000#. He must have felt bad about leaving #p1201000# all by herself, because he promised to help #p1002104# anytime she needed it.

string.name: name
string.value: An Information Dealer's Work
You should start training in Victoria Island and ask #bthe Information Dealer of #m104000000##k, named #b#p1002104##k, for some help.

#p1002104# tells you there's no better way to learn the inner workings of the world than to be an Information Dealer, and he offers you a position working with him. #p1002104# then gives you a simple quest to introduce you to the roles of an Information Dealer and informant. The quest involves finding out the latest rumors the crewmembers of #b#p1002001##k have been talking about.\r\n\r\n#y21707# #b(#u21706#)#k
You relayed to #p1002104# all the rumors you heard from #p1002001#. You guess this is the type of thing that informants do all the time.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Information
For the time being, you're working as an informant for #p1002104#. Your first task is to approach #b#p1002001##k and ask about any rumors circulating among the crewmembers.

#p1002001# tells you that revealing a rumor is no big deal, but he'll only do it under one condition. Turns out he wants some snail shells to treat his arthritis. Fair enough. The area surrounding #m104000000# is infested with snails, so this shouldn't be hard. 

#i4000019# #t4000019# #b#c4000019# / 10#k
#i4000000# #t4000000# #b#c4000000# / 10#k
#i4000016# #t4000016# #b#c4000016# / 10#k
You gave him all the #t4000019#s, and in return, he told you that the crew is currently stressed about the certain revival of the Black Mage. You'd better relay this bit of info to #p1002104#.

string.name: name
string.value: Your First Informant Assignment
Now that you have an idea of what an informant does, it's time to get your hands dirty. #b#p1002104##k will tell you what to do.

Your first information gathering assignment is to find out why the #o1210102#s near #m100000000# have started acting so wildly. They're usually so tame! #p1002104# tells you to ask the mushroom monster scholar about the occurrence and see if he can shed some light on what's been going on. #b#p1012111##k can be found in #b#m100000000##k.
You met with #p1012111#.

string.name: name
string.value: Check Out the Orange Mushroom
This is your first assignment as an informant. You're here to ask #b#p1012111##k in #b#m100000000##k about possible causes of the #o1210102#'s strange behavior.

#p1012111# needs to find out what is happening to the #o1210102#s. He wants you to find out if any horns can be salvaged from the #o1210102#s. Defeat the #r#o1210102#s#k and search for the #b#t4032314##k.
#i4032314# #t4032314# #b#c4032314# / 20#k
You brought the #t4032314#s you found to #p1012111#. He says he's going to start studying the horns and asked you to come back later.

string.name: name
string.value: Enter the Cynical Orange Mushrooms!

This is your first assignment as an informant. You're hopeful that this time #p1012111# of #b#m100000000##k has found the cause of the #o1210102#s' strange change in behavior. You'd better go talk to #b#p1012111##k.

#p1012111# says that #ra cynical group of #o1210102##ks was seen hanging around #m100000000#. He thinks they may have influenced the regular #o1210102#s as well. He then instructs you to eliminate #r50 #o9300274#s#k and give him #banything you find that might be considered odd#k...

#o9300274##r #a217111##k
#i4032315# #t4032315# #b#c4032315# / 1#k
You eliminated the #o9300274# and brought back the #t4032315# for #p1012111#. He found it unusual and asked you to wait while he gives it a detailed analysis.

string.name: name
string.value: First Assignment, Completed!

Since this is your first assignment as an informant, you are eager to find out whether #p1012111# of #b#m100000000##k has solved the mystery behind the #t4032315#. Go visit #b#p1012111##k and find out.

#p1012111# says he discovered a faint noise coming out of the #t4032315#, which only #o1210102#s can hear, and that's what's been causing their aggressive behavior. In other words, #bthe #r#o1210102#s' behavior is all because of a puppet#k! Now that you have this case pretty much wrapped up, your should report the info to #b#p1002104##k.

You notified #p1002104# about the cause of the strange behavior among the #o1210102#s, which officially concluded your first ever assignment as an informant. You should probably spend some time leveling up and training yourself now.

string.name: name
string.value: Green Mushrooms at the Secret Forest to the South
This is your second assignment as an informant and you need to ask #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k why the #o1110100#s have suddenly turned so aggressive.

#p1032101# says she's heard that a lot of monsters have been going crazy and that they all seem to have something in common: their strange behavior is tied to an odd puppet. Maybe this too is tied to the puppet? You should eliminate the #r#o1110130#s#k and find a #b#o1110100# puppet#k if you can.

#o1110130##r #a217141##k
#i4032316# #t4032316# #b#c4032316# / 1#k
You gave #p1032101# the #t4032316#. #p1032101# seemed shocked that the rumors were actually true and wanted to find out who was responsible for placing a puppet on the #o1110100#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Tree Witness
This is your second assignment as an informant and the question remains, who planted the puppet on the #o1110100#s? Talk to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k for some answers.
#p1032101# says that the #b#p1032112##k at #m101010000# should have seen who put the puppet inside the #o1110100#s. He wants you to find out from the Talking Tree who the culprit is.
#p1032112# stated that recently a little kid was seen carrying puppets in the South Forest. Since then, the #o1110100#s have gotten much more aggressive.

string.name: name
string.value: Second Assignment, Completed!
This is your second assignment as an informant and you must relay #p1032112#'s eyewitness account to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k.

#p1032101# is sure that the changes happening to the #o1110100#s is connected with the kid carrying the puppets and tells you to be extra cautious. Now that this case is pretty much wrapped up, you should relay the information to #b#p1002104##k.

You told #p1002104# why the #o1110100#s have become so aggressive, and that concluded your second assignment as an informant. But you wonder, will the fairies be able to watch over the forest all by themselves?

string.name: name
string.value: Your Third Informant Assignment
You have now reached Level 23, which means #p1002104# will soon be giving you your third assignment as an informant. You should head to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# suspects that the #o1140100# case in #m102000000# is similar to the ones in #m100000000# and #m101000000# and asks you to gather some information related to the present case. To get the details, you have to head over to #b#m102000000##k and talk to #b#p1103004##k...
You met with #p1103004# in #m102000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Stumps
This is your third assignment as an informant and this one involves studying the strange-acting #o1140130#s with #p1103004# in #b#m102000000##k. You'd better go talk to #b#p1103004##k.

#p1103004# already knows that the puppet is the reason behind the changes in the #o1140130#s. She asks that you go to #bGusty Peak#k, defeat #r100 #o1140130#s#k, and bring back #o1140130#'s puppet. She adds that you should just come back even if you don't discover a puppet after eliminating all 100...
Any #o9101002##r #a217221##k
You eliminated 100 #o1140130#s but didn't discover any puppets. #p1103004# says that something is very strange, because the puppet can be detected amongst the #o1140130#s...

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Puppet
This is your third assignment as an informant and you're at #b#m102000000##k with #p1103004#, investigating the causes of the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior. You should talk to #b#p1103004##k.

#p1103004# tells you that the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior was definitely caused by a puppet, but the puppet is not necessarily on the #o1140130#s' bodies. It could be somewhere outside... You should search the #bPile of Relics#k in #b#m102020500##k and find the #b#t4032319##k.
#i4032319# #t4032319# #b#c4032319# / 5#k
You retrieved all of the #t4032319#s. #p1103004# seemed genuinely shocked that the puppets were used for such a purpose and told you she'd have to write a report on this. A report? What report?

string.name: name
string.value: Third Assignment, Completed!

This is your third assignment as an informant and this one involves investigating the suddenly-erratic #o1140130#s in #b#m102000000##k. With the help of #p1103004#, you were able to locate the cause of the madness. The case seems to be nearing its end. You should talk to #b#p1103004##k.

#p1103004# says that the puppet doesn't necessarily have to be on a monster's body, it's enough just to be near a monster. She says that she will take measures to beef up security so the kid with the puppet can't get close to #m102000000# ever again. This concludes the case, and you are going to send the information to #b#p1002104##k.
You updated #p1002104# on what happened in #m102000000#, which concluded your third assignment as an informant.

string.name: name
string.value: Your Fourth Informant Assignment
You have now reached Level 28, which means #p1002104# will be giving you your fourth assignment as an informant today. Head to #b#m104000000##k and meet with #b#p1002104##k.

Many reports have been filed concerning a bunch of depressed #o2230101#s in #m105040300#. This has to be the work of the puppeteer. Head over to #b#m105040300##k and talk to the person who first discovered this. They say it's a boy named #b#p1061019##k.
You met with #p1061019# in #m105040300#.

string.name: name
string.value: 4th Assignment Completed

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and while you've found the puppeteer's cave, you need a password to enter. Maybe #p1061019# knows what the password could be? Go talk to #b#p1061019##k in #b#m105040300##k.

#p1061019# says that he doesn't know anything about the password but says that he saw the puppeteer scribble something onto #p1061006# that just might be the password. Find out what the password is by talking to #b#p1061006##k and tell #b#p1002104##k the password is as well.\r\n\r\n#y21730# #b(#u20730#)#k
So you found out the password but decided to first return to #p1002104# and debrief him on the case. This concludes your fourth Informant Assignment. Next up, Operation Puppeteer Headquarters?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Puppeteer!
You have now reached Level 29, which means it's time for you to ambush the #o9300344#, no? You should head over to #b#m104000000##k and notify #b#p1002104##k that you are ready for action.

#p1002104#, seeing that you're determined to attack the #o9300344#, decides to rent a powerful weapon for you. It's a disposable weapon, but it'll be put to good use. Now everything is set for the ambush in #b#m910510201##k. Remember, the password is 'Francis is a genius Puppeteer!'

#o9300344##r #a217311##k
The Black Wings' Clue #t4032322# #b#c4032322# / 1#k

You defeated the Puppeteer, but he ran away before you could finish him off. All you have left is a document the Puppeteer dropped while running away. When you showed #p1002104# the document, he suddenly looked dead serious.

string.name: name
string.value: The Black Wings' Conspiracy

The document you extracted from #o9300344# turns out to be a Black Wings document! Unfortunately, the document is written in code. What should you do? Go to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k for some advice.
Looks like the only person that can decode the document is #p1201000#. Head over to #b#m140000000##k and ask #b#p1201000##k to help.

The document says that the Black Wings possess an item known as the #t4032323#. #p1204002#, the puppeteer, is utilizing his special skills in mob manipulation to look for a certain Seal Stone. But what does that mean? What exactly are the Black Wings after?
As soon as you reach Level 45, you receive a message from #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# notifies you of some new information regarding the Black Wings and asks you to head to #b#m200000000##k to meet #b#p2012012# the fairy#k. #p2012012# will probably have some more details about this.
You met #p2012012# the fairy in #m200000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Giant Nependeaths Appear
It seems that something related to the Black Wings is happening in #b#m200000000##k. You should talk to #b#p2012012##k.

#p2012012# the fairy has noticed that the number of #r#o9300347#s#k has been steadily increasing in #b#m200060001##k and wants you to look into the #o9300347#s there. Apparently, if you're not careful and enter the wrong path from #b#m200060000##k, you may end up in #m200060001# instead, so you should head there right now, eliminate the #o9300347#s, and retrieve any strange items they might drop.\r\n\r\n#i4032324# #t4032324# #b#c4032324# / 5#k

After defeating the #o9300347#s, you brought back a #t4032324#. #p2012012# was curious to see who would do such a thing and seemed to worry even more that the sheer weight of the Nependeaths might cause Orbis to sink. She wanted you to discuss the problem about #m200000000# with someone who might know more.

string.name: name
string.value: To the Sealed Garden
You'll find #m920030001# in #m200000000#... You wonder if it's related to the Seal Stone. You bet #b#p2032001##k in #b#m200050000##k can explain a thing or two.

According to #p2032001#, #m920030001# is where the #bSeal Stone is hidden#k. The only way to enter #m920030001# is through a stem of the Nependeath which connects #m200060001# to #m920030001#. An intruder has actually grown the #o9300347# for this specific purpose. #p2032001# is desperately asking you to prevent the intruders from entering...

So you came face to face with a #o9300348# in #m920030001# and successfully defeated it, but ended up losing the Seal Stone to a member of the Black Wings, #o9300349#, who snatched it away from you. When you asked #p2032001# what you should do, she told you that she doesn't know what they want the Seal Stone for and sat quietly with a grim expression.

string.name: name
string.value: The Stolen Seal Stone of Orbis
You lost the Seal Stone of Orbis. What does this mean? Head to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k to get some advice.
After explaining to #p1002104# everything that took place in #m200000000#, #p1002104# felt that this information should be relayed to #b#p1201000##k as well.

#p1201000# seemed glad to have discovered that the Black Wings are after the Seal Stone and that there's more than one Seal Stone out there. She encouraged you with motivating words, then taught you a new skill that she had just decoded, known as the #bCombo Smash#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Investigating Mu Lung
As soon as you reach Level 54, you hear from #b#p1002104##k.
#p1002104# says they've just received word regarding the Black Wings and urges you to go to #b#m250000000##k. Talk to #b#p2090004##k in #m250000000# for more details.
You met with #p2090004# in #m250000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Black Scroll
So what does #b#m250000000##k have to do with the Black Wings? You should talk to #b#p2090004##k to find out.

#p2090004# received a #t4220151# a few days ago from a man who claimed to be the #r#o9300351##k of the Black Wings. But because he took such poor care of the #t4220151#, the contents of the scroll seems to have faded away. You think the only way chance to restore the content is through #b#p2091008# the painter#k.
You gave the restored #t4220151# to #p2090004#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Special Ink
You want to restore the #t4220151# that the Black Wings gave to #p2090004#. The one person in #b#m250000000##k who is capable of doing the restoration is #b#p2091008# the painter#k.

#p2091008# states that to restore the #t4220151#, one must make a #b#t4032342##k and pour it all over the Scroll. He then asks you to bring the materials necessary to make the ink, so he can make some for you.
You handed #p2091008# the materials and received #t4032342# in return. You should now open the #t4220151# and pour the #t4032342# over it.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Meet Mu Gong

The letter issued by #o9300351# of the Black Wings... In order to deliver the letter to #p2091007#, you first must win over #p2091005#, who is one of his students. You'd better head over to #b#m925020000##k and start sweet-talking #b#p2091005##k.

You ask nicely to see #p2091007#, but #p2091005#'s stance remains the same: NO! So, you decide to sweeten the pot, as instructed by #p2090004#, by offering healthy items for the body, which works like magic. You'd better start gathering some #b#t4000591#s#k.
You can find good Bellflowers by going through the #rSecret Portal behind the pillar#r right of So Gong.
