When you brought the #t4000591#s to him, #p2091005# discreetly told you the way to #m925020000#'s back alley. In front of #m925020000# are some flags. You need to use the portal under the green flag on the right side to get to #p2091007#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Stolen Seal Stone of Mu Lung
You lost the Seal Stone of Mu Lung. What does this mean? You'd better head over to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k to get some advice.
When you tell #p1002104# about everything that took place in #m250000000#, #p1002104# felt it was necessary for you to tell #b#p1201000##k in #b#m140000000##k about it.

#p1201000# stated that you did get something significant out of this, in that you found out the heroes were the ones that personally delivered the Seal Stone to those towns, and that by making that connection, you can focus on studying those heroes which will in turn lead you to new information. She then gave you a newly-decoded skill called #bFinal Charge#k!

string.name: name
string.value: Back to the Past
When you reach Level 63, #b#p1002104##k sends you a message.

According to #p1002104#, one of the clocktowers in #m220000000# has broken down. This clocktower manages time, and when it broke, it somehow created a path to the past. Exploring the past could reveal some information about Seal Stones. #bThe busted clocktower with the time-control room can be accessed through the ladder on the top floor of Helios Tower#k, so you should make you way over there.

According to #p1002104#, one of the clocktowers in #m220000000# has broken down. This clocktower manages time, and when it broke, it somehow created a path to the past. Exploring the past could reveal some information about Seal Stones. #bThe busted clocktower with the time-control room can be accessed through the ladder on the top floor of Helios Tower#k, so you should make your way over there.

string.name: name
string.value: Seal Stone of Ellin Forest
You ran into someone from the past who apparently knew you. Maybe #p2131000# in Ellin Forest knows something about the Seal Stone. You'd better go talk to #b#p2131000##k and find out.

#p2131000# says that she stored a rock in #m300000011#, which the heroes left for her, and she thinks it might be the Seal Stone. Entering #m300000011# to verify whether the rock is actually a Seal Stone requires a #b#t4032325##k. #p2131003# in #b#m300000000##k apparently has the #b#t4032325##k.
#i4032325# #t4032325# #b#c4032325# / 1#k
You received the #t4032325# from #p2131003#. #p2131000# told you to head to the #m300000011#.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Key
Apparently, #p2131003# has the #t4032325# that can open the safe where the Seal Stone of Ellin Forest is stored. You'd better head over to #b#m300000000##k and talk to #b#p2131003##k.

You ask #p2131003# for the keys, but she starts to panic. She tells you that she may have lost it. It looks like the #r#o9001024#s#k nearby have the key, so it's up to you to defeat them all and retrieve it.
She found one of keys that #p2131003# lost and gave you the #t4032325#. Be sure to take it to #p2131000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Info on Another Seal Stone

You met #p1204031# in the #b#m100000201# of #m100000000##k. Thankfully, the letter hadn't gotten lost, but you think #p2131000# must have been shocked to see you. You'd better to talk to #b#p2131000##k.

#p1012100# flashed a big smile, saying that she knew she'd someday meet you again. She then handed you the letter. It's a great feeling, knowing that you have a friend that remembers you hundreds of years later. You'd better show the letter to #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# tells you that the letter is unreadable and that it actually might be cursed. He recommends that you show #p1201000# the letter. Since she seems to be good with spells, she might be able to break the curse.

string.name: name
string.value: Decoding the Letter
You can't read the letter given by #p2131000#. What is this, anyway? You'd better head over to #b#m104000000##k and ask #b#p1002104##k what to do with it.
According to #p1002104#, the letter is written in a secret code. Thankfully, you have a master decoder in #b#p1201000##k, so take the letter and head over to #b#m140000000##k.
#p1201000# said that decoding the letter may take some time and told you she'll let #p1002104# know once it's complete.

string.name: name
string.value: A Letter to the Queen
When you reach Level 68, #b#p1002104##k send a message.

Apparently, #p1201000# succeeded in decoding the letter and it contains some surprising information! Better head over to #b#m140000000##k immediately and talk to #b#p1201000##k about the contents of the letter.
Amazingly, the letter written by the heroes was addressed to the Queen of the time. The actual content of the letter simply asked that the Queen take good care of the Seal Stone of #m130000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Suspicious John
#p1002001# has noticed that #p20000# has been acting weird lately. You'd better head over to Lith Harbor and talk to #p1002001# to see what's up.
Apparently, #p20000# started displaying some strange behavior ever since he started carrying some wooden box with him. Your task now is to investigate the wooden box that's next to #p20000#.
As you promised to #p20000#, you did not reveal to #p1002001# that the wooden box contained medication for arthritis.

string.name: name
string.value: Secrets of the Wooden Box
#p1002001# asked you to investigate the wooden box that #p20000# always carries around.
You find unidentified medication inside the box.

It turned out that #p20000# had been taking his own special arthritis medicine behind #p1002001#'s back. You made a deal with him, promising not to tell anyone about the contents of his wooden box in exchange for a small reward. You shouldn't tell #p1002001# about the wooden box. Just make something up.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dream
A dragon asleep in a forest covered in fog... What a strange dream. \r\n\r\nYou feel a bit tired from dreaming about the dragon but #byou should say good morning to your family.#k.

When you tell your Mom about the dream, she says that it's a very interesting dream and that you should share it with #b#p1013101##k, who is in the #b#m100030102##k. Hmm... #p1013101# will probably just laugh at you. Still, you should go tell #p1013101#.
#p1013101# just laughed, saying your dream was stupid. Just as you suspected.

string.name: name
string.value: Feeding Bull Dog
Say good morning to #b#p1013101##k.

#p1013101#, after laughing for awhile, says to stop talking nonsense and asks you to give #p1013102# some breakfast. Give some food to #b#p1013102##k, who is to your #bleft#k, since #p1013101# is too scared to do it himself.
You fed #p1013102# breakfast.

string.name: name
string.value: Sandwich for Breakfast
You fed breakfast to #p1013102#. Come to think of it, you're hungry too... Go ask #b#p1013101##k about breakfast.

#p1013101# gave you a sandwich for breakfast. He tells you to #bgo inside the house again once you're done with your sandwich#k. Mom must have something she wants to ask you to do... In any case, eat your sandwich first.
Mom suddenly handed you a #t1003028#. Huh? Why did she give this to you?

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Lunch Box
#bMom#k seems to have something she wants you to do. Talk to her.
Mom asks you to deliver the #t4032448# to #bDad#k who is working at the #b#m100030300##k. Go to the #m100030300#. Leave the house and head #bto your left#k.
You delivered the #t4032448# to Dad.

string.name: name
string.value: Fixing the Fence
#bDad#k seems to have something he wants to ask you to do. Talk to Gustav, your Dad.

Dad says that there's a hole in the farm fence because some #o1210100#s escaped. He asks you to bring him some #t4032498#es so that he can fix the fence. Defeat some of the #r#o0130100#s#k nearby and bring back some #b#t4032498#es#k.\r\n\r\n#i4032498# #t4032498# #b#c4032498# / 3#k
When you gave Dad the #t4032498#es, he made you a chair with the wood leftover from fixing the fence.

string.name: name
string.value: Rescuing the Piglet
#bDad#k seems to have something else he wants to ask you to do. Talk to Dad.

Another #p1013200# ran away while the fence was broken. Go to the #b#m900020100##k and bring back the lost #p1013200#. #rYou must be careful as the recent rain storms may have destroyed the paths#k.


#i4032449# #t4032449# #b#c4032449# / 1#k
While searching for the #p1013200#, you found a strange egg. How will you raise this egg?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Eggs
#p1013101# seems to have an Incubator that can be used to hatch an egg. Talk to #b#p1013101##k.

#p1013101# says that he will give you an Incubator if you do his chore of collecting #t4032451#s. Go to your #bright#k and collect the #t4032451# that #p1013101# is supposed to collect. You can obtain an #b#t4032451##k by clicking on a #b#p1013104##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032451# #t4032451# #b#c4032451# / 1#k
You collected the #t4032451# and received an incubator from #p1013101#.

string.name: name
string.value: Chasing away the Foxes
#b#p1013101##k seems to have something he wants to say.

#p1013101# says that there are too many foxes in #b#m100030103##k these days and suggests eliminating the #r#o9300385#es#k together. #p1013101# tells you to go to the #m100030103# first to start the elimination and that he will follow later... \r\n\r\n#o9300385##r #a220081##k
#p1013101# never did help you. 10 #o9300385#es were easy to handle... But #p1013101# just can't be trusted.

string.name: name
string.value: Verifying the Farm Situation
#p1013101# seems worried that the number of #o9300385#es has grown. Talk to #p1013101#.

#p1013101# says that he is worried whether the number of foxes in the #b#m100030300##k has also grown. He asks that you go to #bDad#k and ask him about the situation. If the number of foxes has grown, some major hunting may be required...
Dad seems to be more worried about the #o1210100#s than the #o9300385#es.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Farm
Dad seems to have something he wants to ask you to do. Talk to Dad.

Dad asks you to help him calm the #o1210100#s who are jumping around like crazy. Disciplining a few #r#o1210100##ks might calm them down... Go to the #b #m100030310# to your left#k and take care of those pigs.


#o1210100##r #a220101##k
You disciplined the #o1210100#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 1st Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 1st Job Advancement
Dragon Master 1st Job Advancement
Baby Dragon Mir has been born from the Dragon Egg.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 2nd Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 2nd Job Advancement
Dragon Master 2nd Job Advancement
Mir has grown?! Mir has grown bigger and taken off the egg shell he was wearing as a hat... Apparently, dragons grow too.\

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 3rd Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 3rd Job Advancement
Dragon Master 3rd Job Advancement
Mir has grown again! As Mir grows, you can feel yourself developing as well.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 4th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 4th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 4th Job Advancement
Mir has grown again and learned a new skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 5th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 5th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 5th Job Advancement
Mir has grown again. He is getting bigger and bigger... He's getting kind of scary?!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 6th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 6th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 6th Job Advancement
Mir has grown again and learned a new skill. Just how much bigger is he going to get?

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 7th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 7th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 7th Job Advancement
Mir has grown again. There's hardly a trace of his earlier cute appearance. But he does look really cool now...

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 8th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 8th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 8th Job Advancement
Mir has grown and learned a more powerful skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 9th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 9th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 9th Job Advancement
Mir has grown again. His new golden scales show off his newfound strength and you can feel yourself that much stronger as well.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master 10th Job Advancement

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Dragon Master 10th Job Advancement
Dragon Master 10th Job Advancement
Mir is now fully grown. Is this what an Onyx Dragon truly looks like? Looking simultaneously threatening and friendly is a privilege reserved for Dragons.

string.name: name
string.value: Hero's Succession
When you reach Lv. 200, #p1205000# starts talking to you. What could it be about? Respond to #p1205000#.
#p1205000# says that he didn't expect you and #p1013000# to grow this strong and asks that come to the #bIsland where he sleeps#b so that he can pass on a forgotten power.

#p1205000# teaches you Hero's Echo, a skill that was once used by Freud. He says that he is happy another Hero has appeared in Maple World that can take the place of Freud and asks that you continue to fight for Maple World alongside #p1013000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Rumor about the Dragon Mount

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Mount
#b#p1032001##k in #m101000000# starts to talk to you...

#p1032001# says that he has heard a rumor about a #bDragon mount#k and is curious whether an Onyx Dragon can be mounted. If it seems possible after talking to #b#p1013000##k, return to #p1032001#.\r\n\r\n#y22401# #b(#u22401#)#k
#p1032001# says that he heard about a very powerful warrior named #p9901000# who knows how to mount a dragon and suggests that you go to #m102000000# and meet with #p9901000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Is Dragon Mounting Possible?
Is it possible to mount an Onyx Dragon? Ask #b#p1013000##k.
#p1013000# says that it shouldn't be too difficult to carry someone your size. Ah, so it is possible to mount an Onyx Dragon.
#p1013000# says that it shouldn't be too difficult to carry someone your size. Ah, so it is possible to mount an Onyx Dragon. Go inform Grendel the Old of this fact.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of a Cool Saddle
When you enter #b#m130000000##k, the home of people who mount birds, someone starts talking to you.

A person named #p1101002#, who is the Tactician in #m130000000#, tells you to leave since this island is only for Knights. He says that all the saddles for the Knights are made by #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000000##k... Would he be able to make a Dragon Saddle?

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Saddle
Ask #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k to make you a saddle.

#p2060005#, after measuring #p1013000#, says that a Dragon Saddle must be custom made to fit #p1013000#. He says he will make you a saddle if you pay for the materials and labor.
You can obtain the materials by entering the door of the Mushroom House between the Ribbon Pigs upstairs.
You received a completed saddle from #p2060005#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Saddle
You lost the Dragon Saddle! What to do? Go to #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000000# #m230000003##k and ask for another saddle.

#p2060005# says that he will make you a saddle if you bring him #b50 #t4000155#s#k and #b1 #t4032474##k like before. However, unlike last time, he won't give you a special discount and will charge the full #b20 million mesos#k. Bring him all the materials.
You can obtain the materials by entering the door of the Mushroom House between the Ribbon Pigs upstairs.
You received the saddle from #p2060005# again. It's not cheap so you should be careful not to lose it again.

string.name: name
string.value: Uncomfortable Saddle
#p1013000# seems to have something he wants to say. What could it be? Talk to #b#p1013000##k.
#p1013000# grumbles that the saddle is painful because he's gotten too big. He definitely does look very uncomfortable. Maybe you shouldn't mount him until a new saddle can be made.

#p1013000# grumbles that the saddle is painful because he's gotten too big. He definitely does look very uncomfortable. Maybe you shouldn't mount him until a new saddle can be made. Does that mean you have to go to #b#m230000000# again for a new saddle...?

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Bigger Saddle
Ask #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k to make you a bigger saddle.

#p2060005# says he will make you a saddle that is flexible enough for #p1013000#. However, the materials are going to be quite a challenge.
A #b#t4032476##k from Shipwreck Treasure Chests in Ocean I.C., Crystal Gorge , Red Coral Forest, or Turban Shell Hill, and some #b#t4032477##k, a specialty product of #m251000000#, from Captain Hwang.
After receiving all the materials, #p2060005# made you the #t1912034#. With this, you should be able to mount comfortably for awhile.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: #Wbasic# #i1912034:# #t1912034:# 1 Unlocks 'The Lost Big Saddle' quest Unlocks 'Uncomfortable Saddle II' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Obtaining the Unbreakable Porcelain
In order to make a bigger saddle, you need to obtain some #t4032477#, a specialty product of #m251000000#. You should ask #b#p2092001##k, who is in charge of trade in #b#m251000000##k.

The #t4032497#, the master artisan who makes the #t4032477#, has been kidnapped by the Red-Nose Pirates. If you want some #t4032477#, you'll have to rescue #t4032497# first... Enter the Pirate Hideout to rescue the #t4032497#. You can enter from the #b#m251010403##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032497# #t4032497# #b#c4032497# / 1#k
You rescued the #t4032497#. All you have to do now is ask the #t4032497# to make you some #t4032477#.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Unbreakable Porcelain
Ask the #b#t4032497##k, who you rescued from the Red-Nose Pirates, to make you 2 #t4032477#s.

The #t4032497# says that he will need some materials to make the #t4032477# and gives you the names of the items which can be found near #m251000000#. Go find all the materials.

#i4000291# #t4000291# #b#c4000291# / 100#k
#i4000292# #t4000292# #b#c4000292# / 100#k
You received 2 #t4032477#s from the #t4032497#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Big Saddle
You lost the #t1912034#! What to do? Ask #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k to make you another saddle.
#p2060005# is angry that you lost the saddle he made you... He will only make you another saddle if you give him #b60 million mesos#k, as well as the #bsame materials as before#k.
You received the #t1912034# from #p2060005# after getting all the materials again and paying double the mesos. Be careful not to lose it again...

string.name: name
string.value: Uncomfortable Saddle II
#p1013000# seems to have something he wants to say. Could it be that he's gotten too big for the saddle again? Talk to #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says that the saddle is too small and it's difficult for him to even fly. He's going to need a new saddle. It's going to be expensive... Go to #p2060005# in #m230000000# and ask for another saddle.

#p1013000# says that the saddle is too small and it's difficult for him to even fly. He's going to need a new saddle. It's going to be expensive... Go to #p2060005# in #m230000000# and ask for another saddle.

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Really Big Saddle
Go to #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k and ask him to make you a Really Big Saddle.

#p2060005# says that you are the only person who has ever asked him to make three different saddles and agrees to make a saddle big enough for #p1013000#. Bring him the required materials and mesos.
#i4000232# #t4000232# #b#c4000232# / 300#k #i4000233# #t4000233# #b#c4000233# / 300#k #i4000234# #t4000234# #b#c4000234# / 300#k #b60000000 Mesos#k
You received a Really Big Saddle from #p2060005#. You can only hope that you won't need any more saddles.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Really Big Saddle
You lost the #t1912035#! What to do? Go to #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k and ask for another saddle.

#p2060005# is angry that you lost something he worked so hard to make. Therefore, you'll have to pay double the fee if you want him to make you another one. For some reason, you almost feel that he's happy about the situation... You hope that you're mistaken.
#i4000232# #t4000232# #b#c4000232# / 300#k #i4000233# #t4000233# #b#c4000233# / 300#k #i4000234# #t4000234# #b#c4000234# / 300#k #b120000000 Mesos#k
You received the #t1912035# from #p2060005# after finding the materials again and paying double the mesos. Be careful not to lose it again...

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Dragon Awakens
Whoa, a dragon really hatched from the egg?! What is he going to say? #bTalk to him by clicking on the Baby Dragon#k.

You're not really sure but you seem to have made some sort of pact with #p1013000# the baby Dragon. He says that as his master, you must take care of him...

As you stand there confused, #p1013000# says that he will show you his power by using his skill to defeat the #o1210100#s. He tells you to simply give the command by using a skill...

#o1210100##r #a225001##k
#p1013000# used his incredible power to defeat the monsters!

string.name: name
string.value: Hungry Baby Dragon
#p1013000#, the Baby Dragon, seems to be very hungry. But what do Dragon's eat? Ask #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says that he also doesn't know what to eat and asks that you be a good master and find him something to eat. Hmm, what would taste good to a Dragon? You have no idea. Maybe #bDad#k would know. Try asking him.
Dad seems to be a bit confused too.

string.name: name
string.value: A Bite of Hay
What would a Dragon eat? #bDad#k is thinking about it.

Dad says that maybe he will eat a #t4032452# like cows do. Obtain #b3#k #bBundles of Hay#k by #bdoing a normal attack on the Haystack#k nearby and feed it to #p1013000#.\r\n\r\n#i4032452# #t4032452# #b#c4032452# / 3#k
#p1013000# doesn't seem to like eating hay...

string.name: name
string.value: A Bite of Pork
What would a Dragon eat? Talk to Mir.
You guess that Dragons are probably carnivores. Hunt the #r#o1210100##ks to obtain some #b#t4032453##k for #p1013000#.\r\n\r\n#i4032453# #t4032453# #b#c4032453# / 10#k
#p1013000# says that he doesn't think he'll be able to digest the #t4032453# very well...

string.name: name
string.value: Tasty Milk 2
Maybe Dad would know what Mir likes. Talk to Dad.
Dad says that if he is still a baby then maybe he should be drinking #bmilk#k. He says that you should ask for some milk from the #b#p1013105##k at the #b#m100030310##k.
You started talking to #p1013105#. Now ask for some milk.

string.name: name
string.value: Tasty Milk 3
Maybe Dragon Babies drink milk too. Get some milk from the Dairy Cow.
You received milk from the #p1013105#. Will #p1013000# like milk? Give the milk to #p1013000#.
#p1013000# really enjoyed the milk. And it seems as if #p1013000# has become a bit stronger.

string.name: name
string.value: What is a Dragon Master?
It does seem as if #p1013000# has gotten a bit stronger. Ask #b#p1013000##k how it happened.

#p1013000# says that #bonce a Dragon and Human are connected through a pact, when one party grows stronger, the other party grows stronger too#k. With that, he excitedly tells you to use his strength...

#p1013000# says that once a Dragon and a Human are connected through a pact, when one party grows stronger, the other party grows stronger too. With that, he excitedly tells you to use his strength... but it's not like you have someone to fight...

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Pigs 2
Mir has started arguing strongly for the elimination of the Strange Pigs... What should you do? Talk to Mir.

#p1013000# says that he and you should eliminate the #o1210111#s. No matter how many times you tell him how dangerous that is, #p1013000# just won't let up. Although it is a bit worrisome, since he is so confident, maybe you should try? Go to the #b#m100030320##k.\r\n\r\n#o1210111##r #a225091##k

Wow, you were able to eliminate the #o1210111#s much easier than you expected. #p1013000# seems to be pretty strong. When you tell #p1013000# that, he says that when a Master and a Dragon puts their powers together, something like this is easy.

string.name: name
string.value: Letter Delivery
Tell Gustav about defeating the #o1210111#s.

Dad is very surprised and wants you to something else for him, as well. He asks that you deliver a letter to #r#p1012003##k in #b#m100000000# #k, explaining the shortage of #t4032453# due to the #o1210111#s. Take the letter Dad has given you and go to town.
Farm Entrance-> Way to the Beach -> Six Path Crossway -> Dream Forest Trail-> The Hill North of Henesys -> Henesys
You delivered the letter to #p1012003#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mushrooms Instead of Meat!
You delivered the letter to #b#p1012003##k. Listen to his response.
Chief Stan wishes the town had more meat, but will settle for some Mushrooms, which will have to do for now. Bring Chief Stan lots of Mushrooms. \r\n#i4000001# #t4000001# #b#c4000001# / 10#k
After receiving the mushrooms, Chief Stan thanks you and tells you to feel free about asking him for anything. You really don't have anything to request of him at the moment, though.

string.name: name
string.value: The Dragon Master's Calling
#b#p1013000##k seems anxious to tell you something. Talk to #p1013000#.

#p1013000# says that he now knows what the Dragon Master is called to do. It's to help people in trouble! He came up with that notion after watching you help Chief Stan. \r\n\r\nWith that, #p1013000# wants to look for #btroubled people in #m100000000##k...
There really was a person in need of help in #m100000000#. #p1010100# seems to be in need of something.

string.name: name
string.value: Rina's Worries
#b#p1010100##k in #b#m100000000# seems to be worried about something. Talk to #p1010100#.

#p1010100# says that she wants to make some Blue Mushroom porridge for #p1012101# who is sick but that they are difficult to get because the #o2220100#s have become so violent. You tell her that you will get them for her but #p1010100# says not to because it is so dangerous...
#p1013000# is quite upset that you won't be helping Rina.

string.name: name
string.value: Let's Train
#p1013000# seems to be very upset that you won't be assisting #p1010100#. How will you be able to appease #p1013000#? Talk to #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# suggests than that you train until you are able to easily defeat the #o2220100#s and asks that you find a training center. Hmm... What to do... Maybe you should ask #b#p1012003##k since he did tell you to ask him if you need anything.
You started talking to Chief Stan.

string.name: name
string.value: Power B. Fore's Training Center
#b#p1012003##k in #b#m100000000##k should be able to introduce you to a training center. Talk to Chief Stan.

There is apparently a place called the Bowman Training Center in #m100000000#. It's normally only available to Bowmen, but Chief Stan says he will write you a Letter of Recommendation to #p1012118#, the Training Instructor. Go to #b#p1012118##k in #b#m100020000##k.
You met with Mr. #p1012118#.

string.name: name
string.value: Power B. Fore's Paranoia
Did he finish reading the Recommendation Letter? Talk to #b#p1012118##k.

#p1012118# says that there is no way Stan would write such a nice letter and that it is a conspiracy to trick him. He wants to test you to be sure... He's obviously deluded but what can you do? Accept #p1012118#'s test.\r\n\r\n#o9300274##r #a225161##k
You passed #p1012118#'s test. But it doesn't seem like #p1012118# is going to accept the results...

string.name: name
string.value: Power B. Fore's Continuing Paranoia
You defeated the #o9300274#s but it seems that #p1012118# still doesn't believe you. Talk to #b#p1012118##k.
#p1012118# denies the results and tells you to hunt #r#o9300274##ks once again. This time he wants you to hunt #r80#k of them... What an annoying guy.\r\n\r\n#o9300274##r #a225171##k
You passed #p1012118#'s second test. Will he accept the results this time?

string.name: name
string.value: Power B. Fore's Training
It looks like #p1012118# has finally accepted you. Try using #b#p1012118##k's Training Center.

All of the monsters inside #p1012118#'s Training Center are easy monsters like #o0210100#s and #o1210100#s. When you complain about that, #p1012118# says that he will train you himself and tells you to hunt #o1210101#s...\r\n\r\n#o1210101##r #a225191##k
When you finishing hunting all of the #o1210101#s, #p1012118# says that you are amazing and gives you the #p1012118#'s Certificate of Training. Is this thing even useful?

string.name: name
string.value: Receiving Power B. Fore's Certificate of Training Again
You lost the Certificate of Training that #p1012118# gave you. Without it, you won't be able to enter the Training Center. Go see #b#p1012118##k again.

You'll be able to receive the Certificate of Training from #p1012118# again by training some more. Hunt 50 #o1210101#s.
#o1210101##r #a225201##k
You hunted the #o1210101#s. Hmm... You're not sure how much longer you'll be able to train here.

string.name: name
string.value: Become a Hero
When you complete #p1012118#'s training, #p1013000# flaps his wings wanting to say something to you. Talk to #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says that since you've become stronger through training, you should now be able to defeat the #o2220100#! He wants you to obtain the #b#t4000009#s#k and bring them to #p1010100#. Sheesh, he really is impatient, isn't he? Go to the Blue Mushroom Forest.
#i4000009# #t4000009# #b#c4000009# / 20#k
#p1010100# was very surprised and happy to receive the #t4000009#.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Maya's Porridge
#p1010100# in #m100000000# seems to have something she wants to say to you. Talk to #b#p1010100##k.
#p1010100# says that the porridge made of #o2220100#s is ready and asks that you deliver the #t4032458# to #p1012101#. Enter #b#m100000001##k and deliver the porridge to #b#p1012101##k.
#p1012101# seems to be feeling a little better after eating the porridge.

string.name: name
string.value: Investigating Strange Mushrooms
#p1040000#, the guard standing at the #m106010100#, wants to say something to you. Go to the #bSix Path Crossway#k and talk to #b#p1040000##k.

#p1040000# says that he heard from #p1010100# how strong you are and asks for you assistance in investigating the Blue Mushrooms that have started acting strange. You simply need to get #b40 #t4000009#s#k as samples and bring it to #p1012111#, who studies mushrooms in #m100000000#.\r\n\r\n#i4000009# #t4000009# #b#c4000009# / 40#k
When you show the #t4000009# to #p1012111#, he gets a serious look on his face.

string.name: name
string.value: Mike in Sleepywood
#p1040000# seems to find it difficult to believe that a puppet could be making the Mushrooms act so strange. Talk to #b#p1040000##k.
#p1040000#, while still doubtful, asks that you warn #b#p1040001##k in #b#m105000000##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Mike's Request
You have something you need to tell #p1040001#, who is guarding #b#m105000000##k. Go see #b#p1040001##k
#p1040001# says that there are problems at the moment, but that the Guards are always in need of good people. He asks if you could help since you look pretty strong. Talk to #b#p1013000##k about it.
#p1013000# says that helping people is always a good thing to do.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 225 Unlocks 'A Guard's First Assignment: Cleaning Up' quest

string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Second Assignment: Helping Beginner Adventurers
It looks as if there's another assignment for the newest Victoria Island Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k in #b#m105000000##k.

#p1040001# says that new Adventurers sometime enter the #m102000000# Burnt Lands by accident. Your job is to patrol #bthe Burnt Lands west of Perion#k and help Adventurers if you find any.
#y22529# #b(#u22529#)#k
You reported helping a beginning Adventurer to #p1040001#.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 650 #Wbasic# #i1942000:# #t1942000:# 1 Unlocks 'A Guard's Third Assignment: Maintaining Warning Signs' quest

string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Third Assignment: Maintaining Warning Signs
It looks as if there's another assignment for the newest Victoria Island Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k in #b#m105000000##k.

#p1040001# says that safety requires taking precautions and asks that you review the information on the warning signs located in the #bNorthern Mountains and the Burnt Lands#k areas. It's been a while since they were checked, so you'll need to fix any mistakes.
#bTalk to the signs located in #m102020100#, #m102030000#, #m102030100#, #m102030200#, and #m102030300##k
You wrote down the monsters displayed in all of the Warning Signs.

string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Fourth Assignment: Discovery of Strange Mushrooms
Looks as if there's another assignment for the newest Victoria Island Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k in #b#m105000000##k.

#p1040001# says that he's discovered odd Mushrooms just like #p1040000# described. He says that the #o2230101#s are located inside #m100020400#. He wants you to defeat the #r#o2230101#s#k and retrieve the #bPuppet#k...
#o2230131##r #a225311##k #i4032461# #t4032461# #b#c4032461# / 1#k
You defeated the #o2230101#s. #p1040001# seems worried that #p1040000# is right...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,050 #Wbasic# #i1962000:# #t1962000:# 1 Unlocks 'A Guard's Fifth Assignment: Strange Wild Boars' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Kerning City Investigation: Alex
Come to think of it, there is a person you know in #b#m103000000##k. Go ask #b#p1052000##k in #m100000000# if he knows anything about a thief.
#p1052000# says that he will answer anything for you if you give him some news about #m100000000#. News about #m100000000#, what could you tell him about? Talk to #p1052000#.
#p1052000# doesn't seem to know anything about the thief. However, #p1052000# did tell you about the person you should question next.

string.name: name
string.value: Kerning City Investigation: JM
The person that #p1052000# told you about while you were investigating in #b#m103000000##k is JM. Go see JM.

JM says that he will only trade information with you and that he will tell you anything you want if you bring him #t4000042#s. Go into the subway and bring back some #t4000042#s.\r\n\r\n#i4000042# #t4000042# #b#c4000042# / 50#k

JM says that there haven't been any recent trading of herbs and that it is possible it just hasn't been traded yet. He tells you to ask #p1052103#, who watches many people pass, if she has noticed anyone recently who smells of herbs.

string.name: name
string.value: Kerning City Investigation: Nella
While investigating #b#m103000000##k, you were introduced to #p1052103#, who has a good nose. Talk to #b#p1052103##k.

#p1052103# got angry saying that while the thieves in #m103000000# may be a bit sneaky they are not the type to steal things. She says, to regain the honor of Kerning City, she will catch the thief herself... Looks like you can leave this investigation to #p1052103#. Tell #p1061005# as much and ask him to wait.

#p1052103# got angry saying that while the thieves in #m103000000# may be a bit sneaky they are not the type to steal things. She says, to regain the honor of Kerning City, she will catch the thief herself... Looks like you can leave this investigation to #p1052103#. Tell #p1061005# as much and ask him to wait.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Types and Characteristics (Vol. I)
Borrow a book about Dragons from #b#p1012109##k in #b#m100000000##k.

#p1012109# loaned you a book called #t4161049#. #p1012109# says that he hasn't finished reading it himself and asks that you return it after you're done. Read the book and then talk to #p1013000#.\r\n\r\n#y22539# #b(#u22539#)#k
You read through all of #t4161049# but there was no information about #p1013000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Knowledge About Dragons 1
You received the #t4161049#. #p1013000# seems to also be curious about its contents... Talk to #b#p1013000##k.
#p1013000# asks for you to read through the #t4161049# and tell him what it says. Read the book and explain it to #p1013000#.
Unfortunately, the book doesn't contain any information that pertains to #p1013000#. Maybe the #t4161050# has some information?

string.name: name
string.value: Ellinia Magic Library
#t4161049# doesn't seem to contain any information about #p1013000#. Is it possible to get the second volume? Ask #b#p1012109##k.
#t4161049# seems to have been borrowed from the #b#m101000003##k in #b#m101000000##k. #p1012109# says that you should be able to borrow the second volume from the #m101000003#...

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Book? 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Where's the Book?

#p1032001# said that #t4161050# has already been borrowed by #b#p1052106##k from #b#m103000000##k. He asks that you get the book from #p1052106# and return it to him after reading it. Go to #m103000000#.
You asked #p1052106# in #m103000000# about #t4161050# but he says that he already let #b#p1002100##k in #bLith Harbor#k borrow it...

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Book? 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Where's the Book?
When you ask #p1002100# about the book, she says that she gave it to #b#p1002001##k who said he needed it. Ask #p1002001# about the #t4161050#.
#p1002001# says that he borrowed the book because he thought that #p1012101# might be bored and that he gave it to #p1012101# already. Go to #b#m100000000##k and meet #b#p1012101##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Book? 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Where's the Book?
When you ask Dr. #p1032104# about the book, she says that she sent it to her professor who really needed it. Go to #b#m102000000#'s Mini Rocky Road#k to find #b#p1022006##k.
You met #p1022006# at the Mini Rocky Road.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Book? 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Where's the Book?
After searching and searching, you finally found the person who has #t4161050#! It's #p1022006#, the Archaeologist! Talk to #b#p1022006##k who can be found at #b#m102020200##k.

#p1022006# says that he hasn't been able to open the book since being attacked by the #o3210100#s and says that he will give you the book if you eliminate the dangerous #o3210100#s. Go to the #bBurnt Land#k and eliminate the #r#o3210100##ks.\r\n\r\n#o3210100##r #a225451##k
You eliminated the #o3210100#s. Go get the book from #p1022006#.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Types and Characteristics (Vol. II)
Get #t4161050# from #b#p1022006##k at #b#Mini Rocky Road##k.

You should read through #t4161050#, which you received from Winston. It may help you understand #p1013000# a little bit better. Once you're finished reading it, be sure to return it to #b#p1032001##k in #m101000000# #m101000003#.\r\n\r\n#y22547# #b(#u22547#)#k
#p1032001# says that he will let you know if a new book regarding Dragons comes in or if new information arrives from #p2081000#, his friend in #m240000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Knowledge about the Dragon 2
You obtained #t4161050#. #b#p1013000##k seems really curious about its contents...
#p1013000# is very excited about the book possibly containing information about his race. #bRead the book and explain what it contains to #p1013000##k.

#p1013000# appears to be a very special dragon called the Onyx Dragon. The explanation about a pact being necessary seems to confirm it. But it also says that the Onyx Dragons became extinct a long time ago...

string.name: name
string.value: The Culprit is in the Dungeon
Did she find out who stole the #t4032464#? Ask #b#p1052103##k in #b#m103000000##k.

#p1052103# says that the culprit is in the Dungeon and that the culprit's hideout is inside #b#mRocky Wasteland##k. She wants you to go inside, catch the thief, and restore #m103000000#'s honor. Hurry to Sleepywood Dungeon.
The dungeon where the thief was supposed to be was quiet. There were no people, only a strange puppet... Could this puppet be the culprit?

string.name: name
string.value: Puppet Caring for his Master 1
A talking puppet? Could a puppet really have stolen the herbs? Talk to the #b#p1063018##k in the #m910050300##k, the culprit's hideout that is connected through the #b#m105070300#.

The #p1063018# says that he only stole the herbs to treat his master who was hurt, and that he is sorry. The #p1063018# says that he will return the herbs but asks if you could give him some potions for his master...

#i2000002# #t2000002# #b#c2000002# / 20#k
#i2000003# #t2000003# #b#c2000003# / 30#k
You gave the potions to the #p1063018#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Returned Herbs
You gave the potions to the #p1063018#. Will you now be able to get the herbs back? Go to #b#m105070300##k.
The #p1063018# returned the herbs to you while repeating his apologies. Now take the herbs to #p1061005#.
#p1061005# has now got his possessions back and is no longer suspicious of #m103000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Puppet Caring for his Master 2
The #p1063018# needs help. Go to the #b#Rocky Wasteland##k, and meet the #b#p1063018##k.

The #p1063018# says that he wants to put bandages on his injured master and asks that you bring him some #b#t4000035#s#k so that he can make a bandage. You can obtain #t4000035#s from the #r#o3230101#s#k that appear in the #b#m103000000# Subway#k...\r\n\r\n#i4000035# #t4000035# #b#c4000035# / 60#k

When you bring him all the #t4000035#s, the #p1063018# is touched and says that someone like you has the qualification to be in the organization that his master is in. He says that when his master returns, he will ask him to allow you into the organization...

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Test
You meet Chief Stan in #b#m100000000##k through #p1052103#'s introduction. Talk to #bChief Stan#k, who seems a bit doubtful.

Chief Stan wonders how the son of a farmer could have gotten so strong and says he wants to test you. You must go to #mEllinia's Close to the Sky#, hunt the #r#o3000001#s#k there, and bring back #b#t4000068#s#k.
#i4000068# #t4000068# #b#c4000068# / 2
Even having received the #t4000068#s, Chief Stan still seems a bit doubtful.

string.name: name
string.value: Kidnapping of Camila
Chief Stan is calling you urgently... What could this be about?
Chief Stan says that #p1012108#, who went out of town to pick strawberries, has been kidnapped by Golems. He asks that you go to Golem's Temple and rescue #p1012108#.
Fortunately, you were able to rescue #p1012108#, but what was that strange Golem?

string.name: name
string.value: Reason for the Golem's Change

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Henesys!
Talk to #bChief Stan#k who is deep in thought about the change in the Golems.
Chief Stan says that it might be able get some hints from #p1012108#. He wants you to ask #b#p1012108##k if she remembers anything. She is a sensitive girl so ask her carefully.
#p1012108# says that she saw Golems jumping out of a door with a strange puppet sitting on top...

string.name: name
string.value: Condition for Joining the Secret Organization 2
Will you be allowed to join the Secret Organization now? Talk to the #b#p1063018##k.

The #p1063018# says that you will be allowed to join the Secret Organization if you meet just one more condition. This time, he wants you bring him #b#t4000031#s#k from the #bZombie Lupins#k. You're not sure what they need it for but go ahead and get it for them.\r\n\r\n#i4000031# #t4000031# #b#c4000031# / 20#k
It looks like you'll be able to join the Secret Organization soon. For now just wait.

string.name: name
string.value: The Value of One Scale
You may be able to confirm whether #p1013000# is really an Onyx Dragon with just one scale. Ask #b#p1013000##k to give you one scale.

#p1013000# says that his defenses will weaken if a scale is removed. He says that he'll need calcium to compensate and asks that you feed him bones. He says that #b#t4000204#s#k should suffice...\r\n\r\n#i4000204# #t4000204# #b#c4000204# / 50#k
You fed the #t4000204#s to #p1013000# and took one of his scales.

string.name: name
string.value: Knowledge about Dragons 3
#b#p1032001##k starts talking to you. Has the #t4032467# been verified?
According to #p1032001#'s friend Tatamo, it's certain that #p1013000# is an Onyx Dragon. He asks that you come to #m240000000# if you want more details. Go to #b#m240000000#.#k.\r\n
You met Tatamo in #m240000000#. He was very happy to see #p1013000# and told you about Onyx Dragons and how they became extinct...

string.name: name
string.value: Never Give Up!
You hear that #p1013000# is an Onyx Dragon and that Onyx Dragons are extinct. #p1013000# may be sad. Console #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says that there may be other Onyx Dragons in this world just like him. He wants to continue searching. Your Dragon is so mature! \r\n\r\n#p1013000# is right. It's too soon go give up hope. There may be more information so wait for #p1032001# to contact you.

#p1013000# says that there may be other Onyx Dragons in this world just like him. He wants to continue searching. Your Dragon is so mature! \r\n\r\n#p1013000# is right. It's too soon go give up hope. There may be more information so wait for #p1032001# to contact you.

string.name: name
string.value: Permission to Join the Secret Organization
The #p1063018# starts talking to you. Have you finally been allowed to join the organization that #p1063018#'s master is in? Respond to the #b#p1063018##k.

The #p1063018# says that he hasn't been able to contact you sooner because his master is in a precarious situation and has been on the run. He says that you'll be able to join the Secret Organization as a temporary member. Go to the #b#m200080601##k in #b#m200080600##k. He says that it's the room with a #bwing-shaped sign#k on the entrance...
You went into the secret room that the #p1063018# mentioned and searched behind the #p2012034#.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Growth Accelerant
Go to #p2030012# and make the Growth Accelerant as instructed by the mission assignment you found behind the #p2012034#. #b#p2030012##k is in the #b#m200081201##k.

The ingredients for making the Growth Accelerant are #b10 #t4000070#s, 10 #t4000071#s, 10 #t4000072#s, and 10 #t4000068#s#k. Get all of the ingredients and give them to #p2030012#.
#i4000070# #t4000070# #b#c4000070# / 10#k #i4000071# #t4000071# #b#c4000071# / 10#k #i4000072# #t4000072# #b#c4000072# / 10#k
You received the Growth Accelerant from #p2030012#. Go back to the secret room and put the Growth Accelerant behind the brick.

string.name: name
string.value: Another Clue about the Onyx Dragon

string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
#p1032001# in #m101000000# starts talking to you. Could there be some more information about Onyx Dragons? Respond to #p1032001#'s call.
#p1032001# says that there is a new book that came into the #b#m101000003##k that is very interesting. He says that it may be a clue about the Onyx Dragons and asks that you come check it out.
You met #p1032001# and asked about the book.

string.name: name
string.value: Crew Member's Voyage Log

string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
Get the book containing a clue about Onyx Dragons from #b#p1032001##k in #b#m101000000##k.
The book is a Voyage Log written by some crewmember. #bRead through the book#k and ask #p1032001# about the book's author.
The book's author is a person named #p0020000# who lives in #b#m104000000##k. Go see #p0020000#.

string.name: name
string.value: John's Testimony

string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
Go see #p0020000#, author of the #t4161051#. #b#p0020000##k lives in #b#m104000000##k.

#p0020000# says that he indeed who wrote the Voyage Log and that not a single word of it is exaggerated. When you ask #p0020000# about the location of the island that is mentioned, he gives you a map that shows where it is. Can you find a ship willing to go there? Go see #b#p1002001##k.
#p1002001# says that he can't sail to this Island...

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Advice

string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
#p1002001# says that it won't be easy getting to the island marked on the map. There must be some other way. Ask #b#p1002001##k again.

#p1002001# says that the only sailor in #m104000000# who has the ability to sail to the island marked on the map is #b#p1002101##k. But #p1002101# stopped sailing a long time ago... If you bring him some #t4032470#, maybe #p1002101# will change his mind. Go to #b#m110000000##k and bring back a #b#t4032470##k.

#i4032526# #t4032526# #b#c4032526# / 1#k
#i4032470# #t4032470# #b#c4032470# / 1#k
#p1002101# gladly agreed to sail after receiving the #t4032470#.

string.name: name
string.value: Tropical Fruit Punch
Before asking #p1002101# to take you to the Island, prepare some #t4032470# to give him as a gift. The #t4032470# is sold by #b#p1081100##k in #b#m110000000##k.

#p1081100# says that #t4032470# is difficult to make and that she will make you some #t4032470# if you bring her the ingredients and pay her for the labor...

#i4000136# #t4000136# #b#c4000136# / 5#k
#i4000029# #t4000029# #b#c4000029# / 30#k
#i4000044# #t4000044# #b#c4000044# / 30#k
#b60000 mesos#k
You received the #t4032470# from #p1081100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Strong Sail Needed

string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
#p1002101#, who has been looking at the map for awhile, has a grim face... What could it be? Talk to #b#p1002101##k.

#p1002101# says that going to this island with a normal sail is impossible and a stronger sail that won't rip under strong winds is needed. #p1002101# asks that you bring him some #b#t4000030#s#k... A sail made with #t4000030#s should be able to face strong winds.\r\n\r\n#i4000030# #t4000030# #b#c4000030# / 2#k
You brought the #t4000030#s to #p1002101#. #p1002101# says that the #t4000030#s are very tough and that it will take a lot of time to make the sail. He will contact you when it is completed.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Organization's Second Mission
#p1013202#, who you've never seen before, starts talking to you... Who could this be?

#p1013202# introduces himself as a member of the Secret Organization, then thanks you for doing a good job on the first mission. Now, he needs you to do something else. Your second mission is to eliminate the #rDecaying Coolie Zombies#k at the Forest of the Dead, collect the #b#t4000593#s#k, deliver them to #b#p2022003##k, and take what he gives you in return...
You can enter the Forest of the Dead from the open door located at the right side of the bottom floor of the Chief's Residence.
When you gave the #t4000593#s to #p2022003#, he gave you one #t4032471#, then laughed eerily.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 7,400 #Wbasic# #i4032471:# #t4032471:# 1 Unlocks 'Delivering the Black Key' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Black Key
Once you receive the #t4032471#, #p1013202#, a member of the Secret Organization, starts talking to you again. Respond to #p1013202#.

#p1013202# tells you to place the item you received under the #b#p2030015##k located at the #b#m211040200##k in #m211000000#. Once it is there, another member of the Secret Organization will come retrieve it... Go do as he says.
You placed the #t4032471# under the #p2030015#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Black Key
You lost the #t4032471#! What should you do? #b#p1013202##k starts talking to you... How did he know?

#p1013202# says that he will let it pass just this once, then tells you to bring more #b#t4000593#s#k to #p2022003#. If you do that, he will give you the item again...
You can enter the Forest of the Dead from the open door located at the right side of the bottom floor of the Chief's Residence.
You received the #t4032471# from #p2022003# again.

string.name: name
string.value: Question about the Secret Organization
Once you complete your delivery of the #t4032471#s, #b#p1013000##k starts talking to you.

You talked to #p1013000# about what the Secret Organization does. This mission seems to be about helping people by eliminating the Zombies. Although you wonder why they are so secret, they seem to be a good organization.

You talked to #p1013000# about what the Secret Organization does. This mission seems to be about helping people by eliminating the Zombies. Although you wonder why they are so secret, they seem to be a good organization.

string.name: name
string.value: Completed Sail
#p1002101# in #m104000000# starts talking to you. Could he have completed the sail? Talk to #p1002101#.
#p1002101# says that the sail has been completed and tells you to come to #b#m104000000##k if you want to go to the island on #t4032469#.
You met #p1002101# in #m104000000#. #p1002101# said that the ship is ready and for you to let him know whenever you are ready to head out.

string.name: name
string.value: Before Receiving the Secret Organization's Third Mission
#p1013202#, from the Secret Organization, starts talking to you.

#p1013202# thanks you for the good job you've done so far and asks you to come to the #b#m922030000##k in #b#m220000300##k if you want to know more about the Secret Organization. He says that he will meet you there in person to tell you more...

#p1013202#'s name is #p1013203#. He says that the name of the Organization that he is in is called the Black Wings and that they are trying to awaken a great being called the Black Mage in order to make Maple World a better place to live. They are currently in the process of preparing for that event...

string.name: name
string.value: Releasing the Free Spirits
The item that #p1013203# was talking about seems to be ready. Go to the #b#m922030000##k, the Black Wings hideout in #m220000300#.

#p1013203# gives you the pouch containing the spirits and tells you to go to the #b#m922030010##k. He tells you to climb the ladder, placed there in advance by another member, then #brelease the pouch and free the #t4000594#s in order to chase everyone away#k. He wants you to return to him once everyone is gone...
This is kind of strange, you wonder why he wants to free the spirits and chase everyone away...
#o9300389##r #a225831##k
You returned after releasing the spirits at the #m922030010# on top of #m922030000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Suspicions about the Secret Organization
You completed the Secret Organization's third mission. But #p1013000# gets a serious expression as he talks to you...What could it be about? Talk to #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# raises some suspicions about the Black Wings. Come to think of it, you never received any explanation about why you were supposed to release the #t4000144#s at the #m922030010# and eliminate the #o9300390#s, or what significance there was to the #o9300390#'s last words. #bAre the Black Wings really a good organization#k? You are starting to get suspicious...

#p1013000# raises some suspicions about the Black Wings. Come to think of it, you never received any explanation about why you were supposed to release the #t4000144#s at the #m922030010# and eliminate the #o9300390#s, or what significance there was to the #o9300390#'s last words. #bAre the Black Wings really a good organization#k? You are starting to get suspicious...

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Organization's Fourth Mission
#p1013203# starts talking to you. It must be about the Secret Organization's fourth mission. Respond to #p1013203#.

#p1013203# tells you to go get the #b#t4032472##k from #b#p2092001##k in #b#m251000000##k. He says he will explain what it will be used for later... Go to #m251000000# for now.\r\n\r\n#i4032472# #t4032472# #b#c4032472# / 1#k
You gave the map to #p1013203#. #p1013203# asks you to wait as he will give you your next mission...

string.name: name
string.value: Map of Turtle Island
For your fourth mission, meet with #b#p2092001##k in #b#m251000000##k to find the #t4032472#.

#p2092001# says that he will give you the map if you complete his request. He wants you to eliminate the bad pirates, #r#o9001029##k and #r#o9001030##k, who are harassing the people of #m251000000#.x000D_
Once you eliminated the #o99001029# and the #o9001030#, #p2092001# gave you the #t4032472#. He says that it's not a place you can easily reach, so you shouldn't even try...

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Organization's Fifth Mission
After seeing the map, #p1013203# smiles as if satisfied... What kind of map is this? Ask #b#p1013203##k.

#p1013203# gives you an item called a #t4032473# and tells you to enter a portal that leads to Turtle Island, where you are to #boffer it on an altar inside a cave in the center of the island#k. You're not sure what this is about... You just have to #bdrop the #t4032473##k on the altar.

Turtle Island was the island where the Dragon was sleeping! By breaking the #o9300391# as #p1013203# told you, you were able to get close to the sleeping Dragon. But you were told to come out as there was nothing more for you to do there...

string.name: name
string.value: Dangerous Premonition
When you come out of the cave, #p1013000# seems restless. Ask #p1013000# if he is okay.
#p1013000# says that he has a strange feeling about this and that you shouldn't just leave the island. He may be right. #bTurn around and return to the Peaceful Cave where the Dragon is sleeping#k!
When you talk to #p1013203#, who suddenly appeared in the cave, he attacked and said he doesn't need you anymore. What happened? Was he just using you?

string.name: name
string.value: Voice of the Sleeping Dragon
You aren't sure why the Black Wings did this or what they are after... Suddenly, #p1013000# seems surprised by something. What is it? Talk to #b#p1013000##k.
#p1013000# says that the sleeping Dragon called to him. He says to try talking to the Dragon. Will that Dragon really respond?
#p1205000#, the sleeping Dragon, recognized #p1013000#!

string.name: name
string.value: Result of the First Mission
Did the Black Wing missions really help people? Or were you just being used? Go to #b#m200000000##k and see the results of your first mission to make the #t4032468#.

#p2012012#, the fairy in #m200000000# says that they suffered a lot because of the Nependeath that suddenly grew and that things might have been worse if not for the help of a certain person. You were wrong. This wasn't to make crops grow bigger to feed more people, the #r#t4032468# only brought harm#k.

#p2012012#, the fairy in #m200000000# says that they suffered a lot because of the Nependeath that suddenly grew and that things might have been worse if not for the help of a certain person. You were wrong. This wasn't to make crops grow bigger to feed more people, the #r#t4032468# only brought harm#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Result of the Third Mission
Did the Black Wing missions really help people? Or were you just being used? Go to #b#m220000000##k and find out the result of your third mission of eliminating the #o9300390#.

When you ask #p2041004# about the #o9300390#, he's startled and lowers his voice as he asks you to not tell anyone that the guard protecting the #m220000000# storage was attacked, which allowed a thief to enter...#rThe Black Wings had ordered you to eliminate the #o9300390# so that they could steal the treasure.#k

When you ask #p2041004# about the #o9300390#, he's startled and lowers his voice as he asks you to not tell anyone that the guard protecting the #m220000000# storage was attacked, which allowed a thief to enter...#rThe Black Wings had ordered you to eliminate the #o9300390# so that they could steal the treasure.#k
All of the things that the Black Wings had told you to do were bad. #b#p1013000##k, who had wanted you to help people as the Dragon Master, seems very upset...

#p1013000# says that he can't just let this go and suggests that you go to the #b#m922030001##k in #m220000300# where you met #p1013203# in person. Maybe #p1013203# is still there... Go teach #p1013203# a lesson.


#p1013203##r #a225961##k

#p1013203# tried to appease you but you fought him without mercy. Unfortunately, he escaped... Having discovered the truth, you and #p1013000# decide to do whatever it takes to fight the Black Wings and stop the Black Mage.

string.name: name
string.value: After Shedding 1
When you reach Lv. 80, #p1013000#, who has become much bigger, seems to have something he wants to say. Talk to #p1013000#.

Of the scales that #p1013000# shed, there seems to be one that still contains the power of the Dragon. Since #p1013000# has new scales, he says he doesn't need it anymore. Try using it for something else. What about making something with it using the #bMaker Skill#k.

Of the scales that #p1013000# shed, there seems to be one that still contains the power of the Dragon. Since #p1013000# has new scales, he says he doesn't need it anymore. Try using it for something else. What about making something with it using the #bMaker Skill#k.

string.name: name
string.value: After Shedding 2
When you reach Lv. 120, #p1013000# has once again grown bigger. Could he have some leftover scales like last time? Talk to #p1013000#.

#p1013000# gives you another scale that contains the power of the Dragon. It seems to contain stronger power than the last time. You should be able to make another good item using the #bMake Skill#k.\n\nIn any case, #p1013000# now looks pretty imposing... If you didn't become strong along with #p1013000#, you might be too afraid to even look him in the eye.

#p1013000# gives you another scale that contains the power of the Dragon. It seems to contain stronger power than the last time. You should be able to make another good item using the #bMake Skill#k.\n\nIn any case, #p1013000# now looks pretty imposing... If you didn't become strong along with #p1013000#, you might be too afraid to even look him in the eye.

string.name: name
string.value: Request from a Kindergarten Teacher
Raise your Level by helping the townspeople, like the Headmaster suggested. #b#p2152001#, the Kindergarten Teacher#k, seems to need some help. Go see what he needs.

#p2152001# wants to plant flowers in front of the school, so he asks that you hunt #r#o0150000#s#k and bring back #b#t4000595#s#k. You want do what he asks, it's for the children after all!
#i4000595# #t4000595# #b#c4000595# / 5#k

You brought the #t4000595#s to #p2152001#, and he told you that the children will be very happy. He really doesn't fit the image of a Kindergarten Teacher, but he really cares about his kids, which is the important thing.

string.name: name
string.value: Request from a Doctor
Raise your Level by helping the townspeople, like the Headmaster suggested. #b#p2152004#, the Doctor#k, seems to need some help. Go see what she needs.

#p2152004#, a good doctor who seems cold at times, says that the fruits from the fruit trees in town can be used to make a simple, yet effective medicine. She asks you to gather #b#t2022712#s#k for her.
#i2022712# #t2022712# #b#c2022712# / 5#k

You gathered the fruits and delivered them to #p2152004#. #p2152004# said that the town won't run out of medicine for a little while now. Then, she added that preventing the townspeople from getting hurt in the first place was even more important than preparing medicine.

string.name: name
string.value: Request from a Streetsweeper
Raise your Level by helping the townspeople, like the Headmaster suggested. #b#p2152002#, the Streetsweeper#k, seems to need some help. Go see what he needs.

You meet #p2152002#, the Streetsweeper who is always smiling. #p2152002# says that he can manage cleaning inside the town, but he can't clean outside of town, so he wants you to help clean the park pathways outside of town. Eliminate the #r#o0150002#s#k and retrieve the #b#t4000597#s#k.
#i4000597# #t4000597# #b#c4000597# / 5#k

You gathered the trash and gave it to #p2152002#. #p2152002# was very happy about the new, clean streets. Then, quietly, he added that there is something else in town that really should be cleaned up.

string.name: name
string.value: Path of the Wild Hunter

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

You decide to become a member of the Resistance in order to fight for peace and freedom. Members of the Resistance choose from various jobs depending on aptitude and taste... You wonder what jobs are available. Talk to #b#p2151002##k, the Bowman Job Instructor, who works as a Police Officer, to find out more about being a Resistance Bowman.

There is a big difference between a Resistance Bowman and a normal Bowman. #bWild Hunters are strong Bowmen who can engage in fast and powerful battles#k by riding on animals while shooting down their enemies with powerful arrows! If you want to make a job advancement as a Wild Hunter, talk to #p2151002# again.
You made a job advancement as a Wild Hunter. Show your courage and move like the wind to fight against the Black Wings as a member of the Resistance!

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Mechanic

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

You decide to become a member of the Resistance in order to fight for peace and freedom. Members of the Resistance choose from various jobs depending on aptitude and taste... You wonder what jobs are available. Talk to #b#p2151004##k, the Pirate Job Instructor, who dresses up like a bear and passes out fliers, to find out more about being a Resistance Pirate.

The Resistance Pirates are similar to Gunslingers, yet have their own distinctive features. In addition to gun attacks, they are #bMechanics who ride robots and handle machinery with ease#k! If you want to make a job advancement as a Mechanic, talk to #p2151004# again.
You made a job advancement as a Mechanic. Show your courage and utilize all possible methods to defeat the Black Wings!

string.name: name
string.value: Taming a Jaguar
In order to use the Riding Skill, the most basic skill for Wild Hunters, you must first capture a jaguar. Talk to #b#p2151002##k to find out how.
Wild Hunters can tame and mount jaguars. Now, you just need to find out where the jaguars are...
You can enter the #b#e#m931000500##n#k any time by talking to #eBlack Jack#n at the #b#e#m931000500##n#k. Once there, you can use the Capture skill to tame a new jaguar.

string.name: name
string.value: After School Special Training

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
After reaching Level 30, the Headmaster starts a conversation with you again.

The Headmaster tells you that you need to take the #bAfter School Special Training#k. You should go to class and meet your teacher. Special Training, Class, and Teacher are the Resistance passwords! Go to the #bResistance Underground Base#k and meet #b#p2151001##k.
You have a new mission as a Resistance member. It's a tough mission, specially assigned to you... You cannot refuse it, nor do you want to.

string.value: After School Special Training

You have a new mission as a Resistance member. It's a tough mission, specially assigned to you... You cannot refuse it, nor do you want to.

You have a new mission as a Resistance member. It's a tough mission, specially assigned to you... You cannot refuse it, nor do you want to.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Field Trip

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
After reaching Level 70, the Headmaster starts a conversation with you again.

The Headmaster says that you need to participate in a Special Training Field Trip and that you to meet your teacher in class. It must be #banother Resistance mission#k! Hurry to the #bUnderground Base#k and talk to #b#p2151001#, the Battle Mage Job Instructor#k.
You have a new, difficult Resistance mission that must be completed at the Power Plant, the hideout of the Black Wings. Although it will be tough, you have no desire to forfeit!

string.value: Special Training Field Trip

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
After reaching Level 70, the Headmaster starts a conversation with you again.

The Headmaster says that you need to participate in a Special Training Field Trip and that you to meet your teacher in class. It must be #banother Resistance mission#k! Hurry to the #bUnderground Base#k and talk to #b#p2151002#, the Wild Hunter Job Instructor#k.
You have a new, difficult Resistance mission that must be completed at the Power Plant, the hideout of the Black Wings. Although it will be tough, you have no desire to forfeit!

string.value: Special Training Field Trip

string.value: [Job Advancement]
After reaching Level 70, the Headmaster starts a conversation with you again.

The Headmaster says that you need to participate in a Special Training Field Trip and that you to meet your teacher in class. It must be #banother Resistance mission#k! Hurry to the #bUnderground Base#k and talk to #b#p2151004#, the Mechanic Job Instructor#k.
You have a new, difficult Resistance mission that must be completed at the Power Plant, the hideout of the Black Wings. Although it will be tough, you have no desire to forfeit!

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Emergency Roundup

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
After reaching Level 120, the Headmaster starts a conversation with you again.

The Headmaster tells you to go quickly to the #bSchool#k and meet your teacher, because there is a #bSpecial Training Emergency Roundup#k. You heard that a different teacher will be in charge this time...you wonder what is going on with the Resistance. Go quickly to the #bUnderground Base#k.
The Job Instructor is not at the Underground Base... #p2151003# meets you instead. Her expression confirms your suspicion...something must be wrong.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the missing Job Instructor

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
#p2151001#, the Battle Mage Instructor, lost contact during a recent mission, but you don't know anything else... Ask #b#p2151003##k for more information.

You are told that #p2151001# lost contact while he was on a mission to find out about the new Black Wings weapon being developed by #p2154009#. Although there is no doubt that there was an intrusion in the Laboratory, there is no way to know what happened next. Go into #b#p2154009#'s Laboratory#k and try to find #p2151001#.
You should disguise yourself as a Black Wing, then approach #p2154009# inside the Mine.
After falling for #p2154009#'s trap, you met #p2151001# inside the prison. #p2151001# seems to be injured, and he cannot move. Fortunately, he's still conscious...

string.name: name
string.value: Dangerous Laboratory

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

Disguise yourself as a Black Wing member, then go to the #b#m310060000##k inside the Mine to meet #b#p2154009##k, the Black Wing Mad Scientist. You must gain his trust in order to find out the location of the laboratory where the new weapon is being developed.

After talking with #p2154009#, you are given the assignment of patrolling the new weapon laboratory. However, #p2154009# wants you to leave #b5 Million Mesos#k as collateral, so you won't steal anything from the laboratory.
#b5000000 Mesos#k

You gained #p2154009#'s trust and received #t4032743#, which you can use to enter the laboratory where the new weapon is being developed. You can enter through the secret entrance located at #bSecurity System Research Lab 3#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Wings' New Weapon

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
Talk to #p2151001#, who seems to have recovered.

Black Wings' new weapon has already been completed. #p2151001#, who realized the danger of the new weapon, tried to destroy it, but ended up getting locked in prison. You can't just sit there and do nothing! Destroy the #rBlack Wings' new weapon#k and rescue #p2151001#!
#o9001035##r #a230511##k
After completely destroying the Black Wings' new weapon, you returned with #p2151001# using the Underground Base #t4032740#. It was no easy task, but your execution was perfect.

string.name: name
string.value: You Surpass Me

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
You have returned to the Underground Base with #p2151001#. Talk to #b#p2151001##k to see if he's fully recovered.

#p2151001# says he's made a full recovery, but doesn't think he can ever surpass your prowess. Then, he passes the strongest skill he knows on to you, saying he's never been able to perfect it, but believes that you can.
Become a Resistance member who can meet his expectations. Drive the Black Wings out of town and find peace!
