string.name: name
string.value: End of Special Training
Upon reaching Lv. 200, Headmaster #p2152000# of #m310000000# talks to you.
#p2152000# wants you to come to the school. He has something to say to you.

#p2152000# thanked you for being diligent during your Special Training and told you that your training is over, because you don't have anything else to learn. As a Resistance member and resident of the town, he would like to see you dedicate yourself to the town. You received the Hero's Echo skill along with his words of appreciation.

string.name: name
string.value: A Student of the Resistance
Now you're a member of the Resistance! To find out what a member of the Resistance does, ask #b#p2151001##k.

#p2151001# says he can't give you a mission, because your level is too low. He asks that you advance to #bLv. 14#k first. You can hunt and gain experience to level up, but there is also an educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000# the Instructor#k.
You met #p2151000# and asked about the educational program for the Resistance.

string.name: name
string.value: A Student of the Resistance
Now you're a member of the Resistance! To find out what a member of the Resistance does, ask #b#p2151002##k.

#p2151002# says she can't give you a mission, because your level is too low. She asks that you advance to #bLv. 14#k first. You can hunt and gain experience to level up, but there is also an educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000# the Instructor#k.
You met #p2151000# and asked about the educational program for the Resistance.

string.name: name
string.value: A Student of the Resistance
Now you're a member of the Resistance! To find out what a member of the Resistance does, ask #b#p2151004##k.

#p2151004# says he can't give you a mission, because your level is too low. He asks that you advance to #bLv. 14#k first. You can hunt and gain experience to level up, but there is also an educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000# the Instructor#k.
You met #p2151000# and asked about the educational program for the Resistance.

string.name: name
string.value: General Enhancement Course
Continue the educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000##k at the #m310010010# to begin the secret educational program.

One must complete all three courses in order to participate in the secret course, which is a General Enhancement Course. Enter #b#m310010400##k and eliminate #o9300412#. #r#o9300412##k has the ability to fly, which helps the trainees enhance their general abilities.
#o9300412##r #a231061##k
When you went back to #p2151000# to report your completion, you reached Lv. 14. You wonder if you can receive your first mission now...

string.name: name
string.value: The First Mission
Upon reaching Lv. 14, #b#p2151001##k of the Resistance talks to you.

#p2151001# says you can take on your first mission as a member of the Resistance! #p2151001# tells you to go see #bResistance #p2151003##k to receive the mission. Go see #p2151003# at the Underground Base and ask about the mission.
You asked #p2151003# about the first mission.

string.name: name
string.value: The First Mission
Upon reaching Lv. 14, #b#p2151002##k of the Resistance talks to you.

#p2151002# says you can take on your first mission as a member of the Resistance! #p2151002# tells you to go see #bResistance #p2151003##k to receive the mission. Go see #b#p2151003##k at the Underground Base and ask about the mission.
You asked #p2151003# about the first mission.

string.name: name
string.value: The First Mission
Upon reaching Lv. 14, #b#p2151004##k of the Resistance talks to you.

#p2151004# says you can take on your first mission as a member of the Resistance! #p2151004# tells you to go see #bResistance #p2151003##k to receive the mission. Go see #p2151003# at the Underground Base and ask about the mission.
You asked #p2151003# about the first mission.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Patrol Robot
You wonder what your first mission as a member of the Resistance will be... Ask Resistance #b#p2151003##k at the Underground Base to find out!

#p2151003# asks you to defeat the #r#o1150000#s#k scattered in #b#m310030000##k and retrieve the #bmemory chips#k from them. She says she'll be able to find out important information about the Black Wings by analyzing the tape.
#o1150000##r #a231101##k #i4000598# #t4000598# #b#c4000598# / 10#k
You collected the #t4000598#s from the #o1150000#s. #p2151003# said she would begin analyzing the tape immediately, so you gave her a few moments...

string.name: name
string.value: Sending a Warning
Check in with #b#p2151003##k to see if she's finished analyzing the #t4000598#.

According to the analysis, the Black Wings are spying on the impatient grandpa #b#p2152010##k. He discreetly supports the Resistance, but it's enough to get the Black Wings' attention. Talk to #b#p2152010# and use the code words #b<Roach>, <Dance>, and <Nap>#k to warn him#k.
You warned #p2152010#.

string.name: name
string.value: Surl's Request
#p2152010#, who supports the Resistance in ways other than fighting wants to ask you for a favor. Go see #b#p2152010##k.

#p2152010# says he might have to leave for a little <nap>, but he's afraid a <roach> might be watching him. He says to tell <her> about his situation and get her advice... You recognize the Resistance code and realize that the girl #p2152010# is talking about has to be #p2151003#. Go talk to #b#p2151003##k and get her advice. She will probably give you #ban item that will replace Surl#k...
With the Transformation Potion that #p2151003# made, you underwent a transformation and talked to the Black Wing watchman #p2152016# in order to create an alibi for #p2152010#.

string.name: name
string.value: Basics of Being Part of the Resistance: Transformation and Camouflage
The <girl> in <underground> that #p2152010# is talking about must be #p2151003# at the Underground Base. Find #b#p2151003##k and explain #p2152010#'s situation.

After listening to what you had to say, #p2151003# said #p2152010# can't leave for supplies due to the surveillance of the Black Wings. So, she suggests that you create an alibi for #p2152010#. You will have to #bdisguise yourself as #p2152010# and talk to watchman #p2152016##k. #p2151003# offers to make you a potion that can help you transform, but you need to bring her some ingredients first.
#i2000000# #t2000000# #b#c2000000# / 10#k #i2000003# #t2000003# #b#c2000003# / 10#k #i2022712# #t2022712# #b#c2022712# / 3#k
You received the transformation potion from #p2151003#, who said you can transform into #p2152010# by drinking it.

string.name: name
string.value: Awakened Test Subject
Upon reaching Lv. 16, #p2151003# of the Resistance talks to you. You wonder if it's another mission...

You're not getting a mission this time, but it's just as important. #b#p2151005##k, who was rescued from the Black Wing Laboratory, has opened her eyes. She wants to meet you, so head over to the #b#m310010010##k.
A kid who was a test subject, she will now be called #p2151005#. You know you'll get along just fine.

string.name: name
string.value: The Test Subject Recovers
Ask #b#p2150006##k at the #bUnderground Base#k to see how #p2151005# is doing.

According to #p2150006#, #p2151005# has become extremely weak and fragile due to the experiment. She offers to make a comfortable bed for Vita if you go to #b#m310030100##k and bring back #b#t4000599#s#k by defeating #r#o1150001#s#k.
#i4000599# #t4000599# #b#c4000599# / 60#k
You delivered the #t4000599# to #p2150006#. Hopefully, this will help #p2151005# recover quickly.

string.name: name
string.value: Request of the Test Subject 1
Upon reaching Lv. 18, #p2151003# of the Resistance talks to you. You wonder if it's another mission...

You don't receive a mission this time, either... It's about #p2151005#, who has fully recovered and #bdecided to become a supporter of the Resistance#k! #p2151003# wants you to introduce yourself to Vita, since the two of you will be seeing a lot of each other. Head over to the #bUnderground Base#k.
#p2151005# wanted to repay you for your kindness since she recovered her health and can move freely.

string.name: name
string.value: Request of the Test Subject 2
#p2151005# hesitates to ask you something. Talk to #b#p2151005##k at the Underground Base.

#p2151005# says she'd like to use her knowledge of medicine to help the Resistance, but she's unsure whether her knowledge is accurate or not. To confirm, she wants to try concocting the medicine. Head over to #b#m310030110##k and find the ingredients for her experiment.
#i4000600# #t4000600# #b#c4000600# / 30#k
You delivered #t4000600#s to #p2151005#. She said she can make sure the medicine is effective now...

string.name: name
string.value: Request of the Test Subject 3
#p2151005#'s medicine should be ready by now. Talk to #b#p2151005##k at the Underground Base.

#p2151005#'s medicine is finished, but it still needs to be tested. Help her test the medicine by drinking it and successfully defeating the #rTraining Robot#k in #b#m310010500##k. Then, report to #p2151003# while the medicine is still in effect.
#o9300413##r #a231181##k

#p2151005#'s medicine was incredible! When you informed #p2151003# that the medicine had no side effects and you were able to successfully defeat the Training Robot, she was ecstatic! She said she would think about how the members of the Resistance can use it in the future.

string.name: name
string.value: The Second Mission
Upon reaching Lv. 20, #p2151003#, a member of the Resistance, talks to you.

#p2151003# says your second mission is to go talk to #b#p2152010##k and solve the problem he's having. Since #p2152010#'s in charge of supplies and support for the Resistance, it must be important. Go talk to him!
You met with #p2152010# and found out the problem he was having.

string.name: name
string.value: Water Trade
#b#p2152010##k, a Resistance colleague, has a favor to ask.

#p2152010# says he should stop selling the water he's been collecting, because the Black Wing surveillance is getting to be too much. He says the water delivery is being done via the airship, so head over to #b#m310000010##k and deliver water to #b#p2150008##k.
Although you had an encounter with a group of thieves, you were able to safely deliver the water.

string.name: name
string.value: Abuses of the Black Wings
The group of thieves dropped a strange item, a #b#t4032745##k... Very suspicious. Perhaps #b#p2152010##k knows why the thieves were carrying a #b#t4032745##k.
#p2152010# was surprised and upset to see the #t4032745#. In fact, #p2152010# is enraged, demanding that you rush over to the #bUnderground Base#k and show the #t4032745# to #b#p2151003##k.
#p2151003# was furious and said that the Black Wings were probably disguising themselves as thieves to steal from people.

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Test Subject 1

#b#p2150006##k may look like just another Assistant Plastic Surgeon, but she's actually in charge of mending wounds and healing the Resistance. She has something to ask you, so head over to the #bUnderground Base#k.

#p2150006# says #p2151005#'s medicine has helped her focus on taking care of her patients. She is so grateful that she would like to give a present to #p2151005# to thank her. Collect the ingredients that are required for the present. You can find #b#t4032746#s#k by hunting #r#o2150002#s#k in #b#m310030310##k.
#i4032746# #t4032746# #b#c4032746# / 10#k
#p2150006# began to make a present for #p2151005#, so you gave her a few moments.

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Test Subject 2
Talk to #b#p2150006##k at the #bUnderground Base#k to see if she's finished the present.
#p2150006# made a #t4032747# for #p2151005#. Since #b#p2151005##k doesn't have a hometown, she thought this would allow Vita to feel at home here. #p2150006# wants you deliver the present.
#p2151005# was so excited to when she received the present, and said she would work even harder for the Resistance.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Test Subject's Medicine
#b#p2151003##k, a member of the Resistance, wants to speak with you. Head over to the #bUnderground Base#k.

#p2151003# says it isn't a secret mission, but a simple favor. She wants you to meet with a #bResistance Secret Agent#k to deliver some medicine. The medicine appears to be something that was concocted by #p2151005#. Go to the Secret Meeting Place via the back alley near #m310030110#'s Phone Booth.

The Resistance Secret Agent was #p2159010#, who rescued you in front of the Laboratory a long time ago! #p2159010# said that he's seen a lot of medicine with the initial V on it and wondered who made the medicine.

string.name: name
string.value: The Third Mission
Upon reaching Lv. 29, #p2151003#, a member of the Resistance, talks to you.

#p2152010#, a member of the Resistance, is in danger! He left town for a business deal, and the Black Wings attacked him. Hurry and rescue #p2152010#! You can find him in #b#m931000440##k, located behind #b#m310020100##k's Observation Binoculars.
#p2152010# seems to be safe for now.

string.name: name
string.value: Protecting Surl

#p2152010#, a Resistance supporter, is in danger and could be attacked by the Black Wings any minute now! Hurry and rescue #p2152010#! Go to #b#m931000440##k, behind #b#m310020100##k's Observation Binoculars.

The Black Wings have begun attacking #p2152010#! #bDuring the given time, you must protect #p2152010# from the Black Wings#k. Defeat all nearby members of the Black Wings and prevent #p2152010# from getting injured.
You were successful in protecting #p2152010#. #p2152010# thanked you and said that with people like you to stand up to the Black Wings, peace is imminent.

string.name: name
string.value: Jun's Thoughts
No adult in #m310000000# seems approachable, but a child may be different. Talk to #b#p2152008##k, and see if you can find out why people aren't talking to you.

Although the child gives you a little more reaction than any of the adults, #p2152008# isn't what you would call friendly. You wonder how you can befriend #p2152008#... Perhaps you can give #p2152008# a gift. He seems to dote on #bthe puppy he's carrying#k...

After you gave him some delicious Dry Treats for his puppy, #p2152008# opened up to you. According to #p2152008#, keeping distance from outsiders doesn't seem to be a part of the town's culture. He says the townspeople just avoid people like you. You wonder what that means... You couldn't possibly be worse than the Black Wings.

string.name: name
string.value: Ulrika's Thoughts
No adult in #m310000000# seems approachable, but a child may be different. Talk to #b#p2152009##k, a girl who looks bright, and ask her if she knows why the townspeople refuse to talk to you.

Although she gave you a bit more of a response than the adults of the town, #p2152009# still seems to distance herself from you. You try to think of ways to befriend #p2152009#... Perhaps you can give #p2152009# a gift. After all, she seems to be in search of #bFruits to give her big sister#k.

#p2152009# opened up to you a little more after you give her a #t2010003# that is known to energize and rejuvenate. According to #p2152009#, the residents of this town hate anyone who is a part of the #p1101000# Knights. You can't imagine what the #p1101000# Knights have done to the townspeople...

string.name: name
string.value: Cygnus the Betrayer
You can't figure why the people of #m310000000# hate the #p1101000# Knights so much... Since you've come to Ereve, ask the #bEmpress#k.

When you ask Empress #p1101000# about #m310000000#, she grimaces and says it's because the Knights have broken their promise to the town. You still don't know what happened between the Cygnus Knights and the residents of Edelstein... Ask #b#p1101002##k.

#m310000000# is a town taken over by the Black Wings. Apparently, the people of #m310000000# formed the Resistance and fought against the Black Wings for years in order to drive them out of their town. Empress #p1101000# had her Knights join forces with the Resistance in order to stop the revival of the Black Mage.
One day, the Resistance decided to launch their ultimate attack and asked the Knights to help them. Without hesitation, the Empress willingly agreed to provide support. However, the Cygnus Knights broke their promise and #m310000000# was defeated, resulting in more severe oppression and surveillance of its residents.
Since then, the townspeople have despised the Empress and her Knights as much as they do the Black Wings.

string.name: name
string.value: Town Filled With Suspicion

You come to a newly-discovered area, #m310000000#, but no one will talk to you. All the residents seem to go about their business without saying a word... you wonder what's going on... Ask Headmaster #b#p2152000##k, who looks the most gentlemanly out of everyone.

Headmaster #p2152000# says the reason the townspeople are avoiding you is probably because they think you are one of #r<them>#k. He says to talk to #bpeople dressed in black in this town#k if you want to learn more about it.
#y23906# #b(#u23906#)#k

The Black Wings rule #m310000000#, and the townspeople have no choice but to accept it. Because everyone in #m310000000# despises the Black Wings, the overall climate of the town is far from happy and inviting. But, since you've resolved the misunderstanding, you should be able to talk to the residents.

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Reaction
The Black Wings are a bunch of hoodlums who collect Seal Stones... Tell #b#p1201000##k and ask her for advice.

When #p1201000# receives the information you acquired in #m310000000#, she's surprised, yet accepts it easily. It's as if she expected it... #p1201000# requests that you continue to hide your identity and collect more information. She warns you not to do anything rash, since you could get yourself hurt by going on the attack alone.

When #p1201000# received the information you acquired in #m310000000#, she was surprised, yet accepted it easily. It seemed like she expected it... #p1201000# requested that you continue to hide your identity and collect more information. She warned you not to do anything rash, as you could get yourself hurt by going on the attack alone.

string.name: name
string.value: Mir's Reaction
The connection between your organization and the Black Wings, as well as #m310000000#... It all seems really complicated. Talk to #b#p1013000##k.
The Black Wings seem to be extremely suspicious. They were not exactly seen as heroes in #m310000000#, but maybe they're a good organization, anyway...
The Black Wings seem to be extremely suspicious. They were not exactly seen as heroes in #m310000000#, but maybe they're a good organization, anyway...

string.name: name
string.value: Watchman Bavan's Request
#b#m310000000##k's watchman, #b#p2152016##k, is grumbling and looking for someone.

#p2152016# the watchman says his job is to take the #t4000598#s out of #o1150000#s, but he wants you to do it, because he's feeling lazy. Defeat #r#o1150000#s#k and find #b20#k #b#t4000598#s#k, then take them over to #b#p2152017##k the watchman, who is in charge of tape analysis.
#i4000598# #t4000598# #b#c4000598# / 20#k
Watchman #p2152017#, as with #p2152016#, seemed annoyed when she received the #t4000598#.

string.name: name
string.value: Watchman Leonore's Request
#b#m310000000##k's watchman, #b#p2152017##k, is grumbling and looking for someone.

Watchman #p2152017# tells you her skin was severely damaged while analyzing the #t4000598#. She needs you to find some items that would help her skin. Go to the #bGeneral Store#k and purchase some fruits.
#i2010003# #t2010003# #b#c2010003# / 3#k #i2010000# #t2010000# #b#c2010000# / 3#k #i2010004# #t2010004# #b#c2010004# / 3#k
You delivered the fruits to Watchman #p2152017#.

string.name: name
string.value: Watchman Wonny's Request
Watchman #p2152017# is grumbling and looking for someone. You wonder if the analysis mission is over yet... Talk to #b#p2152017##k.

#p2152017# says that transferring the analysis to the Hideout is #p2152018#'s job, then asks you to deliver the analysis results to #bWatchman #p2152018##k. #p2152017# must really dislike #p2152018#...
Watchman #p2152018# read over the analysis results carefully. When you asked him if he was allowed to do that, #p2152018# urged you not to tell anyone.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate Strange Signs
The cowardly #bPolice Officer #p2152003##k in #b#m310000000##k has a favor to ask you.

#p2152003# tells you that many visitors are getting lost, because the signposts have been broken. She wants you to teach a lesson to the #r#o1150001#s#k. Go to #b#m310030100##k, located on the right side of the town, to find them.
#o1150001##r #a239131##k
You returned after teaching the #o1150001#s a lesson.

string.name: name
string.value: Recycling is Important
#b#m310000000##k's diligent #bStreetsweeper #p2152002##k has a favor to ask you. Talk to #p2152002#.

#p2152002# says #m310000000# is currently suffering from a shortage of electric power, and that everyone should recycle even the littlest items. He asks you to collect Recyclable Rue Batteries from the children near Checky.
#i4032750# #t4032750# #b#c4032750# / 1#k
You collected #t4032750# and delivered it to #p2152002#.

string.name: name
string.value: What's Under the Animal Costume? 1
#b#m310000000##k's #bbrainy girl, #p2152009##k, is curious about something.

According to #p2152009#, no one has ever seen the face of #b#p2152005# the part-timer#k, because he always wears a bear suit while handing out fliers at the Square Fountain. #p2152009# says her curiosity is driving her crazy...
#p2152005# scribbled something on a piece of paper for you. It said, <Inside is a dream and a hope>... You doubted #p2152009# would be pleased with that answer...

string.name: name
string.value: What's Under the Animal Costume? 2
You received an answer from #p2152005#. Under the bear suit is a dream and a hope... You figure this answer won't satisfy #b#p2152009##k's curiosity.

Of course, #p2152009# doesn't believe #p2152005#'s answer. After much contemplation, she suggests putting a snake inside #p2152005#'s suit to make the person inside jump out! She wants you to catch a #r#o1150002##k for her. You can catch a live snake by using the Net that #b#p2152009# gave you#k... Be careful, though, it sounds pretty dangerous!
#i4032751# #t4032751# #b#c4032751# / 20#k
Surprised at the snake, #p2152005# jumped out of the suit but it the person inside was wearing another layer of animal costume!

string.name: name
string.value: What's Under the Animal Costume? 3
20 #t4032751#s inside #b#p2152005##k's suit! You can't beat that!

#p2152005# was relieved that the snakes weren't poisonous. Then, Checky said that under the animal costume there is simply a dream and a hope for the future. He sincerely requested that people stop trying to find out what more is inside. Your conscience tells you that you won't be able to bother #p2152005# any further. Tell #b#p2152009##k what you think.
Disappointed that she was not able to identify who #p2152005# is, #p2152009# clenched her fists, determined to find out, no matter what it takes.

string.name: name
string.value: Should I Leave?
#b#m310000000##k's average resident #b#p2152011##k seems to have something on her mind.

#p2152011# says she loves her home, but doesn't know if she can live in a town that is being conquered by the Black Wings any longer. She says the #o2150000# came and stole her water last night. First, eliminate the #r#o2150000##k to calm #p2152011# down.
#o2150000##r #a239181##k
You eliminated all the #o2150000#s, which seemed to calm #p2152011# down. She said she could never leave the town that she loves so much.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Confess Your Crush 1
#b#m310000000##k's #bKindergarten Teacher #p2152001##k wants to confess his love for someone. Go to the front of the school and meet him.

#p2152001# has a crush on #p2152017#! #p2152001# wants you to find him some flowers that he can use to confess his love. He is convinced that the mysterious #t4032752# would surely win her heart.
Find #b#t4032752##k and deliver #p2152001#'s confession of love to #b#p2152017##k. #t4032752# can be found somewhere near #b#m310020200##k. Use your normal attack when you discover it.
#i4032752# #t4032752# #b#c4032752# / 1#k
When #p2152017# received the #t4032752#, she scoffed and said she didn't know why men give her useless flowers that are inedible.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Confess Your Crush 2
#b#m310000000##k's Kindergarten Teacher #b#p2152001##k doesn't seem to be bothered by rejection. In fact, he wants to confess his love to #p2152017# again.

Since she said she didn't want useless flowers, #p2152001# wants to give her something delicious to eat. He wants you to find #b#t4000600#s#k, a delicacy, and confess his love to #p2152017# once more. It's not exactly a romantic gift, and you doubt she will accept his love this time.
#i4000600# #t4000600# #b#c4000600# / 40#k

#p2152017# was appalled when she saw the #t4000600#s. She absolutely hated it, until she heard that it's good for maintaining healthy skin and weight. Then, her expression began to soften slightly, although it was no doubt another failure for #p2152001#.

string.name: name
string.value: Ace the Pilot's Mistake
The #t4032753#, which is proof of #p2152001#'s love, is with #b#p2150008##k in #b#m310000010##k. Since it has already been paid for, go over to #p2150008# and pick up the Diamond.

#p2152001#'s #t4032753# has been unintentionally thrown away by #p2150008#. Eliminate the #r#o2150001##k and find the #b#t4032754##k.
#i4032754# #t4032754# #b#c4032754# / 20#k
You found the #t4032753#. Deliver the Diamond to #p2152017#.

string.name: name
string.value: Is it Love? Or...
#p2152001#'s plan must have worked... #b#p2152017##k has finally made a decision about something!
#p2152017#, blushing, hands you a pink letter. It appears that #p2152001#'s confession was accepted. Hurry over to #b#p2152001##k and give him the good news.
When #p2152001# received #t4032755#, he didn't seem too happy. He could only grimace and say the plan finally worked. You had no idea what he was talking about...

string.name: name
string.value: Albert's Daughter
#b#m310000000##k's former Council President #b#p2152006##k needs help.

When the Black Wings took over #m310000000#, #p2152006#'s only daughter was taken hostage. #p2152006# says he'd like to send her something she might need while she's being held hostage at the Black Wings' headquarters. Go to #b#m310000004##k and find him #b#t4032757##k.
#i4032757# #t4032757# #b#c4032757# / 1#k
You found #t4032757#, which belong to #p2152006#'s daughter.

string.name: name
string.value: Maybe They Will Pass It On
You wonder how you can deliver clothes to #p2154004#, who is being held hostage at the Black Wings' headquarters... #b#p2152006##k seems to have an idea.
#p2152006# says #p2152016#, the Black Wing watchman, is delivering items to #p2154004#, and asks that you take the box containing clothes, food, and money to #b#p2152016##k.

When #p2152016# received the box from #p2152006#, he immediately opened it. Then, #p2152016# took the food and money inside the box, leaving only the clothes. From what you saw, you can only assume that not much has been delivered to #p2154004# from #p2152006#.

string.name: name
string.value: Wonny's Dilemma
You stand there with a blank look on your face, surprised at #p2152016#'s behavior, but another Black Wing watchman, #p2152018#, begins to talk to you.
#b#p2152018##k says he will deliver the clothes to #p2154004#. You aren't 100% sure that the clothes will get delivered safely, but you don't really have a choice...
You worried that #p2152018# would do the same thing as #p2152016#, but the sincere look on #p2152018#'s face convinced you. However, he still seemed to have a dilemma...

string.name: name
string.value: Big Sister's Birthday Party 1
#b#m310000000##k's brainy girl #b#p2152009##k needs help.

#p2152009# wants to throw a wonderful birthday party for her sister by baking her a birthday cake. But, to make a birthday cake, she has to whip up some foamy cream. Help #p2152009# make some foamy whipped cream.
#i4032760# #t4032760# #b#c4032760# / 1#k
#p2152009# was very happy to see the finished whipped cream. She said that her delicious cake will be done in no time.

string.name: name
string.value: Big Sister's Birthday Party 2
#b#p2152009##k has more things left to do.

#p2152009# wants you to tell her older sister to come home for her birthday, no matter what it takes. You don't even know who #p2152009#'s sister is... When you asked #p2152009#, she said the two of them look so similar that you won't have any problem finding her. Find #b#p2152009#'s big sister#k in town.
#p2152009#'s big sister was #p2152004#. The calm, poised, cold #p2152004# and the tomboy #p2152009# are sisters... They look and act nothing like each other!

string.name: name
string.value: Finding the Runaway Girl
#b#p2152004##k is scared out of her wits. Talk to #p2152004# and find out what happened.

#p2152004#'s sister #p2152009# ran away from home. #p2152004# thinks it's because she didn't come home on #p2152009#'s birthday like she promised. She doesn't think Ulrika went far, so #bsearch outside of the town to find #p2152009##k and convince her to come back with you.
You brought #p2152009# back with you, but #p2152009# was still upset.

string.name: name
string.value: Reason Behind Her Busy Schedule

You don't know why #p2152004# couldn't keep the promise she made to #p2152009#. If she couldn't even tell her own sister, it must be a pretty important reason... Go see #p2152004##k, who is serving as a member of the Resistance in the #bUnderground Base#k, and find out what the real reason is.

The reason #p2152004# can't keep the promise she made to #p2152009# is because she's so busy serving as a member of the Resistance. Even if she wanted to explain herself to her sister, she's torn, because she has to keep her identity a secret. #p2152004# still wants to apologize in any way she can, so she writes a letter to her sister. Hopefully, #b#p2152009##k will understand...
#p2152009# thanked you for delivering the letter and said she would read it.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need Some Fresh Air
#b#p2152005##k the part-timer seems to be in pain. Find out what happened.

#p2152005#'s suit makes breathing difficult. You wonder why the suit has to be on at all times... Help #p2152005# find a #t4032763#. A doctor like #p2152004# should have a #t4032763# handy... Go talk to #b#p2152004##k.
When you tell #p2152004# about the situation #p2152005# is in, he shakes his head at the foolishness.

string.name: name
string.value: Finding an Oxygen Respirator
As a favor to #p2152005#, ask #b#p2152004##k for a #t4032763#.

#p2152004#, shaking his head at the situation, says he will give you a #t4032763# if you can retrieve a #b#t4032754##k from the #r#o2150001##k for him.
#i4032754# #t4032754# #b#c4032754# / 40#k
#p2152004# looked inside the #t4032754#.

string.name: name
string.value: I Am the Council President
#b#m310000000##k's new Council President #b#p2152007##k gave you an order.

#p2152007# says everyone started hating him once he became the new Council President. He says they gossip about him and that they need to be watched. He asks that you bring #b#t4000604##k from #r#o2150003##k...
#i4000604# #t4000604# #b#c4000604# / 60#k
#p2152007# said he can keep an eye out for people who gossip about him using the #t4000604#.

string.name: name
string.value: This is Just a Mission
#b#m310000000##k's watchman #b#p2152018##k needs a hand.

#p2152018# says the #r#o2150003##k right outside of the town is creating problems. He needs you to eliminate #o1150000#, so that it can be replaced with a new #o1150000#. #p2152018# doesn't seem happy about the choice he's had to make...
#o2150003##r #a239371##k
#p2152018# was getting ready to switch the #o2150003#, but he looked troubled.

string.name: name
string.value: Nothing is More Important Than Money
#b#m310040000##k's watchman #b#p2153000##k needs something.

#p2153000# was a resident of #m310000000#, but became a Black Wing watchman for money. On top of that, #p2153000# earns extra money by selling the batteries inside #r#o3150000##k... Find some batteries for #p2153000#.
#i4032764# #t4032764# #b#c4032764# / 40#k
When you gave #p2153000# the #t4032764#, he laughed villainously. You hope #p2153000# has a good explanation for that...

string.name: name
string.value: Ready to Enter
Talk to #b#p2153003##k, who is hiding in #b#m310040200##k.

#p2153003# looks just like #p2152008# back home, but acts completely different. He came to the Mine to rescue #p2154004#, but can't enter because of the gatekeeper... He tells you he would charge inside if he had a shield that could protect him. Find a #b#t4032765##k from #r#o3150001##k for #p2153003#.
#i4032765# #t4032765# #b#c4032765# / 10#k
#p2153003# was very happy to receive the #t4032765# and said he was ready to immediately charge the gatekeeper. You wonder if #p2153003# will succeed...

string.name: name
string.value: Those Punks Annoy Me
#b#m310000000##k's impatient old man #b#p2152010##k is displeased with something.

#p2152010# tells you he's reminded of the nightmare he used to have when he worked at the Mine a long time ago, and he wants you to eliminate the #r#o7150000##ks.
#o7150000##r #a239451##k
When you told him that you eliminated all the #o7150000#s, #p2152010# was extremely happy. You don't know why he hates #o7150000#s so much...

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Proposition

You try to enter the Mine, but are stopped by the gatekeepers. You must be a member of the Black Wings and have permission to enter. Just when you think there's no other way, someone offers you a proposition...

You try to enter the Mine, but are stopped by the gatekeepers. You must be a member of the Black Wings and have permission to enter. Just when you think there's no other way, #p2153000# says he has a proposition for you. Talk to #b#p2153000##k.
#p2153000# looks like he's a Black Wing watchman. You wonder what kind secret proposition he could have in mind...

string.name: name
string.value: Purchasing a Disguise
You wonder what kind of secret proposition #b#p2153000##k could have. Talk to him and find out.

#p2153000#, part of the Black Wing management, says he'll sell you his #b#t1003134##k. With his hat, the gatekeepers will surely let you in. He wants #b100000 mesos#k for it.
#b100000 mesos#k
You received the #t1003134#. #p2153000#, laughing, said he'll sell you another if you ever need it. He really is an unpleasant man, but at least you can enter the Mine now.

string.name: name
string.value: How is My Father?
#b#p2154004##k, the girl at the #b#m310050000##k in the Mine, has a favor to ask.
#p2154004# tells you it's been so long since she was captured, and she's curious about how her father is doing. She asks you to deliver a letter to her father. Deliver #t4032767# to #b#p2152006##k.
You delivered the #t4032767# to #p2154004#'s father #p2152006#, the former Council President.

string.name: name
string.value: Crime Prevention System Inspection
#bAndroid #p2154003##k, who protects the #b#m310050100##k in the Mine, has something for you. Talk to #p2154003#.

#p2154003# wants you to inspect the #bCrime Prevention Systems#k to make sure they are working properly. You can inspect them simply by using a normal attack on the Crime Prevention Systems. Go to the #bIntruder Search Warrant 3#k.
#o9300420##r #a239491#
#p2154003# thinks that the Crime Prevention Systems are perfectly fine and is satisfied with them. However, because he's an Android, he doesn't show any emotions.

string.name: name
string.value: Another Method
You wonder if #p2153003# went into the Mine to rescue #p2154004#. Go to the #b#m310040200##k one more time.

It seems like he used the Rock Shield to enter, but failed to get past the gatekeeper. #p2153003# is still looking for a way to enter the Mine. According to the rumors, there is someone who sells #bhats that can disguise people as Black Wings#k. Find a #t1003134# for #p2153003#.
#i1003134# #t1003134# #b#c1003134# / 1#k
When #p2153003# received the #t1003134#, he said he'll sneak into the Hideout and bring #p2154004# with him. Then, in the cockiest way possible, he said to prepare a welcome party for his return.

string.name: name
string.value: An Attempt to Escape
#p2153003# must have successfully entered the Mine. Talk to #b#p2153003##k in #b#m310050000##k.

#p2153003# says he was able to enter with the help of the #t1003134#, but couldn't bring #p2154004# with him because #p2154005# is guarding her. He says he'll be able to rescue #p2154004# if you distract #b#p2154005##k to buy him some time... Eliminate the #r#o6150000##k, show #p2154005# the #b#t4000608##k, and tell him there seems to have been an intruder.
#i4000608# #t4000608# #b#c4000608# / 30#k
You brought #p2154005# outside!

string.name: name
string.value: I Can't Escape
You went outside with #p2154005#, but you don't know if he fell for your trick. Talk to #b#p2154005##k.
#p2154004#, who was supposed to escape while you keep #p2154005# busy, has not escaped yet. There must be some reason that's stopping her... Ask #b#p2154004##k.
If #p2154004# escaped, the Black Wings would take revenge on the entire town. #p2154004# decided to stay back, so that the Black Wings wouldn't hurt the town.

string.name: name
string.value: Gabrielle's Request
#b#p2154004##k, who is being held hostage at the #b#m310050000##k in the Mine, says she has something she'd like to test.

#p2154004# says she would like to help the town any way she can while being held hostage. Lately, she's been eavesdropping on the Black Wings' conversation and collecting information. According to what she's heard, #r#o7150004##k has a built-in chip, and by studying this chip, she says the Black Wings' technology can be revealed. As a favor to #p2154004#, find #b#t4032768##k and take it over to #b#p2152018##k.
#i4032768# #t4032768# #b#c4032768# / 20#k
#p2152018# was surprised to receive the #t4032768#, but still seemed determined.

string.name: name
string.value: Please Help Us Clean Francis's Room
#bBlack Wings' secretary #p2154002##k at the #b#m310050000##k in the Mine is swamped with work. Talk to #p2154002#.

#p2154002#, the Black Wing secretary, takes care of every trivial thing to prepare those who return from business trips. #p2154002# says Francis's room is a mess, and she would like you to eliminate Francis's Dolls, which have been acting up. #bEnter Francis's room located to the left#k and take care of the Dolls.
#o9300416##r #a239541##k
You eliminated all of Francis's Dolls. You hope Francis won't be upset... #p2154002# didn't seem worried.

string.name: name
string.value: Please Find Dargoth Some Snacks
Black Wings' secretary #b#p2154002##k at the #m310050000# in the Mine is still struggling with so many things to do. Talk to #p2154002#.

This time, #p2154002# needs a snack for Dargoth. Help #p2154002#, and find Dargoth a snack. Dargoth likes to eat #b#t4000102#s#k found in #r#o4230110##k.
#i4000102# #t4000102# #b#c4000102# / 40#k

When you delivered #t4000102#, #p2154002# was extremely happy. Dargoth can't be a human...no human eats such things.
In any case, the Black Wings don't appear to be all that vicious.

string.name: name
string.value: Please Help Repair Baroq's Wall
Black Wings' secretary #b#p2154002##k at the #m310050000# in the Mine is still struggling with so many things to do. Talk to #p2154002#.

#p2154002# says #p2154000# and #p2154001# destroyed the wall, which must be repaired. However, the #o7150000#s aren't listening, so she wants you to teach the #o7150000#s a lesson. Defeat those #o7150000#s.
#o7150000##r #a239561##k
#p2154002# was really happy that you taught those #o7150000#s a lesson.

string.name: name
string.value: Please Catch Eleanor's Pet
After all that, Black Wings' secretary #b#p2154002##k at the #m310050000# in the Mine still seems to be struggling with so many things to do. Talk to #p2154002#.

#p2154002# says Eleanor's pet escaped its cage and is running around the room. She asks that you catch it and put it back into the cage. She says that first you have to exhaust the pet's strength, then use the item inside the cage to catch the pet. You wonder what kind of pet Eleanor has... Go to Eleanor's room.
#i4032769# #t4032769# #b#c4032769# / 1#k
Eleanor's pet was a giant #t4032769#. After all sorts of struggle, you were finally able to catch the pet. You never figured a secretary's job could be this dangerous!

string.name: name
string.value: Everything is for the Mission
Android #b#p2154003##k, who guards the #m310050100# inside the Mine, needs something. Talk to #p2154003#.

#p2154003# says he wants to upgrade his abilities for his mission and asks that you find the necessary parts. The parts can be obtained by eliminating the #r#o6150000#s#k.
#i4000608# #t4000608# #b#c4000608# / 50#k
Once you delivered the materials, #p2154003# began working on upgrading his system. He lacked the emotions to properly thank you, as with all #o8105003#s. Don't take it personally...

string.name: name
string.value: Warriors Get Hungry, Too
Black Wing management #b#p2154000##k at the #b#m310050100##k in the Mine appears to be extremely hungry.

#p2154000# and #p2154001# only seem to do the work of one person. They don't go on as many business trips, because they prefer training, unlike others in management. Find food for #p2154000#, who has become famished due to heavy training. #r#o7150002##k seems to have the meat #p2154000# wants. #i4032770# #t4032770# #b#c4032770# / 100#k
#p2154000# was very happy with #t4032770#.

string.name: name
string.value: Unpleasant Mechanical Doll
Talk to #bWatchman #p2154006##k who guards the #b#m310050200##k in the Mine.

Watchman #p2154006# says he, too, was in #m310050400#, but left because he didn't want to live next to Androids. #p2154006# apparently hates robots, because they have no real feelings.
He says he's curious whether Androids would get scared of creepy things, so he wants you to catch some #r#o7150001#s#k and show their #bTentacles#k to #bAndroid #p2154007##k.
#i4000610# #t4000610# #b#c4000610# / 80#k
#p2154007# wasn't bothered by the #t4000610# at all.

string.name: name
string.value: I am a Doll With No Feelings
Talk to #bAndroid #p2154007##k at the #b#m310050400##k in the Mine.

#p2154007#, the mechanical doll with no feelings, thrives on bio energy. He says he has to steal energy to #bfill his Energy Cartridge, which activates his heart#k. This time, though, #p2154007# wants you to fill his Energy Cartridge for him... #bThe Energy Cartridge will be automatically filled when you hunt#k.
#p2154007# politely thanked you when you handed him a full Energy Cartridge. Oddly enough, it seemed like #p2154007# didn't really need to fill his Energy Cartridge. You were fooled...

string.name: name
string.value: Please Check on Her
Android #b#p2154007##k at the #m310050400# in the Mine has a favor to ask. Talk to #p2154007#.
#p2154007# is worried about his sister deep inside the cave. He wants you to deliver an Energy Cartridge to #bhis sister#k. First, talk to #p2154007#'s sister...she can be found past #m310060000#.
You met #p2154007#'s sister, #p2154012#. She has even less feelings and emotions than #p2154007#!

string.name: name
string.value: Trivial Tasks are Boring
Talk to #bResearch Intern #p2154008##k at the #b#m310050400##k in the Mine.

#p2154008# says he's extremely bored, because all the fun experiments go to senior researchers, leaving him with only the trivial tasks no one else wants to do. He wants you to be his puppet and put yourself in the abnormal status he names...
If he says Poison, then you get poisoned, and if he says Curse, then you get cursed and come back to him. All the abnormal status potions are in #p2154008#'s laboratory, so go and drink the potion according to the abnormal status he names.
You find this to be a pretty strange way to entertain...
You sacrificed yourself and became whichever abnormal status #p2154008# named. #p2154008# was entertained, but you wondered what was so enjoyable about it...

string.name: name
string.value: Materials for the Experiment 1
#p2154009##k, the Black Wing #bmad scientist at the #b#m310060000##k in the Mine, seems to be conducting a dangerous experiment.

#p2154009# says he needs #b#t4032771#s#k for a new experiment and wants you bring them to him. You can't even imagine what he's going to do with them... Head over to the #b#m310050520##k where the Racaronis can be found.
#i4032771# #t4032771# #b#c4032771# / 10#k
#p2154009# let out a vicious laugh as soon as you give him the #t4032771#s. His experiment doesn't seem very pleasant...

string.name: name
string.value: Materials for the Experiment 2
#b#p2154009##k, the Black Wing mad scientist at the #m310060000# in the Mine, seems to be conducting another iffy experiment.

#p2154009# says he needs #t4032772#s for a new experiment and wants you bring them to him. His last experiment seemed so cruel... you wonder what he's up to this time. Go over to the #b#m310050510##k.
#i4032772# #t4032772# #b#c4032772# / 10#k
#p2154009# seemed satisfied with the #t4032772#s and continued with his experiment. It seems like his experiments are getting more dangerous.

string.name: name
string.value: Materials for the Experiment 3
#p2154009#, the Black Wing mad scientist in #m310060000#, is starting another experiment. You shiver just thinking about it...

#p2154009# says he needs #b#p2154012#'s Heart#k for his experiment. You worry what will happen to #p2154012# if she doesn't have a heart... Can she function? #p2154009# doesn't seem to care at all...
#i4032773# #t4032773# #b#c4032773# / 1#k
You gave #p2154009# the spare heart. #p2154009# knew you didn't find the two hearts yourself, but he didn't care.

string.name: name
string.value: Zechtok-2000's Feelings
You were given a mission to steal #p2154012#'s Heart. But, while you debate yourself and get anxious, you see someone walking toward you.

#p2154007# in #m310050400# says he is willing to give you his heart in place of #p2154012#'s. But, without a heart, #p2154007# won't be able to function, either... When you tell him that, #p2154007# says #p2154003# promised to make him a heart, so he has nothing to worry about. Take the #b#t4032774# to #p2154009#, and go to #p2154003# to get #t4032774##k.

#o8105003# #p2154007# in First Square said he was willing to give you his heart in place of #p2154012#'s. But without a heart, #p2154007# wouldn't be able to function, either... When you told him that, #p2154007# said #p2154003# promised to make him a heart, so he had nothing to worry about. Take the #t4032774# to #p2154009#, and go to #p2154003# to get #t4032774#.

string.name: name
string.value: Muscat-2000's Thoughtfulness
Without a heart, #p2154007# stops functioning. To save him, you need the new heart that #p2154003# made. Go to #b#m310050100##k and see #b#p2154003##k.

#p2154003# gave you the heart that he made with his own two hands. He says it lacks energy, because it wasn't made by #p2154009#. Due to its insufficient energy efficiency, you need to take it to #b#p2154007##k after charging enough energy. Like an Energy Cartridge, #bthe energy seems to charge when you hunt monsters#k.
After receiving a new heart, #p2154007# opened his eyes. The #o8105003# siblings, who can't feel any emotions, truly had a strong sibling bond.

string.name: name
string.value: I Think There's a Burglar
Something must have happened to #bResearcher #p2154011##k in #b#m310060000##k in the Mine. Talk to #p2154011#.

#p2154011# says thieves took his research results, and he wants you to eliminate the culprit, #r#o8105000##k. From what you can gather, it doesn't seem like #p2154011# agrees with #p2154009#'s experiment...
#o8105000# #r#a239691##k
You eliminated #o8105000#, which satisfied #p2154011#.

string.name: name
string.value: Can We Really Do This?
#p2154010##k #b the Lead Researcher in #m310060000# in the Mine is struggling with something.

#p2154010# is worried about the growing number of raccoons, not to mention all the other creatures #p2154009#'s experiment is putting in danger. He wants you to check what creatures have been caught by #p2154009# inside the new laboratory. Go all the way to the end of the shaft, #bwhere the raccoons are#k.

You found a strange creature in Mine Shaft 3 who had ores decorated on its body. When you told #p2154010#, he was surprised and exclaimed that he didn't expect a Baby Ore Muncher to be captured in there, too. An Ore Muncher is a rare creature that only lives in this shaft and is considered a mystical creature in the city...

string.name: name
string.value: Escape Plans
Since discovering that even #t4032775# was included in #p2154009#'s experiment, #b#p2154010##k is determined to do something.
#p2154010# is determined to release #t4032775# and needs your help. Find the Laboratory Key that #b#o8105001# has#k, #bopen the Laboratory door, and rescue #t4032775##k!
You delivered the #t4032775# to #p2154010#. #p2154010# seemed happy, but said it was too early for him to celebrate.

string.name: name
string.value: Erasing the Trace
Although you rescued the #t4032775#, it's not entirely over yet. You have one more thing to do. Talk to #b#p2154010##k.

#p2154010# says everything that you and he have done is probably recorded on #r#o8105001#s#k, and the records must be deleted. He says you must eliminate at least #b300#k of them to make sure all the records have been deleted from the #o8105001#s...
#o8105001##r #a239721##k

You defeated all the #o8105001#s. You hope the #t4032775# will be okay now... Fortunately, #p2154010# volunteered to look after the #t4032775#. He said everything will be over if #p2154009# finds out, but he believes he can handle it on his own. He deserves a round of applause for his dedication!

string.name: name
string.value: Defeating the Broken Security System
#bAndroid #p2154012##k in #b#m310060000##k in the Mine seems to have something to say. Talk to #p2154012#.

#p2154012# wants to eliminate #o8105001#, because it is now broken and useless. Help #p2154012# defeat the #r#o8105002##k.
#o8105002##r #a239731##k
You eliminated the #o8105002# with #p2154012#. But #p2154012# didn't thank you for your help at all. She really has no feelings whatsoever...

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Failure 1
The Black Wing mad scientist #b#p2154009##k in #m310060000# in the Mine is looking pretty unpleasant. Talk to #p2154009#.
#p2154009# says his experiments aren't going smoothly because there have been too many failure Androids. He wants you to tell #b#p2154012##k to eliminate the #o8105004#.
You told #p2154012# to eliminate the #o8105004#.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Failure 2
You delivered #b#p2154009##k's order to #p2154012#. But, #p2154012# just stood there with no expression on her face.

#p2154012# cannot eliminate the failures, because the thought of it makes her too depressed. Although #p2154012# seems to have no emotions, she cannot eliminate the #o8105004#, who is like her sibling. Help #p2154012#, and do the job for her.
#o8105004##r #a239751##k
#p2154012# thanked you for your help.

string.name: name
string.value: Maplemas Surprise Party!
There's an awesome Maplemas party going on in Happyville!
Extra extra! Happyville is holding an amazing party for Maplemas! For more details, please go see Rooney.
I talked to Rooney about the impending Maplemas party. Apparently it's a dress-up party, so I better go talk to Cliff about a possible potion for transformation.

string.name: name
string.value: In Preparation for the Party
I better go see Cliff so I can attend the party that takes place in Happyville.
I have to gather up 50 Rascal's Snowflakes in order to receive the special potion required to transform.
Now that I am ready to dress-up and transform, it's time to party!

string.name: name
string.value: In Preparation for the Party
I better go see Cliff so I can attend the party that takes place in Happyville.
I have to gather up 50 Rascal's Snowflakes in order to receive the special potion required to transform.
Now that I am ready to dress-up and transform, it's time to party!

string.name: name
string.value: A Secret Note
A secret note came from the Snow Spirit of Happyville. I wonder what happened?

I finally realized the true intent of the Snow Spirit as she strives to protect Happyville from disaster. In order to ruin Scrooge's plan, she asked Alcaster of El Nath for some much needed help. I better go find him immediately!
I gave Alcaster a note from Snow Spirit. Now it's time for me to wait for his reply.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcaster's Reply
Alcaster says he has something for Snow Spirit.
He handed me a reply letter to Snow Spirit, a note that contains the exact method we should take to defeat Scrooge. I better go see her right now!

I gave the Snow Spirit Alcaster's reply letter. She stood quietly for a moment, then gave me something called Force of the Spirit, which she said was the key to defeating Scrooge. What exactly is this?

string.name: name
string.value: Save the Snowman!
Scrooge seems to have started putting his plan into reality. I better go see Snow Spirit.
Protect the snowman from Scrooge and his men!
I was able to protect the symbol of luck here in Happyville, the giant snowman. That really made my day.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Pirate

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Pirate
The wife of a sailor, eh? I'll bet she needs some help.

I spoke with the lovely Angelique, and I'm going to deliver #b25 Soft Feathers#k to her husband, Richard, for her. He works on Tae Gong's ship in Aqua Road. Once I have everything, I'll head there, drop everything off, and let Angelique know her husband has everything.
I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

string.name: name
string.value: Discovering Secrets

string.name: parent
string.value: The Terror of MV!
Charles the Adventurer prepared something for all Maplers... Let's go find him.
Charles has asked us to get 7 secret letters. Charles said we can find them in a pile of stones. Where should we start to look? \n\n#i4032118# #t4032118# #b#c4032118#/7#k
You've accomplished your job and gained EXP and 1500 mesos. You can move on to the next quest!

string.name: name
string.value: MV's Treasure
Lara is looking for a brave adventurer who wants to prove their strength and courage by a dangerous task--finding MV's Treasure.
Lara asked me to find MV's Sabre in MV's Treasure Dungeon. She said that many monsters are guarding the treasure so I should be prepared. \n\n#i4032119# #t4032119# #b#c4032119#/1#k
Lara was really happy when I gave her MV's Sabre, and she gave me a nice gift in return.

string.name: name
string.value: A Headache for Treasure Hunters
Lara has a new source of trouble recently. Let's visit her and find out what's troubling her.

Now I need to take some action. Let's show them who's boss! For Lara! 

#o9400741# #r#a281101##k
#o9400742# #r#a281102# #k
#o9400743# #r#a281103##k
I've done a perfect job with what Lara asked, she is now happy again!

string.name: name
string.value: Cool as Ice
I think it's about time Icebyrd gave me some answers...I should go speak with him.
I've spoken with Icebyrd, and he seems cryptic-what is he hiding?

Icebyrd has revealed the truth to me at last-he was contacted by Subani to establish New Leaf City as well as anchor Masteria to the Maple World. He was sworn to secrecy, and to this day, can never leave the continent. It appears that Subani and Icebyrd are the first line of defense against the demonic Naricain, and by defeating his Twisted Masters; I am now his enemy as well. He also mentioned that our adventures here have just begun...with the Twisted Masters out of the way, what's next? Perhaps answers lie within the #bKrakian Jungle#k, and the mysterious city there...only time will tell!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: 4 Year Anniversary Cake
I finished the birthday cake for #rMapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary#k! \nI should take the cake to #b#p9000021##k.
I finished the birthday cake for #rMapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary#k! \nI should take the cake to #b#p9000021##k.
I delivered the finished cake to #b#p9000021##k. He was so thrilled as if it were his own birthday... I wonder what the connection is between #p9000021# and MapleStory?

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of the Miwok Artifact
I heard Kopee Relicseeker is looking to find the #bMiwok Artifact#k. Let's go ask Kopee Relicseeker what she's after.
Kopee Relicseeker and Toh Relicseeker say they are looking for Miwok Artifacts that have been lost. Let's acquire the #bMiwok Artifact Piece#k from the monsters and take them to her.
Kopee Relicseeker was so happy to find a sign of the Miwok Artifact. She and Toh Relicseeker said they would stay for a while and further search for the Miwok Artifact.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Tribal Ring: Circle of Ancient Thought
Happy to have found the remnant of the Miwok Artifacts, Kopee says she has something to tell me. Let's go and see her.
Kopee offered to make me a Legendary Tribal Ring using the belongings of her Miwok ancestors! I should collect every artifact I find and take my findings to Kopee.

Kopee, using the ancestors' belongings, made me a ring. I received a Circle of Ancient Thought from her! She told me she'd make me one every time I bring her an artifact. I'd better take what I find to Kopee.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Tribal Ring: Circle of Ancient Strength
Happy to have found the remnant of the Miwok Artifacts, Kopee says she has something to tell me. Let's go and see her.
Kopee offered to make me a Legendary Tribal Ring using the belongings of the Miwok ancestors! I should collect every artifact I find and take my findings to Kopee.

Kopee, using the ancestors' belongings, made me a ring. I received a Circle of Ancient Strength from her! She told me she'd make me one every time I bring her an artifact. I'd better take what I find to Kopee.

string.name: name
string.value: Soft and Cozy Chief's Chair
Kopee says she'll make a nice chair for the person who has released the seal of the #bMiwok Artifact#k. Let's go talk to her.

Kopee says that she'll make you a #bMiwok Chief's Chair#k as a token of her appreciation for your help. She says if I go and talk to Toh Relicseeker and release the seal of the #bMiwok Artifact#k 20 times using the #bEnchanted Scroll#k, she'll make me the chair. It's a great opportunity for me to receive a reward and the Chief's Chair from the Miwok Artifact.
Kopee gave me a Miwok Chief's Chair as a gift, thanking me for finding the Miwok Artifact. It's an impressive chair that is both soft and cozy.

string.name: summary
string.value: Release the seal on the Miwok Artifact 20 times

string.name: name
string.value: The Wandering Alchemist Eurek's New Skill
I hear that #b#p2040050##k over in Sleepywood is working on a way to scroll items without equipping them. I should go see Eurek and see how far along his research is--maybe I can learn how to do it!

I spoke with Eurek and he's perfected his method for scrolling unequipped items. I've agreed to gather some materials for him for a trip he's taking. I'll need to get #b#p2040050##k everything he needs: 

#t1302013# #b#c1302013#/1#k
#t2043000# #b#c2043000#/1#k
#t2040000# #b#c2040000#/1#k
#t2040400# #b#c2040400#/1#k
#t2040600# #b#c2040600#/1#k
#b1,000,000 mesos. I can't wait for him to show me how to perform this new skill!

I returned with the materials that #b#p2040050##k asked for and learned how to use scrolls on unequipped items! Eurek also mentioned that in his travels, he'd heard rumors of a powerful monster residing somewhere in Leafre--even stronger than Zakum.

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Week Event - September 29th
#b#p9010010##k apparently has a special gift in celebration of the new school year...
#b#p9010010##k says that the gift will be mine if only I can keep the candle from blowing out for 1 hour. How exciting!
I received the #bTeleport Rock#k as a gift! This should come in handy if ever I'm trying to go somewhere that's difficult to get to.

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Week Event - September 28th
I think #b#p9010010##k has something special for me.
#b#p9010010##k says I can trade in a scroll for a scroll cast with her magic spell, which will increase my Success Rate by 5%. I should think about this one, since I can only trade 5 times today.
#b#p9010010##k has given me a scroll with a higher success rate in return. She has a kind heart.

string.name: name
string.value: Advanced Training 1
#b#@9201119:#k in #b#m102000000##k says he'll begin the first training.

#b#@9201119:##k's first training requires you to hunt #r#o1110101#s#k.\n\n They can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k. Let's report to #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have completed #b#p9201119##k's first training!

string.name: summary
string.value: Monster Hunt

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,600 Able to proceed to 'Reporting the Training Results' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Advanced Training 2
#b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he'll begin the second training.

#b#@9201119:##k's second training requires you to collect #r#t4000005#s#k.

 #r#o1110101#s#k drop #r#t4000005#s#k.

 #r#o1110101##k can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k.

string.value: Drought in Perion
#b#@1022000:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he has a favor to ask. Let's go see him.

#b#m102000000##k gets its water from other regions, as it has always been a region of very little moisture.

But as of late, the water supply has been cut off, resulting in a drought across Perion.

Go talk to #b#@9201120:##k, the plumber in #b#m103000000##k.
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says there might be a problem with the Water Pipe.

#b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k needs help investigating the incident. Let's talk to him.

He suggests you go to #b#m104040002##k and investigate the area. He says the monsters nearby may have consumed it, so you might be able to find some sort of clue if you continue to hunt them.

20 #rLeaves#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k.)
5 #rFlints#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k.)

Report back to #b#@9201119:##k in #bPerion#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@9201119:##k in #bPerion#k says you must inform #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k of this.

string.value: Exp 4,500 Able to proceed to 'A Burglar Demon' as next quest.

string.value: A Strange Burglary Case
#b#@9201119:##k in #bPerion#k says you must inform #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k of this.
Let's go find #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k and tell him what the demon looks like.
You discovered that a demon named #rValefor#k was behind the burglary case in #bEllinia#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'Returning to Kerning City' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Returning to Kerning City
#b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k says #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k must be notified of this creature at once. Let's talk to #b#@1032001:##k.
#rValefor#k, who was sealed in #bKerning City#k, is a demon infamous for stealing from people.\n\nLet's inform #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k.
You have told #b#p1052001##k in #bKerning City#k about the demon.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2500 Able to proceed to 'The Demon Likes...' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Demon Likes...
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he needs a valuable item that can be used as a bait to catch #rValefor#k. Let's talk to him.
You need a valuable bait to lure #rValefor#k. Go talk to #b#@1052102:##k in the #bSubway Entrance#k of Kerning City.
In order to find something valuable to use as bait to catch Valefor, you were told to find #b#p1052102##k in #bKerning City#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'Shumi, the Coin Mania' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi, the Coin Maniac
#b#@1052102:##k in #bKerning City#k says she is willing to give you an item that looks valuable, though she can't just give it to you for free. Let's talk to her first.
Let's catch the #rBubblings#k in the #bSubway of Kerning City#k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1052102:##k in #bKerning City#k upon completion.
You have acquired a big #rModel Coin#k, which you will use as a bait to catch #rValefor#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Catch Valefor!
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says it is time to eliminate #rValefor#k the demon. Let's talk to him.

If you go to #b#m103030200##k, you will find a Demon's Doorway where #rValefor#k is hiding. 

Defeat #rValefor#k!

Report back to #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k upon completion.
You have defeated #rValefor#k whose seal had been broken. But who or what is responsible for the broken seal still remains a mystery.

The #rAncient Bow#k is Solomon's Bow that was used to eliminate the demon. It is said to have been sealed in #b#m101010102##k, so let's head over there.
#b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k says he'd like to restore his lost memory.

The legend of the bow was about #rSolomon's Bow#k. But something seems incomplete.

Initially disappointed at the weak bow, #b#@1022000:##k further did some inspection and found a faded emblem that was once sealed on the bow.

This must mean that the seal of the demon has been broken!

Rush over to #bKerning City#k and talk to #b#@1052001:##k, a very dependable source of information.
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he's discovered the location of the demon, but you can't enter without a certain item. Let's talk to him.

string.value: Unveiling the Map
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he may be able to reveal the white portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k has asked you to bring him #rInk#k (a drop item from #rOctopuses#k) in order to uncover the mystery of the Treasure Map. He says there is a hidden portal that will take you to a location filled with #rOctopuses#k near the yellow barricade in #b#m103010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k upon completion.

The #rDirty Treasure Map#k is covered in Green, Red, and White.

Green was removed from the map using the Slime Eraser.
Red was vaporized by the Flint, and the curse of the animal's blood was released using Ayan Mercury's Microphone.
White, after being sprayed with the special Ink, quickly revealed the map.

The map has finally been completed!

string.name: name
string.value: [Collect] I Need an Umbrella!
#b#@1010100:##k in #b#m100000000##k says she hates getting wet in the rain.

Although usually sunny, #b#m100000000##k has rainy days from time to time. Because #b#@1010100:##k hates getting wet in the rain, she has asked you to bring her some materials with which she can make an umbrella.

Bring 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k after hunting #rGreen Mushrooms#k.
(You can easily find them in the #b#m105050400##k.)

Report back to #b#@1010100:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You have collected 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k for #b#p1010100##k since she said she wanted to make an umbrella.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] The Pigs Are Ruining the Produce!

She says the #rPigs#k are devouring all of the produce and has asked you to hunt them.

Hunt 30 #rPigs#k.

Report back to #b#@1012108:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated the #rPigs#k that were ruining the produce.

string.value: Exp 600

string.name: rewardSummary

You have eliminated the #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that have a red similar to #b#p10502000##k's hair. Seeing how you've done this ludicrous favor for him, it is obvious that you are a very kind and generous person.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Camouflaging Slimes
#b#@1092011:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he has a favor to ask of you.

He says the #rSlimes#k in the forest are so similar to the green leaves that people have trouble telling them apart, which prevents those who are afraid of the monsters from entering the forest.

Eliminate 30 #rSlimes#k. They can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092011:##k in #b#m120000200##k.

The #rSlimes#k in #b#m120000200##k are known to scare people by randomly popping out here and there, and you have eliminated 30 #b#p1092011##ks for #b#p1092011##k in #b#m120000200##k who is terrified of them.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Avoid the Stink
#b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k says he's found additional information on Astaroth.

He has discovered where #rAstaroth#k is, but says no one can reach that place due to the extremely foul odor. However, he has offered to make you a Gas Mask, if you bring him the necessary materials.

15 pieces of #rWild Boar Leather#k, 15 #rEvil Eye's Eyeballs#k, and 30 #rCharm of the Undead#k

Let's report back to #b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k upon completion.
The #rWild Eye's Gas Mask#k has been finished. Oh boy, the mask is stinky. This probably can't be worn unless the outside stink is exponentially worse and absolutely unbearable.

string.name: name
string.value: For the peace of Victoria Island...
The time for battle has arrived. Please visit #bthe Rememberer#k in #bSleepywood.#k

You can reach #rAstaroth#k by going through the door in the #b#m105010000##k. It's filled with a horrible stench, Defeat #rAstaroth!#k Return to #bthe Rememberer#k in #bSleepywood#k once your task is completed.
You defeated the demon #rAstaroth#k, who threatened the peace in Victoria.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Trick or Treat
They say that Cassandra has prepared a fun event in commemoration of the Halloween Season. Would you like to learn more about it?

Cassandra has asked that you bring her 31 Green Halloween Stick Candies. The candies are carried by Monsters during the Halloween season, and Cassandra says that the monsters in the Haunted Mansion have more than others. Who knew that Cassandra had such a craving for sweets, but this should be easy, right?\n\n#i4032444:# #t4032444:# #c4032444# / 31

It's not certain whether Cassandra was happy because she received the candies or because she pulled off a trick... Regardless, it always feels good to help someone, no? You can receive another Halloween task if you return to Cassandra after 1 hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Witch Malady's Secret Mission
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.

string.name: name
string.value: Stinky Seasoned Cursed Frog Eggs and Mushrooms

The basic ingredient for this dish recipe is #bCursed Frog Eggs#k. It also needs #bOrange Mushroom Caps or Horny Mushroom Caps#k. Be sure to look around carefully, as they say that the frogs and cats roam around town when they are hungry. Sure, you might feel a bit wary about eating something that the Witch prepared...but it's not like you'll die, right?
After reciting a strange chant, the Witch makes you a dish that doesn't look too appetizing.

string.name: name
string.value: Dreamy Bloody Mushroom Wine

string.name: name
string.value: Yellow Turkey Egg Hunt
Cody says he has a special request to ask of you in celebration of Thanksgiving. See what it could be!

Cody's been busy collecting #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k in celebration of Thanksgiving! Hunt the #bTurkey Monsters#k that have been appearing around the #rTowns and Mini-Dungeons of Henesys, Kerning City, Perion, Ellinia, and Orbis#k and collect as many #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k as possible for Cody!
Cody says he is truly grateful for your help and is asking you to come back and see him again in 30 minutes. Seems like he's got another favor to request.

string.value: The Object of Professor Foxwit's Interest
Professor Foxwit in NLC has a deep interest in the Turkey Commando's Eye. If you happen to come across any of these eyes, be sure to bring them to Professor Foxwit in NLC.
Professor Foxwit in NLC has a deep interest in the Turkey Commando's Eye. If you happen to come across any of these eyes, be sure to bring them to Professor Foxwit in NLC.
Professor Foxwit in NLC has told me a fascinating story about Turkey Commandos.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 50,000 Meso

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar
Hmm, that woman looks like she's preparing some sort of celebration... I should check it out.

I spoke with Hannah, and she's preparing a Festival of Lights. I've agreed to help her build the Altar by gathering 25 Altar Pieces. She mentioned that the monsters would already have an axe stuck in them, so I should hunt those.
I collected the 25 Altar Pieces and returned to Hannah. She was happy, and began building the Altar. She also mentioned that I could come back for more work when I have a chance

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Presents from Cassandra
Cassandra says she's giving out New Year's presents every day for those who log in. So go visit the ever so generous Cassandra!
What presents has #bCassandra#k prepared?
#bCassandra#k says she will give out a New Year's present every day until January 19th for simply logging in.

#i1112413:# 

You are told to go straight to #b#m140000000##k and meet #b#p1201000##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Hunter's Luck - Week 6

The time between February and March is what many call the prime hunting season! Receive some hunting pointers from Scadur and become the best hunter on the block!#b

<Event Period>
March 22, 2010 - March 28, 2010

<How to Join the Event>
1. Receive the 2x EXP item that Scadur hands out once a week.
2. Use the item when in need of an extra boost of Luck.
3. Hunt away!

<Notes>
1. 2x EXP item will expire at midnight on Sunday.
2. New 2x item will become available the following Monday.

string.name: name
string.value: A Third Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 55, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 55 and tells you that she will give you another scroll when you are ready. Just how many scrolls has #p9010010# prepared? In any case, go to town and meet #p9010010# when you reach Lv. 60.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you an even better scroll if you reach Lv. 70 by #bMay 4#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 60

string.name: name
string.value: A Fourth Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 65, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 65 and tells you that she will give you the scroll she mentioned before when you reach Lv. 70. How will she react after seeing how much the Dragon she called cute before has grown? Go to town and meet with #b#p9010010##k when you are Lv. 70.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 80 by #bMay 4#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 70

string.name: name
string.value: A Fifth Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 75, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#p9010010#, in a sincere voice, congratulates you for reaching Lv. 75 and asks you to reach Lv. 80 to receive the final scroll. Go to town and meet with #p9010010# when you reach Lv. 80.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. #p9010010# says that she has given you everything she could and that all that is left is for you to work hard and believe in yourself.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 80

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master's Treasure Chest
The Administrator says that she will give anyone who hatches a Mini Dragon Egg the chance to obtain some precious treasures.

You can receive the Onyx Dragon Treasure Chest from the Administrator by bringing her all 7 symbols of the Ancient Onyx Dragon. You can find symbols of the Ancient Onyx Dragon inside the Evan Gift Box given by Cassandra.
You received the Onyx Dragon Treasure Chest from the Administrator. Rumor has it that it belonged to an ancient Dragon Master.

string.name: summary
string.value: Collect the 7 symbols of the Ancient Onyx Dragon.

string.name: name
string.value: The Shadow Knight's Request for Help
#p9201144# in #m683010000# needs your help. Go to #m683010000# via the Dimensional Mirror and talk to #p9201144#.
#p9201144# says that he is in need of a Twin Dragon's Egg and asks you to bring one back for him. You'll have to be quick before the mother dragon returns to the nest!

You've brought back a Twin Dragon's Egg for #p9201144#. He thanks you and tells you that you can gain precious treasures from the Twin Dragon's Egg by using a special Incubator found in the Cash Shop.

string.name: summary
string.value: Bring back a Twin Dragon's Egg from Dragon's Nest.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Popularity 3

string.name: name
string.value: Confused Evan
In celebration of the launch of Dragon Master Evan, #rthe Trailblazer Evan event#k is currently running. Go talk to #bCassandra.#k
Collect as many #b#t4001435##ks as you can. You'll get a great reward!\r\n\r\n#b#t4001435##k x 100
So you've finally become a #rConfused Evan#k, eh?

string.value: Beginner Evan

string.name: name
string.value: Evan Trailblazer
