Collect as many #b#t4001435##ks as you can. You'll get a great reward!\r\n\r\n#b#t4001435##k x 3000
You've paved the way for all Evans as a #rtrailblazer.#k

string.name: name
string.value: Evan's Eternal Trailblazer
In celebration of the launch of Dragon Master Evan, #rthe Trailblazer Evan event#k is currently running. Go talk to #bCassandra.#k
Collect as many #b#t4001435##ks as you can. You'll get a great reward!\r\n\r\n#b#t4001435##k x 3000
You've paved the way for all Evans as an #rimportant trailblazer,#k not to mention that you've earned the honorable title too. A title that lasts forever!

string.name: name
string.value: First Evan Launch Gift from the Admin
The Maple Admin has prepared a gift for you to celebrate the launch of Evan. If you're curious about the gift, talk to the Maple Admin.
The Maple Admin has prepared 5 different cash items that look especially good on Evan. You can get the first item from the Maple Admin when you reach Lv. 17.
You have received your first Evan Launch Gift from the Admin.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need to Prove Myself to My Daughter
Uh-oh. Bruce seems to be having a family crisis like he did five years ago. Go to Henesys and lend him a sympathetic ear.
Bruce says that he needs to prove himself to his daughter, Ayan, but can't really do it himself. He needs you to bag #bGhost Stump#ks and fetching #b50 Seedling#ks for him.
Bruce seems to be having a family crisis like he did five years ago.

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a True Mapler
For a year, Neinheart's been unwilling to train anyone who's not a Cygnus Knights. But for MapleStory's 5th Anniversary, he's going to be generous and train all Maplers. Go see him in Ereve.
Neinheart's training you. Training you hard. Prove yourself a worthy Mapler and get #b50 Sea Horse Horns.

string.name: name
string.value: Cakes or Pies?
The Maple Administrator needs help settling an argument between Cake Boss Daniel and Pie Lord Tiara. It's gotten quite out of hand.
You have to help the Pie/Cake faction win their status as this year's MapleStory Anniversary official dessert! Go see Pie Lord Tiara/Cake Boss Daniel.
The Maple Administrator needs help settling an argument between Cake Boss Daniel and Pie Lord Tiara.

string.name: name
string.value: What day is today?
The Maple Admin is giving a quiz.
The Maple Admin is giving a quiz.
To celebrate Canada Day, the Maple Admin gave you a Maple Leaf Paint (Canada).

string.name: name
string.value: What day is today??
Maple admin is giving a quiz.
Maple admin is giving a quiz.
To celebrate Independence Day, the Maple Admin gave you a Star Spangled Paint (USA).

string.name: name
string.value: What the Mama Monkey Stole
Something bad seems to have happened to #p9000079#, a tourist who is sightseeing in the #b#m950100000##k. Talk to #b#p9000079##k.

#p9000079# was upset that a huge #r#o9409012##k stole her cell phones and cameras. Recover #p9000079#'s lost #bCell Phones#k and #bCameras#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. 

#i4032634# #t4032634# #b#c4032634# / 5#k
#i4032635# #t4032635# #b#c4032635# / 5#k

#p9000079# would like to thank you for recovering her items and requests your help in the future if she happens to lose something again. She says she often loses things, so go see her again #bin 1 hour#k.

string.name: name
string.value: White Baby Monkey Making a Mess of the Garden
#p9000074#, a boy monk at the #b#m950100000##k, seems to be worried about something. Talk to #b#p9000074##k.

#p9000074# says that recently, a growing number of #o9409013#s have been entering the temple to break things and loot items. He asks that you teach the #o9409013#s a lesson. Help #p9000074# by eliminating #r100 #o9409013#s#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. \n\n#o9409013##r #a503151##k

You helped #p9000074# by defeating 100 #o9409013#s. Although the #o9409013#s should remain quiet for now, they will probably return soon again to make another mess. Come back #bin 1 hour#k to lend your assistance.

string.name: name
string.value: What the White Mama Monkey Stole
#p9000077#, a fruit seller at the #b#m950100000##k, seems to be very angry. Talk to #b#p9000077##k.

#p9000077# was angry that the #o9409014#s stole the #t4032636#s that he had left out to sell to the tourists. Eliminate the #r#o9409014#s#k and recover #b20 #t4032636#s#k at #p9000077#'s request. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. \n\n#i4032636# #t4032636# #b#c4032636# / 20#k
You eliminated the #o9409014#s and recovered the #t4032636#s. Still, the #o9409014#s have their eyes on the #t4032636#s. Please come back #bin 1 hour#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Goblin Crowns
#p9000076# at the #b#m950100000##k has a wish. Has it come true yet? Talk to #b#p9000076##k.

#p9000076# says that she came here to pray so that her wish might come true. Unfortunately, despite the long time she has spent in prayer, her wish has yet to be fulfilled. She says that maybe she should offer something. Defeat the #r#o9409015#s#k and bring her some #b#t4000577#s#k. You can enter the Goblin Cave by talking to #b#p9000075##k. 

#i4000577# #t4000577# #b#c4000577# / 50#k
#o9409015##r #a105861##k

You defeated the #o9409015#s and delivered the #t4000577#s to #p9000076#. Wait #b1hour#k to see if her prayers have had any effect, then come back to see her. She may want to offer something else if her wish doesn't come true.

string.name: name
string.value: Threat of the Red Goblins
#p9000073# at the #b#m950100000##k has a very grave concern. Talk to #b#p9000073##k.

#p9000073# seems to be worried about people being victimized by the #o9409016#s. For the safety of others, please eliminate the #r#o9409016#s#k and recover their #baxes#k. Talk to #b#p9000075##k to enter the Goblin Cave. 

#i4000576# #t4000576# #b#c4000576# / 50#k
#o9409016##r #a284291##k
You eliminated the #o9409016#s and recovered a good number of their axes. Still, these probably aren't enough. Come back again #bin 1 hour#k to eliminate some more Goblins.

string.name: name
string.value: Corruption of Morals: Strong Stone Goblin
#p9000072# at the #b#m950100000##k looks very upset. What could be the problem? Talk to #b#p9000072##k.

#p9000072# says that the influx of tourists has corrupted the morals and culture of the village. As evidence, he mentioned the outfit of the #o9409017#s. #p9000072# said that he can no longer put up with the #r#o9409017#s#k walking around in their revealing underwear and asked that you eliminate them. Enter the Goblin Cave by talking to #b#p9000075##k. \n\n#o9409017##r #a503191##k
You eliminated the #o9409017#s, but #p9000072# is worried that #bin just 1 hour#k, they will return again as they were before. Come back later to help #p9000072#.

string.name: name
string.value: Lucky Gift
The Administrator is waiting for you.
She says that the item is currently being made.
You received a Lucky Gift from the Administrator.

string.name: name
string.value: How to find friends
The Maple Administrator says she wants to tell you how to find friends.
Try finding friends to make your MapleStory experience even better!
Hooray! You've added a friend. Make more friends to enrich your MapleStory experience.

string.name: name
string.value: How to find friends
The Maple Administrator says she wants to tell you how to find friends.
Try finding friends to make your MapleStory experience even better!
Hooray! You've added a friend. Make more friends to enrich your MapleStory experience.

string.name: name
string.value: The 2nd Gachapon Stamp event is in progress!
The Maple Admin has detailed information regarding the 2nd Gachapon Stamp event.
The Maple Admin has informed you that the 2nd Gachapon Stamp event will take place from June 16 to July 14.
The Maple Admin has informed you that the 2nd Gachapon Stamp event will take place from June 16 to July 14.

string.name: name
string.value: Professor Foxwit's New Research Results
Professor Foxwit, who has been working diligently at a high place in NLC, will be presenting the results of his new research. Talk to Professor Foxwit.
According to Professor Foxwit's research on Iruvata, the speediest monster in Neo City, the secret to the monster's speed is in its equipped android gears.
Professor Foxwit explained the new suit and referred you to T-1337, who isn't too far from your current location.

string.name: name
string.value: Making Android Gears
T-1227 has prepared today's mission for you.
T-1227 says that if you successfully complete this mission, you may be able to earn Iruvata Booster.

string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminiscing I
You hear that you can receive help from #b#p1002001##k in Lith Harbor...

You meet #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k says that you remind him of his younger days when he was starting out on his adventures, and he would like to help you. He says first that you need to bring him #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k. For a talented explorer like you, this should be a piece of cake.
You showed your potential to #b#p1002001##k, who you met in Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k recognized your potential and gave you some mesos that should come handy during your adventures.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Diligent Explorer

#b#eTitle Challenge - Diligent Explorer#n\n#kIf I log on for 3 or more consecutive hours for 27 days within the 30 day time limit, I can earn the #e#bDiligent Explorer#k#n title. I should go see the Monk of Honor, Dalair.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Diligent Explorer#n
#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds
 - Today's Play Count : #Dhour#Hours #Dmin#Minutes #Dsec#Seconds / #Dminhour#Hours

#b#eTitle Challenge - Diligent Explorer#n
#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds

The Monk of Honor, Dalair, said diligence is the first criteria of being an explorer and applauded me. Then he gave me the '#bDiligent Explorer#k' title for successfully completing the challenge.

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who's Touched the Sky
Let's aim for the top! Something good will happen if you visit the high-altitude locations around Maple World.
#b#eTitle - The One Who's Touched the Sky#n#k\r\nLet's climb to the top of high-altitude locations in Maple World.\r\n#bReach the #R27018# region from a total of 5 regions.#k
You're #b<The One Who's Touched the Sky>#k. You were able to breathe fresh air at the top of the world while looking down at beautiful, calming views.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer

#b#eTitle Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer#n(Special Title)\n#k#e#bPink Bean Slayer#k#n, the title given to the person who slays the most Pink Beans! Dalair said that if I hunt a Pink Bean but don't report it to him, it won't count.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Pink Bean Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

The person who reports the most Pink Beans hunted to Dalair will receive this title. But, if I give up, I'll have to start all over from zero next time!

#b#eTitle Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Pink Bean Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

The honorable '#bPink Bean Slayer#k' title is given to the one person who slays the most Pink Beans.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Donation King#n(Special Title)\n#kA symbol of wealth and honor that is given to one person: try out for the #e#bDonation King#k#n title! I heard they are choosing Donation Kings to represent each town. I should go see the Monk of Honor, #b#p9000040##k.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Donation King#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Time Left : #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds
 - Donated Amount : #b#jmoney##k Mesos

 At the beginning of each month, the donation record of every town is reset. Dalair said simply donating a large amount of money will not win me this award, but he said I must demonstrate wisdom.

string.value: Wonderful Pet Owner

#b#eTitle Challenge - Wonderful Pet Owner#n\n#kIf you have a pet, see if you can acquire #r1400 Closeness points#k with your pet! Dalair, on behalf of the God of Honor, is looking for passionate and caring pet owners. He says anyone who reaches #r1400 Closeness points#k with a pet will receive the #e#bWonderful Pet Owner#k#n title.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Wonderful Pet Owner#n#k\n\nAcquire #r1400#k Closeness points with your pet.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Wonderful Pet Owner#n#k\n\nYou have received the #bWonderful Pet Owner#k title and the associated medal.

string.value: Acquire 1400 Closeness points with your pet.

string.name: name
string.value: Outstanding Citizen

#b#eTitle Challenge - Outstanding Citizen#n\nParticipate in #k#bMarriage, Guild, and Family#k activities! Dalair, on behalf of the God of Honor, is looking for active citizens. He says anyone who participates in a #bMarriage#k and a #bGuild#k, and #bhas at least 1 Junior#k, will receive the #e#bOutstanding Citizen#k#n title.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Outstanding Citizen#n#k\n Actively participate in Marriage, Guild, and Family activities.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Outstanding Citizen#n#k\n\nYou have acquired the #bOutstanding Citizen#k title and the associated medal.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Be part of a Marriage and a Guild, and register at least 1 Junior.

string.name: name
string.value: Persevering Challenger

#b#eTitle Challenge - Persevering Challenger#n\nClear the #k#bDangerous Dungeon!#k quest. Dalair is looking for adventurers who are thirsty for a challenge. He is giving out the #bPersevering Challenger#k#n title to adventurers who defeat tons of monsters...
#b#eTitle Challenge - Persevering Challenger#n#k\nClear the #bDangerous Dungeon!#k quests of the 3 representative mushrooms in MapleStory.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Persevering Challenger#n#k\n\nYou have acquired the #bPersevering Challenger#k title and the associated medal.

string.name: name
string.value: Endless Journey Medal
Let's go find Cassandra.
Get ready! Maple has another surprise for you! A chance to receive the Maple Lover Medal! Log in to MapleStory for an hour everyday for 15 days to collect the 15-Day Dreamer Medals!
Get ready! Maple has another surprise for you! A chance to receive the Maple Lover Medal! Log in to MapleStory for an hour everyday for 15 days to collect the 15-Day Dreamer Medals!

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Expert

#b#eTitle Challenge - Monster Expert#n\nCollect #k#b30 Monster Cards#k. Dalair, on behalf of the God of Honor, is looking for explorers who know everything there is to know about the monsters in Maple World. He says anyone who collects more than 30 Monster Cards will receive the #bMonster Expert#k#n title.
Collect the Monster Cards, which will help you understand the tendencies, habitats, and dropped items of various monsters. Some cards have special powers that will help you in your adventures.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Monster Expert#n#k\n\nYou have received the #bMonster Expert#k title and the associated medal.

string.value: Honorary Subway Worker

The subway lines in the northern part of Kerning City is about to shut down construction because of monsters. Rescue #e#bMr. Lim#k#n from the abandoned subway station and acquire the title #b<Honorary Subway Worker>#k.

#e#bHonorary Subway Worker title#k#n
* Requirements: Eliminate at least #b10,000 monsters#k on the Abandoned Subway Platform
* Current count: #b#R7762##k
After completing the requirements, see #bMr. Lim#k to receive your medal.

Charity is key to a prosperous life. Acquired the title #b<Lith Harbor Donor>#k.\r\n

string.value: Well Behaved Child
You helped Chief Stan in Henesys and he called you a #bWell Behaved Child#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Perion Guard
You decided to work as a #bPerion Guard#k at the request of Mike who guards the Perion Dungeon Entrance.

string.name: name
string.value: Kerning City Honorary Citizen
You helped Nella clear Kerning City's name and became a #bKerning City Honorary Citizen#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Organization Temporary Member
You passed the Secret Organization admissions test as suggested by the Puppet Left Behind and became a #bSecret Organization Temporary Member#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master
You used the scale you got from Mir to make a #bDragon Master#k medal.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Master
You received a more powerful scale from Mir and made a golden #bDragon Master#k medal.

string.name: name
string.value: Hero's Successor
You went to Afrien and received a medal that was used by Dragon Master Freud. With this, you became recognized as the #bHero's Successor#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Beginner
You have become a member of the Resistance. Although right now you are participating in so-called Special Training, you will defeat the Black Wings someday and restore the town.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Intermediate
You defeated Schiller of the Black Wings, whom you met at the Laboratory a long time ago. Through your missions, you are starting to become a mature member of the Resistance through.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Graduate
You eliminated the Energy Conducting Device that was taking all of the energy in Edelstein. You wonder what the Black Wings are up to now...

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Superior
You rescued the captured Job Instructor and eliminated the Black Wings' new weapon. Continue to train, and you should be able to defeat the Black Wings in the future.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Training Master
You reached Lv. 200, which ends your developmental stage. The Black Wings are still around, though. Drive them out of Edelstein, and know that your battles will continue until Edelstein is restored.

string.name: name
string.value: I'm a Lucky Guyâ˜…
You were selected in the Mechanic Flash Time Event on August 14, 2010 and earned the title of #bI'm a lucky guyâ˜…#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Passing the Quiz
Meet the #b#p9250121##k.

Give the correct answer to the quiz given by the #b#p9250121##k.
Only problem is...
#rÎ”t = [ Î”t0 ] / [ root{ 1 - ( v/c )^2} ]#k is all you can remember.
You made contact with the #b#p9250121##k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Way Home
Talk to #b#p9250122##k, who is getting a lot of attention for being clad in Chemical Protective Clothing.
Escort #b#p9250122##k at the #b#m502010010##k to the OSSS Secret Base. \r\n\r\nTalk to #b#p9250122##k and enter the #b#m502010100##k.
You successfully escorted #b#p9250122##k

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine
#b#p9250125##k is waiting for someone to collect materials for the Time Machine today.

Help #b#p9250125##k build a Time Machine.

If you complete the missions given to you by #b#p9250126##k, you will receive Completion Certificates.

Take all 6 Completion Certificates to #b#p9250125##k.
You spent the day helping #b#p9250125##k build a Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 1: Deep Sea Janitor
#b#p9250126##k is looking for Mainboards, which are needed to build the Time Machine.

Use the OS4 Shuttle located in the OSSS Secret Base 
to travel to the #b#m502010200##k.

You must destroy the Space Ship parts located throughout the deep sea

and bring back 10 Mainboards #b#i04032708:##k.
You retrieved the Mainboards required for the Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 2: Vegetable Oil
#b#p9250126##k is looking for Vegetable Oil needed to build the Time Machine.
Hunt the vegetable monsters in Maple World and bring back 10 containers of Vegetable Oil #b#i04032703:##k.
You collected the Vegetable Oil required for the Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 3: Miner in a Gas Mask
#b#p9250126##k is looking for Fossil Minerals, which are needed to build the Time Machine.

Use the OS4 Shuttle located in the OSSS Secret Base to travel to the #b#m502010300##k.\r\n\r\nDestroy the Fossil Mineral mounds located throughout the mine and bring back 10 Fossil Minerals #b#i04032709:##k.
You brought back the Fossil Minerals required for the Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 4: Carnivorous
#b#p9250126##k is looking for Animal Gas needed to build the Time Machine.
Hunt the animal monsters in Maple World and bring back 10 containers of Animal Gas #b#i04032704:##k.
You collected the Animal Gas required for the Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 5: Why's the Processing Plant so Far?
#b#p9250126##k is looking for someone to deliver all the Time Machine materials to the Processing Plant.
Use the OS4 Shuttle to deliver the materials for the Time Machine to the Processing Plant.\r\n\r\nWhen the shuttle arrives at the Processing Plant, enter the Processing Plant and come back out.
You delivered the materials for the Time Machine to the Processing Plant.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 6: Defend, Defend, Defend!
#b#p9250126##k needs someone to help defend the Processing Plant.
Help Randall defend the Processing Plant.
You successfully helped Randall defend the Processing Plant. Great work!

string.name: name
string.value: Final Visitor
The Visitor Representative turned out to be a #b#p9250124##k.\r\nHow could this be? Go find out.
You heard the entire story from #b#p9250124##k.\r\nYou must now use the Cube Conversion Device at the crashed Mothership entrance to enter Doctor Bing's Cube.
You decided to help #b#p9250124##k stop the Time Machine from being built.

string.name: name
string.value: Preventing the Creation of the Time Machine
#b#p9250124##k is waiting for someone to help stop the Time Machine from being built.
Use the #b#p9250138##k inside #b#m502040000##kand return to the past so that you can prevent the Time Machine from being built.
You helped #b#p9250124##k stop the Time Machine from being built.

string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 1: Good Bye Janitor
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to prevent the collection of Mainboards required to build a Time Machine.
Go to the Deep Sea in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat the #b#o9420069#s#k that are collecting Mainboards.
You prevented the collection of Mainboards, which are required to build a Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 2: Good Bye Miner
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to prevent the collection of Fossil Minerals required to build a Time Machine.
Go to the Mine in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat the #b#o9420070#s#k that are collecting Fossil Minerals.
You prevented the collection of Fossil Minerals, which are required to build a Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 3: Catching Up to Tortoise
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to prevent the delivery of materials to the Processing Plant.
Go to the Underground Passage in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat the #b#o9420073#s#k that are delivering materials for the Time Machine.
You prevented the Time Machine materials from being delivered to the Processing Plant.

string.name: name
string.value: Correcting the Past 4: Destroy, Destroy, Destroy!
Future Doctor Bing is looking for someone to destroy the OS3A machine that is defending the Processing Plant.
Go to the Processing Plant in the past using the #b#p9250138##k and defeat #b#o9420074#s#k, who is commanding the plant's defense.
You stopped #b#o9420074##k, who was defending the Processing Plant.

string.name: name
string.value: Chance for a Counter Attack
Doctor Bing says that he has some big news.\r\nGo see Doctor Bing in his laboratory.
You received information about the Mothership's crash from Doctor Bing.\r\nFind Doctor Bing's forces and head over to the Mothership crash site.
You received information from Wynn, who was analyzing the Mothership at the crash site.

string.name: name
string.value: Melted Chocolate
The chocolate has been melted! The Maple Admin wants to discuss this with you...

string.name: name
string.value: Many a Mickle Makes a Muckle
Collect 9 #b#t3994199#s#k to exchange for any chocolate from the Maple Admin.
You received a chocolate for 9 #b#t3994199#s#k.

string.name: name
string.value: To the Future
If you're ready, talk to #b#p9250125##k.

In order to start Bing Machine - Alpha, you must go to the future and bring back some Crystanol. \r\nUse the Time Machine located in the room next to Doctor Bing and travel to the future. \r\nTo the future! That's pretty crazy...
You're finally able to equip the Bing Machine! Now all that is left is to defeat the aliens.

string.name: name
string.value: To the Energy Laboratory
A Mapler who seems to have arrived before you is hiding amongst the grass.\r\nYou should start a conversation.

You discovered the location of the Crystanol Fragment. You must take the portal to the right of #b#p9250130##k and continue until you reach the Energy Laboratory. If you meet aliens on the way, hide in the grass.
You arrived at the Energy Laboratory. \r\nBut there is an Anti-Theft Laser preventing your approach. What to do?

string.name: name
string.value: How to Enter?
You met another Mapler at the Energy Laboratory. Should you try starting a conversation?
You arrived at the Energy Laboratory but an Anti-Theft Laser is preventing your approach. There is a Teleport Device nearby which may allow you to pass through safely...
The Teleport Device has been turned on! All that is left is to retrieve a Crystanol Fragment and return to the Time Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Crystanol Retrieval
Now that the Teleport Device has been turned on, time to find some Crystanol!
You found a Crystanol Fragment! Now it's time to return to the Time Machine. But before you do that, you should give #b#p9250130##k some detailed information about the Energy Laboratory.
Now, use the Time Machine to return to the present and deliver the Crystanol Fragment to Doctor Bing.

string.name: name
string.value: Equipping the Bing Machine-Alpha.
You've received the Bing Machine-Alpha. But #b#p9250125##k seems to have something he wants to say...
You've received the Bing Machine-Alpha. But #b#p9250125##k seems to have something he wants to say...
Talk to #b#p9250133##k.

string.name: name
string.value: OSSS Mission 2: Protecting the Scientists
Receive an OSSS Mission from #b#p9250133##k.

Protect two scientists hard at work throughout Maple World. When you find a scientist and start a conversation, aliens will appear. You must protect the scientists. You will not be able to do the mission when another Mapler is protecting the scientist.
Receive this mission again after completing the other missions.

string.name: name
string.value: OSSS Mission 4: Retrieving Alien Chips and Spy Cameras
Receive an OSSS Mission from #b#p9250133##k.

The aliens have planted Spy Chips and Spy Cameras inside monsters in Maple World. Retrieve 30 of each so that the aliens can no longer monitor Maple World. You have a chance to obtain Spy Chips and Spy Cameras whenever you defeat monsters in Maple World.
Receive this mission again after completing the other missions.

string.name: name
string.value: Talk to Principal Researcher Bass
Talk to #b#p9250134##k about the Demoralizing Aliens Project proposed by OSSS.
You heard from #b#p9250134##k about the Demoralizing Aliens Project proposed by OSSS.

string.name: name
string.value: United Against Alien Scum!
Talk to #b#p9250134##k about the Demoralizing Aliens Project proposed by OSSS.
Find the friend #b#p9250134##k has chosen and raise their fame.\r\nIf the friend has disappeared, forfeit the quest and start again.
You raised the fame of a friend in Maple World and received a medal.

string.name: name
string.value: OSSS Mission Issued
OSSS is ready to issue a mission. Talk to #b#p9250133##k when you're ready.
Use the Orders given to you by #b#p9250133##k and complete each of the OSSS missions. When you complete the missions, you'll be given #b#t04310004#s#k.
You've completed all of the OSSS missions. If you want to be issued these missions again, talk to #b#p9250133##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Clearing Party Quests

Each time you clear a party quest, OSSS will issue you a #b#t04310004##k. 

Party Quest List:
#b<Moon Bunny>, <First Time Together>, <Ariant Coliseum>, <The Crack of Dimensions>, <Forest of Poison Fog>, <Monster Carnival>, <Monster Carnival 2>, <Remnant of the Goddess>, <Lord Pirate>, <Romeo and Juliet>, <Dragon Rider>#k

Return to #b#p9250134##k after clearing the party quest to receive a #b#t04310004##k.

Just remember that you can only get credit for 1 party quest a day.
You cleared the party quest and received a #b#t04310004##k from #b#p9250134##k.\r\n\r\nHold on to the #b#t04310004##k as it can be used to upgrade the Bing Machine-Alpha and Visitor equipment.

string.name: name
string.value: Demoralizing the Aliens
Show the aliens how many brave Maplers there are in Maple World! For every hour you're online, OSSS will issue you #b#t04310004##k.
Since OSSS will be issuing you #b#t04310004##k every hour you're logged in, you should stay connected and not log off.
You received #b#t04310004##k for staying online for an hour. Good job doing your part to scare away the aliens!

string.name: name
string.value: Is This A Dream?
You're back in the present and the Future Doctor Bing has sent you a message.\r\n(How did he send a message?)

The Future Doctor Bing wants you to meet his present self.
Use the Command Center Warp Capsule #i2030011# to warp to the Omega Sector.

Find Doctor Bing, who is somewhere inside.
Doctor Bing is hard at work and doesn't seem to have any idea what's going on.\r\n\r\n(Yet...)

string.name: name
string.value: Unidentified Spaceship
An unidentified spaceship has crashed in Maple World. Talk to #b#p9250156##k, who is in Henesys, Orbis, Ludibrium, and Omega Sector, and go to the spaceship crash site.

A spaceship presumably belonging to aliens has crash landed in Maple World. An organization called the OSSS seems to be investigating it. Investigate the cube-shaped spaceship and defeat the leader of the aliens before returning to #b#p9250154##k.
You explored the alien cube and defeated the Ultimate Visitor.\r\nBut why do you feel as if you've been here before...

string.name: name
string.value: A White Christmas
A penguin dressed like Santa has appeared in every major town!\r\nFind out what's going on.
A penguin has requested your help.\r\n\r\nGo see if there's a penguin in town dressed like Santa.
Ah, now that the tree is decorated, the holidays feel complete!

string.name: name
string.value: Love Counseling?!
#b#p2005##k says he needs to ask you something. This better not be some weird favor...

#p2005# is helping #b#p20001##k, part of the crew of #b#m60000##k, to find materials for his girlfriend's present. He asked you to get #b3 #t4000003#es#k and hand them to #p20001#. #t4000003#es? Defeat #r#o0130100#s#k to get them. \n\n#i4000003##t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/3
You gave #p20001# the #t4000003#es. #p20001# is going to make a boat.

string.name: name
string.value: Sam's Advice
A kind guy on Maple Island, #bSam#k wants to give you some advice...

Sam taught you #bhow to use AP#k, which you get whenever you get a new level. The investment of AP determines your power (STR), intelligence (INT), agility (DEX), and luck (LUK). It can also increase your HP and MP. \n\nWhoa... Fantastic! You learned a lot thanks to him. Sam said there is one more thing he has to tell you.

Sam said to go to Victoria Island to become a stronger adventurer through a Job Advancement. You can choose from Warrior, Magician, Bowman, and Thief on Victoria Island. Each job has a stat requirement: #bWarriors need STR 35, Magicians need INT 20, Bowmen need DEX 25, and Thieves need DEX 25# k. You should remember that and invest your AP in the proper stats of the job you want!

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Third Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!

After you hunted five Red Snails, Mai says itâ€™s time for even more powerful monsters. She wants you to hunt #r3 Slimes#k and bring back #b1 Squishy Liquid#k. \n\nSlime #r#a10431##k #i4000004# #t4000004# #b#c4000004# #k/1
After successfully hunting Slimes, you obtained the Squishy Liquid and reported to Mai.

string.name: name
string.value: Biggs's Story on Victoria Island.
Go to #bSouthperry#k and meet up with #bBiggs#k to learn more about Victoria Island, like Bari suggests.
Biggs tells you the basics of Victoria Island and advises that you speak with Olaf once you land there. Okay, gotta remember that. #bLith Harbor#k. Meet #bOlaf#k. Okay!
Olaf seemed genuinely happy to meet a new traveler and said if you want to learn more about job advancement, he's your man!

string.name: name
string.value: Cygnus Knights
Neinheart suddenly approaches you...
The Cygnus Knights... Neinheart wonders if you are interested in joining...
The Cygnus Knights... What is that?

Your mission is to clear Stage 1 to enter the tower, enter Stage 2, clear 6 Mysterious Rooms in the tower, and restore the broken Statue of the Goddess. Hopefully, your group can survive Stage 3, where #r#o9300039##k awaits, and rescue the Goddess.

string.name: name
string.value: Forest of Poison Haze

A time in the past where one can travel to through the broken Gate of Time. Fairy of Ellin Forest is awaiting a hero who will one day save the polluted forest. But...should anyone interfere with history?

 - #eTime Limit#n: 30 minutes
 - #eNumber of Participants#n: 3-5 people

From the Time Control Room on top of Helios Tower, you can travel back to the past by passing through the broken Gate of Time.
Another Maple World awaits beyond the gate. It looks like Victoria Island of the past. But, then you see something... A mysterious person is going around polluting Ellin Forest. Of course, you must help! However, no one should interfere with history... Perhaps borrowing Ellin's magic will allow you to save the forest without changing history. Make a #b#t1032060##k by collecting #b#t4001198#, the reward for saving the forest.
#eMission#n
 Complete #r#jcmp# #k
 Fastest Time #b#jmin# #kmin #b#jsec# #ksec ( #jdate# )

 #b#i1032061# #t1032061# #k #r #jhave1# #k
 Record
 #b#jrank# #kRANK 


#eSummary#n
There is a time in the past where one can travel through the broken Gate of Time, and the Fairy of Ellin Forest is awaiting a hero who will save the polluted forest. But, you wonder if anyone should interfere with history...

By transforming into one of the five past heroes who used to protect Victoria Island, you were able to save Ellin Forest. Of course, it is their names that will be recorded in history, but that's fine with you. After all, Ellin promised to remember you.

string.value: Dragon Rider

Go to the #b<Heavenly Doorway>#k and discover the true identity of the #rDragon Rider#k. You should be able to find him if you chase after him, defeating Wyverns on the way by using the #bSoaring#k skill to fly.

 - #eTime Limit#n: 30 min
 - #ePlayers#n: 3 - 6
 - #eRequirement#n: Acquire Soaring skill.

Follow and defeat the #rDragon Rider#k who disappeared near the #b <Heavenly Doorway>#k. You will need to fly there by using the #bSoaring#k skill. Be careful, though! Falling while using the #bSoaring#k skill will cause #bgreater damage than a normal fall#k!

The #rDragon Rider#k was a Halflinger raised by Wyverns after an accident as a child at the Dragon Canyon.

As soon as the game starts, you'll receive 50 #t02270002#s and 5 #t02100067#s. #r#t02270002##k is used to capture the monster with little HP to acquire the Spirit Rock, and #r#t02100067##k is used to steal the competitors' Spirit Rocks.

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Carnival

Monster Carnival, a carnival that celebrates the strongest of the strong!
The party that acquires the most CP (points earned by defeating monsters) in 10 minutes will win. Utilize CP to use skills, monsters, and others to disrupt the other team for possible upsets as well.

 - #eTime Limit#n: 10 min
 - #eTotal#n 
 1) Field 1 Â· 2 : 2-4, Easy
 (Brown Teddy, Block Golem)
 2) Field 3 Â· 4 : 2-4, Medium
 (Toy Trojan, Robo)
 3) Field 5 Â· 6 : 3-4, Hard
 (Rombot, Robo)
 - #eRewards#n: #b#i1122007# #t1122007##k
 (Collect 50 #t04001129# to receive it
 from #p2042000#)

Show everyone how powerful you are by winning the Monster Carnival! Collect #r50 #t04001129#s#k to earn #b#t01122007##k. Use #b#t02041211#s#k to upgrade the necklace.

string.name: name
string.value: Fixing Blackbull's House
You hear that Blackbull in Perion is fixing up his house.

In the dusty town of #m102000000#, you run into an oddly-dressed man named #p1020000#. He needs to fix his house and asks you to help by getting #b10 #t4000003#es#k and #b5 pieces of #t4000018##k. If you do, you'll get a nice shield. You wonder what would happen if you refuse... The man wouldn't eat you or anything, right? At least, you hope not.

You brought #p1020000# of #m102000000# #b10 #t4000003#es#k and #b5 pieces of #t4000018##k so he could fix his house. You received a shield as a reward. With scratch marks and blemishes all over it, the shield looks pretty old. You wonder if it's even usable.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to gather materials to fix Blackbull's house.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 220 #Wprob# #i1092000:# #t1092000:# 1 #i1092001:# #t1092001:# 1 Unlocks 'Building Blackbull's New House' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's Second Challenge

string.name: parent
string.value: Jane the Alchemist

This time, Jane promises to make an even better item, so she needs you to gather #b1 Mushmom Spore, 3 vials of Drake's Blood, 100 Medicine with Weird Vibes, and 30 Malady's experimental frogs#k. She said something about making Power Elixirs, something that restores both HP and MP.
You got Jane the materials she needed. If she does well, you'll get some nice elixirs. If not...er, you're not sure you really want to take what she gives you...

string.name: name
string.value: A Clue to the Secret Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book
Mr. Wetbottom in Sleepywood is going through some hard times.

At a VIP sauna in Sleepywood, you meet a bald man called #bMr. Wetbottom#k. He has a son that ran away from home with an important book. He wants you to find his son and get the book back. He promises a nice sauna robe in return. He also says his son Ronnie hangs out at a tree tunnel near Ellinia. Anyway, is that book more important to him than his son? What kind of a book is it anyway?
You found #bRonnie#k in the tree tunnel, like Mr. Wetbottom requested.

string.name: name
string.value: Don Hwang's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request
You hear that Nella at Kerning City is the one to talk to if you're looking for work...

You give Nella 1000 mesos as commission for telling you about various requests from the citizens of Kerning City. The first request is to get materials for Don Hwang, the owner of the armor shop. You must find #b5 #t4000042#s#k and #b5 #t4000035#s#k that Wraiths are known to drop. It won't be too hard, since you can easily find Stirges and Jr. Wraiths at the Subway.

You delivered what Don Hwang asked for and you got bunch of lemons in return. You wonder what kind of armor Don Hwang will make. Nella said there are many more requests you can do. You should visit Nella every once in a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request
You got a second request from Nella. Shumi wants to make a house for her little puppy. To make a puppy house, she needs #b5 Processed Woods#k and #b5 Screws#k. You need to get those ASAP.
You delivered what Shumi asked for and you got bunch of cakes in return. Now, Shumi's little puppy has her own house. Return to Nella for another gig.

string.name: name
string.value: Andre's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request

You got a third request from Nella. Andre from the Hair Salon wants some Seafood Soup. You should get #b15 Octopus Legs#k and #b1 Pure Water#k.

#i4000006# #t4000006# #b#c4000006##k/15
#i2022000# #t2022000# #b#c2022000##k/1
You delivered what Andre asked for and got a glove in return. You hope he enjoys his hearty bowl of Seafood Soup. Return to Nella for another gig.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Faymus's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request

Nella says that you look much stronger. She wants you to get some ingredients for Dr. Faymus, the owner of the potion shop. He needs #b10 Jr. Necki Skins#k. Taking on Jr. Neckis might be little tough, but you know you can handle it!
You delivered what Dr. Faymus asked for and got bunch of white potions in return. You wonder what kind of potion Dr. Faymus will make using those materials. Return to Nella for another gig.

string.name: name
string.value: Chris's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request

You got another request from Nella. Chris's pillow was stolen a few days ago and now he can't sleep. To make a new pillow, he needs #b10 pieces of Leather#k. You should get them as soon as possible, so Chris can get some sleep!


#i4000021# #t4000021# #b#c4000021##k/10
You delivered what Chris asked for and got some refined steal and bronze. Chris can finally sleep well in his new pillow. Return to Nella for another gig.

string.name: name
string.value: Cutthroat Manny's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request

You got another request from Nella. Cutthroat Manny needs to get #b20 Evil Eye Tails#k so he can make a nice dinner of Evil Eye Stew. Now, that sounds delicious...in a gross, disgusting, putrid type of way!\n\n#i4000007# #t4000007# #b#c4000007##k/20
You delivered what Cutthroat Manny asked for and got a pair shoes in return. Now... Cutthroat Manny doesn't have to worry about his dinner menu for a while. Return to Nella for another gig.

string.name: name
string.value: Luke the Security Man's Wish to Travel
You hear that Luke the Security Guy made up his mind on something...

You meet Luke at the entrance of the dungeon again. The Snake Drink from before is all gone, because his mom drank it all... Luke is definitely ready to quit the boring life of a security guard and wants to travel. In order to make a glove fit for traveling, Mr. Smith of Perion suggested #b1 Black Feather, 3 Orihalcon Plates, 30 Dragon Skins, 10 Screws, and 3 Horns of Taurospear!#k And, of course, he probably wants you to collect them for him. Luke says that the fairies in Ellinia may know something about the feather...

#i4011005# #t4011005# #b#c4011005##k/3
#i4000046# #t4000046# #b#c4000046##k/3
#i4000030# #t4000030# #b#c4000030##k/30
#i4003000# #t4003000# #b#c4003000##k/10
#i4031042# #t4031042# #b#c4031042##k/1

I got Luke all the materials he needed for the nice glove, and return, he gave me a very precious item that has been passed down from generation to generation, an #bold bronze normal Helm#k. I feel like I'm losing out on this deal...but I can't get mad at him since it's been passed down from generation to generation. I heard Mr. Thunder can make this helmet even better...I should go there sometime later.

string.name: name
string.value: First Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.
Go meet Ronnie in the woods in Ellinia.

Ronnie from the forest of Ellinia asked you to gather up materials to build a house for newborn fairies. #b50 of each of the following: Orange Mushroom Caps, Leaves, Squishy Liquid, and Red Snail Shells each#k ... You can get most of these from the monsters around the prairie.
You got all the items Ronnie requested, but when do you get rewarded for this? What? How many more times do you have to do this?

string.name: name
string.value: Third Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.

This time Ronnie wanted #b50 each of Drake's skull, Stone Golemâ€™s pieces of rock, the skin of Croko, and Lupin's banana#k. I can probably get those from the monsters at the ant hole, prairie, and at swamp...this is getting quite difficult now...
I got them all for Ronnie. I'm still not getting anything?? How many more times do I have to do this??

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Second Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya

This time Maya wanted #b50 each of Fireboar teeth, Bubbling's huge bubbles, pig ribbons, and tablecloths#k. Apparently, I can get those by hunting down the monster around the plateau, subway station, and prairies ... well, that's easy!
I got them all for Maya. Please don't tell me she wanted all these for free...

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Third Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya

This time, Maya requested #b10 Lupin Dolls and 50 each of Cold Eye's tail, Tortie's shell, and Iron Hog's Steel Hoof#k. Apparently I can get those through monsters at the highland, beach, and prairie. This is getting harder now...
I got them all for Maya. I'm still not getting anything?? How many more times do I have to do this??

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Last Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya

Maya requested, for the last time, #b50 each of Clang's claws, Dark Stone Golemâ€™s pieces of rock, the eyes of Wild Kargo, and Tauromacis's horns, along with one diamond#k. Apparently I can get those through monsters at the beach, deep forest, and deep into the Cursed Temple... this is RIDICULOUS! It's too hard!

I got all the items Maya requested for the last time...or is it? As a sign of appreciation, she gave me a pair of shoes her grandma made for Athena Pierce, the chief of this town. It may be really old, but it still looks solid like brand new!!

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for the Red Cape

string.name: parent
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend
Let's go to Pia in Henesys

I ran into that same teddy-bear-costume-wearing Pia at the Henesys Park. I did her a favor and took care of the blue mushrooms before. This time, she wants to make a present for a friend in Ellinia who wants to go out on a journey. The claw that she wants to make for her consists of #b15 silver plates, 50 dragon skins, and 40 screws#k...and for the friend, she also wanted me to get back the #bRed Cape#k that Rina of Henesys borrowed. If I get her all these...am I going to be richly rewarded?
I decided to go to Rina to get the #bRed Cape#k back, which she has borrowed from Pia.

string.name: name
string.value: Reawakening the Gladius

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji's Old Gladius

You find Chrishrama of Sleepywood and show him the #bOld Gladius#k that Manji gave you. He claims to have made it himself... He says that he needs #b1 Star Rock, 1 Piece of Ice, 1 Ancient Scroll, and 1 Flaming Feather#k to awaken it. Unfortunately, you've never heard of any of those items and have no idea where to get them... Chrishrama says that Mike, who guards the entrance of the dungeon, may know how to obtain them.

#i4001006##t4001006# #b#c4001006##k/1
#i4021009##t4021009# #b#c4021009##k/1
#i4003002##t4003002# #b#c4003002##k/1
#i4001005##t4001005# #b#c4001005##k/1
#i1302014##t1302014# #b#c1302014##k/1

I got all the materials needed to reawaken the sword to Chrishrama. He couldn't believe his eyes, but went on with it, and reawakened the sword into #bHero's Gladius#k. It gives off a mystic light...and it's a really nice sword! Hmmm...I don't know if I should really give it to him...

string.name: summary
string.value: I need to find the materials needed to reawaken the Gladius and take it to Chrishrama.

string.name: name
string.value: Mar' the Fairy and the Water of Life

At Ellinia, I ran into a fairy that's been busily studying the magic of life. Her name is 'Mar' and after taking a look at my pet that's been turned into a doll, she told me she can make it come back alive with #bThe Water of Life#k and #bThe Scroll of Life#k. I heard that she knows Cloy of Henesys... since it looks like a pet trainer named #bTrainer Bartos#k of Henesys knows something about the scroll of life, I should head over there...

After easily passing the test from Trainer Bartos of Henesys, I got a hold of #bThe Water of Life#k and #bThe Scroll of Life#k, and got that to 'Mar' the fairy. With her magical power and the items I got her, she turned the doll back into a living pet. I can hang out with him for a while longer now ... sweet ...

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama and the Diet Medicine
Let's go look for Sabitrama in Sleepywood.

In front of Sleepywood Hotel, I met #bSabitrama#k, a medicinal herb trader who seems to be the younger brother of Chrishrama. He said he found a place where he can finally find the herb that he needed for this medicine he's working on...and that he asked if I could go in that forest and grab an herb called #bPink Anthurium#k. It consists of green grass and a small pink flower ... I better remember this well and get him the exact same one. I heard the place is near Ellinia ... I should go there and talk to this guy #bShane#k ...

Thankfully I got the flower that Sabitrama wanted from the Forest of Patience, and as a sign of appreciation, he gave me a #bscroll for the overall armor#k. Oh, and he also said that from here on out, I can enter the Forest of Patience without having to pay Shane of Ellinia. Based on what I've heard, the diet medicine Sabitrama's working on is for Shane's fiance... I better get back in the Forest of Patience when I have some time ...

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama's Anti-Aging Medicine
I heard that Sabitrama in Sleepywood is making a new medicine...

I ran into #bSabitrama#k again in front of the Sleepywood hotel, the same one I helped get herbs before. This time, he said he found a place where I can get the important herb that he needed for his new medicine. He asked me if I could go into that forest and grab #bDouble-Rooted Red Ginseng#k for him. The root is in two, and red ... I should remember it well and find the same one once I get to the top. I should speak to #bShane#k of Ellinia ...

Thankfully I got the one that Sabitrama asked me to get, and for that, I got rewarded with a mysterious rock. And from here on out, I don't have to pay Shane every time I go in the Forest of Patience. From what I hear, that anti-aging medicine Sabitrama is working on may be what Shane needed ... if I have time, I should go back in there ...

string.name: name
string.value: John's Pink Flower Basket
Let's go meet John at Lith Harbor.

At Lith Harbor, I met a fisherman named John. He wanted to get his wife a nice flower basket for their upcoming anniversary. He asked me if I could get him #b10 Pink Violas#k for her. According to him, a mysterious statue can lead me to where the flower is. Sleepywood ... SLEEPYWOOD?!That's FAR!

I got John all #b10 Pink Violas#k. With these, he can make a beautiful flower basket for his wife on their anniversary. As a sign of appreciation, John got me a whole bunch of screws left over from ships here and there. By the way, if there are this many screws that have fallen out of ships, then how in the world are they even working...? Are they carrying passengers on it?

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Lost Coin
Let's start looking for Shumi in Kerning City.

I met this girl named Shumi in Kerning City. She was devastated about losing the lucky coin that she borrowed from a friend, and she was asking me to find it for her. She also told me that a bunch of guys draped in white cloth took it from her in the subway, and that they may be found at the #bConstruction Site B1#k, deep in the station ... I should go there first ...

I found the lost coin that Shumi of Kerning City was looking for, and returned it to her. A precious coin borrowed from her friend, huh ... as a reward, she gave me a whole bunch of the return scrolls ... not bad at all!! She also said other items can be found at #bConstruction Site B1#k ... I should check it out later ...

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Lost Bundle of Money
Let's go look for Shumi in Kerning City.

I ran into Shumi again at Kerning City. She seemed really worried about how she lost her rent money because a Stirge flew over and snatched a bundle of money away from her. Man ... do I have to walk back in there again ... can I just pay the rent for her? Anyway like last time, I need to go back in there, this time to #bConstruction Site B2#k and find the bundle of money she lost. Aye, better go in there now...

I got Shumi from Kerning City the lost bundle of money. I guess she can pay her rent now...and as a reward, she got me #b100 Mana Elixirs#k...she also said I may find other items at the #bConstruction Site B2#k...I should go check it out sometime...

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Lost Bundle of Money
Let's go look for Shumi in Kerning City.

I ran into Shumi again at Kerning City. A while ago, she got a favor from JM From the Streetz to get an elixir for him, only to have the sack of money fall down and lose it all in the process. I guess I can find it at the deep part of the subway station, the #bConstruction Site B3#k, again.

I got Shumi of Kerning City the lost sack of money. With that, she can finally get the stuff JM requested. As a sign of thanks, she gave me #bscroll for shoes for speed#k. Since there are other items that can be found at #bconstruction site B3#k , maybe I should head back in there sometime...

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach II
Riel in Florina Beach asks me a question about Florina Beach. Piece of cake. I can answer that before I start my work.

You have to prepare the recipe ingredients for 12 people, then bring them to Riel in Florina Beach.\n\n#i4000029:# #t4000029:# #c4000029# / 12 #i4000136:# #t4000136:# #c4000136# / 5 #i4000043:# #t4000043:# #c4000043# / 20
I answered all the questions that Riel gave me. I passed Riel's tests and she took the recipe for 12 people.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach III
Emergency for the girl living in Florina Beach.
I worked part-time gathering recipes for cooking meals for the tourists coming to Florina Beach.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach
Riel is trying to develop special dish of Florina Beach.

I need to collect some of the recipes to develop the Special Taste of Florina Beach. I heard that #b10 #t4000136#, 10 #t4000043#, 10 #t4000044#, and 10 #t4000029##k are necessary. Will Valen's new recipe succeed?
I'm familiar with working on Florina Beach. I visited Riel one more time and helped her out. Why is she so desperate to help Valen?

string.name: name
string.value: Research on Animal Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Fossils
Dr. Betty in Ellinia told me that she needs #b1 #t4031151##k for her research. She asked me to find her daughter near Henesys, and bring it back to her. Where would Anne be?
I met Dr. Betty's daughter, Ann, playing near Henesys by herself.

string.name: name
string.value: Progress on Fossil Research

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Plants
I heard Dr. Betty has finished the research on plants. Maybe I should go and see how it is.

You meet Dr. Betty again, and she tells you that the research was finished before explaining it to you. The Doctor then tells you to take the Research Report and deliver it to Dr. Winston in Perion. Dr. Betty also informs you that if you take #b10 Leaves, 5 pieces of #t4000018#, 1 #t4031153#, and 1 pair of #t1032000##k, Dr. Winston will be ecstatic.

#i4000005##t4000005# #b#c4000005##k / 10
#i4000018##t4000018# #b#c4000018##k / 5
#i4031153##t4031153# #b#c4031153##k / 1

I delivered Dr. Betty's Fossil Research Report to Dr. Winston in Perion. Along with the report, I also gave him the leaves, firewood, Stump's tear, and earrings. In return, Dr. Winston gave me the Leaf Earrings.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Maple History Book
Jay of Henesys has something to ask regarding the Maple History Book.

#p1012109# of Henesys asked if I could find #b#t4031157##k, #b#t4031158##k, #b#t4031159##k and give them to #b#p2041022##k of Ludibrium. #b#t4031157##k was the one that went missing in on the way to Orbis; #b#t4031158##k being kept at a treasure chest at Grendel the Really Old's house in Ellinia; and #b#t4031159##k, apparently being stolen by the Chronos.
I gathered up all 3 Maple History Books, gathered them up, and handed them to #p2041022# of Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: The Stump Horror Story
Ayan of Perion says she can't take one step out of town. I wonder why...

I met Ayan of Perion. Apparently, she cannot remember anything about her childhood, and she lives every day in fear of Stumps. So scared, in fact, that she can't even dare to look at it. Accompanied by this paralyzing fear of Stumps, she cannot take one step out of Perion, and asks me to take them out for her sake. Are they really THAT scary? \n\n#o0130100# #r#a20821##k
I took out Stumps for the sake of Ayan in Perion. She can finally venture outside without having to worry about them!

string.name: name
string.value: Icarus and the Balloon
I wonder how Icarus's doing with the glider...maybe I should go check up on him at Kerning City.

Icarus failed to create a working Hang Glider, and is now attempting to create a flying balloon... It looks just as preposterous as his last attempt, but you don't think you can stop him. To make the flying balloon, he needs #b30 #t4000035#s#k and #b10 #t4031164#es#k. You hope this works...

#i4000035##t4000035# #b#c4000035##k / 30
#i4031164##t4031164# #b#c4031164##k / 10

I got the materials needed for #p1052106# to make the flying balloon and realize his dream of flying. I don't know if his 'flying balloon' will indeed fly, but there's a chance that it may indeed work. I'll check up on him around the time when the flying balloon should be ready to take flight and see if he's for real this time.

string.name: name
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger I

string.name: parent
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger
Apparently a strange vibe has been permeating deep inside the dungeon of Victoria Island. I should meet up with the Insignificant Being for details.
You need to gather 33 Cold Steams from Ice Drake to be used in a spell by the Insignificant Being.\n\n#i4031212##t4031212# #b#c4031212#/33#k
The Insignificant Being finally gave me a chance. Where can I gather up the items needed for the spell?

string.name: name
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger II

string.name: parent
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger
The Insignificant Being said he needs to gather up the ingredients necessary to use as a spell to seal up the danger that's been spread all over the deep regions of the Dungeon.

You need to gather the items that the Insignificant Being needs to seal up the curse. Find 10 Wild Kargo Spirit Rocks, 10 Tauromacis Spirit Rocks, and 10 Taurospear Spirit Rocks. 

#i4031213##t4031213# #b#c4031213#/10#k
#i4031215##t4031215# #b#c4031215#/10#k
#i4031214##t4031214# #b#c4031214#/10#k
I gathered up the spirit rocks for Wild Kargo, Tauromacis, and even Taurospear. Is there more left?

string.name: name
string.value: DANGER! <1-G. Mushroom>
You heard there's a warning sign about monsters somewhere in the Singing Mushroom Forest...
Eliminate #b33#k Green Mushrooms, then find 'The Rememberer.' \n\n#o1110100# #r#a21051##k
I tried eliminating the Green Mushrooms all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

Eliminate #b33#k #o2110200#s, then find 'The Rememberer.' \n\n#o2110200# #r#a21061##k
I tried eliminating the #o2110200#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

Eliminate #b33#k #o2230100#s, then find 'The Rememberer.' \n\n#o2230100# #r#a21081##k

string.name: name
string.value: POLLUTED! <3-Jr. Boogie>
I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere around The South Rocky Mountain Perion Southern Ridge...
Eliminate the Jr. Boogies you find at The South Rocky Mountain Perion Southern Ridge and bring back #b12#k Horns of Jr. Boogie to 'The Rememberer' as proof. \n\n#i4000067##t4000067# #b#c4000067##k/12
The dungeon now features strange monsters such as Jr. Boogie. Wonder if there's more coming...

string.name: name
string.value: DANGER! <1-G. Mushroom>
You heard there's a warning sign about monsters somewhere in the Singing Mushroom Forest...
Eliminate #b333#k Green Mushrooms, then find 'The Rememberer.' \n\n#o1110100# #r#a21111##k
I tried eliminating the Green Mushrooms all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

I tried eliminating the #o2110200#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

Eliminate #b333#k #o2230101#s, then find 'The Rememberer.' \n \n#o9101001# #r#a21131##k
I tried eliminating the #o2230101#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.
