Eliminate #b333#k #o3230100#s, then find 'The Rememberer.' \n\n#o3230100# #r#a21151##k
I tried eliminating the #o3230100#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

string.name: name
string.value: Shawn the Excavator's Request
#p1022006#, who resides at the East Rocky Mountain, says Shawn the excavator asked him for a favor...

Lately, the excavation site has been hit with an unknown monster. As a result, #p1022006# requested that I study the reason behind the monster's creation. To conduct the research, I'll have to collect #b5 each of #t4000196# and #t4000197##k that #b#o2230110##k and #b#o2230111##k use. 

#t4000196# #b#c4000196##k/5 
#t4000197# #b#c4000197##k/5
He said studying #t4000196# and #t4000197# will take some time. I better wait 'til it gets done with.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate Monsters from the Site
#p1022006# asked me to wait while he's analyzing #t4000196# and #t4000197#.

#p1022006# seemed shocked to find out what he had found out through studying #t4000196# and #t4000197#, but he didn't want to divulge the information on me. He wanted me to first eliminate the monsters, so I'll do that. 

#o2230110# #r#a21182##k
#o2230111# #r#a21181#
Winston claimed the monsters have decreased dramatically, but I disagree. Not only that, but I felt a strange vibe around the excavation site. What would that be...?

string.name: name
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest
#p1032001#, the chief of #m101000000#, apparently wants my help. I better go see\n#p1032001#.
#m101000000#'s chief #p1032001# needed a favor, so I went. #p1032001# said when I go to #b#m240000000##k in Ossyria, and I need to see #m240000000#. I'd better hurry!
I received a request from the chief of #m101000000# and headed over to see #p1032001# as their messenger. #p1032001# was worried I may get lost on the way.

string.name: name
string.value: To the Desert...
I'm now ready to go to wherever #p1022002# is going to take me. I should go see #p1022002# now.
Where is #p1022002# going to take me...?
#p1022002# has sent me to Nihal Desert.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's Last Training Session
You're really starting to look like a Warrior now. #b#p1022000##k wants to give you a final training session.
#p1022000# wants you to hunt #r15 #o1130100#s#k. #o1130100#s look like #o0130100#s but are much stronger. You should stay on guard at all times.\n\n#o1130100# #r#a21311##k
You wiped out 15 #o1130100#s. Thanks to #p1022000#, you're well on your path of becoming a true Warrior.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's Third Training Session
You're definitely getting stronger. #b#p1032001##k suggests another training session.
#p1032001# wants you to eliminate #r20 #o0210100#s#k. You've got this handled; it shouldn't be hard at all. Go and get those #o0210100#s! \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21341##k
You eliminated 20 #o0210100#s. Ha! You felt quite proud of yourself.

string.name: name
string.value: A rainbow snail shell that makes wishes come true?!

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail

Pia asked me to go to the thicket around the beach and take out #rMano#k. I'm to bring back #b#t2210006##k. So you get to stay here while I do all the work for you again? Don't you think this is a bit too much? I might use all of the #t2210006# for myself!
#t2210006# wasn't an item that makes dreams come true. It turns people who use it into snails. Phew... learned a good lesson not to believe in rumors, otherwise I would be the one crawling about.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Riel
Riel, Rael and Roel start betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's first meet with #bRiel#k.

Riel secretly asks to help her win the bet. Her deal is to defeat #r50 Clangs#k. How do I get myself into these situations? I'd better help her with this, and then talk about how ridiculous this bet is.\n\n#o4230104# #r#a21581##k
Defeated all Clangs for Riel.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Roel
Riel, Rael and Roel start betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's meet with #bRoel#k.

Roel looks just like Riel but with a tougher attitude! Her dare was to take out #r50 Lorangs#k. Roel asks me to help her win the bet. I'd better help her with this, and then talk about how ridiculous this bet is. \n\n#o3230102# #r#a21591##k
Defeated all Lorangs for Roel.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Rael
Riel, Rael and Roel start betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's meet with #bRael#k.

Shy Rael says her dare was to take out #r50 Torties#k. She doesn't look like a person who'd participate in this kind of bet. Looks can be deceiving. Rael hesitates to ask me to help, but I'd better get this over with and take out those Torties. Then I'll talk about how ridiculous this bet is.\n\n#o4130101# #r#a21601##k
Defeated all Torties for Rael.

string.name: name
string.value: The Half-written Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: The Lost Letter

I found a letter in the trash, all crumpled up in a ball. It looked like someone was in the middle of writing the letter when they decided to throw it away...It's hard to read what's written there because of all the creases everywhere, but I think I see the name ''Athena Pierce'' faintly across the page. I wonder if I can find the person to whom this letter belongs.

While I was trying to read the letter, Muirhat approached me with a suspicious look and started asking why I am reading Kyrin's letter. I told him that I had found it in the trash, and to that, he asked if I would be interested in delivering Kyrin's letter to #bAthena Pierce#k in #bHenesys#k.
I've delivered the letter to Athena Pierce as Muirhat had asked me to.

string.name: name
string.value: Athena Pierce's Smile

string.name: parent
string.value: The Lost Letter
I wonder how Kyrin and Athena Pierce know each other. Let me see what Athena Pierce has to say about that.
How surprising! Athena Pierce and Kyrin used to be practically family! I had no idea that the two had such a deep history.

string.name: name
string.value: Athena Pierce's Gift

string.name: parent
string.value: The Lost Letter

I'd better hurry and bring this orgel to Kyrin who is onboard on The Nautilus waiting for me, especially for Athena Pierce's sake. She's dying to see Kyrin. Anyhow, it's amazing how deeply their fates are intertwined...
I've delivered the orgel to Kyrin per Athena Pierce's request. Kyrin seemed so happy- I guess it was a good thing that I picked up the letter from the trash after all?

string.name: name
string.value: The Prince's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Whalians and The Nautilus
There's apparently a mysterious dolphin in the corridors of the Nautilusâ€™ lower deck. Seems very strange... What would a dolphin be doing out of the water and onboard a ship?

The mysterious dolphin is claiming that he is actually a Whalian prince and that he can't transform back to being a Prince because he is low on mana. Perhaps I should go find a bottle of #bmana elixir#k for the Whalian Prince?
Finally, the Whalian Prince has been replenished with mana. I thought he was just an ordinary dolphin... I mean, who would have known that he could turn out to be such a handsome prince?

string.name: name
string.value: Can you please give Baine a helping hand?

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Entity Onboard The Nautilus

Baine's job is to monitor the sound waves of The Nautilus. The way the ship sounds is a good indicator of the overall well-being of the ship. Recently, Baine had apparently detected a strange sound coming through the walls on the lower deck. Could this be an ominous sign of things to come?

When Baine detects the strange sound waves coming from The Nautilus, he asks #bBart#k, the #bkeeper of the Watchtower#k, whether he's noticed any changes in sight. The watchtower is apparently on the eastern end of the shipping dock so I'd better look around carefully.
Bart says that he's noticed some strange movements. I wonder what he saw.

string.name: name
string.value: Porchay's Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians
Porchay, who stays with the Whalians in the Generator Room, says that there is an emergency. I wonder what it is.

I can't believe that the Whalians have completely run out of food! According to Porchay, Kenta has plenty of food ingredients so I should go to #bKenta#k and talk to her. I should take Porchay's letter with me too, right?
I gave Porchay's letter to Kenta.

string.name: name
string.value: Help Me Find My Glasses
Apparently there's someone on the harbor, in trouble. He says he's lost something that's practically like a body part of his...

Having lost his glasses, Abel is unable to see anything. Let me help Abel find his glasses in the bushes near the #bwatchtower#k, located on the east end of The Nautilus harbor where the seagulls have gathered. And remember, #bAbel's glasses#k have horn-rimmed frames! \n\n#i4031853##t4031853# #b#c4031853##k / 1
Oh. Abel seems so happy to have his glasses back. But now that he's got his glasses back, he seems like such a different person. Do those glasses have some kind of power?

string.name: name
string.value: A Hole in The Nautilus

Code red! There's a hole in the ship and The Nautilus is in danger! The Nautilus' crew, Bonnie, is trying everything to stop the hole all by herself... We can't let The Nautilus sink like this! I must go and help!
The hole on the ship must be stopped with a Solid Horn. You should go find #b30 Solid Horns#k before Bonnie loses all her strength. \n\n#i4000073##t4000073# #b#c4000073#/30#k
Whew, I can't believe we saved The Nautilus from sinking into the ocean. Bonnie and I saved The Nautilus!

string.name: name
string.value: How to become a Brawler
In order to become a Brawler, I must go see Kyrin.

Kyrin says that she wants to test how far I have gotten on my training before she will help me job advance into a Brawler. I must first hunt down the #rOctopusesrates#k on the testing grounds and collect #b15 Potent Power Crystals#k. I must remember to use the #rFlash Fist#k skill in order to defeat the Octopusesrates. \n\n#i4031856##t4031856# #b#c4031856#/15#k
I've passed Kyrin's test! I'm ready now to become a Brawler!

string.name: name
string.value: How to Become a Gunslinger
In order to become a Gunslinger, I must see Kyrin.

Kyrin says that she wants to test how far I have gotten on my training before she will help me job advance into a Gunslinger. I must first hunt down the #rOctopusesrates#k and collect #b15 power wind crystals#k. I must remember to use the #rDouble Shot#k skill in order to defeat the Octopusesrates.
I've passed Kyrin's test! I can now become a Gunslinger!

string.name: name
string.value: The Beginner Pirate's Second Training Session
You feel stronger, but you still have a long way to go. Talk to #bKyrin#k for more training!
Kyrin says the best way to learn is to keep hunting monsters. She says to hunt #r26 Pigs#k this time. \n\n#o 1210100# #r#a21941##k
Ah, 26 Pigs, slain and looted. You reported the news to Kyrin.

string.name: name
string.value: Tienk, the Monster Book Salesman
As soon as you arrive in #m104000000#, find #b#p0002006##k, the motor-mouth salesman.
As soon as you arrive in #m104000000#, find #b#p0002006##k, the motor-mouth salesman.
You've talked to #b#p0002006##k the salesman about the #bMonster Book#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Stone Golems
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help. I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island is infested with evil spirits, but you can't give up. You need to eliminate #r20 Stone Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their wickedness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5130101# #r#a21981##k
You eliminated 20 Stone Golems and can only hope that you've made a difference in Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Dark Stone Golems
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help. I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island is infested with evil spirits, but you can't give up. You need to eliminate #r20 Dark Stone Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their wickedness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5130102# #r#a21991##k
You've eliminated 20 Dark Stone Golems and can only wonder if you've made a difference in Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Mixed Golems
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help. I should go see Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island is infested with evil spirits, but you can't give up. You need to eliminate #r20 Mixed Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their wickedness in Victoria Island.\n\n#o 5150000# #r#a22001##k
You've eliminated 20 Mixed Golems. You can only hope that you've made a difference in Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Skeletons
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help. I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island is infested with evil spirits, but you can't give up. You need to eliminate #r20 Skeleton Soldiers#k and #r20 Skeleton Generals#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their wickedness in Victoria Island. 

#o 5150001# #r#a22011##k
#o 6230602# #r#a22012##k
You eliminated 20 Skeleton Soldiers and 20 Skeleton Generals. You hope you've made a difference in Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Drakes
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help. I should go see Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r50 Drakes#k and #r50 Ice Drakes#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. 

#o 5130100# #r#a22022##k
#o 6230600# #r#a22021##k
I've eliminated 50 Red Drakes and 50 Ice Drakes. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Tauromacis
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help. I should go see Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r30 Tauromacis#k and #r100 Cold Eyes#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island.

#o 7130100# #r#a22031##k
#o 4230100# #r#a22032##k
I've eliminated 100 Tauromacis. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dish 1

I've lost my appetite as of late... I wonder if Tangyoon could help me find a newfound appreciation for food by cooking me something new. I'm definitely ready for the challenge now so I should go talk to Tangyoon in The Nautilus' cafeteria. Oh yea, the cafeteria's on the upper deck.

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish recently, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before. He's apparently been working with Evil Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only you would bring him #b10 Evil Eye Tails#k... You wonder if Evil Eyes are even edible. \n\n#i 4000007##t 4000007# #b#c 4000007#/10#k
Man, just as I'd suspected, Evil Eyes definitely aren't as tasty as I had hoped. But in a burger, well, it's not all that bad after all.

string.name: name
string.value: Bring a Lemon for Shulynch
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do.
Bartol wants me to take this lemon to #bShulynch, who is in the ship's Training Room on the upper deck#k. \n\n#i 2010004##t 2010004# #b#c 2010004#/1#k
I've delivered the lemon to Shulynch.

string.name: name
string.value: Take the Gold Pouch to Muirhat
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do.
I should bring the #bGold Pouch#k to #bMuirhat#k as Bartol asked me to. Muirhat is standing #bin front of the Control Room on the upper deck#k.
I've delivered the Gold Pouch to Muirhat.

string.name: name
string.value: Deliver the Tattered Map to Black Bark
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do.
I should deliver this #bTattered Map#k to #bBlack Bark#k in the #bCentral Conference Room of The Nautilus#k.
I've delivered the Tattered Map to Black Bark.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Crumpled Piece of Paper Again
You have lost the list of informants you retrieved from the hut in the swamp region. What to do...? Let's go see #bJM#k again.

JM scowls and scoffs at you. He says he'll provide you with the list of informants again, but asks you to pay #ba fee of 2000 Mesos#k. He then instructs you to leave the payment inside the trashcan. Head over to #b#m103030100##k.
You have taken the list of informants out and left 2000 Mesos inside the trash can.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Mr. Pickall
According to the information provided on the #t4031894#, #p9000008# is one of the informants that JM wants you to go see. Let's go find #b#p9000008##k.
According to #p9000008#, #o6220000# looks a lot like #o3110100# but bigger, and it can even use magic. Anyway... He seems like a nice man.
According to #p9000008#, #o6220000# looks a lot like #o3110100# but bigger, and it can even use magic.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Jake
According to the information provided on the #t4031894#, #p1052006# is one of the informants that JM wants you to see. Let's go find #b#p1052006##k.

While chatting away, #p1052006# suddenly mentions something regarding the #o9300003#... that #o9300003# wasn't always gigantic. He says it was a #o210100# that exponentially grew due to the #bGrowth Powder#k...

While chatting away, #p1052006# suddenly mentions something regarding the #o9300003#... that #o9300003# wasn't always gigantic. He says it was a #o210100# that exponentially grew due to the #bGrowth Powder#k...

string.name: name
string.value: The Forest of Evil

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil
#b#p1032100##k who lives in #b#m101000000##k was in a dangerous situation...

Arwen says she was attacked by a giant monkey monster in the forest. Although she wasn't hurt, she was angry that something like this was still happening because #p1032001# had casted the magic of darkness during his days of youth. Let's go find #b#p1032001##k.

#p1032001# admits that he did, indeed, make a mistake when he was younger that is still affecting #m101000000#. He asks you to find #b#p1040002##k the cat in #b#m101030200##k to see what information you can gather about the monster that attacked Arwen.

string.name: name
string.value: Reef's Gratitude

#p1032100# and #p1032001#, #m101000000# and #o5220002#. And Reef... The air seems to have been cleared. Although Faust still loiters around the forest, #b#p1032108##k probably feels relieved for the time being. Let's go find #p1032108#.
Appeased, #p1032108# thanks you for your work.
Appeased, #p1032108# thanks you for your work.

string.name: name
string.value: A Way to Fight Off Sleep
You should go see #b#p1040001##k in #b#m105000000##k.

I met with #b#p1040001##k. #b#p1040001##k says he can't stand guard at the dungeon entrance because he keeps falling asleep. If this continues, something bad is bound to happen. I need to find a potion that can fight off sleepiness and give it to #b#p1040001##k.

#i02000000##t02000000# #b#c02000000#/1
#k#i02000001##t02000001# #b#c02000001#/1
#k#i02000002##t02000002# #b#c02000002#/1#k
#k#i02000003##t02000003# #b#c02000003#/1#k
I fed the potion to #b#p1040001##k but it was no use. But #b#p1040001##k was very appreciative of my efforts.

string.name: name
string.value: Captain Al, Who Are You?

A middle-aged gentleman who claims to have been the leader of a Family for 30 mind-boggling years... the rumors about this man, #bCaptain Al#k, who can be found in #bLith Harbor#k and #bOrbis Park#k, are running rampant. What exactly are a Family and a Leader anyway? They sound interesting... better ask #bCaptain Al#k that question myself.
#bCaptain Al#k seemed much more pleasant than the rumors suggested. I have a lot to ask... and he said ask him when I'm ready. How about now?

Captain Al's passion for adventure and the Family is palpable. Forget the tear-jerking adventures of Captain Al; I'm more interested in the concept of the Family... \nFortunately, Captain Al told me to ask him anytime about the Family. Should I become a Leader myself? Well, first I'll need to find a Junior I can support.

string.name: name
string.value: Find a Junior!

string.name: parent
string.value: Captain Al's Passing of Knowledge
#bCaptain Al#k told me to see him if I was ever interested in starting a Family. Better go visit him at either #bLith Harbor#k or #bOrbis Park#k.

Captain Al's mission was simple! He just asked me to find a Junior that I want to support. I better register at least one Junior, then report the results to him.

#rAdd at least one Junior#k
(From the Family window[Hotkey : F], press the Pedigree button to check )
I succeeded in adding a Junior under me! Of course, that's how great my leadership is... Haha.

string.name: name
string.value: Raise the Rep!

string.name: parent
string.value: Captain Al's Passing of Knowledge

#bCaptain Al#k's next mission is for me to reach #r1,000 Rep#k! It's not an easy task by any means. According to Captain Al, this number cannot be achieved without the leadership and the overall support I provide to the Juniors. Captain Al gave me a clue in that I should help Juniors acquire EXP and help them Level Up as much as they can. EXP... Leveling up... HOW?

#rAchieve 1,000 Rep#k
(Open the Family window to check the Rep)
I finally reached 1,000 in Rep! ...I have to thank the Juniors that really helped me get there.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Shoo Away the Evil
Chrishrama in Sleepywood claims that he's felt an ominous energy. Let's go talk to him.

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him.

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him. Since you've stuck a Charm on all 6 of the Shaman Rocks, let's go see Chrishrama.

string.name: summary
string.value: Place a Charm on the 6 Shaman Rocks located throughout the central dungeon of Victoria to drive out evil!

string.name: name
string.value: Balrog and the Seal

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog
Manji's apprentice, Mu Young, has a pensive look on his face. Shall we hear what he has to say?

Mu Young says his master was right to worry. He says Balrog, who was sealed by Tristan a number of decades ago, is preparing to reemerge. He has asked you to form an Expeditionary Team to prevent Balrog from reviving.

Mu Young says his master was right to worry. He says Balrog, who was sealed by Tristan a number of decades ago, is preparing to reemerge. He has asked you to form an Expeditionary Team to prevent Balrog from reviving.\r\nBut as you tried to prevent Balrog's revival, he disappeared into thin air, and you had to tell Mu Young.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's form an Expeditionary Team and go into the cave where Balrog is sealed. You will do what you can to prevent Balrog from reviving and report back to Mu Young.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 12,000 Unlocks 'A Letter to the Master' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Understanding the Horny Mushroom Signals

string.name: parent
string.value: Strange Mushrooms
You'd better check in to see the progress The Rememberer of Sleepywood is making with his research on the strange mushrooms.

The Rememberer has completed his research, and has suggested that there may be some Horny Mushrooms that have been tainted. He's asked you to gather some Tainted Horny Mushroom Caps.


#i4032390:# #t4032390:# #c4032390# / 20

The Rememberer told you that his study of the Horny Mushrooms has been completed, but that he still can't understand the vague mushroom signals. He told you he still doesn't know what drove the mushrooms into a rage.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,000 Unlocks 'Zombie Mushroom Signal 1' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Karcasa's Memory

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
Karcasa has information on Mushroom Castle. You'd better go talk to him.
Karcasa claims he'll remember information about the Mushroom Castle if he eats some carrots right now... Really? \r\n
You gathered the carrots and gave them to Karcasa in exchange for information about the Mushroom Castle.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 3,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Karcasa's Memory 2'quest\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Karcasa of the Desert

Through research, you discovered that a place known as the Mushroom Castle is in trouble, but even #bThe Rememberer#k doesn't know anything about the place. You should see what he thinks you should do next.

Through research, you discovered that a place known as the Mushroom Castle is in trouble, but even #bThe Rememberer#k had no clue where that is. He recommends you ask #bKarcasa#k in the desert for some information...
You met #bKarcasa#k and asked about the Mushroom Castle, to no avail.

string.name: name
string.value: Lana's Decision
#bLana#k the CEO of Big Hit Records says she needs a few moments to decide whether Blake has what it takes to make a big debut. Talk to her in a minute to see what she decides.
Finally! Blake will be able to make his debut! But first, you must convince the seven star chef #bRobby Fray#k to cater Blake's after party.
What? #bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? Well, you gotta do what you gotta do to help Blake make his debut. Talk to Robby Fray again.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 600 Unlocks 'Convince Robby Fray' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Say 'NO' to Plagiarism
Master Rho doesn't seem like he's ready to hand over the new song even though you've already paid the fee. Why is he so hesitant? Ask #bMaestro Rho#k if everything is okay.

Spirit of Rock is playing Maestro Rho's music without proper approval. Defeat Spirit of Rock and listen to the last song he plays.\r\n\r\nIt is highly recommended that you turn up the volume a bit in the system options so you don't miss any important parts of the song while you're listening.
You have destroyed Spirit of Rock as Maestro Rho requested. But he's still reluctant to let go of his Composition Notes. You don't have much time left. Ask #bMaestro Rho#k for the new song.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,600 Unlocks 'The New Song' quest Unlocks 'The Last Song' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Exploring Mushroom Forest (1)
In order to break through the barrier in Mushroom Forest and rescue the princess...
You should investigate the barrier inside Mushroom Forest and report the results to the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.\r\n#bInvestigate the barrier in Mushroom Forest: #R2314# / 1 complete.
You looked at the obstruction and saw that it was a powerful magic barrier that cannot be physically broken through. The Secretary of Magic of Mushking Empire might know what to do.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should investigate the powerful barrier inside the Mushroom Forest and report the results to the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Investigate the barrier at Mushroom Forest: #R2314# / 1 complete.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,650 Can proceed to the 'Exploring Mushroom Forest (2)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Killer Mushroom Spores (1)
#b#p1300007##k the mushroom scholar told you that he knows how to create a #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k... Now you should do something about it.
Find the #b30 Poison Mushroom Caps#k required to make the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k and deliver them to #b#p1300007##k.
You found the 30 Poison Mushroom Caps required to make the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k and delivered them to #b#p1300007##k.

string.name: summary
string.value: Find the 30 Poison Mushroom Caps required to make the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k and deliver them to #b#p1300007##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,300 Can proceed to the 'Killer Mushroom Spores (2)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Over the Castle Walls (2)
The #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k seems to have something to tell you regarding somehow infiltrating the castle.
You should investigate the Mushking Empire and report the results to the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.\r\n#bInvestigate the Outer Walls of the Castle: #R2322# / 1 Complete.
You studied the castle wall and realized it won't be easy to get passed it.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should investigate the castle walls of the Mushking Empire and report the results to the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #bInvestigate the Outer Walls of the Castle: #R2322# / 1 Complete.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,300 Can proceed to the 'Over the Castle Walls (3)' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Sending Provisions (2)
#b#p1300005##k tells you his troops need some more equipment...
Defeat the #bRoyal Guard Pepe#k and gather #b25 #t4000503#s#k.
You delivered #b25 #t4000503#s#k to #b#p1300005##k.

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat the #bRoyal Guard Pepe#k and gather #b25 #t4000503#s#k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Seal of the Empire
Seems like #b#p1300003##k wants to tell you something...
You need to find the stolen Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire and bring it to #b#p1300003##k.
You found the #bPrime Minister#k, who stole the #bRoyal Seal of the Mushking Empire#k. You reclaimed the seal and returned it to #b#p1300003##k.

string.name: summary
string.value: You need to find the stolen Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire and take it to #b#p1300003##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Dual Blade: The Seal of Destiny
An owl randomly appeared with a letter written to you by an unidentified person.

An owl randomly appeared with a letter written to you by an unidentified person... The content of the letter was short and included a warning to never stray from the path of a Dual Blade... Who could have sent this letter? The letter continues by saying that the writer will contact you again when you reach #e#bLv. 9#k#n.

#b- To #h0# -
'Mwahaha... #h0#... How are you? I hope this letter finds you well and faithful on the path of a #eDual Blade#n... Soon, we shall meet again. I will contact you again when you reach Lv. 9. How shall I get in touch with you? Don't worry, we're watching you closely... Mwahaha.'
- From Your Secret Watchman -

An owl randomly appeared with a letter written to you by an unidentified person... The content of the letter was short and included a warning to never stray from the path of a Dual Blade... Who could have sent this letter? The letter continues by saying that the writer will contact you again when you reach #e#bLv. 9#k#n.

#b- To #h0# -
â€™Mwahaha...#h0#... How are you? I hope this letter finds you well and faithful on the path of a #eDual Blade#n... Soon, we shall meet again. I will contact you again when you reach Lv. 9. How shall I get in touch with you? Don't worry, we're watching you closely... Mwahaha.'
- From Your Secret Watchman -

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 10 Can proceed to the 'First Mission: Infiltration' quest

string.name: name
string.value: First Mission: Infiltration
You received another letter from the unidentified man who previously sent you a letter by an owl at Maple Island.

The man, who remains unidentified, declares that the Dark Lord is not the true master of Kerning City and that the Dual Blades will soon reclaim their rightful position of power. To that end, he assigned you the mission of infiltrating the Dark Lord's organization in order to identify his movements. 
#eYour mission is to infiltrate the Dark Lord's organization by making the first job advancement as a #bThief#k!#n

#bAfter meeting with the Dark Lord and advancing as a Thief, you are called to find him in Kerning City.

The man, who remains unidentified, declared that the Dark Lord is not the true master of Kerning City and that the Dual Blades will soon reclaim their rightful position of power. To that end, he assigned you the mission of infiltrating the Dark Lord's organization in order to identify his movements. 
#eYour mission was to infiltrate the Dark Lord's organization by making the first job advancement as a #bThief#k!#n

#bAfter seeing the Dark Lord and advancing as a Thief, you met with #b#eRyden#n#k, the sender of the letter.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Make a job advancement as a #bThief#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 300 #Wbasic# #i1032076:# #t1032076:# 1 Can proceed to the 'Second Mission: Trust' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Second Mission: Trust
Ryden says that he has a new mission for you. Go to Kerning City and meet with Ryden.

Ryden says that Lady Syl is concerned about the Dark Lord's doubts since he didn't teach you all of his skills.\r\nYour second mission is to gain his #e#b'complete trust'#k#n. Gain the Dark Lord's complete trust by taking care of his worries.

Ryden said that Lady Syl was concerned about the Dark Lord's doubts since he didn't teach you all of his skills.\r\nYour second mission was to gain his #e#b'complete trust '#k#n. You took care of one of the Dark Lord's worries and obtained his trust.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #bThe Dark Lord's Trivial Problem 1#k#b\nThe Dark Lord's Trivial Problem 2#k

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 300 Can proceed to the 'Third Mission: Investigation'

string.name: name
string.value: Third Mission: Investigation
Ryden says that he has a new mission for you. Go to Kerning City and meet with Ryden.
Ryden says that he needs to know how the residents of Kerning City feel about the Dark Lord and entrusted you with the task of finding out. Go see #bNella#k, the cute girl in pigtails.
Listen carefully to Nella's opinion.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200 Can proceed to the 'Nella's Opinion' quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Fourth Mission: Double Agent
Ryden says that he has a new mission for you. Go to Kerning City and meet with Ryden.

Ryden says that the Dark Lord's organization has discovered the Dual Blades, and the organization is secretly conducting an investigation. Ryden says that their efforts must be diverted in order to prevent interference with future plans. As a double agent, your mission is to deceive #bEels#k, who is spearheading the Dual Blade investigation. \r\nYou should go see #bEels#k at the #b#m103020200##k.

Ryden said that the Dark Lord's organization discovered the existence of the Dual Blades and were secretly conducting an investigation. He said that their efforts had to be diverted in order to prevent interference with future plans. You met with Eels, who is in charge of investigating the Dual Blades, and passed on false information that should deceive him.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Complete the #bInvestigating the Suspicious Person#k quest\nComplete the #bFalsified Remnant#k quest

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 200 Unlocks 'Quieting Wraiths' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Fifth Mission: Fabrication
Ryden says that he has a new mission for you. Go to Kerning City and meet with Ryden.

Ryden says the time has come to expose the Dark Lord's true nature. He asks you to put up posters at Kerning City's Construction Site and the Subway Ticketing Booth, which state that the current Dark Lord assassinated the former Dark Lord. He also wants you to plant a bomb at the Jazz Bar, where the Dark Lord is located.\r\n#i03800089# #i3800015# #i3800014#

Ryden said that the time had come to expose the Dark Lord's true nature. He asked that you put up posters at various places in Kerning City, which stated that the current Dark Lord assassinated the former Dark Lord. Also, he asked you to plant a bomb at the Jazz Bar, the location of the Dark Lord. You had completed both these tasks.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 330 Unlocks 'Sixth Mission: Destroying the Evidence' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Sixth Mission: Destroying the Evidence
Ryden says that he has a new mission for you. Go to Kerning City and meet with Ryden.

Ryden says that the poster and bomb incident has awakened the Dark Lord to the threat of the Dual Blades. Their full identities might be compromised if they stay in Kerning City much longer. Since it is time for them to make a quick exit, he asks that you recover the #b#t4032622:##k which was hidden purposefully. \r\nComplete Destruction of Evidence...\r\n

Ryden said that the poster and bomb incident had awakened the Dark Lord to the threat of the Dual Blades. Their full identities would've been compromised if they stayed in Kerning City much longer. Since it was time for them to make a quick exit, he took back the Dual Blade Seal that had been attached to a #o1120100#.

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat #bOctopuses#k, which can be found at #bKerning City's Caution Falling Down and Abandoned Construction Site#k, among other places, and recover the #b#t4032622:##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 480 Unlocks 'Sixth Mission: Destroying the Evidence 2' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Shiba's Story

string.name: parent
string.value: Visiting The Secret Garden
You've been contacted by Ryden, who had disappeared. Has the time come?
Ryden says that the time has come for you to enter The Secret Garden. He gives you directions to the location and says that you should first meet with #bShiba#k when you arrive at The Secret Garden.

Ryden said that it was the appointed time for you to enter The Secret Garden. He gave you directions to the location and said that you should first meet with #bShiba#k when you arrived at The Secret Garden... You met #Shiba#k at The Secret Garden 1st Floor.

string.name: name
string.value: Dual Blade: Time for the Awakening
Lady Syl, the master of The Secret Garden, says that the time has come. Time for what...?

Lady Syl, the master of The Secret Garden, says that the time has finally come. Now, she wants to test whether you are truly ready to walk the path of a Dual Blade. She says that if you get the Opalescent Glass Marble by hitting it and then double-clicking on it, you'll be able to obtain the Mirror of Insight that only appears to those who are qualified to be its owner.

Lady Syl, the master of The Secret Garden, said that the time had finally come to test whether you were truly ready to walk the path of a Dual Blade. She said that if you got the Opalescent Glass Marble by hitting it and then double-clicking on it, you'd be able to obtain the Mirror of Insight that only appears to those who are qualified to be its owner... You obtained the Mirror of Insight, then gave it to Lady Syl, who congratulated you for awakening as a Dual Blade.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Unlocks 'Suri the Owl' quest Unlocks 'Seventh Mission: Eyewitness' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Seventh Mission: Eyewitness
Shiba at The Secret Garden has an urgent message for you. What could it be about?

#bShiba#k, the legendary Dual Blade, assigns your seventh mission. Your mission is to find an eyewitness to the disappearance of the former Dark Lord, but it's going to be difficult since it's been such a long time. Perhaps you should talk to Mr. Pickall, who previously told you about the former Dark Lord...

#bShiba#k, the legendary Dual Blade, assigned your seventh mission. Your mission was to find an eyewitness to the disappearance of the former Dark Lord. Although it was a difficult task, you were able to speak with Manji who was an eyewitness and discover that the former Dark Lord was very close to Tristan.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Complete the #b'Eyewitness Holding the Key'#k quest.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,100 Unlocks 'Dual Blade: The Dark Lord's Diary' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Dual Blade: Time for the Awakening
Lady Syl has something to ask of you.

Lady Syl says she is furious after hearing Manji's story. She has decided to initiate a war against the Dark Lord and asks that you go to the hidden room inside the Jazz Bar to recover the former Dark Lord's diary. She asks that you exercise caution since the current Dark Lord could have potentially set a trap... You are to come see her again with the Diary once you've reached Lv. 30.

Lady Syl said that she had become furious after hearing Manji's story. She decided to initiate a war against the Dark Lord and asked that you go to the hidden room inside the Jazz Bar to recover the former Dark Lord's diary. \r\nInside the secret room in the Jazz Bar, you were attacked by the Dark Lord's subordinates. Luckily, you were able to defeat them and come out with the diary. When you returned to Lady Syl with the diary after reaching Lv. 30, she advanced you as a Blade Acolyte.

string.name: name
string.value: Eighth Mission: In the Presence

string.name: parent
string.value: Eighth Mission: In the Presence
Lady Syl has something to ask of you.

Lady Syl has finally recovered from her shock and says that she now knows the direction that the Dual Blades must travel. For the Dual Blades to rise from the shadows and become an organization recognized by all, it must receive the recognition of #bArec#k, the elder thief in El Nath. She asks that you meet with Arec as her messenger and find out how the Dual Blades can receive his official recognition...

Lady Syl after recovering from her shock said that she now knows the direction that the Dual Blades must travel. She said that for the Dual Blades to rise from the shadows and to become an organization recognized by all, it must receive the recognition of #bArec#k, the elder thief in El Nath. She asked that you meet with Arec as her messenger and find out how the Dual Blades can receive his official recognition... What will Arec require for the Dual Blades to receive his recognition?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 14,000 Unlocks 'Arec's Test' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Arec's Secret Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Eighth Mission: In the Presence

Arec gives you a secret letter to be delivered to Lady Syl while stating that he will recognize the Dual Blades. Does the letter affirm his approval? Why does he want you to go see Lady Syl after becoming Lv. 55?

When you delivered the letter to Lady Syl, she said that the Dual Blades have been officially recognized. She also said that the Dual Blades will now be able to make a job advancement like other thieves when they reach Levels 70 and 120.

string.name: name
string.value: Sixth Mission: Destroying the Evidence 2
Assist the Dual Blades by following Ryden's order.
Help with #bRyden's#k plan to completely eliminate the evidence.\r\nDefeat the Bubblings and recover 5 #b#t4032621:#s#k.
You brought Ryden the #b#t4032621:#s#k in order to eliminate the evidence. What could the next mission be?

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat the Bubblings in places like #bEllinia Chimney Tree#k and recover the #b#t4032621:##k.

Assist the Dual Blades by following Ryden's order.
Destroying the Evidence Stage 3...\r\nDefeat the #bStirges#k, recover the #b#t4032623:#s#k, and take them to Ryden.
You defeated the Stirges and recovered more evidence. Way to represent the Dual Blades!

string.value: Defeat the Stirges located throughout the Kerning City Subway Transfer Area and recover the #b#t4032623#s#k.

Defeat the Dark Stumps and recover #b5#k #b#t4032624:#s#k.
You were successful in eliminating all of the evidence. What will the future hold for you as a Dual Blade?

string.name: name
string.value: Missing Staff Sergeant Charlie

string.name: parent
string.value: Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication
Let's go meet Master Sergeant Fox.

Inside El Nath, I found #bMaster Sergeant Fox#k, who seemed to have crash-landed here. He asked if I can find 3 of his men and if they are doing their job wherever they are. The ones I need to meet up are #bStaff Sergeant Charlie, Corporal Easy, and Sergeant Bravo#k, and they should be around Ossyria. He'd prefer that I meet them in the order of their ranks... that sounds pretty difficult to me ...

string.name: summary
string.value: Find Staff Sergeant Charlie

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 1,200 EXP\r\n Can proceed to the 'A Request from Staff Sergeant Charlie' quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Missing Sergeant Bravo

string.name: parent
string.value: Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication

Inside El Nath, I found #bMaster Sergeant Fox#k, who seemed to have crash-landed here. He asked if I can find 3 of his men and if they are doing their job wherever they are. The ones I need to meet up are #bStaff Sergeant Charlie, Corporal Easy, and Sergeant Bravo#k, and they should be around Ossyria. He'd prefer that I meet them in the order of their ranks. I found #bStaff Sergeant Charlie#k at Orbis. Now I have to find #bSergeant Bravo#k next.

I found #bSergeant Bravo#k in the middle of a snowfield far from El Nath. He said he's been doing his duties and that, while investigating around the area, he found this piece of an ancient document that he wants me to deliver to Master Sergeant Fox.

string.name: summary

Inside El Nath, I found #bMaster Sergeant Fox#k, who seemed to have crash-landed here. He asked if I can find 3 of his men and if they are doing their job wherever they are. I found #bStaff Sergeant Charlie and Sergeant Bravo#k. Now I have to find #bCorporal Easy#k next.

I should go see Alcaster of El Nath right now...

I met #bAlcaster#k, the archeologist, at El Nath. He said he had heard about the #bBook of Ancient#k, which tells about the Great World War, happened hundreds years ago. Interesting... The only living descendant of the author of the 'Book of Ancientâ€™ #bHella#k who lives in Orbis. I better go to find her right now.

Spiruna promised to tell me everything that she knows, as long as I find the #bBlack Crystal#k that she lost in the snowfield while on a search for some materials for spells. Now where in the snowfield must that be...?

I found Spiruna's #bBlack Crystal#k underneath a rock at the snowfield, but it has some serious cracks on it. Anyway I should give this back to Spiruna immediately.

I got #bKriel the Fairy#k all the items she asked for, and got the #bFairy Dust#k in return. Now all I need to do is get this to Spiruna and see what happens.

string.value: I should take the Fairy Dust back to Spiruna.

string.name: name
string.value: The Truth Comes Out...

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

Spiruna was utterly ecstatic over receiving the #bFairy Dust#k, and proceeded to tell me everything she knew about Hella. Oh my goodness... Are you kidding me? That assistant there is the Hella I've been looking for all this time??

string.name: summary
string.value: I should talk to Spiruna's assistant, whom now I know is Hella.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,400 Can proceed to the 'Hella is Finally Found' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for the Wiseman in Perion

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

I handed Scadur the wolf skins he asked for, and he gave me back the #bold ring#k. He reminisced the old days where heard about the ring through the four wise men he had met as a young man. He recommended me to go visit Victoria Island and meet up with all four of the wise men, starting with the one in #bPerion#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for the Wiseman in Ellinia

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

I handed Dances with Balrog 2 Power Crystals and received the 1st #bold piece of map#k. The map is cut in four pieces, each piece held by a wise man. He wanted me to gather up all four pieces of the map, find the Book of Ancient through it, and seal it up for good. Next up: The wise man in #bEllinia#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Grendel the Really Old and His Recovery

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
The wise man of Ellinia, #bGrendel the Really Old#k, promised to give me the map piece in exchange for #b2 Wisdom Crystals#k.
I gave Grendel the Really old Wisdom Crystals. Now I can get the map piece.

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for the Wiseman in Henesys

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient

I met my end of the bargain by handing Grendel the Really Old the 2 Wisdom Crystals, and he met his end of the bargain by handing me the 2nd #bold piece of the map#k. Next up: The wise woman at #bHenesys#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Athena Pierce and Her Recovery

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
The wise man of Henesys, #bAthena Pierce#k, promised to give me the old piece of map in exchange for #b2 DEX Crystals#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for the Wiseman in Kerning City

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I met my end of the bargain by handing Athena Pierce the 2 DEX Crystals, and she met her end of the bargain by handing me the 3rd #bold piece of map#k. Last up: The wise man at #bKerning City#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Dark Lord and His Recovery

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
The wise man of Kerning City, #bDark Lord#k, promised to give me the map piece in exchange for #b2 LUK Crystals#k.

string.name: name
string.value: All the Map Pieces in One Place

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I have obtained all #b4 map pieces#k from the four wise men in Victoria Island, and this map supposedly locates where the Book of Ancient is currently hidden. I should get back to Alcaster now.

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from Sergeant Bravo

string.name: parent
string.value: Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication
I found Sergeant Bravo at the snowfield, and he asked me to get him #b2 refined #t4011003#s#k while giving me an item which is to be given to Master Sergeant Fox.
I brought two Adamantium to Sergeant Bravo. He seems to give something to Master Sergeant Fox...

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from Corporal Easy

string.name: parent
string.value: Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication
I found Corporal Easy somewhere around the Orbis Tower, and he asked me to get him #b2 refined #t4021005#s#k while giving me an item which is to be given to Master Sergeant Fox.
I gave two sapphires to corporal Easy. If I get what he gives me, I can go to Master Sergeant Fox.

string.name: name
string.value: Ericsson Loves Cats

string.name: parent
string.value: The Chaos behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice
I should go see Ericsson.
Ericsson was way too busy playing around with his cats and didn't have enough time to make the sap of Nependeath. What can I do to make one?
I got the Lunar Wristband for Ericsson's beloved kitty, Nero.

string.name: name
string.value: A Request from Moppie
I should check up on Moppie, as he is waiting for his master who left him with the words 'I'll be back' as he went on his studies.

I should find Moppie's master, Huckle, since he was the one that Moppie with the words 'I'll be back' as he went on his studies. Huckle should be somewhere safe in Orbis Tower working on his studies ... but where exactly?
I found Huckle, who was diligently working on his studies at the Orbis Tower. He looked like he hadn't bathed in weeks.

string.name: name
string.value: Food-Hunting for Moppie III
Moppie's master, Huckle, wants to ask me for another favor...now what?

Huckleâ€™s time is still consumed by his studies, and he wants you to get even more fish for Moppie. This time, he wants 150 of them! Deliver them to Moppie. \n\n#i4000088##t4000088# #b#c4000088#/150#k
You gathered 150 of Jr. Pepe's fish and delivered them to Moppie, but...

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes's Hobby
I should go visit #p2012017#, the weird scientist living at the basement of Orbis Tower.

At a small dinky room in the basement of the Orbis Tower, which also happened to have flooded, I met up with #p2012017#. I accidentally broke #p2012017#'s favorite toy baby seal. He proceeded to really get angry and demanded that I take out #b50 Scuba Pepe's#k and gather #b10 #t4000154#s#k.

#t4000154# #b#c4000154##k/10
Scuba Pepe #r#a30651#
I accidentally broke Hughes's Toy Baby Seal, so I got him some #t4000154# as well as kill off some Scuba Pepe's. Fortunately, Hughes seems to be okay by now.

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes's Weird Invention
#p2012017#, the mad scientist who lives at the basement of Orbis Tower, apparently has invented something incredible.

I went to the basement of the Orbis Tower to see the mad scientist, Hughes. He claimed to have invented equipment that will allow us to breathe underwater. Not bad... He said with a few materials, he can also make one for me. I better start gathering up... 

#t4000153# #b#c4000153##k/50
#t2022040# #b#c2022040##k/50
#t4011001# #b#c4011001##k/5
#t4003000# #b#c4003000##k/30
I went to the basement of the Orbis Tower where Hughes lives, gave Hughes all the materials needed, and got #b#t1102061##k in return, to breathe underwater.

string.name: name
string.value: A Healthy Snack for the Huskies
I should go see #p2060000#, who's at the Whale Island that's covered in snow.

You meet #p2060000#, who lives with her huskies in the Snowy Whale's Island. #p2060000# asks you to bring her #b50 #t4000161#s#k for her huskies, which can be obtained from #bSeacles#k.\n\n#i4000161##t4000161# #b#c4000161##k / 50
You brought 50 nutritious #t4000161#s to Nanuke. Her huskies are so happy!

string.name: name
string.value: The Bottled-up Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost in the Ocean
In the currents near Aquarium, you got hold of a letter from someone in need. Who could have writtin it...?

You found a message in a bottle. Through the dry sand inside the glass bottle, you were able to find Robinson, who had been looking for help for a while. He seemed tired from his long solitary stay on the island, and he wanted you to get him some pure water. \n\n#t2022000# #b#c2022000##k/1
You gave Robinson a bottle of clean water. How did he end up getting lost in the first place?

string.name: name
string.value: Robinson's ID

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost in the Ocean

You met Robinson in the middle of the island right at the center of the ocean, and he said he used to be a pilot for the army of Omega Sector, but while fighting aliens, he fled, only to be swept by strong currents. He wishes to return to the Omega Sector, but he has no idea where he is. All he knows is that he's now covered in scars.
You went to see #b#p2051001##k at the Omega Sector and handed him Robinson's ID. He said everyone's been wondering where he went and wanted you to describe the position of the island in detail.

string.name: name
string.value: Sending Relief

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost in the Ocean

Kay of the Omega Sector complained of the lack of members available due to the battle against the aliens, and asked me if I could give this warp capsule, specially made in Omega Sector, to Robinson. A warp capsule that takes the person to the Omega Sector regardless of the place of origin? That's awesome!! I wanted to take it myself for a split second, until I found out that only the Omega Sector members can use it. Darn it...

Kay needed help from me, since he couldn't send the rescuers to save Robinson, and so I got the specially-made warp capsule and gave it to Robinson. Now he can go back to the Omega Sector and get himself fixed.

string.name: name
string.value: The Ocean View : Kriel's Offer

string.name: parent
string.value: The View of the Ocean

Kriel, a fairy that resides in Orbis, surely has never been underwater before, right? I mean, she has wings that are good for navigating the friendly skies, and definitely not for navigating underwater. Anyway, I should go see Kriel the Fairy.

Kriel, a proud owner of a set of wings, was blowing off travelers that weren't fortunate enough to have them. I don't think she has a clue that there are numerous breathtaking places that just cannot be reached by flying. According to Lisa, Kriel's not to enthused with the fact that she can only hear about the rumors of Aqua Road and not being able to go there in person. Anyway, Lisa suggested that I buy Kriel 'The Official Aqua Road Photo Album' from #bMuse#k. Muse, huh... Another trip underwater... \n\n#i4031310# #t4031310# #b#c4031310##k / 1

I gave Muse 100 snow crystals and purchased the Official Aqua Road Photo Album, then gave it to Kriel for the viewing. After seeing her admit how beautiful Aqua Road is, I must say I felt validated by it, but it also seems like she set the whole thing up for this from the get go. Oh well, at least Kriel's happy, and that's good enough for me.

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Advice
I should go pay a visit to Kenta, the animal trainer at Aquarium Zoo, with my pet.

#p2060005#, the animal instructor at Aquarium Zoo, mentioned that if the pet's loyalty increases, then the pet will start walking in the same pace as its master, and offered a chance to increase the loyalty level of my pet. He gave me a task of finding #b5 pieces of paper#k hidden away somewhere in Aqua Road with my pet, and increase the closeness of my pet by #bat least 15#k. He even gave me a clue in that I should look into a #bbox#k at the bottom of the ocean... Okay, now off to find the papers! 

#t4031274# #b#c4031274##k / 1
#t4031275# #b#c4031275##k / 1
#t4031276# #b#c4031276##k / 1
#t4031277# #b#c4031277##k / 1
#t4031278# #b#c4031278##k / 1

I looked through the box at the very bottom of Aqua Road and wound up finding the 5 pieces of paper, with my pet accompanying my every move. Then I went back to Aquarium Zoo to see Kenta, and while going through the mission, the loyalty level had already been increased. My pet is now walking in the same pace as I am... wow...

string.name: name
string.value: Spiruna's Concern
It seems like #p2032001# in Orbis has some concerns...

As the Pixies turned ferocious recently, #p2032001# is worried about Orbisâ€™s future and asked me to drive away the Pixies and entrusted me with the Pixie's sculptures. But could it be because of the Pixie who is outside the door that we cannot go out? 

#t4000059# #b#c4000059##k / 10
#t4000060# #b#c4000060##k / 10
#t4000061# #b#c4000061##k / 10 

#o3230200# #r#a30971##k
#o4230106# #r#a30972##k
#o5120000# #r#a30973#
The Pixies were driven away and the sculptures were left aside and given to #p2032001#. #p2032001# researched on the sculptures and told me to look for him again.

string.name: name
string.value: The Record of Goddess Minerva
#p2040052# heard the news that the tower of the Goddess was discovered while he was looking for the person who will listen to his requests...

#p2040052# said that he researched Goddess Minerva when he was young and crazy about her, but nobody believed him. I have been asked to look for data about the Goddess Minerva in the Tower of the Goddess, shall I help?\n\n#t4161014# #b#c4161014##k/1

#p2040052# was very happy that the diary of the Goddess was donated to the library. We researched about Ossyria's past and said, wouldn't be of great help? Now that it's in the library, the book must also be happy that it will be read by many people.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Food to Spiruna
I heard #b#p2012011##k of #b#m200000000##k has something to take care of...

According to #p2012011#, #p2032001# the crazy old lady lives with her student somewhere around Cloud Park. They usually stop by the grocery store and buy some food, but they hadn't come by over the last few days. Concerned, #p2012011# asked me to deliver the food to #b#p2032001#'s student#k for him...

#i2010003# #t2010003# #b#c2010003##k / 20 
#i2010000# #t2010000# #b#c2010000##k / 20 
#i2010002# #t2010002# #b#c2010002##k / 20
I managed to deliver the food to #p2032001#'s student.

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes's New Experiment
I heard #b#p2060006##k is in need of help...

#p2012012# told me since she had already made it once, making #t4031190# again shouldn't be a big problem, and asked me to gather up the materials for it. Since she said this time it won't require as many materials, I better go get #b50 #t4000073#s#k, #b10 #t4003004#s#k, and #b10 #t4000021#s#k?

string.name: name
string.value: Alcaster's Cape

string.name: parent
string.value: Warm El Nath
According to #p2020003#, the person that gave him the magical cape is a man over 300 years old. Really? If so, then wouldn't that be none other than #p2020005#? Go see #p2020005#.

The person who gave #p2020003# the cape was indeed #p2020005#. The one that #p2020003# had in his possession turned out to be the #t1102109#, which he made to combat the cold of #m211000000# when he went there to study magic. After asking for the cape, he asked me to get him some items so he can make another one for you.

#i4021000# #t4021000# #b#c4021000##k / 4

As soon as she awoke, Eliza was furious that the Goddess had been kidnapped. Now, she realizes that it was foolish of her to behave that way. Although Eliza has calmed down, her #rDoppelganger#k, whom she summoned out of rage, is still roaming around, attacking innocent people... Eliza has asked you to defeat #bEliza#k in #b#m200010302##k. \n\n#o8220000# #r#a31131##k
#bEliza#k is relieved of hearing that her clone is no longer able to do any harm.

#o3230303# #r#a32021##k
#o3230308# #r#a32022#
I took care of the #b25 #o3230303#s#k and #b25 #o3230308#s#k like Marcel asked, but I have a gut feeling that another set of powerful forces is lurking around this tower.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 10

string.name: parent
string.value: Just Another Day at Work
I found the last Roly-Poly working hard, so I took a picture of him with the camera that #p2040015# gave me.
I took the pictures of all 10 roly-polies working at Eos Tower and gave them to #p2040015# of the Toy Factory in Ludibrium. It looks like Roly-Poly 6 is in need of help... I should check him out.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Fix Eos Tower
I should go check out Roly-Poly 8 at Eos Tower

I met up with Roly-Poly 8 again at Eos Tower. He seemed worried that there are a lot of places to fix at Eos Tower, only to have the monsters stop him from doing so. He asked if I could take out #b25 #o3230103#es#k and collect #b20 Plastic Crowns#k in the process. I can do this... 

#o3230103# #r#a32241##k
#t4000100# #b#c4000100##k/20

I took out a bunch of #o3230103#s and collected #c4000100#s just the way the Roly-Poly 8 of Eos Tower asked. How long is this maintenance job going to last anyway? This should get done soon so I don't have to do them any more favors.

string.name: name
string.value: The Girl Who Lost Her Memory

string.name: parent
string.value: Korin's Memory
I heard something happened to Korin of Ludibrium... I better go check up on her.

I met a girl named #bKorin#k at a small house nearby Ludibrium. Korin had been missing for 10 months, and she did not remember anything that occurred during that time. She wanted me to find these men wearing the black suit that visited her the other day, and ask him whatever happened to her the last 10 months. A man wearing black suit... I don't think he'd be at Ludibrium or Eos Tower.

I met Korin, who was suffering from partial loss of memory, at Ludibrium. I was able to meet Agent Marco at the Omega Sector. He's the man wearing the black suit who held the clue regarding her lost memory.

string.name: name
string.value: Grandpa Clock's Crisis

string.name: parent
string.value: A Delivery to a Lost Time

After obtaining the #b#t4031094##k by destroying the dollhouse the monster disguised as, I went down to the Lost Time to find #p2040029#. But it seemed like instead of him helping me fix the clocktower, he was about to die first, so he wanted me to take down some monsters called #bTick-Tocks#k and pick up the #b#t4031098##k that they possess. I better get them before #p2040029# dies.
I got the #t4031098# from Tick Tock. I need to get this to the #p2040029# before it's too late.

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Mechanical Parts
I better go see Cheng the Assistant, who should be somewhere around Toy Factory

At the Toy Factory in Ludibrium, I found Cheng the Assistant riding around on a white wooden horse. Chang was concerned about the sudden disappearance of the mechanic parts all over the factory, and wanted me to find those parts for him. I should head over to Toy Factory <Main Construction1> Part 4 with help from Cheng, where the parts are hidden. I need to gather up 10 Mechanical Parts and bring them back to Cheng.
I found the 10 missing parts in the Toy Factory and gave them back to Cheng the Assistant. Hopefully this will help the Factory run as smoothly as it should be.

string.name: name
string.value: Scroll of Life

Somewhere around Ludibrium, I saw a small fairy that was glowing all over her body. Her name was Wisp, and is a part of Mar the Fairy. She saw my pet in a state of doll and claimed that she can turn my doll pet back into a real-life pet with #bwater of life#k and #bMcDonald's#k. The Scroll of Life is apparently at #bCloy's House#k in Ludibrium, which should be empty at this point.

I found the #bscroll of life#k at #bCloy's house#k in Ludibrium. I gave this, along with the #bWater of Life#k, to Wisp and he helped turn my pet back alive. I need to have some play time with my pet now!

string.name: name
string.value: The Messenger of the Toy Palace 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Toy Palace
#p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, has something in plan for me. I should go visit #p2041004#.

I went to #m220000000# to visit #p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, because he had an offer for me. #p2041004# requested that I, as a representative of the #m220000000# castle, visit a place called #m240000000#, and if I was really interested in heading there as a messenger of #m220000000#, then I should eliminate #r10 Ratz, 10 Black Ratz, and 10 Red Ratz#k first.

Ratz #r#a32421##k
Black Ratz #r#a32422##k
Ratz #r#a32423##k

At the suggestion from #p2041004#, the security guard of #m220000000#, I headed to #m240000000# as the messenger of #m220000000#. #p2041004# graciously provided me with #b#t4161013##k. What's the item I'm supposed to give him, though?

string.name: name
