#p2040013# apparently has been skipping lunch these days because of heavy workload... I better check it out.

#p2040013# complained to me that he had been missing lunch lately because of the #o3210205#s that were all over Eos Tower. The angered #p2040013# wanted me to kill #b20 #o3210205#s#k and bring him #b5 #t4000096#s#k.

#i4000096##t4000096# #b#c4000096#/5#k
#o3210205# #r#a32441##k

I was able to help out #p2040013#, who had been missing lunch almost every day because of the #o3210205#s invading Eos Tower, by killing off those #o3210205#s and giving him some walnuts in the process.

string.name: name
string.value: Operation Strategy 1 : Collect All the Eggs

string.name: parent
string.value: The Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation
#b#p2041026##k in the #b#m220000000# Clocktower basement#k has proposed to begin a Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation. What does he mean by that? Let's go find #p2041026#.

The Clocktower Monster Wipe-Out Operation has begun. #p2041026# asks you to bring back #b#o4230113##k, #b#o3230306##k, and #b#t4031991##k... It seems he wants to exterminate all the eggs first. Alright, whatever he wants!
He says you can find other eggs by hunting #rTick, Tick-Tock, or Chronos type monsters#k, but #b#o5220003s# have a tendency to hatch their eggs in another bird's nest#k, so their eggs would be amongst eggs of other birds. It seems you have to crack other eggs to find it and take it over to #t4031991#. 

#i2022354##t2022354# #b#c2022354#/10#k 
#i2022355##t2022355# #b#c2022355#/10#k 
#i4031991##t4031991# #b#c4031991#/10#k
You have found all the eggs and gave them to #p2041026#. Ghosthunter Bob seems satisfied and suggests you engage in the operation.

string.name: name
string.value: Getting in the Way of Alcadno
#b#p2111008##k, an alchemist from Zenumist, seems to have a plan in store. Now that I'm Zenumist, I should help him out, right? I better go see #p2111008# immediately.

Zenumist is in conflict with Alcadno... I knew that fact, but I never thought he'd ask me for a favor like this! Anyway, since #p2111008# made the request, I better follow through with it, or I may be in trouble. I'll have to destroy #r200 #o5110300#k that Alcadnos have been working on. \n\n#o5110300# #r#a33081#
I destroyed the #o5110300#s that Alcadnos have been working on, at the request of #p2111008#. Hmmm... Was I allowed to do this? Why do Zenumist and Alcadno have such a huge conflict between them?

string.name: name
string.value: An Incident, and the Missing Alchemist
#b#p2111008##k, the alchemist from Zenumist, seems to need me for something else. What must it be this time? I better go see #p2111008#.

Bedin told me to enter the lab of Alcadno when no one is present, and steal the #b#t4031708##k for him. Apparently, it can be found on top of the table at #b#m261020700##k... but in order to get to #m261020700#, I'll have to use the portal from #m261020600#. Since all the lights are off at the lab, I'll have to really search for the document in the dark... \n\n#i4031708##t4031708# #b#c4031708##k/1

An incident from long ago. It all started with a flawed experiment from an alchemist. The failure brought a massive explosion, and the accompanying earthquake destroyed many parts of Magatia. The Magic Pentagram that was destroyed left the Homun into a rage ever since. To make matters worse, the alchemist responsible for this seems to have gone missing...

string.name: name
string.value: Carson's Experiment

string.name: parent
string.value: Zenumist and the Missing Alchemist

I found out through Bedin about the incident that happened a long time ago, and there are two people who hold the final clues. One is the missing alchemist himself; the other is the president of the society! Seems like he knows something about the missing alchemist...

Carson told me if I wanted to know more about the incident, then I'll have to prove him my worth, by entering the #bclosed-off lab#k where #rHomun#k is, and acquire the Magic Control Device and control the monsters through that. Once I throw the device into the Pentagram of Alchemy in the lab, the monsters can be controlled in an instant, and then I'll need to bring back #b#t4031709##k as evidence... \n\n#i4031709##t4031709# #b#c4031709##k/1
After I told him I successfully controlled Homunculi, that's when the president started discussing serious matters with me.

string.name: name
string.value: Destroy the Roid

#b#p2111009##k, an alchemist from #m261000000#, seems to be proficient at concocting and experimenting with medicine. He mentioned that he's short on something again. What would he be short on this time? I better go see #p2111009#.

Out of the blue, #p2111009# asked me to destroy #r#o5110301##k, which can be found at the storage area in the basement. Destroying #o5110301# wouldn't be impossible... but why? Does this have something to do with getting in the way of the Zenumist Society? \n\n#o5110301# #r#a33131##k
After destroying the #o5110301#s, I reported the results to #p2111009#. He then flashed a smile of satisfaction and relief. What the... Something about this creeps me out!

string.name: name
string.value: Life Alchemy, and the Missing Alchemist

Out of the blue, Alcadno's #p2111009# told me he wanted to reward me for helping him out with various favors... something doesn't seem right, but I'll just think of it as a positive event. I should go see #b#p2111009##k.

#p2111009# seemed grateful that I've helped him, and asked me to take a pill that he left for me at the top of the table in the upper lab. He also asked me to come down and see him again before the effect wears off. What is this? Is he conducting an experiment on me?

I knew it! I knew the medicine was dangerous. Fortunately, I was able to receive an antidote, but this is crazy! According to Russellon, the experiment he conducted was something he did with the #bmissing alchemist#k, a friend of his. The missing alchemist must have worked on something like changing the human's body form...

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Friend

string.name: parent
string.value: Alcadno and the Missing Alchemist

After I gave him his fee, #p2111007# told me something in his smug way. He asked me if I knew #b#p2040050##k. ... #p2040050#? Well, he's also an alchemist, I suppose... Which means he may have a connection with #m261000000#! What was his relationship with #p2111002#? I better go see #p2040050#.

#p2040050# was friends with #p2111002#. According to him, #b#p2111002#'s Secret Notes#k can be found somewhere... Secret Notes? #p2040050# told me he can't find the location where the Secret Notes are hidden either, but he was sure the key was #bmade out of silver#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Parwen the Ghost
When I entered a lab full of #o6110301#, I heard a strange voice somewhere inside... this is not good.
Following along the deep, mature voice, I found myself having crossed the #bstrange #o6110301##k.
A strange #o6110301#... Apparently it's the alchemist that worked here before, called #p2111006#. What? Does that mean he's... a ghost! For a ghost, he certainly does not seem intimidating...

string.name: name
string.value: The Key to the Secret Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes

I mentioned the book I found at the underground study to #p2111004#. I told her that the book may hold the clue to #p2111002#'s disappearance... then I asked Phyllia for #t4031744#. She seemed hesitant, but she gave me the item in the end. Time to go back to the #bunderground study#k.

Looking at the hidden hole, I matched #t4031744# into it, and... The rose engraving on #t04031744# matched the shape of the hole. That's when a light flashed out of the hole. Okay, time to look more into it.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secrets of Magatia

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes

Thanks to #t4031737#, #t4161032# can now be read the way it was meant to be... The hidden message pertains to the #bhistory behind the creation of #m261000000##k. #p2020005# told me to visit him after finding out all the truth behind the note...
#m261000000#... With the secrets behind the town of alchemy about to be unveiled, I needed to see someone that is aware of its history... which means only one person. Alcaster.

string.name: name
string.value: The Black Magician's Magic Pentagram

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes

#p2020005# said that because of #p2111002#'s experiment, the Black Magician's Magic Pentagram that sustained #m261000000# was shaken to its core, which destabilized the Pentagram. He also mentioned that if this is kept as it is, then soon, the Magic Pentagram will explode. In order to prevent this from happening, he instructed me to find #b3 Magic Rocks and place them in sequence to soothe the Magic Pentagram, then apply pressure to the center of the Magic Pentagram#k... 

#i4031739##t4031739# #b#c4031739##k/1 
#i4031740##t4031740# #b#c4031740##k/1 
#i4031741##t4031741# #b#c4031741##k/1

I received one of the Magic Rocks from #p2020005#, but the rest will have to be found through the #rmonsters of #m261000000##k. I better find 3, and then head off to the Black Magician's Lab. That lab is only accessible through the secret passage that connects Zenumist and Alcadno.

After successfully putting Magic Pentagram under control, I went to see #p2020005#, the 3rd president of the Alchemist Union, again. I wonder what he's thinking, with that soothing smile that instinctively makes us put our guards down...?

string.name: name
string.value: The Brutal Truth

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. De Lang's Notes

#m261000000#, the town of alchemists, has a dark history that had been hidden away from the public. #m261000000# was built where the Black Magician's Lab was a long time ago, when the Wizard ruled all of Ossyria. The town was initially growing with the experiments conducted by the Black Magician as foundation. If this fact is ever let out to the public, the damage to #m261000000#'s reputation might be irreparable, they say...
#p2111002#, the missing alchemist ... His beginning of the tragedy might have stemmed from the town of #m261000000# in itself. The end of this story is...

string.name: name
string.value: For Zenumist

#p2111002#, the missing alchemist. What he wanted and the dark truth behind #m261000000 #... All these previously hidden facts have been revealed. Now it's the matter of choice. If I am to choose Zenumist, I'll have to head to where #r#p2111000##k is.

If I handed #b#t4161033##k to #p2111000#, then the truth about #m261000000#, as well as all things #p2111002# strived for would be hidden forever. If that really is what I want for this to happen, then I have no choice but to hand in #t1102135# and the note to #p2111000#.
I gave #p2111000# #t4161033#, and received a brand new Zenumist Cape. This has made me forfeit my right to condemn the Zenumists. This has now made me an integral part of the Zenumist.

string.name: name
string.value: For Alcadno

#p2111002#, the missing alchemist. What he wanted and the dark truth behind #m261000000 #... All these previously hidden facts have been revealed. Now it's the matter of choice. If I am to choose Alcadno, I'll have to head to where #r#p2111001##k is.

If I handed #b#t4161033##k to #p2111001#, then the truth about #m261000000#, as well as all things #p2111002# strived for would be hidden forever. If that really is what I want for this to happen, then I have no choice but to hand in #t1102135# and the note to Maed.
I gave #p2111001# #t4161033#, and received a brand new Alcadno Cape. This has made me forfeit my right to condemn the Alcadnos. I am now one of them.

string.name: name
string.value: For Phyllia

#p2111002#, the missing alchemist. What he wanted and the dark truth behind #m261000000 #... All these previously hidden facts have been revealed. Now it's the matter of choice. If I am to choose the truth, then I'll have to head over to #b#p2111004##k.
The truth must be told, even if it causes heartbreak and anger. Once I get myself ready to reveal the truth, I better hand in #b#t4161033##k to #p2111004#.
With trembling hands, #p2111004# received #t4161033#. There was no way to tell how she'd react to it, whether to be angry, sad, in despair...or forgive. It's all up to her now.

string.name: name
string.value: What De Lang Wants

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is De Lang?

I entered #m261020401# without really thinking too much about it... As usual, #b#p2111006##k the talkative ghost starts up a conversation. I don't really want to listen to him go on and on about his life. What should I do?
When I asked about #p2111002#'s past that I saw through him in the past, Parwen's face lit up and showed me #p2111002# again. Hmmm... He looks like a bit of time has passed since I last saw him...

I tried to start up a conversation with an obviously tired #p2111002#. His face may have the look of exhaustion, but he managed to smile just a bit. He may have failed the experiment, but he said he has succeeded in creating a new medicine for #p2111005#...

string.name: name
string.value: De Lang's Potion

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is De Lang?

#p2111002# confessed his research hasn't taken steps forward these days, but then he lightened up and told me he found a cure for #p2111005#... What? #bA medicine for #p2111005##k? But everything in #p2111002#'s house seemed to have been cleaned out. \n\nIf he didn't try so darndest to hide this, then someone from Alcadno that might have gotten through #p2111002#'s Lab Report. I better go see #b#p2111001##k of Alcadno, since he searched #p2111002#'s whole house.
When I told #p2111001# of #p2111002#, he seemed genuinely shocked.

string.name: name
string.value: Who is De Lang?

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is De Lang?

I explained to #p2111003# that the medicine might cure #p2111005#, and received the medicine from him. I did bring this half suspecting this might be a scam, but really... is it enough to cure #p2111005#? The president of Alcadno Society, #b#p2111001##k, might correctly find out the list of ingredients for this.
#p2111001# said this medicine indeed cures #p2111005#'s sickness... Why in the world was #p2111003# holding on to the medicine #p2111002# made all this time??

string.name: name
string.value: Parwen's Pass

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret, Quiet Passage
#p2111006# is the chatty ghost at the basement lab of #m261000000#. Apparently, he knows a secret passage in #m261000000# that no one is aware of... I better go talk to #b#p2111006##k.

#p2111006# said that a long time ago, when he was an alchemist at #m261000000#, he had a #bpass#k that gave him access to the secret passage that connects Zenumist to Alcadno. ...a Secret Passage? That sounds very interesting! #t4031745# believed that #rCytis#k might have taken it, so I'll have to find the pass myself and use it at the entrance of the Secret Passage.\n\n#i4031745##t4031745# #b#c4031745##k/1
I brought #t4031745# to the entrance of the Secret Passage, but the door didn't open. What the...

string.name: name
string.value: Verifying the Password

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret, Quiet Passage

#p2111006# said he came up with the master code that'll allow me to gain free access to the Secret Passage, and gave me a long list of numbers. Sigh... this is so complicated, I'll have to write it down somewhere.
When I entered the master key #p2111006# gave me, the Secret Passage opened up, and now I have unlimited access to the passage. Hmm... Heâ€™s much more helpful than I thought.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcadno and the Ostracized Research
Apparently, #bRussellon#k, an alchemist from Alcadno, wants something...

Russellon mentioned that there was an alchemist that has been ostracized by everyone for trying to combine the works of Zenumist and Alcadno, #bYulete#k, and he was interested in obtaining the Lab Report. He wanted me to acquire #b#t4031774##k for him, and in order to do so, I'll have to find someone that is aware of #p2112014#'s current whereabouts... \n\n#i4031796##t4031796# #b#c4031796##k/1

I was able to find Yulete's Lab Report, and gave it to Russellon. According to him, Yulete's studies were released at the height of the conflict between Zenumist and Alcadno, and mentioned that if he released it at an opportune time, then he could have received a much more favorable response.

string.name: name
string.value: Yulete's Request

For a while, he was so jaded that he wanted to take on Magatia all by himself, but now that someone recognized and appreciated his greatness, Yulete seems to finally find some peace in himself... I better find #bYulete#k, who might be hiding somewhere in #bMagatia#k.

Yulete made a promise that from here on out, instead of conducting experiments to be accepted by others, he's going to do it for his own satisfaction. Conducting these studies and experiments alone seems a little difficult, though. I better help Yulete out. #k

#y3366# #b (#u3366#)#k
#y3367# #b(#u3367#)#k
#y3368# #b(#u3368#)#k

I was able to really help Yulete complete his experiments. He may not have been universally accepted by his peers, but he's indeed a genius alchemist. An alchemist like him is more than capable of raising the bar of alchemy in Magatia much higher.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Reagent
To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.

Yulete asked me to help him #bmake the Reagent#k. I'll need to pour the prepared liquid in the beaker and make the reagent, but I heard that the liquids have to be poured in sequence. .. And the sequence is #bred, green, yellow, blue, and purple#k! Let's make this. \n\n#i4031798##t4031798# #b#c4031798##k/1
After successfully making the reagent, I reported the results to Yulete. He thanked me for helping him with something that he considered was a difficult task.

string.name: name
string.value: Organizing the Lab Report
To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.

Yulete asked me to organize his Lab Report. At his #bLab 2#k, there are so many reports that he had written that have been spread out all over the place that it needs to be organized in the worst way. I better start gathering up some #breports#k. \n\n#i4031797##t4031797# #b#c4031797##k/20
I gathered up the reports and gave to Yulete. Organizing all these reports will keep Yulete busy for a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Sirin's Tailoring Methods

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Response

Sirin was more than happy to accommodate, by giving me the pattern to the nicest clothes she has in store. So all I need to do is give this to Juliet? Hmmm... Something tells me this might not end up the way I planned. Anyway, I better give #bJuliet#k the patterns first.
After giving Juliet the pattern, she jumped for joy. That's the good part. Can she really make the clothes based on the pattern, though?

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet's Response

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Response

Juliet was able to make the clothes. It was very well-made, actually. She must be good with her hands. There's one slight problem, though... I wonder if she'll really give it to Romeo, because it is DEFINITELY FOR WOMEN!! I knew something wasn't right. Despite the concerns, Juliet asked me to give this 'dress' to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo seemed very happy to receive the clothes that Juliet made for him. Seriously, is he going to wear that dress with the pink ribbon on? Alchemists are really strange, that's for sure.

string.name: name
string.value: Allegro, the Master of the Rings
Romeo had decided to propose to Juliet. To help facilitate that, I better get him a nice ring. The ring can be acquired through Allegro, the master of rings at Wedding Village.

Allegro said the perfect ring for Romeo and Juliet might be the Silver Wing Ring that represents purity, and asked me to gather up the materials for him. 

#i4021007##t4021007# #b#c4021007##k/2 
#i4011004##t4011004# #b#c4011004##k/2
I received the ring from Allegro. I better give this to #bRomeo#k now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Unidentified Group
#b#m261000000##k's #b#p2111007##k seems to be concerned about something. What must that be? I better go see #p2111007#.

#p2111007# said recently, someone purchased an inordinate amount of jewels and machinery, so much so that he wanted to make sure who that person might be that made the massive order. These items seemed to have been shipped to #b#m100030000##k...

At #m100030000#, I saw a tree entrance that had not been seen before. It looked like an entrance to a fort... So when I tried to speak to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of the entrance, he said a new fort for #bPirate #p1072008##k is currently being built.

string.name: name
string.value: Moren's Upset

string.name: parent
string.value: Gordon Passes His Magic

Keol and Ramain have been concerned lately because Moren seemed to be letting out a heavy sigh every other minute. They may not try to show it, but the two are struggling right now, so for the sake of these three, I better ask Moren what's up.

Gordon's Secret Technique! This is something I didn't even see coming. A secret technique that even the creator of the Maker skill cannot execute. Moren had high expectations that this technique would further advance the Maker skill. I decided to visit Gordon in El Nath without notifying Moren. Who knows, I might be the one learning that skill instead.

After calmly answering Gordon's questions, I was able to have this rolling in no time. Gordon at first seemed taken aback that the very existence of the technique had been exposed, but seemed to have gotten over it quickly. He then made a proposition where if I pass his test, then he'll share his technique with me. I wonder what that test is...

string.name: name
string.value: Gordon's Magic Iron

string.name: parent
string.value: Gordon Passes His Magic

Just as Gordon says, being a great craftsman requires patience and stamina. Gordon then gave me a test where he assigned me to gather up some Jr. Yeti Skins, which are also used as primary materials for shoemaking. I wonder what that secret technique is... I better come back ASAP.\n\n#i04000048# #t04000048# #b#c04000048##k / 50

I finally found the secrets to Gordon's technique! Well, the important aspects here are the two types of Magic Pentagrams that's used to create a new scroll, and the Magic Iron that helped press them. The Magic Iron that Gordon gave me... it seemed like it had some sort of a story behind it, but I was not able to listen to it in detail. I should ask him about that the next time I see him.\nAccording to Gordon, when summoning the Maker skill, when I have the Magic Iron equipped in my hand, then I'll be able to create new scrolls.

string.name: name
string.value: Gordon's Warm Heart

Oh my gosh... I wound up losing #b#t1122013##k! I swear I kept it with me, but while I looked away, I wound up... misplacing it. Sigh, there's nothing I can do, I better just visit #b#p2020002##k and tell him what happened. Do I really have to go to #b#m211000100##k and face the music?

He knew I had misplaced it? He picked it up from the streets? I was shocked to hear what #b#p2020002##k told me. Honestly, losing it really made me feel guilty about it, but at least it's back in my hands now! Phew... I'll need to start another conversation with him.

I really didn't see it coming. I was totally unaware that he had left #b#m211000100##k and was watching me from the back... thankfully, #p2020002# had the item with him, and he just gave me back the item without much of a lecture. I felt so bad and embarrassed that I vowed never to misplace the item ever again.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Letter
Chief Stan wants to ask me for something... I wonder what it is...

I met with #bChief Stan#k, who was at Henesys in Victoria Island. He handed me what appeared to be an old, sealed letter, and wanted me to deliver it to Dr. Kim of Omega Sector. He said to get to Omega Sector. I'll need to first get on board a ship from Ellinia to Orbis, followed by the ride to Ludibrium from there.

I met Dr. Kim at Omega Sector, and handed him the #bsealed letter#k that Chief Stan gave me. This place seems to be full of facilities designed in anticipation of the alien invasion... I should talk to Dr. Kim whenever I have a chance...

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting with Chury

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments

I met Chury at the Silo of the Omega Sector and showed him the #bBlueprint Machine#k, which contains the blueprint of the new robot that I got from Dr. Kim. Chury wanted to show this to Hoony, so he asked me if I could show the Blueprint Machine to Hoony, as well as provide him with #b20 Space Foods#k, for he had been away at the Field for a while. Space Food, huh... I think I can find them through Barnard Gray the alien. I'll run into on the way to the Field. \n\n#t4000117# #b#c4000117##k/20

I met up with Chury somewhere around the Omega Sector Silo. Chury wanted me to show the Blueprint Machine to Hoony, as well as give him some food. In turn, I gave Hoony some Space Food to last him a while, and showed him the Blueprint Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting with Hoony

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments

I met Hoony at a Field around Omega Sector, and showed him the #bBlueprint Machine#k, as well as provide him with #b20 Space Foods#k. Hoony said that he fixed #bGunny's Laser Gun#k that he was asked to fix and requested me if I could give him his #bLaser Gun#k as well as show him the Blueprint Machine. He should be somewhere around the Field. Where could he be...?

Hoony wanted to show the Blueprint to Gunny. He was already on his way to give Gunny a new weapon, so he asked me if I could give him the new gun, as well as show him the Blueprint. After much searching around, I was able to finally find him and gave him the gun.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Robotic Parts

string.name: parent
string.value: Supplying the Robotic Parts

I met with Cheng the Assistant at the Toy Factory in Ludibrium, and he handed me 3 boxes full of robotic parts, which will be used to make the robot. Now I should just hand them over to Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

At the Toy Factory in Ludibrium, Cheng the Assistant gave me 3 boxes of robotic parts so I could deliver them to Dr. Kim of the Command Center in the Omega Sector. After delivering the goods to Dr. Kim, he gave me a Warp Capsule, which will enable me to transport to Ludibrium in an instant. Hmmm... This looks like something I can use!

string.name: name
string.value: Hoony's Toothache
I should go see Hoony of Omega Sector.

I met with Hoony again at a field around Omega Sector. Hoony seemed to have an affinity for sweets, and it did not do his teeth any good. Now, he needed Pain Reliever to relieve the excruciating pain on his teeth. My job now is to get the #bPain Reliever#k from the Omega Sector, and give it to Hoony.
I purchased the #bPain Reliever#k from Dr. Pepper at the Omega Sector Silo, and gave it to Hoony, who was at a field around Omega Sector. Seriously, enough with the sweets!

string.name: name
string.value: The Alarm Clock
I should go see Pink Mesoranger, who's somewhere around the Boswell Field...

I met up with #bPink Mesoranger#k at the Boswell Field near Omega Sector, and she looked very concerned over her never-ending habit of oversleeping. She asked if I could get her 20 #bTable Clocks#k that are dropped from monster #bTick-Tocks#k. I better start heading down to the bottom of the Ludibrium Clocktower. \n\n#t4000114# #b#c4000114##k/20

I gathered up #bTable Clocks#k for Pink Mesoranger, who was stationed somewhere around Omega Sector, so she can overcome her chronic oversleeping. But then again, she always had trouble waking up, so I may have to find something more powerful for her...

string.name: name
string.value: The New Control Program

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot
I should go see Kay the engineer at the Omega Sector.

I met Kay the Engineer again at the Silo of the Omega Sector. She first wanted to make sure that I didn't forget that I volunteered to be her assistant. Then, she said she needed a number of memory cards that contain Rombot Control Program, and asked me to collect 3 #bRombot's Memory Cards#k, which can be found through Rombot the monster at the Eos Tower. Then, I'll have to pay a visit to #bPorter#k at the Command Center in the Omega Sector and have him decipher the memory cards, and then hand the #b3 Deciphered Memory Cards#k to her.
I defeated the Rombots that have been hidden in Eos Tower and got a hold of the #bRombot's Memory Cards#k. I then handed them to Porter to decipher the code.

string.name: name
string.value: Where is the Dropship?

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Dropship

I was able to hand #bPorter#k's letter from the Command Center in the Omega Sector to #bKay the Engineer#k, who was in the Omega Sector Silo, on time. I was expecting it to be a love letter, to no avail. Instead, it was about the missing dropship, and its current location. That's boring... anyway, Kay requested that I find the Dropship, which should be somewhere around Boswell Field, and check out the pilot's livelihood.
I found an empty dropship at the Boswell Field, and it appeared to have mistakenly landed here. The pilot is nowhere to be found; a letter was found instead.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 500 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b500 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/500

I gathered up enough Mateon Tentacles for Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector to make the new antidote. Was that the reason? It looks like Rice created the medicine that even the great Dr. Pepper couldn't make. Once he gets the patent on it and mass-produce it, he may be sitting on a huge pile of cash. Will he share a little bit of that with me?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Plateon
I better go see Green Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Boswell Field.

I met up with Green Mesoranger again at the Boswell Field of Omega Sector. This time, Green Mesoranger said that the #bPlateons#k, which are far more dangerous than the Mateons, are threatening the Omega Sector and that I'll have to take care of them, while bringing #b80 Plateon's Helmets#k as evidence.\n\n#t4000121# #b#c4000121##k/80

I took out the Plateons and collected 80 Plateon Helmets, just the way Green Mesoranger from Boswell Field asked. The duties of the Mesorangers don't seem to be over, though, so if I have some time to spare, then I maybe I should go check Green Mesoranger then.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Plateon and Mecateon
I better go see Green Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Boswell Field.

I met up with Green Mesoranger again at the Boswell Field of Omega Sector. As a last task, Green Mesoranger asked me to eliminate the #bPlateons#k again, and collect #bMecateon's#k weapons, which are very high-quality. I need to take out #b150 Plateons#k and collect #b120 Mecateon's Laser Guns#k for him.

#o4230120# #r#a34371##k
#t4000122# #b#c4000122##k/120

Just the way the mission stated by Green Mesoranger of Boswell Field, I took out the Plateons and collected Mecateon's laser guns. Green Mesoranger seemed genuinely surprised by the fact that I took care of all the missions, and told me it'd be a pleasure to work with me again. Now, THAT felt good!

string.name: name
string.value: The Ore of Dark Crystal
I should go visit General Maestro at the Omega Sector.

I met General Maestro, who's in command of a humongous army at the Omega Sector. The General said we'll be able to obtain the powerless, lightless #bDull Crystals#k because they've been used at the Eos Tower. While most would dismiss the item as nothing more than a useless crystal, the General believed it had something important hidden within, and he requested me to gather up #b20 Dull Crystals#k at the Eos Tower. I'll need to get those crystals from the #bDrumming Bunnies#k at the tower.\n\n#t4031135# #b#c4031135##k/20

Just like the way General Maestro instructed, I went to Eos Tower, took out the Drumming Bunnies, and gathered up #b20 Dull Crystals#k for him. While looking at the crystal, he mentioned that there must be something inside these crystals to turn these previously-adorable Drumming Bunnies to something of a menace. I wonder exactly what's inside it.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Power of Origin?
I should go visit General Maestro at the Omega Sector.

I met General Maestro, who's in command of a humongous army at the Omega Sector. The General said after investigating the Dull Crystals from the Drumming Bunnies, he realized that the aliens may have a clue about this, and instructed me to find Alien Gray. There may be an item around Alien Gray that may provide clues for this. Of course, it won't just cough up the item, so I'll have search the area around Alien Gray.\n\n#t4031136# #c4031136#/1

Just like the way General Maestro instructed, I found a hidden document that appeared to have been purposely hidden Alien Gray. The general said, after putting the document through Alien Language Translator, it said a Dark Crystal Ore with its dark force will turn a harmless doll into a monster. He wanted all the crystals gone before it gets too late.

string.name: name
string.value: Terminating the Dark Force.
I should go visit General Maestro at the Omega Sector.

I met General Maestro, who's in command of a humongous army at the Omega Sector, again. The General said although a perfect solution hasn't been presented yet, there's something for me to do. He wanted me to bring back #b30 Dull Crystals#k and #b10 Dark Crystal Ores#k from the Drumming Bunnies at the Eos Tower.

#t4031140# #b#c4031140##k/30
#t4004004# #b#c4004004##k/10

Just like the way General Maestro instructed, I gathered up the #bDull Crystals#k and #bDark Crystal Ores#k from the Drumming Bunnies. Hopefully this'll stop the bunnies for a while, but this ain't over. I wonder when peace will actually settle on the Eos Tower.

string.name: name
string.value: A Chat with Nara the Tour Guide

string.name: parent
string.value: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach
Nara said a Ripped VIP pass will not work, nor can it be re-published, but the way to leave may be easier by paying a visit to Shuri, the Tour Guide at Orbis.
Hmmm ... so something as simple as making a new ticket cannot be done, huh. Alright, since I'm here and all, why don't I just take a crack at it â€˜til the very end?

string.name: name
string.value: Recovering VIP Ticket to Florina Beach

string.name: parent
string.value: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach

I visited Shuri, and she mentioned that the VIP ticket cannot be re-issued, but it can be recovered. To recover the ripped VIP ticket, I'll need a few items... 

 #t04000059# #b#c04000059##k/50 
 #t04000060# #b#c04000060##k/30 
 #t04021007# #b#c04021007##k/3
After recovering the ripped VIP Ticket to Florina Beach, I was given the VIP Ticket to Florina Beach, a lifetime pass, as a sign of thanks.\nNow it's a matter of taking a vacation whenever I want.

string.name: name
string.value: The Binding
The number of ghosts has increased dramatically, that it got to the point of #p2041026# being sent to Ludibrium to do something about it. I should go see him.
I was able to meet #p2041026# past the Path of Time of Ludibrium. He wanted me to eliminate the bindings of #o7130300#, and collect the bindings for him. \n\n#t4000148# #b#c4000148#/20#k
I helped #p2041026#, who was hastily sent to Ludibrium, eliminate the bindings that enclosed #o7130300#.

string.name: name
string.value: Free Spirit
The number of ghosts has increased dramatically, that it got to the point of #p2041026# being sent to Ludibrium to do something about it. I should go see him.
I was able to meet #p2041026# past the Path of Time of Ludibrium. He wanted me to free #o6230500#s and collect their souls. \n\n#t4000144# #b#c4000144#/80#k
I helped Ghosthunter Bob find freedom for Master Soul Teddies.

string.name: name
string.value: The Soul Collector
Ghosthunter Bob of Ludibrium is complaining that he lost the vacuum that gathers up the spirits in it.

Apparently, once Ghosthunter Bob focuses on eating, he will never realize about anything and everything, including the thefts. This is the reason he had no idea his Soul Collector had been missing. I better help him find it back. 

#t4031193# #b#c4031193##k/1 
#o8141000# Eliminate #r#a34461##k
I helped Ghosthunter Bob recover the lost Soul Collector.

string.name: name
string.value: Mason the Collector

string.name: parent
string.value: Mason the Collector
I should meet Mason, who newly moved into a previously-empty house at Ludibrium.

The bird with an odd way of talking, Mason the Collector is always busy looking for something to collect. It especially has a fondness for sparkling objects, and apparently found the Aurora Marble at the Warped Path of Time. Hmmm... Wonder who has that item? \n\n#t4031189::# #b#c4031189#/1#k
At the Warped Path of Time, I took out the Lazy Buffies, collected the Aurora Marble, and handed it to Mason.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of the VIP Ticket
Where did the ripped piece of the VIP ticket go? I better go see Kevin the Soldier.
The ripped piece of the VIP ticket is missing, so I went to Kevin the Soldier for its whereabouts. Kevin wound up picking up the ticket after I left.
I was looking for the ripped piece of the VIP ticket for a looong time, and I found out that the ones I dropped, Kevin the Soldier managed to pick them up and save them. Phew!

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of the VIP Ticket
Where did the ripped piece of the VIP ticket go? I better go see Kevin the Soldier.
The ripped piece of the VIP Ticket has disappeared, so I asked Kevin the Soldier for some help.
Fortunately, even after losing a ripped piece of VIP ticket, Kevin the Soldier was picking up after me. Phew... thanks a lot.

string.name: name
string.value: Blocktopus is an Alien?
I heard that #p2050001# of #m221000000# has something new to research, and is in need of help...

As someone who tirelessly studied life in space, #p2050001# wondered if a monster from Eos Tower, #b#o3230302##k, is in fact an alien. He said details could be found out by having an octopus key chain...

#i4000099##t4000099# #b#c4000099#/1#k

Then... if there's more definite evidence than #t4000099#, maybe we'll find out a more accurate answer.
Gave #p2050001# #t4000099#. Will #p2050001# be able to find the correlations between #o3230302# and aliens?

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane2

As #p2140000# said, I was able to pass #m270010100# and go all the way to #m270010200#. But I couldn't move beyond that... I thought I was given permission, what's going on? I'm going to have to complain to #b#p2140000##k.

He said the permission he gave me was only up to #m270010200#, and that if I wanted to go in further, I would have to prove myself for that as well. When I told him that I definitely want to explore more, he said to go to #b#m270010200##k this time and defeat #r999 #o8200002##k... \n\n#o8200002# #r#a35021##k

I defeated 999 #o8200002#. #p2140000# was once again impressed and granted me permission. I get a feeling that this permission is only good up to #m270010300#. If I want to go in further, will I have to prove my strength again?

string.name: name
string.value: Memory Keeper

string.name: parent
string.value: Memory Lane

I went to go see #p2140001# just as #p2140000# told me to. He immediately knew that I lost my memory and said in order to retrieve the lost memory, I would need to go back to the beginning where my adventure began...
After talking to the Memory Keeper, I went to my previous job post at Victoria Island to retrieve my memory. I wonder if I got my memory back. I guess I'll know when I try to go past Memory Lane...

string.name: name
string.value: Frozen Emotions

string.name: parent
string.value: Road of Regrets
I received permission from #p2140000# but I wasn't able to get past #m270020500#. Is there another problem? I should go talk to #b#p2140000##k.

#o8220005#, the Ice Knight who protects the temple, has frozen his emotions so that regret would never cause him to fail a mission. #p2140000# said it seems like #bmy emotions have been frozen as well#k while fighting him. He continued to say that those with frozen emotions don't feel any regret and can't pass through the Lane of Regret... So what do I do? \n\n Then #p2140000# suggested perhaps #b#p2140002##k, who can make all sorts of things, might be able to help me.
I met with #p2140002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Beyond the Ruins
#p2140000# made the intruder's force field ineffective. What was this intruder planning to do? I should ask #b#p2140000##k.

#p2140000# said that he has no idea what the intruder wants. There's nothing but a ruin deep in the temple and nothing to take from the Path of Past. 'Perhaps the #rMirror of the Goddess#k...?' he mumbled and then shook his head and said 'No way...' But just in case, he told me to go past #b#m270040000#, to #m270050000##k and check...
When I told #p2140000# that someone summoned a strange monster from the Mirror of the Goddess, his face turned pale.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search for the Lost Memory

According to the Memory Keeper, in order to find my lost memory, I need to go back to the starting point of my adventure. Starting point of my adventure? Let's see... Wouldn't that be when I left Maple Island to Victoria Island for the first time and got my job? I should go see #b#p1022000##k.

It had been a long time since I last met with #p1022000#. He said he remembered back when I was just a beginning and I knew nothing. He was happy to see how I've grown into a great warrior. I was touched that he still remembered our first meeting from such a long time ago.

It had been a long time since I last met with #p1022000#. He said he remembered back when I was just a beginning and I knew nothing. He was happy to see how I've grown into a great warrior. I was touched that he still remembered our first meeting from such a long time ago.

string.name: name
string.value: The Goddess' Blessing

string.name: parent
string.value: Road to Oblivion
I received permission from #p2140000#, but once I went deep inside the temple, something was stopping me and I couldn't go further. What did I lose this time? I should go see #b#p2140000##k.

#p2140000# scratched his head and said he didn't know what happened this time. He said unless I lost my Oblivion, which doesn't make sense, there should be no reason I can't pass through the Road to Oblivion. \n\nHe suggested that maybe the #bGoddess' Promise#k has been broken and told me to go see #b#p2140003##k to check the records of the promise.

I met with #p2140003#. He said he was waiting for me and began explaining things to me as if he already knew what happened. He said that the blessing of the Goddess of Time will never disappear or be taken away, and it was still valid... However, he said that there is another reason why I can't go deep into the temple.

string.name: name
string.value: Beyond the Ruins
#p2140000# made the intruder's force field ineffective. What was this intruder planning to do? I should ask #b#p2140000##k.

#p2140000# said that he has no idea what the intruder wanted especially when there's nothing but a ruin deep in the temple and nothing to take from the Path of Past. 'Perhaps the #rMirror of the Goddess#k...?â€™ he mumbled and then shook his head and said 'no way...'. But just in case, he told me to go past #b#m270040000#, to #m270050000##k and check...
When I told #p2140000# that someone summoned a strange monster from the Mirror of the Goddess, his face turned pale.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for Lost Memories

If one is to look for a lost memory, then one must return to the place it all started. The place it all started... It all started when you first left Rien and stepped foot on Victoria Island. You'd better go talk to #b#p1201000##k.

You met with #p1201000# for the first time in a while. Lilin seemed genuinely happy to see you work hard to regain your previous form, both physically and mentally. You were glad as she reminisced about the first time you met.

You met with #p1201000# for the first time in a while. Lilin seemed genuinely happy to see you work hard to regain your previous form, both physically and mentally. You were glad as she reminisced about the first time you met.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of Lost Memories

According to the Memorykeeper, you must return to the point where you started your adventure in order to regain your lost memory. Hmm... Wouldn't that be the time you left the farm and went to Chief Stan on an errand? Go to #bHenesys#k and meet with #bChief Stan#k.

You met with Chief Stan. Chief Stan, who only knew you to be the second child of the Gustav, was very happy that you became a Maple World Hero. Talking to Chief Stan, who still remembers your childhood, warms your heart.

You met with Chief Stan. Chief Stan, who only knew you to be the second child of the Gustav, was very happy that you became a Maple World Hero. Talking to Chief Stan, who still remembers your childhood, warms your heart.

string.name: name
string.value: Brotherly Love

string.name: parent
string.value: Brotherly Love

While I was busy secretly placing sacks of rice on both Chil Sung's and Chil Nam's stacks back and forth, I was finally caught red-handed by Chil Sung. Chil Sung thanked me for strengthening the love and bond between the brothers even more. He also said that Chil Nam might have noticed it himself, and wanted me to go see him.

I was busy transferring multiple sacks of rice for Chil Sung and Chil Nam on each other's stacks, but was caught red-handed. The brothers seemed genuinely thankful for helping them strengthen their love and bond even more. Chil Nam even offered me the best pork and buckwheat paste meal in Korean Folk Town!

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Seed
Apparently, a Swallow hurt its wing and is lying down around the village shrine. I better go check it out ...

I met Swallow near the village shrine, its wings clipped. Swallow was on a delivery, but lost the item that it was supposed to deliver: a rare seed. Swallow wanted me to find it. Apparently, it dropped the seed somewhere around where a bunch of suspicious rabbits looked on. Maybe the rabbits took it...\n\n#t4031241# #b#c4031241##k/1

I met Swallow near the village shrine, its wings clipped. Swallow was desperate to find the lost seed, and asked me for help. Swallow claimed to have lost the seed where a bunch of suspicious-looking rabbits gathered up, so I asked each and every one of them about the whereabouts of the seed. The seed was eventually found, and I gave them back to Swallow.

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing to Eliminate Goblins

string.name: parent
string.value: Goblin at Black Mountain
Apparently, Chumji, who is the landlord of the Korean Folk Town, have a request for me.

Chumji, who resides in Korean Folk Town, requested that I take out the Goblins who have been appearing at the mountain. The Goblins that have appeared at the Black Mountain are the goblins that have run away from the storybook on the Goblin Story, and they have been hiding out at an abandoned home. In order to draw them out of the seclusion, he told me I needed three different types of baits: #b#t2022050#, #t2022051#, #t2022052##k. I'll need to move around town and gather those items up. and then return to Chumji.

#t2022050# #b#c2022050##k/1
#t2022051# #b#c2022051##k/1
#t2022052# #b#c2022052##k/1

Chumji, who requested that I eliminate the Goblins that have run away from the Goblin Story book and are currently hiding at an abandoned house in a mountain, told me that in order to draw them out, I'll need to have three things that they love: buckwheat paste, roasted pork, and rice wine. He wanted me to gather them up for him. In the end, I was able to do so with help from Kong Ji, Hongbu, and Chil Nam.

I heard the Helios Tower Library has been ruined. I need to go check it out...

Wiz the Librarian seemed very concerned about the mix-up of the storybook on Hongbu and Nolbu, and he wished to get the story straight and find the storybook that actually does present the story in the right order.
Through the request from Wiz the Librarian, I have managed to straighten out the story of Hongbu and Nolbu and acquired the fixed storybook, after which I headed back to Wiz and gave him the book.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wooden Hoe That Snapped

string.name: parent
string.value: Kong Ji's Request
I heard that Kong Ji is in need of help. I should go check it out...

I went to visit Kong Ji again. She was sitting down, looking dejected. Her stepmom ordered her to plow the field by lunch, but her wooden hoe, which had been used for years and years, finally couldnâ€™t handle the pressure and snapped. Kong Ji felt that only a durable steel hoe can help her plow the field, so I have decided to get #t4031222# for her. I heard that I can obtain the #t4031222# by eliminating the Blins, who reside at the Black Mountain... \n\n#t4031222# #b#c4031222##k/1

I found a way to acquire #t4031222# through Blins at the Black Mountain, and gave them to Kong Ji, who still seemed devastated by the 'snapping' of the wooden hoe. Needless to say, she was ecstatic when given the steel hoe. She was thankful for my work, and went out to start weeding the garden. Kong Ji's been through a lot; hopefully something good happens to her down the road.

string.name: name
string.value: The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon
I heard there's a boy somewhere in Korean Folk Town that needs my help.

#b#p2071008##k is a boy that lives in Korean Folk Town with his mother and a little sister. He seemed to be in a hurry for something, so I asked him what's up, and he told me a story of what happened today. Apparently, his mother went out for a little bit, and while she was away from home, a tiger from the Black Mountain came to town and threatened to eat his sister and him. He said he has to leave town today before the tiger catches him tonight, and told me he needed #b20 #t4031268#s#k from #bHodori#k. And for reasons unknown, he also wanted me to get #b1 #t4031269##k that #r#o2230106##k gives.

#t4031268# #b#c4031268##k / 20
#t4031269# #b#c4031269##k / 1
#p2071008# from Korean Folk Town requested for 20 #t4031268#s and 1 #t4031269#. I got him the items, and he gave me #t4031270#.

string.value: Mr. Shim's Request
I should go visit Mr. Shim in Folk Town. I heard he hasn't been doing well lately...

At the Korean Folk Town, I met with #b#p2071009##k, who's a loving father to his only daughter, Shim Chung. Lately, however, he's been worried that his eyesight is rapidly failing him, and he fears that he may one day become blind. He wanted to buy a pair of Reading Glasses, but the astronomical price tag calls for #b300 #t4031279#s#k per pair, he wanted to borrow them from me. How am I going to find #t4031279#, though?
Ahhh, Mr. Shim said I can find it through #r#o3210208##k at #bHelios Tower#k... 

#t4031279# #b#c4031279##k / 300

I ran into #p2071009#, who was concerned about his rapidly failing eyesight, at Korean Folk Town. After hearing his story, I promised to lend him 300 #t4031279#s. The problem is, I don't have any rice ... but thankfully, after defeating #o3210208#, I was able to get 300 #t4031279#s. As a sign of thanks, #p2071009# gave me #t4031280#.

#t4010006# #b#c4010006##k / 1

#p2081002#, who's in charge of taking care of the egg for #m240000000#, wanted to keep the egg warm at all times, and wanted to cover it up with fluffy feathers of #o7130500#. I was asked if I could gather up some feathers of #b#t4000226##k and #b#t4000229##k.

#i4000226##t4000226# #b#c4000226##k / 55
#i4000229##t4000229# #b#c4000229##k / 75

string.name: name
string.value: Recipe for the Medicine
I heard something happened in Leafre. I'd better go talk to Pam.

Apparently something did happen at Leafre. I asked Pam what's up, and the concern was that the Halflingers living at the town ran into Kentauruses at the forest and were badly injured. To heal those Halflingers will require a medicine, and the #bChief Tatamo#k mentioned that #b80 #t4000241##k are required to make the medicine. I'll have to gather up #b80 #t4000241##k now for the wounded Halflingers.\n\n#i4000241##t4000241# #b#c4000241##k / 80

After hearing from Pam that in order to cure the Halflingers that are wounded by Kentauruses, I'll need to gather up some grass chewed by Birks, I was able to do exactly that and gave them all to Pam.

#p2081003# said that while roaming around Minar Forest, he saw that the trees that lead to Dragon's Forest have turned #bred#k. He doesn't think the other Halflingers know about this and asked me to go tell the Chief.
As #p2081003#'s requested, I went to see #p2081000# and told him that the trees at the entrance of Dragon's Forest had turned red.

string.name: name
string.value: The Remnants of Horntail...
After defeating Horntail, I was able to acquire Nine Spirit's Egg. I better take it to Nine Spirit's nest and see what happens.
When I placed the egg on the nest, the egg hatched, and a baby dragon emerged from the nest.
After returning Nine Spirit's Egg onto its nest, the baby dragon hatched from the egg. As soon as the dragon emerged, it coughed for a little bit, and spat out #b#t2041200##k.

string.name: name
string.value: The Suspicious Wanderer

string.name: parent
string.value: The Truth Behind that Man
There is a rumor that Han the Broker of Magatia has acquired a new piece of information. Sounds exciting...

Han the Broker says a suspicious wanderer was staying in Magatia until just a few days ago, but then disappeared without a trace. Han the Broker thinks you might be able to find the wanderer if you follow the traces he left and suggests you first go to Ariant to find him.
You met Syras at Ariant Station to ask about the suspicious wanderer that Han the Broker has told you about. Syras at the ticket box desk said a strange man bought a ticket to Orbis.

string.value: #bTalk to Syras, the ticket agent at Ariant Station.

You meet Isa the station guide as Syras instructed. Isa says an absent-minded man asked her directions to Leafre. She added that he was rather strange.

The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 asked you to find the Shelter Key and deliver it to Captain Edmond. You retrieved the key from the monsters and gave it to Captain Edmond at the quayside.

string.name: name
string.value: Nex the Time Guard

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing
Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your third time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Nex the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your third time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the third test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to the Bombed City Center in the year 2099. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary

EXP 106,900

string.name: name
string.value: Rambunctious Robots

string.name: parent
string.value: Year 2215- The Bombing

You meet May in the middle of the Bombed City Center in the year 2215. What's she doing in the destroyed City Center? In any case, she asks you to defeat the Robbies that appeared after the bombing. She says they're so loud and rambunctious that she's about to have a nervous breakdown.

You met May in the middle of the Bombed City Center in the year 2215. She asked you to defeat the Robbies that appeared after the bombing. She said they were so loud and rambunctious that she was about to have a nervous breakdown. Well, that worked out since you were thinking about getting rid of those noisy robots anyway.

string.name: name
string.value: The Dragon Rider's Identity 1
According to rumors, something has been appearing near Leafre and causing problems for the town. Go see #bChief Tatamo#k to find out more details.
Go meet #bChief Tatamo#k in Leafre and found out about what's been happening in there.
You met with #bChief Tatamo#k and received a request to investigate the strange case happening in the town.

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Teaching 1

string.name: parent
string.value: No Gong's Teaching
At #b#m250000000##k, there is an instructor that trains the Masters, an instructor by the name of #b#p2091000##k. Maybe I can become a Master myself if I train with him.
Without any explanation, #p2091000# ordered to me to take on #r10 #o5120503#s#k. \n\n#o5120503# #r#a38001##k
Even though I was successful in taking on all the #o5120503#s, #p2091000# didn't compliment my work one bit. What is he? Is he really going to help me become the Master?

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Teaching 2

string.name: parent
string.value: No Gong's Teaching
Despite defeating 10 #o5120503# just as #b#p2091000##k ordered, he had that look of 'that's really nothing'. What? Okay, that's really not cool. I better go see #p2091000# again.
Without any explanation, #p2091000# ordered to me to take on #r20 #o5120503#s#k. \n\n#o5120503# #r#a38011##k
Even though I was successful in taking on all the #o5120503#s, #p2091000# didn't compliment my work one bit. He's really getting on my nerves now...

string.name: name
string.value: No Gong's Teaching 3

string.name: parent
string.value: No Gong's Teaching

Despite defeating 20 #o5120503# like #b#p2091000##k asked, #p2091000# still seemed uninterested in making me the Master. Seriously, is he really an instructor? This is really getting on me, and I got to see him now, just to see what he'll ask me to do.

I asked him about being the Master, but #p2091000# gave me this uninterested look and told me to defeat #r40 #o5120503#s#k. First, 10... Then 20... Now 40? What am I, a training dog? Despite my anger ready to spill over, I realized I couldn't stop now. Fine, I'll do what #p2091000# says.\n\n#o5120503# #r#a38021##k

Despite defeating 40 #o5120503#s, #p2091000# still gave me that uninterested look and just nodded nonchalantly. I mean, he should be giving me some kind of a compliment for doing all that, but instead, #p2091000# iterated that I am still nowhere close to being a Master. Is he really gonna make me the Master?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Pirates
I heard #b#p2094000##k the bellflower is planning something. What would that be?

#p2094000# had a plan to release the Bellflowers that were being treated as slaves to the pirates. Unfortunately, he couldn't do it by himself, and asked me if I could go up to the pirate ship and defeat #r200 #o9300117#s#k and #r200 #o9300118#s#k. There are many different types of pirates under Lord Pirate, and the ones in command act differently from others. Apparently, they only make a quick appearance, then disappear. I better remember how they look, and eliminate the right ones. 

#o9300117# #r#a38121##k
#o9300118# #r#a38122##k

I was able to defeat the #o9300117#s and #o9300118#s at the pirate ship. Unfortunately, there are still plenty of pirates, and Lord Pirate is still alive and well. Will this be enough to save those Bellflowers?

string.name: name
string.value: Pirate's Map
#b#p9000009##k of #b#m104000000##k apparently has been waiting for the right time to do something big.

#p9000009# seemed eager to fight the stormy sea, and wanted me to find #b#t4001119##k, the map that featured the secret path through the stormy sea. According to #p9000009#, the one that has all 6 divided pieces of #b#t4001118##k happens to be the only person that has survived the stormy sea, #rLord Pirate#k... Hey, that means I have to go through the lair of Lord Pirate! \n\n#t4001118# #b#c4001118##k/6

I was able to gather up all the #t4001118#s from the lair of Lord Pirate and gave them to #p9000009#. Obtaining the map, #p9000009# seemed ecstatic to finally be able to tackle on the stormy sea. I mean, he's acutely aware of the dangers that lurk over him, and yet he seemed too eager to attack the water. #p9000009# really must be one heck of a traveler.

string.name: name
string.value: Finding the Ingredients for Tae Sang
#b#p2091002##k of #b#m250000000##k was apparently searching for a better ingredient for medicines.

#p2091002# told me that he heard rumors that at the lair of the pirates at #m251000000#, there are some herb concentrates available that cannot be obtained in ground. He asked me if I could get #b50 #t2022132#s#k and #b100 #t2022131#s#k for him.

#t2022132# #b#c2022132##k/50
#t2022131# #b#c2022131##k/100
I found 50 #t2022132#s and 100 #t2022131#s, and gave them to #p2091002#.

string.value: Making Body & Physics Medicine 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Making Body & Physics Medicine
Is #b#t2022144##k just about ready? I better ask #b#p2091002##k.
I finally received #b#t4031552##k from #p2091002#. Hmmm... It smells much better than I thought! I better take this to #b#p2091000##k immediately.

I managed to deliver #t2022144# to #p2091000#. I actually feel a little envious of the students that will be taking this to further strengthen their training... Fortunately, #p2091000# gave me some #t2022144#, too. Will this taste alright?

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo Protecting the Peach Tree
The proud protector of Peach Farm, #b#p2091003##k, has something he really wants...

#p2091003# wants to find a medicine that really speeds up the growth of Peach Tree. #p2091002# is a master at making these medicines, but he can't ask the owner of the Peach Farm to make the medicine for him, so he's asking me to get #b#t4031554##k from #b#p2090004##k...\n\n#i4031554##t4031554# #b#c4031554##k/1
I was able to obtain the medicine from #p2090004# and gave it to #p2091003#. Phew. Making a medicine through #p2090004# must be much more difficult than protecting the great Peach Tree.

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's Swallow

string.name: parent
string.value: Do Gong Seeking Swallow
#b#p2091001##k of #b#m250000000##k seems to be concerned about something...

#p2091001# seemed worried that the #b#p2071006##k he had raised hasn't been seen around #m250000000# lately, and he seemed genuinely concerned, for #p2071006# always made time to say hello even when it was busy. #p2071006#?? I think I know who that may be... I better go see #p2071006# and let it know of #p2091001#'s words.
#b#p2071006##k seems to remember things about #p2091001#, but doesn't seem 100% sure about it...

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Escaped Pot
#b#p2092001##k of #b#m251000000##k seems to be concerned about something...

#p2092001# seemed concerned about the fact that the #o4230505#s prepared to place herbs in have instead been inhabited by an unknown creature, causing havoc around the area. He asked me to eliminate #r400 #o4230505#s#k for him.\n\n#o4230505# #r#a38341##k
After defeating 400 #o4230505#s, #p2092001# seemed very pleased. I still have no idea, however, what exactly was inside it...

string.name: name
string.value: Weakening King Sage Cat

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat
The Head Mental Trainer of #bMu Lung#k, #bDo Gong#k, seems to be concerned about something...

A source of awful concern for Do Gong was Master Goblin, who over the course of a thousand years has digressed from a promising Master to a bona-fide Master Goblin. Do Gong pleaded with me to defeat Master Goblin, who's responsible for tricking Tae Roon and is primed to trick his way into Mu Lung. In order to weaken Master Goblin, I'll first have to eliminate Sage Cats and recover #bcat dolls#k from the battle. \n\n#i4000289# #t4000289# #b#c4000289##k/100

I managed to defeat the Sage Cats and recovered the cat dolls. After casting spells on those cat dolls, Do Gong wanted me to head to #b#m250010503##k to see if the spells were casted right. Off to the Goblin Forest.

string.name: name
string.value: Master Goblin's Call

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat
As soon as I reach #b#m250010503##k, I can faintly hear a voice coming out of there...

Out of the blue, #rMaster Goblin#k decided to speak to me. Master Goblin seemed eager to dispel the rumors and misconceptions held towards him... is he for real?? I should head over to the #bRock Support of the Disappeared Statue#k at #bGoblin Forest 2#k as Master Goblin instructed.

Master Goblin reiterated he had no hard feelings towards Mu Lung, and that all this hatred stems from Do Gong, who's jealous of Master Goblin's mastery on spells. No way... I better talk to Master Goblin and find out myself.

string.name: name
string.value: Do Gong's in Trouble

string.name: parent
string.value: Eliminating King Sage Cat

Master Goblin, who calls himself the King Sage Cat, proclaims that he's the true Master, and although he may have been ridiculed by Do Gong, he was willing to let it slide and offer a truce. Also wanted to offer a miracle medicine to #bDo Gong#k as a sign of truce. Well, I better give Do Gong the red marble like he said.
The stuff Master Goblin gave to Do Gong wasn't the Miracle Medicine!!! It's a POISON!!! Will Do Gong be able to survive this? I better check his pulse right now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Rumor in the Sea of Fog
Captain Hwang from Herb Town wants to tell you a creepy rumor about the Sea of Fog, located east of Herb Town. His story could be interesting. How about it, huh?

Captain Hwang from Herb Town tells you about the eastern route that connects Herb Town and Aqua Road. As the longest waterway in Maple World, this route passes through what is known as the #b'Sea of Fog'#k, located east of Mu Lung Garden. He says there is a rumor that a ghost ship sails around this Sea of Fog.\r\nCaptain Hwang then suggests that you look for the ghost ship. He hints that you might be able to get some information from the Dolphin Taxi.

Captain Hwang from Herb Town told you about the eastern route that connects Herb Town and Aqua Road. As the longest waterway in Maple World, this route passes through what is known as the #b'Sea of Fog'#k, located east of Mu Lung Garden. He says there is a rumor that a ghost ship sails around this Sea of Fog. You were instantly drawn to Captain Hwang's story and arrived in an unknown island in the Sea of Fog. You discovered the ghost ship with the help of the Dolphin Taxi, which brought you to that mysterious place.

string.name: name
string.value: Queen's Tea 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Queen's Tea

You eliminated 30 #o5200000#s, returned to #b#p2012012##k, and received a #t4031577#. It doesn't look all that special... Why is the queen being so picky? Anyway, you should deliver this #t4031577# to #bthe queen #p2101007##k.
As expected, the queen didn't even say thanks. You can understand why the people of #m260000000# hate her guts. Arrrgh!

string.name: name
string.value: Schegerazade's Fear

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller
Inside #b#m260000300##k, there's a storyteller who know so many stories that she has enough to go nonstop for the next 1,000 days. Her name is #b#p2101008##k. You should go see her.

#p2101008# was unjustly dragged over to the palace simply for knowing so many stories. She seems worried that one day, she'll run out of stories. To help #p2101008#, you should head to #b#m222020000##k, and rent a book so she has more stories.
You told #p2040052# about #p2101008#. He seemed genuinely shocked.

string.name: name
string.value: Borrowing the Book from Wiz

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller

After hearing the whole story, #p2040052# decides to lend #p2101008# a book. But there's a rule in #m222020000# where any book someone borrows must be replaced by another book, so you have to find one. Maybe you should put together a list of stories that #b#p2101008##k knows and make a book out of that.
When you told #p2101008# what #p2040052# said, she smiled brightly and told me that she has a list of stories that have already been written down. Phew, thank goodness.

string.name: name
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller

string.name: parent
string.value: Schegerazade the Storyteller
#p2040052# of #m222020000# has prepared some storybooks for #p2101008#. No idea when the queen may act up again, so you should hurry back to #b#m260000000##k and give them to #b#p2101008##k.
After receiving the book, #p2101008# let out a sigh of relief. Hopefully these books will be enough for her for a while... Poor #p2101008#, when will she be freed from the wrath of the queen?

string.name: name
string.value: True or False

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits and Red Scorpions
After listening to #p2101000#, you discover there may be another secret organization besides the Sand Bandits. The Red Scorpions... Who are they?

#p2101000# said that since the ring is from the Red Scorpions, who bully people in the neighborhood, she stole it from them and gave it to others. What? So #p2101012# is a Red Scorpion? But he told me he's a Sand Bandit...

#p2101000# said #p2101012# is a fake, and you should find the Red Scorpions' hideout, which should be nearby. She said only a special password can open the door. As revenge, she suggests stealing their treasure and giving it to others. But what did she mean by 'You already know the password'?

string.name: name
string.value: Sejan's Sand Bandits

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Sejan
You've passed all of #p2101011#'s tests. Right? Hm, maybe you should talk it over with #b#p2101011##k.
#p2101011# needs you to fork over #b10000 mesos#k to help the Sand Bandits give aid to the people of #m260000000#. He says selflessness is a key trait for a Sand Bandit.

It took you a while to gather the money, but you finally donated 10,000 mesos to the residents of #m260000000#. Now you've passed all of Sejan's tests! But you're not done yet. The secret wall mentioned a bow, yes, but it also mentioned arrows, an iron hammer, and a dagger.

string.name: name
string.value: The Man with the Iron Hammer

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Ardin
The words 'Iron Hammer' was written on the #p2103001#. There's only one person in #m260000000# that carries an iron hammer. Was his name #p2101003#?

#p2101003# is a member of the Sand Bandits. #p2101003# says only the strongest are allowed to be members and that you have to prove your worth. He wants you to eliminate the ferocious #r#o2100105#s#k. Easy!\n\n#o2100105# #r#a39311##k
You eliminated the #o2100105#s, but #p2101003# said that you still need to do more to earn his approval.

string.name: name
string.value: Ardin's Sand Bandits

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Ardin
You passed all of #p2101003#'s test, so he will accept you as a member of the Sand Bandits...right? Better go talk to #p2101003#.

#p2101003# tells you the Sand Bandits need to get stronger to fight the queen, and says if you beat him, he'll accept you as a member of the Sand Bandits. Will you be able to defeat #p2101003#? \n\nArdin's Other Self#r#a39331##k

He may look slow and clumsy, but #p2101003# was much more powerful that you had envisioned. You won anyway, though. #p2101003# said you now have to gain the acceptance of the other Sand Bandits. Come to think of it, the #p2103001# also mentioned a bow, arrows, and a dagger.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lady with the Dagger

string.name: parent
string.value: Sand Bandits According to Eleska
The word 'dagger' was written on the #p2101002#... You think it's referring to someone. There's only one person in #m260000000# carrying a dagger... Was her name #p2101002#?

#p2101002# is a member of the Sand Bandits! She looks quite intimidating, but when you summon the courage to tell her that you want to be a member, #p2101002# says you should enter the queen's treasure storage room and steal a treasure from there. For more information, you should ask #bsomeone inside the palace#k...
Inside the palace, you asked #p2101008# the storyteller about the treasures.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission Complete!

string.name: parent
string.value: First Mission of Sand Bandits
#p2101010# should be done with the Tigun Transformation Potion. Go see #b#p2101010##k.

You got the transformation potion that allows you to change into #p2101004#. The potion doesn't look appetizing... Oh well. You should take the #p2101004# transformation potion, head to #b#m260010600##k, and steal some #bsilk#k from #b#p2101013##k.\n\n#i4031571# #t4031571# #b#c4031571#/1#k
You received the queen's order of silk from #p2101004# and gave it to #p2101010#. Awesome! Your first mission as a Sand Bandit... Complete!

string.name: name
string.value: Stealing Queen's Order of Silk
Your first mission as a Sand Bandit is to steal a batch of silk that the queen ordered. Disguised as #p2101004#, you must go to #b#m260010600##k and get the silk from #b#p2101013##k.
#p2101013# keeps giving you suspicious looks. Arrrgh... You better be a smooth talker and just get the #bsilk#k.
You finally got the silk from #p2101013#. Phew, it really is hard to pretend to be someone else. Better return to #p2101010# now!

string.name: name
string.value: Byron's Recommendation Letter
You've been in #m260000000# for a while... suddenly, #p2101005# contacts you, wanting to meet up. What's this about?
#p2101005# says you're ready to make a job advancement and recommends that you see #p1022000# in Victoria Island. Hm, better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1022000##k, then.
You showed #p1022000# the recommendation letter written by #p2101005#. #p1022000# trusts #p2101005#'s judgment and told you to drop by whenever you're ready to make your job advancement.

string.value: Byron's Recommendation Letter!

#p2101005# says you're ready to make a job advancement and recommends that you see #p1090000# in Victoria Island. Hm, better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1090000##k, then.
