string.name: name
string.value: Sejan's Good Habit
#b#p2101011##k in #b#m260000200##k seems to be in some kind of trouble... Go pay him visit.

#b#p2101011##k says he didn't retrieve his arrows for a week and now he can't find them all. You tell #b#p2101011##k you would find his missing arrows, but wow, he's really missing a lot! Goodness. How many arrows does #b#p2101011##k shoot every day? \n You might've heard somewhere that they sell #b#t02060001##k in either #r#m220000000##k or #r#m222000000##k...

#b#p2101011##k started practicing with his bow again, now that you've given him the arrows. You wanted to ask #b#p2101011##k how many arrows he shoots each day, but he looked so focused that you felt bad bothering him.

string.name: name
string.value: Jiyur's Palace Entry Pass

string.name: parent
string.value: In Search for His Sister
#b#p2101001##k says he is going to see his sister. You're a little worried what he means by that.

#p2101001# really misses his sister. #p2101001# plans to buy a #b#t04031582##k from #b#p2101004##k to get into the palace. Since #p2101001# has no money, you agree to buy it for him.\n\n#i04031582# #t04031582# #b#c04031582##k / 1

#p2101001# looked so happy when he received the #b#t04031582##k .Just like that, he ran off to the palace. You should ask him about it later. But...was he supposed to write his name on the #t04031582#? You've never heard of that before.

string.name: name
string.value: The Tree Cutter's Test
#b#p2071011##k in #b#m222010102##k is looking for you? That's strange. What does he want...?

#p2071011# observes that you come here often and wants you to stay away from such a dangerous place. But, seriously? He's afraid to walk around the forest because of the #o5100003#s? If you don't convince #p2071011# that you're strong enough to handle yourself here, he might physically drag you out of #m222000000#!

#r30 minute time limit
#k#o5100003# #r#a39511##k
#p2071011# was amazed you were able to hunt all the #o5100003# in such a short time. But after all that work, all you got was permission to freely roam around the forest... Wonderful.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of the Long Lost Pyramid

#bByron#k, who studies the everyday life of the desert people of the #bAriant Back Street#k, says that he's found something strange in the desert. You should go visit Byron.\r\n#bTip - Take the ship from Orbis heading toward Ariant, the oasis of Nihal Desert.

Byron claims that a huge sandstorm recently covered the path between Ariant and Magatia and completely changed the landscape of the area, revealing a #e#bmysterious pyramid#k#n. He's currently seeking explorers willing to help unlock the mysteries surrounding the Pyramid. First up, you'd better head over to Sahel 3 and talk to #e#bDuarte#k#n, who stands near the Pyramid.

As Byron requested, you headed to Sahel Desert in search of the giant, mysterious Pyramid. At its entrance stood Duarte, who warned about the dangers of the Pyramid, but opened its doors to any who dare risk their lives to unlock its mystery.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Talk to Duarte who stands near the Pyramid at Sahel 3.

string.name: name
string.value: Stop 'em!
Let's go look for #b#p9270028##k in CBD!

#b#p9270028##k has asked me to gather up #b#t4000369#s and #t4000370#s#k to make it safer for Singapore Children to walk around. Well, some people just don't follow the rules, do they? I should help #p9270028# to make Singapore a better place.

#t4000369# #r#c4000369#/100#k
#t4000370# #r#c4000370#/100#k
After helping #p9270028#, I feel much safer to walk around in CBD. Hope all the children are feeling the same!

string.name: name
string.value: Stop the Speeder!
#p9270028# in CBD is really concerned about the growing number of speeding violations. Let go find him and see what is happening in CBD!

#p9270028# asked me to collect #b#t4000371# and #t4000370##k to warn people how important it is to follow the law. He emphasized that this is only to keep us safe from any danger.

#t4000371# #r#c4000371#/100#k
#t4000370# #r#c4000370#/100#k
I feel so good that I have contributed myself making Singapore a better and safer place to live in.

string.name: name
string.value: Technical Assignment
Rumor has that #b#p9270029##k in CBD is kind of sick. I should go find out what's up with him.

#p9270029# asked me to gather some requirements for his school work. Why is he asking such things from me? He didn't seem that sick! Anyway, I will be kind enough to help him out this time. But only this time though. Let's just gather those items and deliver it to #p9270034#.

#t4000374# #r#c4000374#/2#k
#t4000375# #r#c4000375#/6#k
#t4000376# #r#c4000376#/1#k
I was able to provide #p9270034# the required items for #p9270029#. Hope he does the same for me when I feel sick!

string.name: name
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume
I think I just saw a Fashionable lady, #p9270032# in CBD waiving her hands at me! Am I that Attractive?

#p9270032# has asked me to gather #b#t4000035##k and #b#t4000021##k in order to make a fashionable brand new Indian Costume.

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/20#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/20#k

Now that I have brought all the required items to #p9270032#, I never have seen somebody so obsessed with her fashion that much. Talking about the fashion, there is no one that dresses better than me in MapleS.E.A.

string.name: name
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume
#p9270032# who is obsessed with fashion is looking for help once more. What should it be this time?

She is definitely obsessed with fashion! She wants another dress. Wonder how many dresses she has in her closet. Is she a fashion model or something? Well, let's just give her what she needs.

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/25#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/25#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/5
Angie rewarded me with carrot cake to show her appreciation for gathering the items for her new clothes. It looks so delicious.

string.name: name
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume
What? #p9270032# in CBD is looking for me again? I wonder what it could be this time!

No surprise to find out that she wants a new dress! She asked me to gather 50 #t4000035#, 50 #t4000021#, and 10 #t4021003# this time. I really hope that she is satisfied with her dress!

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/50#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/50#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/10#k
Phew... Finally, #p9270032# was able to get all dresses she ever wanted! But speaking of fashion, I am sure that I look much better!

string.name: name
string.value: The great secret reveals

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of the Ghost Ship
#b#p9270030##k is about to reveal more about his secrets! Let's go find him Boat Quay.

The strongest ghost, #b#o9420512#s#k are the ones that #p9270030# was so afraid of. Well, I am not afraid of anything! He asked me to help him get back to the sea by eliminating #b300 #o9420512#s#k. He told me to bring my friends with me since these ghosts are the most powerful ones in town. Follow me, my fellow Maplers!\n\n#o9420512# #r#a45121##k
Eliminating #o9420512# was not an easy task for me but I did it! Now, I should go see #p9270030# and see if he has left to the sea. Or does he have another serious secret, something Big?

string.name: name
string.value: Fight for the future

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of the Ghost Ship
I sense something that #p9270030# has not told me all of his secrets. There is still something about this ghostship. Let's go find out.

Believe or not, #p9270030# told me that there is this Boss Ghost, #r#o9420513##k who controls all other ghosts in town. Without defeating this monster, the boat quay will never be the same. Let go investigate the ghostship now. But I must be cautious since he also said the ghostship itself is a big maze... I will have to eliminate #o9420513# and collect #t4000384# as a proof of elimination.

#o9420513# #r#a45131##k
#t4000384# #r#c4000384#/1#k
What an experience! I am glad that I brought peace to this town and to the sailors! However, I feel that the ghost has not been perfectly disappeared. I should go check every once in a while.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost White Essence
If I lost the #bwhite essence#k, I should go visit #bRalph the Wanderer#k again.

I should go eliminate Mr. Anchors once more and gather Red Essences. I should really take care of the White Essence this time when Ralph the wanderer gives it to me.

#o9420512# #r#a45221##k
#t4000383# #r#c4000383#/300
Phew... I really should go take care of #bCapt. Latanica#k this time and bring peace to the Boat Quay Town.

string.name: name
string.value: Return of Capt. Latanica
#bRalph the Wanderer#k is sensing dark force around the Ghostship Area... I have to check him out once again.

#bRalph the Wanderer#k believes that #rCapt. Latanica#k is back!!! He wanted me to enter the engine room once again, but he needs to find out that I am still in shape. I will have to prove to him that I have been training myself and am prepared.\n\n
I was finally able to prove to him that I am still prepared to enter the engine room. Now, Capt. Latanica is all mine!

string.name: name
string.value: A Bright and Sunny Day

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
It is such a sunny day! I really need something to cool down!

#b#p9270061##k says that with the #b#o9420527#s#k running outside the village, we won't be able to go out of the Kampung. They want me to help get rid of them and collect #b50 #t4000465#s#k. \n\n#t4000465# #r#c4000465#/50#k
After getting the #b#t4000465##k they felt less heated.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 10,000 3,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'Too Hot!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: I am Bored!

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
People in Kampung village seem not as perky as they used to be. Talk to #b#p9270061##k and see what else he needs to bring the energy back to village.
#b#p9270061##k and entire village are bored and they need me to hunt #b100 #t4000466#s#k so they can entertain themselves with their favorite songs. \n\n#t4000466# #r#c4000466#/100#k
Kampung village is now full of delightful melody playing with finest #b#t4000466##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 30,000 8,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'All taken away!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: All taken away!

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
#b#p9270061##k needs more of the #b#t4000466#s#k to keep the Kampung village safe from #b#o9420528##k.
#bEmo Slimes#k have snatched away all of the #bRebabs#k in the village. Kampung Village now needs#b 150 Rebabs#k to lure those monsters and put them to sleep. \n\n#t4000466# #r#c4000466#/150#k
#b#p9270061##k and the whole village is now safe from #b#o9420528##k, and it seems like there will be a party with some great music. Kampung village is always a fun place to hang out.

string.name: name
string.value: Running out of Wigs!

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries
#b#p9270060##k is gloomy than ever at the shocking news that Blondie has lost her wig by accident. He's in desperate search for someone who can bring some more #b#t4000467##k from #b#o9420529##k.

#b#p9270060##k needs #b200#k more #b#t4000467#s#k from #b#o9420529##k to cover up Blondie. Hunting #b200 #o9420529#s#k sure is not an easy task. But thinking how much Blondie means to him, it's no wonder he's putting all these effort to make Blondie looks pretty again. 

#o9420529# #r#a45461##k 
#t4000467# #r#c4000467#/200#k
#b#p9270060##k is so happy to see Blondie as she's prancing along the street with new golden wig. Maybe she will stay out of danger for a while.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 35,000 Able to proceed to 'Tires are missing!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Tires are missing!

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries

Lots of people are having trouble going around the town because their tires are suddenly being stolen by sneaky creatures known as #b#o9420530##k. Who could retrieve all those stolen tires from these villains?

#b#p9270060##k is eager to bring those stolen tires back from #b#o9420530##k. Why don't you step up and save all those people from such an inconvenience? 

#o9420530# #r#a45471##k 
#t4000468# #r#c4000468#/50#k
#b#o9420530##k may seems disappeared for now, but you can never be sure if there won't be any more of them coming back to town and stealing things from innocent people.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 33,000 Able to proceed to 'Oly Oly is back!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Oly Oly is back!

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries
#b#p9270060##k has found out that even more tires have been stolen now. It must be those sneaky villain, #b#o9420530##k, back in town!

This stealing must be stopped now! Let's put an end to it, once and for all! 

#o9420530# #r#a45481##k 
#t4000468# #r#c4000468#/100#k
#b#p9270060##k was happy to announce that life in the city is back to normal that everybody is getting proper transportation they need. What a relief!

string.name: name
string.value: Hunger calls

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
#b#p9270059##k looks so down and depressed. Maybe there's something you can do to make her feel better.

#b#p9270059##k is standing with a growling stomach. She doesn't want to eat anything else but famous #b#t2022203##k from Local Specialty Shop in Singapore or Kampung? Let's get #b10 
#t2022203##k for her. 

#t2022203# #r#c2022203#/10#k
Nothing taste better than #b#t2022203##k for an empty stomach.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 6,000 Able to proceed to 'I need Vitamin C' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: I need Vitamin C

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
After eating #b#t2022203##k, #b#p9270059##k had a terrible stomach ache. It seems like someone must help her immediately before she is carried off to the hospital.

Fresh fruit will put #b#p9270059##k's stomach at ease.

#t2010000# #r#c2010000#/5#k 
#t2010003# #r#c2010003#/5#k
Maybe #b#p9270059##k has learned her lesson which is to eat proper amount at a time.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 8,000 Able to proceed to 'My Lovely Scarf' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: My Lovely Scarf

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
#b#p9270059##k, one of the most fashionable people in the city, is anxious to get trendy fashion item #b#t4000469##k faster than any others.
#b#p9270059##k has made up her mind not to go out in the city without a matching #b#t4000469##k to go with her new outfit. And she needs 50 of them to choose from. \n\n#t4000469# #r#c4000469#/50#k
She does look pretty with the scarf on her. Before long, there will be many people who will want to have one of those trendy scarves.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 15,000\r\nAble to proceed to 'My Scarves Were Stolen!' as next quest.\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: My Scarves Were Stolen!

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
#b#p9270059##k's jealous sisters have taken away all of her scarves, but #b#p9270059##k won't just sit back and ruin her reputation as the hottest fashion icon in the city. What will she do?
#b#p9270059##k is planning to have even more #b#t4000469#s#k than before. Will she able to get them? \n\n#t4000469# #r#c4000469#/100#k
#b#p9270059##k looks more fabulous than ever. You certainly did her a great favor.

string.name: name
string.value: Gift for Dear Daddy

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party
#b#p9270058##k is lost in her thought. Her daddy's birthday is coming and she wants to give him something special this year.

#b#p9270058##k's daddy is a great fan of music, as well as a collector of all sorts of musical instruments. #b#t4000472##k might be the perfect birthday gift for him. 

#o9420534# #r#a45531##k 
#t4000472# #r#c4000472#/100#k
#b#p9270058##k's daddy was happy with the gift and he promised to take her out for an exquisite dinner.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 10,000 #Wbasic# #i2000005:# #t2000005:# 10 Able to proceed to 'Daddy's Birthday Party' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Unexpected Guest

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party

#b#p9270058##k and her daddy were both surprised to see that most of the guests had brought their kids with them to the birthday party. There are no gifts prepared for little kids, but #b#p9270058##k doesn't want to send them home with an empty hand. She must think of something very quickly.

Since all adults guests had received #b#t4000470##k as a gift, #b#t4000474##k would be just perfect for little guests. Now it's a matter of time. Enough #b#t4000474##k must be brought back to #b#p9270058##k before the party is over. 

#o9420536# #r#a45551##k 
#t4000474# #r#c4000474#/100#k

Just before the party was over, all kids at the party received surprised gift and was overjoyed. Though #b#p9270058##k had to rush into preparing gifts for those unexpected guests, after all, more the merrier.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 18,000 Able to proceed to 'Grand Finale' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Grand Finale

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party
There's nothing better than great bonfire as a finale of the party. But somehow, there are not enough wooden barrels to create grand bonfire. #b#p9270058##k must work something out quickly.

#b#t4000473##k would be perfect to create a huge flame of the bonfire. #b#p9270058##k need at least 100 of them in order make the grand finale of the party. 

#o9420535# #r#a45561##k 
#t4000473# #r#c4000473#/200#k
What a grand finale! It was the best birthday party EVER!

string.name: name
string.value: Off to the City

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung
#b#p9270062##k just realized he needs something he can use as travel expenses while going around the city. Maybe #b#t4000477##k could come useful because they're such a rare item in the city.

#b#t4000477#s#k can be sold at a high price in the city market place. #b#p9270062##k must have plenty of them before the trip. Otherwise he would come short of travel expenses in the middle of the trip. 

#o9420539# #r#a45581##k 
#t4000477# #r#c4000477#/200#k
Now #b#p9270062##k is fully ready for the trip, and it's time to enjoy. Yeah!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 54,500 Able to proceed to 'Gift for Brother' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Gift for Brother

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung

When #b#p9270062##k was in the city for travel, he was so excited that left the gift he got for his brother waiting in Kampung village. Little brother must be so disappointed to find out there is no gift at all.

#b#p9270062##k must hurry and bring back those forgotten gift for his brother. 

#o9420538# #r#a45591##k 
#t4000476# #r#c4000476#/200#k
#b#p9270062##k's little brother was so thrilled to receive #b#t4000476##k as a gift. What a joy of giving presents to someone you really care for.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 44,500 Able to proceed to 'Merry-go-round in Kampung' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Merry-go-round in Kampung

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung
#b#p9270062##k was so impressed with one of the merry-go-round he saw during his recent trip, that he decided to build on in Kampung village for little kids.

In order to build a nice sturdy merry-go-round, #b#p9270062##k needs plenty of #b#t4000478##k. Will Kampung village have its very own merry-go-round? 

#o9420540# #r#a45601##k 
#t4000478# #r#c4000478#/200#k
Kampung's very own merry-go-round is finally completed. Look at all the joy in the little kids' faces!

string.name: name
string.value: Off to the Fantasy Theme Park

Have you been to the Fantasy Theme Park lately? Well, it seems like it's not such a fun place like it used to be. #bLam#k said something scary is going on in there. Wanna know? Go see #bLam#k right now!

#bLam#k said there are 2 fierce monsters appearing in Fantasy Theme Park, threatening all visitors. If nobody stops them, Fantasy Theme Park will soon become their playground. #bLam#k said he knows how to invoke those monsters. You must bring him 10 Rodeo's Scarves and complete Away from Kampung quest. Then he shall tell you how to defeat those creatures! 

#t4000471# #r#c4000471#/10#k

#y4557#: #r#u4557##k

#y4558#: #r#u4558##k

#y4559#: #r#u4559##k

#y4560#: #r#u4560##k
Let's talk to #bAldol#k. She is at the Entrance to the Spooky World. She will allow you to get into the Spooky World. Let's see what you and your friends can do for Fantasy Theme Park!

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Instructor Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Trainer's Command

Pet Trainer Bartos told me if I can prove to him that I am capable of handling pets, then he'll teach me a secret method to handle more than one type of pet...I should visit the Pet Park over in Henesys (by entering through the hidden portal near the Cat statue).
In order to prove my worth as a pet trainer, I'll have to find the hidden note somewhere in the Pet Park.
I found the note! Finally! Bartos looks like he wants one more thing before teaching me the secret technique...

string.name: name
string.value: The Secret Method

string.name: parent
string.value: Trainer's Command
I'm nearly there; I should visit Bartos and see if I can finally learn Bartos's secret method of handling multiple pets at once.
In order to learn various commands, I'll have to give Bartos the Pet Snack. Hmm, he mentioned a bigger store...
I finally learned the secrets of commanding multiple pets through Bartos. I shall display my talent to the world!

string.name: name
string.value: Robo Upgrade!
Once the Baby Robot has been nurtured to reach level 15, I better take it to Garnox, who specializes in nurturing evolving pets.

Robots, a beautiful product of a perfect blend of technology and magic, can apparently transform into a more mature being. The process just requires some materials to work with. I'll need to get #b1 #t5380000##k and #b50 #t4000111#s#k and bring them to Garnox.
What used to be a small robot pet has grown up and became an Adult Robot.

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Jungle
There's a Masked Man in New Leaf City... what's his deal?

I spoke with Jack Masque. He's a bandit prince from Amoria. He's in love with Princess Restless, and is trying to win her love from afar. He's got a passionate hatred for Wolf Spiders, as one bit her just as she was giving him a kiss. So, I've agreed to hunt down 100 Wolf Spiders in return for his thanks and something special he picked up. I should be able to find them in the MesoGears...

+Phew* I wiped out 100 of those pesky Wolf Spiders, and in return, I received a Leaf Crystal from Jack Masque. I can come back every 72 hours to help him if I want. I wonder what he did to get kicked out of Amoria...?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 Electrophants and Gryphons have fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Jungle - Continued
There's a Masked Man in New Leaf City... what's his deal?

I spoke with Jack Masque. He's a bandit prince from Amoria. He's in love with Princess Restless, and is trying to win her love from afar. He's got a passionate hatred for Wolf Spiders, as one bit her just as she was giving him a kiss. So, I've agreed to hunt down 100 Wolf Spiders in return for his thanks and something special he picked up. I should be able to find them in the Temple Hive...

*Phew* I wiped out 100 of those pesky Wolf Spiders, and in return, I received a Leaf Crystal from Jack Masque. I can come back every 72 hours to help him if I want. I wonder what he did to get kicked out of Amoria...?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons have fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

I visited the Glimmer Man, and discovered that he's an ultra-powerful mage whose ability to turn his entire body into pure diamond (hence his name) has allowed him to journey to space and other inhospitable environments. Through the vast knowledge he's acquired during his explorations, he's also become somewhat of a renowned weapons creator and arms dealer.\r\nThe Glimmer Man has landed in Masteria looking for something called #b#t4031760##k, a rare element from the alternate dimension of Versal he's been dying to experiment with. To thank me for recovering some and bringing it to him, he's promised to make me a weapon of my own from it. However, I've got to also track down #b7 #t4021008#s#k and return these to him as well. Only then can he reduce the naturally unstable Materia down to a useable form. A weapon made from an otherworldly material! I wonder what it does...

I returned to the Glimmer Man and he synthesized the #b#t4031760##k and the #b7 #t4021008#s#k I gave him to form a Materia Orb. He's said his precocious friend Spindle can turn this into a weapon, so I should see him when I'm ready to make the weapon...WOOT! Spindle is currently residing in the Omega Sector. Additionally, anytime I find more White Versal Materia, I can bring it to the Glimmer Man and he'll create another Materia Orb for me so I can make another weapon!

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia Continued

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

Through the vast knowledge he's acquired during his explorations, he's also become somewhat of a renowned weapons creator and arms dealer.\r\nThe Glimmer Man has landed in Masteria looking for something called #b#t4031760##k, a rare element from the alternate dimension of Versal he's been dying to experiment with. I returned to the Glimmer Man and he synthesized the #b#t4031760##k and the #b7 #t4021008#s#k I gave him to form a Materia Orb. Additionally, anytime I find more White Versal Materia, I can bring it to the Glimmer Man and he'll create another Materia Orb for me so I can make another weapon!

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion
The Rememberer sure would know who Bob is. He's the Rememberer! I should talk with The Rememberer to find out what he knows.
The Rememberer isn't really being helpful today. Very slow talking, not really informative. I wonder why he is so... depressed.
He is MEAN! MEAN, MEAN, MEAN! He took away Bob's Snail Shell from me without me letting him! Now, what do I have to do?

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion

I found it! I found Bob again! He must have escaped from The Rememberer by himself! I feel really terrible that I let this kind of things happen. I am going back to The Rememberer to tell him to lighten up.

I don't think The Rememberer gets the whole idea of me doing this. Bob may be just another monster but I know what is right or wrong. And I am going to pay back just the way he did to me. I need to get 1 #b#t4000019##k other than Bob's to pull this off.
I got him! The Rememberer will always remember this day. The day he got tricked by me! Ok. I should stop doing things like this though.

string.name: name
string.value: Bruce's Research
Bruce, the monster researcher, might know something. Maybe he can tell me how old Bob actually is. If I get to know how old he is, wouldn't that be a discovery of something remarkable?
He does seem to know something about his age but he looks spooked. I shouldn't hesitate to ask him what is wrong!

Wow... Bruce told me that Bob's age is incalculable. This is getting serious, isn't it? A snail that even professional monster researcher can't tell the age. Maybe he was right about asking me to go see Winston. Maybe an archeologist knows more about the history and the age issue than Bruce.

string.name: name
string.value: Eat This!
I keep seeing these fireplaces around the house. I wonder if they lead anywhere...maybe Edmunds knows? He mentioned something about a key. I should press him a bit more.

My hunch was right. The fireplaces are interconnected through the mansion's Chimney; perhaps I can use them as an alternate way of navigating through the house. However, they're locked and Edmunds holds the only key. He will reluctantly give me the key if I collect #b20 of each type of Gummy Slimes#k. There's Red, Green, Purple and Orange ones; so I'll need to hunt all over the house to get them. It'll be tempting to eat them first.

Edmunds reluctantly gave me the Omni Key after I collected the Gummy Slimes for him. With it, I can enter the fireplaces throughout the house and the Chimney to which they all connect. Hmmm... Who knows where all these fireplaces lead?

string.name: name
string.value: A Lost Girl
There's a girl wandering around the Prendergast Mansion. I wonder what she's looking for.

Sophilia is looking for her favorite toy - the very first doll her father made for her when she was a child. She seems to have been looking for it for quite awhile. She mentioned something about Ludmilla having a history of hiding her toys. If I can find Sophilia's doll for her, maybe I can put her spirit at ease.
I gave Sophilia back her favorite doll. She was so happy to get it back that she gave me some of her favorite candy.

string.name: name
string.value: The M-Files
I heard there's a MBI (Maple Bureau of Investigation) agent in the Phantom Forest! I should investigate what he's investigating!

I spoke with MBI Agent Falcon. He's on the trail of a dangerous specter, but it looks like that crafty ghost gave him the slip by scattering his #b#t4031764#s#k all over the place. I've agreed to collect #b50#k of them so he can continue the hunt!
I tracked down all 50 of Agent #b#t4031764#s#k that he asked for! In return, he's given me Smores! Mmm...If only he had a napkin...

string.name: name
string.value: File Under Incomplete
MBI Agent Falcon is still snooping around the old Haunted House, even after I helped him find some of the Paranormal Activity Report Pages! I wonder why... maybe he still needs help.

Looks like MBI Agent Falcon spoke too soon... 50 pages led him to the wrong, uh, dead guy... but he thinks that if I collect #b100#k more of them, he'll be able to catch Mr. Bones for sure! Whew... 100 pages. I wonder how many pages in total were in his original report.
I tracked down all of the 100 more #t4031764#s#k Agent Falcon requested! Now he can finally go track Mr. Bones... I hope.

string.name: name
string.value: The File Thickens Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The File Thickens
Agent Falcon is still hanging out in front of the Haunted House?! Doesn't he have other ghosts to catch, myths to debunk? Maybe I should go see if something's wrong...

I'm starting to think that Agent Falcon spends too much time writing reports, and not enough time doing actual investigative work! The elusive Mr. Bones turns out to be Prendergast, the former owner of this house! Falcon wants me to find Jonas in the Haunted House, give him this Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to fill out, and return the completed form to him.
I got my questionnaire from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?
Jonas was very confused by the doll I gave him. He was almost speechless. I hope he is not going any more insane than he is right now.

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awakened him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.

Jonas gave me all of his Toymaker Gear in return for helping him destroy his twisted creations. He also gave me the key to his Toy Workshop, asking me to give it to someone who will help keep it safe and find a way to restore the Prendergast name.

string.name: name
string.value: Psycho Jack

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awakened him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Psycho Jacks#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think.
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

string.name: name
string.value: Sophilia Doll

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awakened him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Sophilia Dolls#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. But they are scary looking for sure...
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awakened him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Nightmare#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. Or is it?
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

string.name: name
string.value: Halloween : Entering the house
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...

string.name: name
string.value: The File Thickens Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The File Thickens
I got my questionnaire from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?

I gave Agent Falcon's Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to Jonas and had him fill it out. Finding him in the labyrinthine mansion was the hard part... Jonas was actually quite cooperative, especially for a spirit. In any case, I returned the completed form to Falcon, who was ecstatic that he didn't have to set foot inside the creepy old mansion again.

string.name: name
string.value: Dinner Fixins
It's time for Thanksgiving and I'm ready for some home cookin'! I should pay Mom and Dad a visit over in Henesys!

I'm helping Mom and Dad make Thanksgiving dinner! I have to gather one of each ingredient: 1 ear of #b#t2020029##k, a can of #b#t2022262##k, a #b#t2022263##k, bowl of #b#t2022264##k and best of all, #b#t2022261##k. They promised me an #b#t4031529##k if I return quickly. I guess the Turkeys stole all the ingredients to make Thanksgiving fixins... I guess they think that without the fixins', there'll be no dinner! No dinner? No way! Time to defeat some battle-hardened Turkeys!

My trusty weapon did a fine job of ruffling those rowdy turkeys' feathers, and I obtained all of the ingredients for Mom and Dad. In return, they gave me my #b#t4031529##k! I guess doing chores does pay off! I can take this to any of the Store Vendors in New Leaf City, and receive a #bNexon Game Card#k for it! ...I'd better get out of here before Aunt Petunia shows up! Mom mentioned that I can help her with dinner once a day until it's time to eat!

string.name: name
string.value: Game On! <CVS>
I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #ballowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #ballowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #ballowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad every day until the end of the event, receive #ballowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

string.name: name
string.value: Game On! <Rite Aid>
I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #ballowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #ballowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #ballowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad every day until the end of the event, receive #ballowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

string.name: name
string.value: Little Suzy's X-Mas Dilemma

There's a little girl with a puzzled look on her face in New Leaf City. With X-mas time just around the corner, she should be happy... I wonder why she looks so puzzled and confused instead? Looks like she may need some help with her Maplemas spirit!

Little Suzy was all excited for Maplemas this year... until she learned all about a similar holiday called 'Versalmas' from a strange green mouse named O-Pongo. Now she doesn't know what sounds more exciting - Maplemas... or Versalmas? Suzy needs my help to help her decide which version of X-mas she should celebrate this year. In order to do that, I'll have to speak to both Maple Claws and this O-Pongo character, and then come back and talk to her. Maplemas holiday from an alternate dimension, huh? Very curious...

I spoke to both Maple Claws and O-Pongo. It seems that both Maplemas and Versalmas have their merits. In the end, Suzy's put the decision on me: she's asked me to deliver her X-mas Wishlist to one of the two 'Santas,' which will determine which holiday she's celebrating this year. I have a feeling that this decision is important, that I'm not just making a choice for her... but also one for myself. Which holiday do I believe in?

string.name: name
string.value: A Versal Tradition
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to O-Pongo. I'd better speak with this strange green mouse and find out more details about Versalmas.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to O-Pongo about Suzy's dilemma. O-Pongo listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Versal Power! I spoke with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, who is the 'Santa' for the Versal version of Maplemas, and learned a great deal about Versalmas. He told me about the customs for their holiday--quite different from the Maple World! The world of Versal is usually shrouded in darkness; Versalmas is an annual holiday that celebrates the emergence of the sun in their world, which shines for 90 straight days and only for these 90 days. For Versalmas, children receive presents every day for the first 30 days, and get cool treats like Sugar-coated Olives and Caramel Onions! Sounds pretty awesome... Now I'd better speak with Maple Claws and head back to Suzy... It makes me wonder for myself though, which holiday would I pick to celebrate? Hmmm...

string.name: name
string.value: A Very Merry Maplemas
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I'm thinking I should give it to Maple Claws; I should go see her in Happyville.

I can give Little Suzy's Wishlist to Maple Claws. In doing so, she'll be counting on me to help me recover her presents for her this year. All I have to do now is to give Maple Claws the list to cement my decision. Yes... it's going to be a very Merry Maplemas this year!

I thought that Maplemas was the better holiday so I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to Maple Claws. In return, she gave me a red #bMaplemas Hat#k that I can wear proudly to show my Maplemas Spirit! Every time I help Maple Claws recover the presents stolen by monsters, she'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents with her in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring her presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing Maple Claws more presents will also help me earn #bMaplemas Spirit#k! If the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k, Maple Claws will have a special something for me at the end of the event!

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's Purple box
Bill is frantically looking for a Purple box. I wonder why...
If I find the Purple box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the Purple box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's Red Box
Bill is frantically looking for a Red box. I wonder why...
If I find the Red box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the Red box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Red)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up.

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Red Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service. 

#t2022538# #b#c2022538#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Red Easter Eggs#k with the #rEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #bEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad.

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Riding
The keeper of the #bAquarium#k, #b#p2060005##k, is researching a way to tame and possibly ride monsters. I should take a trip to Aqua Road and see if there's anything I can do to help!

#p2060005# found out that someone is trying to steal his research. #p2060005# asked me to #b watch the wild boar#k and bring back #b#t4031508##k to him. On top of that, he asked me to get the wild boar's #b#t4031507##k as well...I'd better stay alert for this one--I don't want someone to steal his research before I learn how to tame and ride monsters! 

#i4031508##t4031508# #b#c4031508#/5#k
#i4031507##t4031507# #b#c4031507#/5#k.

I obtained the items and returned to the Aquarium. For helping him with his research, #p2060005# gave me the #bmonster riding skill#k and one #b#t1912000##k for the monster. It's time to travel in style! I must look in the Tiger Ridge map, there should be some rubble lying about--a hidden portal. Traveling through it will transport me to a new area with the pigs. I can use the perfume when I'm close to one to capture it. After that, I can equip the Mount and the saddle, and use my new Monster Riding skill to call the mount! I can feed my pet by visiting the Leafre Pet Food Seller, and make it stronger. Hmm...I wonder if there's a way to get a stronger mount? I'd have to be ready for the 4th Job advancement, I'll bet.

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Saddle
I lost the #t1912000# that I received from #b#p2060005##k! What should I do? Hmmm... Maybe I should go see #p2060005#. I hope he's nice enough to give me another one!

#p2060005# says that making a #t1912000# for monster riding requires special ingredients. He needs #b200#t4000171#, 200 #t4000030#, 200 #t4000055##k. #p2060005# says he will also need #b5 million mesos#k for 'research purposes'. I believe this is otherwise known as 'extortion'. He's probably a bit upset at me for losing the first one. Oh well, looks like I've got some work to do...\n\n#i4000171##t4000171# #b#c4000171#/200#

I returned to #p2060005# with the proper materials and the 5 million meso extortion--I mean 'Research Fee'. In return for my efforts, I received #t1912000# from #p2060005#. I should be able ride monsters again with this. I'll be sure not to lose it again!

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Perfume

I lost #t2270000#. I can't train the monster without it. What should I do? I should head back to Aqua Road and go see #b#p2060005##k. Maybe I can tell him that I met someone in Amoria and had to go on a date...

#p2060005# says he's heard of this phenomenon of people using that perfume on dates. He doesn't understand why, it smells a lot like raw garlic and hot feet to him. Luckily, he has plenty of #t4031507# and he will make me another #t2270000# if I bring him #b#t4031509##k.\n\n#i4031509##t4031509# #b#c4031509#/1#k. I'd better hurry back--I want my new mount!
I received #t2270000# from #p2060005#. Phew...I should go train my monster now. On the way, I'll think of a better excuse if I lose the perfume again--this kinda does smell like hot feet...

string.name: name
string.value: Silver Mane
I've heard that #p2060005# has furthered his research and found a way to upgrade my existing mount. A faster monster to ride? I should go see #p2060005# in Aqua Road immediately!

#p2060005# said you needed #b#t4000261# and a #t4000262# in order to make your mounts bigger, faster, and stronger. However, he wants you to donate #b50,000,000 mesos#k so he can conduct further research to develop methods to help people co-exist with monsters. 

#i4000261##t4000261# #b#c4000261#/500#k
#i4000262##t4000262# #b#c4000262#/500#k

It took a bit of time, but I returned with the needed items and 'donation' he asked for. #p2060005# made my #t1902000# into a #t1902001#. What a difference! My mount is so much sharper and stronger than before! I can run over almost anything now!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider

You have now reached the apex of the Maple world, the one who is considered the ultimate warrior. To commemorate your sterling accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081100##k has something for you...

It's the one thing that countless warriors, who have taken their mind and body to the very limit, strived for, but couldn't get... But now #p2081100# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

It's the one thing that countless magicians, who have taken their mind and body to the very limit in search of mana, strived for, but couldn't get... But now #p2081200# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

It's the one thing that countless bowmen, who have used bows to pierce the darkness this world offers, strived for, but couldn't get... But now #p2081300# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

It's the one thing that countless thieves, the dominant forces in the dark, strived for, but couldn't get... But now #p2081400# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider
You have now reached the apex of the Maple World. You are the ultimate Pirate, and to commemorate the incredible accomplishment of reaching Lv. 200, #b#p2081500##k has something for you.

It's the one thing that countless Pirates, the undisputed masters of the sea, strived for, but couldn't get... But now #p2081500# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #p2081100#
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top! With him at my side, nothing can stop me!

string.name: name
string.value: Ramain's Amazing Skills

I was finally able to learn the 'Maker' skill through Moren. Awesome!! Does this mean I can make something right now from scratch? But... where should I start? While I was standing there not knowing what to do, that was when a man came up to me to tell me something. That man happened to be Moren's friend and a legend in the field of making Monster Crystal, Ramain.

Ramain works with Moren and happens to be known as the master of producing Monster Crystals. He's a nice fellow, but his stuttering makes him really hard to understand. Anyway, after watching me being unsure of myself what to do with the skill, he offered to teach me how to produce a Monster Crystal. He then asked me to make one right there on the spot...\n\n#i4260000# #t4260000# #b#c4260000# / 1#k

Ramain, the master of producing Monster Crystals who is Moren's coworker, taught me how to produce a Monster Crystal. It was a bit difficult to understand him due to his constant stuttering, but it was very helpful. Then, he asked me to make one right there on the spot, challenging me to make 1 #t4260000#, the easiest Monster Crystal to make. After making one, Ramain took a look at it, and commended me for my effort. Hah! Does this mean I can be considered an Item Producer now?

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #3
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol received a request to build an equipment, and entrusted me to do the job for him. Karl from Ludibrium is the one that made the request. Wow, so I'm finally getting a legitimate request like this? Time to really put in my A-game!\n\n#i4001176# #t4001176# #b#c4001176# / 10
Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Ludibrium to build a shovel, and he asked me to do it for him. I tried my best, but all I got in return was a snide remark from Keol.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #5
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Valen of Florina Beach for a pair of shoes. A pair of footwear on the sandy beach... it probably should be light yet sturdy...!\n\n#i4001178# #t4001178# #b#c4001178# / 5

Moren's coworker Keol received a request from Valen of Florina Beach for a pair of beach sandals, and asked me to do it for him. I tried my best, but of course, Keol believes it's the worst thing in the world.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #12
Keol, the pompous working partner of Moren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Moren's coworker Keol received a special request from Muse to make a pair of boots for Nanuke, who spends his days alone with the dogs at the Snowy Whale's Island, and asked if I could make one for him. That's really nice of Muse to do that.\n\n#i4001185# #t4001185# #b#c4001185# / 1
I made a pair of fur boots for Nanuke on behalf of Muse. Whale Island is a cold, cold place to live in, so I made sure to pack in enough fur to make it as warm as possible.

string.name: name
string.value: Moren's New Discovery

#b#m261000000##k is the land where Alcadnos and Zenumists form an uneasy truce in... One day, a news exploded in the Maple World where an alchemist from Zenumist, #b#p2110004##k, discovered a new method that will change the way alchemy works. #p2110004# was also looking for a capable apprentice that will spread his work to mainstream, and this caused a huge number of people to head over to #m261000000#...\r\nHe's apparently staying at #m261000002# of #m261000000#, which is a town of alchemists at Nihal Desert.

After spending a number of years conducting experiments, #b#b#p2110004##k, an alchemist under Zenumist Society, finally discovered a #bnew method#k of producing items, where the item can be created solely out of alchemy. To learn his new method, I visited #p2110004#. He said in order to acquire this new method, I'll have to take three classes... #bthe fundamentals of alchemy, the basic theory of science, and the actual application of alchemy#k...Sheesh, when can I attend all those classes?

#b#m261000000##k is the land where Alcadno and Zenumist form an uneasy truce in... One day #p2110004#, the alchemist from Zenumist, #b#p2110004##k, discovered a new method of item creation that relies solely on alchemy. Apparently, #p2110004# has been looking for an apprentice for his new method, so I went ahead to #m261000000# to visit him.

string.name: name
string.value: Carson's Fundamentals of Alchemy
When I visited Moren to learn his new method, he instructed me to attend a class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy taught by Carson of Zenumist Society. Ahhh... this sounds boring...
Moren said in order to attend the class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy, I must visit the head of Zenumist Society, #bCarson#k.
I managed to stay awake for Carson's class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy. Yay!

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes the Fuse's Basic Theory of Science
When I visited Moren to learn his new method, he instructed me to attend a class on the Basic Theory of Science taught by that eccentric scientist Hughes the Fuse. This worries me quite a bit...
Moren said in order to attend the class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy, I must visit #bHughes the Fuse#k, who is holed up somewhere inside Orbis Tower, doing his own thing.
I was able to keep track of Hughes the Fuse's disorienting science class. Yay!!

string.name: name
string.value: What Moren Dropped

string.name: parent
string.value: Moren's Third Round of Teaching!

It's been a while since I started producing items. I think I am now at the point where Moren is starting to acknowledge my item-producing skills. He seems to be devoting all of his time to creating a new item. I better stop by and say hello...

Moren had been devoting all of his time to creating a new item. When I visited him at Magatia, he seemed so into his work that he didn't even realize I was there, and kept on mumbling illegible things. That's when I noticed something dropped behind his back. What is that?

I visited Moren at a lab in Magatia, but he seemed very much into his work that he didn't notice me walking in. That's when I noticed a piece of paper dropped from behind his back. The note contained a whole bunch of notes. What does it say?

string.name: name
string.value: The Book of Invisible Ink

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

I found a mysterious book deep in the #m230000000# sea while exploring. It is Bowman-related and mentions mastery of a skill known as Eye of the Heart. There's also a fading inscription about obtaining something from the book itself. Could this be a skill book? I must find out! #p2040052# knows a lot about books. I should ask if he can decipher anything useful from this book...

#b#p2040052##k read the book and speculated that the book must've been written with invisible ink to conceal valuable information. Clever...but not impossible to break. He says I have to get a special type of ink in order to read it. He can use the ink to restore the inscriptions so it is once again readable. The ingredients are #b#t04000183#, #t02022000#, and #t04006000##k...I hope this isn't all for naught...

#i4000183##t4000183# #b#c4000183# / 50#k
#i2022000##t2022000# #b#c2022000# / 10#k
#i4006000##t4006000# #b#c4006000# / 30#k
#i4161018##t4161018# #b#c4161018# / 1#k.
I found the ingredients and returned them to #p2040052#. He said making the ink takes a bit of time, so I'll have to wait until it's ready.

string.name: name
string.value: The Ancient Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

After I handed him all the ingredients, #p2040052# sprinkled the ink on the book. Before our eyes, the ink soaked into the pages and restored the words! It revealed information about the bowman's ultimate skill! What could that be? It sounds powerful...I should go ask #b#p1012100##k. \n\n#t4161024# #b#c4161024# / 1#k.

When I asked #p1012100# about the book, she was shocked! I related the entire tale of the ink restoring the pages, and how #p2040052# mentioned it was made with invisible ink to prevent knowledge of this technique from spreading into unworthy hands. She has agreed to take a further look into the book to find out more.

string.name: name
string.value: The Bowman's Ultimate Skill

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

While studying the book, Athena remarked that she's heard about the Bowman's Ultimate Skill but has never seen one of these books before. She told me that if one masters this skill, they might even surpass her in level. To discover more, she told me to go see #bRene#k...\n\n#t4161025# #b#c4161025# / 1#k for more information. This is shaping up to be quite a journey...
I traveled to the frozen fields of El Nath and gave the book to Rene. She was intrigued by the book as well, and wants to study it a bit more before she tells me more information.

string.name: name
string.value: The Dragon's Guardian

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart
#b#p2081007##k, guardian of the holy dragon Nine Spirit. I heard he knows a lot about dragons.

I met Raul, who introduced himself as the knight who guards the holy dragon, Nine Spirit. He needs help making the dragon grow and I've agreed to assist him. He told me to get #b#t04031449##k in order to make the baby dragon display it's potential power. #t04031449# can only be obtained from a living dragon...If I catch a Wyvern, I'm sure I can get it. \n\n#i4031449##t4031449# #b#c4031449#/20#k
After a bit of Wyvern hunting, I brought #t4031449#, Raul breathed power to the baby dragon. Now the baby dragon has #r#q2321003##k's power!

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Power 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart
I spoke with #b#p2081007##k, who mentioned that the dragon is not at its full power yet. I must find a way to increase its power further...perhaps through a ritual or item?

Raul has agreed to help me further. He told me to gather #b30 #t04031483##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. I should be able to strengthen the dragon even more! \n\n#i4031483##t4031483# #b#c4031483#/30#k

After a long hunt, I gave Raul #t4031483#. Using it in an ancient ritual, he increased #q2321003#'s power even more. Yet something tells me there is more power within the dragon, waiting to be unlocked...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

I obtained a peculiar looking book. The entire book, cover to cover, is black so I can't read it... I'm getting a strange vibe from the book. Perhaps #b#p2081200##k will know something about this book.

#p2081200# said to go see #b#p2060100##k, the witch from the deep sea, to get information about this book. #p2060100#...? Why wonâ€™t #p2081200# just tell me about the book himself? Would #p2060100# really know anything? I'm skeptical, but I have no choice...I must know more! \n\n#i4001107##t4001107# #b#c4001107# / 1#k
#p2060100# didnâ€™t know much about the book itself. However, she seemed to know #bhow to read the book#k. She understood the language, and agreed to tell me what it means upon my return.

string.name: name
string.value: Method of Contradiction

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

I went to see #p2060100# with #t4001107#. #p2060100# says I have to burn the book with cold flames in order to read it. A strange, but effective way of hiding the information contained within. The information has to be important if someone went through all this trouble. She's agreed to help me. I must gather #b5 #t4000008#, 50#t4000081#, and 100#t4000150##k to make #t4001108# which is needed to burn cold flames. Can I trust this witch? I hope she does not lead me down the wrong path...

#i4000008##t4000008# #b#c4000008#/5#k 
#i4000081##t4000081# #b#c4000081#/50#k 
#i4000150##t4000150# #b#c4000150#/100#k
Success! I gave all the ingredients to #p2060100# to make #b#t4001108##k. Now, I must find a place to properly burn the book...perhaps the sea?

string.name: name
string.value: Caron's Note

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

According to #p2060100#, the author of this book appears to be Caron, a boatman at the River of Death who takes spirits to the underworld. He wrote stories about ferrying those who died to the underworld; but yet returned, somehow brought back to life. As I continued to read, I noticed a familiar name. It was #b#p1061011##k of #bSleepywood#k... #p2060100# told me I could find out about the secrets of death if I meet those who returned from the grave. There is a secret here that I must discover!

#p1061011# knew about Caron as #p2060100# said. It appears there is a way to learn how to bring back the dead back to life. Such a technique would certainly come in handy during encounters with dangerous monsters. I must learn it!

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

When I asked #p1061011# to teach me how to resurrect the dead, he told me that I have to experience death. He told me to go to the dark place across from the Door of death, guarded by #bThanatos#k, at the #bBottom of Ludibrium Clocktower#k. I'm a bit scared, but my spirit is telling me that this is the path to take.\n\n#i4031448##t4031448# #b#c4031448#/1#k

That was a tough test, but somehow, I survived. I received the supremely powerful skill known as #b#q2321006##k. #p1061011# said those who obtain such power should never abuse it. This technique, while powerful, breaks one of nature's most sacred laws, that of life and death. I should be careful...

string.name: name
string.value: The Great Warrior, Sayram

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior
#b#p2040052##k of #b#m222020000##k says he has something to tell me...

#p2040052# talked about a warrior named #bSayram#k. He mentioned a singing shield which I can use to get information about the old techniques of Sayram. Then he told me to go see #b#p2081000##k at #bLeafre#k to find more information about him...Let's go see #b#m240000000#'s Chief#k with the #b#t4161019##k that 
#p2040052# gave me. Should be an amusing trip at the least. A singing shield? I wonder... 

#i4161019##t4161019# #b#c4161019# / 1#k
Tatamo seems to know about Sayram, however, the singing shield is another matter. I wonder if this is all true or just some kind of joke...perhaps I should talk with Chief Tatamo again.

string.name: name
string.value: Griffey's Necklace

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior

#p2081000# knows about Sayram but doesn't know anything about the singing shield. He says that I might be able to find some information on it from the #b#t04031479##k which Sayram gave to Griffey, whom he dearly loved. So I'll head to Minar Forest and find the necklace from the #o8180001#. Should be a piece of cake...yea, right...\n\n#i4031479##t4031479# #b#c4031479#/1
I found #t4031479#, and after some 'persuasion', obtained the necklace. Now to return to Chief Tatamo and see what he says about this.

string.name: name
string.value: Sayram's Skill

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior

#b#p1061012##k said the picture on the necklace points to #m910500200#, the deepest part in the entrance of the Shrine. He said that I would find the Singing Shield there. However, he said #m910500200# would be locked so I would have to eliminate #o9500139# to get the key...Will I really get Sayram's shield there? The Insignificant Being tells me to try taking the key I already used for another world to #b#p2040052##k as well...This is getting interesting, I'd better keep my weapon close! 

#i4031471##t4031471# #b#c4031471#/1#k
#i4031475##t4031475# #b#c4031475#/1#k

I went to #b#p2040052##k of #b#m222020000##k to find the singing shield. While talking to the Wiz, Wiz found the skill book from the singing shield. This WAS the great warrior Sayram's skill! I have learned a new technique! Quite unexpected but excellent nonetheless. I shall use this in battle to defeat my enemies!

string.name: name
string.value: Robeira's Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Shammos's past

#p2040052# agreed to find the book for me. I wonder what the book says, must be important...

string.name: name
string.value: A Magician's Story

string.name: parent
string.value: Shammos's past

#p2040052# said the book #p2020009# left for me is quite strange, and relates to Magicians somehow. I'm supposed to deliver it to #b#p1032001##k if I'm finished with it. Magician's story? What could it be? Maybe I can ask #p1032001##k.\n\n#t4161020# #b#c4161020# / 1#k
Upon delivering the book to #p1032001#, I decided to ask about the book. My words met with an empty look and eerie silence. I may have just hit a nerve...

string.value: Another Crazy Genius?!

string.name: parent
string.value: Shammos's past

After an uneasy silence, #p1032001# spoke at last. He said that the main character of the book is none other than #p2022003#, who used to be a human and a genius Magician. Then he asked me to go check out the elder's official residence, #b#p2022003##k, to see how he's doing these days...
#p2022003# is still out of it. But I think I heard him say #p1032001#...

#p2022003# just kept shouting #p2020009# and #p1032001#'s name. I wonder if he's really crazy...

#p2081009# gets upset at those who think the shield is weak. He developed a new shield skill and said to get used to fighting with the shield if I want to learn the new skill. He told me to hunt 200 #r#o9300096##k at the training ground he prepared...\n\n#o9300096# #r#a61801##k

Hugh said it's not his book. However, he told me that it has information on how to make something amazing. Hugh said he'll make it and asked me to bring him the ingredients...I have to see Kay and Porter to get some of the ingredients. This is going to take some time.
