string.name: name
string.value: Protect Ludibrium

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium

A mysterious power appeared in Ludibrium, and then suddenly disappeared. Chaos ensued. Now is the time to straighten up the screwed-up time of Ludibrium. I'll need to go see #b#p2041021##k, who's at the #bPath of Time#k under Ludibrium.
I met up with #b#p2041021##k at the Path of Time. I promised him to find a new source of energy that may replace the original Time Sphere, which had been the main source of power for Ludibrium.
I gathered up enough #b#t4031170#s#k and gave them to #b#p2041021##k as a replacement for the Time Sphere. I think he can make a new source of power with #i4031170#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Replacement Time Energy

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium
The source of energy has been swallowed a whole by #o8500001# with the disappearance of the time sphere. I need #p2041021# to find a way for an alternative.

Thanks to Papulatus Clock with Time Sphere, the monsters below Path of Time have grown much stronger. There is, however, a way to recover the energy from those monsters; defeat them and they'll cough up the item that stores the energy. I'll need to gather up 300 Tachions and 100 Mysterious Powders. 

#t4031175:# #r#c4031175#/300#k
#t4031171:# #r#c4031171#/100#k
I gathered up #t4031175#s and #t4031171#s as the replacement energy to create the new Time Sphere.

string.name: name
string.value: The Time Sphere

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium
I may need to take care of some more business while creating the time sphere. I should go see #p2041021#.
I found the #t4031179:# that #p2041021# was talking about. Apparently, to defeat Papulatus, we need to be at least level 80 or higher...

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium
Everything is ready. Now all we need to do is eliminate the evil force that is #o8500001#.

Enter the power-generating room by finding the #b#t4031172:##k by defeating the monsters guarding the gate. I also need to place #b#t4031179:##k at the crack to call #o8500001# out.

#t4031172:# #r#c4031172#/1#k
Eliminate #o8500001# #r#a71031##k

Finally got to eliminate #o8500001#, the evil force-dripping monster that was hogging the Time Sphere and stealing out all kinds of power through Ludibrium! The Clocktower shall emit forces of nature, and Ludibrium shall be brought in peace.

string.name: name
string.value: Papulatus's counterattack
I thought there would be no problem in the clock tower since I stopped the crack of dimension and got rid of #o8500002#, but I still have things to do. Let's go to #b#p2041021##k.

#p2041021# said that once the crack occurs on the wall of dimension, it becomes weak so that can easily have holes. He was worried that #o8500002# will attack again. #p2041021# asked me to check out on #b#p2041023##k monitoring around the operation room if #o8500002# comes in.
#p2041023# said #o8500002# invaded again showing me the evidence of a piece of dimension crack. He asked me to get rid of #o8500002# as I once killed #o8500002# that I can do it again...

string.name: name
string.value: Moira's Whereabouts

string.name: parent
string.value: War of the Dragons
I heard recently #p2081000# in #m240000000# often looks up at the sky. Who is he waiting for? Let's go see #p2081000#.

#p2081000# in #m240000000# was concerned about #b#p2081006##k, a close magician friend, because he had recently lost contact with her. #p2081006# is very close to dragons in Minar Forest and a few days ago, she went to the forest because she heard that the dragons were under danger. Since then, she lost all contact with her. What could've possibly happened to the dragons in Minar Forest and where has #p2081006# disappeared to? Wouldn't I be able to find her somewhere #bbeyond Dragon's Forest#k?
#p2081000# asked me look for magician #p2081006#. After getting lost for awhile, I was finally able to meet #p2081006# at the top of the entrance of the Cave of Life at the dragon's nest.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Medicine for Transformation

string.name: parent
string.value: War of the Dragons

Moira, whom I met at the entrance of the Cave of Life, asked me to defeat Horntail. She said that she would make me a secret medicine that allows one to transform into a dragon, which I'll need to pass through the entrance of the cave that is guarded by Horntail's follower, Keroben. 
Let's get back to Moira with all the ingredients.

#i4001075##t4001075# #b#c4001075##k / 1
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267##k / 1
#i4001076##t4001076# #b#c4001076##k / 1
#i4001077##t4001077# #b#c4001077##k / 10
#i4001078##t4001078# #b#c4001078##k / 1

Moira told me about the war of the dragons and asked me to defeat Horntail. Moira said that she will make me a secret medicine to transform if I bring her all the ingredients she had asked of me, which I would need to get passed #p2081005# and enter Horntail's cave.. Let's get all the ingredients to Moira. Moira made me a secret medicine that can transform me into Cornian.

string.name: name
string.value: Badge of a Squad Member
Moira says she has a personal request...

Moira tells me that she was once a member of the Dragon Squad, and that she is worried about other members, now scattered to the winds. She asked me to look for the badge of the members. She said if I bring three badges from the members and the certificates from Zakum, Papulatus and Pianus by defeating them in battle, she would appoint me as an #rHonorary Squad Member#k and show me the #bsecret passage to cave#k that only members know about...

#i4001080##t4001080# #b#c4001080#/1#k
#i4001081##t4001081# #b#c4001081#/1#k
#i4001082##t4001082# #b#c4001082#/1#k
#i4001085##t4001085# #b#c4001085#/1#k
#i4001083##t4001083# #b#c4001083#/1#k
#i4001084##t4001084# #b#c4001084#/1#k
I gave three member badges and also Zakum, Papulatus and Pianus certificates to Moira. She then appointed me an Honorary squad member and showed me the secret passage to the cave.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Secret Medicine for Transformation
I want to enter the Cave of Life one more time...I wonder if I could get the transformation medicine again. Let's go see Moira again.

Moira told me to bring her all the ingredients if I want the transformation medicine again. Let's get back to Moira with all the ingredients.

#i4001103##t4001103# #b#c4001103##k / 1
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267##k / 1
#i4001104##t4001104# #b#c4001104##k / 1
#i4001105##t4001105# #b#c4001105##k / 10
#i4001078##t4001078# #b#c4001078##k / 1
I gave Moira all the ingredients again and she made me a transformation medicine that allows me to transform into Cornian.

string.name: name
string.value: Grako's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!
I need to go see Grako!!

Grako of Showa Town has a stomach ache which seems to have stemmed from indigestion. I wanted to get Grako some medicine, but she said she doesn't think she'll need a medicine; instead, she wants to drink soft cider. I should go get some cider for her.\n\n#t2022002# #b#c2022002##k/1
I gave Grako the cider, but... oh man, he's been FAKING IT! Arrrgh... and anyway, he said he actually wants to ask for another favor, this one being REAL. Should I trust him this time?

string.name: name
string.value: Mariwaka's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!

Mariwaka said she got her purse stolen a while ago, and asked me to ask Popo in front of the police station if the police are doing something about it, just in case they found it for her. Man, people in this town looove to ask for favors. So annoying!
Just like Mariwaka asked, I went to where Popo is.

string.name: name
string.value: Mariwaka's Purse

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!
Apparently, Popo is so busy he hasn't had time to handle the case of Mariwaka's missing Purse. My gosh! Mariwaka will be really disappointed if I tell her the bad news...

Mariwaka asked me if I could find the purse for her, in place of Popo. She said the thugs walking around the back alley may be the ones that stole her purse. She also mentioned that they have not seen any type of animals in the city for quite some time...I wonder what happened to them...
I returned the purse to Mariwaka, and she was crying with tears of joy. Oh yeah, I remember, she's an actress...! I wonder if she was really acting...

string.name: name
string.value: The Scarred Kitty

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I should go talk to #bThe Scarred Kitty#k.
I should feed this poor-looking #bScarred Kitty#k.

I fed #bThe Scarred Kitty#k at Showa Town, and... WHAT? This kitty's talks! Apparently this kitty was teased, abused, and labeled as a monster cat because it spoke and understood the human language. After thanking me for food, it promised to help me if I ever run into a tight situation.

string.name: name
string.value: Upgrading Zakum Armor
Tsuri, the gregarious fish merchant, claims to have knowledge of the way to awaken the Zakum Armor's dormant power. I can't imagine this armor at its full strength. Such power!

According to Tsuri, in order to reawaken the dormant power, I'll have to eliminate #b20 Maladies#k and #b20 Wild Kargo's#k within the time limit. 

No. of Maladies Left: #r#a80131##k
No. of Wild Kargos Left : #r#a80132##k

I tried on the Zakum Armor that has been reawakened by Tsuri. I can literally feel the armor's strength, coursing through my veins...as if the fearsome power of Zakum is mine to wield and control...I feel invincible wearing this. This is awesome!

string.name: name
string.value: Read the Newspaper!
Apparently, Tsuri of Showa Town is going through a dilemma. What must that be? I should inquire further...
I met Tsuri at Showa Town, and he wanted me to bring him #b1 #t1002418##k. Should I help him out? \n#t1002418# #b#c1002418##k/1
I gave him one #t1002418##k. What? He wanted to read the funnies? FUNNIES? Seriously? *Sigh.*

string.name: name
string.value: Veggies are Awesome
Recently, the price of veggies has skyrocketed. What happened? Last thing I need is an extra expense--mesos are tight these days!

According to Umi, #b#o8140500##k went crazy at the farm, ruining the harvest in the process. I wonder what's going on here. It seems very strange, as if evil spirits have overcome the town. I can't let that happen! \n#t4000080# #b#c4000080##k/200
By eliminating #b#o8140500##k, I feel like I did my part in protecting the food table of each and everyone in Showa Town. I better start eating my veggies...

string.name: name
string.value: Movie Star
I should talk to Furano, a world-famous movie director. I wonder what he's made? I hope it wasn't something awful, like 'Rampage of the Merciless Onions'...
The final audition is pretty simple. I need to just take on #b#o6130101##k at the inner corner of Henesys. I'll have to destroy it at all costs! \n#o6130101# #r#a80301##k

No way, I'm in the movie already? Darn! No Makeup or anything! If I had known about this, then I would have at least tried to look a bit nicer. Anyways, I can't wait to see how my awesome array of skills comes out on film--maybe I'll even get a close-up!

string.name: name
string.value: Protect Lucas's Farm
It seems like the snails around Amherst are causing great grief around the area because of their actions on the farm. How can I help solve this problem, perhaps I should talk to Lucas!

The snails around Amherst have been causing great damage to farms in the area, and Lucas is really counting on me to come through for them. I'll have to take them out! 
#o100100# #r#a80311##k 
#o100101# #r#a80312##k 
#o130101# #r#a80313#
The snails are gone! Hopefully this will protect the farms for a little bit. Too bad the Work Gloves Lucas gave me smelled like old bananas and fish...yuck!

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Concerns 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya's Concerns
The condition of the baby Lioner concerns me. I better go to Maya's house.

Now, the baby Lioner is poisoned! In order to detoxify the poison, it'll require #b50 #t02050000##ks, #b30 #t04000076#s#k, and #b30 #t04000058#s#k. Gotta hurry! 
#t02050000# #b#c02050000##k/50 
#t04000076# #b#c04000076##k/30 
#t04000058# #b#c04000058##k/30
The medicine should detoxify any poison in its body after a good night sleep. Is this it? I better ask Maya.

string.name: name
string.value: Lionel's Journey
Is Lionel hanging out outside with Maya right now? I better go check them out at Maya's house.

Apparently, the one that scared Lionel was #b#o5130104##k, and that was why it never left the house, despite the necklace. I better gather up #b100 #t04000051#s#k to boost its confidence. \n#t04000051# #b#c04000051##k/100
Maya said Lionel's friends came by and left with it. At least Lionel isn't alone. Maya may be crying, but I think it's best for Lionel to go and live among his friends.

string.name: name
string.value: Tsuri & the Gourmet Dish
Tsuri of Showa Town apparently is going to make a 'fantastic gourmet dish'. Interesting...
Tsuri said, in order to make the fantastic gourmet dish, he'll need #b100 #t04000157#s#k. I can't wait to see what comes out of this! #k#n#t04000157# #b#c04000157##k/100
Gourmet dish? This is nothing more than junk food! *sigh*

string.name: name
string.value: Umi's Spiced Veggies
Umi of Showa Town sounds like she's stuck in a tough spot. I should go talk to her.

She said she needed a solid rock to help her make spice vegetables. A solid rock...speaking of which, I remember hearing that #b#o6400100##k the monster collects them. \n#t04000131# #b#c04000131##k/80
Umi's spiced vegetables sure sound enticing. I should go get some later!

string.name: name
string.value: The Ghost's Whereabouts

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
#b#p1012109##k of #b#p1012109##k's book should be ready by now. I should go talk to him.
Apparently the #b#t4000144#s#k have disappeared to the direction of #b#m801000000##k. I need to find it and return it to its original state.
Apparently, #p9120011#'s doll just went about on its one way. Maybe this has something to do with #b#t4000144##k that #p1012109# is looking for...

string.name: name
string.value: The Man of Convention

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
#b#p1012109##k seems to catch on to something here. I'll need to hear this.

He said #p9120011#'s doll that is laden with #t4000144# may be controlled by something. I can't just stand still listening to this! I'll have to gather up #b50 #t04000148#s#k from #b#o7130300##k, as well as #b50 #t04000147#s#k from #b#o7130010##k. 
Since #p9120011# is crying, I'll have to return #b#t04000147##k to her first and hand #b#t04000147##k to her, then go to where #b#p1012109##k is.

#t04000148# #b#c04000148##k/50
#t04000147# #b#c04000147##k/50

After handing #b#t04000147##k to #p9120011#, a blinding light engulfed the dolls, and then they transformed back to their original state. Too bad #b#t04000148##k disappeared in the process. What should I do? I better go talk to #b#p9120011##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Ray of Light

string.name: parent
string.value: Freed From Darkness
After handing #p9120011# the doll, #b#t04000148#k also disappeared! #b#p9120011##k said she'll tell me a story...
#p9120011# suggested that I go to where #b#p1012109##k is and look for it. That's true, since standing pat doesn't do anything for me. I better go back and discuss this with him.

Apparently, #t04000148# and #t04000147# were both moved by warmth and compassion #p9120011# exudes. Isn't that nice to see? Just as #p1012109# said, if everyone genuinely loves everything around them, then there would be no monsters to begin with...? Anyway, it was nice to hear that #p1012109# may be ready to write the next chapter in the book. I can't wait!

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Code

string.name: parent
string.value: A Puzzling Code
After solving the code, I found out there's a clue in Sleepywood! I better go there immediately.
Based on the bizarre-looking statue in Sleepywood, I was unable to find another code. What would this code imply?
After solving the code written on the bizarre-looking statue, I headed over to a small grave.

string.name: name
string.value: The Meaning of the Code

string.name: parent
string.value: A Puzzling Code
Should I head over to the small grave that serves as the answer to the code written on the bizarre-looking statue? I should--knowing is better than not knowing.
Solving the code took me to this small grave. I better let Kinokonoko know of this.
I told Kinokonoko everything I knew in regards to this puzzling code.

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama's Life Work
Sabitrama of Sleepywood is apparently losing sleep over something. What must that be?

A committee member? What the...
I feel like being pushed into this by Sabitrama, but I think it'll be fun solving the riddles of the ancient archives. The archive stated as such. 

Regarding the 1st Herb: 
The spirit of black and white bids adieu to the land and appears before me. Mark on the two silent spirits, and the spirit will intermingle to transform into the 1st Herb

Regarding the 2nd Herb: 
What do you think of the one that snuffs loneliness and darkness in the cradle, while the soul is vacated from the body? The soul that cannot return must find a soul mate that shall spend the eternity with. You're the doll, and inside, you shall find the 2nd Herb.

Hmmm...where do I begin?

Being called a committee member stinks, but I got paid well, and it was fun. The clues to the 3rd Herb are still nowhere to be found, but ... I actually feel like helping him out once more.\nI should drop by sometime later.

string.name: name
string.value: The Committee Challenges

string.name: parent
string.value: The Committee Challenges
Sabitrama of Sleepywood has been looking for me. Something must have happened. I should drop by when there's time.

Sabitrama found the clues needed for the 3rd Herb.
The message was still too hard to understand. The archive said something like this! ...
What kind of an ominous herb is this?? This herb cannot be placed near a human being, so seal up the force in a spherical object, and never let it see the day of light again...

If it's anything like the herbs before, then I'll still have to obtain this through monsters again. Arrrgh, this is frustrating!

We found the 3rd Herb, but it is tightly sealed inside Lazy Buffy's Marble. It seems like it's been attached for so long, that I don't think we can just pluck it out of the sphere. Sabitrama then mentioned something like applying modern science to opening this. We've come so far, that there's no way we're about to give up.\nBut then again, who am I supposed to find?'

string.name: name
string.value: The Father of Modern Science

string.name: parent
string.value: The Committee Challenges

We found the 3rd Herb, but it is tightly sealed inside Lazy Buffy's Marble. It seems like it's been attached for so long, that I don't think we can just pluck it out of the sphere. Sabitrama then mentioned something like applying modern science to opening this. We've come so far, that there's no way we're about to give up.\nBut then again, who am I supposed to find?'

He may have talked too candidly on some things, but I think the herb can be plucked out of the marble. As part of the deal, I have to gather up #b500 #t04000133#s#k.


#t04000133# #b#c04000133##k/500

The seal is disabled, but since the marble itself isn't very stable, Dr. Kim made a device called 'Open Sesame' and sent it to Sabitrama. I should go see him later. \nAnyway, he's pretty good at what he does, but man he's terrible at naming his inventions!

string.name: name
string.value: Open Sesame
The device known as 'Open Sesame' should arrive at Sabitrama house any minute. I better go see him right now.
I'll need 1,000,000 mesos to open up 'Open Sesame'. I have a feeling that, even after making the investment, we may not get to touch the herb. Even with great hesitation, I must decide right now.

I think, as soon as the seal was disabled with the 3rd Herb, it perished the moment it touched the open air. Sabitrama seemed content with it, but ... I must admit, he's one heck of an enthusiast in terms of herbs. 1,000,000 mesos was a stiff price to pay, but I got the Magic Collection, so I'm good with that!

string.name: name
string.value: Porter's Challenge
#r#p2050013##k feels so energized that he feels that he can do anything. Now, this is not an everyday occurrence, so this I gotta check out.

I don't know what it's for, but he wanted me to gather up #b200#k each of #b#t4000102##k and #b#t4000078##k. He even promised to give me a rock that'll help me tremendously down the road.\r\n#t4000102# #b#c4000102##k/200\n#t4000078# #b#c4000078##k/200
A shield which has such powerful protection it exceeds that of a Pan Lid...is #r#p2050013##k serious or is he pulling my leg?

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat the Great Offender

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ninja Castle
#p9110106# seems like she has something to say.

#p9110106# has requested that you defeat the #bmonster#k at the tower. Don't forget to return with #bthe monster's money#k when you successfully defeat the monster. 

Monster's money #b#c04000346##k/1
You defeated #o9400409# and delivered the #t04000346# to #p9110106#.

string.name: name
string.value: Pet's Re-Evolution
If I ever get tired of the evolving petâ€™s current look, then I can re-evolve the evolving pet again for a different look.
The re-evolution requires 1 #b#t5380000##k and 10,000 mesos again, just like the first time.
The re-evolution had succeeded and now the evolving pet sports a different look.

string.name: name
string.value: Valentine's Day : Heart Chocolate
You can make a special chocolate for the special someone with the ingredients you can gather up yourself. Go see Ace of Hearts and make the Valentine's Day Chocolate full of love.

#b#p2041017##k said he can make a nice package for a chocolate with a heart-shaped box, laden with a special spell full of love, as long as I gather up the materials for both the chocolate and the package. #t4031110#, and #t4031109# can be acquired through monsters, while #t4031111# and #t4031112# can be acquired through #bCoco#k. 

#t4031110# #c4031110# / #r1#k
#t4031109# #c4031109# / #r1#k

#t4031111# #c4031111# / #r1#k
#t4031112# #c4031112# / #r1#k
Ace of Hearts helped me make a Heart Chocolate laden with a spell full of love. \n\n'The power of love shall protect you...'

string.name: name
string.value: Translated Communique
I lost the translated communique. Let's go to Elpam Gorlab!
I told Elpam Gorlab what I want.
I got the translated communique from Elpam Gorlab again. Thank You!

string.name: name
string.value: The Mark of Heroism

Lukan told me about the Valley of Heroes and the giant Menhir columns barring the way through. He mentioned that the Heroic Statues that line the valley would also act as teleporters, for only someone who had an artifact known as the Marker of Heroism. Perhaps someone well-versed in ancient artifacts would know something about these Markers of Heroism... I think I may have an idea on who to ask. Otherwise, it's time for some ledge hopping!

I was right: John Barricade's extensive knowledge about ancient civilizations and items has paid off again! He'll give me the Barricades' Marker of Heroism if I reimburse him for the materials they had to acquire to recreate it: #b1 Power Crystal#k, #b10 Gold Ores#k and #b4Typhon Feathers#k. The only problem: Typhons nest in the upper reaches of the mountain! To get up the mountain, I'll have to go through the Valley first! Ugh! Looks like a catch-22! Hmmm, I guess I could see if someone else might have these feathers... I wonder if anyone else has already made it through the Valley on their own?

John gave me the Marker of Heroism artifact after I brought him the hard-to-find Typhon feathers and the other materials. Now I'll be able to the Heroic Statues to get through the Valley. However, it's not all candy and cake yet; I still need to figure out the correct statues to use, but at least it'll make it easier for me to move around. Guess I'll try each statue as I go along and see where they lead!

string.name: name
string.value: The Brewing Storm

I've heard tell that many travelers get lost in the spooky Phantom Forest. If I come across any of them, perhaps one of them will have an interesting tale to tell about the area. I should search them out, but I better make sure I don't become one of these lost travelers myself... yikes!

I met a knight lost in the Phantom Forest named #bLukan de Vrisien#k. His armor is very ancient-looking, and he seems to be from another era. Lukan asked if I knew anything about the unfriendly #bStormbreaker#k warriors wandering the forest. He seems to hate them, though strangely, his armor looks almost exactly like theirs...lightning bolts and all! Regarding this, Lukan remains tight-lipped... at least until I prove I'm not in league with them. To gain his trust, and prove my fighting prowess, I need to #bdefeat these Stormbreakers#k and #bcollect 10 of their badges#k to bring to him.

After defeating the Stormbreakers as he requested, Lukan explained that he is a #bStormcaster Knight#k from Crimsonwood Keep. When I told him that Crimsonwood Keep was ancient history, and that Masteria had been lost for a millennium, he seemed at a loss for words. Somehow, he has been transported to this time period, his future. Strange things are brewing indeed.

string.name: name
string.value: The Right Path

Jack Barricade has given me the #bMap of Phantom Forest#k that he took from Taggrin. He explained that he was forced to steal it from Taggrin, who had refused to give it to him even after he'd won it in a bet fair and square. Now that Jack's made it up to the Crimsonwood Mountain, he's given the map to me for my own use. Perhaps I should return it to Taggrin? If I keep it, the map will come in handy while navigating the tricky Phantom Forest, #ballowing me to use the marked shortcuts#k and save time traveling. But at the same time, there's a part of me that feels that this map still rightfully belongs to Taggrin. What should I do? It's a dilemma...

I told Taggrin that I'd found Jack up the Crimsonwood Mountain, and explained Jack's purpose. Taggrin was surprised when I offered to return his Map of Phantom Forest to him... and was moved by my gesture. He seems to have warmed up to me, and ask that I return and speak to him. What could he want?

In return for making the honorable gesture of returning his map, Taggrin let me in on a secret of his own: he and his band are not bandits at all, but are actually #bRaven Ninjas#k, descendants of the ancient #bShadowknights#k! They're here to discover what happened to their ancestral Keep and the reason behind the disappearance of Masteria. As such, Taggrin is offering a bounty on the Keep's unrightful occupiers. I can now speak to Joko to redeem any #rBadges#k I find off these corrupted warriors (the #rWindraiders#k, the #rStormbreakers#k, the #rFirebrands#k, and the #rNightshadows#k) for #bmeso bounties#k, and possibly even #bRaven Ninja gear#k! I can make #bone Badge Bounty Redemption per day#k

string.name: name
string.value: Fool's Gold

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and it looks like there a trickster roaming about the Phantom Forest. It caused her quite a bit of trouble-surprising for a warrior of her caliber. I've agreed to help rid the Forest of these nefarious creatures, and as proof, I have to bring her#b 30 of the strange silver clovers#k-she called them #bLucky Charms#k. I'll be on guard-that forest is haunted...or so I've heard...

I ventured into the maddening Phantom Forest and came into contact with a number of the Leprechauns and after a series of battles, got 30 Lucky Charms. I returned them to Lita for the Bounty! She thanked me for my help, and mentioned that I can return to her for more bounty work!

string.name: name
string.value: Rags to Riches

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter.

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and it seems that there strange, powerful spirits drifting about the Phantom Forest. These strange spirits seemingly have no desire, save for tormenting others. I've agreed to eliminate 30 of them, and bring their soiled rags to Lita as proof of valor. I'd better keep sharp-that forest has driven quite a few travelers mad with its confusion...

I navigated the Phantom Forest and collected 30 of the Soiled Rags the Elder Wraiths had upon them. It was strange to finally fight one. They were eerily quiet for being so vicious. I wonder if there's more to their story...perhaps someone in the Phantom Forest would know...

string.name: name
string.value: One Step A-Head

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter.

With all the strange occurrences in Masteria and New Leaf City, Lita Lawless must be busy! I'll bet that she's willing to accept my help...maybe I can earn some mesos in the process! A quick jaunt to the Kerning City subway and I'll be on my way to New Leaf City!

I spoke with Lita, and she told me the tragic origin of the Headless Horseman. He was a former warrior of Crimsonwood Keep that was experimented on the mysterious Alchemist, the same one who corrupted the Krakians. He now roams the Phantom Forest, and I must bring his Jack O'Lantern head to Lita as proof of my triumph!
It was a tough fight, but I brought down the mighty horseman and returned his Jack O'Lantern to Lita. I wonder how many other lives the mysterious Alchemist has ruined...

string.name: name
string.value: Bounty Master

string.name: parent
string.value: Bounty Hunter...
I've completed all Bounty Hunter bounties for Lita Lawless! I think itâ€™s about time I'm deputized! I should head to New Leaf City and find out more!
I spoke with Lita, and she's all set to deputize me whenever I'm ready! Completing all those quests was hard, but well worth the effort!

I've been deputized by Lita Lawless as an official protector of New Leaf City! I've sworn to defend the area, and Masteria in general from all future threats...and from what it looks like, there's going to be a lot of them!

string.name: name
string.value: Attendance Check
So If I head over to #b#p9010000##k, then I'll be able to receive an attendance sheet? I see... so this is to check my ardent attendance to MapleStory. Sounds very intriguing...

#b#p9010000##k told me if I take this attendance sheet to #b#p9200000##k, then I'll be able to receive PB & J Sandwich, Chocolate Milk, Chips, Cookie, and Fruit Roll Up in return. If I continue to gather the items for 14 days, then on the 15th day, I can get a special prize! Apparently I have to come back every day to claim the prize!

As I was successful in checking my attendance, I received scrumptious lunch items in return. I better keep these items that I received from #p9200000# somewhere safe. \n#p9200000# told me if I give him all the items on the 15th day, I'll get something nice as well!

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Spirits

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost Spirits
A new traveler is in the town of El Nath, I wonder what his story is... Perhaps something to do with Zakum? I should pay him a visit; I heard his name is Adonis.
I visited El Nath, and found Adonis. He's speaking to me now...

Adonis and I had an enlightening conversation about Zakum, and the residents of the former town. It appears that Zakum gains additional power from what Adonis calls 'Zakum Diamonds'. They are souls of those who fell in battle against the mighty Zakum. As they were fellow warriors and adventurers like me, their souls must be released. If I can find a relic of the old town, such as a Crystal Blade, Miner's Hat, El Nathian Cape or Cloak of Corruption and combine it with a Zakum Diamond, I can perform a 'Liberation Ritual' that will free the soul by transferring their power into that item. I can then wear the enchanted item for extra strength in battle! Only thing is, Zakum Diamonds only come from one place, Zakum himself. This won't be easy...

string.name: name
string.value: Game On! <CVS>
I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #bAllowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad every day until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad every day until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

string.name: name
string.value: Little Suzy's X-Mas Dilemma

There's a little girl with a puzzled look on her face in New Leaf City. With X-mas time just around the corner, she should be happy... Why does she look so puzzled and confused instead? Looks like she may need some help with her Maplemas spirit!

Little Suzy was all excited for Maplemas this year... until she learned all about a similar holiday called 'Versalmas' from a strange green mouse named O-Pongo. Now she doesn't know what sounds more exciting - Maplemas... or Versalmas? Suzy needs my help to help her decide which version of X-mas she should celebrate this year. In order to do that, I'll have to speak to both Maple Claws and this O-Pongo character, and then come back and talk to her. Maplemas holiday from an alternate dimension, huh? Very curious...

I spoke to both Maple Claws and O-Pongo. It seems that both Maplemas and Versalmas have their merits. In the end, Suzy's put the decision on me: she's asked me to deliver her X-mas Wishlist to one of the two 'Santas,' which will determine which holiday she's celebrating this year. I have a feeling that this decision is important, that I'm not just making a choice for her... but also one for myself. Which holiday do I believe in?

string.name: name
string.value: A Versal Tradition
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to O-Pongo. I'd better speak with this strange green mouse and find out more details about Versalmas.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to O-Pongo about Suzy's dilemma. O-Pongo listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Versal Power! I spoke with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, who is the 'Santa' for the Versal version of Maplemas, and learned a great deal about Versalmas. He told me about the customs for their holiday--quite different from the Maple World! The world of Versal is usually shrouded in darkness; Versalmas is an annual holiday that celebrates the emergence of the sun in their world, which shines for 90 straight days and only for these 90 days. For Versalmas, children receive presents every day for the first 30 days, and get cool treats like Sugar-coated Olives and Caramel Onions! Sounds pretty awesome... Now I'd better speak with Maple Claws and head back to Suzy... It makes me wonder for myself though, which holiday would I pick to celebrate? Hmmm...

string.name: name
string.value: A Very Merry Maplemas
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I'm thinking I should give it to Maple Claws; I should go see her in Happyville.

I can give Little Suzy's Wishlist to Maple Claws. In doing so, she'll be counting on me to help me recover her presents for her this year. All I have to do now is to give Maple Claws the list to cement my decision. Yes... it's going to be a very Merry Maplemas this year!

I thought that Maplemas was the better holiday so I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to Maple Claws. In return, she gave me a red #bMaplemas Hat#k that I can wear proudly to show my Maplemas Spirit! Every time I help Maple Claws recover the presents stolen by monsters, she'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents with her in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring her presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing Maple Claws more presents will also help me earn #bMaplemas Spirit#k! If the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k, Maple Claws will have a special something for me at the end of the event!

string.name: name
string.value: A secret that Mr. Moneybags knows.
There's a legendary necklace called the 'Mind of Maple' that everyone would like to have their hands on...

There's a legendary necklace called the 'Mind of Maple' that everyone would like to have their hands on... Once the Gate of Time opens, Mr. Moneybags will bring the blessing to everyone. Do you have the Mind of Maple? Only Mr. Moneybags knows the secret behind the necklace. Go visit Mr. Moneybags immediately.
Go ask Mr. Moneybags for more information about the Mind of Maple.

string.name: name
string.value: In search of the Mind of Maple

There's a legendary necklace called the #rMind of Maple#k that everyone would like to have their hands on... Once the Gate of Time opens, #bMr. Moneybags#k will bring the blessing to everyone. Do you have the #rMind of Maple#k? Only #bMr. Moneybags#k knows the secret behind the necklace. Go visit #bMr. Moneybags immediately.

Gather up the items Mr. Moneybags asked you to get through #bChief Stan#k in order to restore the #rMind of Maple#k to its original state.

#t4032239:##r #c4032239#/1#k
#t4032233:##r #c4032233#/1#k
The #rMind of Maple#k has been restored to its original state. If you want one yourself, #bMr. Moneybags#k has mentioned that only the power of the guardian spirit may awaken the necklace.

string.name: name
string.value: 2006 Easter : Easter Basket
I better go check and see the Maple Administrator. She may have something in store for me...

The Maple Administrator needs #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbons#k to make me an #rEaster Basket#k. I better go get those right now! 

#t4000003# #b#c4000003#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/100#k
#t4031192# #b#c4031192#/1#k
I got the Easter Basket from the Maple Administrator. Mad Bunny may need this for something... I should go see him now.

string.name: name
string.value: Thanksgiving : Pumpkin Pie
Hmm... There's an old woman over in Henesys...maybe she needs some help cooking?

I spoke with that kind old woman, Grandma Benson, and she needs some help with baking the pies. I've agreed to gather #bthe ingredients#k for her, maybe she'll give me a pie to take with me...I hope so! 

#t4031418# #c4031418# / #r1#k
#t4031419# #c4031419# / #r1#k#k
#t4031420# #c4031420# / #r1#k#k
#t4031421# #c4031421# / #r1#k
I finished gathering the ingredients for Grandma Benson, and she can finally bake the pies. I received a taste in return, and in something that can help me during a tough battle.

string.name: name
string.value: Graham Cracked
What is that old man doing over there with all those Graham Crackers?

I spoke with the old man, Mr. Kit Kat, and he wants to build a Graham Cracker house, but the monsters keep eating them...not that I blame them, they look delicious...despite my hunger, I've agreed to get 50 Graham Crackers for him so he can build his dream house.
I got all the Graham Cracker pieces (and resisted the temptation to eat them), returned to Mr. Kit Kat and he gave me something tasty: Banana Graham Pie. 2 of them!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Beginner

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Beginner
Okay, so now I gotta go see the sailor himself. Where must he be?
I delivered everything to Richard and he asked me delivered his letter to his wife.
I delivered everything to Richard and returned to Angelique. She gave me something nice, and I can go back to her anytime for a quick job.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria: Beauty or Beast!
I heard there's a new girl at the Amoria Hair Salon that needs material for her new hair gel. I wonder what she'd offer in return?
I talked to Claudia. She needs #b25 Squishy Liquids#k for her new hair gel. She's offered to give me a free EXP Hair Salon coupon in return. She seems like a nice enough gal...
I got the Squishy Liquids for Claudia and she gave me an EXP Hair Salon coupon for her shop. I can use it once to get my hair done for free!

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Red Dahlia - Warrior
Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy. Shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Red Dahlia - Bowman
Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy. Shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

string.name: name
string.value: Summer Break: Cody's BBQ.
Hooray for Summer! I heard Cody's having a barbecue! I better head over and see if I can help!
I spoke with Cody, and it looks like he needs help. I'll need to grab 30 #b#t4031658#s#k and bring them back to Cody so he can finish cooking. Just the sound of all that makes me hungry!
I got all the ingredients Cody needed to start the barbecue! With the items he gave me, I can continue to enjoy the summer in style!

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's reminiscence
I think I can get some help from Teo in Lith Harbor...

I met #bTeo#k at Lith Harbor. Teo told me I remind him of his youth when he went for many journeys. Reminiscing about his past, Teo told me he wanted to help me. He said if I bring #b50 #t4000016##k and #b30 #t4000004##k, he will recognize my potentials and support me...ha! This is a Piece of cake!
I proved how good I am to Teo at Lith Harbor. Teo has acknowledged my abilities and financially supported me. With this support, I'll be a great adventurer.

string.name: name
string.value: Beat the Heat <Easy> - 1st Stage

string.name: parent
string.value: Beat the Heat <Easy>
Maple Administrator has come up with an event for the summer. Where must the admin be??

As summer rolls on, The Maple Administrator has prepared an event called 'Beat the Heat' for the health of the users, most of which would be in front of the air-conditioner or a fan. As a warm up, the administrator requested that I defeat #b50 #o130101#s#k and #b20 #o1210102#s#k... sounds like fun.

#o130101# #r#a90512##k
#o1210102# #r#a90511#
I met the Maple Administrator, and passed the 1st Stage of the Easy level of #bBeat the Heat#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Beat the Heat <Easy> - 3rd Stage

string.name: parent
string.value: Beat the Heat <Easy>
I should go visit Maple Administrator for Beat the Heat, 3rd Stage.

For the 3rd Stage task, the Maple Administrator wanted me to defeat #b#o1130100##k and #b#o2220100##k, 25 each, while collecting #b30 #t4000037#s#k from #b#o1210103##k.

#o1130100# #r#a90532##k
#o2220100# #r#a90531##k
#t4000037# #b#c4000037##k/30

I passed the 'Beat the Heat' Challenge that MapleStory prepared for us. Just like she said, I better stop spending so much time in front of air-conditioners and fans, and go out instead and lead an active life.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Knight
It's time to receive the last test given by #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k in order to become a Knight-in-Training.

An eternal loyalty towards the Empress. The courage to stand up to the Black Mage. The will power required to keep your faith intact. As long as you don't forget these three, you'll be able to fight until the very end as a proud member of Cygnus Knights.

An eternal loyalty towards the Empress. The courage to stand up to the Black Mage. The will power required to keep your faith intact. As long as you don't forget these three, you'll be able to fight until the very end as a proud member of Cygnus Knights.

string.name: name
string.value: Welcome to Ereve
You have entered Maple World with a determination to become a #p1101000# Knight. But where is this place? Double-click #b#p1102004##k and start a conversation.

At the request of the Empress, #p1102004#, with his brothers, guides Noblesses who aspire to become a part of #p1101000# Knights. If you #bfollow the arrow to the left#k you'll meet #p1102004#'s brother #b#p1102005##k.
You met #p1102005# as you were asked to do in the quest you received from #p1102004#. #p1102005# seems to have some information for you as well.

string.name: name
string.value: Do You Know the Black Mage?
If you've finished exchanging pleasantries with #p1101000#, it's time to meet #p1101000#'s tactician, #b#p1101002##k, and ask about your immediate duties.

#p1101002# said you weren't strong enough to fight for Maple World, let alone appoint you as a Knight-in-Training. He said you must undergo a training course that has been prepared for you. Let's go see #p1102000#, the training instructor.

#p1101002# said you weren't strong enough to fight for Maple World, let alone appoint you as a Knight-in-Training. He said you must undergo a training course that has been prepared for you. Let's go see #p1102000#, the training instructor.

string.name: name
string.value: Knighthood Exam: Dawn Warrior

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
According to #p1101002#, you can take your Knighthood Exam if you go see #b#p1101003##k, the Chief Knight of Light. Better head over to Ereve and meet #p1101003#.

The Knighthood Exam has started. The test itself is actually quite simple. You just need to reach the end of the Training Forest, enter #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k, and defeat the Tiguru inside while bringing back #t4032096#. Better find #b30 #t4032096#s#k and bring them back to #p1101003#. \n\n#i4032096# #t4032096# #b#c4032096# / 30#k

You have successfully completed the Knighthood Exam and officially dropped the 'in-Training' from your title. As a bona fide Cygnus Knight, do your best to work hard so you will never be ashamed of yourself.

string.name: name
string.value: Ereve Investigation Permit

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
So it seems that if I want to conduct a thorough search on Ereve in search of the Master of Disguise, I'll have to first receive an Investigation Permit. I better talk to #p1101002#.

He claims that due to handing out too many Investigation Permits in times like this, the Investigation Permits have actually run out. He then asked me if I could get him some #t4005004#s so he can issue new Investigation Permits...
I wound up giving #p1101002# some #t4005004#s, and received an Investigation Permit in return. It's now time for me to conduct a thorough search of Ereve.

I gave #p1101002# some #t4005004#s, and received an Investigation Permit in return. It's now time for me to conduct a thorough search of Ereve.
