string.name: name
string.value: Shinsoo's Teardrop

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
It seems like #p1101005# has something to say about the recovered treasure...
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight.

For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight. I'll need to keep my broad perspective of the world intact, but now with the added responsibility of being an Advanced Knight.

string.name: name
string.value: Shinsoo's Teardrop

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
It seems like #p1101006# has something to say about the recovered treasure...
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight.

For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight. I'll need to keep my beliefs and fate intact, like an Advanced Knight would, while delving further into darkness.

string.name: name
string.value: The Stolen Egg

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
#o9001010#? Something about it seems suspicious... I better ask #b#p2081012##k, the Dragon Outcast.

#p2081012# told me if I wanted to find out more about #o9001010#, then I'll have to eliminate one #r#o8180000##k and one #r#o8180001##k. He wanted to leave the house, but not with those creatures out there... I better help #p2081012# out. 

#o8180000##r #a204041##k 
#o8180001##r #a204042##k

The one responsible for stealing the dragon's egg in #m240000000# turned out to be #o9001010#. Even the name seemed quite suspicious. Maybe #p1103000# looked into #o9001010#. I better go visit #o9001010# right now. #b#o9001010#'s cave is located near the dragon's nest#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Knight's Dignity
#p1101002# seemed eager to talk to me about something...

#p1101002# told me that for a Level 50 knight to walk around to various destinations seems beneath my rank, and gave me information on #bMonster Mount#k. According to him, there might be a Mount that's available exclusively for the knights.

#p1101002# told me that for a Level 50 knight to walk around to various destinations seems beneath my rank, and gave me information on Monster Mount. According to him, there might be a Mount that's available exclusively for the knights. I better head off to #m130000000# and hear the story in detail.

string.name: name
string.value: Raising Mimio
I better ask #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k about an enhanced Mount.

Since #t1902005# acquired a wealth of experience, it is now eligible to acquire more power. The problem is that I'll have to feed it with only the top-notch kind of food. To have it resemble the greatness of a dragon, I'm going to feed it with the Special Formula for the dragons in #m240000000#. Pam is the one that sells the Formula.
I was able to purchase all the Formulas and feed them to #t1902005#. Once that took place, #t1902005# went through shedding and became #t1902006#.

string.name: name
string.value: Before the Mission in Perion Begins
It looks like #p1101002# is trying to give me a new assignment. I wonder what it is...
#p1101002# finally gave me a new assignment, but before even starting, he wanted me to get to Ereve so I could make a delivery to someone else...
#p1101002# finally gave me a new assignment, but before even starting, he wanted me to get to Ereve and pick up an item for the upcoming assignment.

string.name: name
string.value: Information From Those Who Remember
Maybe #b#p1061011##k of #m105040300# can tell me something useful about #o9300285#...
#p1061011# told me he can give useful information on #o9300285# if I can eliminate #r250 #o2230101#s#k for him. \n\n#o2230101##r #a207261##k
According to #p1061011#, #o9300285# is a little boy whose name is #r#p1104000##k...

string.name: name
string.value: Chrishrama's Information
Maybe #b#p1061000##k of #m105040300# can tell me something useful about #o9300285#...
#p1061000# told me he can give useful information on #o9300285# if I can collect #b100 #t4000015#s#k for him. \n\n#i4000015# #t4000015# #b#c4000015# / 100#k
According to #p1061000#, #o9300285# seems to doodle in front of #p1061006# when busy. If I look closely into #p1061006#, I may be able to find something...

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Puppeteer!
I better report the information gathered in #m105040300# to #b#p1101002##k.

#p1101002# told you he's certain the boy carrying the doll is #o9300285#, so he wants you to enter the #bhome of #o9300285##k at the Perion #m102010100# to defeat #r#p1104000# the #o9300285##k. \n\n#o9300285##r #a207301##k

I was able to defeat #p1104000# the #o9300285#. Afterwards, when I asked #p1101002# of the word 'Black Wings' that I picked up during our battle, he revealed that the Black Wings are a group that follows the Black Mage and #p1104000# was also a member as well.

string.name: name
string.value: The Return of the Hero
Where is this? What's going on? You don't even know who you are.

#p1202001# seems to be really excited at having met a hero. A hero? Who...you? Judging from what #p1201000# is saying, maybe you really were a hero in your past life. But you have no recollection of it...

Since drinking the potion, your HP recovered quite a bit. You still don't know what's going on, but considering how nicely everyone's been treating you, they must have good intentions. You should have no trouble going back to town now...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Go on to 'The Weapon That Disappeared' quest\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Account
Now that you're safely in town, you should listen to #b#p1201000#'s#k account of what happened in the past, and how you became a hero in the first place.

According to #p1201000#, a few hundred years ago, a group of #bheroes#k valiantly fought against the #rBlack Mage#k who controlled Maple World. Apparently, you're one of them. But because of the Black Mage's curse, you lost your memories and abilities, and were frozen in ice until you were awakened recently.

According to #p1201000#, a few hundred years ago, a group of #bheroes#k valiantly fought against the #rBlack Mage#k, who controlled Maple World. Apparently, you're one of them. But because of the Black Mage's curse, you lost your memories and abilities, and were frozen in ice until you were awakened recently.

string.name: name
string.value: The Five Heroes

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
In order to begin real training, you must first figure out which of the five heroes you were, but you don't remember anything... You'd better discuss this with #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# tells you while she was excavating heroes from ice, she found a weapon used by one of the heroes. She placed it in town. She wonders if it was yours. If it was, then you would be #bAran, the hero who used a polearm#k...

#p1201000# told you while she was excavating heroes from ice, she found a weapon used by one of the heroes. She placed it in town. She wondered if it was yours. If it was, then you would be #bAran, the hero that used a polearm#k...

string.name: name
string.value: The Polearm-Wielding Hero

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

Apparently, a hero's weapon can recognize its owner, which means the weapon would react the moment you touched it...if you were indeed the hero that wielded a polearm, that is. You should head to town and click on #b#p1201001##k.

The moment you touch the #p1201001#, you feel memories flood through you, but you aren't sure if you're really reminiscing or just imagining things. You should try holding the #p1201001# one more time.

You remembered a time when you held the weapon, flashbacks of gripping the polearm in your two hands...while standing in front of the Black Mage. Yes, you were Aran, the warrior that wielded the polearm to perfection.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of Its Rightful Owner

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
As soon as you reach Level 30, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you...
#p1201000# tells you that the polearm is acting strange and that it might be trying to send you a message. You'd better head to #b#m140000000##k and check on the state of the #bpolearm#k.
Standing in front of the polearm is a strange-looking boy who you've never met before. Who is that? That kid does look a bit familiar. What? That boy is #p1201001#? No way...!

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of the Ultimate Weapon

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

You look into the Mirror of Desire. There's a split second when you think you've lost your mind, but then... Where are you? Are you in the past? This feels like deja vu. You remember this, from a long, long time ago, when you begged #b#p1203000##k to make you the best polearm in the world.

When you ask #p1203000# for the best polearm available, #p1203000# takes a long look at you and says you'll need to prove your worth. Your mission is to battle the #r#o9001012#s and defeat them. You also have to gather #b#t4032311#s#k.

You managed to gather all the #t4032311#s required. #p1203000# liked you fearless attitude, and handed you the polearm wrapped in cloth. The polearm, #p1201002#, and... Unfortunately, that was the extent of your memories.

string.name: name
string.value: A Weapon Never Leaves Its Owner

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
As soon as you reach Level 70, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you...
#p1201000# tells you that the polearm is acting strange once again and that it might be trying to tell you something. What's the problem this time? You'd better head over to #b#m140000000##k.
#p1201002# told you that a thief came to the island late one night and removed a Red Jade from his body! He asked you to catch the thief and told you that the thief headed toward #m140020300#...

string.name: name
string.value: Making Red Jade

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
You think you may have to make a new #t4032312# for #p1201002#, but you don't know where to start, since you don't know what to use or how to make it. Maybe #b#p1201000##k knows a thing or two?

#p1201000# tells you to head over to #m140030000# and use the Mirror of Desire to discover how to make a #t4032312#. That seems to be the only possible solution. Oh well...you should go to #b#m140030000##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032312# #t4032312# #b#c4032312# / 1#k
You successfully made a #t4032312#. Thankfully, #p1201002# seemed quite satisfied with it. Having recovered the powers of the Red Jade, #p1201002# unlocked more abilities for you.

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Starts a Fight... with His Owner?

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]
As soon as you reach Level 120, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you...
#p1201000# alerts you that #p1201002# is acting strange once again and urges you to visit #b#m140000000##k immediately. She also warns that she's never seen it act this way...
#p1201002# seemed to be in great pain. What's going on here?

string.name: name
string.value: The Chief Wolf's Rage

You may have lost, then found your #t1902017#, but you wish to raise it in a healthy environment. What should you do? You'd better head over to #b#m914030000##k of #b#m140000000##k and see #b#p1202008##k.

#p1202008# was angry to see that one of his kids was not raised with respect and gave you a tongue-lashing. He then ordered you to make another #t4032334#...\r\n\r\n#i4032334# #t4032334# #b#c4032334# / 1#k
You made another #t4032334# and with that, you were able to raise #t1902017# into an adult wolf. You promise to never, ever lose your wolf again.

string.name: name
string.value: New Beginnings

You discovered that you were a hero that used to wield a Polearm, and just like that, you started to remember a number of your former skills. Your recovered skills are far from optimal, but... You should report this to #b#p1201000##k anyway.

#p1201000# seems amazed that you were able to recover so many of your abilities and urges you to start training seriously. She then recommends that you go see #b#p1202006# the Penguin Master#k, an old penguin that's studied the intricacies of various hero skills. He's located in the west side of town at #m140010100#.
You met with #p1202006# in #m140010100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Train or Die! 3
This #b#p1202006##k is so full of it, but you might as well receive more training from him.

According to #p1202006#, the third lesson involves eliminating #r#o9300343#s#k. He says it's a terribly scary monster to fight, but seriously, how scary could a #o1210100# be, really... \r\n\r\n#o9300343##r #a217031##k

You finished off the #o9300343#s without breaking a sweat! #p1202006# then tells you he's taught you everything that he knows about combat and says that you can go back down the mountain. What...?! You're not even standing on a mountain!

string.name: name
string.value: A Monster War?

This is your first assignment as an informant. You wonder if #p1012111# of #m100000000# has been able to pinpoint the cause of the #o1210102#'s recent changes yet. Maybe you should go ask #p1012111# right now.

#p1012111# says that the change in #o1210102#s may indicate that a war is brewing between the #o1210102#s and the #o1210100#s. In order to confirm his theory, #p1012111# needs to investigate the #o1210100#s, as well. Please bring him #b50 #t4032340#s#k...
He says that the pigs can be found near the beach.
#i4032340# #t4032340# #b#c4032340# / 50#k

#p1012111#, who studied the #t4032340#s, came to the conclusion that the #o1210100#s are not properly prepared for combat, which of course threw out the whole theory of a possible monster war. He then asked you to stop by later since he'd like some time to come up with another hypothetical theory to explain this mess.

string.name: name
string.value: Your Second Informant Assignment
You have reached Level 18, which means #p1002104# will give you your second assignment as an informant. Head over to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k.

The second assignment involves dealing with the suddenly-violent #o1110100#s. Seems quite similar to the first assignment... You should head over to #b#m101000000##k and meet with #b#p1032101##k to discuss the cause of the #o1110100#s' distress.
You met with #p1032101# in #m101000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Rowen's Request 1
You wonder how #p1032101# is doing overseeing the forest. You feel like you should head to #b#m101000000##k to see her.

It seems like the kid with the puppets was once again seen in #m100040000#. Time to eliminate the #r#o1110100#s#k so you can retrieve the #bpuppet#k. 


Regardless of Personality #o9101000##r #a217171##k
#i4032317##t4032317# #b#c4032317# / 1#k
You defeated the #o1110100#s and retrieve the #t4032316#, but you were unable to apprehend the actual criminal. Hopefully the kid will show up again...

string.name: name
string.value: Rowen's Request 2
You should talk to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k and see if the puppet-toting kid has made any more appearances in the South Forest.

#p1032101# says that the kid with the puppet has showed up once again in #m100040003# and wants you to eliminate the #o1110100#s and retrieve the puppet yet again.


Regardless of Personality #o9101000##r #a217181##k
#i4032318# #t4032318# #b#c4032318# / 1#k
You defeated the #o1110100# and retrieved the #t4032318#. So far, you've managed to foil the kid's plan many times. Perhaps the kid'll give up now...?

string.name: name
string.value: The Puppeteer's Invitation
A mysterious figure starts talking to you...

When you accept the invitation from the mysterious figure, you find yourself in front of a strange-looking cave! Inside the cave...is the kid with the puppets! So that's the kid responsible for manipulating the monsters in #m100000000# and #m101000000#? Talk to the kid and see what's up.

When you accept the invitation from the mysterious figure, you find yourself in front of a strange-looking cave! Inside the cave...is the kid with the puppets! So that's the kid responsible for manipulating the monsters in #m100000000# and #m101000000#? Talk to the kid and see what's up.

string.name: name
string.value: The Puppeteer's Warning
What would #p1002104# say about the Black Wings? You should talk to #b#p1002104##k, the Information Dealer in #b#m104000000##k, and find out.

He tells you that the Black Wings are an organization conspiring to resurrect the Black Mage and says that this information must be relayed to #b#p1201000##k as well, so he wants you to let #p1201000# know about the situation. In the mean time, Tru plans on utilizing his network as an Information Dealer to gather as much information on the Black Wings as possible.

#p1201000# thought that the fact that an organization like the Black Wings even exists...means that the Black Mage's resurrection is imminent. She encouraged you to train that much harder to regain your old, heroic form. She then taught you a skill called #bPolearm Booster#k which she learned by poring over an ancient document!

string.name: name
string.value: 10 Boogies's Request
After the #o1140130# case closed, #p1103004# still seems to need you for something. You wonder what. Better go talk to #b#p1103004##k and find out.

#p1103004# thanks you for helping her solve the mystery, but tells you she has a little predicament. She can't leave her post to submit her report! She wonders if you could deliver the report to her boss. Your new task is to deliver the #t4032320# to #b#p1101002##k in #b#m130000000##k.
Take the ship headed to #b#m130000000# from the #bEreve Bound Platform#k north of #b#m104020000##k.

You delivered the report to #p1101002# and received a reward. You noticed that he had a very peculiar way of speaking which, to you, seemed totally inappropriate yet absolutely proper in tone. It reminded you of someone...

string.name: name
string.value: Zombie Mushrooms

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and you need to gather information about the erratic behavior of the #o2230101#s in #b#m105040300##k. You'd better talk to #b#p1061019##k, the witness that reported the incident.

#p1061019# is terrified to see so many #o2230101#s with such irritated faces. They are preventing him from going to the Ghost Mushroom Forest, so he's asked you to find out what has happened to all the #o2230101#s. Looks like you'll have to eliminate the #r#o2230101#s#k and retrieve the #b#t4032321##k.
#o9101001##r #a217271##k #i4032321# #t4032321# #b#c4032321# / 1#k
You eliminated the #o2230101#s and retrieved the #t4032321#. #p1061019# seemed to know something about the puppet...

string.name: name
string.value: The Puppeteer's Cave

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and it involves #p1061019#, who apparently remembered something when he looked at the #t4032321# retrieved from #o2230101#. Go talk to him at #b#m105040300##k.

#p1061019# says that he saw a kid carrying around a #t4032321# some time ago. That must have been the Puppeteer! According to #p1061019#, the puppeteer may be hiding near the Forest of Evil Energy... You should #bgo up to the Rocky Wasteland and look for the Puppeteer's Headquarters#k.
You spotted the Puppeteer's Headquarters, but you need a password to enter.

string.name: name
string.value: The Cave's Password

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and even though you found the puppeteer's cave, you couldn't enter because you didn't have the password. The code might be written on #p1061006#. Go talk to #p1061006# at #m105040300#.

Rotating the #p1061006# might reveal the scribbles, but it's not moving. Wait a minute. The statue seems to be talking to you directly. 'I want 50 #t4000007#s.' Now, you've heard of some outrageous demands, but a statue demanding something from you? Really? Oh well, you better find some #t4000007#s.\r\n\r\n#i4000007# #t4000007# #b#c4000007# / 50#k

You found the scribble on #p1061006#. It's written in a near-illegible scribble, but you can still make it out. It says: 'Francis is a genius puppeteer!' All the words in the password have to be exact, including the capitalization and spacing, so be careful.

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Some Strange Information
The moment you reach Level 31, you receive a message from #b#p1002104##k. Is it about a new Informant Assignment? But he's never mentioned anything about it before...
#p1002104# says he has an urgent message for you and asks you to come to #b#m104000004##k right away. You wonder what's going on.

So it turned out that the message was from a fake #p1002104# who belongs to the Black Wings. In other words, the whole thing was a trap laid by the puppeteer to throw you off guard. Luckily, you were able to defeat the puppeteer, but he got away at the last second again. Meanwhile, #p1002104# was ambushed while waiting for a skill from #p1201000# to arrive. Luckily, he kept it safe and gave you the #bCombo Mastery#k skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Traces of the Puppeteer
As soon as you reach Level 37, #b#p1002104##k sends you a message. Is there a new lead?

#p1002104# says he's found hidden traces of the #o9300346# and that the puppeteer is hidden in the #bPuppeteer's Hideout#k somewhere in the #bForest of Evil Energy#k. He gives you the green light to finish off the #o9300346# if you run into him again...


#o9300346##r #a217341##k
You defeated the #o9300346# without a definite clue to lead you to the #t4032323#. But then, #p1002104# flashed a comforting smile as if to tell you not to worry about a thing...

string.name: name
string.value: The Seal Stone of Victoria Island
You weren't able to gather any information on the #t4032323#, but #p1002104# seems strangely confident about where you stand. Go talk to #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# says that ever since he got ambushed by the #o9300346#s, he's been using any means necessary to find the Seal Stone. He feels that holding on to the Seal Stone would be dangerous, so he wants to store it in #b#m140000000##k, the deserted island. I'd better deliver the #bSeal Stone to #p1201000##k.

#t4032323#. No one knows what its purpose is, but it is obvious that Black Wings want it. Desperately. You can't let that happen... Just as you're thinking this, #p1201000# hands you a new skill called the #bCombo Drain#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Sealed Garden
You wonder if #m200000000# will come crashing down because of the sheer weight of the #o9300347#s. You'd better talk to #b#p2032001##k who lives in #b#m200050000##k before that happens.

#p2032001# says that she's worried about the possibility of the #o9300347#s causing #m200000000# to sink, but she says she's actually more worried about another issue entirely. The fact that the Nependeaths in Orbis have grown so huge may be connected with the path to #m920030001#. #m920030001#? This may be related to the Seal Stone somehow. You'd better keep asking #b#p2032001##k more questions.
#p2032001# first had her doubts about whether you could be trusted and was shocked to discover your true identity. She says that she has seen your grand fate...

string.name: name
string.value: The Shadow Knight's Letter
You wonder how #p2090004# will take the contents of the #t4220151# now that it's restored. You should talk to #b#p2090004##k in #b#m250000000##k.

#p2090004# seems to be genuinely panicking and wants you to deliver the #t4220151# to #b#p2091007##k. But how in the world are you going to meet him when he resides at the very top floor of #m925020000#? That's when #p2090004# mentioned the ultimate weakness of #p2091007#'s student, #b#p2091005##k. You'd better head over to see #p2091005#.
You met #p2091007# and handed him #o9300351#'s Letter of Warning.

string.name: name
string.value: Mu Gong's Test

You wonder what #p2091007# is going to say about #o9300351#'s letter. You should meet with #b#p2091007##k on the #btop floor of #m925020000##k and find out. You can get there via the shortcut in the back alley that #p2091005# told you about.

When you ask #p2091007# about the Seal Stone of Mu Lung, he says that #o9300351# is a dangerous fellow, but tells you that he also has his guard up around you. He also says that he's wants to test you to see if you're trustworthy. All you have to do is beat #o9300350# in battle.\r\n\r\n#o9300350##r #a217461##k
You emerged victorious over #o9300350#. #p2091007# seemed absolutely shocked to see someone using skills from hundreds of years ago...

string.name: name
string.value: Catch the Shadow Knight!

You passed #p2091007#'s test. You should now talk to #b#p2091007##k in #b#m925020000##k and find out more about the Seal Stone. You can get there by going through the back alley that #p2091005# told you about.

According to #p2091007#, the Seal Stone of #m250000000# is stored in a place called #m925040100# and the entrance is somewhere between the pillars of #m250000100# and #b#m250020100##k. Find the pillar that has 'Entrance' engraved on it and say the password to enter the premises. The password is #bActions speak louder than words#k. You'd better enter #m925040100# and stop #r#o9300351##k, then return to Mu Gong.\r\n\r\n#o9300351##r #a217471##k

You defeated #o9300351# in #m925040100#, but the Seal Stone of #m250000000# was taken from you by the Gentleman of the Black Wings. It seems to be a recurring pattern. When you told #p2091007# that the Seal Stone was stolen, he admitted that he himself did not know the true use of that stone and reassured you that all is well in #m250000000# even if the Seal Stone has been taken.

string.name: name
string.value: She Remembers Me
Just as #p1002104# instructed, you use the #m220000000# clocktower to travel to the past. Just as you arrive in the past, someone calls out your name...

#p2131002# seems shocked to see you and greets you like a long-lost sibling. Do you know this person? While you stand there dumbfounded, #p2131002# tells you that #b#p2131000##k is also waiting for you, and that you should make your way to the #bCamp Conference Room#k to let #p2131000# know that you are alive and well.
You finally met #p2131000# in Ellin Forest. #p2131000# seemed glad to see you alive and well, but then learned that you have no recollection of the past and seemed sad to hear it.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Seal Stone of Ellin Forest
It turns out that the Seal Stone of Ellin Forest was taken by #o9300353# of the Black Wings. How did this happen? You'd better go talk to #b#p2131000##k in Ellin Forest.

#p2131000# reveals that she has a letter that contains information about another Seal Stone and promises to hand it to you. Unfortunately, you can't take the letter since #b#p2131000# and you are from two separate times#k. \n\nJust when you think it's all over, #p2131000# tells you that she's a fairy with a very long life, and that she will in fact carry the letter to your time. What you need to do now is leave Ellin Forest and #bmeet #p2131000# in your own time#k. You wonder where #p2131000# is. You'd better ask #b#p1002104##k.

You asked #p1002104# whether he knew anyone named #p2131000#. It turned out that #p1002104# is one of the most well-known people in all of Victoria Island. You should head to #m100000201# in #m100000000# to meet Athena Pierce at the Bowman Instructional School.

string.name: name
string.value: Neinheart the Strategist
Now that you know what's written in the letter... what should you do? You'd better go to #b#m140000000##k and talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says that it's essential to warn #m130000000# about the Seal Stone and writes a letter urging them to protect it at all cost. Your job is to go to #b#m130000000##k and hand the letter to the Queen, but with that annoying strategist of the Queen, Neinheart, blocking the way, it might be difficult. Maybe you should just talk to the #bStrategist#k instead.
You met the Queen's strategist, #p1101002#. He took the letter and told you he'd take it into consideration, but his eyes tell you otherwise.

string.name: name
string.value: Neinheart's Thanks
#b#p1101002##k is sending you a message...
#p1101002# thanks you for protecting the tears of the Divine Bird and wants to give you a reward for it. You'd better head over to #b#m130000000##k.
As a token of his appreciation, #p1101002# taught you a new skill and mumbled that he hoped you might one day join forces with him. That smile of his seemed to convey a million subtle meanings.

string.name: name
string.value: Returning the Empty Lunch Box
Looks like Dad has something he wants to say...
Dad says that Mom probably knows best about how to raise an egg. He tells you to #bgo home and ask Mom#k. While you're at it, he asks you to return his #t4032450#.
After delivering the #t4032450#, you asked Mom about raising an egg. She said that you can raise it in an incubator... #p1013101# seems to know something about an incubator.

string.name: name
string.value: Meeting the Dragon Rider

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Mount
Follow #p1032001#'s suggestion and go find the person named #bFangBlade#k in #b#m102000000##k. He is supposed to be very powerful so maybe he is in the Warrior's Sanctuary.

You meet #p9901000#. He is very friendly, promising to tell you about mounting a Dragon but says you need a saddle first. He mentions that people who came from #b#m130000000##k have very cool saddles. You should go to #m130000000# and bring back a saddle.\r\n\r\n#i1912033# #t1912033# #b#c1912033# / 1#k
After you went to the Aquarium and brought back a saddle, #p9901000# taught you the Monster Rider skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Tasty Milk 1
You have no idea what Dragons eat. Talk to Mir.
No matter how much you think, you just can't figure out what #p1013000# would like. Maybe there is something you missed. Ask #bDad#k again.
After hearing that the 'lizard' is still a baby, Dad starts to think again.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Pigs 1
Dad seems to be worried about something... What could he be worried about? Talk to #bDad#k.
Dad says that the sudden increase of #o1210111#s is giving him a headache. They are so strange and strong that it's no use, no matter how many times he fixes the fences...
#p1013000# starts getting excited after listening to Dad...

string.name: name
string.value: Power B. Fore's Never Ending Paranoia
You defeated the #o9300274#s once again but #p1012118# still seems suspicious. Talk to #b#p1012118##k.

#p1012118# says that he still can't believe you and tells you that if you enter his Training Center and defeat the #r#o9300386#s#k, he will believe you... He really will this time...right? Defeat the #o9300386#s.\r\n\r\n#o9300386##r #a225181##k
You defeated the #o9300386#s. This time, it looks like #p1012118# has no choice but to believe you. Now that you've received the Certificate of Training, enter the Training Center and start training.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Puppet
#p1012111#'s expression darkened after receiving the #t4000009#s. Is it something serious? Talk to #b#p1012111##k.

#p1012111# says that something similar has also happened with the #o1210102#s near #m100000000# and that the culprit is probably a puppet that looks like a mushroom. He says that much of the problem should be alleviated if you hunt #r100#k #r#o2220100#s#k and retrieve the #b#t4032459##k... Retrieve the #t4032459# and bring it to #p1040000#.

#o9101004##r #a225241##k
#i4032459# #t4032459# #b#c4032459# / 1#k
#p1040000# seems worried about the seriousness of the situation.

string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's First Assignment: Cleaning Up
Since #p1013000# also agrees, you've decided to become a Guard. Tell #b#p1040001##k what you decided.

#p1040001# gives you your first assignment. Your job is eliminating to the #r#o2110200#s#k around Henesys Mushroom Forest in order to clear the way to Mushroom Castle. Sounds simple enough.\r\n\r\n#o2110200##r #a225271##k
#p1040001# is very satisfied that you've eliminated the #o2110200#s around Mushroom Forest.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 540 #Wbasic# #i1142153:# #t1142153:# 1 Unlocks 'A Guard's Second Assignment: Helping Beginner Adventurers' quest Unlocks 'Perion Guard' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Beginner Adventurer Christopher
Patrol the #m102000000# #b#Burnt Lands#k and talk to #banyone who needs help#k.

#p1022106#, a beginning adventurer, says that he is so thirsty he can't move. He asks that you bring him some #t4032460# dropped by the #o0130100#s. Defeat the #rStumps#k and get some #b#t4032460##k for him.\r\n\r\n#i4032460# #t4032460# #b#c4032460# / 3#k
#p1022106#, whose thirst has been quenched, thanks you and says that he will find his own way from here.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 650

string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Fifth Assignment: Strange Wild Boars
Looks as if there's another assignment for the newest Victoria Island Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k in #b#m105000000##k.

#p1040001# says that the same phenomena that occurred with the #o2230101#s is occurring with #r#o2230102#s#k and asks that you defeat the #o2230112#s and retrieve the #bPuppet#k if found...

#o2230112##r #a225321##k
#i4032462# #t4032462# #b#c4032462# / 1#k
#p1040001#, after receiving the #o2230102# Puppet, says that he has requested reinforcements. He says that there is nothing for you to do right now but that you should be training.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,200 #Wbasic# #i1972000:# #t1972000:# 1 Unlocks 'Please Catch the Thief' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Please Catch the Thief
#p1061005# in #b#m105040300##k has something he wants to say to you. Go see #b#p1061005##k.

#p1061005# says that #p1040001# has told him that you are a very capable Guard and asks that you help him. According to him, someone has stolen an expensive herb, and he is sure it is a thief from #m103000000#. He asks that you go to #b#m103000000##k and investigate. You suddenly remember that Alex is in Kerning City. For now go see #bAlex#k.

1. #y22534# #b(#u22534#)#k
2. #y22535# #b(#u22535#)#k
3. #y22536# #b(#u22536#)#k
When you tell #p1061005# that you don't think it was a thief from #m103000000#, he says that he will wait for your investigation for now.

string.name: name
string.value: Investigating the Biology of Dragons
When you reach Lv. 30, #p1013000# suddenly grew?! How did this happen? Talk to #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# doesn't seem to know how he suddenly changed either. It seems that neither of you really know much about Dragons. You really should find out more...\r\n\r\n #p1013000# suggests that you find someone with more knowledge to tell you more about Dragons. Come to think of it, #b#p1012109##k in #b#m100000000##k is a total bookworm. Wouldn't he know something?
You asked #p1012109# about Dragons.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Book? 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Where's the Book?
#p1012101# says that the book seemed too difficult for her to read and so she gave it to #p1012110#. Go to #m100010000##k and meet #b#p1012110##k.

#p1012110# says that she sent the book to her Mom because she thought that her Mom would need it. She suggests that you meet Dr. #b#p1032104##k in #b#m101000000##k. Back to #m101000000#? You've made a full circle!

string.name: name
string.value: Clue about the Thief
#p1052103# in #m103000000# starts talking to you. Could she have caught the thief?

#p1052103# says that her underling found a clue about the thief in #m105040300#, where the incident occurred. Unfortunately, the clue was lost on its way to #m103000000# because a #o3110100# attacked. She asks that you recover the #bClue#k about the thief from the #r#o3110100#s#k... 

#i4032463# #t4032463# #b#c4032463# / 1#k
#p1052103# started to read the document with a serious look on her face. You can feel her desire to restore #m103000000#'s honor.

string.name: name
string.value: Kerning City's Honor Restored
Is #p1061005#, who got his herbs back, no longer suspicious of the thieves in #m103000000#? Talk to #b#p1061005##k in #b#m105040300##k.
#p1061005# says that he is sorry for being suspicious of the thieves in #m103000000# and asks you to give his apologies. Go to #b#p1052103##k and tell her that #m103000000#'s honor has been restored.
#p1052103# thanks you for clearing #m103000000#'s name.

string.name: name
string.value: Nella's Introductions
#b#p1052103##k in #b#m103000000##k seems to have something she wants to say...

The news of you helping #p1052103# seems to have gotten around. #p1052103# says that many people have been asking her to introduce you to them. She says to go see #b#p1012003##k in #b#m100000000##k...\r\n\r\nHuh? That's your town... What could it be about? Chief Stan seems to need some help.
Chief Stan doesn't seem to believe your abilities.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Request
Looks like Chief Stan has decided he wants to ask you a favor. Talk to #bChief Stan#k.

Chief Stan says that some strange commotion has occurred in Golem's Temple, the most dangerous area near #m100000000#, and asks you to investigate. He says to not go in too deep, just up to the #b#m106010102##k, and report back.

Stan says he heard that monsters throughout different towns have been acting strange. He says that while the Mushrooms or #o1210100#s acting a little odd isn't a big deal, it will be a problem if the Golems start turning violent.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Golems
Tell Chief Stan what #p1012108# told you.

Chief Stan says the culprit the Golems change may be inside the door with the puppet. He asks you to #benter that door, defeat the Enraged Golems, and bring back the culprit#k. He seems to think it might be a #bdoll or puppet#k...\r\n\r\n#i4032466# #t4032466# #b#c4032466# / 1#k

You eliminated the Golems and brought the #t4032466# to Chief Stan. Chief Stan says if the puppet had been left alone, the Golems would certainly have attacked #m100000000#. He thanks you for saving #m100000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Condition for Joining the Secret Organization 1
The #b#p1063018##k has suddenly started talking to you... What could it be about?

The #p1063018# says he told his master about you and that you can join the secret organization if you fulfill a few requirements. He asks that you go to the #b#North Forest area##k and eliminate the #r#o3230100#s#k.
#o3230100##r #a225601##k
You eliminated the #o3230100#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Onyx Dragon Study
#b#p1032001##k, who's agreed to help you study the Onyx Dragon, starts talking to you...

#p1032001# says that his friend #p2081000# from #m240000000# can identify an Onyx Dragon just by looking at its scales. You may be able to confirm whether #p1013000# is really an Onyx Dragon by sending one of #p1013000#'s scale. Should you ask #p1013000# if he can spare one?\r\n\r\n#i4032467# #t4032467# #b#c4032467# / 1#k
After receiving the Dragon's scale, #p1032001# says it will take time to send the scale to #m240000000# and hear back about it. He asks you to talk to him later.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Organization's First Mission
Receive your first mission as a Secret Organization Temporary Member. The mission should be contained behind the #b#p2012034##k inside the #b#m200080601##k...

The paper behind the #p2012034# says to bring back a Growth Accelerant made by a person named #b#p2030012##k. This must be your first mission.

#i4032468# #t4032468# #b#c4032468# / 10#k
You placed the Growth Accelerant made for you by #p2030012# behind the brick. The Secret Organization must be group of really good people to make a potion that will help the crops in Maple World.

string.name: name
string.value: Slumbering Dragon Island

string.name: parent
string.value: Slumbering Dragon Island
You arrive on the island after traveling for a long time on #p1002101#'s ship... #p1013000# seems to feel something. Talk to #p1013000#.
#p1013000# says that he can feel a strange familiar feeling coming from deep within the island. He thinks that there may be another Onyx Dragon. Head toward the center of the Island.

There was a giant Dragon asleep inside a cave in the center of the island. But you could not enter due to a #o9300391# made with magic. How can you pass this wall? After thinking for awhile, you decide to return to #m104000000# for now.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Organization's Third Mission
It's certain that this Secret Organization called the Black Wings is working for the benefit of Maple World. Go to #b#p1013203##k at the #b#m922030000##k to receive your third mission.
You need to hunt #rSecret Master Soul Teddies#k and collect the #b#t4000594#s#k that drop from them.
You collected the #t4000594#s and gave them to #p1013203#. You wonder what he's going to do with them...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Unlocks 'Releasing the Free Spirits' quest

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Door Blocks
There seems to be something left for you to do. Talk to #b#p1013203##k at the #b#m922030000##k.

#p1013203# tells you to climb up to the #m922030020# once again while the guard is gone and enter the safe to eliminate the #r#o9300390##k inside. He says that you need to eliminate the monster quickly because it is very dangerous.\r\n\r\n#o9300390##r #a225841##k
You returned after eliminating the #o9300390#. #p1013203# says that you did a great job and that you played a big role in helping Maple World. But why do you feel so uneasy...?

string.name: name
string.value: The Past, Onyx Dragons, Black Mage
Listen to the Sleeping Dragon #b#p1205000##k.

#p1205000# starts to tell you about what happened hundreds of years ago. About a time when Onyx Dragons and Dragon Masters lived in harmony and how the Onyx Dragon's suddenly became extinct... After talking for awhile, #p1205000# says that it's too difficult to explain and that he will show his memory. You are sent to a strange place...\r\n\r\n#bInside #p1205000#'s memory, become Freud, who was his master, and talk to him.#k.

Hundreds of years ago, the Onyx Dragons were destroyed because of the Black Mage. #p1205000# was entrapped in ice by the Black Mage. From the conversation between Freud and #p1205000#, you can guess that #p1013000# is #p1205000#'s child. But it doesn't seem that #p1205000# wants #p1013000# to know.

string.name: name
string.value: Unavoidable Truth
There is a lot that #p1013000# doesn't know because he was not able to enter #p1205000#'s memory. Tell #b#p1013000##k what you saw and heard.

Was it wrong to help the Black Wings whose mission was to revive the Black Mage? #p1205000# says that he just can't believe it and wants to look back at all the missions you did for the Black Wings. #bGo to Orbis, El Nath, and Ludibrium to ask about the results of your actions.#k. 

#y22593# #b(#u22593#)#k
#y22594# #b(#u22594#)#k
#y22595# #b(#u22595#)#k

Everything you did seems to have helped the Black Mage's goals. None of it helped the townspeople at all. In fact, your actions have caused only problems. How could this be? All the things you did for Maple World were for naught.

string.name: name
string.value: Result of the Second Mission
Did the Black Wing missions really help people? Or were you just being used? Go to #b#m211000000##k and find out the result of your second mission of collecting and trading Zombie teeth.

#p2020009#, the Chief in #m211000000#, says that there are traces of the basement key being copied, and though he suspects #p2022003#, he has no proof. He says that the #m211000001# basement is highly guarded because there is a very important item inside. It's certain that the key you received from #p2022003# has gone into the hands of the Black Wings. #rWhat you thought was going to help #m211000000# has only helped the Black Wings.#k.

#p2020009#, the Chief in #m211000000#, says that there are traces of the basement key being copied, and though he suspects #p2022003#, he has no proof. He says that the #m211000001# basement is highly guarded because there is a very important item inside. It's certain that the key you received from #p2022003# has gone into the hands of the Black Wings. #rWhat you thought was going to help #m211000000# has only helped the Black Wings.#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Spill It, Headmaster!

You are told that you can become a member of the Resistance when you reach Lv. 10, but you don't know how you will use your level... Maybe the school Headmaster will have that answer. Go see #b#p2152000##k, the school Headmaster. He's standing in front of the school.

With a kind expression on his face, the Headmaster tells you that your level will go up naturally as you gain more experience while helping the various people in town. Go and #bhelp the townspeople who are in need#b.#k.
#y23001# #b(#u23001#)#k #y23002# #b(#u23002#)#k #y23003# #b(#u23003#)#k #y23004# #b(#u23004#)#k #y23005# #b(#u23005#)#k

After helping the townspeople, you returned to the school Headmaster, but you had already reached Lv. 10. You wondered what to do next, thought about how to become a Resistance member, and then remembered they are supposed to contact you. Now, you wait anxiously for the call...

string.name: name
string.value: Request from a Police Officer
Raise your Level by helping the townspeople, like the Headmaster suggested. #b#p2152003#, the Police Officer#k, seems to need some help. Go see what she needs.

#p2152003#, the fearful Police Officer wants you to take care of the #rPotted Morning Glories#k that are frightening the townspeople. You need to eliminate of #r20#k of them. To be honest, though, it seems like #p2152003# is the one who's afraid of them, more so than the townspeople.\r\n\r\n#o0150001##r #a230021##k
You took care of the Potted Morning Glories and reported it to #p2152003#. #p2152003# was ecstatic and said that the townspeople will no longer fear the Potted Morning Glories...nor will #p2152003#.

string.name: name
string.value: Request from a Mascot
Raise your Level by helping the townspeople, like the Headmaster suggested. #b#p2152001#, the part timer#k, seems to need some help. Go see what he needs.

You meet #p2152005#, the part timer wearing a bear suit. #p2152005# asks that you help him distribute the many fliers he has. Place the flier that #p2152005# gave you #bon the town bulletin board in front of the Free Market#k.
You told #p2152005# that you distributed all the fliers.

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Invitation

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

You raised your Level thanks to the Headmaster's suggestion. The Resistance should be contacting you soon, but you still wonder how they will do it... In any case, the Headmaster seems to have something to say to you. Go see #b#p2152000##k in front of the school.

The Headmaster congratulates you for raising your level and gives you a #b#t2031010##k. You want to refuse it, since you're still waiting to be contacted by the Resistance, but you end up taking it. There's no way to know when the Resistance will be contacting you, so maybe you should try using the #t2031010#...
#bUse the #t2031010# by double-clicking on it from the Inventory Use Tab#k

When you used the #t2031010#, you arrived at the Resistance Hideout! Not only that, Doctor #p2151003#... No, Resistance member #p2151003# was also there! The other people you saw in town were all there, but they looked different! Even the Headmaster...he was the leader of the Resistance! Those fighting the Black Wings are none other than the townspeople who appeared to live ordinary lives!
If you want to become a member of the Resistance to fight for peace and freedom, choose your job now!

string.name: name
string.value: Path of the Battle Mage

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

You decide to become a member of the Resistance in order to fight for peace and freedom. Members of the Resistance choose from various jobs depending on aptitude and taste... You wonder what jobs are available. Talk to #b#p2151001##k, the Magician Job Instructor, who works as a Streetsweeper, to find out more about being a Resistance Magician.

A Resistance Magician is quite different from a normal Magician. More HP and more Buffs, in addition to consecutive attack abilities, make the #bBattle Mage#k comparable in speed and power to a Warrior! If you want to make a job advancement as a Battle Mage, talk to #p2151001# again.
You made a job advancement as a Battle Mage. Now, show your courage and stand in the forefront of battle as you fight against the Black Wings as a member of the Resistance!

string.name: name
string.value: Revenge and Growth

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

A difficult mission that will have you fighting against the Black Wings is about to begin. Go to the #bResistance Underground Base#k and talk to #b#p2151001##k in order to hear the details of the mission.

There is a Black Wing member returning to Edelstein with important intelligence. Your mission is to eliminate the Black Wing member and retrieve the intelligence. Wait for the Black Wing member returning in the Airship. #p2151001# says that you can expect to see someone familiar... You worry about what he could mean... In any case, go to #b#m310000010##k.
#i4032737# #t4032737# #b#c4032737# / 1#k

The person you met during your mission was the Black Wing member you ran into while rescuing #p2151005#! Back then, he was more powerful than you, but this time, you were able to handle him with ease. When you reported the results to #p2151001#, he gave you a job advancement, so that you could use even stronger skills.

string.name: name
string.value: Revenge and Growth

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

A difficult mission that will have you fighting against the Black Wings is about to begin. Go to the #bResistance Underground Base#k and talk to #b#p2151002##k in order to hear the details of the mission.

There is a Black Wing member returning to Edelstein with important intelligence. Your mission is to eliminate the Black Wing member and retrieve the intelligence. #p2151002# says that you can expect to see someone familiar... You worry about what he could mean... In any case, go to #b#m310000010##k.
#i4032737# #t4032737# #b#c4032737# / 1#k

The person you met during your mission was the Black Wing member you ran into while rescuing #p2151005#! Back then, he was more powerful than you, but this time, you were able to handle him with ease. When you reported the results to #p2151002#, she gave you a job advancement, so that you could use even stronger skills.

string.name: name
string.value: Revenge and Growth

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]

A difficult mission that will have you fighting against the Black Wings is about to begin. Go to the #bResistance Underground Base#k and talk to #b#p2151004##k in order to hear the details of the mission.

There is a Black Wing member returning to Edelstein with important intelligence. Your mission is to eliminate the Black Wing member and retrieve the intelligence. #p2151004# says that you can expect to see someone familiar... You worry about what he could mean... In any case, go to #b#m310000010##k and defeat the Black Wing member.
#i4032739# #t4032739# #b#c4032739# / 1#k

The person you met during your mission was the Black Wing member you ran into while rescuing #p2151005#! Back then, he was more powerful than you, but this time, you were able to handle him with ease. When you reported the results to #p2151004#, he gave you a job advancement, so that you could use even stronger skills.

string.name: name
string.value: Destroying the Energy Conducting Device

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
A mission taking place at the Power Plant, the hideout of the Black Wings, is about to begin. Talk to #b#p2151001#, the Battle Mage Job Instructor#k to hear the details of the mission.

Energy from the Power Plant is being rerouted by the Black Wings from the City to somewhere else. Your mission is to destroy the <#r#o9001032##k>.
1. Roam around the Mine until you find a way to #bdisguise yourself as a Black Wing#k.
2. Sneak into the Power Plant disguised as a Black Wing. You can enter the Power Plant by going through the Power Plant Security.
3. Use all your strength to destroy the #o9001032#.
#o9001032##r #a230331##k

You destroyed the #o9001032#! #p2151001# was very happy and said that your work will alleviate much of the town's energy problems. He said that you proved yourself capable of using stronger skills and gave you a job advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: Destroying the Energy Conducting Device

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
A mission, that will take place at the Power Plant, the hideout of the Black Wings, is about to begin. Talk to #b#p2151002#, the Wild Hunter Job Instructor#k to hear the details of the mission.

Energy from the Power Plant is being rerouted by the Black Wings from the City to somewhere else. Your mission is to destroy the <#r#o9001032##k>.
1. Roam around the Mine until you find a way to #bdisguise yourself as a Black Wing#k.
2. Sneak into the Power Plant disguised as a Black Wing. You can enter the Power Plant by going through the Power Plant Security.
3. Use all your strength to destroy the #o9001032#.
#o9001032##r #a230341##k

You destroyed the #o9001032#! #p2151002# was very happy and said that your work will alleviate much of the town's energy problems. She said that you proved yourself capable of using stronger skills and gave you a job advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: Destroying the Energy Conducting Device

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Advancement]
A mission, that will take place at the Power Plant, the hideout of the Black Wings, is about to begin. Talk to #b#p2151004#, the Mechanic Job Instructor#k to hear the details of the mission.

Energy from the Power Plant is being rerouted by the Black Wings from the City to somewhere else. Your mission is to destroy the <#r#o9001032##k>.
1. Roam around the Mine until you find a way to #bdisguise yourself as a Black Wing#k.
2. Sneak into the Power Plant disguised as a Black Wing. You can enter the Power Plant by going through the Power Plant Security.
3. Use all your strength to destroy the #o9001032#.
#o9001032##r #a230351##k

You destroyed the #o9001032#! #p2151004# was very happy and said that your work will alleviate much of the town's energy problems. He said that you proved yourself capable of using stronger skills and gave you a job advancement.

string.name: name
string.value: Agility Enhancement Course
Participate in the educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000##k at the Underground Base #m310010010#.

There are a total of three courses in this educational program. The first course focuses on enhancing your agility. Enter #m310010100# and eliminate #r#o9300409##k. #o9300409# has the ability to become transparent, so you must be careful.\r\n\r\n#o9300409##r #a231031##k
You completed the Agility Enhancement Course and reported back to #p2151000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Attack Enhancement Course
Continue the educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000##k at the Underground Base #m310010010# to begin the second course.

There are a total of three courses in this educational program. The second course focuses on enhancing your attack. Enter #b#m310010200##k and eliminate #r#o9300410##k. #o9300410# has the ability to self-detonate, so you must eliminate it before it explodes.\r\n\r\n#o9300410##r #a231041##k
You completed the Attack Enhancement Course and reported back to #p2151000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Endurance Enhancement Course
Continue the educational program that is provided for the Resistance. Talk to #b#p2151000##k at the Underground Base #m310010010# to begin the third course.

There are a total of three courses in this educational program. The third course focuses on enhancing your endurance. Enter #b#m310010300##k and eliminate #r#o9300411##k. #o9300411# is extremely tough and will not be easily eliminated.\r\n\r\n#o9300411##r #a231051##k
You completed the Endurance Enhancement Course and reported back to #p2151000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Catching the Water Thief Monster
Go see #b#p2152010##k, who is in charge of Resistance supplies, and help him with his problem.

#p2152010# engages in bartering in order to find financial support for the Resistance. Of the items he trades, water is one of the most important commodities. However, it appears that #o2150000#s have come and stolen all the water. Head over to #b#m310030200##k and teach the #r#o2150000#s#k a lesson, then bring the #b#t4000601#s#k over to the #bstorage tank next to Surl#k to fill up the tank. You must fill the #bwater tank#k all the way.

#bFill the water tank with water
#bCaution: You must drop one bottle of water at a time, with the correct timing. It takes each bottle a few moments to be absorbed into the tank.
#p2152010#'s water tank was successfully filled.

string.name: name
string.value: A Village on Guard

You come to a newly-discovered area, #m310000000#, but no one will talk to you. All the residents seem to go about their business without saying a word... you wonder what's going on... Ask Headmaster #b#p2152000##k, who looks the most gentlemanly out of everyone.

The residents of this town aren't hard of hearing or unable to speak, and they certainly don't value silence. Apparently, they just don't like talking to you, but you don't know why... There might be #ba resident who is willing to answer your question#k. See if you can find someone.

#y23901# #b(#u23901#)#k
#y23902# #b(#u23902#)#k
Everyone in this town seems to have a grudge against the #p1101000# Knights. You wonder why...

string.name: name
string.value: Can You Help Edelstein?

The townspeople seem to hate anyone who is a part of the #p1101000# Knights just as much as they hate the Black Wings. But, you still don't know why... Talk to #b#p2152000##k in front of the school. He seems friendly enough to answer your questions...

Apparently, the #p1101000# Knights have broken their promise to this town. You, personally, may not be responsible, but it is your duty as a Cygnus Knight to regain their trust. When you tell him that, #p2152000# says he will have the townspeople open up to you if you find #b#t4000603#s#k for the children.
#i4000603# #t4000603# #b#c4000603# / 40#k

#m310000000# is a town that has been taken over by the Black Wings, and for some reason, they hate the #p1101000# Knights, as well... #p2152000# said that you should know the answer to that question better than anyone, and avoided giving you a straight answer.

string.name: name
string.value: Their Identity
You wonder who <they> are why the residents wouldnâ€™t talk to you because of <them>... Talk to the #bcorpulent man in black#k.

#p2152016#, a watchman dressed in black, says they are the ones who rule this town now and demands that you pay a fee if you want to stay in this town. He's a rather unpleasant man, but you can tell he isn't lying. You don't seem to have any other option but to find the item #p2152016# wants.
#i4000603# #t4000603# #b#c4000603# / 40#k
#p2152016# was pleased when you handed him 40 #t4000603#s. He nodded his head, slightly and arrogantly, and says you can stay in this town.

string.name: name
string.value: Who Should We Be Angry At?
The Black Wings have tricked and betrayed you. You don't know what to do, because their headquarters is in #m310000000#. Discuss it with #b#p1013000##k.

#p1013000# says you shouldn't attack them, because they belong to the Black Wings. #p1013000# also suggests that you hide your identity and slowly investigate #m310000000#. You decide you will attack, if and when Hiver returns.

#p1013000# says you shouldn't attack them just because they belong to the Black Wings. It also suggests that you hide your identity and slowly investigate #m310000000#. You decide to attack if and when Hiver returns.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Confess Your Crush 3
Despite the second rejection, #b#m310000000##k's Kindergarten Teacher #b#p2152001##k still seems hopeful. You wonder what more he has in mind.

#p2152001# says he spent his monthly salary to purchase a Diamond, which he wants to give #p2152017# as a gift. He's already paid for it, so the only thing left to do is to pick up the Diamond. Go to #b#m310000010# and pick up the Diamond from #b#p2150008##k, then deliver it to #p2152017#.
#i4032753# #t4032753# #b#c4032753# / 1#k
#p2152017# was ecstatic when she saw the Diamond. You wonder if she will accept #p2152001#'s love...

string.name: name
string.value: Please Find the Missing Item
#b#m310000000##k's #bAssistant Plastic Surgeon #p2150006##k is looking for something.

#p2150006# says she left town in a hurry and lost an important item under some #r#o2150002#s#k, then asks if you can find the #b#t4032756##k she lost. Go over to #b#m310030310##k and eliminate the #o2150002#s to retrieve the #t4032756#. \r\n\r\n#i4032756# #t4032756# #b#c4032756# / 1#k
#p2150006# was really happy to receive her #t4032756#. You still can't figure out what an Assistant Plastic Surgeon was doing outside of town with her #t4032756#...

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift For Sis
You wonder if #b#p2152009##k of #m310000000# understands her sister now...

Though she doesn't know the specifics, #p2152009# says she finally understands why her big sister is always so busy and promises that she won't get upset at her sister anymore. #p2152009# wants to give her big sister a picture of her, so that she won't forget about her. Find #b#t4032762##k, which was stolen by some #r#o3150000# Signs#k a long time ago, and deliver it to #b#p2152004##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032762# #t4032762# #b#c4032762# / 1#k
#p2152004# was so excited to receive #t4032762#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Unexpected Problem
Retrieve a #t4032763# from #b#p2152004##k.

#p2152004# offers you a used Oxygen Respirator that looks like it was thrown away by someone. He says it will be enough for #p2152005#... You can't imagine how a doctor could do something so unsanitary. Go see #b#p2152005##k.

#p2152005# was about to equip the #t4032763#, until he discovered something shocking. With the #o9300416# head taking up so much space, equipping an Oxygen Respirator was impossible! In retrospect, #p2152004# was wise in his decision...

string.name: name
string.value: The Truth
#b#p2152002##k says he has something to tell you about #m310000000#'s watchman, #p2152018#. Go see #b#p2152002##k and find out what it is.

According to #p2152002#, #p2152018# is originally from #m310000000#. He forced himself to become a part of the Black Wings, because he wanted to keep an eye on #p2154004#, his former lover currently being held hostage.\r\n\r\nHe says you should go to the walls of the mansion at 10 o'clock at night (Pacific Time) if you want to confirm his story about #p2152018#. According to him, you will find #p2152018#, waiting patiently for his love #p2154004# to return.

You returned after seeing #p2152018#. #p2152002# said that #p2152018# really wants to protect the town from the Black Wings, but can't, because #p2154004# is being held hostage. #p2152002# added that many people think #p2152018# betrayed his own town... #p2152002# said he hopes you don't think that, too.

string.name: name
string.value: Rebellious Movement
#m310000000#'s watchman #b#p2152016##k has something for you to do.

According to #p2152016#, a few town residents are plotting to fight against the Black Wings. The leader of the group is apparently #b#m310000003##k's #b#p2150003##k! #p2152016# wants you to interrogate #p2150003#.
#p2150003# denied doing anything dangerous like that. But, he did admit doing something at 6pm in #m310000003#.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Rebels
#p2150003# appears somewhat suspicious. Inform #b#p2152016##k of what you know.

#p2152016# is convinced that #p2150003# is building a bomb to terrorize the Black Wings, and he wants you to #rdestroy the dangerous item#k that #p2150003# is making. First, you have to #bwitness what he's doing by raiding the #m310000003# at 6pm (Pacific Time).
#p2150003# was looking for #o5100002# in order to research how to provide extra heat to expedite the hair-perming process.

string.name: name
string.value: Please Find My Little Brother
#b#m310000000##k's #bscaredy cat #p2152008##k needs your help.

#p2152008#'s brother #p2153003# has gone missing. He went to rescue #p2154004#, but went toward the #bMine#k where the adults warned them to stay away. #p2152008# is extremely worried. Find #b#p2153003##k for #p2152008#.
#p2153003# refused to return home until he finds #p2154004#. He looks like a healthy little boy and can probably take care of himself just fine.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secret Black Wing Portal

There is a strange device in front of the Mine that looks like a portal, but it isn't activated. You have numerous questions about the portal... Talk to #p2153001##k the #bportal manager. There must be a secret way to get to him from Road to the Mine 2.

The portal seems to have been made for the Black Wing management to travel quickly to Victoria Island. If you're not a part of the Black Wing management, you cannot use it. When you plead with #p2153001#, he asks you to eliminate #r#o3150002##k first.
#i4000607# #t4000607# #b#c4000607# / 100#k
When you eliminated #o3150002#, #p2153001# was thoroughly satisfied.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need a Sample of the Cells
The Black Wing mad scientist #b#p2154009##k in #m310060000# in the Mine is obsessed with experimenting.

#p2154009# says he's so curious about the Rue creation mechanism of the #r#o8105005##k that he simply cannot stand it anymore. He wants you to find him a #b#t4032776##k. He doesn't seem like he's in his right mind... \r\n\r\n#i4032776# #t4032776# #b#c4032776# / 30
#p2154009# laughs with happiness and excitement. With this DNA Sample, cloning an Ore Muncher may be possible... You see now that #p2154009# really isn't in his right mind.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Red Dahlia - Pirate
Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy. Shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Pirate

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Pirate
Okay, so now I gotta go see the sailor himself. Where must he be?
I delivered everything to Richard and he asked me delivered his letter to his wife.
I delivered everything to Richard and returned to Angelique. She gave me something nice, and I can go back to her anytime for a quick job.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons have fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons have fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Demise of a Madman

string.name: parent
string.value: The Terror of MV!
Charles has prepared a second task for us. Let's go find him! (You have to form a party for this task)
Charles has asked us to eliminate the madman known as 'MV'. \n\n#o9400705# #r#a50661##k
You've accomplished your task and gained EXP, 2500 mesos and a special gift!

string.name: name
string.value: 4 Candles
If I go see #b#p9000021##k, I can receive a candle? A special MapleStory 4 Year Anniversary event...? Sounds interesting.

#b#p9000021##k told me if I safely guard the candles for 30 minutes, I will receive a #b#t04001167##k. Since I have to maintain connection in order to protect the candles, might as well have fun and play all day today.

I received a #b#t04001167##k!\nAfter safely keeping the candles, I received a #t04001167#. I should store away the #b#t04220045##k that I received from #p9000021#.\n#p9000021# said if I collect 5 cake pieces and complete the birthday cake, I will get a large gift.

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Cody's 4 Year Anniversary Party!
#b#p9200000##k is said to be preparing something for MapleStory's 4 year anniversary. I should go see what he's up to.
Cody asked me to get him a #t04001126# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party.\n\n #i04032306# #t04032306# #b#c04032306##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody every day.

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Cody's 4 Year Anniversary Party!
#b#p9200000##k is said to be preparing something for MapleStory's 4 year anniversary. I should go see what he's up to.
Cody asked me to get him a #t04032307# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party. \n\n #i04032307# #t04032307# #b#c04032307##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody everyday.
