Cody asked me to get him a #t04032308# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party.\n\n #i04032308# #t04032308# #b#c04032308##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody every day.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons have fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons have fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Week Event - October 8th
#b#p9010010##k apparently has a special gift in celebration of the new school year...
#b#p9010010##k says that the gift will be mine if only I can keep the candle from blowing out for 1 hour. How exciting!
I received the #bOwl of Minerva#k as a gift! This should come in handy if ever I'm trying to go somewhere that's difficult to get to.

string.name: name
string.value: Meeting the Training Instructor
#b#@1022000:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he will help you train.
He says you can receive additional training from #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k.
The Path of a Warrior.

string.name: summary
string.value: Please go see #b#p9201119##k in #b#m102000000##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 500 Able to proceed to 'Advanced Training 1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Advanced Training 2' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Inspecting the Water Pipe

string.name: parent
string.value: Drought in Perion
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says there might be a problem with the Water Pipe.

Please inspect the Fire Hydrants to identify the cause of the problem.

Go to #b#m102040000##k and inspect the Fire Hydrants, and bring 3 #r#t4001340#s#k.
(Attack the Fire Hydrants with your weapon.)

Report back to #b#@9201120:##k in Kerning City upon completion.
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says he knows the reason why the Water Pipe is clogged.

string.name: summary
string.value: Inspect the Fire Hydrants and bring 3 chunks of #r#t4001340##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1500 Able to proceed to 'Sticky Slimes!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The First Encounter with Lucci
#b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k says he'll help you train further. Let's talk to him.
He says he has additional training courses for Magicians.\nLet's talk to #b#@9201121:##k in #bEllinia#k.
The Path of a Magician.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 500 Able to proceed to 'Rigorous Training 1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Rigorous Training 2' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Rigorous Training 3' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Rigorous Training 4' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Clues!

string.name: parent
string.value: The Cause of Sickness
#b#@9201120:##k in #bKerning City#k says he might have seen something strange near the Water Pipe.

He says he might have seen something strange near the Water Pipe.\nLet's go over to #b#m102050000##k and inspect the Fire Hydrants. Report back to #b#@9201120:##k in #bKerning City#k when you find the clue.
Someone had been spreading the virus through the Water Pipe. There must be some twisted figure behind all of this!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'To Perion!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Demon Behind It All

string.name: parent
string.value: Unveiling the Secret
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k says he's identified the emblem. Let's go see what he's discovered.

He says the emblem signifies #rMarbas#k, who is known for spreading diseases. He was sealed in #bEllinia#k, but someone has broken the seal.

First thing's first, though. He says you he needs a lot of Trees to stop the virus from spreading.
He says to hunt #rDark Stumps#k and #rAxe Stumps#k.
(He says they can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.)

Return to #b#@1022000:##k in Perion upon completion.
The emblem signified #rMarbas#k the demon; the virus was stopped by blocking the Water Pipe with the Trees.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,500 Able to proceed to 'Returning to Ellinia' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: First Encounter with Ervine
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he will help you train further. Let's talk to him.
Let's go find #b#@9201120:##k in #bKerning City#k for additional training.
The Path of a Thief.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 500 Able to proceed to 'Even More Challenging Training 1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Even More Challenging Training 2' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for the Lost Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost Book
#b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k wants your help in finding his #rLost Book#k. Let's go find him.
He says he lost the book in #b#m104040001##k and #b#m104040002##k on his way back from #bNautilus#k.\n\nHe says you may be able to find the #rLost Book#k if you keep hunting the monsters in the area.
#b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k says to return the #rLost Book#k to #b#@1012109:##k in #bHenesys#k. Letâ€™s go see #b#@9201118:##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2,700 Able to proceed to 'Returning the Book to Jay' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Returning the Book to Jay

string.name: parent
string.value: Lost Book
#b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k says to return the #rLost Book#k to #b#@1012109:##k in #bHenesys#k. Letâ€™s go see #b#@9201118:##k.
Let's take the #rLost Book#k over to #b#@1012109:##k in #bHenesys#k and return it to him.
#b#p1012109##k's #rLost Book#k disappeared because #b#p9201118##k borrowed it and lost it, but it was found in #b#m104040001##k.\n\nBut what in the world is the Statue of Leafre?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1000 Able to proceed to 'Meeting Kyrin of The Nautilus' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Baine Likes...

string.name: parent
string.value: Commotion on the Ship

#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says there was something very valuable amongst the things she's lost. She says to go talk to #b#@1092002:##k in #bNautilus#k, but there is also something you need to do first.

#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says you must make something amazing for #b#@1092002:##k.
If you bring her the following materials, she promises to make something special for Baine.

#rPig Vein#k(a drop item from #rRibbon Pigs#k that can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.)
#rDark Wooden Board#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.)
#rYoung Soul#k (a drop item of #rOrange Mushrooms#k.)

Report back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k after you collect all the items.
Talk to #b#@1092002:##k in #bNautilus#k to deliver #rKyrinvana's Guitar#k and ask about the #rLost Statue#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 4,500 #Wbasic# #i4032484:# #t4032484:# #c4032484# 1 Able to proceed to 'Commotion on the Ship, No More!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Encounter with Hill, the Antique Collector
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k says she'll help you train further. Let's go find her.
Find #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k for additional training.
The Path of a Bowman.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 500 Able to proceed to 'Show Me What You're Made Of-1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Show Me What You're Made Of-2' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Fairies Like...

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legend of Ancient Bow
#b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k says he'll tell you what the fairies like. Let's talk to him.

The fairies are very fond of the sound of Ocarina.



#b#@1012003:##k says he will make you an Ocarina if you bring back the following items.

#rTree Branch#k (a drop item from #rStumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100050000##k.)
#rEllinia Tree Barrel#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.)

Report back to #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@1032101:##k in #bEllinia#k will welcome you if you give her the Ocarina. Let's go see her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,000 #Wbasic# #i4032481:# #t4032481:# #c4032481# 1 Able to proceed to 'Solomon's Bow' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: So the Demons Like Noise?

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he's discovered the location of the demon, but you can't enter without a certain item. Let's talk to him.

You must have a noisy instrument in order to enter the Demon's Doorway in #b#m104040002##k.
He says he'll make you a loud instrument if you bring him the following materials.

#rOrange Mushroom Cap#k (a drop item from #rOrange Mushrooms#k)#rOctopus Leg Stick#k (a drop item from #rOctopuses#k. There is a portal near the yellow barricade in #b#m103010000##k which leads to a hidden map where many Octopuses can be found.)
#rPumpkin Head#k (a drop item from #rRibbon Pigs#k that can be easily found in #b#m103020100##k.)

Report back to #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he has located the demon but has no way of catching him. Let's talk to him first.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 4,500 #Wbasic# #i4032482:# #t4032482:# #c4032482# 1 Able to proceed to 'Catching the Demon' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Catching the Demon

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he has located the demon but has no way of catching him. Let's talk to him first.
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k is said to be the descendant of the hero who made #rSolomon's Bow#k. Find her and see if you can get her to tell you how to recover the power of Solomon's Bow.
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k says she knows how to restore the power of Solomon's Bow. Let's talk to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2500 Able to proceed to 'The Legendary Revival' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Finding Muirhat
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says she will help you train further. Let's talk to her.
Let's go find #b#@1092007:##k in #bNautilus#k for additional training.
The Path of a Pirate.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 500 Able to proceed to 'Rigorous Training! 1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Rigorous Training! 2' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Calming the Soul with Music

string.name: parent
string.value: Unveiling the Map
#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says the map is cursed with the blood of an animal, so you must calm the soul of the animal. Let's talk to her.

#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says you must have music to calm the soul.
She has asked you to bring back the following items.

#rLong Strong Stick#k (a drop item from #rStumps#k.)
#rSmall Snail Shell#k (a drop item from #rRed Snails#k.)
#rPiece of White Pants#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.)

Report back to #b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k will be able to solve the last mystery. But first, let's talk to #b#@1022007:##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 4,500 #Wbasic# #i4032488:# #t4032488:# #c4032488# 1 Able to proceed to 'To Kerning City' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: [Collect] Ew, It's Slimy!
#b#@1032106:##k in #b#m101000000##k has a favor to ask...

Something slimy is making it hard for the fairies to fly in the forest.

He has asked you to eliminate #rSlimes#k and bring back 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k 20.

Report back to #b#@1032106:##k in #b#m101000000##k when you finish collecting all the Squishy Liquids.
You have collected 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k for #b#p1032106##k. He thanked you for helping the fairies roam the forest freely.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 700

string.name: name
string.value: Really Zingy Kebab

The basic ingredient for this dish is the #bBloody Mushroom Wine#k. It also needs #bStirge Wings or Evil Eye Tails#k. Be sure to look around carefully, as they say that the frogs and cats roam around town when they are hungry. Sure, you might feel a bit wary about eating something that the Witch prepared...but it's not like you'll die, right?
After reciting a strange chant, the Witch makes you a dish that doesn't look too appetizing.

string.name: name
string.value: Witch's Special Stew

This dish is made using dishes that the Witch has already prepared. She will make it if you bring her #b1 Swamp Wrap, 1 Rough Leather Steak or 3 Slimy Canapes, and 3 Zingy Kebabs#k. Be sure to look around carefully, as they say that the frogs and cats roam around town when they are hungry. Sure, you might feel a bit wary about eating something that the Witch prepared...but it's not like you'll die, right?
After reciting a strange chant, the Witch makes you a dish that doesn't look too appetizing.

string.name: name
string.value: Butler: 'The Trap'
Things might seem rather ominous, but you must finish what you've started. Let's see what the butler, who is in the Foyer, has in mind.
It looks like you're fighting a girl ghost. And you also need to collect #r20 Olivia's Dolls#k. You could very well be dreaming...
Yes, you did it! The ghost has been vanquished and you collected #r20 Olivia's Dolls#k! Perhaps you've finally arrived at the end of this saga.

string.name: name
string.value: Butler: 'The Trap'
Things might seem rather ominous, but you must finish what you've started. Let's see what the butler, who is in the Foyer, has in mind.
It looks like you're fighting a girl ghost. And you also need to collect #r20 Olivia's Dolls#k. You could very well be dreaming...
Yes, you did it! The ghost has been vanquished and you collected #r20 Cursed Dolls#k! Perhaps you've finally arrived at the end of this saga.

string.name: name
string.value: Butler: 'The Trap'
Things might seem rather ominous, but you must finish what you've started. Let's see what the butler, who is in the Foyer, has in mind.
It looks like you're fighting a girl ghost. And you also need to collect #r20 Olivia's Dolls#k. You could very well be dreaming...
Yes, you did it! The ghost has been vanquished and you collected #r20 Cursed Dolls#k! Perhaps you've finally arrived at the end of this saga.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: 'Help Me'
The poor girl standing outside the mansion looks so frightened and alone. Let's see what she needs help with.
Olivia will not return inside to the Mansion until the #b100 Rotting Skeletons#k are defeated.
The #b100 Rotting Skeletons#k have been defeated. Olivia is now able to enter her home, but this might just be the beginning.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: 'Find My Daddy'
Those monsters have been defeated, but it looks like Olivia has something else to request.

In order to find the right key to the Piano Room, you must first obtain #b25 Silver Keys, 25 Gold Keys, and 25 Brass Keys#k. Though it would be easier if you could just break that door open instead...
You collected the #b25 Silver Keys, 25 Gold Keys, and 25 Brass Keys#k. But there's still more work to be done before you can relax.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: 'Bring My Daddy'
Is she still looking through those keys? Maybe she could benefit from some helping hands.

Olivia handed you her letter asking that you deliver it to her father right away. You can rescue Joe by using the key inside the letter. Now, let's see where this place is and get him out of there quick!
There must be some relief since you were able to unlock the Piano Room and get that letter to her father. But wait, you might just have another monkey on your back...

string.name: name
string.value: Joe: 'Clear the Way'
It looks like you found Olivia's father, Joe. Although he seems a little distraught, you will need to escort him to the front yard.
Joe would like you to kill #b100 Glutton Ghouls, 1 Psycho Jack #kso that he'd be able to walk through the hallway untouched.
You were able to defeat the#b 100 Glutton Ghouls, 1 Psycho Jack #k. The hallway is now clear for him to escape.

string.name: name
string.value: Father: 'Dirty House'
Well, the hallway is clear, but it doesn't appear like Joe is ready to move. What is it now?
Joe wants you to go #rfetch his butler, Steward#k, for him. Who does he think you are--his butler?
You finally located #rSteward the butler#k in the right room. He doesn't appear to be too happy at your arrival, though.

string.name: name
string.value: Steward: 'I'm a Butler, Not a Maid!'
You have arrived before Steward. It's uncertain how happy he'll be to see you though, especially when he hears what kind of job he'll have to do cleaning up this mess.
The butler advised that you to collect #b10 Tombstones#k to prove to Jonas that you are serious about the mission. You can find Tombstones by hunting monsters inside the Haunted Mansion.
Yes! You were able to collect the #b10 Tombstones#k and show Jonas that you want this whole thing to end. But it's questionable whether he got it completely...

string.name: name
string.value: Jonas: 'Jonas' Presence' 1
What in the world is Jonas doing, still hanging around? Whatever the reason, this haunting stuff needs to stop. You're about to have the chance to tell him face-to-face.

It appears Jonas would like you to retrieve #rSophilia's Favorite Doll#k. He mentioned that Sophilia kept her favorite doll inside a crate in one of her rooms. Bring it back to him. Where in this big ol' house could it be?
So, you finally got your hands on #rSophilia's Favorite Doll#k. Will this do the trick?

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: 'Help Me'
The poor girl standing outside the mansion looks so frightened and alone. Let's see what she needs help with.
Olivia will not return inside to the Mansion until the #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k are defeated.

string.value: Steward: 'I'm a Butler, Not a Maid!'
You have arrived before Steward. It's uncertain how happy he'll be to see you though, especially when he hears what kind of job he'll have to do cleaning up this mess.
The butler advised that you to collect #b10 Tombstones#k to prove to Jonas that you are serious about the mission. You can find Tombstones by hunting monsters inside the Haunted Mansion.
Yes! You were able to collect the #b10 Tombstones#k and show Jonas that you want this whole thing to end. But it's questionable whether he got it completely...

string.name: name
string.value: Jonas: 'Jonas' Presence' 3
What in the world is Jonas doing, still hanging around? Whatever the reason, this haunting stuff needs to stop. You're about to have the chance to tell him face-to-face.

It appears Jonas would like you to retrieve #rSophilia's Favorite Doll#k. He mentioned that Sophilia kept her favorite doll inside a crate in one of her rooms. Bring it back to him. Where in this big ol' house could it be?
So, you finally got your hands on #rSophilia's Favorite Doll#k. Will this do the trick?

string.name: name
string.value: Mardi Gras Throws
Would you like to participate in #rthe Mardi Gras Festival?#k If so, please see #bGaga.#k

Monsters attacked the storage room and looted the Beads we were saving up for the festival, stealing everything! If you eliminate the monsters and bring me #b10 Bead Necklaces#k, I'll make you #ra Mardi Gras Feather: Green, Purple, Red#k--whichever one you want!
You have returned with 10 Bead Necklaces that will be used in #bthe Mardi Gras Festival.#k You can participate in this event until #rMarch 15, 2011.#k

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 25, #p9010000# starts talking to you...
#p9010000# says that you can now receive a gift from #p9010010# and that you should go to town and meet #b#p9010010##k. She will be very happy to see you...
You received a #t1022097# that #p9010010# made herself. Work harder and reach Lv. 50 before #bMay 4#k to receive a scroll that can be used on it.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 30

string.name: name
string.value: A Second Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 45, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#b#p9010010##k congratulates you for reaching Lv. 45 and tells you that she will give you a scroll that can be used when you reach Lv. 50.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 60 by #bMay 4#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 50

string.name: name
string.value: The Shadow Knight in Dragon's Nest
The #p9010000# says that there is some news you should know about. Click on the light bulb over the #p9010000#'s head to hear the news!
The #p9010000# says to go through the Dimensional Mirror to get to Dragon's Nest, where you will find #p9201144#.
You spoke to #p9201144# in Dragon's Nest. He told you about some eggs you can obtain from the Dragon's Nest.

string.name: summary
string.value: Go to Dragon's Nest and look for #p9201144#.

string.name: name
string.value: The New Beginning

If you missed the 'I Need to Prove Myself to My Daughter,' 'Welcome Back to New Leaf City,' 'Nautilus' Secret Entree,' or 'Path of a True Mapler' quests, you can go back and revisit them. Just talk to Lilin in Rien.

If you missed the 'I Need to Prove Myself to My Daughter,' 'Welcome Back to New Leaf City,' 'Nautilus' Secret Entree,' or 'Path of a True Mapler' quests, you can go back and revisit them. Just talk to Lilin in Rien.

If you missed the 'I Need to Prove Myself to My Daughter,' 'Welcome Back to New Leaf City,' 'Nautilus' Secret Entree,' or 'Path of a True Mapler' quests, you can go back and revisit them. Just talk to Lilin in Rien.

string.name: name
string.value: Tourist Site: A Wild Monkey Mess
#p9000078#, the #b#m950100000##k PR Manager, seems to be encountering some problems. Talk to #b#p9000078##k.

#p9000078# says that the number of #t4000574#s being thrown away by the #o9409011#s is becoming a nuisance for tourists visiting the #m950100000#. Help #p9000078# by eliminating #r100 #o9409011#s#k and gathering #b50 #t4000574#s#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k.

#i4000574# #t4000574# #b#c4000574# / 50#k
#o9409011##r #a284241##k

Even though you eliminated the #o9409011#s and cleaned up the #t4000574#s, the #m950100000# still doesn't seem very clean. #p9000078# plans on continuing his clean-up of the place and asks that you come see him #bafter 1 hour#k, if you'd like to help.

string.name: name
string.value: Evolving Ring Event
The Evolving Ring Event is taking place to celebrate the launch of Big Bang! Go see Gaga to learn more about it.
Stay logged in for an hour each day to evolve your ring! Talk to Gaga for details.
Stay logged in for an hour each day to evolve your Evolving Ring. You can evolve it all the way up to Lv. 17, so keep at it and make the Ultimate Evolved Ring!

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - PQ Mania
#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n\n#kIf I achieve rank S in 5 party quests, I can get the #bPQ Mania#k title! Dalair is waiting for a warrior that can earn this honorable title.

#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n
#k 
 - Party Quest S Rank : #b#jscnt##k / 5 
 #jgaugePqS# #jperPqS# %

#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n
#k 
 - Party Quest S Rank: #b#jscnt##k / 5 
 #jgaugePqS# #jperPqS# %

I got rank S in 5 party quests! Dalair, the representative or the God of Honor, gave me the title of '#bPQ Mania#k'. He said this title is only for a small number of explorers like me who devote themselves to party quests.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Quest Specialist

#b#eTitle Challenge - Quest Specialist#n\n#k A warrior who completes 800 quests, not including event quests... I don't even know if that's possible. The Monk of Honor, Dalair, said a title called #e#bQuest Specialist#k#n will be given to the one who accomplishes this amazing feat.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Quest Specialist#n

#k - Completed Quests : #b#jcmpcnt##k / 800(excluding events)
 #jgaugeQCnt# #jperQCnt# %

#b#eTitle Challenge - Quest Specialist#n

#k - Completed Quests: #b#jcmpcnt##k / 800(not including events)
 #jgaugeQCnt# #jperQCnt# %

I finished 800 quests, not including event quests! On behalf of the God of Honor, Dalair awarded me with the title, '#bQuest Specialist#k'.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Celebrity!
#b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n\n#kA title given to those who increase their popularity by 1,000 within the 30 day time limit. I should talk to Dalair and try out for the #e#bCelebrity#n#k Medal.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n
#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes
 - Popularity Level : #b#jpopgap##k / #jpopG#
 #jgaugePop# #jperPop# %

#b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n
#k - Time Left: #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes
 - Popularity Level: #b#jpopgap##k / #jpopG#
 #jgaugePop# #jperPop# %

I raised my popularity by 1,000 within 30 days! Even Dalair seemed surprised by it, and he gave me the '#bCelebrity#k' title. Ha, maybe I should try out for the '#bMaple Idol Star#k' medal now.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Veteran Hunter

#b#eTitle Challenge - Veteran Hunter#n\n#kHunt #r1,000,000#k monsters that are higher level than you within 30 days! The Monk of Honor, Dalair, is looking for a clever hunter who has stamina. Anyone who completes this task will receive the title, #e#bVeteran Hunter#k#n. I heard that the person with the highest score will receive another title called #e#bLegendary Hunter (Special Title)#n#k...

#b#eTitle Challenge - Veteran Hunter#b#n

#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds
 - Hunted Monsters: #r#jmon##k / #jmg# #k
 #jgaugeHunt# #jperHunt# %

* Only monsters that are higher level than you count 
 (Characters that are level 120 or higher must hunt monsters that are level 120 or higher
 in order for it to count)

#b#eTitle Challenge - Legendary Hunter#n(Special Title)#k

 - Hunted Monster Count #1

#b#eTitle Challenge - Veteran Hunter#b#n

#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds
 - Hunted Monsters: #r#jmon##k / #jmg# #k
 #jgaugeHunt# #jperHunt# %

* Only monsters that are higher leveled than you count 
 (Characters that are level 120 or higher must hunt monsters that are level 120 or higher
 in order for it to count)

#b#eTitle Challenge - Legendary Hunter#n(Special Title)#k

 - Hunted Monster Count #1

I tried out for the Veteran Hunter title, which you get by hunting as many monsters your level or higher that you can within a specific time limit. Dalair said that if I want to become the '#bLegendary Hunter#k', don't forget the hunting record resets every 1st day of each month. Oh, he also said if I lose the Veteran Hunter medal, I have to redo the challenge so I should make sure to take good care of it.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Maple Idol Star
#b#eTitle Challenge - Maple Idol Star#n (Special Title)\n#kWho is the most beloved Mapler? The Monk of Honor, Dalair, said this person will be given the #e#bMaple Idol Star#k#n title.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Maple Idol Star#n(Special Title)\n\n#k - Popularity : #b#jpop##k

#b#eTitle Challenge - Maple Idol Star#n(Special Title)

#k - Popularity : #b#jpop##k 

'#bMaple Idol Star#k, the title that is given to the most popular person in Maple World'... Dalair said you have to have a good strategy in order to claim this title which you can only try out for once a month.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Horntail Slayer

#b#eTitle Challenge - Horntail Slayer#n(Special Title)\n#k#e#bHorntail Slayer#k#n, the title given to the person who slays the most Horntails! Dalair said that if I hunt a Horntail and don't report it to him, it won't count.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Horntail Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Horntail Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

After everyone reports to Dalair how many Horntails they hunted, the one who hunted the most will receive this title. But... wait? If I give up, I have to start all over when I try out again next time?!

#b#eTitle Challenge - Horntail Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Horntail Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

The honorable '#bHorntail Slayer#k' title is given to the one person who slays the most Horntails.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Adventurer
You can earn the #b<Beginner Adventurer>#k title by completing your 1st Job Advancement as an Adventurer.
Adventurers who complete the 1st Job Advancement will receive the #b<Beginner Adventurer>#k title. Let's go find NPC #p9000040#, who can be found in every town.
You have earned the #b<Beginner Adventurer>#k title by completing the 2nd Job Advancement as an Adventurer.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Report to NPC #b#p900040##k and receive the honorable #t1142107# Medal.

Maha...was your weapon...? You're beginning to remember...little by little...
Maha...was your weapon...? You're beginning to remember...little by little...
Maha...was your weapon...? You're beginning to remember...little by little...

string.name: name
string.value: Glorious Worker
#b#p9250125##k wants to reward you for your assistance in building the Time Machine.
#b#p9250125##k says you'll get a reward if you help for one week!\r\nHmmm, what could the reward be?
#b#p9250125##k gave you the OS4 Shuttle.
A Public Phone has been placed in every town.\r\nThe phone is ringing... Should you answer?
You picked up the phone and were connected with someone on the other line.
You must meet #b#p9250121##k, who is hidden in every town. Remember the formula: #rÎ”t = [ Î”t0 ] / [ root{ 1 - ( v/c )^2} ]#k that #b#p9250125##k mentioned.

string.name: name
string.value: OSSS Mission 1: Alien Elimination
Receive an OSSS Mission from #b#p9250133##k.

Defeat #b20 Powerful Aliens, 20 Wise Aliens, and 20 Lucky Aliens, who appear when you defeat Unidentified Powerful Aliens, Unidentified Wise Aliens, and Unidentified Lucky Aliens, respectively#k and return to #bHead Researcher Wynn#k.\r\n\r\nYou must be wearing a #bBing Machine or a Visitor Suit#k to defeat the aliens.
Receive this mission again after completing the other missions.

string.name: name
string.value: OSSS Mission 3: Alien Photo
Receive an OSSS Mission from #b#p9250133##k.
Use the #bOSSS Camera#k to take photographs of #b3 Unidentified Dexterous Aliens#k. \r\n\r\nYou can use the camera by #bdouble clicking on it in front of an Unidentified Dexterous Alien#k.
Receive this mission again after completing the other missions.

string.name: name
string.value: OSSS Mission 5: Infiltrating the Mothership
You can now infiltrate the alien mothership!\r\nGet a new OSSS mission from #b#p9250146##k at the mothership crash site.

Enter the Cube in the air through the mothership. 
Defeat all the aliens inside and return to #b#p9250146##k to get a medal.

You can enter #bthe most difficult Cube once a day, the middle difficulty Cube three times a day, and the low difficulty Cube without limit#k.

You will be required to wear the Visitor Suit, which is upgraded from Bing Machine-Alpha Suit when entering the Cubes except for the Lv.30 Cube.
Return tomorrow to infiltrate the mothership again.\r\nDon't forget that the future of Maple World is in your hands.
